Adresse: 21 Av. de la Prte de Ch√¢tillon, 75014 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Absolutely amazing food, fantastic atmosphere and great service! Highly recommend it for food, shisha and entertainment! 10/10üòÄ', 'very cool because without Alcohol!', 'Music is heard in hotel! It is very loud!', 'It was good for a change of scenery but just pay attention to the little details, the prices are not the same during the week and on weekends, also on Fridays, there is no point in wasting time with the waiters and wasting your time , in any case thank you for everyone', 'Excessive prices\nNothing, in my opinion, requires these prices whether for shisha or drinks.\nRegarding the service, you have to be very very very very patient in every sense of the word']

['Got there for a business dinner. Food is excellent! I also like the service and ambiance.', 'Fancy restaurant with very good and professional staff. We had a bussiness dinner here and it was perfect.', 'Very nice restaurant with typical French cuisine. Very nicely presented dishes and good service on the day of our visit. You can eat "a la carte" or you can choose a menu of entree, main dish and dessert at a price of 49Euros. In the summer they do outside seating which when the weather is good this can be very pleasant.', 'A very nice restaurant with a particular style, at the side of a beautiful old park. The service was very attentive in a traditional fashion, and the food was delicious and original. Portions were on the small side, so you can take three courses without feeling too full.', 'Beautiful place with excellent food, wine and service.']

['My partner and I dined in with 2 French local friends on a Monday night at 7:30pm. The restaurant was only 20% full. The portion size here is very generous. Complimentary bread was provided. The appetizers alone is a full meal in itself. We ordered a beef tartare with truffled Gorgonzola sauce and a foie gras to share and a side order of salad not knowing both the tartare and foie gras also came with the same salad. The salad comes with prosciutto and salami too, which was filling. Between my partner and I, we shared an octopus risotto with truffle flavor and tortellini with meatballs in mascarpone cream with Italian truffles. None of the dishes had any truffle flavor whatsoever. The octopus was overcooked and chewy. The tortellini was good just missing the truffle flavor. We were so full from the appetizers and salad we couldn‚Äôt finish our mains. After our friends paid for dinner the owner kindly offered us shots of limoncello.', 'Loved the food!! Went twice on vacation. Portion size is incredible and the taste is authentic Italian in Paris. Owner was wonderful!! Very friendly and personable. Don‚Äôt miss out on a wonderful meal and atmosphere. I‚Äôd give it 10!stars if I could.', 'We come to to this place when we want to eat a huge plate of tasty pasta, or should I say a huge pot. There is enough choices for all tastes and the prices are correct. The food is tasty and well made, but I would not recommend the starters unless you share the main dish. The staff is always on deck, you are quickly served. I would recommend coming early on weekends as the place can get crowdy. Enjoy !', "Fantastic flavours and service from start to finish - with a real sense of character and generosity. This was an absolute delight to find and I'd happily go back and explore the rest of the menu on future trips to Paris! Very memorable food and fun :)", 'The service was amazing.. Authentic. Truffle pasta to die for and all our plates were big portions! I highly recommend this  place we will surely be coming back']

['Located in the Cit√© Internationale Universitaire of Paris, this CROUS restaurant provides cheap and healthy meals for students at discount prices (1-3.30‚Ç¨). For the price, the food quality is great, although the customer service is incredibly disappointing and the hours are not great, especially as lines do tend to form in the evening. Great option for students during the week; without a student card it‚Äôs almost 10‚Ç¨ and not worth it. P.S. do not spend your money on the Saturday brunch, as it is almost double the price for a significant reduction in food quality.', "I like it!
Highly recommend:)
I arrived half an hour before closing time, and they still had food of all options! That's just amazing, because in other Crous restaurants they don't.
Also I got a hair in my food, but it still was very delicious! (No complaints, there were really a lot of people eating, so it's definitely their)
Amazing for its price!
(2 portions in the photo)", 'The food was very good for me ! But some stuff a bit unfriendly. But still best place to to grab quick cheap healthy meal.', 'I would give this place 0 star if I could. The utensils are incredibly dirty and the portions are really small.', 'Avoid the cashier ladyÔºÅÔºÅÔºÅRude service and over charges with no reason.

I‚Äôm a student with Izly account which works perfectly on my campus.

The rude woman overcharged me ‚Ç¨8.8, but she pretended it was my Izly account‚Äôs problem and told me to send the documents to Izly to get my money back. MADE LAUGH OF ME IN FRONT OF THE QUEUE! Intolerable ! ! ! So mean ! ! !']

['Good service they are really nice people and good food and drink. We really enjoy , thanks you ‚ù§Ô∏è', 'The waiter is a disaster. He doesn‚Äôt even have the slightest manners.', 'Very nice & friendly place. The hookah & food are so bomb ! Don‚Äôt hesitate guys you will not be disappointed. Thanks a lot to Malik who is very helpful and nice, I will def come back again !', 'Really bad! Especially very impolite personnel. Pay 3 euros more for a shisha, and go to a some touristic shisha places in rue Mouffetard!', 'Waste of money & time']

['We visited  la rotonde in march 2023. Jad√® was an wonderful server and very helpful. We appreciated her attempting English and she, our  attempting french. Definitely recommend stopping jn for a bowl of beuf Bourgogne of steak frites.', 'Very nice dinner, I have ordered the plat du jour, and what I ate was above and beyond expectations! Especially for the price point , I don‚Äôt think you can find any better value for money elsewhere. Also , the staff was very professional and welcoming. I will definitely come back', "It was the worst experience I had in Paris. Terrible service.

They instructed me to access the menu using the QR code. We were very clear in ordering a Parisian breakfast for 6.90, which on the menu included a hot drink + orange juice + croissant + omelette.

When the bill came, they charged me 14.90 for an American breakfast. I informed them of the mistake and they said that was it.

I showed that the menu listed everything for 6.90 and they said it was an error on their website.

The waitress called the person in charge of the establishment, who was completely rude. They also said that I should imagine that it wouldn't be that cheap, and that I would have to pay the bill.

In a normal situation I wouldn't pay and call the police, but to waste travel time on this, it was better not to go ahead.

Maybe it's no surprise that all the cafes had lots of customers and this one was almost empty.", 'We come here only for breakfast after tennis at Elisabeth. So it is convenient, great and affordable breakfast and good service', 'A nice caf√© to drink a good cappuccino and have a cigarette...']

['This place is such a hidden gem! The food is always fresh, full of flavor, and served with a smile. It‚Äôs a cozy spot perfect for a quick dine-in or takeout. The staff are super friendly and make you feel right at home. And on a side note, their Turkish baklava is absolutely the best I‚Äôve ever had.. sweet, flaky, and just perfect. Highly recommend stopping by!\n‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è', 'Delicious and cheap, very good restaurant for students nearby.', 'All of the staff is lovely, and the food is great üíï', 'Good food, reasonable price', 'Honest, simple, quick and satisfying burgers and kebabs. Warm service. A very pleasant experience overall. üëå']

['Best food in Paris! I enjoyed eating here on two different days and the owner is very welcoming and charismatic. I ate the fish Alfredo and the butchers special and enjoyed the quality and fresh ingredients. I highly recommend this restaurant.', 'If you enjoy mediocre, sarcastic, and aggressively passive service, be sure to visit this place.
From the beginning, it was clear that the experience would not be pleasant. When we asked the waiter if there was a table available, the answer we received was "bah ouais" (with a very unpleasant expression).
By the way, it is not worth mentioning all the unpleasant moments in this place.

To avoid.', 'Just delicious food. Cooked to perfection. Friendly and attentive waiters. We tried the cocktails too, definitely try the margaritas! One of the best I‚Äôve had.', 'Nice spot to step by and eat or drink. I had a good omelette and a glass of wine. The service was good and fast. I really appreciated the decorations of the indoor. Definitely okay!', 'Beautiful place at the entrance of a city park near the cit√® universitaire. Tasty food at reasonable prices. You have to try the croque madame with fried potatoes.']

Adresse: 94 Rue de l'Amiral Mouchez, 75014 Paris, France
Reviews:
['I‚Äôve visited this store twice since arriving in Paris, and unfortunately, both experiences have been unpleasant. On my first visit, the cashiers were unhelpful. Given the store‚Äôs proximity to an international university, I expected a bit more assistance, but instead, I was met with blank stares and confusion. I brushed it off, attributing it to potential language barriers.

However, my second visit was far more troubling. Yesterday, I experienced racial profiling. As I was checking out, the cashier asked me to open my purse‚Äîa request that wasn‚Äôt made of any other customers and wasn‚Äôt asked during my first visit. As an American, this behavior was shocking and left me feeling confused and uncomfortable. This experience has certainly impacted my impression of the store.

Additionally, I was rushed while trying to put my food away, which only added to the stress. They take two customers at the same time at the register, making the process overwhelming.

INTERNATIONAL KIDS BE WARY!!', "I walked in, no one said I couldn't enter the store, at 8:55, three grown men  came to me 2 minutes later and the cashier yelled at me to get out because they were closing, I was the only person they yelled at, I was telling them that I had one item to get and the two men followed me to yell at me and the cashier yelled at me, I left 9:00 on the dot. So idk, as a women in a country that is not my own to be yelled at by two grown men and embarrassed by a service worker when I did nothing wrong is gross and dangerous. If there is a reason to make clients leave I understand, but yelling I don't think should be accepted.", 'So far I saw expired products twice on the shelves in this store and mentioned it but apparently they don‚Äôt care.
They recently started asking people to open their bags when they leave the store.
What happened to this city?!', 'Cashiers are not too friendly, even though they speak English, they never want to answer anything in English, a bit disappointed. I even asked her politely "Parlez-vous anglais?" I thought people in the service industry would be kind since there are so many people of various nationalities in paris.', "During corona it is great to shop here. Unlike another supermarket, it is not insanely overcrowded and unlike people assume, the prices aren't really much different from the other supermarkets."]

['Great place where to have a beer at a reasonable price (6‚Ç¨ for a pint during happy hours). I really liked their tartare, it was tasty and fresh. I warmly recommend it.', 'It was very nice here.
The pizza was nice and tasty and the chips served with it were also nice.
The service was quick, however it was quite hot inside
Lovely location aswell.
Overall very nice here and it is worth visiting.', 'Very nice staff and fairly good price for the meal and portion size. I went to it three times for dinner since it was close by and tried different items on the menu - all of which were delicious! Would recommend :)', 'The staff was very accommodating and friendly. I want to give a higher review because of them. However, the food was bland and mediocre at best. It even remained lacking with the liberal use of salt and pepper. This would be perfect for a retirement home cafeteria.', 'We have been there 4 nights in the row. Was a perfect end after our daily Olympic trips through Paris. Staff and food were amazing.']

Adresse: 1 Rue de la Cit√© Universitaire, 75014 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Magnifique! The food here was delicious, the service was excellent, and the dining space is cozy with large windows. Highly recommend.', 'Food- super delicious
Place- clean
Resto owner- welcoming and friendly
=Perfection.

Will definitely come back', 'Heaven for Viet food lover. Excellent pho and a Hanoi beer. Super friendly owner.', 'The food is authentic and healthily cooked, and the service is personable. Also had a great iced Vietnamese coffee. The restaurant is small, but the tables are well arranged so diners are not so close together. The restaurant is right next to the Montsouris park, so it is easy to have a nice meal and then take a stroll in the park, around the pond.', "Very nice Vietnamese restaurant! The only issue is the greasy atmosphere in a rather small space: don't wear anything hard to wash or you might continue to enjoy your meal for a few more days. This being said, it is really worth it, though."]

["-----Pire pizza que j'ai jamais goute, dans toute ma vie, et a 15 euros en plus! Nous avons pris un marguerita, et nous n'avons pas pu le manger du tout. Le fromage n'est pas du mozzarella, mais un melange avec un fromage rapee generique ----c'etait juste degoutant . Le pain est trop epais, et pas bien cuite.  Les promotions (1 + 1 a -50%) ne sont valables que le midi et les hommes qui travaillent sont un peu trop malpoli.Je le deconseille sincerement.\n-----Worst pizza i've ever eaten, in my entire life, without any exaggeration. We were not even able to have more than a couple of bites, it was inedible...and honestly i am not very picky when it comes to pizza, i will usually eat anything resembling it! But not this one. :( It was 15 euros, which is rather expensive for a pizza in Paris. the cheese isn't quite mozzarella, but that very generic fromage rapee (less than emmental!) mixed with shredded mozzarella and it was just vile. the bread was far too thick and undercooked, no seasoning or anything. We tried to save it by adding oil and oregano but the cheese was still too disgusting. The men working there were a little rude, but not anything out of the ordinary I suppose. I truly recommend avoiding this place. I never leave google reviews, but i hope i can spare someone else the horror.", 'horrible. The man who delivered our food was inefficient, incredibly rude, loud, and threatening. Would not recommend this place to my worst enemy.', 'Literally the best meal I had since coming to Europe, and the nicest guys work there!', 'Top', 'Troo bon ‚ù§']

["Good, fast and cheap. If I want a quick pizza, I go here. It is a little hard to find. You have to go up a flight of stairs next to a Franprix on place de Rungis. Plus, it's small, having only a three or four tables.\n\nBut if you are in the neighborhood looking for a quick bite, you will find good food there.", 'Delicious pizza, friendly staff', 'Decent pizza at decent prices', 'Cool', 'Very successful pizza and tacos with unbeatable value for money, little waiting and correct delivery']

['Came to paris, and wanted to find a good hookah caf√©. This one is perfect. Staff is super friendly, the drinks are delicious and hookah very nice. I highly recommend this place.', 'Just on vacation in paris, my friend recommended this hookah. Good food and great prices! Come here for a lot of fun!

Le 75 is le Q.G! ‚ù§Ô∏è', 'Very nice place ü§©
Food was good üëçüèº
Pleasant waitress', 'Very tasty food...  Specially cordon blu maison', 'Very good restaurant...']

["Very friendly!
I ordered multiple times from here and never was disappointed
Plus it's a great value for the money

I specially recommend the ch√®vre miel pizza!
Enjoy", 'Good, cheap, amazing. Open on sundays', "Food is OK, but takes quite long as well as the kebab sandwich being quite plain, as it doesn't contain any salad whatsoever. All in all, an ok bistro if you have to eat on the go", 'Very satisfied with the quality of the kebab for this price.
They gave me a lot of meat and the fried are crunchy.
I recommend taking a set-menu for the can drink :)', 'Excellent, authetntic North African kebab meals at excellent prices. Fresh produce and excellent service. You have to eat here.']

Adresse: 97 Rue de l'Amiral Mouchez, 75013 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Visited after Paris FC v Rodez.
Very surprised by all the negative reviews! Excellent pricing for Paris, quick and friendly staff.
We will come back to try the food.', '100 points to the young girl who works here, super friendly, quick, with good English. Food was good, we tried burgers maison.', 'Authentic French bistro. The terrine de sanglier was home made and delicious. I recommend the raie and the plateau de fromage.

Excellent quality, great value for money, a wonderful place to meet an old friend.', 'Change of ownership : The best place to get a drink with friends. The staff are very friendly; I highly recommend it.', 'Very welcoming and friendly staff. We are regulars here now!']

['Top caf√©', "Very disappointing. Unfriendly service, waiters who say bad things about customers out loud. Chopped steak with nerves, no more fries in the afternoon, poorly filled glasses of beer...\nIn short, we won't be coming back!", 'Great couscous and served by the very nice brothers!', 'Thank you for your', '']

['The nicest service EVER. Comfy food in a homy place where you are treated with such warmth!!!! The daily menu they serve is 100% home-made and tasty. Great price as well.', 'We eat here in the lunch time. We found the place to sit with the pram. So if you travel with a toddler you can get here the great service. We took dishes of the day and dessert and everything were extremely delicious.', 'Parfait', 'We enjoyed the food very much.', 'Good chef, fun bar tender, cool music']

['Highly recommend this excellent Thai food.  We had spring rolls, chicken pad Thai, Red Curry Chicken, basil chicken, fried rice, and rice.  Every dish was amazing with perfect flavors.   This was the right quantity for 3 people.  We had little leftover that they packed for us.  Prices are reasonable.', 'Cozy little restaurant. The p√¢tes thai were really delicious, and I would definitely take them again. The citronelle and scampi soup was also very fragrant, If you like citronelle, I can recommend it.', 'The lemongrass soup is amazing! Great food and service. Thank you!', 'Very enjoyable Khmer meal from papaya salad to pad thai,  nice and spicy, very friendly, and courteous üòã', 'The food is good, but not the dessert. The service was really not good. She was chasing us to order and took our plates so quickly. The dessert, we took a roll of banana chocolate, and our kid didn‚Äôt like it. I did taste the dessert and the roll tasted very old and oily. At least, they could put some music on Friday evening. I recommend only for takeout.']

['Excellent thai and chinese cuisines with very friendly and accomodative staff service. Had a great dinner with table French wine at very affordable price. Highly recommended to visit. Roasted duck and sticky rice are my recommendations with the local wine. Location is near to a well connected area with multiple bus and metro stations in close proximity. Lots of hotels like Ibis & Novotel in walking distance. Make sure to drop by if you stay in the locality', 'Extraordinary food. We came across this place by chance. We were starving and wanted something good but not too expensive. The beef with basil was simply amazing. The service was really friendly and helped us order. The best unplanned dinner we had in Paris.', 'Pad Thai with prawns was amazing, we even order it for a second time to share, even the couple behind us order it twice too. Honestly, you cannot miss the pad thai.', 'Love to dine in this restaurant.the menu is extensive and the food is great.Especially the set meal is really worth it.The service is great too .my stay in Paris only 3 nights came here to eat dinner twice.', 'Delicious with reasonable price']

Adresse: 72 Rue de la Colonie, 75013 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Cute restaurant with authentic Chinese food!

We went here for lunch on Christmas Eve and was impressed by the authenticity. We ordered hot and sour soup (ÈÖ∏Ëæ£Ê±§), green beans (Âπ≤ÁÖ∏ÂõõÂ≠£Ë±Ü), spicy mapo tofu (È∫ªÂ©ÜË±ÜËÖê) and duck breast (‰∫¨ÈÖ±È∏≠ËÑØ). The soup was very appetizing with right about of seasoning and texture. The texture of the soup can be tricky as you need to put right amount of corn starch. The green beans were well cooked also. The chef did a good job in bringing out the crispness of the beans.

Overall a five star for me! üëç', 'This‚Äôs a secret place,a hidden gem,variety choices on the menu, all dishes are delicious,delicate and great portions !plus,friendly staff !', 'I must have a very bad luck or there must have something wrong with the rating to have the worst dumplings in my life. I believe that you can feel that disappointing dumpling even you are not an Asian or not use to have dumpling, a very basic one for a restaurant like this. üéÉüéÉüéÉ', 'Very good food and impeccable service', 'A very authentic Chinese restaurant, the ingredients they used in the marmite are rich, the duck and lambs meat are tender and soft. I recommend']

["A real neighborhood bistro like you can't find anymore these days! Friendliness is anchored in the rock, regulars or one-day customers feel at home! H√©l√®ne is an exceptional manager, although the bar is warm and picturesque, without her it will have no meaning! The concerts organized from time to time will take you to a little-known dimension! That of artistic and human excellence, you can simply play cards, chess or 421...enjoy the cocktails üç∏ and the essential ginger rum and coffee rum. Don't hesitate!", "In Paris, few bars still have a real soul. Chez H√©l√®ne is one of them. Shy neophytes, don't be afraid to open the door of this den where humanity, celebration and passionate discussions follow one another until you drop. It is here that the history of Paris and the lower part of the village of Butte aux Cailles resides.", 'Passing by chance (and timidly) in front of this beautiful place, I was shaken by the courtesy of the owner. She said hello, I turned around and walked into her bar. Not having found my beloved casanis, I drank half pelforths... I will return there very soon to make it one of my HQs. We feel so good in this neighborhood family bar. H√©l√®ne has a sensitive and precious ear, she sings very well.', 'The atmosphere is truly extraordinary in this small neighborhood bar.  Popular and friendly people dance to music from the 80s. They welcome you with open arms.  I will go back often because the boss is cool!', 'Neighborhood bar as charming as it is friendly with a musical atmosphere that would make many people envious. The hostess H√©l√®ne, warm, charming, attentive, will put you at ease. My only regret is not having stayed there longer...']

['The Lao cuisine can be discovered and appreciated in this restaurant, which has done some renovation and has a proper toilet area, next to the counter.
The unwritten rule is that only the man boss is allowed to allocate you a table and only him is allowed to take your initial order. So, need to understand this rule and be patient, especially when it‚Äôs getting crowded and most of time is crowded.
The numerous dishes are delicious, the portions are generous for most of them and the complimentary vegetables and herbs are the complete set that any Lao person expects to get to enjoy the dish.
The price is very competitive in Paris.', 'good food and service is fine just took really long time to get our order and more time to serve our foods hopefully to adds more meat as you can see more on noodles not much ingredients üòÖ', 'We came in as a big group on a Sunday lunchtime and we get served fairly quickly. The food is really nice at a reasonable price here. If you are really hungry, definitely come here they will fill you up.', 'We arrived around 8.30pm on a Sunday and we were second in the queue for a table. We waited for about 20 minutes for a table to be available. The first disappointment came that I kept getting attention from waiters that I‚Äôm ready to order several times but I was kept being ignored, maybe because my table is next to the window behind a pillar. The table next to us arrived after us but ordered food way before us. We waited for about 20 minutes before placing the order. The frustration is that only the owner can take the order which is the main reason why it‚Äôs so slow. When I complained this to the owner, he said:‚ÄùDid you see we are very busy? Do you want to place order now or what?‚Äù He is certainly doesn‚Äôt care about losing one customer since the restaurant is so busy. He didn‚Äôt argue with me but clearly his attitude is ‚Äòwhatever‚Äô- I don‚Äôt need your business! It was well after 9pm when we ordered the food and that‚Äôs very late for a family with young child to dine out.
My first impression after seeing the menu is wow- the price is really good! So I ordered 6 dishes altogether for 3 of us (one is child). The food tastes okay but I was disappointed to find out the portion size is very small. They are all starter sizes. So I ended up ordering an extra dish after we finished all food as we weee still hungry. The last dish was supposed to be spicy duck salad but it definitely didn‚Äôt taste like duck but more like liver. I didn‚Äôt complain as it‚Äôs so late and I just want to leave. So each individual dish is quite cheap, it‚Äôs only because it‚Äôs starter portion size. Our bill at the end is about ‚Ç¨65 for 2 adults and 1 child which isn‚Äôt cheap and we only had water. All in all, it‚Äôs somewhere I would want to return.', 'The restaurant is located in the district number 13 of Paris, in the Asian town.

The restaurant is kind of cosy. It has a traditional Asian look from the outside and from the inside too.

The menu is huge. It took me a while to decide for the dishes I wanted to try! Food is simply delicious. Full of flavours Portions are good size.

Service is nice, fast and friendly. They speak little English, but just enough for them to get by when you order.

Highly recommended']

Adresse: 72 Rue de la Colonie, 75013 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Super', 'Excellent restaurant', 'Super', 'Top', "Indian dishes without taste, uncooked meat and lots of fat. naan with very little cheese, almost impossible to find, still happy that there is good decor. Classic Asian dishes for the price I don't recommend at all"]

Adresse: 79 Rue de la Colonie, 75013 Paris, France
Reviews: ['We came here for dinner. The staff was great, the food was awesome, and you can watch your food being cooked.  We had curry and vindaloo, both of which were perfect. The Naan bread was freshly cooked to order, just perfect!', 'We had the vegetable samosas, the vegetable biryani, the boeuf dal dadoca, the garlic nann, and the mango and pistachio ice cream. All the food was delicious, it came promptly and it was more then enough for two people. The server was very kind, friendly, and helpful. We took leftovers home and the waiter gave us little to go containers for the homemade sauces. I highly recommend eating here!', 'Food is great. Friendly staff. Very reasonable price. You get to taste the authentic biryani here. Must try.\nMaybe the place can upscale a bit in regards with ambience and decor but the taste of food makes you forget about it.', 'Very good food, friendly staff and affordable menus. Definitely worth coming back !', 'the food was great, satisfied my craving for South Asian food; the two guys that were working were super nice too and it was great to chat with them and hear about their stories and all']

['Fresh orange juice on the spot for less than 2 euro.', "Employees don't want to work and close the doors 10 minutes before the closing time. Maybe, their management is already sleeping.", 'Nice place to pick up groceries or any food item you can think of. Place looks small from outside, but is much bigger inside. They have a huge wine section. They also sell beer and hard liquor. Fresh food, frozen food, cold cuts, juices.. it seems to have any thing in food. Great option if you are staying nearby and doing self catering.', 'The franprix labeled frozen cauliflower was molded - waste of time, money, and the food! Very disappointing - i understand at some point they can‚Äôt see the inside of ¬¥food‚Äô due to the packaging however how frozen vegetables can be molded ? Never going again :(', 'Staffs were helpful.']

['The atmosphere here is great, and I really enjoyed the vibe. However, the service left much to be desired. Despite not being French, I‚Äôm still a paying customer and should be treated as such. There was no greeting, not even a simple ‚Äòbonjour,‚Äô and I had to track down our server while she was outside smoking with friends to get any attention. Because of her attitude, I‚Äôm not sure I‚Äôll be returning. If I do, I‚Äôll just stick to ordering at the bar. The experience felt discriminatory, which is really disappointing', 'Had the chicken burger and got so impressed! Super super delicious
I went during a rainy saturday and the place was very cozy inside and with very good music playing.
Hamza was the person who took care of us and he did it with a contagious good mood and agility!', 'Absolutely beautiful !!
A real stand out experience the waiter was very helpful and accommodating. Relaxed local atmosphere.
We had not planned our visit here just stopped in as needed to eat before heading to the airport. The food was great, my son says it was the best burger he ever had ! Thank you for the staff for being so accommodating!', "I visited with my friend and we sat outside on this nice summer evening.

I ordered a Vegetarian Burger for ‚Ç¨15.5 and my friend took American burger for ‚Ç¨15!
The service was nice and quick.

The food was quite good with a nice presentation as well. The ambiance outside is okayish with several other customers, and only problem being right next to the bus stop.

Otherwise it's okay, maybe a bit too pricey. Didn't grab a drink this time, maybe next time!", 'Staff are super friendly and helpful. Food was good. Beer is priced well.']

['I am from Germany but I will come back only for their pizza!!! The workers are so nice, great service üëçüíØ UNDERRATED and needs more attention, very delicious!!!!!!!!!!!!', "Very helpful staff considering I don't speak French.
Lovely pizza reminds me of back home.
Plenty of toppings
Great value", 'Amazing place', 'Very good restaurant. Pizza too good. Tagliatelle, a real delight. Everything we ate was really good. I recommend 100%. And also not expensive. üëç', 'Great value for money. Pizza delivered on time and very good']

["Little northern Chinese shop in an area dominated by vietnamese noodle shops. But it's clear why they are still standing strong. The simple flavors of their dumplings are a nice change. Went only for the dumplings and steamed buns, but enough options and I believe that's their strong point. Don't forget to dip with a vinegar chili oil mix you can prepare yourself. Good food doesn't have to be complex. Nice little shop and friendly shop keeper are a plus!", "One of the best restaurants in the neighborhood. The food is excellent, the staff is super nice, the prices are extremely reasonable given everything. It's relatively hidden in a smaller side street, but absolutely worth the detour", "Didn't try the other dishes but the dumplings are delicious.", "Loved this place!
Very good value for money. I had the dumplings and stir fried noodles (13 euros total). The portions are huge!

Make sure you have cash if you plan on not eating too much as they only accept card for payments above 12 euros.

Looks like it's family run. The lady who ran the place was really nice and friendly.

Will definitely go back and recommend to other people too :)", "Really tasty spicy food, dishes from northeast China. The specialty of the house is ravioli, they have like 8 different types that serve, fried, boild or steamed in portions of 10, from ~‚Ç¨5,5 up, depending on the type, but it is rather cheap and all are homemade. Do not let the pic disappoint you, we took the food home so the ravioli spent 2 hours pressed in the container and ended up sticking to each other, but were really tasty.
We ordered mapo tofu, sea-flavoured aubergine and sauteed green beans.

The restaurant is kind of hidden: it doesn't have a very big sign on the door, nor a big window showing the dining room, so pay attention when you go to find it.

Ë∞¢Ë∞¢‰Ω†‰ª¨ÁÉ≠ÊÉÖÁöÑÊ¨¢Ëøé! ÊàëÂÜç‰ºöÂà∞‰Ω†‰ª¨ÂÆ∂ÂéªÈ•±È•±Âè£Á¶è!"]

Adresse: 78 Rue de l'Amiral Mouchez, 75014 Paris, France
Reviews: ['The flavours are very good. Pizza and lasagna. It‚Äôs hard to find pizza in France that balances well the sauce to cheese ratio but they do a decent job. The people are also nice. The portions are not large but the prices are also reasonable. Not sure why the rating is not higher. It‚Äôs not fancy but it‚Äôs a good neighborhood place.', 'Delicious and affordable pizzas, incredibly nice staff', 'We had the breaded chicken with pasta and midi salad. Feels like you are dining in someone‚Äôs home instead of a restaurant. Staff are friendly and provide quick and kind service. Ate here a few times the three weeks we were here.', "This place is charming and affordable. The server was lovely, and very patient with my terrible French. Lots of neighborhood folk picked up takeaway pizzas while we were there. I wish I'd found this place sooner‚Äîwould definitely return if I were staying around these parts longer.", 'Top!']

['If I could give 0 star, I would. Worst of the worst!

After reading all the 1-star reviews, I fully understand all these peoples‚Äô frustration.

I am writing to express my deep dissatisfaction with the appalling treatment we received at your restaurant. One of your staff, a Chinese lady, was shockingly rude, publicly chasing us out in front of other patrons. All we did was enter through the restaurant while trying to find an exit because the mall was shut and the usual way out was blocked.

Her behavior was absolutely disgraceful‚Äîthere was no need to treat us with such disrespect. Why couldn‚Äôt she simply explain the situation politely instead of resorting to such hostile actions? Because of her disgusting attitude, I will never patronize your establishment again and will make sure others know about this unacceptable experience. üëéüèªüëéüèªüëéüèª', "Went there for lunch
It was already fully packed with people
Waiters running here and there. Couldn't believe how busy they were....
Their food was delicious
Service could be improved
Forgot to take the picture of the noodle which was very traditional made from ChaoZhou

üëç", 'Great food. service is great if you manage to catch the trolleys. Location is okay.', "Wish I had more pictures to upload what a gem this place is it's like an old Hong Kong dimsum restaurant food was amazing and staff were brilliant on helping us must visit if u love dimsum", "Went there on a Sunday to have lunch before we headed back home and it was packed! Super tasty food and definitely more than worth the price. We had yum cha and then some noodles (which I sadly didm't take a picture of), and all of it was prepared to perfection. In my opinion the staff being a bit less courteous according to the other reviewers is a non-issue, they were super busy so of course you won't get the same attention but the food more than made up for it and they were quite kind in any case."]

['Well coffee was a bit smaller than the US. But that s understandable since it s a culture thing here. Overall thumbs up!', 'Slow service, employes are chatting and working at ease while there is a long waiting line.', "Sadly a very regular McDonald's, it appears in some articles and searches for Little China/Chinatown Paris. But no other difference than description in Chinese, could be a tourist attraction if they would work with the given area.", 'I visited today But There Toilet Not Clean. Please Respect Customer & Focus on Your Surface . Thanks for your Understanding', 'If you shop in Casino before you will get a promotion for a free sandwich(burger).\nService here is busy but normally quite quick. Popular items are always hot due to the turnover, less popular items can be varied.']

['Had dinner at Lao Viet at the recommendation of a extended family member and I had the best Vietnamese/Laos dishes ever! The appetizers are a wonderful idea for sharing, had the shrimp ravioli soup which is delicious (heads up: it has cilantro so if you‚Äôre not a fan, you can ask to have it remove). It‚Äôs a family owned business restaurant, everyone is extremely kind! The whole experience (culinary and ambiance) is amazing. Will come back on the next visit in Paris. Thank you!', "I ordered take out here. I assumed they would put chopsticks inside so I didn't check... if you still want to get take out after reading this review, you should ask them for chopsticks or fork.\nYou can see pictures of the food. Not very appealing! I wish I could say the smell was any better, but it wasn't. There were small slices of lemon with the skin inside the salad and also unpealed crabü¶Ä that I had to fish out cause I felt like someone prepared my salad on a rock by the sea and suddenly they saw a crab trying to steal the food so they crushed it and mixed it with the rest of the ingredients!\nI am a hard-core fan of Asian food but this was my first time trying Laotian food. So I can't honestly say if I don't like their cuisine or if this restaurant was really bad... I'm just gonna say to all the readers who are like me : approach with utmost caution! This could be the worst meal of your life!", 'Im Vietnamese so Im quite picky when eating Vietnamese food but Ph·ªü in this restaurant is really delicious and tastes 99% the same with the one I ate in Hanoi. Moreover, there are lot of beef in the dish, which is a big plus. I will give this restaurant 10000000 points.', 'The food was good, prices were correct, I recommend the Nem Lao !', 'Fried noodles are good! Be careful chili sauce is really spicy üå∂!']

['Tang Fr√®res is hands down the best spot outside of Asia to find an incredible selection of Asian fruits. From fresh green baby mangos and lychees to dragon fruits and rambutans, they‚Äôve got it all, and at great prices!\n\nAfter savoring some rich garlicky escargots, head to Tang Fr√®res to cleanse your palate with their crisp, tangy green baby mangos.', 'Huge Asian supermarket with many locations in Paris. Their prices are reasonable compared to other supermarket nearby.', 'Tang Freres is where you want to find Asian foods including typical Vietnamese foods such as coriander, rice rolls, dumplings, spring rolls... fresh and delicious food. In addition, there are many special spices, no shortage of anything, including moon cakes during the mid-autumn season or broken rice for those who like to eat broken rice - a typical dish, must try when coming to Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.', 'Really the best and probably biggest Asian supermarket in Paris. They have so many different varieties of Asian goodies, ranging from exotic fruits and vegetables to snacks to loads of frozen goods. Staff is also always super friendly and helpful.', 'Big Asian supermarket. Has pretty much everything. Prices are ok. Good market to go in get what you need and leave. Dont expect fancy, cleanness, helps, etc‚Ä¶kinda hard to find too.']

['Nice atmosphere, decorated with contemporary and popular art, prices were super affordable, bo bun was super good, and we tried the imperial noodle soup with porc foot. Spicy! Would go back üëç', 'This place is a must visit if you‚Äôre in the area! This was amazing service, normal prices and fantastic pho! Some of the best pho I have had in years. The broth was packed with flavor. They were able to accommodate my group of six and even opened up a second side to make room for us. The server was very kind even though our French was not very good.', 'One of the best Pho in Paris.

Service was good with attentiveness, The restaurant was not busy when I visited but the foot traffic was steady after I left around 1pm, also I noticed that the other half of the restaurant (next door) was half filled.

The broth was light with mild flavours and aromas, beefy notes with a light sweetness.

Pho Bida is commonly for light Pho and best for Breakfast or lunch as it is not too heavy.', 'Came twice to pho Bida in my first time to Paris on a recommendation. I‚Äôve had a lot of Pho in Toronto and this is by far the best pho I‚Äôve ever had. Needed to eat their pho twice. The only negative is their shallow metal spoons that prevent better soup eating! Highly recommend.', "The Pho Bida has a great atmosphere, the staff is very helpful and kind. I had a great time, I shared three different kinds of meals, they were all very tasty is particular the soup of the pho. We also didn't have to wait long to eat, everything came at a very fast pace.The prices are also very cheap for the quality served.
I would recommend and come back again."]

["Tricotin recommended by my uncle, a loyal customer for 30 years who always urges me to visit it. It's not overly fancy, but the vibe is authentic and the food is delicious, making you feel like you're not in Paris. You can see the culture reflected in the decoration and the tableware they offer.üëç
I've visited ten times and each visit the food gets better!! my all time fav dishes are the shrimp spring rolls, shrimp soup, noodles with beef and onions, and their special five-times-spicy sauce üòãüòã Whenever I dine there, I always end up ordering the same onesüòÖ
The respectful, knowledgeable, and kind staff enhance the experience even more. Highly recommended! ü§çüëç", "A Hidden Gem in Paris Chinatown

This restaurant is a delightful surprise, offering an authentic blend of Vietnamese, Chinese, and Cambodian cuisines. Recommended by a Cambodian friend with connections to the staff, we were treated to an exceptional dining experience.

The menu showcases a diverse array of dishes, each executed with skill and authenticity. Every plate that arrived at our table was a hit, demonstrating the kitchen's consistent quality across various Asian culinary traditions.

Despite the bustling atmosphere and full house, the service was impressively swift and attentive. The ambiance perfectly captures the essence of a genuine Asian eatery, transporting diners to the vibrant streets of Southeast Asia.

As Khmer speakers, we may have received some extra attention, but the overall experience suggests that all patrons are in for a treat. This restaurant is a must-visit for anyone craving authentic Asian flavors in the heart of Paris.

I'm already looking forward to my next visit to explore more of their tantalizing menu.", 'The food was very good, with a great atmosphere and good prices. The soup had a strange taste to me, perhaps because it‚Äôs something new to my palate, but overall, everything was great.', 'The service is good and quick, the food is good and affordable. Nothing amazing but we had a nice meal here. It was rather busy but we still didn‚Äôt have to wait long and we didn‚Äôt have to wait long between each dish coming out.', "TLDR: Affordable, quite tasty, quick service.

Came here with a friend to try out some Asian foods. We were immediately seated, very quick service, the staff can speak multiple languages (Vietnamese, Chinese, Khmer, English, French). The food was served instantly, tasted okay, suited the price though. Most of the dishes are around 10 euros.

Don't try Vietnamese coffee here, just Americano + condensed milk, it tastes bland. Others were fine."]

['You can really feel this old Hong Kong movie vibe walking in this place, decent food quality with the prices they have, especially in 2024 after inflation! Staffs were talking in Cantonese but food was more of a Vietnamese Cambodian southeastern Asian style, highly recommended!', 'Hidden gem of 13th arrondissement !!!

Authentic Chinese, Thai, Cambodian, Vietnamese dishes in one restaurant !!!

Overlook its outdated appearance and you will be happy for finding this wonderful restaurant !!!!', 'The interior and exterior of the Restaurant de Paris may look very outdated and the place itself is hidden in a block behind the main street... but they are serving the same quality food for a long time!

I particularly love their roasted meats, homemade, always fresh and tasty!

They offer a very large choice of Chinese, Thai and Vietnamese dishes very well executed.

The service is above average compared to how you would be treated in most of the restaurants in the Paris Chinatown.', "We were literally forced to sit down at a table even though we hadn't made a decision at the time. We decided to give this place a chance because the hosts gave the impression of a rather nice elderly couple. In the end we waited half an hour for our order and were brought horrible food, all the food had an unpleasant musty taste. The drinks tasted disgusting even though we ordered just coffee and coconut water, simple drinks that are hard to spoil. When we complained about the drinks we didn't get any empathy from the staff. There were other guests sitting behind us who were not happy either.", 'I had an excellent beef noodle soup but my three friends meals were not good and had no flavor. They overcharged one of my friends and he got sick from the food.']

Adresse: 42 Av. de la Prte d'Ivry, 75013 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Great tasting Japanese sushi and sashimi. Very reasonably priced and the quality of the food was sublime.The interior was quite basic. However, I would travel all the way back to Paris to eat here again, it was that good.', 'Very friendly staff and owner. I eat lots of sushi and the sashimi/ nigiri here is good. Its not Michelin level sushi obviously but its up there! Very happy to dine here again.', 'I highly recommend this place. Tasty japanese food with fresh ingredients. We ordered sushi, and some fried chicken bowls. Everything was amazing. The service was great. A place value for money definitely.', 'Very nice place, food is very tasty and reasonably priced. Owner/staff spoke English which was very helpful and the atmosphere is very relaxed. We got 2 dragon rolls, 1 California maki set and 2 drinks', "Another overrated restaurant. The owner was actually a bit biased if you don't speak French. I had the sushi rice bowl. The rice was almost like a porridge,very soft rice. When I feedback to him, the owner don't looks happy and to know more for improvement"]

["Well it's in Paris Chinatown, and there are Chinese people sitting drinking in the beer bars inside, quite unique... But that's about it.  It's like any other mail anywhere else.  It's not a bad thing, just not the Chinatown attraction thing you'd expect or hope for as a tourist.", 'I always like to buy Filipino pruduct in this store', 'Great mall, a bit tricky parking (the roads are too narrow)', "Nice little shopping center. Has a really large convenience store with rows upon rows of spices, canned stuff, drinks, meats, biscuits, and pretty much all you'd need to buy.

There's also a cool fish shop, a medical wing with a pharmacy, a dentist cabinet, and more, some clothing shops, and a handful of bars and restaurants.

It's on the small side for a mall imo, but it still packs quite a lot.", 'The store there the service seams like they dont want to serve us']

["Yummy Chinese food.

We tried to order the Roast Pork but they had run out.

We instead got Roast Duck (named Peking Duck) and the Char Siu.

Staff don't really know much English, so French is the way to go. We got away with speaking some half decent Mandarin.", 'I may be heavily biased as a Torontonian but I did not particularly find the food here good, average at best. We had a plate of veggies, pork, duck, and dry fried beef ho fun. Veggies were cooked well. Pork had barely any crisp to the crust which was the most disappointing part. The duck was thick and chewy. The beef in the ho fun was dry but the noodles were otherwise cooked ok. The Michelin recommendation is not supported on this visit sadly.', 'One of the best roasted ducks I‚Äôve had‚ÄîI‚Äôd compare it to Michelin spots in Hong Kong! The crispy pork had the perfect salty flavor, and the dumplings were packed with a generous filling. Highly recommend this restaurant! :)', 'I recommend this restaurant they make good traditional cantonese food with good service, generous portions and very reasonable prices. Their roasted duck was delicious, and the fried vegetable noodles were so good, obviously the noodles were fresh and home made. Their chicken with lemon sauce wasn‚Äôt so good, the fried chicken part was great but the lemon sauce tasted like candy, I think they went too much on the corn syrup or something made taste funny.
And I think they should pay more attention for the toilets because some customers misuse them.', 'There is a long line at the door with a full restaurant, which is always a good sign. The food is certainly not disappointing. I have not had good Chinese food for quite some time. The food quality and authenticity of this restaurant easily beat any Chinese restaurant in the entire DMV (Washington DC, Maryland, Northern Virginia) region. I know this at the first bite of the chicken dish, which you can tastes the real flavor of the chicken.  The seafood carousel is also very good.']

['We had a lovely experience in this restaurant. We did the six course tasting menu and every dish was tasty. The service is good. We were running a bit late and the restaurant didn‚Äôt have any issues with it.', 'This was great value for money. We opted for the six course tasting menu and we were delighted with everything offered - beautiful dishes, lots of inventive things but overall just really excellent food. The fish courses were a particular delight and the desserts (yes, plural, somehow) were some of the best we‚Äôve had. Great service (excellent English but also humoured us with our dodgy French) and would definitely recommend.', 'This was the best dinner experience I‚Äôve ever had in my life, incredible food and very attentive and charismatic waiters who took their time to explain everything in English. It was our first fine dining experience and we really enjoyed the friendly atmosphere. They were also very accommodating to our dietary restrictions (vegetarian and allergies). A special thanks to the service staff which were incredibly friendly people! Thank you!', 'Just one word to describe everything : perfect. We had the 6 course ala carte and every plate they put in our table is very fullfiling. And the price is not bad at all. Service was excellent and the ambiance of the place makes  you feel right at home. Parfait!', 'My husband found L‚ÄôHommage since we had an overnight in Paris before heading back home.

Wow!

This place really lives up to its place in the Michelin Guide! We had the six courses and they did not disappoint. From the amuse bouche through to the dessert, everything was perfection and the service was incroyable. Would definitely visit again when in Paris.']

["You know it's authentic when the mom is the cook and doesn't even speak French, and the daughter is the waitress. Everything was so amazing. Best Cambodian food we ever had, from the rice cakes to the spring rolls, the prawns and need dishes, highly recommend this gem.", 'Coconut chicken is so great, I would like to back again for it\U0001f979', 'Best Cambodian restaurant in Paris! It is my favorite place to eat! I recommend grilled pork ribs! and Amok. Very friendly service and all dishes tastes like warm homemade foods.', "Best Cambodian food I've ever tried. The dishes so so tasty and the owner is very friendly.", "Excellent  Cambodian restaurant, very good experience, the food is great and savory and they serve good portions, so you're full after eating there !!! üòÅüòÅüòÅ"]

['A little expensive but delicious. Clean and has a good service.', 'Great place : cheap and full meal, great taste, nice decoration, so clean, having A/C, calm street üòä', 'Nice food, nice service. Perfect for a quick lunch', 'Good food, simple but clean and new restaurant.  Tea was offered . Bimbimbap was not very big though', 'I highly recommend... Very nice food and service']

["This is generally a good Chinese restaurant with a very wide selection of Chinese dishes. I definitely recommend their Pekin duck, which was cut and served as a table side. The duck comes in an authentic way, with wraps and veggies and sauces that you can use to make a yummy duck wrap. We ordered a whole duck, had half of it in the pekin duck style and used the other half to make a duck veggie stir-fry dish and a duck stir-fry noodle dish. Although it's very considerate of the restaurant to offer us the option of using half of the duck to order other dishes, I wouldn't recommend the stir-fry dishes here. They were too oily for me and my friends, and all we could taste was oil, oil and oil. However, apart from the pekin duck, I definitely recommend the dim sums and Chinese dumplings here. They were so yummy and most of them tasted really authentic. I loved the soup dumplings and the shrimp dim sums the most. The restaurant is very spacious, so normally, even if you come without reservation, you don't need to wait for a long time. So to be brief, the pekin duck and dim sums are really great here, you wouldn't regret try them.", 'One of the oldest Chinese restaurant in Paris Chinatown. Food average, food quantity not enough. Only good for special event as they have a big big room. One of the biggest chinese restaurant in Paris Chinatown.', 'Friendly staff and service. A bit disappointed with the quality of the dim sum. Very pricey for what it is. But the whole duck and other dishes looked delicious and the restaurant was full by 12:30 on a Saturday. I would probably come back to try their family sized dishes. In the photo was the only dim sum dish that I thought was good.', "It's even better than most of the Chinese restaurant in China, the roast duck is just gorgeous beyond praise.", 'Best Chinese food in Paris or surrounding area.\nMy gastronomical highlight of Paris!']

['The restaurant owners is an old Vietnamese couple, they are fantastically nice and friendly, willing to share and explain the stories behind foods, it‚Äôs more than a 5star service. Highly recommend , highly respect , highly appreciate.

Foods r wonderful, thumb licking good! Especially the soup of pho, the fresh spring rolls

Best pho in Paris', 'We found a real gem! I had heard great reviews  about this place so decided to take my parents to try on our recent trip to Paris. My parents are from Vietnam and I have failed to find a pho restaurant in London which has impressed them. Finally Ph√≥ 18 impressed them with the quality of the pho (clean but flavoursome broth, perfect noodle texture and tender beef) and dessert (the ‚Äúthree colour‚Äù che ba mao coconut drink was the best we have ever had). The lovely owner talked us through how they make their delicious broth, confirming that each batch is made with large bones of Charolais beef (French bred and certified) which are slowly cooked each day to ensure a balanced flavour and freshness (there is no overnight broth which is why the broth is so clear in comparison to the cloudiness of other restaurants). The sweetness and flavours of the beef infiltrates the soup, without the need for strong seasoning (which some other restaurants will use to substitute flavour).  The che dessert is made fresh (not with artificial powders) and with quality coconut milk therefore there is a limited amount available so don‚Äôt miss this before they are sold out.  It‚Äôs a shame we do not live in Paris as we would certainly be regulars. Highly recommend this restaurant for those that want to enjoy high quality and authentic pho and che.', 'Everything we ordered tastes so good and got great portions, too. Eating outside on the street isnt also loud so it‚Äôs a great place to sit outside and enjoy the summer weather of Paris though you can also sit inside. Overall, would recommend if you‚Äôre into Vietnamese food with big portions. If you are a small eater, consider sharing with someone.

Enjoy!', 'Authentic Vietnamese food. Taste just like like the way I remember  in my childhood . I always order beef rice noodles soup and my husband always order beef and nem rice vermicelli.  They make really good 3 colors rich coconut milk drink/dessert.', "Pho 18 serves a good bun bo hue, on the menu as 'soup speciale au pied de cochon', with side of shrimp paste for adjustment to your liking. There's not much herbs but in Paris this seems to be the standard, they don't grow an abundance of herbs like you would get in a warmer climate. Soup was good, spring rolls are good, service warm and friendly."]

['The imperial concubine chicken is very delicious. The chicken is fresh and comes with two plates of dipping sauce. It has the appearance and spirit of Cantonese-style white-cut chicken. One person ordered a quarter, which also came with chicken legs. The service is mediocre. A store with good value for money, I will visit again.', "The service is very good and the taste is also very good. I especially like the imperial concubine chicken. I have tried many dishes and have never been disappointed. Compared with that beauty, it's not even the slightest bit stronger. I felt unwelcome as soon as I walked in the beautiful city. I was asked to do the same thing when I had a meal. I couldn't even cook a roast duck. They asked me to get a duck burrito with bones. It was really enough. I will never go to Mirador City again, I will only come to Mirador", 'Not going today. Been there once before. I wanted to add some extra dishes, so I was very polite and asked the boss for the menu. I only said it once, and the boss yelled at me, "Didn\'t you see that he was busy?" Speechless. Extremely embarrassing. The food is just so-so, and I don\'t think it tastes very good. Someone in Xiaohongshu once said that his family\'s attitude was bad, and they scolded him back in French. I was really speechless. Anyone who has been there will understand. One star is too much', "The attitude was extremely bad. My friend had Parkinson's disease and couldn't hold their chopsticks. They were too slippery. I very politely asked for a pair of disposable chopsticks. He directly scolded the person and said that the boss would not give it to him even if he told him not to give it. I'm going to argue, just tell me to get lost... Where does this courage come from? A Chinese restaurant that doesn't even have chopsticks.", "The taste is okay, but it's very ordinary, so ordinary that I didn't even take a photo. The reason why I gave it two stars is because the male boss is a hermaphrodite and is always mocking the guests, which really affects their mood. Get more rest when you are tired. Don't use tiredness as an excuse to wait for a long time without even giving you a menu."]

['An amazing spot for authentic Vietnamese cuisine. Their soups are not only incredibly flavourful but also come in huge portions, making them perfect for a hearty and satisfying meal. If you‚Äôre looking for a cozy place to enjoy delicious Vietnamese food, this is a must-visit. Highly recommend.', 'I would give 11/10 if I could. This place totally satisfies my craving for Southern Vietnamese food \U0001f979 the pho, bun bo hue, che dau trang were all on point that we came back twice!\nThe owners and staff were all kind and friendly. It can be very crowded on weekend so long queue might be expectec', 'In the heart of Paris, Ngoc Xuyen offers an authentic taste of Saigon. The pho‚Äôs rich, nuanced broth and the perfectly crisp spring rolls, paired with an abundance of fresh herbs, evoke the soul of Vietnamese cuisine. Definitely going back.', 'We took a pho and a crab soup (bun rieu). The pho was good and the bun rieu was absolutely delicious !\nThe food looks home-made and is really authentic. Highly recommended !', 'Very very good rolls, the beef in the pho could‚Äôve been more tender or thinly sliced but overall it was great']

['Food was really good. Taste are good.
Service very quick despite the full restaurant room.
We are very close to other people.', "It was OK.
Recommended as the only good dim sum resto in Paris, haven't tried any others.
Sui mai and chicken feet were good the only good dishes.
Ha gao dough too tough. Cheung fun thick and heavy covered in a sweet soy sauce.
The rest may be good, but not to my taste.
Service good, attentive waiter who refilled teapot without us needing to ask", 'I had my first dinner  here with my friends and it was great! Then I decided to take my family here too, and of course it was a great experience.

Big portions and so amazingly good!', 'This restaurant is my favorite place for the dish Pho Phnom Penh, served with pork meat, minced pork and some innards, then squeezing some lemon on it, and it‚Äôs delicious. The portion is big enough. We also try their duck fried noodles, with juicy thick duck meat. Meat is also generously served.
The service is attentive and efficient.
The price is reasonable for the portion served.', 'Authentic food with a great variety of cantonese, cambodian, and thai dishes. One star was taken as roasted meat was not as fresh as expected.']

['Nice friendly atmosphere.
Tasty, inexpensive food. I ordered take away for 3 people (not including drinks) for 32euro.
Portion size is medium to big.', 'Not bad, god service and atmosphere.', 'Decent enough to satisfy Vietnamese food cravings. Staff were hard to communicate with in both English and French. Was quiet when we arrived so food and service was very efficient.', 'My family enjoyed their  Singaporean  fried noodles and Marmite.
Taste and serving size good. Well recommended.', 'Fresh, fragrant and flavourful Vietnamese cuisine. Several veggie options. Liked it a lot!']

Adresse: 33 Av. de la Prte de Choisy, 75013 Paris, France
Reviews:
['The food is the best here, really good if you are looking for good authentic Vietnamese food. I would suggest the rice and pork ribs are the best. My wife and I have been coming here for years as a tradition, the owner is accommodating to English speaking customers although he doesn‚Äôt speak much English, he tries his best.
The atmosphere is very peaceful.', "This is must be the worst pho I ever been. The food it's not that great. I met people around the area told me this place no one go there, unfortunately for the first time in Paris accidents choose the wrong place. Soup so sweet like desserts.", 'Such a shame that such great food was soured and sullied by the utterly, incomprehensibly rude, poor service. If you must eat here, order from UberEats (if they're on it). Otherwise, Paris is full of other places with much more gracious and hospitable staff.

Perhaps the older man who served us didn't care for clients, as the restaurant is already well established and he's making his money. Perhaps it was the wine he was drinking, or the fight he got into with another table (who may have been regulars.) But the entire experience was uncomfortable and awkward. After a long day of sightseeing, we were hungry and this was the exact antitheses of what any dining experience should have been.

For starters, when we asked for drinks, the older man was belligerent in even recieving the request. We were 6 people (and 2 kids) who ordered over ‚Ç¨125+ worth of food and drink. There was a moment we'd asked for something off the menu: "fried rice with vegetable." We were curtly told "no, don't have" until we pointed it out - after some shock at just how rudely it was stated - on the menu and he agreed, sheepishly, that it was something they did indeed have.

I can't believe I even wasted this much effort on the review, it was such a horrid experience. Such a damned shame.', 'I remember dripping in sweat, sitting in this restaurant, and enjoying every flavourful minute of it. The restaurant is a bit tight but the service is quick and they are fully equipped to satisfy your cravings. Make sure to order some iced tea. It will make the heat feel 10x less painful.', "When we ate their sandwiches for the first time, it wasn't bad. That's why we returned yesterday. But,.... it wasn't as good as before  , I'm sorry to say this but honestly it was the worst Vietnamese food we ever had.

We eat very often Vietnamese coz we love it, and it never disappoints us, so we visit several different Vietnamese restaurants. And yesterday... we had the worst Vietnamese dishes and were disappointed for the first time.

We got 1 bahn mi au poulet (chicken sandwich) , 1 bahn mi au b≈ìuf (beef sandwich) , 5 pieces of fried chicken drumettes (or drumsticks I dunno), and 5 pieces of nems.

‚Ä¢ The breads of bahn mi were so dry, and for me there weren't enough vegetables in them, there weren't cucumbers and onions anyway. (Bahn mi without cucumbers and onions , it's weird for us) And as you can see in my photo, there was only one small branch of coriander which already started turning into yellow.
‚Ä¢ The fried chicken .... we couldn't finish one because they were TOO dry to chew, as if they were cooked 2, 3 days ago.
‚Ä¢ The nems, the rice paper skin was hard to chew , just like the chicken, and the meat in them was smelly (I'm sorry to say this but honestly the meat was stinky ‚òπÔ∏è). It was our first time to eat nems that smell so strong.

Because of the quality of food, we wanted to give 1  star but since the price is quite cheap compared to the other Vietnamese restaurants in Paris, we put 2 stars.

We were so disappointed to return, we'll definitely never return again,
but we still wanted to leave a review because we hope the owners will take this problem seriously and have an improvement sincerely."]

Adresse: 50 Av. de la Prte d'Ivry, 75013 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Best authentic Asian bakery in Paris!', 'In this wholesale pastry shop which delivers to many Asian supermarkets throughout France, the welcome is very friendly from very kind ladies.
The traditional, handcrafted Asian pastries sold there are a delight.', 'I bought a pack of 12 "vanilla almond flavored cake (mini)", what a disaster, there is no taste. I looked in vain for vanilla and less almond except for the poor strip on top. On the other hand, my mouth was very dry after eating just one of these cookies, which shows that they leaven their dough with various chemicals.

In the past, we found large round, flat almond biscuits in Asian stores that could be kept for a long time and which, although not expensive, had a good almond taste.', 'Good quality traditional Chinese pastry.', 'Very very good ^^ #Quimper #bzh #bretagne']

['"A great canteen for Cantonese food"
Went there for a quick bite and ordered a "m√¨ s·ªßi c·∫£o" and a "h·ªß ti·∫øu nam vang kh√¥". The broth is tasty, noodles are fine and meat are well cooked. Nothing exceptional, simple, quick. money worth. Have a try', 'Wow, the food was amazing and the service was quick. I was amazed at how efficient this place was. And the only place we were able to get actual real tea. Brewed and by the pitcher. Get the calamari (stuffed squid) thank me later.', 'Here offer Chinese & Vietnamese food.

I love the noodles as it is really warm one and taste not super strong but dumpling is a little bit too stiffs.

Veg ‚Äî   Wonderful as very Cantonese style and a little bit spicy.

Staffs are friendly as introduce a lot and very talkative !

Environment is ok and wish they can keep more clean ;)

Recommended as price is fair', "Place was constantly packed when I was there. Which is a good sign, unfortunately I ordered a sweet and sour chicken  It wasn't to my liking due to the way the chicken was cooked, boiled and had the slimy film of skin on it.
This place was more like a cafe than a restaurant.  Be prepared to be squashed in a seating area at full capacity", 'Recently visited a gem in Paris‚Äô Asia town ‚Äì a Chinese noodle shop that truly impressed. The beef noodles were a delight, boasting a rich and flavorful broth paired with perfectly cooked noodles. Equally noteworthy was the wanton pork, tender and seasoned to perfection. A must-visit for authentic, mouth-watering Chinese cuisine in the heart of Paris.']

['An amazing Cambodian restaurant! I tried loc lac rice with a sunny side egg! It‚Äôs PHENOMENAL- chewy saut√©ed beef and well-fried rice. I will come back for sure. A must try.', 'Very good small restaurant for Chinese-Vietnamese/Thailand.', "Im from NYC and this place seems to taste more authentic than most similar places in ny. Give it a try if you're in the area and craving Southeast Asian flavors.", 'The food was incredible, the portions were huge, and the prices were way below what I expected, especially for a big city like Paris. I cannot reccommend this place enough! They have a wide array of dishes (at least 80 or so), from specifically Cambodian to more generally East Asian. The atmosphere was wonderful and cozy, servers are very sweet. In case you might need it they have bathroom in the back.', 'used to be really cheap but now its relatively normal/cheap. amazing food really chill place with a woman preparing the food in the restaurant which is super friendly:) food is really fast and good.']

['We had the Vietnamese and Thai Papaya Salad. The Thai one was better seasoned and delicious, while the Vietnamese one was slightly bland. The Pork with Basil was really good although the portions could be bigger, we were still kind of hungry afterwards', 'Small restaurant with a comfy atmosphere. The food was delicious both times we went as a family. I recommend the springrolls and the fried rice with shrimp! Also, the old man working there was really nice and always helped us out. All in all, worth it!', "It's okay. I ordered a Vietnamese papaya salad but am a little disappointed with the taste and the small size of the plate. What I got was not what it looks on the menu. Isan grilled beef(entrecote, says the menu) was nicely marinated but there was a piece that was very hard and chewy. The duck salad was delicious but I had issues with the size of the plates that I ordered. May be I should have tried the cold vermicelli noodle dishes, instead.", "I recently had the pleasure of dining at Tha√Ø-Vien, and it was an exceptional culinary experience.

Tha√Ø-Vien offers a delightful fusion of Thai and Vietnamese cuisine, and it does so with finesse. The menu was diverse, featuring an array of dishes that catered to various tastes. Whether you're a fan of spicy Thai curries or craving the fresh flavors of Vietnamese pho, they have something for everyone.

The food at Tha√Ø-Vien was not just delicious; it was a flavorful journey. Each dish was crafted with precision and care, showcasing the authentic flavors of both cuisines. The ingredients were fresh, and the balance of spices and herbs was impeccable.

The ambiance of the restaurant was also noteworthy. It had an inviting atmosphere that made dining there a pleasant experience. Whether you're visiting for a romantic dinner or a casual meal with friends, Tha√Ø-Vien's setting is suitable for all occasions.

Lastly, the service was top-notch. The staff was attentive and knowledgeable about the menu, making recommendations that enhanced our dining experience.

In summary, Tha√Ø-Vien is a culinary gem that offers a delightful fusion of Thai and Vietnamese flavors. If you're looking for a place to savor authentic and delicious dishes in a welcoming atmosphere, I highly recommend giving Tha√Ø-Vien a try. It's a memorable dining experience that I look forward to repeating.", 'Super quick and good service and atmosphere, very good food 10/10 !!! Nem tradeua and baby crabs (fried) HIGHLY RECOMMENDED !!! GO THERE !!']

['We had an amazing time and experience here. My husband and I were on a 1 year anniversary trip in September and this was one of our highlights. I love Laduree and he had never been to one and visiting France we were trying to find places with his last name and stumbled upon this gem. It was only open for a month or so and the staff was so friendly and accommodating. Originally I was unable to get a reservation because it was fully booked but we took our chances to show up. It was rainy that day and many people cancelled reservations so they were able to accommodate us.

The food was delicious! I highly recommend the Royal brunch but it‚Äôs enough for 2! The drinks were great and pastries even better.

We hope to go back someday !', 'Amazing place with incredible energy

Very friendly staff, everything was great üëç
I was especially impressed by the man with blue eyes who met me at the entrance, he was very nice üåû', "If I could have given 0 stars I would have. We waited for 35min in the entrance with nobody caring to greet us, we were wondering why we were waiting with so many tables available. Huge lack of staff obviously on that Saturday. They gave us a table by the doors which they were not closing to facilitate their back and fourth service outside. We had a draft (October) and couldn't take our coats off. The waiter just didn't want to take our order after I complained about the beginning of our experience. We were about to leave but someone else found us a better spot. Then paying 8‚Ç¨ for a cold and bland tea which tea bag wasn't even left on a side for me to choose how strong I wanted it was a pure disgrace. The next waiter didn't even wave it from the bill after I explained my complaint and just moved on. The toilets were careless with blocked basins and the used hand towels were left everywhere without anybody to take care of it. They threw away my son's bottle in the garbage right after we forgot it on the table. Ladur√©e can't even hire people with proper hospitality service training. They absolutely don't care. No need to tell me in your response below that you're sorry and you'll work on it. At this point I want a full refund.", 'Love it!', 'No good hh']

Adresse: 2 Rte de la Ferme, 75012 Paris, France
Reviews:
["An incredible meal. The service was impeccable.
We weren't lucky enough to have a table close to the windows, but the experience remains unforgettable.
2 years later, we're still talking about this perfect mushroom egg and honey dessert!

The price is forgotten but the quality remains! Go and discover this magnificent restaurant.

Thanks again", 'Great place with exceptional panoramic views. Super nice server. Good food and well presented.', "We wanted to do brunch, but apparently they didn't do that anymore. So we decided to go to the panoramic restaurant for a birthday. The organization was not the best because we had to visit the stables which was not on time, which meant that it fell when we were supposed to eat. Otherwise, I would say the dishes were good, but not exceptional. We pay for the event and for the setting.", "The staff is not attentive. The food is bland and dry. I asked for a little more sauce with my chicken, they never brought it to me despite repeated reminders. My colleague was supposed to have a plate of prawn, we brought her a simple plate of fish and chips.
The portions are really small.
The setting is pretty good.

I don't recommend this place if you're looking for good food at decent prices.

Everything is way too expensive for what it is!", "Excellent and well-portioned food, friendly staff. Exceptional view of the Vincennes racecourse. It's a spectacle as well as a meal to be had at least once in your life. I had a good afternoon despite not winning anything on the race predictions."]

Adresse: Route de la Pyramide, 75012 Paris, France
Reviews:
['We had a great evening! Good music, nice cocktails', 'Lovely staff and super good food (well done for the excellent maff√©, the soft chocolate, everything is good). Smiles, good humor. We had a great time and we will come back for lunch with great pleasure. Thank you, thank you and thank you again.', 'I went there when it opened around 11 a.m. with my wife and my 3 year old daughter. The meal was good, and we were quiet. The staff was very friendly, we had a great time.', 'A superb discovery nearby!

The setting is very pleasant, you are far from the city atmosphere; difficult to get rid of in the Paris region.

The kitchen is simple but very effective! The dishes are plentiful and good!
Note that happy hour is attractive (4:00 p.m.-8:00 p.m.).

The staff is super friendly, professional and friendly!

I will come back!', 'Restaurant located at the exit of the Bois de Vincennes arboretum sector.
good welcome, rather quiet, beautiful terrace, simple cuisine, fair price and pleasant atmosphere.
Happy hours from 4 p.m. only downside: credit cards not accepted.
of course I will come back.']

Adresse: Hippodrome De Vincennes, 2 Rte de la Ferme, 75012 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Tn', "Very expensive portions and ridiculous quantity,
so much so that the staff completely agree with the customers.
It's just not possible and should be denounced.
Pure and simple theft", 'Good pleasant restaurant or staff and very friendly good time relaxing with the pleasure of seeing the races no one even coming to the table to bet', 'Good times spent with friends', '']

Adresse: 5 Pl. de la Prte de Saint-Cloud, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews:
["Great Place, escargot was amazing so was the Duck and all the food. Great atmosphere. Saw celebrities and prices not outrageous for what you get. Definitely recommend. Best part was the staff, our waiter who's name start with L was amazing, funny and always on top of things. Tall gentlemen from Romaina", 'Ordered the meal at 23H.
Menu entr√©e + main dish = 30euros is not only deal, but also it was tasty.

March/2023
Scallops were awesome, with rice. The fish (mackerel) paste with bread was very good too.', 'The staff was nice. There was a slight language barrier, but they were able to get us exactly what we asked for. Food and drinks were good. The atmosphere was good until they let a women bring in her huge hairy dog. I‚Äôve never experienced that at dinner. The dog didn‚Äôt appear to be a service animal. Other than that, we had a good time.', 'Food average.   Presentation is good.  Waiter was not the best‚Ä¶ very loud and pushy.  Dishes came out at different times.  One of the main dishes came very late.    Wouldn‚Äôt return.', 'Really had a great time.  Took my mom here for her 70th. Staff were accommodating, fun , sang her happy birthday in French... she loved it. The food was great too, we had the veal and grilled salmon. Desserts were profiteroles and creme brule...great atmosphere and ambience was chilled, too.']

['The "pate" was dry and tasted like sawdust. The main "pork cutlet" was also sub-par and did not meet my expectations and would rather belong in a cheap tourist trap than this highly praised restaurant.
