The broccoli under the meat was overcooked and tasteless. Look at the pictures and get your own impression if you don't believe me.

Quite a sad "french cuisine" and I'll definitely won't go there again.', 'Great atmospheric bistro, delicious food, attentive service, went for dinner with colleagues and returned a second time for lunch on my own during my short business trip. The waiters were welcoming and I left feeling very satisfied', 'A wonderful dining experience for my entire family. The staff was so friendly and welcoming. They gladly translated and explained the items on the menu. The food was delicious. The prices were great for the quality of food. I would definitely recommend and we will return.', "Really loved our dinner here. The place felt full of friends of the manager and we felt very welcome. The food (especially the mash potato which was the best I've ever had!) and wine was wonderful. Can't wait to go back!!", "Great experience in this restaurant! Loubna and Adama were smiling, friendly and full of energy!
The food was excellent.
We took macaroons with fresh cheese, salmon rillettes as a starter, supreme of chicken with mashed potatoes as a main course and rum baba, French toast and chocolate cake for dessert.
If you like rum baba, don't hesitate! You'll like it!"]

['Non eatable burger!
Taste was horrible, I wasn‚Äôt able to eat more than a single bite. (Beef burger)
Fries: as you can see and also read in another comment, seems like they were fried many times in a poor quality oil.
Taste: beef was extremely disgusting. Quality of the meat was questionable.
Service: nice server, however when he came to bring the check, he asked if everything was ok. Obviously no. I left the entire food, and when I said: no it wasn‚Äôt. He didn‚Äôt dare to ask why.
Never again!', 'Cute cafe in a nice location.  We were served quickly.  Tasty desserts and drinks.  We had a flatbread, drinks, and dessert.', 'I had the chicken and it was great, the portion was generous too. I also had the grosse profiterole, it was good.', 'The staff is welcoming and professional.  The lasagna is smashingly good!  Love your lasagna.', 'Nelson is a great waiter. Very nice ambiance and nice way to have a drink and look at people walking by.  Nice beer on tap and delicious Frites']

['One of the best seafood restaurant in the neighborhood of Paris!
Fresh and tasty with reasonable price :)
Love it! Will visit it again :)', 'Nice place, perfect staff, very friendly, good service, sea food are very fresh, the oysters are perfect, a main dish cost about 35 euro
I ordered oysters, fish and souffl√© as desert
Lovely diner
Highly recommended', 'I was impressed with everything: Service, speed, quality and quantity of the food. The wine list is also quite interesting. I would warmly recommend.', 'Service is 4 star food is 3. A nice decent place . But not very impressive.', "Had a scrumptious dinner there a few months ago. Although based on the reputation of the place I was expecting the personnel to be very snobish, but I'm glad I got proven wrong. Truth is everyone was really mindful of how our meal was proceeding, discrete at times but always helpful when need be. The food was really something! A large variety of well balanced and refined dishes. A great experience I'd gladly recommend to anyone."]

['Dive into their daily suggestions or explore the incredible menu‚Äîeither way, you‚Äôre in for a treat that you won‚Äôt regret! The staff is always friendly and full of energy, making every visit a delight. I can‚Äôt recommend it enough; it‚Äôs an experience you don‚Äôt want to miss!', 'Food is delicious!! Starters, main course dessert fabulous. Service very proffessional. Always happy to come back here. I recomend this place', 'Very good place with everything we ordered was perfect. Above the expectations.', 'Great italian restaurant ! The owner is really friendly ans the products quality is amazing ! Crowded on a saturday night - booking is a must.', 'Real Italian restaurant. Good food and matching wines. The owner is a very nice and welcoming man.']

['Yes!!! This is my favourite Italian restaurant in Paris. The staff were friendly and hospitable. The food was amazing. The ambiance was chic and classy. Definitely comes highly recommended. The desserts were amazing too. ü§§ü§§ü§§üëèüèΩüëèüèΩüëèüèΩüòçüòçüòç', 'Came here for lunch on a weekday: place was full. The chef-owner took the order himself. I ordered fresh grilled anchovies as appetizers, and scallop roasted in shell as main course. Both were delicious. The sides that came with the scallops were mashed potatoes and a blanched collard green. The mashed potatoes were the smoothest I have ever had. With a glass of wine and a cafe, the bill came to ‚Ç¨46.5.\n\nThe only thing that kept this from being a five-star review was the service. The chef-owner was the only friendly one. Waiters dropped food on your table without even stopping. It was actually among the worst service I have experienced in Paris in years.', 'Marius is wonderful restaurant discovered last year . We could not wait to go back . It is a hidden gem in Paris specialising  in exquisite seafood . I would highly recommend ¬´\xa0Salade de Tourteaux aux Herbes\xa0¬ª, ¬´\xa0Pav√© de Turbot\xa0¬ª and as a dessert, their ¬´\xa0Tarte Fine Ti√®de aux Pommes\xa0¬ª . The best ! The service was impeccable with attentive and knowledgable staff who made excellent recommendations. Marius is a must visit restaurant for seafood lovers in Paris, offering exceptional cuisine in a charming setting . Jacqueline', 'Excellent cuisine,  nice staff, and very good customer experience.  I strongly recommend this address.', 'Best seafood restaurant in Paris! Location near Roland Garros. Great hospitality. Beautiful patio.']

['Incredible pizzas cooked over a wood fire!\nThe chef has apparently won pizza competitions in Italy and it shows on the plate! Very nice surprise well done', 'Excellent pizzas! I highly recommend! Cooked over a wood fire, the dough is delicious!', 'This restaurant does not exist, its phone does not work, it is squatting on the location of Villa Murat', 'Very good pizzas with quality ingredients.']

['Good vegetarian options and meal deals', 'Italian grocery store and caterer offering affordable lunch options.

The formulas:
- Slice of pizza, drink and dessert for 9 euros.
- Main course, drink and dessert for 11 euros.

I tried the carbonara which is generous, the pasta is al dente. The bacon is very crispy.

The pizza is consistent, the pizza dough is similar to focaccia. The filling is generous.

The arancini is huge and well-filled, not too oily. It lacked a little seasoning.

The tiramisu is okay, nothing more. The panna cotta is creamy.

The staff are friendly and very efficient.

I recommend for a quick lunch!', 'Delitaly is a delight, with tasty and authentic Italian products. Thank you to the kind woman for the attention to my daughter during each visit, it makes the experience even more pleasant!', "I would have given 5 stars at the start but the more time passes the less I go there because of the boss who makes me uncomfortable... and yet I live 2 steps away and I love the quality products even if it is rather expensive. I went there regularly for 2 years, now I'm moving on. I still repeated the experience today but the same, the boss creates an unpleasant climate..... really a shame (small positive mention for the two young saleswomen who are adorable)", "Store that no longer offers ‚Äúfresh‚Äù 20 minutes before closing. I won't go back there again, posting times and not respecting them is useless. The mop went to 45."]

['Super market with everything available here. Staffs are really helpful and knowledgeable. Not all staff is able to speak English but customer is able to manage. Similar to other franprix also.', 'I absolutely destroyed their chicken and frites meal deal for ‚Ç¨3,90. It was amazing and the place was very clean and I was impressed at their selection of Mochi.', 'Nice store, but prices slightly high', 'Fairly large store for food and beverages.', "More expensive in the neighborhood, you can't find."]

['I want to avoid this mcdonalds here in porte de st cloud, avenue Versailles, I had 2 bad experience my first order they  give me different totally different items, after a week I  went again and I have to wait for 45mins for my order, for a fast food chain then they dont put burger in my menu‚òπÔ∏è i dont like the atmosphere Its crowded and a lot people waiting outside for their order, the crew is not organize  and not accommodating', 'Big area and it was my first time to have macarons at a McDonald‚Äôs. That was pretty cool, but service wise it was a little confusing because McCafe orders were uncoordinated with the main orders and where you get them so I went back and forth. Hopefully they‚Äôve fixed it!', "Went for lunch here after visiting the PSG stadium. The food and drinks were quite good. I'd recommend this place.", 'Most of the time they "forget" 1 or 2 items in the menu when you take away', 'the worst place in Paris, the service is rude and unreliable, you have to wait ages for your order']

Adresse: 8 Pl. de la Prte de Saint-Cloud, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ['The attendant is very rude and not welcoming at all. Also makes fun of clients.', 'Bought a vape here and it literally did not work', 'Open Late. When you need cigarettes.. stamps.. or other things..', 'You can find some pipe tobaccos but so expensive!', 'Ok']

["As an American in Paris without much French, I had some anxiety about ordering a pizza. But the friendly French folks at Pizza Exelman's made it SOOOO easy. We called to place our order, and they were really nice and helpful. They told us the pizzas would be ready in 10 minutes, and sure enough, when I got there 10 minutes later, the pizzas were just coming out of the oven, piping hot and smelling delicious. The guys were very kind, and we managed to have a nice conversation between their English and my lousy French,. Best of all, THE PIZZAS WERE DELICIOUS!! Can't recommend Pizza Exelmans highly enough.", 'This place it‚Äôs great, pizza it‚Äôs amazing and service as well!', 'Nicest people in Paris work in this place, and the pizza is good', 'One of the best pizzas in Paris, huge and delicious portions and really cheap prices. Don‚Äôt hesitate to visit this place.', 'Pretty decent pizza and staff happy to speak English. Top notch']

Adresse: 6 Pl. du Dr Paul Michaux, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Excellent friendly restaurant, service impeccable , ambience wonderful , bathroom very dirty and could use some work , but a great place', 'Was sat down at a dirty table with missing utensils. Waitress forgot to give us water after ordering and didn‚Äôt know basic details to dishes (e.g the size of a dish). Almost everything on the menu was unavailable. We tried ordering the linguine and were told that they ran out of burrata. We tried ordering the veggie pizza and they then said that the oven wasn‚Äôt working. Overall, the food was good but definitely not worth the price (20-30). We got 2 bottles of water that couldn‚Äôt even fill 3 cups that totaled to ‚Ç¨14.', 'After seeing rave reviews about Les Princes being the perfect place to grab a bite before a match at Parc de Prince, I had high hopes when I arrived at 12:30. The hostess promptly seated me at a pleasant outdoor table, and as I waited for my friends to join, I ordered water and a bottle of Ros√®. Unfortunately, it took quite some time for the water to reach my table, but at least the Ros√® arrived promptly.

When my friends finally arrived, we were relieved to receive table water and bread. Excited for our meals, we placed our orders, only to be met with disappointment. It seemed they had run out of chicken for my beloved Chicken Caesar Salad, yet nobody bothered to inform us. Frustrated, we eventually had to ask about our food. I reluctantly ordered another salad, and they assured me it would be ready in 20 minutes. As a consolation, we were given extra Ros√® on the house. However, the ultimate letdown was that we never received our meals.

With the game starting at 15:00, we had no choice but to leave at 14:30. So, after spending a frustrating two hours at the restaurant, all we had to show for it was bread, water, and Ros√®. Needless to say, I left the establishment feeling incredibly disappointed. It truly baffles me how such a renowned place could let such a mishap occur.', 'Waited 45 minutes for a very ordinairy bowl of guacamole after many reminder to the waitress. Everyone around us were getting their food but we were ignored. This is not acceptable for an establishment in this price range.', "The location is a bit boring but the place is nice and the staff is friendly. The dumplings where the best I've ever had, all the plates where clenc before they left the table, so the kitchen staff knows what they are doing. Exceptional prices for what you get, as long as you didn't come for the view!"]

Adresse: 2 Av. de la Prte de Saint-Cloud, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ['An extremely nice person outside helped me to fill the tank, while you are welcomed inside the office by another smiling person. Keep it up.', 'Super service formidable au top', 'Ok', 'Correct', 'Lovery place']

['Just like other franprix, but sometimes it is interesting to pretend that I don‚Äôt know French and listen to what you say', "Not recommended. The security guard asked to leave my bag with all belongings ON THE FLOOR near the EXIT DOORS without any attendance. And he wasn't joking! Reading the other comments, this place really has an issue with its staff and it's not changing. Avoid this place", 'You can find some  "Halal" frozen food in their supermaeket', 'Mentally challenged cashier attacked me, scratched my face and damaged my shirt (and is still allowed to work there).', 'Very and pleasant staff, easy communication in English.']

['This place was absolutely amazing. We came close to closing time. The owner Billie was so nice to my family. We had a great time, he played music we would love and kept the girls entertained with a little dancing. Good place for food and drinks!', "This restaurant is just next to another one which does pizza's. They obviously have a tie in to each other as our waiter took drinks next door and people sat near us ordered pizza's to their table. The food was tasty and filling  I had a burger image attached, fries are separate so you can pick and choose your side. As you would expect the drinks were the usual, they do have happy hours think it as 3 to 8pm which seems the usual time for local bars. Would happily eat there again, helped by them speaking good English", 'Phenomenal local experience and faire where everybody knows everybody. Food and drinks are great quality, worth every dollar. We tagliatelles avec panchetta et supreme poulette (Roast Chicken with gravy). Drink paired well for a great price.', 'good coffee, but very slow service (restaurant was quite empty)', 'Really lovely and pleasant experience!']

['The prices were very reasonable and fast service. The ladies were very efficient at taking orders (sit down place but orders taken from behind the counter). Fed 2 people at around 20 Euros. Very nice and quaint.', 'We visited this place for takeaway and took home some springrolls, chicken in sweet chilli sauce and a beef/onion dish to complement with the noodles we would cook home ourselves. All the options were decently priced and the food was really delicious.', 'Correct', 'Always fresh', "I do not recommend this place. I went there for the first time for a menu with caramel chicken. When I tasted my dish, I thought they had made a mistake because it didn't taste like caramel chicken at all. What's more, the taste was really unpleasant, I couldn't eat it.
I wanted to give this restaurant another chance and I could see that it was not a mistake on the order and that it was really the taste of their caramel chicken.
In addition, this restaurant offers menus for 9‚Ç¨50 while they only accept cards from 10‚Ç¨ which is illegal... They force their customers to order more so that they can pay by card ...
To flee...."]

['The good:
The place is chic, is good located, the service was polite (not friendly) and attentive in a way. The menu has a nice selection of French dishes.

The not so good:
The food is overpriced for what it was. The onion soup was the worst onion soup I have had in Paris, it had no salt whatsoever and I couldn‚Äôt taste any cherry. Was so bad that couldn‚Äôt make myself eat more than few spoons. When the waiter asked me if I was done, I said yes, so the waiter asked how it was, and I said that it was honestly really bad. To this the waiter simply said, ok and left. The meat and the fries had also NO salt, and well, is not optimal but you can add salt on top but in fries, when they are not good seasoned in the correct moment, it is impossible to season them well. But hey, I was hungry so I finish the meat.
I had a beer there and got served with some olives and peanuts, the ‚Äúweird‚Äù to not say disturbing, was to see olive bones in there‚Ä¶
But the worst was that in the maybe 40 minutes I was there, 3 mices passed next and in front of my table (which was inside the restaurant).

I would not come back, period. In that area there are literally in front, behind and next other bistros, so no thanks.', 'Jan-2024
It is likely the chef was changed. Onion soup was good in Mar-2023, but it was bad this time. Bread was burned and small amount of cheese, no taste of the soup‚Ä¶I claimed and they changed it. Though it got ‚Äúlooks‚Äù better than the first one, still the similar taste. I won‚Äôt order this in the future.
Though the main dish ‚Äúonglet de boeuf‚Äù was good,  the fries were very bad.
I don‚Äôt know if I would come back next time.

Mar.2023
Convenience place near Porte de Saint Cloud station.  I got 2 entr√©e and both were good with decent price.', 'Great location for this French brasserie near 3 famous stadium in west Paris. The largest terrace on the area and also great Parisian atmosphere inside. Menu has all the classic French brasserie options and also recommend the daily ¬´\xa0suggestions\xa0¬ª. Good cocktails and wine options (with some affordable Grand crus!). We Went on a July sunday evening and it was busy and lively.', 'Great experience, food was very tasty and service was even better. Really great place to sit down, relax and eat something really good:)
Szczeg√≥lne pozdrowienia dla Pana kelnera.', 'Horrible service. Server spilled our food across the table when delivering it and didn‚Äôt even bring a napkin to clean it up.  Drinks are very expensive. Beer should not be 7‚Ç¨ for a .5 pint.  Location is good but we will not be back!']

["People there are jerks. Couldn't find the chocolate milk, just banana chocolate milk and the guy was super condescending telling me it's not a big store I should open my eyes.", "The items there are a bit disorganised, but I like the fact that they've got an oven for public use to heat baguettes and other confectionaries before heading to the cash counter.", 'Nice store to grab the essential groceries. Also great to buy some ready-to-eat light food for lunch, perfect for tourists.', "Service well. Juice mechanics doesn't work most of the time.", 'Open until 12a.m. very convenient']

Adresse: 68 Rue Vasco de Gama, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews:
['The degustation was absolutely phenomenal. The food was simple, yet sophisticated. Each course displayed a superb balance of flavour with the intention to showcase the ingredients used, whether it‚Äôs cod, lobster, pork belly, veg or herbs. I also liked the presentation.

The service was professional and efficient. I had to take a star off for service because the white wine served wasn‚Äôt perfectly chilled. The restaurant should have provided ice bucket which would have enhanced the experience.

This restaurant is worth a short trip from the central area.', "At Le Beurre Noisette, you're in for a treat with their exquisite caramelized pork belly that melts in your mouth and bursts with flavor. The warm, cozy ambiance transports you to a quaint Parisian dream while the attentive and amiable staff make you feel like a VIP guest in a culinary wonderland.

Their attention to detail shines through, from the artful plating to the expertly curated menu, creating a sublime dining experience. This hidden gem, with its combination of exceptional food, intimate charm, and amazing personal service, is long overdue for a Michelin star. Le Beurre Noisette should be a top priority for any discerning gourmand in Paris.", 'What an amazing experience we had a Pleasantly wonderful evening at this Michelin rated restaurant the foods which we ordered were simply perfect the surprise of cold pea soup was great with the small chunks of roasted bacon slumbering in the bottom a hidden treat! Each course was fantastically executed and the service was exceptional to the last minute...', 'Homey French modern spot with fresh ingredients, nice ambiance, and good prices.', 'Great little spot. We rented the whole restaurant for a corporate dinner and they couldn‚Äôt have been nicer. Very reasonable value too']

["Rooms are very small, but adequate. Bathroom is very small. Shower floods easily, and really needs a door. Motion lights in bathroom are a nuisance. No elevator, and narrow spiralling staircase to carry your bags up to your room. Management is very friendly and helpful, but charges too much to hold your bags for you, considering they won't be locked away securely. Great location walkable to restaurants, shopping, and two Metro lines, as well as the Tram. Perfect place for someone travelling light, or for a couple that will be out exploring the city most of the time.", 'We have been very comfortable in this hotel for a few days in Paris. The manager was very kind and helped us with everything we asked for (for example one night I asked for hot water to make tea and he brought a kettle to my room so that I would always have it available). We could arrive late at night and they always opened the door by ringing the bell. The only thing that is perhaps not so much in our favor is that the hotel has no elevator, but you can still take the suitcases up the stairs. Overall we liked it very much. The manager transmits very good vibes and is always in a good mood and willing to help. The metro lines 12 and 8 are close by. But you can also walk to trocadero from there if you walk for 35 minutes. We would definitely come back :)', 'Very bad service with annoying people attending the place. The owner yelled at me when I asked where I could park my bike to ask for a coffee.\n\nAvoid this place at all costs', 'Drama and disaster. Terrible cigarette stench. Spartan standard - poor room, old furniture, no pillow, bathroom with a toilet at 1,5 m2. Price per night 90 Euros is a scandal.', 'Friendly guy at the desk and clean accommodation, not far to walk places or to public transport']

['The couscous is really great, big portion and tasty. I would recommend particularly the merguez! The carrots with cumin was delicious as starter!', 'This in my opinion is a hidden gem. I found this place because it is next to my gym and wanted to give it a try and let me tell you: the experience was amazing, felt like i am in Morocco, from the ambiance, decoration, music, it was super nice. The portions were huge! Although the plates are on the pricier side but compared to the portions they are excellent. The service was really good and everything was super clean. Thank you ! Will definitely visit again soon.', "Good food, good portions, reasonable prices. I used The Fork (la fourchette) application to find and book a table.
The pastilla was good, but not the best I've ever had. However, all the food was good and authentic. I almost felt like I was back in Morocco with all the sofas and decorations :)
Staff was friendly and welcoming. I would definitely go back for a tajine!", 'We recently had the pleasure of dining at La Table Marocaine located in the heart of Paris our experience was nothing short of delightful.

We opted for the Harira soup and a salad as starter. The Harira soup was a truly tasted perfectly as expected from traditional Moroccan soup.

For our main dishes, we chose the Lamb with Couscous and the Tajine with Potatoes and Olives. The Lamb with Couscous was a true masterpiece. Only comment here that the meat was under cooked and therfore less tinder. The couscous was fluffy and well cooked. The Tajine with Potatoes and Olives was equally impressive.  For those seeking a classic Moroccan taste these are perfect dishes.

The service who is also the owner was attentive and friendly and he ensured that we were well taken care of. The ambiance of the restaurant is cozy and inviting, with an authentic Moroccan decor.

Our experience was exceptional with vibrant flavors of Moroccan cuisine. If you find yourself in Paris and craving authentic Moroccan food, I highly recommend visiting La Table Marocaine for what it offers.', 'loved it...amazing food, cosy interior and friendly smiling service...what more to wish for...had an excellent evening here...']

['The sweets were good. The service was friendly. Unfortunately no wifi.', 'Located opposite the Paris Sud  indoor stadium Average food with premium prices because of its strategic location Service is fast', 'I usually stop here for a snack and/or an allong√©. During cold days I like the sunny seating area. The many electric heaters they have installed outside make it comfortable to sit on the patio any time of the day. This is a fun and an energetic location, right by ligne 12 and the expo.', 'Went in with my 36 week pregnant wife and ordered a beer and a glass of water. He refused to serve her water and said she needed to order a ‚Ç¨6 bottle of water or we had to leave. When I questioned this, he told us to leave and came at me as I left the bar, screaming and gesturing in my face. I left, half bemused and half embarrassed for him and the owner of the bar.\n\nGive this place a miss‚Ä¶ not just because of the rude waiter, but their pints are ‚Ç¨12 and there are loads of bars nearby with pleasant service and much cheaper drinks.', 'Went there to watch the World Cup semi final. The staffs were honestly super nice and I don‚Äôt understand why the reviews of the staffs are so bad here. The food was not bad. The highlight of the course was definitely their cr√®me br√ªl√©e. The sugar layer was the perfect thickness and the texture of the cr√®me was so perfect. The only thing I would say is that their orange juice is super bitter.']

["The best Lebanese Food I've tasted in Paris!! Everything is just perfect, the beautiful and simple decoration, the lightening, the music, the friendly and welcoming staff. I adore the olives and the turnip pickles they offer before you order.. Then with every mezze, it was a divine taste!! The best tabbouleh u can eat! I highly recommend!!", 'Really expensive but soooooo good. Like seriously one of the best middle-eastern restaurants I‚Äôve ever been to.', 'Amazing place, food and staff ! Vibe was very welcoming and warm.
Food was top notch very delicious and quantity was enough for two people
Definitely coming back again .
Highly recommend it .', "Eight years ago, I visited Al Wady with my family, a Lebanese restaurant in Paris, and just this Friday, I visited again. It's absolutely wonderful! The place is super clean, making you feel right at home. And the food? It's incredibly tasty. They've kept the same amazing quality and friendly service all these years. It's definitely the best Lebanese restaurant in France, perfect for family meals. I highly recommend trying the hummus with meat and the fatoush - they're the best I've ever tasted. Whether you're a local or just visiting, make sure to bring your family here. Everything about Al Wady is outstanding, and I can't suggest it enough to anyone as It‚Äôs not just a restaurant it‚Äôs an amazing dining experience.
Ps: I was so excited to eat the delicious food at Al Wady that I forgot to take any pictures. But I will definitely go back there soon and make sure to take lots of great photos then. The food was too good, and I want to show everyone how nice it looks too!", 'The food was really good, the portions are big.']

['Ambiance: Nice and pleasant
Service: there was only one persons serving but she was quick
Food: I ordered chicken dish and it was very tasty. Suited for my Indian taste buds.
I also ordered lemonade and it was different from what we get in India. It was synthetic like sprite or something but was good.', 'It was perfect to have dinner here! They invited us to come in at 22:30 when we were really hungry and the food was incredible. Also, service was top-notch ü•∞', 'Foie gras, escargot, duck, steak tartar - so traditionally French but better! Our party had four adults and two boys with adult appetites. Even during a busy service, staff were attentive and helpful.', 'Yet another new restaurant experienced and while we enjoyed it, it could have been better. There was a large group, to be fair to the restaurant not everyone arrived at the same time, but those of us there were left waiting to be asked even if we wanted a drink. Once the orders were taken drinks and food was delivered quickly, it might be the English in me but if you are serving a 0.5L beer in a pint glass 2" of head is excessive, it might be the normal in Europe but the head is not what the customer is paying for. The various dishes were accepted to differing degrees, some really enjoyed, others less so. Despite not being busy staff had to be sort on occasion when required. Could be easily better', 'Gabriel was a brilliant server. He made us the lovely cocktails in the picture. Knew what to ask and adapted the drink to your taste.
Makes the experience in any place just that much more pleasant.
Not only that, he also made the effort of getting us something to nibble on while we enjoyed our drinks (a Spritz and an Americano).

The ambience is nice. A pretty bar. Family friendly. There were people of all ages.

Would love to go there again, if the opportunity arises.']

['Kind service , really tasty sushi and the price was awesome !', "the place is so little but the food is nice.  If you need the bill ask for it cause sometimes they don't give it", 'PERFECT ! This is the best food in my life !', 'Exactly what I needed. After an overload of over priced local cuisine, this little jem hit the stop. Great sushi and the prices where very cheap. I loved it!', 'Not good at all for vegetarian people.\nThere are plenty of vegetarian dishes, many vegetarian versions of ramen, japanese noodles. The taste of this restaurant is not good.']

['Sushi was perfect\nSoup was good and other food we had was just as we expect', "Good ol' Japanese food. Good but nothing more. Price was fair.", 'really nice japanese food, unlimited food for only 18‚Ç¨ !!', 'Dgls', 'Lots of things to review, starting with the kitchen. The all-you-can-eat formula is not enough to compensate for the mediocre quality and lack of diversity of dishes.']

['The food is very good, but the recent management change, left only one guy doing all the work and alone. If you come here, prepare to wait at least 20 to 25 minutes for the guy to start working on your order... Be patient, very patient...', "The best Lebanese Man'oushe at the best price ever with the best smile from the cooks.

They have a special offer : from 7p.m. till 10 p.m. you get any lebanese man'oushe for 5.50 euros only.

A man'oushe is a lebanese, flour based, on-the-go snack that is delicious and healthy at the same time :
It's basically a bread freshly baked on which the topping can differ : cheese, taouk chicken, thyme-zaatar mix, kafta, soujouk (my personal favourite that i let you discover with the chefs signature garlic sauce).

Thanks a lot for reading my review.", "Stumbled upon this little neighborhood favourite when we couldn't find a fancier place near here and so glad we did. Nothing fancy about this place butgod food and lots of local business.  Got excellent recommendations from a regular customer and enjoyed the beef and falafel Soujuk", 'Best authentic Lebanese food in Paris! Lovely hospitality as well!', 'The place is small. The owner changed recently so the food quality is quiet different than before, but it keeps improving.']

['Decent restaurant for lunch, fixed-price menu was nothing to write home about, but did the job.', 'Top top top', "At lunchtime, the daily specials are generally successful. There are almost only regulars. The decoration needs to be reviewed, it's a bit sad.", "Don't come here. Rude, uncaring staff. The environment is unwelcoming for non-French speakers, and the food was mediocre. I understand that many French people may not speak English, but there is one worker in here that just straight up rude and arrogant. There is two Asian looking staff that don‚Äôt speak English, but they tried to help. This one white looking staff just disrespectful. We sat at the table and ordered food for two of us. All of sudden, this rude white dude came and took away all of our utensils. While he was taking things away, he kept mumbling something under his breath with an angry face. HARSH! Mutual respect has nothing to do with race and language. Being respectful is the basic etiquette for being a human. Save yourself some money and don‚Äôt come here. I will miss this place 0 stars if I could.\n\nDon't come here. Rude, indifferent staff. The environment is not welcoming to non-French speakers and the food was poor. I understand that many French people may not speak English, but there is one worker here who is just plain rude and arrogant. There are two Asian-looking staff members who don't speak English, but they tried to help. These white looking staff are simply disrespectful. We sat at the table and ordered food for both of us. Suddenly this rude white guy came and took away all our utensils. While he was taking things away, he kept muttering something under his breath with an angry face. RUDE! Mutual respect has nothing to do with race and language. Being respectful is the basis of being human. Save money and don't come here. I would rate this place 0 stars if I could.", 'Good little brasserie, pleasant owner, a gizzard salad and grilled flank steak with green beans and a coffee, the meat is good and tender, like butter, I recommend']

['Most delicious food I have ever tasted anywhereü§§ü§§', "One of the best Asian food with some very tasty specialities around that area, it's not that expansive for what you get and quality is nice!

Always a pleasure to chat with the owner üòÅ very kind peoples

I recommend : chief's crispy chicken üå∂Ô∏èüå∂Ô∏è
Or the beef in the warm plate üëå", 'Best Asian food and it has never disappointed me. I have been having prawns and chicken here. Almost tried everything in prawns and chicken. Just love it.', 'Nice food and good value for the area', 'So friendly and great amount of dishes! Nice service.']

['We stopped in after a volleyball game, our server was incredibly friendly. He handled a very large group so well. The pasta was decent, beef Bolognese was fine, the mushroom penne was the best dish anyone ordered and the pizza was okay, not great.', "Worst steak ever  too expensive and so chewy. Too salty.  Potatoe soaked in oil and dripping.  Wine horrible  salad very stale.  Rib ey steak too chewy. DO NOT go tonthis restaurant. It's a rip off. Too expensive.  See attached bill", 'Ordered a Poke bowl, it was out of the kitchen in under 3 minutes. I could tell the rice was old and everything was cold, tasted like a the refrigerator. I took one bite and sent it back, I was told I would still need to pay for the dish. I also ordered water and they charged me $7 for it, I asked for the cap to the water because they charge me for it and they told me that it was a bottle deposit and they couldn‚Äôt give it to me. I will never come back here.', 'We arrived to the restaurants after the motorshow closure, around 9.30pm, and they accepted us. The service has been very gentle and fast despite the restaurant was quite full booked.\nWe took 1 pizza Margherita, 1 Pizza Parma, coke and tap water and the total price was 37‚Ç¨. I raccomend this place. Thanks!', 'Service on the level of canteen with the price of restaurant... even i saw much better service canteen. The barman was too nervous i woud say The pizza though was good quality.']

['We loved this place, we were made to feel welcomed as soon as were entered the place.  Great selection of beers, we also had a bite to eat there.', 'We had seen tis small bar on google and went there to see for ourself, It is a bar with a small kitchen and we came at the wrong time, they were going on vacation so the kitchen was basicly closed... However Philip (asumed the owner?) did not just give up on us and offered 2 choices a cheese plate or a sandwich with Salmon, we choose the last and wow did Philipe suprise us the salmon was very very fresh great sliced and came with 2 pieces of toast and butter, it was finger licking good lol...the beer was a great lightbeer and the atmosphere was very good. If we go back to Paris we will go back to le 347', 'Julie was the absolute BEST! Fantastic waitress she went above and beyond. Abdu also was fantastic!!', 'Friendly staff ! Good food ! And always a great vibe .', 'Good selection of beers!']

['Bad service and the ice-cream much smaller than usual Mcdonald.', 'Worst experience when you don‚Äôt get everything you paid for. Looked at the receipt 10 times and still forgot a portion of fondue fries ü§¶\u200d‚ôÇÔ∏è', 'It‚Äôs nothing extra. Just solid 3. Nothing to complain about. Fast, efficient service.\nCould improve on', 'This happened again, they missed the ingredients.', 'The fries needed salt.  Everything else was great.  I love Paris!!']

Adresse: 16 Rue du Colonel Pierre Avia, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews:
['One of the best experiences I‚Äôve had of watching movies üé•

Very well organized including the the seats that they have. You will enjoy the show with the effects on the seats üí∫ that they have.

The people working there are very friendly and very helpful.

Easy access by buying your ticket üé´', 'Visited to watch a movie which was super cool. The place is well maintained and spacious. Service is usually good and the ambience is marvelous. It is situated far away from the residential place.', 'Good experience. It was clean and well maintained. Seats were comfortable. Movie screen was fabulous ü§©', 'The place is outdated when it comes to the style but the actual theaters are great with a sound system that makes the whole theatre rumble and a top of the line display. The theater "1" is absolutely beautiful with a Rolls Royce style "starlight" ceiling. The only major downside is the lack of "VOSTFR" movies as most of them are in french.', 'The place is not clean and everything is overpriced.']

['First time here and I like the quiet atmosphere and cozy surroundings. The food is authentic and the staff are very friendly. Recommend people who is rush to watch Olympic Games nearby to come and try.', 'A great place to enjoy delicious Asian food at Paris! You have a lot options to choose here. The price is super worth it and services here just make you feel at home.', 'My go-to spot after gym. PHO is just beyond delicious in here, and the service is excellent. Definitely one of my favorite restaurants to eat in in Paris.', 'Decent Pho place with fair prices and quick service. The pho soup itself was however rather bland and we had to spice it up a lot with the condiments on the table.\nI have tried plenty of Vietnamese places in Paris and cannot recommend this restaurant as much as other places. Still, though, if you are in the area and got no other options, you should be doing fine with this place.', 'The dish is nice and saves my hungry night. The only thing is that this Vietnamese restaurant is run by Chinese so at some points you know that it‚Äôs not that authentic. But as a Viet, I must say it‚Äôs good']

['This restaurant opens anytime nonstop, located not far from Ballard subway station. Food is nice and good customer service too', 'Good traditional bistro\nGreat fish and chips\nLarge and varied salads', 'Great food! Great service, good price. AC!', 'I had fish and chips, and food poisoning after.', 'Do not order a cocktail here. They use the cheapest ingredients, bare minimum. Zero effort.']

['The pizza dough was amazing
A lot of cheese which is always nice

The waiter was very gentil

Good price.

The wait time was a bit long.', 'Cheese nan are a very good idea from this shop. It has interesting tastes! Try it!', 'Crazy fresh ingredients & lovely staff']

Adresse: 8 Rue du G√©n√©ral Alain de Boissieu, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Rude Waitstaff and Poor Service

I came here with colleagues, but the experience was ruined by an unprofessional waiter. While I was briefly on my phone for work, instead of just taking orders, the waiter insisted I put my phone away and even tried to grab it from my hands! I expect a waiter to do their job‚Äîtake orders and serve drinks‚Äînot lecture me.

Even after I complied, he never brought the drink I ordered. Very disappointing. If you‚Äôre looking for respect and good service, avoid this place.', 'Tasteful food, good atmosphere, large space, but gets offset by small portions and  arrogant service.', 'The food and service were exceptional. I had a late change to the timing and the staff could not have been more helpful. 5 stars.', 'I have been here a few times and each time the food is perfect. The chef always gets everything spot on.
The service and wine were great too!
This establishment knows what it‚Äôs doing.', 'Sensacional food but 3 hours and counting and they can not serve us the complete dinner!!']

['This was excellent! Delicious Friday night sushi üç£ ü§§ Superbe addresse', 'Excellent! AMAZING SUSHI. As someone who‚Äôs been to many sushi places before, this one ranks very high and I‚Äôll be back', "There are so many fake reviews saying bad things about this place that don't even describe the actual restaurant. The large menu offers many choices and the prices are reasonable for the quality.", "Another buffet sushi, at 18‚Ç¨
Selection is a bit lacking, they seem to put more fish in the makis than usual for the type of place (though it was a Sunday evening)

The miso soup was unexceptional. It's
OK.", "Undeniably one of the best ‚ÄúAsian‚Äù restaurants I have ever eaten at. I order in often and the sushi is delicious. The noodles are the best I've ever eaten (and I've already been to China!). The value for money is more than fair, it‚Äôs plentiful and good."]

['This was excellent! Delicious Friday night sushi üç£ ü§§ Superbe address! I think there is a Maps overlap with the other sushi', 'Highly recommended, especially the all you can eat menu. It is not a buffet but prepared to order. A treat, very fresh products.', 'All you can eat of excellent quality.
Possibility of ordering three times.
Varied menu between ‚ÄúJapanese‚Äù and ‚ÄúChinese‚Äù food.
Really good and fresh for an all-you-can-eat restaurant.
Around ‚Ç¨14 for lunch and ‚Ç¨19 for the evening (to be verified).
Wide choice of √† la carte dishes', 'The sushi and skewers are OK but the service has deteriorated significantly in recent months. The room service is slow and the waitresses are very unpleasant!!!
However, this restaurant is one of my neighborhood canteens. I raised this problem with the manager who received no response.', 'The best all-you-can-eat restaurant in Paris! Fresh and tasty products for an extremely reasonable price! I am now a regular with my husband :)']

["I actually really literally feel like puking thinking of this restaurant. Anyone who knows anything about sushi will be able to tell from just the photos that it's not a good place at all. I stopped by on a whim without reading any reviews unfortunately so had the misfortune of eating this meal.

I ordered the saumon fromage which is a poor man's french version of the philadelphia roll, I suppose. God. The rice was so, so cakey and thick and had a refrigerator taste. The salmon tasted fishy. The cream cheese even tasted off - not the regular philadelphia kind, something softer and less flavorful.

The eel handroll was literally nauseating. I almost puked after I took a bite - it tasted seriously as if it had gone bad.

There was nothing wrong with the service and the ambiance was nice, I just honestly believe the food was completely revolting. I'm not sure how anyone eats here. But I would definitely avoid it at all costs.", 'Great food.', 'Good enough for quick lunch. Friendly people', 'Excellent food and service', 'Correct']

['The price is really good for the eat as much as you like. The sushi are well done and they have vegetarian options too. The desert is included. Good find for a sushi bar in Paris.', 'Amazing place, fantastic attentive fast service with outstanding value will be coming back soon!', 'Nobody cared to bring a menu, we had to grab one ourselves. Then 20 minutes of raising hand to attract waiter‚Äôs attention and make order - no one cared, we could not make an order and had to leave to search for another place to eat.', 'Excellent quality food, friendly service. Japanese and Chinese specialties. Great address. They have an all-you-can-eat option too, on request ! Their Udon noodles are amazing.', 'Okay. Few sashimi in thin slices on top of lots of rice.']

Adresse: 58 Rue Vasco de Gama, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews: ['The staff were friendly and attentive. They even remembered us from the day before, when we stopped to look at their menu. The pizza was straight out of the oven and delicious. The citron tart was refreshing, and the Irish coffee glac√© was very good. We enjoyed our dinner and the service very much!', 'this is AMAZING! restaurant menu was in english and french and had a wide variety of food including vegetarian options! it‚Äôs quite small but the owners are super sweet, instantly welcoming us and offering smoothies! not to mention they were definitely quite fast with providing amazing food!!!', 'Delicious truffle pasta. The panna cotta cream was great ‚Äî but, unfortunately, they used cheap, sugary syrup as a topping.', "I stayed in Rue Vasco da Gama and the place is walkable from my stay. The place is a cosy little joint. The owner and service guy are great! The food was excellent and delectable!! We ordered Escalapo Saint Mercure and Pasta with Basil, olive oil and pine nuts. The portion sizes were good too! I had to get mine packed as I couldn't finish my pasta. Price is reasonable as well.\n\nA must try if you're in the area. :-)", 'Great service, food and prices.']

Mercy!', "EXCELLENT restaurant!! I've been going there for about 4 years and everything is amazing: the food, the wine, the staff, the atmosphere, the music... Honestly an absolute MUST to try!!!", 'A great little spot, tucked around the corner of Rue Vasco de Gama.  Ive tried italian in many places in 15th arrondissement and this has been the best.  Risoto was good and creamy.  Pizza had taste.  Carbonara had flavour.  Its right down the block for me and i will be sure to return when i come 3 times a year.  Tony was great and service with a smile.', 'Excellent food, excellent service, excellent price. Food was delicious and was served very quickly. Top class experience would recommend to anyone fond of Italian food. Or any food for that matter!', "Wish I got a picture of the food. It was a last min decision but the best decision I made. I got the shrimp with rice and to date, that is one of the best meals I've ever had!"]

['This place is kind of touristy. It‚Äôs just the area. But the local still do come here. The staff is good they all know some level of English and with my little knowledge of French we had no problems ordering.

The atmosphere was good. It had a weird French cafe look and feel. Unlike any other cafe I went to in the time I was in Paris.

The food was good but a little on the pricey side for what it was.  I don‚Äôt think this was the case just for this place but rather the whole area. Like they all priced higher due to the conference center close by.

Bottom like if you are in the area and are looking for a cute cafe to try this place will suit you just fine.', 'A very cozy and lovely cafe. I had the petit d√©jeuner extra, which has almost everything for a really good price. The pastry was excellent, really yummy baguette, amazing coffee and eggs! Highly recommended!', 'We really enjoyed coffee. But why cocktails are so expensive? It is more expensive, then in top rated cocktail bars.', "Cute resto, perfect for a lazy weekend lunch with friends. I went on a Saturday and it was very calm. Nice waiter, cute decorations, with plenty of seating outside. I had the chicken burger with avocado and sauce au miel (aka fancy homemade honey mustard) which was really good and well presented. Will definitely come back again. The only downside is that it's on the corner of rue hameau where there is a bit intersection directly across from the expo center, so I imagine it's a bit noisy during the week with all the traffic", 'Went here for breakfast whilst staying in Paris. It was very nice, we both had scrambled egg with cheese and ham, which was incredibly tasty! Very nice atmosphere and music in this Caf√©. The orange juice was a little expensive at ‚Ç¨5.80 but equally it was freshly squeezed by the taste of it. Glad we found this place as it was the exact sort of place and vibe we were looking for!']

['Some of the best food I‚Äôve had. It‚Äôs at a calm place. The staff is super friendly even if they don‚Äôt speak English very good. That was in no way a problem.', 'Oh my god, this place is awesome!
First, the price is super reasonable.
Cant find this price in anywhere else in Paris.
Second, staffs are super friendly.
They kept checking us if we had any problem!
Last, food quality!! Salmon steak, beer, icecream everything here was great.', 'L‚ÄôEtincelle has delicious food, tasty drinks, and most importantly, lovely staff! The Royal Couscous for dinner is a must try. Hamid and the whole staff are incredibly friendly and my whole family felt welcomed. I would recommend anybody try this spot, but especially Americans looking for an authentic, warm Parisian experience.', 'Panini with chicken was delicious. The staff working there were so good, he helped us to understand the menu.', 'Friendly staff! Reasonably priced items. Enjoyed our dinner here']

Nom: Caf√©t√©ria M√©diance H√¥pital Europ√©en Georges Pompidou
Reviews:
['Had the most horrible experience picking up food from this store. I came to pick up an order that I had placed on the ¬´\xa0Too Good To Go\xa0¬ª app. The pick-up time was not up to date as it was indicated 18h-18h30 whereas the store closes at 18h.

I do feel bad for the staff as it was their right to finish their work at the given time. But this does not justify the fact that they are rude and tried to shut me up when I was explaining the app to them. I would be more than happy to return the next day at the time when the store‚Äôs open if they had explained in a friendly manner, which was not the case.

The only good thing is that they still gave me my order, but only it‚Äôs because I had stood my ground due to the fact that I had already paid. But that was not without being ¬´\xa0scolded\xa0¬ª by the lady working at the counter that I shouldn‚Äôt have come.

I tried placing myself in their position, would it had cost them something to do the same thing before being unkind ?', 'The new team is unpleasant! You are dealing with fragile and sick people, who do not see well or hear poorly; a little empathy and a smile are the minimum! It‚Äôs not a ‚Äúclassic‚Äù H relay. The manager is always on top but she should choose her staff better!', "Clearly lacking renewal and choice.
The quality decreases (frozen tomato sandwich, bagel with stale bread, etc.) and the price increases.
And I'm not talking about mouse droppings just at the tail...", "Pleasant place and space for a short break
My son is hospitalized and we often visit the hospital cafeteria.
I would like to note the attitude of one of the waitresses (blonde) when tidying up the terraces. The trays are smashed, the iron chairs slam, the trash cans are thrown away to be put back in place and so on...all this with a hell of a noise. I don't know how the hardware can withstand such assaults every day.
This person forgets that they work in a hospital and that silence and calm are required
A hospital cafeteria is a place of relaxation for staff, patients and visitors and it would be good for this person to be aware of this.", 'A pleasant place to relax between two meetings. The hall where it is located is very beautiful, light, open and it is pleasant. The staff is friendly. The tables are clean. My criticism goes to the pastries served: there are only high-calorie things! (Not bad but only extremely fatty things in addition to being sweet) A simple roll, or rusks would be welcome!  THANKS']

Adresse: 19 Bd des Fr√®res Voisin, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews:
["Service is okay. The establishment seems to date quite a while back and  isn't as new.
There's often the things you might need, which is a plus. However, the store closes quite early.", 'A place not overcrowded with price more attractive than at Intermarch√© or Monoprix. So a good place', 'People are nice', 'Cool', 'A large, well-maintained store, the salad bar is well equipped and always clean, there are also hot dishes and the pizzas are great, so we can eat on site and heat our dishes in the microwave .
A big thank you to the staff who are super friendly and always attentive, they can even search for and order new references that were not in the store if you ask, I find that very kind and serious.
I recommend!']

['Friendly cashier but I saw a mouse on the shelf near the bread area and heard it squeaking', "A rather big supermarket within Paris that dispose of all it's brand has to offer (freshly pressed orange juice, coffee grains...) A nice supermarket to be near of.", 'Convenience store near u üçäü•™ü•´', 'The staff is very good and helpful', 'Very clean, great selection of products and fresh produce']

['Huge portions, spicy level not for beginners but it‚Äôs delicious, really loved this place, my huge recommendation ‚ò∫Ô∏è\U0001faf6üèºü§§

Ps: this restaurant should add more pictures to their instagram, to help those like us that don‚Äôt know the Chinese home made cuisine, but that we want to discover and enjoy.', 'More of a higher end Chinese restaurant. Great authentic dishes and good service (which is rare in Parisian Chinese restos). Modern deco and nice presentation as well (another rare thing). Bravo. Will be back.', 'Delicious! All fresh food. The Pekking duck pancakes were 10/10.. though we probably could have shared one dish together üòÖ

I‚Äôll be coming back!', 'They were kind, and we had a good time.', "C'est trop bonÔºÅ Et les services sont sympathiques. The food is so delicious! And all the materials are fresh. Surely I will go back this restaurant again and again"]

["A wonderful small creperie! One chef does everything. Perfect for lunch, dinner, or date. Huge selection of different crepes, variety of ingredients, coffee, deserts, etc. And nor as expensive at all. You won't regret it if you visit it a few times when you are in the area.", 'Very cozzy small restaurant with happy friendly lady staff. It\'s my first time to try galette sarrasin so I choose classic "compl√®te"(egg, ham, cheese) with bol√©e de cidre brut (dry apple cidre) , it\'s great combination.', 'My wife and I visited this small but lovely creperie in Paris. The crepes were just perfect! The host was also very kind and welcoming.', "They served us different crepe without any explanation. That was because they didn't have ingredients anymore. I understand it sometimes happens but the most annoying thing is that they didn't tell us before they actually served.\nThey never say sorry. Instead of that, they said it's still good. What a hospitality that was. They can not communicate with people. It's just a sad place. Never come back this stupid restaurant.", 'An amazing creperie! The owners were supper friendly and the crepes were amazing. The small dining area had a great atmosphere for a desert or a full meal, despite our lack of French ordering was easy because they patiently explained the menu. I have limited experience with Parisian crepes, but these were by far the best I have ever had. These crepes are something everyone deserves to try!']

["I had dinner at 750g.

The atmosphere is relaxed and casual, perfect for a dinner with friends. The decor is eccentric, kitsch, but cozy.

The food was good. I had egg with a mix of fried mushrooms and veg couscous. Both definitely tasty and well-prepared.

The menu is often changed, but vegetarian options are always available.

Service was friendly and efficient.

Overall, 750g is a reliable choice for a casual meal in Paris. It's a good option if you're looking for a comfortable place to eat with good food.", 'Food was good, not the best I‚Äôve had in France but it was pretty good, and the atmosphere was really great and cute! About half of the menu was gluten-feee or was able to be done gluten-free, which was nice but there wasn‚Äôt much detail provided in French or English on the dishes and how they were served.
Additionally, I will preference this next part by saying that we were there during the Olympics and it was probably 80% full, but our service was pretty bad. We ordered a bottle of wine when we sat down and had to ask 3 different people for it and it still took about 30 min to get it. We also asked for bread multiple times and it still took about 15 min, and our food was cold by the time the bread got there.', "An excellent budget bistro.

I've had multiple entrees, mains and desserts and everything I've had has been very good to excellent.

On several occations there has been room for 2-4 without reservations.

Includes options of entree+main or main+desert for 22‚Ç¨, full 3 course for 26‚Ç¨, excellent value for money.

The pictures include a 'perfect egg', steak and fries and a rice pudding, all very good and tasty.

Can strongly recommend if you do not have a reservation for the night after a day at the expo center.", 'Good for value restaurant and obviously very popular among locals. We were quite amused to see that the local police also visits them and one even got a rousing birthday celebration.
The food is decent though some are obviously better than others.', 'Wonderful traditional French food!
Everything was delicious.
The service was also good. It was a bit crowded, but the food still arrived quickly.']

Adresse: 208 Rue de la Croix Nivert, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Amazing experience, the food, the service, and the atmosphere all exceeded expectations. Highly recommend this restaurant!', 'Superb food, passionate crew and a lovely atmosphere!

The service is welcoming, professional and very informative. The owner took his time to walk us through the brief menu in detail, explaining the delicacies of each dish.
Their set menu comprising of 2 starters, 1 fish and 1 meat course followed by 2 desserts is highly recommendable. Priced adequately at 50‚Ç¨, this menu lets you experience the originality and creativity of the talented chef.
Their two classics, slow braised pork and millefeuille topped with salted caramel are divine!

This passionate team directly sources their  fresh produce from the Rungis market, and the quality of the ingredients is evident in the dishes. The overall concept of L‚ÄòAccolade is well conceived, making this a must try stop for your next meal!', "6 years after my first 5 star visit, I returned a few days ago; it was as amazing as I remember. For the price it must be one of the best restaurants in Paris. My main course (noix d'entrec√¥te) was amazing.", 'Sensational set menu this evening at L‚ÄôAccolade in a relaxed, friendly atmosphere.

Incredibly friendly and knowledgeable staff who really helped make the experience all the more special with unique insights into not only the wine we chose (the Syrah) but also all the individual ingredients that made our four course meal.

We hope to be back soon to sample other dishes from the menu, especially since they do market-seasonal food.', 'A quaint cozy place with good food and great attentive service. Found a table In an fully reserved restaurant. Coming back next time I‚Äôm In Paris.']

Adresse: 3 Rue Vasco de Gama, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews:
['What a great place in terms of food taste and the service. The marrow bone is a killer especially when you add some fleur de sel salt to it as per the recommendation of our waitress. Expansive wine list and again with recommendations from the waitress. I would come back whenever I am in Paris.', 'One of the best tuna I ever had üôè
Friendly good service and very good food !', 'Fantastic place, tried it more than once. Great selection of wine. prefer to rate it 4.5 because one of the times the food served was not warm/hot enough

I‚Äôd still come back', 'Gorgeous little place with a wonderful wine selection from their sister cellar across the road. Staff is very personable. Restroom is very clean, as is the whole restaurant. As for the food, it left a bit to be desired in terms of seasoning but not enough to warrant losing a star. Convenient, quiet location. Would definitely visit again', 'Ok.  Dinner with soup, entree, plat.  Leek soup was good, if oversalted.  Normandy oysters were excellent. Had faux filet for the main and asked for saignant and got something that was barely still pink in the middle. Eh.  Solid wine selection though.']

['Sushi wasn‚Äôt of quality, nor was the meat. The chicken tastes the same as the beef meaning it is cooked on the same grill, which makes cross contamination. The cucumber had a very weird bitter taste, the salmon didn‚Äôt taste like fresh salmon. Safe yourself from this restaurant.', 'It so fast serving and so good food .and food are delicious  I will see again ‚úÖüç∫üç∫', "Very good value for lunch. It was fast and efficient. Great choice of dishes. I'll go back.", 'There are cleaning product in the fry rice, and we told staff but they don‚Äôt seem to care! Food service is extremely slow. We ordered a bbq set with 5different things and that taste the same!', "Seemed like a lively restaurant when we arrived and we had reasonably high hopes. We are a family of 4 visiting from London for the Olympics. I wish I'd read the reviews as we probably would have steered clear and I wish we had. We sat for 5 minutes before any menus were brought to us and I picked them up myself. We ordered one of the large mixed sushi/BBQ yakitori sets plus a plate of mixed sashimi. After about 20 minutes the waitress told us they were out of tuna and asked if they could replace with salmon. I said it would mean there would be a lot of salmon and she reassured us there would be other sushi too. The dishes arrived and I regret I didn't photograph it. I'm laughing as I write but literally every piece of sushi was salmon. It was salmon, salmon then more salmon, plus a plate of salmon sashimi. When I raised this with her she said she had explained this. I refused to accept it, especially the mixed sashimi plate. They replaced it with what I can only describe as some off cuts of fish. I've eaten alot of sushi and I must admit I had just lost faith and was totally put off the meal. They barely laid out table sonic had to walk up to collect our own dipping bowls as well. The BBQ skewers were ok. We won't be returning. I felt they were pretty dishonerable and didn't particularly care."]

["Great Indian restaurant located in the 15th district of Paris. The staff is delightful and provides speedy service. The ambiance is charming with authentic Indian decor. While the food was average , the cheese naan could use a bit more cheese. The tikka masala was decent and the dal was acceptable. Prices are reasonable. If you're looking to explore a new dining spot, it's worth a visit!", 'Last evening, my party of twelve hoped for a delightful dining experience. We were seated at 8:30 PM but faced a frustrating two-hour wait for our main courses, which arrived at 10:30 PM. The owner responded unprofessionally, blaming us for making a reservation for a larger group. If they couldn‚Äôt handle it, they should have canceled.

To make matters worse, we watched other patrons who arrived after us being served first, leaving us feeling invisible and marginalized. After such a long wait, we expected a redeeming meal, but the food was underwhelming and lacked the finesse we anticipated.

The owner‚Äôs arrogance, rather than humility, further soured our evening. Dining out should be an experience filled with warmth and hospitality, not an endurance test. In summary, this establishment displayed inefficiency and disdain. A restaurant that cannot accommodate guests respectfully and fails to deliver on flavor does not deserve patronage. I urge potential diners to seek better experiences elsewhere.', "Stay away from this restaurant! Horrible food, bad service, and inferior quality. Most curry base is the same whatever you order. The waiter is not only rude he doesn't know his limits of talking to the customers. Chaotic service. Quality of food is bad. I wonder how this restaurant exists.", 'I ordered yesterday at Bunjab Palace 4 Naan bread for take away: 2 cheese and 2 garlic. They cost me 18‚Ç¨. They were not good, had a burnt taste. I‚Äôm sure I can do better at home. I don‚Äôt recommend naan bread there.', 'Absolutely fantastic experience! The food was bursting with authentic, rich flavors‚Äîeach dish perfectly balanced with aromatic spices. The paneer pakora, chicken tikka masala and mattar panner was a standout, and the naan was incredibly soft and flavorful. The service was attentive and friendly, creating a warm, welcoming atmosphere that made for a relaxing meal. From the generous portions to the beautiful presentation, every aspect of this restaurant exceeded our expectations. If you‚Äôre craving delicious, authentic Indian food, this is definitely the place to go in Paris!']

Adresse: 196 Rue de la Croix Nivert, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Highly recommended. They are super nice and friendly. Food is amazing!! We love this place.', 'Great place for a drink. Especially during happy hour.', "Incredible food!
I wasn't expecting it to be this good.
I had the best spring rolls I've ever had then the Lamb was superb!
Great service and nice atmosphere.", 'The BAO burgers at this spot are must. They are absolutely delicious ‚Äî authentic bao style buns with a delightfully spiced chicken.', 'Beautiful place! Staff were lovely and super friendly, and the food was fantastic. Lovely lunch']

['Very welcomign restaurant, not a lot of meals to my preticular taste but definitely left full with no space left! Definitely filling , not too bad of a price, there is bathroom, been here with 2 more friends, sat outside, quite cozy and nice, would reccomandüëå‚ú®\n\nGroup of 2-4 definitely can fit, has a lot of seats for bigger groups too, from what I saw when I was there üå∏', 'Juice is not fresh, not all items in the menu available, bathroom doesn‚Äôt work, service is slow. Truly disappointing.', 'Ordered a chicken it bloody from inside and that is very dangerous. I wanted to enjoy dessert. The ‚Äúfondant au chocolat‚Äù is Not at All fondant from inside! I ordered a glace with and they brought it in a small cup completely smashed!! The Chef should review his service!!', 'Decent onion soup and profiteroles. Nothing too special and a bit expensive as every restaurant in this area of Paris.', 'Try other places for breakfast. Paid 50 Euros which was less than those of franchised fastfood  restaurants.']

['Top', 'Very bad experience! Pizzas ordered with the ‚Äú1 bought = 2nd at 50%‚Äù promo but charged full price and cold! Bad faith from the manager who says that the promotion is only valid for "takeaway" orders while his flyer indicates 'delivery'... A shame. Go on your way.', "Canvassed at the Paris fair, we ordered lunch and it was disappointing!
The offer indicated was not respected 1 purchased the second at -50%. It is not indicated that this offer is not valid on delivery! It's lamentable. Commercially to avoid.

In addition we had to pick up the delivery man at the entrance to the fair because he was blocked, cold pizza and when we called back for explanations we were told that it was like that and not otherwise.", 'Bad experience. Canvassed on our stand at the Paris Fair. 1h30 delay in delivery. Not commercial at all. The -50% offer on the second pizza mentioned on the flyer is misleading (during delivery: the delivery person tells us that there is no offer for delivery). Duo pizza too small and cold. TO FLEE', 'I find the pizzas very good! I often order delivery and it‚Äôs fast.']

['We order everything we can order on the menu and finish all of them.

We enjoy our dinner.

Thank you Sylia.', 'Very crowded restaurant with delicious food and nice service.', 'Dinner was amazing. Great service and the duck breast was incredible. Really cozy inside and close to our hotel. Our waitress spoke English and that is not to be expected but always very much appreciated. Visiting from the U.S. if you want to sit outside or during peak dinner - reserve a table. We had dinner at 730 and were able to be seated inside without a reservation but it filled up quick.', 'Very yummy , highly recommended!:)
Peaceful environment and nice staff!

The waiter gentleman can speak English and a bit Chinese:)
Love it !
I will come back and eat here again.
Merci!', 'Meeting a friend for lunch, I found this very charming Paris restaurant in the 15th. We were intrigued by the limited menu offerings all of which sounded so yummy. We selected the prix fix meal that icluded a starter (baked artchoke and cheese with a salad), a main dish, we shared the roasted duck with a green garlic sauce followed by dessert, a traditional creme brule√© made with chocolat and carmel. Glasses of red wine and a bottle of tap water. Everything was above par at Afaria including our friendly, helpful, and delightful French waitress, Celia who helped us decide. She made our lunch most enjoyable, special, and very entertaining. Merci Celia!']

['A cinema in Paris 15th arrondissement that offers Hollywood movies in English with French subtitles.
Super comfortable seats, clean.
We can also choose our seats upon buying, unlike UCG.
We watched Avatar in 3D. We have to buy the 3D glasses but it only costs 1‚Ç¨ per pair so it‚Äôs okay
Overall, it‚Äôs was super good!', 'Clean large theater with many movie choices and snacks to choose from. The workers are always so nice and welcoming, this has easily become my favorite pathe in paris!', 'Overall it‚Äôs nice. Sound quality is just above average. Salle 6 is too long with small screen.', "Pros:

The displays are top of the line.

The sound system is excellent.

There are escalators for people that don't enjoy stairs.

There are many auditoriums, you will likely find a seat at any time of the day.

The cin√©ma itself is beautiful and clean.

Cons:

So far, there are non.", 'Large modern cinema with comfortable cinema room. Room 6 offered the chance to book a sofa for 2 people as opposed to two seats. They have an upstairs bar which serves wine & beer ahead of the film.']

['Absolutely lovely experience at Le Grand Pan. The service here was wonderful! I came in solo and took a seat at the bar. The team was busy with multiple parties that night but attended to me quickly and warmly. Food and wine pairings were perfect!\n\nHighly recommend making a reservation in advance, or chance a seating at the bar (still a great exp!)', 'My party and I are visiting France for the first time and had the most amazing experience at Le Grand Pan. The staff was wonderful and so accommodating to us. We asked for wine recommendations and had a delish and affordable wine and then an incredible dinner. One member of my party was vegetarian and the chef made her a fabulous meal. The dessert was the best way to end our first travel day. Merci chef you are so wonderful thank you for welcoming us to the city.', "It is a beautiful restaurant, there was a little wait for a table with our booking. That was ok though as it was worth the wait. The staff were very friendly and accommodating with us being English. One staff member inperticular Paloma (don't know if I got that right) was fantastic. Our menu was translated for us and she gave her recommendations too. The food was fantastic, delicious doesn't cover it. The only thing I would improve was having more bread with my pate, but I'm greedy ü§£. The chips were the right amount of crispness but still fluffy inside. Desert was my favourite, I had the citrus meringue pie that was a pie but wasn't a pie (words from the staff). Delicious.", 'Lovely little gem tucked away on a quiet street.  We had reservations (seems like a necessity) for my birthday dinner.  The restaurant is crowded like all really good restaurants in Paris but we didn‚Äôt mind a bit.  The wait staff were kindly patient with us, explaining the menu and what they are known for - the rib steaks. Unfortunately they were out of the veal so we opted for the beef.  A huge (maybe 2‚Äù?) rib steak done very rare with accompanying frites and salad for 2 to share.   We also had two appetizers, octopus on pur√©ed cauliflower and small shrimp on celeriac. Both very nicely done.  A chocolate cake finished off dinner.  Not bad but pretty much a chocolate lava cake that everyone at home is obsessed with.', "Dined here for our last night in Paris. Nice hidden gem in the 15th away from all the tourists. Great ambiance, I would recommend this for couples or a group of friends who want to have a good meal together. We ordered the c√¥te de b≈ìuf for the main course, only reason I'm giving it a 4/5 because my expectation was just too high. The steak itself was just ok nothing special, it was a little tough to be frank even cooked at medium rare. I was kinda disappointed, the steak knives were also giving me a hard time cutting throught the steak. Price is not as high as other establishments in Paris: 3 glasses of wine, 1 entr√©e, 1 main course for ‚Ç¨105. Didn't take a picture of the octupus tentacle, that was cooked to perfection by the way. Side dishes were delicious even though they were a basic salad and potatoe wedges. Would not hesitate to try the other things on the menu."]

['Amazing Experience!
The food was absolutely delicious, and the atmosphere was perfect‚Äîwarm, inviting, and beautifully designed. Every dish was full of flavor and thoughtfully presented. The ambiance added

so much to the overall experience, making it truly memorable. Highly recommend!', 'Excellent tandoori chicken and lamb. Dal is great! One of the few Indian restaurants with very specific and differentiated flavors among diff ent types of curry. Fresh spices and ingredients that you can taste. Curry fish is excellent too. It‚Äôs been remodeled recently and it‚Äôs a lot more open and comfortable. While we liked to old fashion decor before, the modernized ambience is actually an improvement. Highly recommended!', 'Eat Indian food regularly and this food was exceptional. Would definitely recommend this place to eat. Wanted to eat there the following night but unfortunately they are not open on Mondays.', 'I recently had the pleasure of dining at Arti Indien Restaurant, and it was an exceptional experience! From the moment I walked in, the warm and inviting ambiance set the tone for an unforgettable meal.

The cheese naan was a standout‚Äîperfectly soft with a deliciously gooey, cheesy center. It paired beautifully with the flavorful curries we ordered. The tandoori chicken was cooked to perfection, with tender, juicy meat and a smoky, spiced marinade that was bursting with authentic flavor.

To round off the meal, I tried their kulfi, and it was divine. Creamy, rich, and subtly infused with traditional flavors like cardamom and pistachio, it was the perfect way to end a fantastic dining experience.

The staff were attentive and friendly, making great recommendations and ensuring everything was just right. If you‚Äôre looking for an authentic Indian dining experience with a menu that delights, I highly recommend Arti Indien Restaurant.  I‚Äôll definitely be back!', 'Disappointing. We ordered butter chicken. There was so much tomato in the sauce it felt like pasta sauce. Not to mention it was sweet. Daal was ok but the naan not so much. I can‚Äôt believe they are not using red onions but only white onions. Overall it was quite pricey for a rather dull meal.']

['Ordered via Deliveroo, double hot dog meal and 5 tenders meal, from tenders 1 sauce missing. Hot dogs 1 missing another one looks like this.
Delivery was quick, bag secured with tape, so delivery guy did his job well. Restaurant seems messed up...', 'They often get the order wrong, a whole sandwich, a whole wing order etc‚Ä¶ its ridiculous', 'KFC in convention is always the best...staff service, location, atmosphere,  cleanliness...highly recommended.', 'Dear KFC Establishment,

Following my visit to your restaurant, I wad delighted to have savored a variety of flavors. I would recommend adding more flavors such as honey mustard or per chance ranch.

Sincerely,

Yours truly,

Alex', "Every time I went to this place there is always a 30-40 mins wait time which is understandable for the number of people. The food is excellent it's just when there is not a lot of people, you find some people that smell weed and a horrible smell.
Again the food is very good for take away or delivery but the atmosphere is questionable."]

['The food is nice, especially the Tangsuyuk. The Budae jjigae is good but a bit overpriced considering the ingredients are quite cheap (instant noodle, kimchi and sausages)\nThe service is very friendly and attentive. One more star for the service.', 'Songsan is among the very few traditional Korean restaurants of Paris. The staff is almost entirely Korean, the food is tasty and authentic, and the restaurant is modern. Most tables are busy with persons from the Korean community, which is an excellent sign. We loved it, and we will come back!', 'one of the best and most authentic places I‚Äôve ever tried in Paris', "It's like the food I eat in Korea. Moderately spicy and sweet. Like Korea, the food you order comes out quickly and the menu is diverse, but most of them are above average in taste. Bossam and Budaejjigae are impressive, and Korean-style Chinese food is also good. The chicken was a little disappointing, but overall it is a Korean restaurant that embodies the taste of Korea well.", 'Great food and very helpful, even though we didn‚Äôt book but still tried their best to host us. Food is great as specially we had a nice hotpot. Good atmosphere. Would recommendüòã']

Nom: LA PLACE ITALIENNE Paris 15 - Da Faustino
Reviews:
['Decent neighborhood pizza place, but I found the pizzas to be quite inconsistent in quality. Maybe they should consider a smaller menu, less variety. The place is quite small and does get crowded and hectic with all the delivery guys coming in and out.', 'One of my best pizzas ever! Ordered the one with truffles.
