Really incredible taste and great ingredients. Dough is something exceptional, for real!', "This place has such unique pizza types and man are they good! I had never tried a pizza with cr√®me fra√Æche instead of tomato sauce, and now thanks to this place I'll probably be addicted!

They are quick when ordered to go (I've never eaten in there).

A bit on the pricier side, but very delicious and filled with flavor.", 'My favourite pizza place in Rive Gauche! I particularly like the variety of pizzas they propose. So tasty ü§§', "This is not Pizza Hut or Domino's, this is freshly made thin-crust pizza baked in wood-burning oven with fresh ingredients: definitely upscale but not outrageously expensive. Eat in or have it delivered. I was happy to take the kids to small friendly restaurant in 15th -- loved it!"]

['I am sorry, I am giving them a review without having eaten anything. I was in Paris and searched a map for a Nepalese restaurant; a Nepali man recommended Sagarmatha. I went there by taxi at 12:00. They accepted reservations but had no information about their closing time. I waited for 30 minutes.', 'A truly gem found in this restaurant. They serve Indian, Nepalese and Tibetan specialities. The decor is really cosy inside and you can smell incense. In terms of food, we had a starter with really good taste and the sauces that came with it were delicious and tasty. Took some spicy momos and they were spicy but real good! The flavours were definitely there! Also personnel is really nice!', 'This restaurant is an absolute gem! I had an amazing dining experience!

The food was very delicious, full of flavor and god, every dish was even more delicious than the other. We tried the Naan nature et Naan Safarmatha maison (avec du fromage, l‚Äôail et gingembre), Daal soupe, Riz Pulao, Royal agneau Jalfrezi üëèüèºüëèüèº, and Poulet Korma! FOOD IS JUST PERFECTION.

The waiter was extremely friendly and polite, the atmosphere was so calm, well decorated, music is nice !!

I‚Äôll definitely come back! üôèüèª', 'Amazing food. Spiced and tasty. Confort food', "Must recommendedüëçüòä. This is the best indian/nepali food restaurant in Paris! We just loved their food, please do try the bengan bhartha (aubergine curry), garlic Naan, noodles and Momo's!
The staff is super nice and welcoming, they make sure if the food is as per you expectations."]

['Lovely Moroccan restaurant!
The staff is really attentive and quite friendly, you can see that they are really concerned about you having a good experience.
The food is delicious! I am specially a big fan of the pastillas (miam).
The dishes are well served, I believe you van easily share one main course and one starter, and be quite satisfied!', "Insatisfaisant et tr√®s mauvaise exp√©rience,  √† fuir !
Knowing the North African cuisine, this restaurant cannot meet your expectations,  the taste is far , really far from what we are used to eat. The service was horrible, the waiters couldn't even provide a straw to a kid and they were not nice with the kid because they were moving which is normal if you have kid.
I ordered a soup (harira) was OK with nothing extraordinary,  Pastilla ( awful,  we never fry this dish), couscous not really tasty , it was like a semolina with a sauce and big slice of vegetables,  missing the spices..etc. dessert, oriental pastry, okish but you can tell that was prepared weeks ago and not really fresh...
The only good comment I can provide is the setting which is well defined
Was a first and last time there!!!", 'Stopped by for a quick lunch. It was fine, served quickly.', 'Actually, the 15eme use to have a large population of people from the Maghreb. This restaurant is very close to Porte de Versailles (Convention center) and many "international" folks will venture out to this restaurant for what we typically call "couscous", even though it's more than just couscous. And, it has more of a neighborhood feel, very welcoming.

It's across from a cute little park, the outside of the building is nothing special.  As you entered, you're truly transformed into a very spacious restaurant, beautifully decorated, and very Moroccan. You actually feel like you're in Morocco!

The staff are incredible. Very amicable and just friendly. We started out with ap√©ros of champagne, beer, and wine. Since Moroccan food tends to be heavy, with the exception of myself, all ordered only a "plat" (main dish). I ordered a Pastilla (pidgeon encased in a flaky phyllo with powdered sugar and cinnamon) for an entr√©e. It was delicious! The crust was extra crispy, but the pidgeon was nice and moist and very flavorful, and not dry as in most places.

Then onto our plats, three of us had the lamb with prunes, apricots and raisins. One, had the couscous of chicken and mergez sausages.  And one other person had the lamb with fava beans. All, excellent, excellent delicious dishes. Very tasty, and it was accompanied with grilled banana chilies and lots of harissa (hot spicy sauce)--two types a wet, and a dry version. I've been to Morocco, and I have to say, this is as good as any you'd get in Morocco.

Two of us ordered dessert. I had the Phyllo with chantilly and creme anglais, it was really delicious.  And, our friend got to select from a plate of various middle eastern desserts (see photo). Very delicious albeit extremely sweet which is typical of many middle eastern desserts.

When all was said and done, the maitre'd gave us a degustif of an alcoholic drink made with dates. It was very strong, but delicious.

The ambiance, the decor, the staff, and the food was all excellent. We all commented we would come back in a heart-beat.  Also, I had alot left-over, and they didn't blink and eye when I asked for a doggie bag, not common in France. They truly are so accommodating!

For 5 of us the bill came to 220‚Ç¨.', "Best Moroccan food we've ever had. The Bastilla and Lamb Targine were amazing!!"]

["Great food and friendly service. Only the recommended dessert took over 45 min. They told us that the first try was forgotten in the oven and burned to death so we had to wait for a second one. The one waitress guarantied us to give us the dessert for free but I am not sure if this was respected in the final bill. Haven't asked for the bill but the total amount was in my opinion with dessert calculated. Maybe because I payed to the other waitress or I missed sth else on the bill. As we saw on other guests this was a one-time thing and only on our table. Nevertheless the restaurant is a recommendation and worth to visit.", 'Fantastic food and great value - we had the 3 course daily special for 25¬£ and it was all delicious. I had the Salmon Gravalax, Steak Frites and Cr√®me Br√ªl√©e and all were perfect. Staff friendly, highly recommend!', 'Fantastic spot for dinner. Lovely service, and the roast chicken was delicious. Highly recommend - magnifique!', 'Some good food in a pleasant part of the 15th arrondissement. Staff are welcoming and prices aren‚Äôt too high. Puy lentils with duck liver and poached egg was a top starter. Very relaxed atmosphere too!', 'Outstanding food and great service. A very high quality restaurant, and well worth a visit.']

['No need to say more, it‚Äôs STARBUCKS.', 'I ask for a drink "Sur place" and it comes in a paper cup even though the ticket also says "Sur place" and there is a law saying it should be in a reusable cup. It has happened to me many times here so the staff need to read the tickets properly instead of just using paper cups by default.
The wifi also works about 1 out of 5 times I come.
Poor management.', "Lots of people, very complicated to get a seat.
Customers are very unruly with feet on the table!I told a barista about this customer with feet on the table, she took a look at it and did absolutely nothing about it.
I think the staff needs to check the tables more often on rush hour to clean the tables and rearrange the seats that people have disorganised.
The time before this one I had a sandwich and basically it's just bread there is nothing in it to speak of.
I just go there to get an Americano and sometimes with a doughnut or cake because the rest of the food offer is very disappointing.", 'Served a frozen sandwich and staff were rude when asked for it to be reheated and once it was reheated they served it back to me as a mess on the plate. Awful place.', 'Friendly English speaking staff, good assortment of menu, plenty tables and chairs considering the size of the store (small for Starbucks standards) and an array of seasonal drinks (I‚Äôm talking to you Pumpkin Spice Latte lovers). The three stars rating is due to one bathroom only (if the store is crowded, you‚Äôll have to hold for quite a while) and the two open doors that leads to two different, yet equally loud streets, so if your intent is to write and study while at Starbucks (a common practice) this may not be the best place for you.']

['Cute and serene local restaurant. The inside vibe is zen and cozy. We loved that the menu has two sections: one Indian and the other Nepalese. I got the Thali off th√© Nepal menu and enjoyed the fact that you get different degustation in one plate: lentil, eggplant, chicken, and rice. Since you get to choose the protein - there‚Äôs a variety of other options including shrimp and lamb. We also got the butter chicken off the Indian menu (thought the sauce was a bit too sweet for my taste). Th√© garlic naan was lovely and upon arrival you‚Äôre greeted with papadam and dipping sauces (mint and tamarind). Overall recommend.', "Amazing food. The butter chicken is the best I've tasted. Give this place a try.", 'Very good and fast service! The food was good, also! At a reasonable price. üëÄ

The only reason I will give it 4/5 stars is because the menu was all in french & I only speak English (and romanian). It would be a nice upgrade for the menus to be in english as well. Consider it, please! üòÜ

For some of the foods, so I can understand what they exactly are, I looked online. They have a well made site from which you can order home as well! And there are tons of pics with the foods they have. ü•üüçõ

The waiter was pretty kind with us, he recommended us the best out of what we picked (indianswad special at 24,90‚Ç¨, 120.59 Romanian Leu, which is a complete menu & it has a starter, a main course and a dessert).
Even tho‚Äô the waiter‚Äôs english was not very good, we managed to tell him what we want. Very kind!

We didn‚Äôt really know what to order as desserts so we went for something we found on the site, but on the site there were 5 pieces in the bowl, but he brought us only 2. Too bad, it was pretty good! Like some sort of soft donuts dipped in a sweet sauce, honey like....

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è for the service
‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è       for the food
‚≠êÔ∏è                        for not having the menu in

english too', "A truly fantastic experience. For those who don't speak French, many of the staff spoke perfect English. All the great Indian food you are used to, except better. Child friendly experience as well!", 'excellent food very delicious nice personnel too']

["One of my two favorite Lebanese restaurants in Paris. Took my wife there on our anniversary and the place didn't disappoint. Kafta was as good in taste as you'd get at home, possibly better. Taouk was perfect, so was the Arayess. Happy with my pick for that night.

Note 1: the metro is just across the narrow street, so there will be some periodic micro earthquakes, so it can be mildly annoying or a fun thing. For us, it was the latter, and a cute memory.

Note 2: seriously, try the kafta", "A wonderful feel of a family run eatery. Their earnest effort to make the place cozy and we'll presented. Service is polite and order taking informed. The authentic food is the star of the show. The mezze is fresh and flavourful, the grill plates are tender and juicy. This is our go to Lebanese.", "Excellent restaurant ! We came here for new year's eve, everything was delicious and the quantities were generous :) the personnel was very friendly and very reactive, the wait time was minimal and they made sure to check everything was okay for us. I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone who wants to try Lebanese food (bonus: the meat is halal) :)", 'One of the best lebanese food in Paris that I have tried so far.
Real taste in their mezze as well as their mixed platter gril.
The owners of this resto are always there to make sure the experience is personalized and authentic. Prices are adequate.
I think this will our place to go when we‚Äôre in for some lebanese food üá±üáß', 'I loved everything about it but the only thing I would argue is that the portions of the food are a bit small! Nevertheless, exquisite taste, great service and beautiful place!']

["As soon as we sat down, we were handed complimentary wine, juice, and hot towels to wipe our hands. The waitress was very kind and quickly brought our orders and drinks. The sushi was much larger than we expected. The food was delicious and was the best I've had my whole time in Paris. Highly recommend", 'This restaurant was discovered by accident when I was starving and entered the first restaurant I saw.
I was surprised when I saw it empty yet nicely decorated.
The restaurant got full quickly as well as my meals.
The food is good fresh.
I was even more surprised to see affordable prices for such a good service.
I wish you are also lucky enough to enter such restaurants by chance', 'The sushi was quite average, nothing extraordinary. The quality didn‚Äôt feel refined, and the overall experience didn‚Äôt stand out. Unfortunately, I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôll be returning to this restaurant for a second visit.', 'The sushi was extremely delicious! The ingredients were fresh and of high quality, and I was very impressed by the selection of different sushi variations. Every bite was a delight. The service was also friendly and attentive. I can highly recommend this sushi restaurant!', 'Excellent service and food. Seated immediately. The hostess brought us complimentary wine with hot towels. The salad was delicious pickled daikon. Miso soup had almost no seaweed but lots of mushrooms. Sushi was perfect. Highly recommend. Oh, hot sake good. Prices reasonable']

Adresse: 111 Rue de la Croix Nivert, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews:
["This place is amazing!
We had the fried chicken and it was so good. It comes one full chicken plus fries! We tried both the honey and the spicy sausage, both very good. They gave us some plastic gloves as usual in Korea so we don't get our hands all dirty.
The people working there are all so friendly and helped us with everything.
The ambiance of the restaurant is also very nice. Cosy and not crowded.
I will definitely come back
Ps. they also have some karaoke rooms.", "Food was very good, and the atmosphere was great as there weren't as many people and even though the serving might have been a little slow, the food made up for it as it was good, cheap and also in large portions. 100 percent would recommend. üíØ", "Had a dinner and karaoke there for a birthday party. Food was great ! Many choices. I would recommend the delicious tartar and the pork osam bulgogi.

The owners / waiters were very nice and accommodating. Loved the atmosphere of the room on the first floor with the summer breeze through the windows.

The big karaoke room was perfect for our group of 15 and lots of fun. Very Parisian as it's a classic cave but smelled good and clean.", 'all i can say is ‚Ä¶ what a place. everything was perfect here. sooondubu was perfect , meat was perfect, service was amazing, and atmosphere was top notch. everyone should visit this place if theyre looking for korean food in paris ‚Ä¶ SHEEEESH!', 'I must say, the boss and boss‚Äôs wife and all servers are soooo kind. They are the kindest Korean people I have ever met.
the fried chicken is my favorite dish (really good). I forgot to take picture,because eating too quickly üòÇüòÇüòãüòãüòãüòã
There are pajeon and jjajangmyeon!']

['HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!\nThis was the best food what we had in Paris! Tasty, cheap, huge portions, we also took sushi for take away after, delicious and freshness of the fish, this place is on one of my top lists in Paris for food! It is worth it to visit and order, you will not be disappointed!', 'the food is so good here and tastes very fresh. I was staying in Paris for a few days and ate dinner here every night it‚Äôs so good and prices are very nice, will come back if I find myself in Paris again! :)', "Excellent experience in this local restaurant, I recommend you eat inside because the service is really nice and warm, always smiling and with lots of little gestures for the customers, I love it. The food is good, nothing extravagant but really well prepared, it's the second time I've eaten here and I've never been sick.", 'Food is well prepared very fresh and delivery is excellent.  I am from California but live here now and this is one of the best Japanese restaurants I have found with now living here in the 7eme for two years!', "We tried them for the first time, the staff is more than nice and welcoming, the food was amazing, great price/quality, all in all it won't be our last time at all!"]

Adresse: 354 Bis Rue de Vaugirard, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Nice neighborhood or visitor bar. Feels like a your local neighborhood bar with a great clientele stopping by to feed their families or catch a rugby match.', 'Came here to watch the rugby cup final. Great atmosphere. Friendly staff. A real find. Would definitely come back.', 'This is my first time in Paris and I‚Äôm so glad that we found this place. We spend very nice evenings with great food, especially burgers!\nI didn‚Äôt even know that there is a Rugby World Cup going on and in this place for us it was a great exeperience. Definitely recommend!!', 'We had 3 really wonderful evenings in this pub. The staff is great and always open for a chat.', 'A great place to catch up with friends for fun and memorable times.\nThe food is awesome and so are the beer and the service. Pierre and Monika are the best bar owners, feels like family. Great decoration and pinball machine too.']

['Very good restaurant. Staff is very friendly. Food 10 out of 5 stars ‚≠êÔ∏èüòä very tasty. Food Prepared very fast. Waiter was very nice to the child. Place is very clean. Recommend to everyone.', 'Food was absolutely delicious! We ordered the Bo Bun, the Crying Tiger, the Grilled Salmon, and Half cooked duck. The duck (pictured below) was exquisite. Crispy on top, soft on the inside. For dessert we had coulifat and the chocolate cake. Very well prepared and worth every cent! Very good service as well
üíì', 'The food is absolutely delicious. Everything! The owners are friendly and are there to cook and serve you with dedication and love. During our stay of 6 days we came here three times! It was that good.
A must if you are staying in this area. We will be back!', "Delicious neighborhood restaurant. My wife got the duck and I had the pork medallions (today's lunch special). Both were excellent. Chocolate dessert and cherry custard pie were also wonderful. Thank you!", "Best lunch in Paris for E13.50!!

This little place is a little gem.

It's on the corner of my road and is friendly and unassuming.  The beer is cold, well kept and they have a wide selection of other drinks and cocktails. The best thing however, is the charming service and the food. They have a plat de jour for E10 and a 2 course option for E13.50 which I have had 3 times now and I have to say I can't fault it.  The prawns in filo pastry with basil and sweet chilli dip are superb and a steal at this price. The veal skewers are excellent and the deserts are always home made and delicious.

You can tell it's a good place to eat as the place is always full at lunchtimes with locals who know good cooking at keen prices.

In short, a great local place for really good food at good prices."]

['Absolutely loved it. Great food,nice atmosphere ,friendly people and resealable prices!\nKeep up the good work!', 'Super delicious food,I recommend the Kebab sandwich. Nice staff. Definitely will be coming back!', "best kebab ever eaten in paris!!! +very clean, nicely decorated and the staff very kind!! I'll be back", 'Fantastic kebabs and great value for money! Lovely friendly staff too. Highly recommend the chicken tandoori and the kebab', 'Clean. Friendly to non-native visitors. Food was excellent. Great value overall.']

Adresse: 108 Rue Olivier de Serres, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews:
['The food is great and authentic. Recommend p√¢te de pomme de terre and tofu skin with piment.', "Visited this place at the recommendation of a friend. Didn't have the appetite for dumplings which was a shame since it's a buffet and looked popular with the other tables.

Note that the mala fried chicken is NOT boneless, that was a downside but not
uncommon for Chinese dishes. But overall dish could be better taste wise.

Stir fried cabbage was surprisingly tasty and delicious. The mala noodles first seemed disappointing but eventually grew on me and will be what I return for! It has a vinegary mushroom taste which is enjoyable (after removing the oil).", 'Small chinese restaurant with no many seats but food is amazing, real Sichuan flavor, very valuable for price.

If you‚Äôre a dumpling lover they have an all you can eat option with dumplings with very affordable price.', 'Although the restaurant was very full, my friends and I were served very quickly. The food was amazing; I ate the Á∫¢ÁÉßÁâõËÇâÈù¢. It is close to the Port de Versailles Expo center, which makes it easy to walk to. The restaurant is very clean.', 'Hidden gem in the area with authentic northeastern Chinese dishes. Great favor. The duck and eggplants dish are so flavorful. Understandably a bit overwhelmed during the Olympics but the owner was super nice and trying best to accommodate.']

['Tbh, the pho tastes so bad and with very little beef and a bit sour. But entree dumplings was not too bad. Any way if you are authentic Asian taster, I am not recommend this one.', 'I ordered the weekday formule which included an entr√©e and a main course for 15 euros. The dumplings were very delicious and served with a spicy sauce. The pad thai was very filling and fresh. I loved the accompaniments that it came with. The portion was quite large and I had to get it packed to eat later! The staff was very friendly. Would definitely visit again!', 'First restaurant experience after landing in Paris and the long drive from airport to hotel. This definitely felt like some of the best Thai food I have had and coming from a trip in Morocco, much welcomed for the change. Highly recommended Thai food in Paris, very nice staff, and most importantly awesome food!', "Nice place even though service was slow due to an almost full restaurant. However, don't go if you are looking for Thai food. Despite the name, dishes were nothing authentic. It wasn't bad by any means, just not what I was craving for that night.", "Descent tha√Ø food, however service was very good.\nThe food tasted ok but lacked flavour in some dishes.\nThe curry in a coconut is a nice touch, but doesn't excuse make it up for the food."]

['Myself and my friend stopped by here recently and had a juice and I took a th√© gourmand. The service is quite slow but the staff were actually very nice. They brought out water to my dog too which always appreciate.', "Found this little cafe on Google, which was a short stroll from the hotel. And I'm definitely glad we did!
Really cozy place and a warm and welcoming staff.
The kids chose a poke bowl and cheeseburger (from the main menu). The poke bowl was fresh and full of flavour.
The cheeseburger was grande and super moist and delicious. Yummy side of chips and a homemade mayo.
Hot chocolates went down without any complaints.

We shared a chorizo egg starter and mushroom starter.
The chorizo egg was a surprise, a poached egg served in a creamy broth and chorizo, an amazing combination of flavours.
As a main, we tried the Caesar salad with crispy chicken, fresh and delicious flavours - missing a bit of dressing though, but nothing to complain about.
We also tried the Crouque Madam, and wow, that blew my mind. Crispy and buttery sandwich with cheese and ham, topped with a sunny side up egg. Crispy Fries. 10/10

Definitely recommend this cozy little cafe for a lazy brunch /lunch, day.", 'Had a menu breakfast everyday just for 13eu
Omelette, Croissant, coffee, fresh juice.', 'Excellent. Food was tasty, service was good. It has a great atmosphere. Not much to dislike! Salmon Poke bowl was especially excellent.', 'good food but very crowded at noon and the service is very slow.']

['The food and service were both excellent when we went for dinner. The wait staff was very friendly and attentive. We decided to have the fixed price menu so the 4 of us that ate each had a starter, a main plate, and a dessert. Between the 4 of us we tried 3 of the different daily specials. All of our courses were delicious. We go again and very much recommend.', 'We had the menu option with starter, main and dessert. All very good. Excellent service as well.', 'Was staying in the neighbourhood and wished to try French cuisine. Choice was limited unfortunately but I found this place which wasn‚Äôt exactly what I was looking for, but gave it a try. The waiter/ manager was very kind and welcoming. The restaurant is small and tables are close to each other, very close. Luckily nobody sat to one side of us but I was a bit squashed with a table behind me. Menu was short, which I liked. I opted for the specials and I can say that I was disappointed by all of them. Service was good, prices were good, place was let down a little by the food', '3 stars for food, 5 stars for service. Not sure what the hype is about. Entrec√¥te steak was tough. Chicken tasted regular and dry. Service saved the day.', 'I had a great time as a tourist at dinner fir one']

Adresse: 3 Rue Olivier de Serres, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Super good food!nice ambiance! And Nice staff ! We are definitely going back to this resturant !üëçüëç', 'Go and fix your opening schedules on google so you don‚Äôt waste people‚Äôs time. Came when I saw its open on google but found it closed when arrived.', 'We visited this restaurant for lunch with friends, and while we were excited for a good experience, we were left disappointed. We were two families with young children‚Äîa one-year-old and a two-year-old. We were surprised to find that any child below eight years old is automatically charged a 9.99‚Ç¨ kids menu fee, regardless of age. Realistically, a one- or two-year-old barely eats anything, so this policy seemed unfair.

As for the food, the quality wasn‚Äôt up to expectations. Some items, like the carpaccio with cheese, seemed far from fresh‚Äîit looked like it had been sitting out for a while. Moreover, the menu options were limited, with not much diversity in choices, which was a letdown for an ‚Äú√† volont√©‚Äù concept.

Finally, the service was lacking. Unlike other similar restaurants, where staff regularly clears tables to make space for new plates, here, the attention to service was almost absent.

Overall, we left feeling that both the quality and value for money could be improved.', 'Really good ! Went there on my bday and no regrets, my fav was the chicken in lil balls :D

Grandmother and mother were pleased with the seafood options, i did not try it myself but i trust their words', 'One of my favorite restaurants in Paris ! So many choices and the food is always warm.
The staff are on point and you can eat alllll the food you want for only 23‚Ç¨.
For asian cuisine lovers like myself, this place is heaven ‚ô•Ô∏è
I highly recommend it.']

Adresse: 55 Rue Olivier de Serres, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Lovely, traditional french bar. Simple and good quality food. Would recommend.', 'Came here for a family dinner and it couldn‚Äôt have been better . Have been to italy but i could argue that this is much better and offered amazing services and even better food', 'Rlly good food, staff are friendly. The burger and the Crem br√ªl√©e chefs üòö. Would definitely come again when I visit France.', 'Came here with a group of friends for dinner. Food was very good, staff were very attentive and prices were very reasonable. I would definitely return.', 'Great service great food! I ordered the chicken burger and it was amazing and fresh! Highly recommend. Beautiful bar and great atmosphere']

['I came here for champions league football. Unfortunately the channel was lagging and breaking up so much that I would not watch the game. I tried the entire first half and got a headache trying to watch with very choppy network.

I complained about this and requested if anything could be done but I was told everything has been tried it‚Äôs the channel.

I left the place for a different bar and watched the second half on the same channel with excellent quality and zero issues.

There was also a fly in the bar which is unacceptable.

Only giving a 3 star due to multiple screens.', 'My family and I are big football (f√∫tbol/soccer) fans and we were looking for a comfortable place to watch a few games from different leagues while in Paris. We were well received, were able to watch a game from the Premier League AND La Liga, and had great beer while doing so. It was late so the kitchen was closed but nevertheless a great time. The man who accommodated us was friendly, welcoming, and fun. Would totally recommend to sports fans.', 'The owner is nice, great atmosphere for watching football matches, I went there to watch champions league semifinal match, it was full and everyone was nice and polite even when it was full and crowded the owner took care of everyone.
You can have lunch or dinner while watching.
Not so expensive and not cheap, I recommend it.', 'Average
Not bad and not particularly good either', 'Great local dive. Very authentic. The owner supports Rennes FC and Sporting Lisbon. Good stuff']

Adresse: 75 Rue Olivier de Serres, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Full of typically french food...if the choice of cheese would be bigger i would have gave 5 stars', 'Worst market. Never on time', 'Too much waiting in line to pay.', "I would have liked to give zero stars but I couldn't. This is the third time I've bought something that's expired. At this store the staff deliberately hides the correct dates or expired areas in the fruit. Today I bought a melon covered in part of a paper that says it's the brand even though it's done on purpose to hide the infected area of \u200b\u200bthe melon. Twice I bought packets of pistachio nuts with an expired date and a sticker hiding the real date. It's horrible.\nI asked all my colleagues that we no longer go there", 'More expensive than Monoprix and poor behavior from certain staff members.\nBesides, the behavior can be seen in certain responses...']

Adresse: 79 Rue Olivier de Serres, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews: ["My group and I were the only people within the restaurant who had ordered food at the time, but service was incredibly slow. The pasta didn't stand out much, and most entrees were average. However, the portions were generous.", "Well, I have seen worst and... I've seen so much better!! to be fair the place owner is very sympathetic but that where it ends. The food may look good, but its very average, I mean I honestly could have made it myself and it'd have been better. Rather average in this area, bistros are very much garbage, we didnt even tried the Mayo/ketchup sauce given the poor quality hygiene, the meat came uncooked we had to have it re-cooked, the egg wasn't either. All in all if you are famished and there are no other options around (like one of the last resort), then its a place to go... scratch that, i dont recommend it at all.", 'Lovely little bistro, not far away from Porte de Versailles Expo Centre. Good value for money.', 'Good food and good service!!! Valuable meals good to try', 'It was very delicious! And the host is really nice :) also the atmosphere is great and relaxed.']

Adresse: 81 Rue Olivier de Serres, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews: ['This place was doubly disappointing because it had good reviews and I have been wanting to try it since a while. They do take some trouble with the presentation of the food but the food itself is meh... After giving me a long explanation as to why one of the dishes in the menu was not available (because it‚Äôs a cold dish and therefore not suitable for winter) they proceeded to serve the hot mezze at a very lukewarm temperature. Nothing seems to be made fresh and they don‚Äôt bother reheating it properly either... The hummus was nice.', 'Everything was great except the service is a bit slow when we asked for tea and sweets.', 'Good Lebanese brunch for those who are looking for something different from the usual brunch standards. A nice range of appetizers in the Mezze starter, and some nice unusual inclusions like Sahlep and orange flower flavored orangeade. The hazelnut baklava is excellent!', 'Great libanaise food, affordable price only for the orders to go. But still not so pricy.', 'Good Lebanese food, Parisian prices. Great location for a post-meal promenade on the petite-ceinture.']

['I had the Vietnamese coffee and beef pho noodles. The broth was rich in beef bone flavor, garlicky which I liked. The beef was thinly sliced wonderfully and the beef balls didn‚Äôt have tendons which i appreciated. It was delightful to find authentic Vietnamese food in the Montmarte area.', 'It is a Cambodian and Vietnamese restaurant.  Takeout is also available.  Meat dishes, noodles, desserts, all were delicious.  The store clerk was also very pleasant and the service was good.', 'Very nice and delicious food. Prices are reasonable! You need a main dish and a starter to be full.', 'Good Cambodian and Vietnamese restaurant.\nFresh ingredients and friendly staff.', 'Amazing food ! really far the best in his category !']

['Googled n saw the high rating n good reviews for this Viet restaurant n it sure deserves this good rating.
Its within short walk from the exhibition halls.

Had the fried quail, beef Pho n fried vegetables.
Everything was great!

Crispy fried quail was prob the best we ever had. Didn‚Äôt feel oily at all, great garlic flavour

Pho was yummy with generous amount of beef, tender n tasty.

Fried vegetables is flavourful too.

Plus owner was friendly, served water immediately (no need to order a bottle of sparkling or still water :)

Prices are wallet friendly.
Overall a satisfying meal for an Asian couple üëçüòä', 'This was probably the most different Vietnamese restaurant we have tried in Paris so far. Cosy interior. Attention to the platings. The duck breast with tamarind sauce was our most favorite! Services were a bit slow but friendly. Worth a try', 'This charming bistro has the best Vietnamese food I‚Äôve ever had. The owners are the face of the bistro- Mr is the front of the house, and Mrs is cooking. The restaurant was full so I was lucky to get a table for one. Mr made excellent recommendations and I left full and happy. The food had such fresh authentic ingredients and the presentation was lovely. I will be back every time I‚Äôm in Paris.', 'Food,service and atmosphere were amazing!
One of the best Vietnamese cuisine I ever had
Highly recommended!', 'Small cosy corner for Vietnamese food. Authentic dishes, taste great. Service was awesome from very friendly staffs.

Recommended dishes: crispy pork belly with rice vemicelli, beef bbq, Vietnamese pancake, soft rice rolls.']

['A quiet and atmospheric restaurant in the 15th arrondissement. The food or menu is nothing special, but overall the taste is above average. It is recommended to sit outside when the weather is warm, but it is good to eat inside as the sun shines well into the restaurant. The staff are friendly, so you feel good after visiting.', 'This restaurant was recommended to us by our hotel and we were not disappointed. We took daily offers and they were just right - tuna steak and grilled lamb, both were served with amazing sauces. Lovely place!', 'Very nice place with good food and even better drinks. Especially the St Germain Spritz üëåüíï', 'Comfy outdoor seating in a quiet neighbourhood. Extremely friendly staff who were extremely gracious dealing with Australian English.\n\nFood was fantastic.', 'Garden mule! It was a mind blowing drink! The service was fantastic, very welcoming and quick! Late at night they had appetizers like a veggie platter and a cheese platter which was fine by us! We had the veggie platter and I thought it was great and plentiful for two! We arrived pretty late around 10:30pm. The atmosphere is fun! I loved the painting of the gorrilla with tinkerbell! So fun and chill!']

['I walk by this restaurant everyday and keep telling myself that one day I should give it a try. I finally did. I want to say I‚Äôm head over heels like some reviewers are - alas, I‚Äôm not. The pizza was really soggy in the middle and lacked flavors. The gnocchi was okayish. Overall decent experience, but the bottom line is I wouldn‚Äôt be rushing for another time. The staff are friendly and the restaurant is cozy.', "Ibrahim was very helpful in suggesting me really nice options. I'm very happy with the quality of the food. Everything was super fresh and delicious. Everyone is very sympathetic. I loved it.", 'Like you can see on the pictures,
two perfect cooked Pastas ‚ò∫Ô∏è
(if you really want to see it‚Ä¶ than go there and enjoy!)

i really liked the professional and friendly waiter/waitress.

We will definitely come again!!!', 'Food was absolutely amazing made it even better that we got service with a smile. Most delicious food and fabulous staff especially guy.', 'Excellent! We were going around France and were looking for a very good restaurant and found this one. Everything was amazing! They know English well and we loved the service.üëçüèªüëåüèªüòç']
['It‚Äôs so good! There are an amazing staff!', 'top .', 'The blonde is rude and a liar .', 'After few months ordered a box and was not good at all! The quality reduced significantly!', 'Excellent']

['The menu was simple and few but tasty and good presentation.  Like a family hosted your dinner and put extra attention.  Even the kids are helping üòäüòä
They are also very attentive.
It‚Äôs a refreshing change from the busy Parisian restaurants.  Lovely.', 'Very nice restaurant cosy and friendly
The service is good
The food is very tasty and generous
We had to take some food in doggy bag
Burrata is delicious', 'We had a wonderful meal at this family shop. The lady was very nice and speaks English to assist us. Highly recommended.', 'This casual Family diner was excellent we have shared a burrata salad followed by 3 pizzas all tasty and very good. The service is efficient and friendly. Good luck to this new comer in the 15th and the prices are very sweet üëè', 'A family run restaurant that has not only wonderful hosts that are perfectly fluent in both French and English, but also delicious food that would satisfy any palate. Stay for the dessert as they are just as amazing. The best tiramisu I have ever had!']

Adresse: Rue de Cronstadt 34 De, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Very practical and well-kept store. Permanently closed since the end of October. several reports to Google but no update...', 'Very clean local store, a large selection of products. The cashier is very pleasant, which is very rare these days.', 'Very pleasant and well-kept neighborhood store. The top manager, always smiling and caring for her customers!', 'Small neighborhood store, very practical but notices indicate that it will close permanently in a few days...for what reason? If anyone has any info...', 'Smiling welcome and very pleasant, super clean store!!\n\nThank you for your welcome']

Adresse: 210 Rue de la Convention 208, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Super !!!', "Very respectful and welcoming staff. The dishes are delicious and the prices reasonable.

It's just a shame that Thai chicken is becoming increasingly rare in the choices offered.

It's one of the best in Paris!", 'Slices of plain industrial chicken placed on rice vermicelli are sold under the name "bo bun"... surprising.', 'what can I say about this delicatessen rubbery nem not heated enough the beef with onions was not great the Cantonese rice was overcooked in short first and last time I set foot there to avoid absolutely', "Very good pho soup with soy coriander mint red pepper on the side
TTB
On the other hand...it's cold...no heating"]

Adresse: 200 Rue de la Convention, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews:
['What a great place. A wide ranging menu with plenty of options. We were there for a late lunch. Chicken burger, Duck special,  beer & wine. Hard to fault the food, which come out quickly and was delicious.

While it can get busy, the staff are fantastic.

Recommended.', 'Nice Cafe to have a drink and a bite to eat. Seating indoors and outdoors. They have a good selection of food. The tables on the inside are small but that adds to the charms.

Service was good and quick. We came in around 18:30 so it was not very crowded. It started to fill up around 20:0. I guess the place can be busy later in the evening.

I had the onion soup and the tartar. Both were very nice and very reasonable pricing.', 'The service was really great. We don‚Äôt speak French and we had several seniors in our group. We had several dishes, drinks and dessert. The risotto was delicious. The chicken special we tasty as well. The ravioli ricotta arrabiati was just ok as it needed more seasoning. For dessert, the French toast with ice cream didn‚Äôt make it to the camera lens as it was shared across the table. Overall, we could definitely visit here again as the experience was good. Oh, the drinks were good and the local beer offered was enjoyed by several.', 'Lovely local brasserie in the middle of Paris.
The food is a 10/10. VERY generous portions. Good value for money.
Welcoming and friendly staff.
We had the Assortiment de tapas, it is great for sharing for 2. And the tastes are just perfect
We also had the salads weekend a rome and cobb salad, recommended!
For the finish you have to try the chocolate fondant... it is to die for ü§§
.
.
Bottom line: Recommended, definitely comming back', 'Excellent Service and delicious food. Excellent.']

Adresse: 192 Rue de la Convention, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews: ["Hello, I ordered one hot chocolate vien. The lady was using her hand to make hot chocolate without hand gloves and even she didn't put sugar as well and didn't mix chocolate properly. She just did hot and gave it to me. I am really disappointed about their service and food too! I am attaching photos as well.", "My group came here to have hot coffee after  dinner, but we ended up having a cold coffee. There's not a lot of people when we entered, so we didn't understand that we waited for more than 30 minutes to have ours. I need  to go 2x to follow up our before they deliver it. I asked our order calm and nicely, but the guys just laughed and didn't even say sorry. And alas!!! they deliver it cold!!!\nI", "Very very busy with a constant stream of delivery riders coming in and out so had to wait a while for my order which had to be done at the self service machine - no counter service for orders.  It was a McDonald's- so consistent and a bit tastier than the UK", "Cold hamburger, cold fries, there were more ice in my coke, than coke at all. And it's terrible dirty tables and floors, feels like the tonnes of sugar syrup was dropped off there. And a lot of wild doves eating fries just from the floor at that place", 'Ordered the double Signature burger from here for takeout. Got home and found out they‚Äôd given me the single. Didn‚Äôt want to have to walk all the way back. Make sure you check.']

['Very great place to eat sushis in Paris with correct prices. I went there many times and it has always been good and clean. The personal is also very kind :)', 'Food ok, but the service is excellent and they do a serious take away trade, .. their salad pictures below is exceptionally good and I had two .. to be fair only tried the sashimi . The other food passing looked excellent next time ! They do loads of combined brochettes which I do like so maybe that‚Äôs their thing !! The atmosphere is just not exciting sort of schoolish ..', 'Nice personal and very delicious!!', 'Splendid food and amazing atmosphere', 'Good sushi, nothing out of the ordinary.']

["Visiting from America I'm happy to see that there's Lao food in Paris. The dining experience was great! Definitely a go to spot if you're craving Lao food.", 'Delicious thai food..beautiful colors and flavors!', 'This place is always excellent every time I go. The food is top quality, fairly priced, and service is quick for lunch. Friendly wait staff too. Ask for extra spice!', 'Amazing food, excellent service, friendly staff.', 'Amazing food - although quite expensive (even for Parisian standards). I recommend the "famous Massaman curry".']

Adresse: 196 bis Rue Raymond Losserand, 75014 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Second order today, and like the last time, we are having to wait for an hour for delivery, give or take. The restaurant is 10 minutes (from an old person) from our place on foot. We don't understand why they are so incompetent. Every time we call to inquire, they say the deliverer left "5 minutes ago". Never again...!

Who knew... this time they didn't have the large pizza we ordered, so they brought us two medium ones. :-(', 'Very rude staff!!!!

The items I ordered are not available but they are not allowing cancellation. To make things worst, the staff who called me is very rude and not event sorry about it. So i asked to call back so I can confirm and check the other options myself. However, when i called‚Ä¶ the call was answered but no one is talking and instead, the phone is left hanging where i can here all the loud noises until i just hang up because no one is responding.', "it's very very bad restaurant and the pizza is also not testing. and the service is not good. I think manager is  not good behave to customers.", "We ordered delivery service with Supereme pizza, 1 Hibeken beer, 1 coke.

There's several problems.

First, menu was changed without notifications. We ordered beer but when delivery arrived, they said beer was sold out and they changed to zero coke. (heineken beer 4.5 euro, zero coke 2.5 euro)

Secondly, pizza quality is bad. I don't know why but there's sand particles in 2 pieces of pizza. We cannot eat 2 pieces.

I love pizza but in this case, I am very upset", 'a literal scam! the ordered pizza came after 30min and was overheated, and as we requested a new one, we were shouted at by the owner! don‚Äòt ever take away from this place, the pizza you get is most likely uneatable/unenjoyable']

['The best place to eat sushi in the country! Friendly, fast service and very clean restaurant. The freshest sushi ever and the sides were also very tasty. Visit for a great experience at great prices! This one is a must!', 'One of the best sushi places i‚Äôve been lately! And i  love sushi! Really recommended, the people were friendly and understood english! The food was yummy and the fish fresh! Even the wasabi was fresh made, and ginger was amazing! The soup was a good start with the salad! If you are near by and you like sushi,you should definitely give a visit! üç£üç±', "Only got takeaway which has 10% off. But it's always busy inside. Food is reliably good and quick service. Soy sauce is homemade and the portions are very good for the money. Not sure warm mushroom soup is a good combination in a bag with cold fish but otherwise very good.", "Wonderful sushi, no cream cheese or spicy tuna nonsense here. If you like sushi with fish as the focus, this is the place to go! Also, their yakitori (roasted meats) are delicious if raw fish isn't your thing. We got a sushi boat, chirashi, yakitori combo, and oyako-katsudon. All delicious! I've been to Japan and I'm still impressed with the quality and affordability!", 'Very delicious, good price. Downside was that there were a lot of clients and the place is quite small.']

['Nicely stocked shelves, budget items are plenty. The lady in the counter was very helpful in selecting a budget champagne and also had good suggestion for cheese. The bread was fresh and well made. Wish we had tried the chicken but it was not ready.', 'Closes before advertised time - got there at 9:45pm and the security guard insisted they were already closed, despite staff still being there and the advertised closing time being 10pm. If you want to close at 9:45, update your hours!!', 'The shelves are not always that organized, and the staff keeps wanting to talk yo you and help with the self-service even though I use the self-service so I can listen to my music and not be bothered.', 'Personnel do not comply with announced opening hours. Also, the security staff is very impolite.', 'Very kind staff!']

Adresse: 151 Rue de la Convention, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Met an extremely rude female employee. Worst customer service ever in Paris.\nVery bad experience. The company should train their staff properly. SHAME!', "24/7 market in Paris! It's like an oasis in the desert.. feels like God's blessing... people who live, understand what I am talking about..", "Good supermarket. You get most of the stuff that is there in all other Carrefour supermarkets but since it's small I guess not everything is available.", 'Good 24/7 small cold store that is full with nearly all you need to survive the night...', 'Much more expensive than Carrefour City that is 200m away. 24/24 is very convenient though.']

["Great fried chicken place by George Brassens. We're always very well received by the staff. The food is what you would expect from a friend chicken place, but it's really well priced. Cheaper than KFC but tastier. Don't be put off by the bad reviews, as it seems it underwent a change in management.", 'Very impressed. Royal with cheeseü§£', 'It was very delicious and nice !\nMost importantly best service in Paris , very kind and welcoming, even an introvert felt warm and comfortable!! Thank you !!!', 'Great food and service. Keep it up habibi!', 'Really good food and a good service üëç']

["It's huge! I was impressed by the size of this market, compared to others in this neighborhood. It's 2 stories, and has so much choice of fruits and vegetables and more.", 'Clean and well organised place for shopping. Amazing team helps you with zeal and enthusiasm. Highly recommend', 'Excelente.very special place. So clean.so kind the people.everyting is fresh.  i like to go to this intermarche.again...is excelente congratularon for the Best place to shops.', "It was just the experience that we we're hoping for! Reccomended always!", 'Always nice polite helpfull and makes you feel welcome and at home Staff are nice good and efficient as always']

['Amazing food with really kind services!üòä
We came as a family of 5, and my son ordered the truffle ravioli and he absolutely loved it ‚ù§Ô∏è We also ordered lamb and beef and the meat was so tender and juicy it was worth it coming to this lovely restaurant üòã. My elder son said he got the best lasagne he ever had. We recommend it to everyone who likes a taste of Italian food üòÄ ! We booked through the folk.', '3.5 stars review
----------------
We reserved through "The Fork"
The place was really crammed and the tables were very much attached, that you'd have to make an effort to cross.
The waitress was professional yet not very friendly.
However the food was really good.
The onion soup was very well made with the exact amounts of cheese.
The pizza was not very special but had a good taste through it's simplicity.
The pasta was good but the portion wasn't very big.
Prices were good but i think they should try to have less people at the same time to make the experience more enjoyable and calm', 'All food ordered tasted delicious, the ravioli was perfect and the pizza made as ordered. Spaghetti was too high priced for all that it was. Still a lovely meal and would definitely have again.', 'Cozy!
Delicious food!
Nice professionals serving us!
They offered a digestive drink :)', 'Very good Lamb, and loved the Carbonara too !!! Definitely should visit !! I‚Äôm coming back for sure :)']

['Had the new year eve dinner here. We had a reservation through TheFork so a table was ready for us. However, the welcome drink was given only after we specifically requested it, even though it was included in the package. The food was okay - foie gras for starter, steak and capon for mains and 2 desserts. Bottle of wine was not included in the package but the price (and the wine) was decent. Staff friendly (sometimes too much). Overall positive experience', 'Food is delicious!! Went there twice during my trip and it was great both times. Staff is super chill and the vibe of the place is great.', "Staff doesn't bother to be friendly, starts talking to us in English but then seems irritated when we talk back in English. I would have been   happy to speak French, but they just assume you're a tourist and are not worth their attention. When our order arrived at the table the staff just stays silent to us, doesn't say a word. There are better and more authentic cafes around this area to visit.", "Great location next to Penarty Metro station üöâ. I recommend the Salmon, ratatouille or  grilled chicken and chips - Poulet Fermier d'ardeche. They have alot on the menu and serve Breakfast, a range of drinks and Dinner. Football was showing the night I visited.", 'A classic Parisian bistro with lovely stuff and amazing food. The menu has a lot to chose from and the stuff is very helpful. They also have a menu of the day with cheaper options. In comparison to other bistros in Paris the prices were a bit smaller. They offer free water without asking which is a plus when you are not a local and maybe struggle a bit with the language. Highly recommend it!!']

['Eva is very nice and I like her charisma a lot. She switched languages between English and French to give us the best experience. She is also very cool and chill. Great experience here. Thanks a lot Eva! üòâ', "Stayed in Paris for a week and I am super upset I didn't come here sooner. Good was excellent üëåüèæüëåüèæüëåüèæ.\nDessert was amazing. Fresh taste and right sizes. Staff speaks English also but be patient", 'I recommend the chicken burrito as it was so tasty and delicious.the staff is also very friendly', "I had a truly disappointing experience at this restaurant. Despite waiting for what felt like forever, all I was served was a cup of coffee, a glass of orange juice, and half a piece of bread. The wait time was completely unacceptable, and when the food finally came, it was far below expectations. The lack of attention to customers and slow service made the visit frustrating and unpleasant. I expected much more and definitely won't be coming back. Only the young guy welcoming us is welcoming ü§Ø", "Not at all what i expected. I was seriously excited for this place sinc least few months. The place does look good but the staff . Oh god! They really don't know how to talk to the guest. The prices are extremely high. And also if you order a cocktail trust me you won't be able to taste alcohol even 1%. There was just one girl who was our server who was genuinely sweet , even though she deserve to be in a better place. The other staff especially the one who was handling the pool area was rude and quite offensive. Being from this field i know exactly on a Friday night how busy it gets but being so so formal and rude is unacceptable."]

['Very good food, nice atmosphere, good music, amable waiters. We had "le formule" with an entree and a plate - fresh food and delicious plus a really good cafe.', 'Great sidewalk cafe near Montparnasse train station.  Nice cafe menu including Croque Monsieur, salads and dinner plates.  Good wine and beer selection.  Friendly, bilingual (French and English) server staff.', 'Great value and service! 6‚Ç¨ pints of Tripel and free potato apetizers that are delicious!', 'Great family run brasserie. Dishes are served in a simple traditional way yet the food was very good. Entrecote steak was excellent. Nice and friendly staff.', 'Very tasty wine and meals:)']

['After walking for 12+ miles on 2 hours of sleep choosing a place for dinner was a daunting task. We stumbled across this place on Google Maps while looking for places near the hotel. It was great to find a local restaurant which wasn‚Äôt full of other tourists. The staff was polite and attentive.

I had the steak (‚Ç¨31) which was perfectly cooked. My only ‚Äúcomplaint‚Äù was that I wish I could have had the potatoes as opposed to the polenta for a side.

We had the brioche dessert which was soft, fluffy and delicious.', 'The staff were exceptionally friendly, which was the highlight of our visit. However, the food fell short of our expectations. Despite the generous portion sizes, the dishes were bland and lacked any distinct flavor. Unfortunately, none of my family could finish their meals. Unless you‚Äôre simply looking to fill up after a long day of sightseeing, I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this restaurant.', 'What an experience. Do not MISS OUT on the onion and bacon pie. The angus steak was fantastic and I could hardly resist the French toast. What an amazing meal with such kind and attentive service.', 'We had a fantastic experience at Le Jerobaum.  Highly recommend.  Service was really well delivered.  They gave us options for table location.  Able to speak English to us with ease.  Food was excellent.   We mostly ate seafood and all was interesting and well cooked.  We really enjoyed ourselves.', 'The staff was really bad - constantly forgetting what we ordered, bringing us something totally different, giving us a wrong bill.

Food was OK, though we had to return the duck because it was way to raw.

Everything seemed really slow - we were waiting for 50 minutes for our deserts and they brought wrong ones.

We would expect some kind of compensation (shots?), but nothing.

We had rather bad time there and I would certainly not to go here again.']

['Very delicious japanese food, good quality, reasonable price, friendly staffs.', 'The food was just so so...
For the sushi/maki/california, there were too much rice compared to the fish. The yakitori was good, though.', 'We order miso soup, udon soup, maki tataki sushi. The Udon soup has no taste at all.
They are not Japanese! They are Chinese who make Japanese food. Even the wasabi does not taste like wasabi,just cheap wasabi which you can just buy in Asian Supermarkets. Like we don‚Äôt order many things,we always just order 2 portions and wait how tasty it.', 'Very good and friendly service
Clean
Fair prices', 'Amazing Place, very tasty and pleasant Service.I recommend coming here.
They have all you can eat formula as well.']

['Delicious Creole cuisine - especially loved their flavourful Cari Poulet and Rougane Boucan√©. We got a set of Entree, main and dessert at 30 euro pp which was great value. Service was quick, staff were very friendly.', 'I lived on R√©union Island over 20 years ago, but I was transported back there when I ate at this restaurant! We had the cari poulet and rougaille saucisse, and it was just as good as I remember from my time on the island. Merci pour un repas d√©licieux !', "Ordered the brunch for 20‚Ç¨ pp.
Definitely worth it. Food is just yummy. Service is great.
Only criticism is that our hot drinks didn't get refilled after asking, but the place had gotten really busy for lunch so its not a big deal.
They have english menus :)", 'We had a fish stew and a lamb stew. Both were very good and subtly flavoured. Sorbets for dessert were a delight, and so were the rum-based cocktails. Service was attentive and polite. Highly recommended.', "Nice Service and tasty food. Unfortunately they don't have an English menu but we managed it with Google translator.
Can highly recommend the restaurant."]

Adresse: 2 rue Pernety / 24 rue Didot, 75014 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Super nice staff, very friendly place, the food was delicious too.', "We don't speak much French and so when the waiter brought us the menu, he stood and translated everything for us, absolutely amazing! The chicken with preserved lemon was absolutely delicious, and the creme brulee dessert was delicious, if a little cold.", 'Lovely place with nice staff and a great old world homely feel. Rustic and charming. Great food - loved the lamb and the chestnut tiramisu.', 'Such a lovely nostalgic bistro. Food and service are both great and good price for Paris. I came back specifically for their burger. Meat is cooked just right, juicy, with a piece of foie gras and so much fresh mushroom under the patty. I would love to try all the other items on their menu next time I come back to Paris.', 'Food is really yummy. Good service. Definitely recommend it.']

['Great service from the staff.   Enjoyed how they brought the daily menu out to the table,  (on a white board) and was able to explain their offerings.  Seating felt a bit cramped.

Food wise,  fresh seafood, and wine!

My only grip was that the food had little to no flavors / taste.   I would assume it was very lightly seasoned to accommodate a wide range of palates.  I just expected more for the price range.

The red fish was seasoned well.  The rest not so.  In my opinion, the vegetable sides I ordered had 0% seasoning.

Absolutely enjoyed the small bowl of complimentary bread and clams.

My Calamari and fried onions were a bit overcooked; however, still edible.

Only able to order one serving of razor claim, due to them having limited offerings.  Only my friend was able to enjoy.  I sampled one of his and it was delicious.', 'La Cagouille

Country: France
Location: 10 Place Constantin Brancusi, 75014 Paris
Cooking Style: Traditional French seafood

Go There For:

‚Ä¢	Exceptionally fresh seafood, prepared simply to let the ingredients shine.
‚Ä¢	A welcoming, unpretentious bistro atmosphere that feels authentically Parisian.
‚Ä¢	The expertly curated wine list by sommelier Kang Du, offering perfect pairings for every dish.
‚Ä¢	Outstanding value for top-quality seafood in Paris.

What to Eat and What to Drink:

What to Eat:
‚Ä¢	Grilled sardines: Crisp, smoky, and bursting with flavor.
‚Ä¢	Marinated mackerel: Balanced with a hint of acidity.
‚Ä¢	Roasted turbot or sole meuni√®re: Delicate and perfectly cooked.
‚Ä¢	Clam broth: Warm, briny, and deeply satisfying.
‚Ä¢	Fresh oysters: Served with classic condiments and a focus on freshness.

What to Drink:
‚Ä¢	Pair shellfish with a crisp Muscadet or Sancerre from Kang Du‚Äôs handpicked selection.
‚Ä¢	Opt for a white Burgundy, like Puligny-Montrachet, to enhance richer fish dishes.
‚Ä¢	Try a light, refreshing Loire Valley red (like Chinon) for a bold but balanced pairing.

Chef and Philosophy:

Chef: Andr√© Robert (founder and owner)

Philosophy:
La Cagouille is an ode to the sea, emphasizing simple preparations that highlight the natural flavors of pristine seafood. Dishes are grilled, roasted, or steamed, avoiding heavy sauces or distractions. The focus is on high-quality, daily-sourced ingredients treated with care.

Sommelier:

Kang Du
The heart of La Cagouille‚Äôs wine program is sommelier Kang Du, who has created a phenomenal wine list that perfectly complements the restaurant‚Äôs seafood-focused menu. His knowledge of French wines, particularly whites from Burgundy and the Loire, is unmatched. He is praised for guiding guests through pairings with a friendly and approachable attitude, ensuring that both wine enthusiasts and novices feel welcome.

Highlights from Critics:

‚Ä¢	Michelin Guide (Bib Gourmand): ‚ÄúIncredible freshness and honest cooking at exceptional value, with a wine list as noteworthy as the food.‚Äù
‚Ä¢	Gault & Millau: ‚ÄúThe seafood is unmatched, and the sommelier‚Äôs expertise elevates the dining experience to a new level.‚Äù
‚Ä¢	Food bloggers: Regularly celebrated for its generous portions, warm service, and Kang Du‚Äôs standout wine pairings.

Signature Dishes:

‚Ä¢	Grilled sardines
‚Ä¢	Marinated mackerel
‚Ä¢	Roast turbot or sole meuni√®re
‚Ä¢	Clam broth
‚Ä¢	Fresh oysters

Ratings and Reviews:

‚Ä¢	Michelin Guide: Bib Gourmand for quality and value.
‚Ä¢	Gault & Millau: Among Paris‚Äô top seafood bistros.
‚Ä¢	Wine program: Consistently highlighted as one of the restaurant‚Äôs strengths, thanks to Kang Du.

Preferred Ingredients:
‚Ä¢	Daily-sourced fish and shellfish from trusted French suppliers.
‚Ä¢	Premium olive oil, fresh herbs, and simple condiments to enhance flavors.

Overall Score: 9/10

Kitchen Score:8.5/10

‚Ä¢	Ingredients & Products: 10/10 ‚Äì Seafood so fresh it‚Äôs the star of every dish.
‚Ä¢	Technique & Simplicity: 9/10 ‚Äì Focused and skillful execution.
‚Ä¢	Presentation: 8/10 ‚Äì Minimalist, letting the food speak for itself.

Wine List: 9.5/10', 'I had a BLAST at Cagouille. I went on my own during a business trip in Paris, looking to eat a Dorade. It was not on the menu BUT they had one left which they cooked for me. Great fishes, seafood, wine list. Average client age is 80YO which was fine by me as old french people know where to eat (i am french as well).', 'Food: Umami
Wine: Best wine list
Reasonable price..
will come back again!', 'I love this place.

Server was very very kind, and atmosphere was ‚Äúsuper‚Äù. Seafood is also very fresh and delicious. It was perfect dinner for my family including my parents.
Hope to visit again. Merci beaucoup.']

['Had diner here with a friend. The menu was diverse , the desserts were amazing , the service was quick and nice. The food was of exceptional quality and I ate more than I should have . ['We had a great dining experience - recommend booking and to expect a relaxed dinner service. We had a fantastic and enthusiastic host who managed the service from start to end by himself. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back and highly recommend this place to anyone looking for authentic French cuisine.', "Excellent bistro.  The food is delicious.

['I spoke to someone the other day that tried very hard to convince me that Movenpick was as good if not better that Berthillon.

Heaven.', 'They were able to prepare food at 4 in the morning, high quality chicken, very tasty in fact', 'I think a little renovation here and there would be a great idea at soleil club', 'The owner should invest in heating the room beside that it was enjoyable.', 'Nice üëçüèæ']

['Superb seafood dinning, I searched for a nearby seafood restaurant and found it with high rate, I reserve via Google and went there.
One of best seafood I‚Äôve tried.
Starting from Appetizer, soup, main dish and even dessert.
Nice vibes and atmosphere, excellent hospitality especially from Clement and Kahina who I left to her to pick her recommendation and suggestion and it was a good choice, Fresh seafood and delicious taste.
Suitable for couples as it could be romantic, for normal day dinner and even for business dinner.', 'The seafood there is top notch. Got to celebrate my 40th there and went back for more seafood the weekend after that. Our server was AMAZING, funny and a vibe. We got her both times there. The food and desert were exquisite.', 'Great fresh seafood but clearly understaffed.
The aperitifs arrived after the food, the bread basket was not brought to us. We had to serve ourselves for the wine as nobody was paying attention to the table.
Do not miss their Baba au Rhum, a real staple', 'It was not was we have hoped for. The restaurant has a nice and appealing interior design, go for the round tables if you are three or more people. They showed flexibility and allowed us to have a vegetarian starter. The service was also nice, but we did not really like the food.

Both starters were plain without much taste, one was really small. The bread has been cut hours ago and was not fresh anymore. The fries were greasy and a little gloopy. The marmite was nothing special but boiling hot. Also the house desert Baba Rhum was just plain dough and loads of cream, at least you could drown it free rhum!', 'Very nice ambiance, the food is exquisite and the service, rightfully truthful to its French reputation.
Moreover, the quality vs price, I would definitely say it is affordable.
A must, recommend this place to any fish/ seafood lover, maybe even meat as they also have a selection of decadent meat.
4 thumbs up, the big toes included as they wiggle of pleasure...']

['We came to this restaurant unexpectedly without researching it and it did not disappoint. From the moment we came in the service and atmosphere was welcoming. If you see anything on the menu that sounds appealing, it is a very high likelihood that it will meet or exceed expectations. I would recommend this location for any occasion and a big shout out to Mathis and entire the staff for their amazing hospitality!', "The omelet was absolutely divine, the duck was well prepared. The homemade tea and apricot juice was an experience. Staff where friendly and helpful. The only complaint I have is I won't be able to find an omelet as good when I go home.", "This restaurant was recommended by our hotel receptionist and it didn't disappoint. The steak, champagne, wine appetizer, and dessert were all amazing. I cannot recommend this place enough!", 'Best meal my mum and I had in our Paris trip. Thank you so much! Will definitely be back. The waiter, cook and staff were so kind and made the atmosphere so relaxing. Big smiles on their faces and had very charismatic laughs. Thank you. We loved every bit of our meals - mains & desserts. Cannot recommend them enough \U0001faf6üèº xx', 'Mathis was very professional, helpful, and pleasant.\nThe food was delicious and served quickly and nicely presented. Will come back again to eat here. Highly recommended üëåüèº']

['Smack in the middle of Paris Montparnasse very much traffic
Bachata lessons and SBK Friday night.
The food is not good because it is Latino food in Paris but what can you expect. I think the ambiance is not bad there but kind of like a popular bar and not very artistic nor was the dancing very good. It is also not a lot of kizomba primarily SB.', 'The worst ‚Äúmojito‚Äù I ever tried. Muy mal preparado solo es agua con az√∫car y ron. Ver bad bartender. The place is mostly empty on a Friday night yet you have to pay ‚Ç¨14 to enter.', 'Worst milonga in Paris, by far. We went on a Tuesday, we were forced to leave things in the coat hanger at 2‚Ç¨/piece (even the shoe bags!). Ladies without pockets will not have a place to keep wallet/phone.

We were treated very rudely because we had a bottle of tap water with us, if you want water you have to purchase!

The vibe in this place is very strange. A mix of rudeness with a relentless pursue of profit.

Any place in Paris is better for dancing than this one, strongly recommend to bring your money elsewhere.', "Completely disappointed. I was looking for a place to eat and dance. A friend told me that it was the best place in Paris to dance  salsa and latin music.  First, apparently they only know bachata and merengue,  I like both of them, but not the whole night, the musical choice was pitiful.
If you want to go for dinner with friends and then dance, better go to a good restaurant first and then come to dance, the menu is very poor and the food lacks taste and imagination, I took a salad and a  piece of beef with fries, the meat was hard and the salad simple and without any interest.
The service very ordinary, second-rate, the server was polite but was never available.
If La Pachanga is the best place to go out and dance, then there's no good place in Paris, better to take a plane and go somewhere else.
Very very disappointed.", 'Lovely atmosphere and friendly folks. Loved it']

['We were received immediately upon our arrival. Seating was available, our orders placed an enjoyable atmosphere of local families sharing their afternoon. Thank you for exceptional world class customer service.', 'I think the standard of food in France is just higher. Even a normal local joint can deliver amazing croissant. ['Generous portions of classic tar tar. This is not your American interpretation of tar tar, this is the real deal. The environment is cozy but slightly too tight. Unfortunately, like most places in paris, the staff is a bit indifferent, but I definitely recommend it! great experience and good prices (abt 15 euros for the tartar, which is pretty filling). All the classics of easy french cuisine done right in a very local parisian bistrot atmosphere. By no means an elegant restaurant but this place is perfect for a low key meal ¬´\xa0sans prise de t√™te\xa0¬ª where you find yourself cleaning your plate with a piece of bread by the end.']

Adresse: 31 bis Rue de la Gait√©, 75014 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Stopped by recently, tried their beetroot tartare topped with goat cheese creme that was quite good. Cote du Rhone red was nice as well.
