Their vegetable sides are seasonally appropriate and their menu is diverse yet each item has the perfect flavors! Their dish of the day today was scallops with bubbly shrimp bisque in the half shell. I had a Macon that I swear changed my life. Be sure to come here if you‚Äôre near!', 'This restaurant is a standout because of its terrace and environ, a peaceful haven just 100m from the  frenetic rue Mouffetard, the famous Roman road. Good menu, vegetarian options, I took the fixed price menu 36e: the chilled soup (base cucumber) was excellent & the dessert (the pear  was smart & fun (photos).  The pasta for main course was ok but paled in comparison to the other 2 dishes.', 'Wonderful liocal innovative food with Iberian influence. Great atmodphere and service.', 'Nice spot in a quiet neighborhood with an outdoor terrace. Service was great! Special shout-out to Barbie who helped us translate everything all the menu (on top of providing fantastic conversation!) While a bit slow to get the food out, it was worth the wait! The veal with candied orange was an unlikely but amazing combination, cooked to perfection. And the chocolate mousse for dessert was borderline sinful, but definitely sized for sharing!']

['Fantastic crepes with top quality ingredients, fast, friendly, and attentive service. If you‚Äôre nearby, you won‚Äôt regret stopping in for a quick sweet treat or a full meal!', 'We loved the crepes at Le Petit Grumeau! The hospitality was the best we‚Äôve had in Paris, the owner was very welcoming and friendly.', 'Do not go here if you only speak English. Owner is not helpful to English speakers. Luckily I speak some French, but otherwise I would have not gotten any help. Also, this place DOES NOT accept card. Only a small sign in French denotes that on the register. I‚Äôd stay away, and just go to another place.\n\nEdit: I‚Äôd like to add that the crepes themselves were really good. They were cooked perfectly and tasted amazing. The lack of willingness to help non-French speakers and not accepting credit card left a bad impression. While yes I do understand English is not an official language here, we are in a city that attracts a high amount of tourism. You‚Äôd think the owner would want to serve all crowds, rather than just the local ones.', 'Although unprepossessing from the outside, this is a lovely neighborhood standby with delicious galettes and cr√™pes alike. (Practical notes: cash only; French only.)', 'Good place to eat, crepes are delicious, would reccomend.']

['Very quaint and homey place. Tiny and cozy. The owner was super friendly. The food was great! Not sure it‚Äôs entirely authentic but it was good. The steamed Vietnamese raviolis was awesome! Their banana sago was also a pleasant surprise. Warm and sweet, perfect for a cold day.', 'Friendly welcome even close to 10pm closing time. Tasted shrimp Pad Thai.', 'So glad we stumbled upon this restaurant at the recommendation of our hotel. Great food at affordable prices. We especially liked the roasted pork and the beef loclac. Accommodating and friendly staff as well.', 'The food is always very good, at a great price! The owner is also super kind and always with a smile. One of my favorite places in the 5th :)', 'Good service but sorry, food is awful.
Not authentic at all and not professional chef.
Not even homemade quality.
Too much MSG (glutamate)
Not recommended at all.']

Adresse: 75013, 159 Rue du Ch√¢teau des Rentiers, 75013 Paris, France
Reviews:
["Mer de Chine Delights with Authentic Flavors

Mer de Chine is unique in its commitment to authentic Chinese cuisine. Every dish I tried was a delicacy that showcased superb cooking techniques and the highest quality ingredients. The cuisine here incorporates the flavors of many Chinese regional specialties, and I especially love their delicious seafood dishes.

In addition, their service is excellent and considerate, and you can really enjoy a warm and inviting atmosphere. Their prices are also reasonable, especially for a restaurant that offers Michelin-level quality.

I can't wait to explore more of its menu on my next visit!", 'Food is amazing, really tasty. Really recommend.', 'I had an amazing dinner with my friends. This was my first time to eat here and taste such a wonderful cocktail made from baijiu, ginger beer and lime juice. They offered excellent service and I could definitely say that they deserve recommendations to every friend who wanna to try the traditional Chinese dish. Besides, they are always on the way of creation and never stop cooking the best.', "Great restaurant!!!!! I love the atmosphere and the kind service here. The dishes are authentic and very delicious, yeah I'm foodieüòâ. For a Michelin level address in Paris, the price is really friendly. Can't wait to come for other top Chinese food!!!", 'Authentic and scrumptious food! The owner is very kind and offers great service as well. Will definitely come back again!']

['As soon as I touched down in Paris, this was my first culinary stop‚Äîand what an extraordinary choice it turned out to be. The lady who served me was the embodiment of grace and warmth, making me feel instantly at ease. I opted for a vegetarian sandwich and an √©clair, and with each bite, I felt as if I were savoring a masterpiece crafted by culinary artists. The flavors were so exquisite that they seemed to whisper the very essence of Parisian charm.

It‚Äôs no wonder Paris holds its reputation as the pinnacle of pastry perfection. From the very first taste, my visit to the city began not just on a high note but at a breathtaking summit. A heartfelt thank you to this remarkable gem for turning my first meal in Paris into an unforgettable memory.', 'I stepped by this bakery in the morning, and I took a sandwich. It was very good, the baguette was still warm and crispy.', "Prices are pretty high but it's a cute spot in a good location with friendly workers... I got a baguette paysanne ‚Ç¨1.20 and a kouing amman ‚Ç¨1.50 they were both very good. Nothing mind-blowing but great flavors and texture.

The had a nice choice of baguettes: Baguette paysanne ‚Ç¨1.20
Baguette r√©tro ‚Ç¨1.20
Pain Paysanne ‚Ç¨2.40

The r√©tro looked a bit more shiny and was not dusted with flour, the paysanne was dusted with flour for a more rustic appearance and the pain is bigger, probably 400g.

Baguette paysanne had the classic crunch and chew you look for in a baguette, the flavor was perfect and pure, it's a great example of a French baguette but nothing inventive or distinguished.

The kouing Amman is a great croissant-style pastry but baked with honey for a crunchier and sweeter mouth feel, similar to a classic palmier but thicker and chewier. Great flavor, love the way the layers fall apart and rip in your mouth. Great flavor so I can assume quality ingredients. I toasted mine and ripped it apart a bit to enhance texture.", "I got a croissant and took it home....
For my happiness I got an extra of protein aka A MOSQUITO I did not pay for it so  thanks for the service...

I will not say it was the worst croissant I ate, but the mosquito definitely shocked me and ruined it. Just be more careful, accidents happen...

Don't put extras if the client doesn't want ", "Staff wasn't very friendly and the croissants were mediocre. However, their pear pistachio tarte is to die for. So delicious and not too sweet. Would come here again just to order that."]

['Very patient while we fumbled with our French and helped us find a hazelnut dark chocolate that was delicious', 'Great chocolate! We tried different pieces and they were all good. My favorite was actually a Peruvian Chocolate Bar.', 'Great staff, really nice and helpful. Good diversity of products and great quality.', 'Really good chocolate and excellent value for money for a Paris chocolatier.', "the place to go for Valentine's day"]

["I write this review while still at the restaurant with the madame who served me stands there glaring. To whomever you may be, I'm not exactly sure what it was I did that wronged you so much. I do apologize for not speaking French well at all, but I just wanted a lovely meal, and was looking for a quiet evening as I am a solo diner.

I'm about to leave this restaurant with this intense sense of sadness. I've left restaurants mad before due to poor attitudes from staff and owner, but never sadness. You made me feel worthless, like a lesser human being. I can only imagine your views on immigrants.

Food was bland, and not made well, tho looking around I suspect that was on purpose, as the same dish on the table next to me look superb, whilst mine looked quite bleak.

Overall just a really sad experience. I am so sorry dear for whatever it is that sours people to you.

If you want bleak sadness for dinner I guess I highly recommend.", 'Owner very nice. Excellent couscous.', 'Best couscous of Paris. Ever!', 'Super  restaurant  excellent', 'Excellent']

['Came for breakfast, really good. Highly recommend', "Very good food, value for your money/quality/quantity. Normal prices. It's the place where the local people have dinner, drinks and have fun. Like it! Nice suburb for a walk-away from the crowdy touristic places in Paris.", 'The steak was awful and the pasta too.\nThe waitress took the wrong order and blamed us instead of taking responsibility of her fault.', 'One of the best bars in Paris! Amazing costumer service and good drinks & food!', 'Excellent beef carpaccio and desserts, also a good place to get escargot if you are a tourist looking to try it out.']

['Friendly staff, very fast service. The food is super good and fresh. My favorite is M22 :)', 'Great and fase service, delicious food! The menus come along soup and salad, both great! Our order was tasteful and well prepared. My sister and I enjoyed a lot!', "It's very delicious, better than any normal sushi restaurant in Paris that we have been try!!! The price is affordable, the service is great. If you wanna enjoy great sushi with an affordable price you should definitely come here i promise you will not be disappointed. You should try all the specialties of the restaurant, it worth.", "Great Japanese restaurant. Big portions, delicious food and fair price. The waiters seem friendly, although they don't seem to know much English. But that's not a big thing. Recommended.", 'They have the best sushi üç£ in this region. The chef is very attentive to details. Kind and attentive service staff. We always enjoyed the sushi once we were around this part of Paris.']

['Very clean ,good food didn‚Äôt get 5 stars just for the limited offer ,but should be more than enough for the majority.', 'Very nice atmosphere, friendly staff and cool cooking tutorials playing in the background (I love tastelife tv). Good portion size and good prices. 10/10 would visit again!', "The worst asian experience in my life. Both in theory different soups tasted the same. Sweet as syrup. My main dish red beef curry was same as soup but with goey meet without any spices apart of this bloody sugar.  My boyfriend took some beef on stick what also was horrible dry as desert. My rice was served in a PLASTIC BAG. Everything was horrible and we didn't finish anything.  No point to explain because woman didn't speak English. We paid for this unpleasant experience 52 Euros. Disaster.", "Fast service, affordable prices, good food (and a very wide menu) were all pluses. Also, there's a stash of kids' toys in the corner that were very helpful in keeping the little ones content during our meal at the end of a long day.", "We LOVED Siam Orchid! The food was great, the service very friendly and efficient, and the atmosphere was spacious and elegant. We'll definitely come back!"]

['Sunday opening time is 9, I arrived now at 9:15 - it‚Äôs closed and no one is replying‚Ä¶ waste of time.', 'Expensive but in case of emergency you can find some foods and other stuff', 'Price is a lil high than expected..', 'Clean, organized and efficient', 'Good service']

['Looks like a random neighbourhood bistro, but the cooking is really excellent, and yes, the atmosphere is genuinely friendly.', 'The owner here was such a sweetheart! Smiles all around despite the language barrier. We enjoyed coffee with a delicious croissant and some orange juice.', 'One star because I can‚Äôt give zero stars.\nProbably an ok place to get a cup of coffe or a beer but the food is absolutely terrible and it made me sick. I was served the most disgusting meal I have ever had in my life. The meat was spoiled, it had probably been cooked the day before and I guess that is what made me ill. The wine and even the penne was not fresh and had been reheated. The man in the bar was acting condescendingly when we said we didn‚Äôt like the food. Horrible place to eat.', "Jouseph, the owner will make you feel like family. He's generous and kind to every one who visits. Yummy food! And a generous host- it doesn't get better.", "I wouldn't recommend this place for the food, but I would highly recommend it for a place to grab a few drinks and to mix it up with its friendly patrons and excellent staff."]

['This is by far my favourite Chinese restaurant in Paris. It‚Äôs always a pleasure to come back here. Their riz du chef and poulet kung pao are just amazing, and the service is always great. I definitely recommend.', 'It‚Äôs my second time to repurchase with my families and friends.  Super delicious foods especially xiaolongbao, chicken and beef.   The services are super well as well.  I will definitely recommend this wonderful Chinese restaurant!!!', 'Love the shredded potato and the pork (with galic and spicy sauce). We asked for extra spicy level and the dishes are so good. Finished them both with two bowls of rice.', 'I‚Äôve been eating almost every evening at this restaurant in the last two weeks. Amazing how you don‚Äôt get tired of it! Honestly a top Chinese restaurant in the 13th arrondissement in Paris. The dishes are authentic and sometimes remind me of my hometown. I highly recommend the Ëæ£Â≠êÈ∏° (poulet √©pic√©) and Âú∞‰∏âÈ≤ú(Di Sanxian), and Â∞èÁ¨ºÂåÖ (Xiaolongbao fait √† la main) is also great.', 'We discovered this little Chinese restaurant with friends after gym - I loved especially the Xiaolong Baos (Shanghai style) and the crispy duck. :) will come back again.']

['Although larger than other Monoprix in the area, the store lacks a lot of choice, both for fresh produce and other groceries. Prices for the fresh produce as really high, which is a big turnoff.', "Service good and you'll find everything you need including fresh fruits and veggies.", 'Friendly and helpful in multiple languages. Fair price. Fresh fruits.', 'Good for any last minute groceries. Have the basics at a good price.', 'This place makes you weigh your own fruit and vegetables. Very strange.']

['This theater is so clean and comfortable. It‚Äôs in a nice area of town, and, after traveling for 3 weeks in Europe, I just wanted a place that felt clean, safe, and comfortable to chill out and enjoy a movie (Aladdin). This is was it. The seats don‚Äôt look very comfortable in others‚Äô photos but they feel great. The lobby is so cool too.', 'The elevated and posh experience is really fantastic. I loved the two seat booths in the cinema, and the bar wine and beer was a lovely way to watch a film.', 'Friendly staff, lovely open wood design full of light with a wonderful lounge area in addition to the foyer waiting area, which regularly shows old classics in addition to the latest films', "My favorite Path√© cinema in Paris. The only Path√© cinema which screens the bleed of new movies and cult classic movies. The atmosphere is calm and the infrastructure with glass and wood was amazing. In this cinema I feel like home because it's so familiar and the staff are so kind.", 'Very clean and nice, the service is good too. The screen itself is also fine, but the cinema room is not so big. Cute and cozy place !']

["One of the worst subways and not only in Paris, but everywhere!
The bread was so stale that it started falling apart when the employee touched it. The portion is fraudulently small. I wonder if they are even allowed to give such small portions! The lettuce had a lot of brown pieces in it. Green pepper was so old it was like plastic.
I hope they do something serious about it but again, it's subway...", 'Guys you have working time until 7 am, then i am coming you close, sort this', 'Very unfriendly staff and they don‚Äôt speak English üëéüèª', 'I‚Äôve been to many Subway‚Äôs but this one is by far the most iconic for one simple reason: Icham
This guy has some amazing advices sandwich wise, and no matter the hour Of the day, from Monday 1pm to Sunday 5am, he will always receive you with the greatest smile and savoir faire
Can‚Äôt recommend this place enough', 'Very friendly staff, you can‚Äôt go wrong with Subway!']

["Excellent place with great products. All the required groceries at a very good price and also you can buy coffee from here.
I liked the location. It is nearby to many restaurants and fast food places. The staff is very good and supportive.
Also we went there and didn't know french so the staff helped us convert french into English.
Excellent experience. Super Recommended.", 'A good alternative to Carrefour, but more gluten/dairy free products would be better.', 'Medium size store on Av de Gobelins but a very good selection of products for everyday living.', 'Assortment is nice, size is medium, staff is a bit below average due to rudeness but welcome to france (. -1 for rude staff)', "This was a nice small grocery near our hotel. The only drawback was it's limited selection."]

['Beautiful place with comfy chairs and very nice view. Food is delicious, buns are soft and warm, ingredients fresh. Lady running this place is so nice
Overall great experience', 'super friendly staff, light fluffy donut, and a huge selection greet you as you walk through the door ‚Äî this is a exactly what I was looking for, and I‚Äôm going to be be back (often)

you order at the vendor machine and collect at the counter ‚Äî it‚Äôs not a complex system at all

there‚Äôs also a fridge FULL of ice cream', 'We were a bit worried when we ordered, as the interior of the cafe is not amazing, but the bagels we had were an 11/10, just fantastic üëå', 'This place is awesome!! I love the food. This is my 4th day in a row ordering from here.The staff is so nice. Although the worker does not speak english. She tried her best to understand me. She always smiles üòÉ.  Which makes me feel comfortable as a foreigner.', 'I tried the salmon donuts. It was nice to try with a cheap price.']

['Went last Saturday and service was super slow, took forever to get the food and it was not very crowded. The dish with soup, white rice, and beef was tasty. Good sake by the glass.', 'The place is incredible, the dishes are very good and the service inside is very warm. Its an exelent place to go out with friends or family', 'Slightly expensive but the food is good and you\nGet a free drink with take away', 'Everything was great! Nice atmosphere, friendly staff and delicious food! The prices are also very affordable and portion sizes are quite satisfying. Would visit again!', 'Do not recommend\nFood is like it was prepared yesterday and given to you today. Not fresh rice. scary to even try eating']

['Best Tom Yum soup I‚Äôve tasted probably since Thailand! We have lots of good Thai food at home in Vancouver Canada but this put me in Tom Yum heaven! We also had green curry with beef and a stir fried vegetable (on Choi) everything was just the right balance of spice tang saltiness fresh herbs ingredients etc etc   We happened to come here because our AirBnB is just around the corner.  What a surprising awesome find!', "We have been craving northern Thai food and found this little treasure in the 13arr. We're so glad to have had dined here! The raw shrimps are just the same as what you'd expect locally in Thailand. Pak see ew was on point as well. Highly recommend!", 'Really authentic thai restaurant!! The staff is friendly and he explains well all the dishes and how to make it!! Definitely come back. Highly recommended!!', "My favorite restaurant in Paris, serving authentic Thai food! Attentive and polite staff. We'll definitely visit again.\n‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê", 'While visiting Paris for my 50th birthday, my daughter and I stopped in for a meal here. We both ordered the shrimp pad thai which was absolutely delectable. And the hospitality was on point. Thanks for the great service and food.']

['Old-school hamburger with a French twist (cheese, mustard, etc...) really well cooked.
The bun is soft and the flavor of the meat and toppings are rich.
My wife's Thai "tartare" was also excellent, plentiful and well seasoned. The service is friendly and nice.', 'Everything was delicious. Highly recommend egg mayonnaise and goat cheese salad as starter, followed by steak tartar and a hamburger.

Better to make a reservation, because it was full when we arrived and the owner was kind enough to helping us find a table outside.', 'The Cheddar Burger is next level, clocked medium rare just perfect! We tried also the Hungarian Tartar and was delicious, people and atmosphere are super nice! 5*', "Stumbled on this place by accident on the Internet.  I nooked it as was more towards East of city so great place to stop if going in city from Disney.  Its kinda out of town, and we parked nearby. I was a little nervous that we would be the only people on a Tuesday evening, but when I got in there, it was fully booked.
It's super casual but awesome food. My wife and I shared a burger and a salmon tarta, and kids had burgers. The cheff clearly had a love for cheese, and developing tastes at the food was fantastic.  If you want fine dining, this is not for you, but great burgers and food in a casual atmosphere is for you.  The staff are super cool and speak English.  Book, and loads of nearby parking...
My photos are rubbish, but the ones on their website are a true reflection", 'My absolute favorite tartare place in Paris! Went there twice in June 2024. Had different tartare creations. Both were really nice. The meat was so fresh. Would keep coming back every time I visit Paris. The service was great. The staff were cool.']

["I just had to pay more than 15,50‚Ç¨ for ONE BOX OF CEREAL and TWO LITTLE BOTTLES OF SAUCE!!! This is so incredible that it might almost be funny, if I wasn't very angry. The prices you pay do NOT correspond to the prices on the tags. This is pure robbery.", 'Nice little supermarket at the rue Broca,it  could be better designed,the self check outs not working. Expensive.', 'It literally has everything, very nice supermarket with a wide selection. Avoid going just before curfew cause it has huge lines.', 'Good and lovely stuff and reasonable price', 'I went to the store on 11/12 at 7:30 p.m. It was really great, and the cashier was magnificent and very pleasant. She was alone, but she managed all the cash registers efficiently. Congratulations for his excellent work']

Adresse: 27 Rue de la Reine Blanche, 75013 Paris, France
Reviews: ["Excellent place to stay for a dinner! The food is fresh and well prepared, the portions are huge, the service is home like, the prices are democratic. This place left a very pleasant aftertaste, as if I've visited my beloved granny. I was treated as a special guest. Thank you!", "Stumbled upon this charming Korean and Vietnamese restaurant near our hotel, Ai-Hua, and it did not disappoint! The staff is incredibly friendly, the prices are reasonable, and most importantly, the food is fantastic. Highly recommend checking it out if you're in the area for a delicious and affordable Korean or Vietnamese meal.", "The beef bibimpap was delicious and perfectly spiced. A great portion for two people if you'll also buy an appetizer. The gy≈çza was disappointing as it arrived in my home delivery order a bit under cooked. I took matters in my own hand and refried it as I like my food well cooked and warm. That lost this restaurant a point but otherwise, delicious.", "Super affordable price, made quickly and tastes delicious! Enjoyed my meal very much, it was so nice and comforting. The soup was tasty, the Korean ginger tea with honey had a nice zing as well as sweetness and the Korean pork was spicy and went super well with the rice. I'm looking forward to coming back on my next trip üòä", 'Tasty dishes at very modest prices and warm welcome. Family friendly too! The owner was very kind to our curious and energetic 15 month old daughter, which put us at great ease. Suggestion: if you order bibimbap, specify if you want your egg raw or cooked.']

['Me and my partner went in for a lunch. The chef(the owner?) was very hospitable even tho he was super busy doing everything on his own, welcoming, cooking, serving and entertaining us and other 3 more tables at the time. He took the time to explain the menus in English as our french is really bad. Good portion size and reasonable price. All dishes we had were so good. I had a scallop carpaccio, which was well seasoned and tasty and a lovely fillet steak which was the best and the most succulent steak I have ever had in Paris. It was shame that we didn‚Äôt have time to try the desserts, looked so delicious.
I will definitely visit next time go to Paris. Highly recommended', 'We stopped here for only cappuccinos, but the place is very nice, good position and the waiter was very friendly (unfortunately, a rare encounter in Paris).

The cappuccinos were not the best, out of the 4 people we were at the table, 2 cappuccinos had nice milk foam, other 2 not :)

The food looked and smelled amazing, we didn‚Äôt try it, just saw to those around us.', 'We had an absolutely lovely evening. My mom celebrated her birthday and the very nice waiter surprised the whole group with free champagne! The food was very (!) delicious. Compliments for the chef. All together we had a great evening due to the lovely waiter who really interacted with us but was never too much, and due to the great chef. Thanks a lot. And will highly  recommend this place to others.', 'Such a perfect supper. The host and staff were incredible, food was delicious (we had the steak frites and cheese for pudding).

Red wine was great, lovely atmosphere - could not recommend more!', 'After a bad customer service experience from another restaurant routed for this restaurant. They really made my day. Food and Service was really great. Atmosphere there is also very cosy. Really loved it']

['Quaint restaurant and bar. Fantastic atmosphere and very attentive staff. We never wanted for anything. We ordered mixed drinks to start, perfectly balanced. The food was quick and cooked exactly as requested. We ended with coffee and desert, our daughter loves tiramasu and she commented that it was the best in Paris. A+', 'Amazing!! Service was great! Food was good, Tiramisu was AMAZING!!\nThe restaurant was very cute with a sunroom in the front. Not busy at all, and food came quick. Owner was very kind and was very quick to respond to any need. Loved it!', 'A darling little restaurant with a charming atmosphere.  I had a delicious Espresso Martini and my Caesar salad was very tasty. The Tiramisu was very good along with the coffee.  I am from the states, but hope to get back there again before I leave.  The service was friendly, welcoming and very attentive.   Great experience!!!', 'Nice French bistro, good service and normal prices.', 'The patron was very friendly and extremely busy! He was kind to my grandchildren and they had a good introduction to Paris in a relaxed atmosphere. The meal, though a little restricted in choice, was well prepared and my beef carpaccio delicious. The desserts - cr√®me brul√©e and chocolate mousse, were excellent. A lovely birthday supper.']

["After having a starter, main, and dessert, I can confidently say this is the BEST Vietnamese culinary experience I've had in Paris.
The service was excellent and efficient. üíñ
I loved everything, and I'm excited to try other dishes and desserts.
It is a fantastic place that I recommend üíØ", "Absolutely fabulous! Were very accommodating despite my inability to speak French (they do speak English, if that is of relevance to you.)
I got the sample appetizers (photo taken halfway through eating) and Gourmand as I was indecisive. They were both delicious! Once I finished I just went up to the counter and paid by card.
I got there right around evening opening on a weekday and was the first one there. They were around 2/3 full by 8pm.
Even though it's a bit far, a great option if you want to see the Eiffel Tower at night since the 6 metro train runs 4 mins from the restaurant to the Trocad√©ro Gardens (the 6 also offers some nice views of the city at night as well).", 'Very good and authentic Vietnamese experience. Went there with a few colleagues who were already raving about the place. Photos include the sampler starter, and various main dishes. They served us with a smile. The place is usually packed, which says a lot about the quality. Thank you!', 'Great for a quick delicious Vietnamese lunch or dinner. Good fresh spring rolls. Vegetarian options available.', 'The most incredible, freshest Vietnamese food in a beautiful setting. Absolutely authentic, melt-in-your-mouth and perfectly seasoned. Modern, nice decor, laid back, amazing service.']

['Good food and beer for a good price. Friendly and efficient service.', 'Great value beers and friendly service. Nice spot to relax and people watch. Hard to find better value in Paris.', 'Very nice services. We had a drink and a cheese plate. The cheese was very good. The bread could have been a bit more fresh. But nice place to hang out.', 'Food was good and served quickly. The staff were friendly, attentive and could speak good English. Overall a good atmosphere inside. Loved it and would definitely visit again.', 'It would be 0 stars if that was possible. My partner and I ordered the most disgusting ‚Ç¨7 Chardonnay and the staff had us pay ‚Ç¨20. Avoid at all costs']

Adresse: 7 Port de la Gare, 75013 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Felt like a laid-back venue, which is great. Not too big (but enough space), cozy, great sound. Enough space to dance. Overall enjoyed it and would come back.', "We went there because there were vegan options so thank you!! It's hard to find in France alas. The place was really cool, very relaxing, by the Seine river. The food was amazing and varied. The prices were fair. What else could you ask for? Amazing waiters too! Quick service!", "This is a wonderful venue. Perfect size to see bands from up close and still be able to move around safely. Staff is friendly and there's a heartwarming feel of inclusivity emanating from the place.
Sound quality and lighting are top notch as well.

If there were any downsides, I'd name the lack of shelter if you're queuing up to enter on a rainy day, the relatively small checkroom counter which means you may spend quite some time dropping your stuff or getting it back, and the very dimly lit washrooms :)
Overall highly recommended!", 'Went down early for a sold out show and was given the heads up that a few more tickets were going to be released.', 'I WAS PHYSICALLY ATTACKED BY THE BODYGUARDS

After denying us to enter, I have been physically attacked.

During these terrific minutes, the only thing that made me and my friend feel safe was recording us. The bodyguards for some reasons decided to take away even this illusion of safeness and throw my phone on the floor.

They first sprayed in my eyes a pepper spray that made my eyes burn. And then they struggled me by the neck, bringing me close to the point of suffocation.
In the attached confused video unfortunately you can see only for a few frames what was going on. I was being suffocated by one of the bodyguards while the others where trying to put themselves in between the camera and me. Before letting me breath, I had to hit the ground with my hands 3 times, to declare my KO. All this, happened after they sprayed me in the eyes. I couldn‚Äôt see anything, only hear the feared screams of my girlfriend.  After this, my friends started asking for some water to put in my eyes, the bodyguards not only didn‚Äôt give it to me, making my pain continue, but started drinking in front of me.

Was not human, was cruel.
Naturally, not me or any of my friends entered in the club. The ambulance arrived, and medicated me.

Please avoid this place, and be aware.']

["This is my favorite place in this area of the 13th, near Tolbiac-Patay. It has everything: a fantastic happy hour, delicious food, kind service and a warm and convivial atmosphere.

If you're coming for lunch, you'll be joined by what seems like half the neighborhood. Reservations are recommended but I'm not sure how to make them except by  phone. We were lucky enough to arrive early enough to still score a seat without a reservation but don't count on it. The same advice applies if you're coming for dinner.

The lunch menu is always on point. Their dinner menu is great as well. Every meal I've had here has been delicious.

If you're in the neighborhood, go to Le Limousin. It's the perfect spot to spend an hour or so and have a wonderful meal.", 'Excellent value for money - the place is quite small and there is a lot of people compressed within this limited space but apart from that the food was delicious and the service really great.', 'Le Limousin is the best restaurant I‚Äôve eaten at in Paris! My husband and I dined there this afternoon and loved it so much. To start, the entire staff is extremely friendly. I ordered the Burger Classic and to say it was incredibly delicious would be an understatement. I absolutely loved it!! It was a far better burger than I can get in my city in NC. The prices were also so reasonable, I was surprised at how inexpensive the bill was! I am thrilled to bits with the entire experience and am trying to find a way to come back over to this spot before I leave Paris! 10/10 would absolutely without a doubt recommend.', 'Get a burger here. Stop reading other reviews or wondering what to get, go here. Get a burger. Be happy ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
As an American, the burger here is better than most any of them back home. The staff from front of house to back of the kitchen looks to be one family and they‚Äôre the best!!! We positively loved our lunch break here. We may even go again before we leave!', 'A hidden GEM, reasonably priced. The food and service exceeded my expectations! Even though I am a non French speaker, the staff did not hesitate to communicate with me, trying their best to make sure I was enjoying the meal.

Randomly found it in Google Map (with good reviews) on the last day of my Paris business trip, I could have come more often if I found it sooner. Highly recommend, I will certainly come again on my next trip.']

['Fantastic food, friendly and amazing service! 5* highly recommend', "Delicious entrecote, fresh fries and salad, flavorful sauce! It's a cozy place in a good location. The staff is attentive and professional. We visited 2 times, and we'll definitely come back.", 'NOPE: never again. ‚Ç¨5.50 for a diluted coffee. The whole place is very noisy, right next to the train tracks. While it is across the river. You could actually find more restaurants and cafes at the river side across the street.', "Nice place to eat around the clock!

So apparently the place opens quite long every day. We came around 11pm and they were still serving warm foods. The prices were nice, I could even say it was cheap for Paris. They also have some wine options but were not that much, and variety.

I ordered the Steak (8/10), it was maybe around 220g of meat served with some salad and fries, it was good, I ordered medium and they came also in medium so it was nice.
my friend ordered a chicken tandoori (7,5/10) they should've just change the name into something else, bc the Indian taste in that food was quite gone haha. But I mean it wasn't that bad, it was just when u read a name and it didn't turn out like what u expected, its bit disappointing. Well anyway.

I drank Sauvignon Blanc from some winery it wasn't taste good, maybe I use to good wines from Germany:D

I loved their Tiramisu though. It was huge, without alcohol (which I found better than with), lot of Mascarpone instead of the biscuits, it was just the way I liked it, so yummy!

If u look for some affordable, nice, and open around the clock- place to eat, then come here, its located also next to a metro station, so u won't have difficulty to find it.", 'Great place to go for a drink. The waiters were absolutely accommodating and efficient. Very lovely. The place could do with more vegan options though. Prices were fair for the capital. Very easy to reach by metro and all.']

['I recently went to this restaurant and I would like to say that I loved the food over there and also the atmosphere was good. Most importantly the service I really appreciate the service of Janushkanth who served us. He was very pleasant, polite and kind. We will surely come back again.', "It's such a student vibe! I went to this place with a friend and everything was student friendly.

The drinks are good, the music are mostly English and the prices are also pretty affordable. Highly recommend!", 'We came here for our final dinner in Paris. I had a team of 15 with me and they were super accommodating. Also had the best shot of my life here!!', 'Loved this place !! The food is amazing and the atmosphere is adorable ! I highly recommend !', 'The Frog & British Library has been my sanctuary in Paris for over two years, offering a perfect blend of ambiance, comfort, and inspiration. Nestled in a charming part of the city, this spot is more than just a pub; it‚Äôs a place where creativity flows freely.

I‚Äôve spent countless hours here, penning an entire memoir from the cozy corners of this establishment. The friendly and welcoming staff, combined with the relaxed yet vibrant atmosphere, make it an ideal place to work, relax, or simply enjoy a pint. Whether you‚Äôre a writer seeking inspiration, a traveler looking for a friendly face, or someone who appreciates good food and drink, this is the place to be.

The Frog & British Library is not just a pub‚Äîit‚Äôs a haven for creativity and connection. Highly recommended for anyone visiting or living in Paris.']

Adresse: 5 Port de la Gare, 75013 Paris, France
Reviews:
["had an amazing dining experience at this restaurant! The food was absolutely delicious; it felt like I hadn't truly tasted good food until now. The cozy atmosphere inside made it even more special, especially with the live band playing on the nearby ship, adding a charming touch to the evening

The service was outstanding‚Äîour waitress was an incredible person who went above and beyond. Since there wasn't an English menu available, she patiently translated the entire menu for me, which I really appreciated ‚ù§Ô∏è

Overall, I thoroughly enjoyed my time here and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for great food and a warm ambiance!", 'A good quick bite on the seine wharf. Pizzas were generous, the waiters polite and friendly. A bit too crowded for lunch break but nonetheless good üëç.', 'Welcoming and absolutely worth returning to. Me and my friends could unfortunately only stop here for a quick pizza during our 2-hour bus-stop. I wish we could have stayed longer, because the time we had was amazing! Lovely service, great pizzas, and very nice ambiance. Would definitely recommend :). Merci!', "Pizza with salmon was amazing. Never seen such amount of salmon and spinach on pizza. Very tasty. Bit Napoli style. Love it. Personnel very nice. Fantastic atmposphere. Prices reasonable.  Only smally issue are lack of toilets - there is a 'thing' close to the place - mobile toilets. Anyway, worth to visit, a tasty!", 'Nice junk boat experience with international food and drinks. There is some live concert on the ground floor and a restaurant below. Quality of the food was pretty good and the staff was very friendly!']

Adresse: Cit√© de la Mode et du Design, 34 Quai d'Austerlitz, 75013 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Came for Back to Basics night. It was karaoke before 9pm then a mix of Afrobeats and American throwbacks. There are tables if you prefer to sit or a dance floor. Food until about 10pm too. Good DJ and vibes', "Great atmosphere, great vibes. Spread over a huge rooftop overlooking the river.
Great to hang out with friends or family or even for a after-work!
By 11, it turns to a night club, so whatever you want, it's here!", 'Great place. No reservation needed (you can if you are a big group). Easily accessible and secure since they have a lot of friendly bouncers. Staff is professional and they make their best to let you enjoy. It‚Äôs a big terrace with a view on the seine river (you get to choose your table) also their indoor place is cozy. Music is great nothing to say about it. Prices are fine (average drink will be 11 EUR)
Good address to enjoy with friends or even colleagues.', "Great place to visit if you're a group. No reservations and you get to have a nice view as well. Gets a bit chilly though at night. Prices are okay and it's assurety of a great time always", 'I had a company event here and it was great due to the people and the music. However, food could have been better - it tasted more like frozen food heated in the microwave. Drinks were fine as fas as it goes. Overall, good spot for events!']

["The food is super good, it feels fresh. The pok√© bowl saumon spicy it's really good, super vast! The service was really kind and the environment is calm, perfect to have a quite dinner with friends or your couple.", 'The food was very good and the service is great. People are welcoming and nice.', 'Very good food, great quality and the people are warm and welcoming, I will come back!', 'Excellent little restaurant with delicious food and super service by Delphine!', 'Maki Sushi Tokyo is my favorite Japanese restaurant in paris! The food is extremely authentic and well prepared! The ambiance inside the restaurant is welcoming and friendly and relaxed. The owners are very sweet and helpful- and professional! The pricing is perfectly reasonable. There is a wide variety of Japanese food available and there is something for everyone! As an extremely picky eater myself, i‚Äôve found many meals that are delicious at this restaurant! There are so many options depending on if you want to eat healthy, hearty, vegetarian, pescatarian, meat, light, or heavy! The restaurant is pristine and very clean. I could eat their cabbage salad for every meal for the rest of my life!!']

["Never order anything from this place.
You'll get your a freezing cold pizza 2 hours later.
The staff is ultra unfriendly on the phone.
The delivery never take less than 1h30.
All of the three deliveries I made were either missing items or with the wrong items.
The pizza are generally good but he quality varies wildly.
You'll sometimes get tasteless canned mushrooms and burnt to crisp pizza...", 'It was a nice and small place to grab a pizza,', 'My husband and I were visiting Paris and he was craving for stuffed crust pizza from pizza hut. We were happy to find a very nice and beautiful lady that spoke English, who was very nice to us. She was the only positive experience  in this place. After waiting for a long time, we got our two "stuffed crust" pizza and went back to our hotel.  After we had our first bites, we couldn't find not even a microscopic piece of cheese inside the crust.. very disappointed!!! No cheese in our "cheesy crust" (as they publise it). Never again!!!', 'We ordered a simple pizza on the web site of the shop, but that pizza never arrived. I also went by person to the shop and they assured that the pizza was going to be prepared and delivered. This didn‚Äôt happened. I would not suggest this shop neither to my worst enemy.', 'Friendly staff at the front desk']

['For a restaurant at the headquarters of the catering company, it can be said that there is work.\nTo believe that they are offering the exact counter-example of what they are selling.\nBut the staff is not to blame because working in difficult conditions and with such little budget for raw materials, no one can save this restaurant.', 'Very fair price and cooked food I recommend', 'A classic administrative site', '', '']

Adresse: Port de la Rap√©e, 75012 Paris, France
Reviews:
['The bar was spacious and nice. The bathroom however was not the best, a bit dirty and portable. Also, the bartender was really rude when i asked if she could make me a mojito. I understand if you dont have cocktails and only beer and wine, but no need to be rude about it. Well, besides that the music and the place is great. Its a place to be in summer. Just not with mojitos lol', 'This is NOT a restaurant that can host dinners in winter time. We were a group of 14 people.
It was freezing and they were not prepared with any proper heat system.
The service took long time despite of the restaurant being almost empty.
We had a menu booked and we couldn¬¥t finish the dessert neither asked for coffees that were included as we just wanted to leave. More than cold.', 'Beautiful cruise ambience resting on the Seine, specially at night when the lights create magic. Has a spacious dance floor  for the noisy and an external sitting space for those who need quiet space. Drinks are a bit over priced but then the ambience is great.', "Actually such a good place to go for drinks with friends and dance a bit. The atmosphere is quite good. But thats everything you've got.

The bouncer does not let you in that quick before 9PM since there's a fee entrance from 9. That's not serious. The waiters are so bad that are far from being professional. Besides prices are so expensive. Had a few bottles of Chardonnay (rater 2.2 out of 5 on wine apps) for 40 euros each. That's such a disgrace.", 'I'm only giving two stars because the music is not bad in this place. However, I didn't like how expensive a bottle of unrefrigerated Hoegaarden is in this place. If you're going to charge 8‚Ç¨ for a regular supermarket beer, at least serve it cold to customers to justify the markup. Also, you have to buy "vouchers" to claim the drinks before you can get in and paying by card requires a minimum purchase of 15‚Ç¨. So yeah, don't forget to bring cash if you're not up to paying for several overpriced drinks just to be able to use your bank card.

The neighboring bars are absolutely better in terms of vibe and prices.']

["Great food, reasonable prices. The waiter switched on the tv loud as he likes football at the middle of our Valentine's dinner so we left.", "I eat here often as it's very close to my place. The pizzas are quite good but a bit expensive. There are places nearby that give about the same quality of pizzas at much lower rates.
Also, there aren't many options available for a vegetarian.", 'Good food for the price but TERRIBLE SERVICE. We asked the waiter for some bread and instead of going to the kitchen for fresh bread, he just took the uneaten bread basket that was sitting on the table next to us... For me this is unacceptable! But still our pizza and pasta were good for the price!', 'I work in this neighborhood and went to this place for lunch once for a pizza. All I can say is that the pizzas are definitely not made in house. They are presumably either frozen or premade in a factory, which is becoming more and more common for restaurants in France. Though the food was not disgusting, it was not good either.', "If in Paris take a moment a come here.  Come and have some wine, try one on the many fine and delicious small plates.
I loved the Croquette de pied de cochon.
Don't be afraid of the communal bread and butter."]

Adresse: 13 Port de la Rap√©e, 75012 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Awful place, bartender scammed me for 50 euros.', "Nice atmosphere on a boat with lights. The food was terrible and the drinks prices were very high. I don't recommend coming here for food and drinks. Also, considering Google says it's a night club, the music choice was terrible and there was no dancing or anything. All in all, just go somewhere else on the Seine.", "Place is good but one star is because of organizer who organized Bollywood party they only play Bollywood songs if that songs are suggested by girls, boys suggestions are not considered by them soooo waste of money plus they charge 20 euro for entry fees it's not worth it better to go somewhere else üçªüçªüçª", 'I have came with clients it was a shame for me as a parisian. Service was not managed an entrecote was ordered three times but the order never arrived to the kitchen. Red wine was way too hot for service. This restaurant is not properly managed by the owner, and it was totally understaffed.', "The upperdeck is quite small but the dance floor is great. Don't forget to come early if you wish to avoid lining up. Beware of prices!"]

['Great little place near Station F. Food is better than other nearby locations.', 'Best bar in the area, the bartenders are awesome and the beer is great!!', 'Great staff, good price, and nice atmosphere!', 'Great service and great bread when you are hungry üçû', 'Service convivial, great food.']

['Delicious - kind people - really a great kebab place', 'Boa comida, em por√ß√µes bastante generosas. O atendimento foi r√°pido e sempre cordial.
Al√©m disso, o restaurante est√° em √≥tima localiza√ß√£o em frente ao hospital e tamb√©m a sa√≠da do metr√¥.', 'Very well placed opposite the CHU.
I ate very well; I had a vegetarian plate with eggplant, fries and salad.
Good value for money.
Small room and quickly full, but rather efficient service.', "I ended up eating here because I was in a hurry I wanted a quality kebab. But I stopped at the wrong place, industrial spit, hard and too salty kebab meat. Restaurant with hygiene standards that leave something to be desired. The meat on display was certainly not from today. I took a bite and immediately spit it out. It's inedible, I don't recommend it. It's better to stay on an empty stomach than to waste ‚Ç¨10 on something very bad. I advise you to go elsewhere it will always be better than this place to avoid", "The restaurant is ideally located opposite the hospital and right next to the metro exit.

I took a Chicken plate, the skewers were cooked in full view of everyone and the cooking was perfect. The chicken was very tender and juicy with a nice smoky flavor.

The plate was very well stocked, I even had trouble finishing it.
The accompaniments: fries, wheat and rice were all very good, well seasoned.
The salad was also well garnished: tomato salad, cabbage cucumber. The plate was served with very good bread.
The prices are rather high but considering the quantity and quality it is very reasonable.
The service and staff are very attentive, it's very pleasant.
The service was very fast. I would come back to try the dish of the day.
I recommend 100%."]

['Good Food. Friendly Staff. Customized food available.', 'Never had their burger but their vegetarian pizza was pretty good for the price, just ‚Ç¨8!', 'It said open 24h, we went on a Saturday night and was closed', 'Very nice food', 'Top']

['No hygiene !
Staff not wearing a mask, sniffing away on the food.
ü§¢ü§Æ', 'Clean.good display..nice staff.', 'Good people overthere .', 'Correct', "Overall everything is correct. The only downside is that one of the employees, who arrived about a year ago, has long brown hair and thinks she's the boss and sometimes speaks badly and is easy to criticize...
We really know the manager who is charming!
The pretty brunette is also very pleasant and the tattooed gentleman is very, very nice."]

["NEW FAVORITE SPOT ALERT üì£

I LOVE this place! I found it by mistake, close to where I work, and I am blown away by how good, healthy and cheap the food is  !!
I ordered the Aioli burger, with fries and Aioli sauce (because... Aioli is life üòÅ). I couldn't believe it was vegan! the texture, the presentation, the taste, everything was just perfect.

Recommended üíØ", 'Visited this restaurant with my meat eating sister and even she enjoyed it.

The little restaurant is super cute, free water as well. The table and chairs are comfy. There's a lot of different food choices. I got the BBQ burger and it was insanely tastey. My sister also loved her burger and said it even tasted the same as a "normal burger".

I also had a chocolate cookie and it was really good. The food prices are completely reasonable and it's only a 15 minute walk away from the arena.

If I was ever back in Paris I'd go here in a heartbeat.', "The BBQ veggie burger was so good! And I loved whatever the seasoning was on the grilled corn on the side. The freshly juiced drink that I picked was perfect. The staff was friendly and spoke English, and the place was clean with lots of space. Not far from the metro. It might be off the beaten path, but definitely worth going to. I'll go again for sure.", 'Reasonable prices. Good quality & quantity.
I had gluten free burger, steakhouse fries, cold rooisbos, pannacotta, and almond latte. All for 20‚Ç¨ ¬´\xa0100% vegan plus gluten free\xa0¬ª
They are all Delicious!!', 'Probably the best vegetarian burgers in Paris. They have unique steaks, much better than the beyond burger one. I tried all the burgers on the menu, and all of them are amazing. I find the ones with the non fried steak better. My only complaint is that this place is rarely open.']

['Small good restaurant
And great service  Friendly chef that loves his work
The fish I had was perfect
Good french food with changing menu every month', 'Food was great and we appreciated the service very much. Found this place by chance and it made our evening special. Merci and greetings from The Czech Republic. :-)', "What a great evening. We chose the place randomly and in the end discovered it to be a hidden delight. The waiter/chef was so friendly and amusing sharing stories with us, and listening to ours too. The evening was very un-rushed allowing us to slowly enjoy each course and the drinks afterward. The atmosphere was relaxed and the food was delicious (I recommend the veil!) I'm not joking when I say that this was one of the best overall restaurant experiences I've had in Paris and for sure, I will happily recommend it to others.", 'The owner and the chef is adorable. He explained everything about the food and we loved the concept. But‚Ä¶..
The food was mostly good, but‚Ä¶.. we arrived at 19:30 and left at 23:20‚Ä¶.

There were no one responsible for the front of the restaurant, so the chef could not just focus and cook‚Ä¶.
We ordered most of the dishes that was supposed to be cooked in advance, but it took for ever for the dishes to come out‚Ä¶.

And on top of that, in the middle of the service instead of cooking for hungry customers- the chef was cooking for his relative who came in dishes not appearing in the menu‚Ä¶..?????

When the food finally arrived- there were confusion and missing dish, main dishes were of a disappointing size and not the same between them. (Same dish for 1 person had double the food than for the other) . Only pasta dish was of a good size.

Only go there if you want to spend all evening at the restaurant and you don‚Äôt have train to catch‚Ä¶

Hope the owner will see this review and get professional help, because we loved the concept and I wish this  restaurant will succeed.', 'Delicious menu that changes monthly to reflect a different French region. Hospitable owner. Lovely place to dine.']

['Good service, food ok.', 'Good place, not expensive.\nQuick service, tasty japonese dishes.\nI liked it.', 'Excellent food, lovely staff, reasonnable price and fresh fish every time I went.', 'Good food, good service. I just miss the crispy onion rolls.', 'Tenpura bibim bap is amazing']

['I remember i had some caf√© very kind people', 'Good selection and fresh orange juice!', 'Excellent little neighborhood supermarket, clean and very friendly team. We go there almost every day.', "It's just my favorite supermarket, the everyday one, top team. Good shelf life. Attentive and friendly service ‚ò∫Ô∏è", 'There are many organic products, expiration date products in a differentiated corner. You can find everything and the staff is always attentive and available.\nThe prices are attractive and so are the times.\nThanks to the team']

['Great place for a healthy salad at work. I go there often and I love the service, the food, prices are not too expensive. The only thing I had a problem with at first was the quantity. Depending on the person serving you, some portions are very small especially if you do not eat carbs. Now the portions seem to have improved. The service is great and fast given the number of people there everyday in the queue.', "I love the salads here. You have a wide choice of bases and items to put in the salad. It can be a bit stressful the first time you go as you need to tell the server which items you would like in the salad and there are lots of people in the queue but once you know what you want it's pain free. The staff are generally nice and the quality of the items in the salad are good for the price. Recommended for a work day lunch.", "Usually busy for lunch but very quick service.\nGood value and healthy, but don't hesitate to ask for a bit more of the ingredients, since the service tend to be greedy/cheap sometimes (pro tip).", "Awesome salads. Love to come here for lunch when I'm working close by at WeWork. If it weren't closed in the evening, I would come after work too üòã", 'Good salade but expensive for what it is, not lot of choices if you take the formula']

Nom: Le Jeanne D‚Äôarc ‚Ä¢ BAR ‚Ä¢ BRASSERIE ‚Ä¢ Boutique CBD ‚Ä¢ Cigarette Electronique ‚Ä¢ CAVE √Ä CIGARE ‚Ä¢
Reviews:
['One of the rare cafes where there is a pinball machine but disappointingly, it tilts as soon as you score a few points = avoid', 'TO ABSOLUTELY AVOID!!!
The very, very thin gentleman is haughty, arrogant and extremely unpleasant.
there was an administrative closure in this caf√© because of hygiene, several people became very ill... they did work on the exterior facade but it is still just as dirty inside... nauseating smell etc etc... very very dirty...', 'I had been going to this tobacconist for several years, I moved but I return there from time to time. ['Stopped in last minute and throughly enjoyed myself! The staff is so friendly and patient. The food is even better! 10/10 recommend!', 'La Soixante Douze is an African restaurant that offer a taste of African cuisine. The food was of based of comparison to other African restaurants I have visited. The chicken was good, but rice was dry. The fish was great, but lack the seasons and flavor. Overall good food and nice atmosphere.', "Delicious food and great cocktails! Very nice vibes in this restaurant! The staff is very friendly and willing to make sure that we're having a good time :)\nAbsolutely recommended if you are in the area :D", "Delicious finger foods and amazing happy hour cocktails! üçπ I had two Cuba libres, they were so good! üôåüèº The vibes were immaculate! üòé I'll definitely be back for a proper dinner and to experience the Saturday music concert! üé∂ #FoodieHeaven #CocktailLover #LiveMusicVibes", 'I‚Äôve only been in Paris for a year, but I‚Äôve already eaten at more than five African restaurants. Out of all the places I‚Äôve tried, Le soixante douze stands out as having the best mafe beef in my opinion, and the presentation of the dish speaks for itself. The food tasted just as good as it looked! I definitely plan on going back to try other dishes from the menu.']

['10‚Ç¨ for a sandwich and a dessert. Expensive for what it is and unpleasant service.', 'Very friendly staff and reasonable prices.', 'Scandalous price due to the absence of direct competition within the BNF and no recycling ‚ôªÔ∏è', "Prices not moderate!! It's expensive", 'Friendly place for well-deserved breaks!']

['The waitstaff was very courteous and happy to accommodate French or English.  The drinks were are standouts and very refreshing.   It was easy to enjoy our conversation and our food.  I highly recommend the cucumber gazpacho.   Excellent!  We ordered different dishes and enjoyed them immensely.  Thank you for a fresh and delicious meal! I‚Äôd definitely come again.', 'Given the many choices Paris offers concerning places to eat dinner, choosing the place to settle can be quite the challenge. Luckily the Fork helped us out with an amazing deal. At first caution is advised when deals seem too good to be true, however, we were pleasantly surprised by the food, atmosphere and charming server (and probably owner). In regards to the actual dinner, the food consisted of classics presented in a modern way whilst also offering some newer dishes. Luckily this restaurant understood the importance of A-grade ingredients as simple recipes were very tasteful. Given the size of Paris, accessibility is very important as well. Given that there is a metro station just across the street, reaching Yuman should give little issues even when situated in the centre like we were. In our eyes, the owner and staff of Yuman understood the message of what good food and service meant and thus we could absolutely recommend this restaurant!', 'Very healthy and tasty food. They use only biological ingredients. I find their prices are quite expensive compared to other places I know.', "As someone who isn't really into vegan and organic restaurants, I gotta say I really loved the food here, good portions and the price was reasonable", 'Excellent meals and desserts. A bit slow to serve so make sure you got time.']

Adresse: 7 Pl. Jean - Michel Basquiat, 75013 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Savoured authentic brochettes at this Japanese gem. Melt-in-mouth goodness. Colonel Glace was a fan-favourite dessert. A must-visit indeed.', 'This place is impressively clean and neat. I‚Äôve never seen a Japanese restaurant so immaculate before. I really enjoyed having a dinner here with my family.', 'The place was so clean, the food tasted so authentic and they had a wide range of dishes to choose from.', 'We came in this restaurant and the way they serve was so respectful and the food was so delicious. I had rice bowl with chicken fry it was so tasty. Must recommend this SUSHI restaurant', 'Nice and affordable place! A very usual meal on the way home']

Adresse: 5 Pl. Jean - Michel Basquiat, 75013 Paris, France
Reviews: ['The fries had no flavor whatsoever, aside from the absurd amount of salt.. they must have used three times the daily recommended dose! The waiter was more interested in chatting with his friends than actually doing his job, forcing customers to shout their orders to get any attention. üëçüèª On top of that, he completely forgot our drinks. Overall, a disappointing experience: bland fries, a good Lipton tea (which they didn‚Äôt even make), and a 10‚Ç¨ bill. Not worth it.', 'So lovely place with a summer and relaxing atmosphere and a varied menu. Cocktail prices are medium, especially during happy hours. Meals and drinks are tasty!', 'A good meal for a work day, tasty and not too pricey compared to the average of the location. üëå', 'Nice bar with the usual drinks. A few things on the bar food menu which are decent. Service is cool at least the bar tender we had was really friendly. Decent place to have a quick drink. Nothing spectacular but in the area you don‚Äôt have many options. Will come again.', 'Definitely won‚Äôt come again. I ordered happy hour drinks in happy hour schedule and was billed in regular price. Not even good quality.. I don‚Äôt recommend, specially for happy hour']

['We initially came as a group of 30 people from the UK and we have not been disappointed. This restaurant was absolutely Amazing! It was a real 10/10. The staff from the entry to the service have been absolutely fabulous. The food was made instantly and the vibe was exactly as promoted on the their page, everyone was enjoying the music. Thank you again for everything ! You will definitely see me/us again soon. üî•üî•üî•üëå', 'Best Friend Birthday Time all the way from Texas! We enjoyed the atmosphere, staff and live DJ.  It was eighteen of us and we ordered from the group menu. We were given one glass of champagne, each table received one tray of appetizers and each person had one choice of food chicken, lamb or fish. We all paid 60-70 per person and tips were not included.', "The meal was okay. However, the food was too pricey and beyond the reasonable range.

Good live music and DJ music uplifting the enviroment and making my stay thoroughly enjoayble. This was the highlight of my visit to Villa Maasai.

There were a lot of issues reconciling the bill, we noticed that there were additional bills for items we didn't order that were added. It just felt like a shady act by the staff member that attended us.

Good place, great atmosphere and ambience but a lot more can be done price-wise and experience-wise.", 'The big restaurant where all these reviews are from, Villa Maasai, closed their doors in September. This establishment I thought would be a smaller version since they took over their website, Instagram, and review pages. It is not! I will never be returning. For simple African dishes they are charging premium prices and giving little portions and bland food. Why is Yassa Poulet 27‚Ç¨ and you only give one price of chicken. For 27‚Ç¨ you should get half a chicken or atleast 2 pieces (leg and thigh). Not worth at all and would never return. Such a shame because the true Villa Maasai was my favorite restaurant in Paris.', 'Food was great but not for the price. The ambiance made up for it!']

Adresse: 10 Port de la Gare, 75013 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Lovely and easy place to sit beside the Seine after a swim. Lovely vegan and vegetarian food. Service was great.', 'A good quick bite on Seine wharf. Good desserts and cheeseburger. Not to pricey (around 37‚Ç¨ for full course plus coffee)', 'Most relaxing dinner we had in the entirety of our trip to France. Extremely friendly and helpful staff, chef was a legend, food was phenomenal. The place itself was clean and just had an incredible vibe, good music. Really made the perfect night out. Most certainly would recommend.', 'Very impressed. Staff was very friendly/professional. I really liked the pulled pork sandwich. Very tasty.', 'Avoid this place. Waiters are very rude and disrespectful, service is extremely slow. Not extremely expensive prices, ok for Paris but definitely for the quality they serve. Mussels were the worst ever, people were returning them. Anyway, we thought it was a nice place to chill because of the decoration but finally it was a very bad experience. One waiter was even aggressive... la honte.']

['I had a terrible experience at Starbucks. First of all, the prices were outrageous‚Äîway too expensive for what they offer. To make things worse, the service was abysmal. The staff took forever to prepare my coffee, and when I asked about the delay, they were incredibly rude. I expect much better from a brand like Starbucks, but this visit was disappointing on every level. I won‚Äôt be returning anytime soon.', "For morning freshness with coffee and cookies it's the best place to select. Calming and clean to gossip and chill with anyone. Clean WC available here and service was also very good.", 'Dirt dirt and more dirt. Dirty and sticky tables, dirty floor, dirty toilets with no soap or tissue, dirty working stations and on top of everything I asked for a simple cappuccino and a hot chocolate for my son nothing complicated. Coffee was burning hot, waited 25 mins before I could actually taste it and in the end it tasted, of course, burned and horrible, my son‚Äôs chocolate looked like a cup of milk with half a spoon of chocolate powder. It also tasted watery.  Way far from the standards. Embarrassing', 'Popped in yesterday  to grab a quick drink on our way to city centre.
I ordered in English as the lady at the counter was speaking English.
We wanted takeaway cups as we were in a rush, but received both drinks in drink in cups. Which I politely asked to be replaced.

Limited seating area.', 'Very good location, everything was great']

['Great little pasta and pizza house close to the metro! Pasta is fresh, sauces are light and fragrant made with proper tomato! 2 pastas, a lemonade and water ‚Ç¨21!', 'Fine for fast Italian if you work in the neighborhood, I imagine a spot like this is very convenient. But to serve that many people there‚Äôs definitely a sacrifice in the quality of the food. My pasta was overcooked and under-seasoned, but filling. For as much business as they have, they should really invest in a new toilet seat that doesn‚Äôt have a crack in it, and yes the bathroom is pretty gross.', 'I ordered a pizza fungi and my bf ordered pasta.. I didn‚Äôt like my pizza but very much enjoyed the pasta.. cause it was a little bit spicy and I love me some spicy anything.. the interior of the place is interesting and you get to see the chef cooking food in front of you and you can take different kind of oil close to the kitchen for you pizza. all of this at a good price is really quite nice bargain.', 'A really nice trattoria in Are. 13 of Paris!

We visited 2 times, and it gets quite busy at times, however the food was ready really fast!

Nice flavours for pizza and pasta!

Good selection of desserts also!

Highly recommended!', 'Easy to find, right opposite of mk2 and near metro station. Food is good, ordered Regina and tiramisu, cake is delicious üòã. Not many people, very good vibe as a fast food restaurant.']

['bad service, dry noodles and expensive... avoid', 'Definitely not authentic, but the restaurant is very clean', "The food was edible but it was not good. I ordered the chicken curry but the chicken was squishy like it had been sitting the sauce for days; you could tell it was not made fresh given it came out so quick. Not much flavor, and the customer service wasn't very good. I will not be going there again. The only good things I could say was the decor was nice, the bottled drink was good, and the rice was cooked.", 'Spotlessly clean, attentive staff and tasty food. Conveniently located on a quiet side street off the busy roads in the 19th. Right opposite Decathlon.\nService a little slow despite not being busy, but good food is worth waiting for.\nPrices fair, matching portion sizes.', 'That was awful. The noodles were gross and the stew disgusting. Stay away.']

Adresse: 40 bis Rue de Tolbiac, 75013 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Although this restaurant was a tight fit , which is very French actually, the cuisine was delicious and just right, not too expensive either.
Not a place for extra-large people who may need to use the washrooms which is located below floor level on a tight spiral metal staircase üò∂
I liked this place despite some minor stuff ‚ò∫Ô∏èü•≥üëçüôèüèº', 'A great find near where we were staying.
