The staff is very nice person and very good vibes to enjoy a cozy calm and clean dish during lunch or dinner time.
Keep it up, customers are happy and satisfied üå∏', 'Food very good and perfect amount. Lovely staff and spoke English. Booked via the fork with no issues.']

Adresse: 81Rue de Tolbiac, 81 Rue de Tolbiac, 75013 Paris, France
Reviews: ['One of the best food places in paris! Ahmed very nice guy and pleased to stop by his restaurant- try the Kabab sandwich tasty and mouth watering! Making also an amazing pizza at your choice - highly recommend.', 'This is a halal restaurant. The sandwich I had, had some salt more than normal. I saw a rat üêÄ running between the wc and the counter place where the food is prepared. This place needs more attention on the hygiene. It was not crowded  when I was there and still not that clean. The only positive thing is that the service was good and the guys were friendly.', 'The meat is not fresh', 'Excellent restaurant !', 'Excellent']

["Bad things:
-very expensive with average quality: it's a library full of students that pays 15 euros a year, so I was shocked by the expensive prices for very simple sandwiches.
-They didn't accept to heat my food in their microwave, even tho I was ready to pay for it, so I ate my food cold :( : in a place where a lot of students come, having a microwave is the bare minimum.

Good things:
-the staff are very nice üíõ.", 'I bought a bowl of rice, chicken, and vegetables. I asked the female cashier there to help me microwave it, she said no. I asked why she answered that it was a salad. Sure, then I tasted it, it has rice in it, it was too hard and cold to swallow. I returned and asked again for her help. She still said no, she cannot. ‚ÄúWhy not?‚Äù I was just confused. I was not like to ask her to microwave something outside the store. She said, ‚ÄúYou already touched it.‚Äù I was shocked and processed her words. She didn‚Äôt give me time to respond, ‚Äúfine!‚Äù she grabbed the bowl and microwaved it. I don‚Äôt know why she said that but I won‚Äôt come there anyway.', 'I true like here for breakfast, the croissant and dessert taste really good and has a very good price, however, RedBull is expensive, you need to know what to choose and what to buy.', 'A great pit stop to get food or coffee when studying. It‚Äôs an open but not too loud place to have a school meeting and study.', "Exorbitant prices, mostly inaccessible to students and moreover for barely adequate food. It's really a shame. Mice could also be seen..."]

["Its correct. Prices are low so don't expect a taste blast. It's not bad not great either.
Small place but not busy.
Go there when want to have some cheap Asian food.
Good prices for Udon and the taste is not bad but is mild so not great.
Chirashi can be better if the rice has some more flavor. Salmon is 3-4 out of 5.
Imho Its correct for the price.
It's clean,  no design. Personnel is Chinese and friendly.", 'Bad food, and the fish was absolutely old. I regret that I ate here. My friend and I couldn‚Äôt even finish the food as the fish tasted so bad ( scared if we‚Äôll get an upset stomach)', 'Very tasty and good price! Will come back again!', 'Not bad.', 'Very good and cheap food. Fully recommend!']
['a place that deserves 5 stars, fast, tasty, high quality', 'Excellent !', 'Perfect', 'Top', 'Top']

["Small but it saves you when the other markets are closed especially on Sundays. The staff working there was helpful even though we didn't speak French", 'Shop mostly has car products and oil. The shelves inside have food and drinks but very little grocery.', 'Carrefour express within the total energy service station. The store is a single wire with a marked entrance and exit. The Kinder D√©lices can be found in the biscuits section, Kinder confectionery and Nutella in the chocolate bar and gondola head sections.', 'Very comfortable even if with little choice. The strong point is the water in the fridge at a non-existent price in Paris, 0.67 euros for a 1 liter bottle. (Parisian average, 2.10 euros for a half-litre bottle) And I assure you that on holiday it is convenient...', 'Terrible experience. Closes at 10:00 p.m. Arrived 9:47 p.m. Thrown out with a broom by the employee in charge of cleaning... Supposedly paid until 10:00 p.m., no more, no less. The cash register was already closed. Supporters of the least effort and as for politeness, it leaves something to be desired. They did not give their name to file a complaint with the Manager...']

['Food was awesome...fresh but but main problem is Toilet is not available...what a joke? Toilet is most important..please I request to subway owner.. thinking about toilet... otherwise food is good..', 'Extremely good service. Staff helps in French, English and German. Sandwiches were also tasty and really well stuffed.', 'I was glad to finally see a Subway!', 'Being a vegetarian this is the good place for the food. You can buy Sub15 with customisation option here and ask them to add all the vegetables u like along with the cheese.', 'Horrible Customer service, not professional at all with dealing with customers especially in taking orders. my order was lost with other customers. In addition the tables were dirty. This place is getting worse day after day.']

['Tasty food, high average prices, helpful and delightful staff (especially the guy on the bar)', 'Tasty food, great service!!', 'Cool üòé', 'The place for afterwork !', "Great bar with very friendly servers, friendly prices and the possibility of putting on music!\nIt‚Äôs a shame that a ‚Äúregular‚Äù customer of the bar, a retiree, spends the evening insistently looking at all the girls (barely adults) and gets caught asking them for photos when they go to the toilet. Furthermore, after a discussion with this gentleman and having informed the bar staff, we had to leave while he stayed to drink drinks with the owner.\nYou'd better pay attention to your customers, so as not to damage the reputation of your bar."]

['Great pizza, great Chef and great atmosphere.

If you like human contact and warm welcome, this place is definitely worth a visit.

The owner is very welcoming, and is very good at interacting with the customers.

We were the only clients on that evening, and we had not only a delicious food, but also a very pleasant time.

The prices are also very correct.

We will visit again with pleasure!', 'delicious food, perfect services‚ù§Ô∏è the host is so kind and friendly', "The pizza and pasta were both better than I had in Italy. The tiramisu and creme brule were both absolutely wonderful. We were also given an appetizer of some olives in some kind of pepper / tomato sauce with bits of cooked pizza dough which was delicious.

This restaurant is so cozy and comfortable. The owner was so gracious and welcoming. Easily one of the best meals I've had in Europe.", "We had a disappointing day followed by a disappointing attempt at dinner. It wasn't salvageable so we went out to get pizza from here. The gentleman who greeted my husband was so incredibly nice and generous, providing a snack while he waited for our order to be prepared. The pizza was delicious. It turned around our bad day. Thank you!", "I ate there dinner tonight and can honestly say that this is one of the best pizzerias in Paris!
The staff was amazing and the pizzas were not only delicious but also heart shaped.
I'll definitely go there again"]

Adresse: 89 Bis Rue du Dessous des Berges, 75013 Paris, France
Reviews:
["I was staying at a hotel around the corner and I'm so glad I found this.

The food was so good!! It's ‚Ç¨10.50 for two of the three day's choices either a starter (entree in French) or the dessert plus the main meal (with a vegetarian option) or ‚Ç¨13 for all 3. They accept credit cards and were so friendly when I told them I spoke no French.

Their daily menu is on the website. Today I had a choice of rice & tuna salad or vegetable soup for the starter. The main dish was mini shell pasta covered in tomato sauce and two pieces of pork. I picked a brownie for dessert. The food tasted really fresh and healthy and the price was incredible.

My only regret isn't they aren't open on the weekend but that's my fault for not planning my trip better. Also they have the option to take the food to go.

My favourite meal on this trip to Paris!", 'Good lunch at affordable price.', 'Super !', "Concept that I love.
This is a very well organized family business.
You must order the day before or in the morning for the big day.
The food is prepared on the big day.
It's homemade with fresh, quality products.
I ordered takeout twice last week.
On Wednesday, I had a dish of three-colored rice shrimp with tomato and feta and for dessert it was really a total killer, a rhubarb tart with a sort of custard. ü•∞
Never tasted this version in my entire life.
The mix of sweetness and sourness was a real marvel. It was perfectly balanced. üòç
Then the next day I had a vegetable moussaka and a lemon tart.
I recommend this establishment.
You can go there with your eyes closed.
Thank you to the staff for their welcome and availability.", 'A little nugget! Discovered thanks to very very good, this little restaurant like at home is perfect! We were welcomed as if we were part of the family by a friendly team, and everything was really good! I will come back during my next visit to Paris :)']

['Correct', "The freezing needs to be reviewed, we bought a log and what a disappointment when we opened the box ü•≤ it's not the first time, I had already had ice cream once and it tasted like water (ice cube). . You should never buy freezer items from this store until this has been changed.", 'Given the very high prices, really to help out.\nBorderline friendliness.\n3 people tidying on the shelves, but no one at the checkout?', 'Very bad Franprix, very bitter cashier, dead rat in the store and so on‚Ä¶ The little Tunisian who was at the checkout was truly a gem!!!!', 'Franprix well run. There is plenty of choice on the shelves with very little out of stock. The fruit and vegetable section is at the entrance to the store. Checkout is quick. The chocolate confectionery and bars are in a low gondola and the bazaar and laundry areas are confused.']

['visited this boulanger twice and both times i have to say i am impressed, chanced upon it whilst in the quartier, saw a persistent long queue albeit the wait time wasn‚Äôt long each time, bought a bollywood sandwich the first time and i just say the chicken was well seasoned and soo juicy, revisited it yesterday and got myself the same sandwich as well as a brownie, a brioche olympiade and a petit pain chorizo, the sandwich was as good as the first time, the brownie and brioche was raved by my husband and the petit pain was still soft and doughy despite it sitting at home for 1 day!
impeccable service delivered by the time each time, same gentleman served me, always with a bonjour and a smile, very welcoming and fast affordable bakes.
will revisit again when i am in the quartier!
Bravo to the √©quipe üíöüíö', 'I tried every different flavors of bread.My favorite one is tuna.It‚Äôs really tasty and not greasy.If I stay more longer in Paris I would try more flavors.', 'The girl was really rude to my husband. We live less than one kilometer away and carefully,slowly carrying the bag ruined both desserts. They were made badly.', 'there‚Äôs always a long line, it‚Äôs close to Sorbonne Tolbiac
ive had their cardamom bun and the sandwich oeuf cocotte which is to die for üòç you can get a student discount too.
cool place i recommend', 'Really good bakery. The servers spoke great English and the food was delicious. We will miss your food! :)']

['I absolutely love this place, the prices and the choice of products they have. I will definitely come back here again.', 'Good shop to get quick breakfast and worth the taste‚Ä¶ Staffs were friendly as well.', 'Very popular bakery with lovely staff. Well priced. Fresh bread, pastries, sandwiches and other foods available. Nice coffee.', 'Cozy bakery just near the metro station.
Croissants are highly recommended.
There are few tables inside the bakery.
It has clean washroom.', "Cute spot for breakfast. Enjoyed my pastries and coffee, and the price wasn't too expensive. Has outdoor seating and a friendly atmosphere. The woman at the counter didn't speak English, but she was very patient with my French!"]

['A good classic Parisian breakfast. Very friendly hosts. The quality is up to par with the prices.\n‚úåüèª', 'Happy hour', 'Cool', 'Cool', "Closed on Christmas Day I'm leaving the info because I discovered it and it's marked open!"]

["The food was alright, but the team effort here is impressive. For a cafe in Paris, this place is actually very spacious, with plenty of outdoor seating, a lengthy bar, and several couches, and a foosball table if that strikes your fancy.
We were here one night when it was pouring outside. The outdoor seating area was covered with glass doors and an awning, but the rain coming down was forcing the awning to cave in. That whole area was starting to flood, so the guests moved inside. Meanwhile, the staff, including bartenders and waitresses, rushed out there to get brooms and anything with enough reach to push the water off of the awning and onto the street. Some of the water still forced its way in, drenching the staff members. As the rain came down relentlessly, their efforts seemed futile, but I respect their dedication.

19.50‚Ç¨ Planche Mixte - Swiss, Comte, brie, and prosciutto, salame, jambon with cornichons and lettuce leaves , and baguette:
Our sweet waitress told us that the charcuterie and cheese board would be plenty of food for two people. The meats and cheeses were not bad, but it whet our appetite for more. The waitress was amused by our rather surprisingly large appetites.

11.50‚Ç¨ Croque Madame - ham and cheese sandwich with fried egg, lettuce leaves, and small basket of fries:
A decent sandwich with a crunchy, crispy cheese on the outside. The fried egg had a nice, runny middle, but I would have liked it if the edges of the egg white weren't dried up, and also would have been nice if the egg was fused into the sandwich to form one entity, instead of an eggg lying atop of a sandwich. The fries were okay, but the salad was just a little wilted.

6.70‚Ç¨ Pink Paloma, Saint Germain Spritz, Pear Fizz:
The drinks we ordered were very reasonably priced. Very light and refreshing, nothing crazy, but they did come with glow-in-the-dark straws. Interesting touch.

Originally we came for a couple of drinks and snacks, but once it started raining, we decided to delay our exit, and ended up eating a very full meal.", "Good restaurant for a quick business lunch with fresh salads, burgers and sandwiches. Service is swift, friendly and professional. Don't expect 3* cuisine, but for a bistro, it is very correct.", 'We went to this place during the "after work rush hour". We were seated and waited for over 20 min until somebody came to clean our table and take our order - the waiter said "well you're seated in this faraway corner"... It's not like we chose our table? Once we ordered, the service was quicker. Waiter served water glasses and drinks while touching the rim of the glasses, which I find very unprofessional and unhygienic. The tables with sofas are not great for eating, because the sofas are too low for the tables and the chairs are a bit too high.
Overall not very comfortable, weird ambiance and service could have been much improved. Food was adequate though.', 'The best chicken in Paris!', 'Nice place. The music is a bit too loud but other than that, the food and the ambiance were good.']

["I was disappointed by the crepes here, my husband ordered a savory crepe which was very dry and only tasted of onion. I ordered an apple one which had a good flavor but the toppings to crepe ratio wasn't good. We had a very nice server and the food came out fast but I wouldn't recommend it since I had way better and cheaper crepes on the street.", "The restaurant had a nice warm ambiance and the staff was very nice and friendly. They also had some good candies after dinner. The food on the other was just OK.\nI think overall it's a nice restaurant to try.", 'Lovely restaurant. Very friendly people. Good food!', 'Enjoyed a delicious galette at this beautiful restaurant. Menu had a great selection of specials from which I chose a galette with feta, tomatoes and eggplant. Staff was friendly, location was in a quiet area. Very pleasant experience.', 'Came across this place accidentally today when I ran in for cover after a sudden rain storm and decided just to stay and eat. So glad I did! The crepe was delicious!!! The servers made me feel very welcome and the food was delivered quickly with a smile! Highly recommend!']

['I was there on Feb. 25, 2024 and was greeted at the counter by a  friendly man.  I ordered a Mocha and a chocolate croissant to go. The mocha was sooooo delicious and richüòãüòç and the chocolate croissant was really fresh and delicious, although I found the size of the croissant to be a bit smallüòÖ
The place looked clean and very spacious.  I will definitely go back the next time I am in Paris!', "It's a nice cool place to sit and drink.
They offer sandwiches, coffee and cakes.
They have a large space and it's most of the time crowdy.
Atmosphere is warm and good and I like it.
They provide internet but not good in tes of speed.
Ok for kids but not kids friendly.
Bo car parking but train station nearby", 'Bought an iced mocha and it was really watered down and light. We were first served a hot mocha which they just poured into some ice in a cup.', 'When an international business puts no trash can in the woman‚Äôs toilet which has plenty of room for trash cans, they are stating hatred towards woman. Where are we supposed to put the used tampons and sanitary serviettes? They certainly don‚Äôt want you to flush them because they have signs everywhere saying don‚Äôt do it. When I talked to a staff, he even kindly told me there is a trash can ‚Äúoutside‚Äù the toilet room. So I guess they just need a sign saying, man and women after menopause only. Please please please read this review if you are a woman and is considering coming here. Come back after menopause!', 'The salmon sandwich and the cranberry juice were delicious, filling and healthy. They have a lot of seats and it was a good experience. Good value for money and quick stop to have quality food.']

Adresse: 72 76 Rue du Ch√¢teau des Rentiers, 75013 Paris, France
Reviews: ['This shop is open until 11pm, which is great if you need something to eat or drink. The shop is clean and there is a large variety of products you can buy.', 'Nice and friendly staff working here. Very friendly towards people who can‚Äôt speak French, which is quite common in Paris as we all know!', 'Great opportunity to buy food and drinks. Good wine selection. Fresh food. Friendly staff.', 'good', "It's open for late hours, you can find anything you want"]

['Good service, excellent menu options and freshly prepared food. I wish the Mousse Chocolat was chocolat noir ;)', "My best friends are at class'croute. As a foreign student they provided the nicest service and great lunch. They encouraged me to practice my poor French and were so welcoming. I'm telling my friends to eat at class'croute", 'super', 'Top service', 'Super']

Adresse: 17 Rue Baron le Roy, 75012 Paris, France
Reviews:
["Quite surprised with this hotel.
Not bad for a 3 star hotel.

The room is very nice, the only downside is the bathroom. It's not dirty, but it's badly kept, ugly, the shower joints are rusty... it needs a renovation.

The buffet is simple but tasty, with juices, coffee, waffles, bread, cereals, yoghurt, etc.

The location is quiet and safe. It is a residential area with a very nice area nearby for shopping and eating.
There is nothing touristy nearby, except the stadium where sometimes they do concerts, but luckily Paris is very well connected with the metro and the hotel has a stop 5 minutes away in the direction of the Trocad√©ro, perfect.", 'Good Hotel for a short stay, staff are amazing and very helpful.

They have a gym and work area as well, very close to metro and huge area for shopping and restaurants.

Room are a bit crippled, breakfast options are awesome.', 'Noisy room because you can hear toilets flushing or something like that, bed a bit on the hard side for my taste but like many other hotels. Service was perfect, and plenty of room around the bed. Shower not safe for those who are disabled (dont walk easy). Will return if going to paris again.', '200‚Ç¨ for a singular night, you would hope to have decent service. modern and clean lobby, the rooms could use a bit of updating. the lights flickered and the bathroom could be better maintained.

we checked in after a long day and missing a train on September 21 around 23h00. after receiving our cards, we went all the way to the 7th floor to room 715 and opened our room only to find there were already people inside! they were just as shocked as we were. not only is that an insane security risk to either party if the circumstance was escalated, but when we went back down to the front desk, the man working there did not even apologize. he just issued us new cards (for room 714 - right beside the people who had just been interrupted!) and dismissed us by blaming his coworker for the mix up. there are no extra boltage or locks inside the rooms, which is why our cards easily opened the door. we checked out the next morning at 06h30 and he had a very smug look on his face and said ‚Äúeverything was okay? sorry about last night‚Äù while eating a pastry and LAUGHING. I wish our circumstances were different and we could have stayed somewhere else.', "What the hell is it?! This hotel is really poor quality. The bathroom -stinks. The room - very tiny, not celaned properly. AC - doesn't work. Walls - thin as hell (you can hear everything from the corridor and other rooms). Iron board - maybe smurfs could iron their clothes on it. In the morning I was woken up by the fan in the room, that I coulnd't turn off. And all that for riddiculous price for night. The only advantage is front desk, lovely staff working there."]

['Great location right by hotel, park, and metro. Good selection of restaurants. Geltato cart, Five Guys, and the Mexican restaurant were awesome! Crepe restaurant had slow apathetic service. There was a giant pile of trash sitting in front for a few days and we did see a huge rat coming out of a trash can.', "charming and peaceful atmosphere, ideal for a quiet getaway. However cleanliness could be improved in certain areas, though it doesn't detract from the overall experience. It's a great spot for those looking to enjoy a relaxing stay with easy access to the city and nature.", 'Quiet happening place as it has all connectivity with the city. Bus stops and metro stations are all within walking distance. Restaurants are nearby and multiple options are available.', 'very beautiful place, feels antique. many restaurents and bars in the area. a big park nearby.', 'A wonderful village offering foods and drinks from bars and restaurants! Locating beside the Bercy gare, it is one of the best choice for taking a rest during your travel!']

['Watched movie here during late afternoon on a weekday. Only a few watching.\nClean, good picture and sound but very little leg room', "The movie theater is very big, it has more than 30 film rooms and each one is very big, but the seats are not comfortable at all, they should be renovated üôÑ. They offer several movies in their original language, and it is clean all the time. The movie starts at the time it is announced. However, their candy service falls short of expectations!!, since the popcorn not only is expensive (6.60‚Ç¨ for 350 grams) is not at all appetizing at all, it looks like it's from the day before, it doesn't even smell like popcorn when you get to the theater, but they have a wide variety of drinks and candy üôÑ. However, I think they should have some other cafeteria service while people are waiting for the movie to start.", 'Nice atmosphere! We saw ‚ÄúTrap‚Äù and it was hard to make a choice of ice creams..Finally it became Haagen Dacz with caramel pecan. Priced down too! Anyway nice clean theatre and good service and clean toilets!', 'It‚Äôs not the best talking about comfort, but the good thing about this one is that is in the Bercy Village, we‚Äôre you can find a lot of restaurants and some shops üëçüèº a good plan after the cinema üé¶', 'There were mice in the room! The room was also very dirty, which could explain the presence of mice. The staff did nothing when we contacted them.']

["Recently visity James Cameron retrospective. What a great exhibition! There weren't many people which added to the nice experience.
The exhibition itself is very complete, showcasing JC early drawings and comics.
For each movie, they also showcased all the creative process and related material.
The exhibition is also a bit interactive, which is an added fun to have.
I can't recommend this exhibition enough", 'I‚Äôm came from America to view this museum.The 2nd level is for George‚Äôs M√©li√®s and is a must see. It was amazing because all of his films are shown there and lots of information on him yet most of the information is in French.', 'Very nice exhibition, we went there one hour before closing, still mangled to see everything. The museum shop sells a wide collection of books about cinema. Theres a very nice cafe too', 'Amazing space for movies and cinema related activities.
Great film festivals and exhibitions about the history of cinema.
A must in Paris.', "Really great museum! I'm studying animation, so the content was super interesting to me. The museum tells the story of how cinema came to be, and how they first introduced motion and sound into it. It also has some props from some popular movies.

The audio guides are free, you only need to provide an identification (from wherever in the world you're from), and they provide so much extra knowledge, so they're definitely a must-have.

The museum doesn't allow photos, so here's a photo from outside. There's also a caf√© if you get hungry."]

['Have been stopping by here a couple times\nwith friends and they have a great selection of snacks for a group of people and drinks too!! We absolutely love the food here , however when it comes to drinks I suggest to stick to beer and wine. Their cocktails are not the best, maybe the quality of alcohol they use or the syrups they have are bad. All and all if you are in for food and beer - it‚Äôs an amazing place!!!\nHighly suggest to come here to spend time with colleagues and friends!', 'we spent a very nice evening there with very nice and tasty drinks and food the two waitresses who served us were perfectly kind and spoke very good English, perhaps the only restaurant in Bercy where you can find waiters who can communicate in another language!!!', 'Staff here are really friendly and helpful. Great spot to watch televised sports. The zero alcohol beer was surprisingly good. Had a plate of plain fries to go with it and although they looked really good, they were lacking in taste.', 'My server was Marthe. She was very polite and helped us very quickly. The food was very good and the place looked incredible. Marthe told us about the beer, she could tell us a lot and with a lot of passion. We also met the manager (Sandrine) and she had an energy I haven‚Äôt seen in a long while. She was so nice and very happy. She could really cheer up the place!', 'Very good meal and good beer. Atmosphere was good too. Service was excellent and the team were very friendly. Will visit again when I return again.']

['I was there for the New year eve 2024.\nThe animation was great and the girls dancing show was impressive! The staff was efficient, the  price was fair enough and the quantity very fair enough as well regarding to that price, taste was good.', 'Very interesting dishes and the concept with the wines cave is something different. The autumn menu was really complete and the service was excellent. Definitely we will visit again in the future.', "Chai 33 is a true gem! The concept is fantastic ‚Äì you're invited to explore a 19th-century wine cellar with a sommelier, picking out the perfect bottle at wine merchant prices. A delightful experience blending history, affordability, and personalized wine choices. Can't recommend it enough!\U0001faf6üèº‚ú®", 'The food was OK for New Year‚Äôs Eve, and the price was very fair. The evening program was also enjoyable.\nHowever, there was an unpleasant experience at the beginning: The manager ‚Äúdirectrice‚Äù from the restaurant who welcomed us at the bottom of the stairs wanted to seat us in a corner, between two walls, where we literally couldn‚Äôt see the show or any other guests. When we asked for a different table, she reacted very arrogant and dismissively, saying that ‚Äúthis is just how it is. This is your table.‚Äù Only after we insisted multiple times we were allowed to change the table. Luckely, the service provided by the two young men was excellent ‚Äì professional, attentive, and friendly. Many thanks to them!', 'Overall, the food was good, the entr√©es were flavourful, although they really screwed the star of the main dish. Duck Magret, the red fruits reduction was very delicious but the duck itself was way over cooked and a little bit burned. Other than than everything was Food good.']

['Very nice and tasty food in a cool atmosphere with courteous staff. Especially their famous sausage with the cheese-mashed-potatoes and the mille-feuille were awesome - I had high expectations, which were exceeded.', 'Such a great quality French food! Aligot is no longer unlimited - just one portion and then you can get it for paying extra. It is very good - the quality is just superb! The price now stands to be a bit overpriced I feel like but it doesn‚Äôt take away so much from the dining experience. Their wine list is extensive and good recommendation from the waiter - we loved it! Overall, if you are in Paris or in the area, I would for sure recommend coming here', 'Amazing traditional dishes and attentive service with homey vibe. Great value for money spent. 10/10.', 'The perfect way to end our stay in Paris. This place is a must visit with the best Duck Liver Hazelnut soup I have ever tasted!!', 'Charming restaurant with a classic atmosphere. We came here to try the aligot and it was very cheesy and filling, worth trying out! It does get quite heavy and is best when hot. The highlight of the meal was the chocolate mousse, it had a deep chocolate flavour and was very smooth.\n\nService was quite good, they seated us despite having no reservation, and many staff spoke English. Our server provided an English menu for us. It does get busy quickly later in the night.']

['Tables in the front and more in the back with power plugs.  Always easier to go to Starbucks rather than other cafe shops in Paris because of the conveniences that they provide such as bathrooms, WiFi and you can take your laptops out and work.', 'This is the dirtiest Starbucks i have ever been. It doesn‚Äôt even feel safe to get in. Dirty, bad service, toilet is for everyone, you better put a key just for clients. It‚Äôs ridiculous what you get for a drink.', 'I recently had the pleasure of enjoying a cup of hot chocolate at Starbucks, and I wanted to express my gratitude for the exceptional service provided by Melvin.  Kudos to the Starbucks team for creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. I look forward to more delightful visits in the future.', 'Great place with great staff. Because of this shop i became a starbucks gold member due to it‚Äôs consistency in providing a great service. Since my university is close by i always come and study at this Starbuck as it is not so noisy and have multiple seating areas. Would definitely recommend it for students as it is also located in a fun area bercy village.', "I am half-tempted to leave a terrible review so this place does not get overrun, as this cafe kind of turned into my favorite hang in the entire city.

Make no mistake about it however, this is the best Starbucks in Paris. You will find other Starbuckses with better interiors and architecture of course, but many of them are simply overrun by tourists and incredibly noisy. Most of them do not even have a terrace, or a single working powerplug.

This place has every advantage a Starbucks megacorp cafe could have, namely:
- Terrace
- Comfortable seats with device charging capability
- 30 second walk from a shopping mall with many international outlets, but NOT situated inside of the mall itself.
- Facing both a massive historical park AND a pedestrian street.
- Directly in front of the Court St-√âmillion Metro Station exit.
- Very friendly English speaking staff.

As far as cons go:
I saw other people commenting that the bathrooms weren't clean, and/or that homeless pickpockets are sometimes around.
There has been times where this has sadly been true, especially in the afternoon. HOWEVER: Please name an international restaurant or coffee chain in any major city in the world that does not also share this very common problem in our day and age.
Not being completely unaware of your surroundings easily solves this issue. That's just Paris for you."]

['Last Dinner in Paris before heading off to London.
Everything was perfect. Thank you for making it so memorable.
Bonjour from Australia.', 'Had a great experience eating here, food was hot and fresh and service was very good.', 'This morning started in a beautiful city but at the wrong place. The barman was very nice but the waiter service disappointed me. He signaled me to get up from the table like you signal a dog to pick up a thrown ball, and then chase it away with a whistle. It was my mistake that I ordered coffee to take away but after a tiring night, I wanted to sit and wait for my friend. I am surprised that this can happen in a city like Paris. He treats me like a dog with the sign of his finger', 'Was looking for a quiet dinner spot before my nearby bus departure from Bercy bus depot, walked across this cozy restaurant and tried it because of the comprehensible English menu, french food options and vegetarian variety. Staff was very friendly and helpful in advising on food choices, especially because I requested no meat.
-The food was great, with generous portions, great flavour and served nice and hot.
-Spacious seating
-Clean washroom
-Good beer on tap', "There's nothing fancy, but the clich√© French onion soup is decent, confit de canard is nice too, the price is reasonable and it's very close to Metro and  hotels such as Novotel and Ibis."]

["The food was absolutely delicious. Although we didn't speak French Michaella made us feel welcomed and helped us through the ordering process.  I definitely recommend this place.", "This is a very nice spot away from the touristy places with good food interesting drinks and good prices. I loved my steak au poivre dish, but I removed one star as my friend ordered a medium well sirloin stake, and it was all raw and red inside. We told the server, but they didn't do anything about it. Overall, I recommend it, but just be careful checking with how coocked you want your meat to be.", 'This is a good chain restaurant. I had the chicken and the potatoes and it was cooked well. My husband had the horse meat with egg and mashed potatoes. We also had carpacio and chicken wings. The food was well cooked. The people are friendly and nice. I would come again.', "Cozy restaurant with amazing food and service.

The atmosphere is terrific, we ordered l'entrecote xl and some appetizers. The waitress was extremely nice and didn't mind to take the order and communicate in english.

Everything tasted amazing, the meat was perfect.

I'd go back to try the other dishes.", "very nice food nice atmosphere the staff is very excellent, we had difficulty in translating I was shocked they don't speak basic English for communication"]

["We've had a greate dinner! It's a small restaurant in a quiet neighborhood. Most likely you will need a reservation. The food is really good. Highly recommend!", 'Absolutely delicious and amazing service. Highly recommend! The lamb was superb.', 'A brand new little restaurant, very good! Some organizational problems (bring cash, the credit card reader does not always work) but largely compensated by the quality of the dishes, very generous. A little extra for the very commercial aspect of the owner. In short, an address to recommend!', 'Extremely good, typical french food in a corner restaurant. Looks and feels like its come right out of the last century with no changes. Very nice staff and fantastic food. Been there a few times now and am always very satisfied!', 'This venue is well worth a visit. Less than half an hour walk from Bercy Village and you reach a traditional French restaurant. We had a warm welcome form our host and the food and wine were excellent. If we we locals it would be are go to place for an evening out .']

['very sweet owners, attentive and pleasant to talk to! food portions were very good for the price and the set options are great. very large selection of food and the grilled skewers are absolutely delicious.', 'just a great place ‚ù§Ô∏è

I ordered a formula of 3 different rolls, and it turned out that they also came with a soup and salad!
The salad is like in my childhood - very tasty sauerkraut (it's hard to explain what exactly I mean by "home-made", we make a similar one in Ukraine).
The service is super, very fast (they literally made me sushi in 5 minutes because I was in a hurry), very friendly staff. Nice prices.
I also want to mention the delicious rice.', 'The food is good and the staff is amazing and super friendly!', '1 star only because there is no option for 0 stars. The sushi here are served with three times as much rice as real good sushi, and the amount of sea food in and on the sushi is almost non existent. Worst sushi I‚Äôve ever eaten and the service is as bad as their food. The long haired, short waitress with the glasses is extremely rude, and she actually came to our table to tell us we couldn‚Äôt eat like we did, leaving all the extra rice behind, and that the pictures in the menu were not contractual, so know that, what you order because you liked the picture in the menu, is not what you will get.', 'Very lovely people here. The service was excellent. I felt very welcomed. I even got a free drink offered. I will come back for sure.
Thank you very much
Merci beaucoup']

['Terrible service: we ordered 3 simple pizzas through the Domino web site, our Bank account has been debited (22,95‚Ç¨) but then the order never reached Domino outlet‚Ä¶
Once there for the pickup, we had to place a 2nd order (22,95‚Ç¨) to get our pizzas,
Endly 45,90‚Ç¨ for 3 simple pizzas.', 'Tasty pizza with affordable price. Would definitely recommend for a chill evening food.', 'Great pizzas, faut service', 'It must be under some sort of new management, the pizza is Horrible and you can tell that they have lost most of their valuable customers‚Ä¶
I have be a consistent client but lately i have been regretting spending my money here, there‚Äôs been a decline in the quality of the Pizza that they make. Sadly this is it no more. Bye ‚úåÔ∏è', "A good place for reasonably priced pizza. Very saucy, great crust and light cheese, the way we like it. I would suggest ordering online if you dont speech French, as we had two wrong orders. Also check and make sure they slice it, only had one pizza sliced. Maybe they normally don't slice them here?"]

['first fine dining experience in Paris, so not many references to compare but heard that this restaurant was owned by a Michelin 2 star chef. had the signature menu in 5 courses with a bottle of wine. every plate was impressive but personal favorite was the third dish. service was good and friendly also.', 'Excellent French cuisine by the great team that gave us for decades the unforgettable Carr√© des Feuillants.\nReservations strongly advised through the website.', 'A wonderful find in our 12th Arrondissement...service was superb. The food exquisite... Will be back', 'Above and beyond all expectations for Parisian restaurant experience. Not to miss opportunity. The service was elegant in all respects. The food was divine. The neighborhood is beautiful Marais. I highly recommend this experience.', 'Good food and very friendly service!']

['The ambience is good and it is located very close to the bercy station. But the waiter was giving us a weird look for no reason like he‚Äôs not happy to serve us. He also charged us 12‚Ç¨ for two cappuccinos which is too much, too pricy.', "Yesterday my friend & I went into Les Spectacles for our dinner before seeing John Mayer across the road at The Accor. We love how they played John Mayer music. The food was amazing & reasonably priced. The service was 1st class & our waiter was very kind & friendly.
Today we went there  for dinner before going to The Mika Concert. Again a very nice meal whilst listening to Mika music, great atmosphere & sevice.
Unfortunately we didn't make the concert because the company I bought the tickets from took my money but failed to deliver my tickets, it turns out that I was scammed üò•
We decided to go back into Les Spectacles. The staff there were very upset to hear what had happened & tried to get us some tickets. They were very kind & offered my friend & myself a free drink.
Being shown such kindness really cushioned our disappointment.
The camaraderie amongst the staff was great to see too.
I will definitely be visiting again on my next trip to Paris.
Put Les Spectacles on your list of places to visit especially before a concert as they play music by the artist you are seeing that night which is a perfect way to start your evening.
Thank you to you all ü•∞", 'Such a terrible experience.
Unpleasant service, overpriced drinks and a waiter who will happily cheat on the bill if you don‚Äôt check the credit card machine.
Never saw that in Paris !!!', 'Okay, but no ketchup)', 'Absolutely terrible service.

I got a beer without any bubbles (and not the brand I ordered) which I asked politely to be changed. This turned out to become a major issue with the staff, and two separate servers objected to my request.

For that reason, I instead asked for the beer simply to be taken back as I didn‚Äôt want it, which they again strongly objected to, and said I would be charged regardless.

It got so absurd that I could not resist to comment on the extremely poor treatment of customers by the servers.

One of the servers (with blonde long hair in ponytail) got aggressive and had to be pulled back by his colleague.

Shocking!']

['I was looking for late breakfast during my stay at TOO hotel. Found this spot when i took a walk to Decathlon that day.

The food was okay, far from let down. And so was the coffee. The place is cozy and nice, and the staffs who served me were all good and polite.', 'The service was great, we were welcomed ver well and the lady that was serving us was very polite. The food was avrage, but it was a quick snack. Overall 3/5', 'Great place to have dinner and drinks and hang out with friends.

Food is reasonably priced and good. We ordered a burger which was around 15‚Ç¨.

We came to play pool and put our name on the list while we had dinner. It was 9‚Ç¨ an hour.

We had a great time here. Staff were very friendly.', 'Nice easy place to eat and relax, staff nice and attentive, food very tasty, quantity was ample also served quickly.
We simply had a Ceaser salad and Salmon salad followed by a Profiteroles,..
Prices are reasonable (ate in happy hour). Worth a visit', 'Perfect atmosphere and amazing tex mex food.']

['Great Food, smiling people and fast service. Thanks to Jimmy for suggestions and friendly conversation.', 'Very satisfying. Everything was fresher and tastier than the standard Japanese restaurant here in Paris, from the soup to the salad, the stir fried noodles to the dessert. Will return for sure.', "Yeko is a great sushi restaurant that gives you a good bang for your buck. The quality of the food is great, more specificaly the fish which is super fresh and tasty. The management and the service is cheerful and very attentive. You won't go wrong there.", 'Love the vibes in this cozy, lovely place. Cindi and her brother, were lovely and gracious to me when I came in for dinner absolutely soaked and wet. The food was amazing. Especially the skewers, drinks and sushi.. Not too salty, greasy or sweet. Just right.. I would like to come back some day. Thank you Cindi, and family!', "This place has a quiet atmosphere and the best staff. Friendly, polite, charming people. The food is always fresh and tasty. I've tried many Japanese restaurants in France but nothing comes close to Yeko. The reference for japanese dishes!"]

['Food was very delicious. I would suggest you are looking for the best Indian food near Eiffel Tower. Jodhpur palace is the one. You can get tasty and Indian food.', "Ok took some time to come around to this review.
Let me summarise it first in a few words, this place has been an experience in itself! Hands down one of the best, if not the best Indian restaurant in the city of Paris!!

I have been in the city for 4 days and have been eating out all this time. Traveling with parents, I was finding and dining in all sorts of Indian restaurants in and around the city. It was by chance we came here out of our way and I'm so glad we did!
The food will bring you home in the first few morsels you would eat. *Yes it's that good!!*
Service: I've yet to see a faster,more professional service in *any* restaurant than here! The person taking care of us was so light on his feet! It was amazing to see!", 'Spicy, authentic and delicious food with North Indian flavors at Vivaldi ,France. Just has to be experienced, serving both veg and non.veg menus with variety of dishes. Spacious dining area, Good service üëå. Most popular among the Tourists.', 'Visited this Indian restaurant along with my family in Paris for the first time after a lot of research. And I can very well say that we did a good job and the restaurant did an excellent job for cooking some  lip smacking dishes of our choice.
The starters like sheek kebab, tandoori chicken, and hara bhara kebab were just awesome. The main dishes like lamb rogon Josh and chicken do payaja reminded us of our days in India.
The owner, Mr. Baldev Singh was a friendly person who understood our requirements and arranged everything accordingly.
He even gave us complimentary cognac after we finished our food. A big thank you to Baldev ji.
I enjoyed Indian food in France after a  long time and I will come again & even recommend this restaurant to all my friends in France.', "This place is so wonderful. We were there for my daughter's birthday.

Very warm welcome and so kind staff.

The cuisine is traditional Indian, but Michelin style.

We came back in the restaurant for a romantic dinner and everything was perfect, the waiter recognized us."]

["Robata is a really good restaurant. Not only is the sushi delicious, they are also very generous when you order from them. They send a bunch of little desserts, a beer, and a little key chain. It's not much but it's appreciated, and like I said the food is really good.", 'Food very well made. The bowls of noodles are more than enough to fill your stomach! Also got some nice snacks, salad and soup on the side, loved all of it. We received a bottle of Japanese beer as a gift and a cute bracelet, that‚Äôs very sweet! It‚Äôs the first time I felt so happy after opening my delivered food and finding a nice surprise inside, very few restaurants care about giving something symbolic and nice to their customers free of charge :- ) Thank you! To add, the menu is very nicely presented and there are a lot of cool foods I would like to try in the future. Well done! :- )', 'Raviolis were bought at the supermarket and not made from scratch. Almost no fish in sushi rolls. Katsu don was kinda dry and onions in it were almost raw', 'Really good affordable sushi! Upon sitting down, you are greeted with some juice. Then soup and salad and a dessert.  All this complimentary of my meal! I would return again as it was delicious food!!', "I thought the meal at ju-ni, while good, innovative, and fresh, didn't quite hit home for me as much as Wako or Kusakabe. While our sushi chef was fun, interesting, and clearly trained, I thought the seasonings for some of the nigiri were a tad off, and the fish could have been sliced better. I'm giving them some leeway as I was there during their first week and there is always room for improvement as they perfect their service."]

["I went to a Turkish restaurant in France as this was a recommendation and this was one of a few times the recommendations was actually very good.

The restaurant was decent and warm and the servers could be much better but it was good. The whole menu was in French so thankfully I had camera translate to translate the menu and I read over a lot of things and I don't know what the name of this dish is per say but it was good.

It was a very meaty pie and it tasted amazing. I but into it and everything just felt like it was melting in my mouth and the sauce over it was fantastic and sweet and not the bad over sugary sweet but a very good balance that you can't eat one thing without the other and creates harmony on the plate.

It was just so good and would recommend anyone to go there. You will most likely not be disappointed and I really mean that, though if you're not French or do not speak French then I highly recommend downloading an app which let's you translate food menus, it's a necessity.

The price itself wasn't really that bad considering how good the food is and it gets a decent score.

8/10.", "I enjoyed an incredible meal here. I'm quite insecure about my French speaking skills, the staff was accommodating and kind. The food was absolutely delicious. I also got to try Turkish wine for the first time...amazing!!! I'm grateful for such a wonderful experience.", 'Everything was simply amazing! It was even tastier than restaurants you can find in Istanbul itself!', 'Nice Turkish restaurant with two lunch menus at ‚Ç¨16 and ‚Ç¨23 (with glass of Turkish wine and coffee/ tea)', "Paris'te ki en iyi T√ºrk restoranlarƒ±ndan biri! If you want to eat good and take some serious service, that's one of the places you have to visit."]

['A wonderful restaurant very conveniently located next to the Daumesnil metro stop. Had such a good first experience, had to go back a second time and had an even better experience!

The staff are extremely friendly and welcoming. The drinks were good and dessert (recommended by the waiter) was exceptional!', 'Very good experience with the restaurant. It‚Äôs the second time we ate there and the staff is very friendly and listening. This time we took a 1.1kg entrec√¥te (72‚Ç¨) to share for three person and they accepted to get it back and cook it a little more. The juice of the meat, the sauces and the garnitures were so good too!! Plus the decorations with red flowers is so pretty ü§©', 'I loved it. Our table had a great view over the fountain. The staff were unanimously professional and friendly.
We had oysters and salmon for starters, then andouillette with fresh spinach, a rack of white fish and a chicken salad. The Pouilly Fum√© was excellent. Nice cocktails. An overall greatly pleasing experience.', "My partner and I were visiting Paris for the first time and we were a bit overwhelmed with the busyness and amount of restaurants in the center of Paris. We headed back to our hotel in Porte Doree and found Au Metro near Daumesnil station which had a lovely looking affordable menu and ambience. As we weren't massively hungry we decided to share a salad and a cheese board expecting them to be small (they weren't!) and they were so good we decided if we couldn't find anywhere while we were site seeing the next day we would return here! And return we did! We had a stunning 1,100kg steak between us with salad and chips, the steak melted in the mouth and was cooked to perfection! We had lovely cocktails and a creme brulee to share at the end. To top it off, the staff were incredibly attentive and friendly. We can't wait to come back the next time we visit Paris!", 'This is a restaurant that‚Äôs definitely worth a visit if you are living near the area. It serves authentic French cuisine and has very friendly waiters. They even went beyond to share with us about the food that is served. Prices are fairly reasonable as well. Escargots and oysters were fresh.']

["We enjoyed our dinner here so I'm quite shocked at the reviews. 2 of us sat outside to people-watch, ordered mussels and fries (‚Ç¨17 plate of the day) and mix appetizers (‚Ç¨6). We split the food and the check and felt satisfied with the experience. Very touristy area but it's all part of the mixed bag that is traveling...", "The place is ok. We took a Viking flamenckushen and Gallete Mere Violette. I didn't have too many expectation from it, but it turn out to be pretty ok ( the galette was a little bit too salty). The cider and the bear were good as well, though I find it a little too expensive ( 4.6 euro for 25cl).\nThe staff is friendly and they try to serv you as quick as possible.", 'The waits are in periods. No attention to you. No serving anything until you ask. Food quality is bad too. Avoid this restaurant.', "Worst crepe I've had in my life. Unbelievable.", 'Overpriced. Unfriendly staff.']

['The restaurant is next the the entrance of the Bercy Village. The are many delicious choices in the menu. Their cake is so delicious. The bread is soft, chouquettes and croissant are excellent. Sandwiches and salad are also delicious.The place is clean and look nice.', "Super cute and cozy caf√©/boulangerie within a shopping outlet, the whole area consists of small shops running along shut-down train tracks.
The caf√© is just 5-10 minutes walking distance from the main bus terminal Paris-Bercy and opens up at 7am, the perfect spot to catch breakfast if you arrive in Paris early or have some waiting time between bus connections.

They have breakfast deals like juice+hot drink+pastry for a reasonable price, but offer salad boxes, sandwiches and other snacks as well. The bread and pastries are freshly baked and taste really good.

I've been coming here frequently since 2022 whenever I travel by bus and love the cozy atmosphere, the staff is super friendly, early in the morning it's not too crowded and the perfect place to slowly wake up while you enjoy a fresh croissant and coffe. ü•∞ü•ê‚òïÔ∏è", "My croissant aux amendes was not freshly baked. I'll maybe look for somewhere else next time.
In fact I did go back a second time a week later early in the morning and found it open while everything else was closed. It not too bad after all. There is a big range of drinks, cakes etc.", 'Unfortunately the quality of service and food has become worse post covid and continues to decrease. The terrase tables are mever cleaned by the staff and it is full of birds, that are ruling the place and fly over customers and eat at the table the remainders of previous customer food. The service is quite bad too (gloomy most of time). The food strangely became worse too, most of Kaysers now have the food (cantine) smell which was not the case years ago', 'What a nice experience. The seller gentleman I met was very polite and friendly. Fast service and nice products. I really like the caesar salad. It was so fresh, crisp and crunchy.']

['Best burger place in Paris. I come here at least one a month, and I never regret spending money on this !!! The staff is welcoming and very nice ! I highly recommend it !', 'It‚Äôs good for what it is, a no non-sense burger with fries. Can get crowded but I never had a problem getting a clean seat. Staff are friendly and someone is always around to help if you have a question.', "No-one beats their burgers! What surprises me every time is how friendly, smiling, professional and agreeable the employees are. The lines go fast and they're so efficient. The peanuts are back!! Can't find salted peanuts in shell in France (at least I haven't found the salted variety). We were sitting below the music speaker and it was a bit loud. We couldn't hear our conversation. I politely asked the manager to reduce the volume and he gladly obliged. Keep up the delicious food and great service!

Delicious and nice friendly staff!!!", 'The hot dogs taste the same everywhere you go at a 5 guys in France‚Ä¶ this one is small, very small patio area that I don‚Äôt recommend at all when it‚Äôs hot outside, it feels like a furnace.
Customer service was ok. She put some Cajun seating on the side so we could try what it was. Fries are a big expensive.', 'I had the luck to get served by the sweetest and friendliest coworker I have ever seen. I asked for his name and he said that his name is Bilal. Normally Im not giving a review but today I have to !. Im a vegetarian and the food was very good. I recommend !!!']

['I visited this place once in hopes of getting a Japanese curry for the cold days but got disappointed by the taste of the food. Service was great to be honest, employees are so nice and welcoming so it breaks my heart to give them a low review but I hope they can improve the taste pallet for curry sauce. Meat is a bit dry and feel like chewing gum and curry sauce was not tasting right. Hopefully it will get better soon!', "Hungry for a very decent poke bowl at a fair price?  Here you go.  I speak minimal French, but not to worry, the staff speak Mandarin, so easy to order.  Yeah.  It is Japanese food served by Chinese staff, but it works.  This is normal in a lot of the world these days, and to their credit, my peeps from China do a decent job of serving Japanese, Korean, Thai, and even occasionally, authentic regional Chinese food.  Come to think of it, I've never eaten great Viet food served by a Chinese staff.  But that's beside the point.

Nice little dinner joint.  Great poke.  Kinda average sushi rolls, but I'll be back.", 'The food, staff and atmosphere at the restaurant is really nice. We ordered and food came out within minutes! The ingredients are fresh, and me and my friend both enjoyed our orders', "First of all, the staff misunderstood our menu and nearly skipped our miso soup and cabbage. They are very nice and caring, but a bit clumsy :/
The food was good, except the slamon sashimi were small (but still thick so it's okay) and the meat skewers didn't have that usual sauce üòí The meatballs were filled with a lot of fat and the beef ones were hard to chew. Overall, this is clearly not the best Japanese restaurant, especially regarding the price you pay. However you are full at the end, cause the plates are well served.", 'Honestly great food, services very polite and fast. I waited 5 minutes and the food was already there. The ambient is not the best but it is located in a cute street']

['Amazing food and excellent service! Stopped by after a tour and restaurant opened at 7pm which was perfect for our large group. They were very accommodating and also provided a menu with English. There was a ‚Äòmenu‚Äô option for 32 euros that included an entree, drink, and dessert. Food was delicious and the desserts were so yummy. Definitely would go back on our next visit', 'Nice easy-going restaurant w/great food. Had the tenderloin, med-rare & it was cooked perfect. Everyone working in the restaurant was very nice.  I will definitely be coming back again!', 'We came here for dinner after walking around the Bercy Village area and wanted to eat close to our hotel.

Service was minimal, food was ok. I ordered the Grilled octopus salad to start and Magret de Canard for the main. The grilled octopus had a nice char flavour, though the salad greens were a bit bitter. Magret de Canard was a bit lacklustre and bland. There‚Äôs no sauce accompanying it. I thought the fries and salad tasted better. Our server didn‚Äôt really seem to know how to explain the Entrec√¥te Charlolais to us either. We asked if it was steak and he said it wasn‚Äôt, and that we probably wouldn‚Äôt like the dish (whatever that means‚Ä¶?). It is a steak dish, so. Just for future reference if anyone else is wondering about that‚Ä¶

It‚Äôs a bit on the pricier side. It was fine, but nothing noteworthy.', 'Established in 2018, one of the most Eye-taking restaurants i ever visited in france. Cozy and welcoming, vast options of food for everyone including kids. Staff is helping and smiling all the time. Food and drinks are mostlty affordable also. In general the hole area is just a treat for the eyes and stomach. Highly recommended and must visit when in town.', "Great service and staff! Not a normal location I would go to but I happened to be in the area for a luggage nanny to watch our items.  The food and staff were superb and spoke great English for us.  It is located near a large amount of other restaurants but had superior reviews compared to all of them.  The burger I had was the chef's special and I chose that because they gave us a sample outside so it was already delicious before I sat down.  The environment is nice and protected us from the wind and cold winter weather.  Recommended!"]

['Delicious shawarma and fries. And they offer complementary mint tea üòã.
The staff are very friendly. The portions are big.', 'Really good customer service, good price and delicious food.

If I put a problem that it lacked sauce.

Kebad with drink was less than 10‚Ç¨.', 'The chicken kebab I got was spectacular the vegetables on it basically melted in my mouth. The salad was very nice especially the sauce that came on it. All in all I‚Äôd definitely eat that again rice and fries were great as well! The customer service was above and beyond we just go off the bus and had a million and one luggage with us but they made sure we were able to put them up and eat without it being in anyone‚Äôs way and they charged my phone for me when I was in desperate need of it, very friendly people and amazing food!', 'Great food and service.great value for Central Paris too plus free tea üçµ', "I'm from Japan and don't understand French, but crew were very kind responce for me. I really appreciate. Sandwich was good and the tea was the best in Paris."]

['Excellent restaurant, great discovery. Very original and delicious food.
I strongly recommend trying at least once.', 'I was visiting from out of town and stopped by with some friends. The staff were very welcoming and friendly. The shisha, milkshakes and desert were excellent too!
I would definitely recommend this place to everyone.

Thank you for the good service!', 'I love the atmosphere, the service and the food, always a very good option. Thanks', 'Found this cafe relatively easy given the directions.
Shisha was pretty good. Hence 4 stars..We paid extra as we wanted natural cube coal...so our shisha cost 17‚Ç¨ ... bit cheeky to charge extra especially as a lot of customers dont like using  the discs...Cans of drink expensive 5‚Ç¨  each. No glass. No ice.. just a straw...Plus each custoner HAD to spend money... although i didnt want a drink when i first got there it was compulsory i had either a drink or a shisha... basically you are forced to spend money.... perhaps if they were less money focused and more client focus they would get better satisfoed customers.', 'Thumbs up to the manager and hospitality, and always tries to keep customers satisfied. good price with good shisha ,']

["The best of the best\nwe found a table the day before we left Paris and I can say with great confidence that it was the best I have tried so far after 10 days in Paris I wouldn't change it the staff is kind and the food very tasty", 'The seafood are very fresh and the beef is cooked to perfection. Seafood comes with a pot of seafood porridge. The porridge help to warm our tummy and is very tasty. Huge potion amount of food. Was there with my family. Everyone enjoy it. Definitely a must to eat if you are around there.', "as always, great portion at pedro alta, it's difficult to get in if you're a small group, however for bigger groups (6+) it's actually easier to get a table since the restaurant is setup this way. lobsters are good value and good taste, however prawns and mussles are very average. The beef (entre cote) is especially great value. Drinks are not the best. Would recommened to everyone who wants a seafood feast with reasonable price in Paris!", 'Really fresh and good seafoods, acceptable price with nice services', 'Love the portions, love the taste, love the food just slightly lack of attitude.. but i will definitely go back here again if I‚Äôm travel to Paris!!!\nHuge portion of seafood and meat lovers, taste amazingly good and really good price with that HUGE portion. Can‚Äôt make reservations, need to queue up, come at least half hour before open then u will get a table for the first customer.. if u come when the restaurant open and during the lunch / dinner time then u might need to wait for 1-2 hours.. so better come early...']

Nom: La Barge du CROUS de Paris
Adresse: Quai Fran√ßois Mauriac, Port de la Gare, 75013 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Best crous with views in town! Hot meals for ‚Ç¨3 with student id. Could not recommend more. Delicious and fresh, easy atmosphere with ample seating. Perfect fuel before heading over to the BNF for studying :)', "I am so happy that place like this exists:)) The food is really good and - the most important thing - affordable. You don't need to be a student to eat cheap here", 'If I  have more time for lunch, I always go there. Good choice of main course, starters, fresh fruits. Friendly staff and perfect view from the first floor. 3.30‚Ç¨ for lunch is a good price for students in Paris.', 'Next to Bnf, the "canteen" on a boat on the Seine River and offers meals similar to university restaurants suitable for young people at a low price. The scenery is good for relaxation.', 'You can eat a huge variety of food for a really good price(as a student I paid 3,80‚Ç¨ for all of this). Open to students, mainly, but not only. Totally recommended!']

Adresse: Port de la Gare, Quai Fran√ßois Mauriac, 75013 Paris, France
Reviews:
["Super unfriendly staff! Also definitely don't go there if you have no Izly account (everyone who is not a student in france has to pay full price there, which is definitely not worth it).

The lady at the counter didn't let me pay two 0.25 beers for me and my boyfriend at student price, because he is not a student in france even though I am. Could have just gotten one 0.5 beer and said it was for me but she preferred to throw the second beer away than to sell it to me at student priceüôÉ", 'I like this place since it's close to where I study and work. However, they don't have the 1‚Ç¨ meal for students. Plus, when i went there i initially wanted to get to the barge du crous but since there were a filming set, we couldn't get in and ended up on the "Quai" with a silent yet relaxing ambiance.
The staff are friendly and welcoming. Even though they don't serve the 1‚Ç¨ meal, they have other alternatives with reasonable and affordable prices.', 'Suggestive, lively and youthful place.
Friendly and helpful staff.
We had some salads, wine and drinks.
The wait was a bit long, the food was decent. I appreciated the balsamic vinegar on the fruit. Not cheap place but within the standard of the city.', 'Excellent service, the waitresses are very responsive, especially the judokat üòäüòä and the boards offered are of good quality, particularly the one with tuna and Espelette pepper, and the Mojito was super well done.', 'Learning on the Seine! In France, learning is done on the Seine Riverüòèüòâ
Nice view, nice atmosphere, great value for money']

['Very nice supermarket in the neighborhood‚Ä¶ improved a lot after the renovation\nNot the best for the big groceries, but still nice for the convenience stuff', 'It closed 15 minutes earlier and didn‚Äôt let visitors in. Answered rudely', "It's a good supermarket and good stuff", 'Ok', 'The prices are excruciatingly expensive and the staff are as rude as possible. Even though we hand the open bag to the cashier, she puts the products aside. At these prices, store to avoid.']

['My Grandson found it on Google Maps with 5-stars for breakfast in Paris (near me) very fresh, nicely prepared and presented. Salmon Crepe and Ham and Cheese Omlete', "So we were trying to find a place to eat crepes and galettes and we found this little cute restaurant. I can't be more happy with it. The service was friendly, the prices good, a nice range of salty and sweet options... And the food was super delicious. I would recommend it!", "I tried the Bolognaise & cr√™pe au beurre sal√©: both were very tasty! I highly recommend this restaurant if you're a big fan of cr√™pes!! (+ prices & service are very good!)", 'The food was stellar, simple french dining at its finest. I had tried ‚Äòle bolognaise‚Äô, it was well-cooked and tasted fantastic.
The interior design was nice and cozy and felt like I was staying in a cottage in the french countryside.
The service was very comforting as they also offer to speak in english for foreigner making the ordering process alot less daunting. They tended all the needs I had needed.

5 stars - would dine here again', 'Excellent cr√™perie! The galettes were delicious made with really fresh ingredients; super tasty! The service was excellent and the atmosphere was nice.']

['What an insult to Asian cookery which when done right is absolutely delicious! We have eaten in many kosher Chinese restaurants and this was without question the worst. Added to the poor quality food we were irritated by the staff stomping around the entire time we were there. Would definitely not recommend and would never go again.', 'Very good food and nice staff! Quick service (the room was not filled, but they still had many delivery orders, making the speed very good in our opinion).', 'Accueil glacial, nourriture inf√¢me.\nThe food is horrible and the manager is obnoxious.', 'Very friendly staff and excellent food!', 'This Chinese restaurant is the best in Paris. The cuisine is excellent and refined, the service is impeccable. Thank you to all the staff for being so attentive to customers.']

['It has never happened to us, that we went somewhere, waited in line for half an hour to be seated, ordered food and beer and then with the first bite, left it all and walked away.

But here we are. Most terrible Paris expat experience ever.

The beer was pathetic and the Mixte Planche (platter) was literally stale and the bread was soggy from the fridge.

In France, the least you can expect even from a coffee shop is a fresh baguette, but here in this restaurant, by the sienne we discovered that the French Baguettes can be soggy and wet and taste like wet socks.

We wanted to complain, but didn‚Äôt have the patience to wait another 30 minutes in line to get to the restaurant serving area.

Horrible & best avoided.', 'Lovely food, lovely friendly staff. A really great experience and pretty unique for Paris. Free Grenadine (squash) for kids is a nice touch. Highly recommended.', 'Pretty cool spot, the new location is cool but a bit far off. Good place to chill in the sun tho. Beer were good. Cool evening overall.', 'A large open space for sitting and chilling around!

If you live in Paris and its summer, this is place to be. Absolutely love the vibe and the close quarters of bars and pubs are not going to bother you in this open space.', 'This outdoor venue features a small stage for live band performances, surrounded by a variety of food trucks. While the food options were somewhat limited, the ambiance and atmosphere were exceptional, especially at sunset.']

['Great place for dine in or take away, tasty food and friendly staff', 'Quite reasonably priced. Food is good and service is prompt. Sitting area is not that big and very small tables better for take away.', 'Food tastes amazing, high quality ingredients for a good price (Cheap for paris). The place is very small, better for takeout. Overall highly recommended if you‚Äôre staying in the Bercy area.', 'Excellent value-for-price! Got a kebab combo takeaway with lower price and higher quality, when compared to other offerings in the city.

Kebab is juicy, the sauce, meat and nann strike perfect balance altogether.

Staffs are efficient, and helpful. Bravo choice for evening and night!

(* the table is at my hostel, while the restaurant also provides limited number of tables and chairs)', 'I ate here a few times. They serve good fresh food.The naan is soo good.This little naan shop, deserves solid 5 Stars.']

['Very original place, inventive and refined cuisine, impeccable service, warm atmosphere.', 'I say wow! Bravo √âmilie for this unique place and for the inventiveness of your cuisine. Of course, I recommend and highly recommend again!', 'Magnificent place and excellent cuisine in a very intimate atmosphere. Hats off to the hostess, the adorable Emilie.', 'Yes, experience to try...absolutely. Well done Emilie! üëç', "Table d'h√¥tes in a totally original setting"]

['Cheap burger for student with a student card. The burger is good and service is fast.', 'Fries are ok. Cheeseburger sub par.', "Well the only positive point. There is none, to avoid the welcome is deplorable the waiters are not polite and incompetent, I did not understand anything he said when I ordered plus he sweated oil fries so I was afraid to eat my fries for fear of catching a terrible disease then the price was too high for what it was, coming close to ‚Ç¨10 for just one menu (it's indecent) then I I met a gentleman who was angry and he advised me not to go to the toilet because there was a terrible smell with even huge cockroaches and also I forgot to mention that there were not many choice of cold drinks (I wanted to have a coke but it wasn't even in the fridge). Finally, I strongly advise you not to go there, you will find much better elsewhere and above all cheaper\n\nAnd don't think that I'm giving it a star for pleasure but unfortunately I have to to publish my opinion.", "Ah, fleeing the welcome and unpleasant, when I ordered he didn't even ask for raw vegetables, I took a kebab which didn't even have any taste, he gave me a very small portion of fries, 9 euros and 50 cents, the menu (we are in Manaco ouuuuuuu) much too expensive for young people in financial difficulty and also my friend was allergic to tomatoes but fortunately he removed the tomato from his sandwich because he did not specify then I I went to the bathroom to wash my hands when I saw a huge cockroach, which is pitiful to conclude if you want to eat well and not lose your money (9.50!!!!!!! Ps: Wallah even in Monaco it's not that price it's much better and don't believe it I put a star because it deserves it it was just to publish for me it deserves 0.", 'No quality, deplorable hygiene with sweating employees who do not wear Charlotte. Regarding the food, the quantities are ridiculous, especially considering the price. I advise you against it.']

['they only speak portuguese or french so just know that if you‚Äôre a foreigner but the staff are so hospitable and quick to help. the food is just like what you would find in portugal and i would definitely come back. the vinho verde they had was also good definitely should try it if you haven‚Äôt had it before.', 'A family run Portuguese style restaurant. Drink options are good, with unique rum offerings like Don Papa, and Diplomatico. Some nice regional wine offerings as well.

Food is exceptional, we had 2 entrees, and 2 main plates, and everything was great. The chorizo entree was excellent. The main courses selected were both beef, with the beef on a hot stone plate being unique. The option to cook it to the level you want was nice, as well as the included dips being the perfect pairing of flavor.

The family members running the place are really warm and friendly, and the entire experience is like eating at a close knit family place versus a commercial restaurant. Overall a superb dining experience.', 'Nice place with nice services dishes are delicious but not many options fron Portuguese cuisine. If you are in the region you can definetively eat there.', 'Nice and friendly place where we had coffee.', 'Nice little Portuguese restaurant in Pairs! The food was authentic and excellent, staff was friendly and offered good service. Price was very reasonable.']

["A LOT of beers. If you're trying to test out a bunch of drinks this is the place to do it. Friendly service and great decorations. Amazing bar!

They also have a few food options which are nice.", 'I made this my go to bar during my visit to Paris for the Scotland 6 Nations match. Friendly staff great atmosphere.
I dare anyone to drink all 10 draught beers (pints) in one session.
Enjoy', 'Impressive! We were able to watch a match, have an amazing vegetarian burger with fries and beer!! The price was okay and the location even better since it‚Äôs not in a very affluent area and there will most probably be space to sit down inside.', 'Lovely vibe here. Music was a good volume for still being able to chat. Beer selection is varied, staff seemed friendly.

Liked the decor a lot and had a relaxed couple of beers here on a Sunday evening.', "A evolutionary concept in Paris.  The choice is huge,  the staff is very knowledgeable and friendly.  If your are curious and like authentic beer,  then it's the place to see."]

['A good fix from our Asian cravings before hitting our way back to Asia.

Wish they had the real Huy Fong Tuong Ot Sriracha though üòâ', 'Friendly staff, especially chef Pako
Big portions & delicious food', 'The food is good, staffs are friendly, highly recommendüëçüèª', 'The food was good, and the portions were large.
