['Amazing place! We was searching a place to eat and we go to this place! The staff is very polite, the atmosphere is Perfect and the food delicious. If you are near go to chez Coquille and feel like a true Parisian!', 'Chez Coquille is a popular place that offers a quick bite if you are in a hurry, but it also offers the possibility of easy going lunch or dinner with Weijn if you have more time. The serving is done by young people who are fast and efficient. We stopped here to order a quick bite because we need to go to the finals match of France against USA ladies basketball in the Mercy stadium, which was not so far from here. To our surprise, the food came in five minutes and it was really good and we were even having time to spare because we had just a half an hour to eat and be on our way. So I recommendation for this friendly restaurant with some nice, art paintings, including flamingos if you want to sit inside.', 'Had one dinner and one breakfast there.\nGood food, good service and reasonable prices.', "Our hostel's staff recommended that we try these local discs. We did not have high expectations, but I was pleasantly surprised by how tasty these foods were. I ordered the SAUMON, TRAVERS DE PORC DUROC, and some kind of snail (I forget the name) as our starters, and they were all delicious. It is quite a big portion for me and my friends. The service is satisfactory. The service is excellent. The environment is satisfactory.", 'Im in totally shock to see this bees trap.\nWhere is the conscience, our planet needs bees, they are an important part of the ecosystem!']

['Carrefour is carrefour. Casher is friendly but don‚Äôt speak English', 'Very pleasant and well-kept neighborhood store where you can find what you are looking for.
I recommend', 'Order placed on 05/20/2023 (express delivery crossroads). Products unfit for consumption: hazelnut chocolate donuts without any indication of the use-by date, smell of old adulterated oil (products expired for a certain time) where the absence of label!!!

['We found this place by just walking around and we are so glad we stopped in! ['Editing my review after the second visit...

First time:
I wish I would have got our server‚Äôs name. He deserves a raise! He spoke perfect English and was quite entertaining and kind. He was lovely! We had very quick service too.

The French Onion soup was stellar. My steak was a steak. Nothing super special, but I‚Äôm spoiled.

Would absolutely go back and I have no clue why there are such bad reviews

Second time: okay I get it. Went a second time and we had terrible service, got the same items and the soup was cold... Our server was on his phone, and didn‚Äôt seem to care about us. Still don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs pricy...

['Had a quick lunch here, a bit unexpectedly, because nothing much was open between Place Felix Eboue and Bercy. Sandwich with jambon de pays was good. The services was really fast and nice. We ordered a pork sandwich from the Menu, which is on the picture. I honestly don't think it's okay to serve this.
I don't recommend ordering the sandwiches. Maybe the other dishes are better?", "The place is very expensive even for Paris standards. They charged 5‚Ç¨ for a coffee that wasn't even that good.

You'd think for such prices, the place would at least be worth it, but nothing farthest from the truth. The place was filthy (not the tables, at least), with a lot of dust and spider webs on higher (but easily accessible for a cleaner) areas, as well as the wooden guitar player statue they have. We were just about to ask them to stab us so at least we could say we were robbed.", 'We ordered a coffee and hot chocolate. Both were nice. The waiter at the cafe was so warm and welcoming. ['Place is really nice. Waiters were sweet and responsive (it was really hot and we asked for ice cubes). Food was really good, except brioche perdue, for my taste it wasn‚Äôt fresh. Really yummy üòã üòãüòã', 'Super cute ambiance. Food was fantastic, was there twice while in Paris. Staff were very friendly and accommodating. Especially to a neighboring table who seemed to be annoying \U0001fae0', "I found this Bistro while exploring the neighborhood where my hotel was located in the 12th arrondissement in Paris. If you're visiting Paris, a metro ride to this restaurant in the 12th won't be a wasted trip. Plus, you'll be able to stroll through the nearby park, Bois de Vincennes, after your meal. ['I was there today at 13:20. Sat at the table on the right from the entrance. What‚Äôs a foolishness!!! What‚Äôs a disrespectful attitude! You‚Äôre just hate your job and have no good manners, and you live in the city with great culture, but you are just a jerk!

My respect to the chef, creme brulee was delicious!', 'Well a little bit disappointed. Personal was ok,the waiter was speaking english. Starters really nice the soup was superhot, perfect! ['Great food. Even though they got my order wrong, (salmon pasta instead of chicken pasta) it was some of the best salmon\nI had. The meal wasn‚Äôt too heavy. ['Amazing place, we went around 12-1am and was the only thing open (we were tourists and we get late night to Paris) and we found this great place, the people over there was so so friendly and kind. We won‚Äôt forget about this place ever. üôåüèªüôåüèªüôåüèª\U0001faf6üèª thank you so much for being so nice.', 'Kebab basic', 'Home zero with capital Z.
There were 3 of us in front of the counter, no one came to serve us, we had to wait another 5 minutes at the table to give them time, still no order taken, we had to leave since we had no more time to waste.
I find this very weird????', 'I am a person who travels a lot accompanied by my little 3 kg pet dog.
I do a lot of restaurants of all kinds. It's always very hurtful to be greeted with a "no dogs allowed" before even a hello. Fortunately it's quite rare.
It's discriminatory.
And it's not commercial when we know that many other restaurants welcome us more pleasantly by offering a bowl of water.
I still leave two stars for the opening hours which are very wide.
Maybe this restaurant has enough customers to be able to refuse those with dogs.
In this case, good for them.
I will revisit my star rating when my little dog is no longer a problem like it is in many other restaurants.', 'The place is much improved, the old reviews are no longer valid
Good oven sandwich and homemade white sauce']

["Almost forgot what was supposed to be the fast food experience: order any sandwich, a side and expect to be served in less than 5 minutes ('caus' that is the maximum amount of time for a sandwich to be made in this type of restaurant) a fresh sandwich with a fresh side of fries. Oh and the option to not have ice in your ice tea! I can't believe I went to the main competitor across the street for the past 4 years because I didn't know this Burger King has handicap bathroom on the ground floor.
I don't know about the other Burger King, but in this one, they seem to care about the customer, not giving the customer a sandwich because guidelines say it can be sold for another minute: put it in the trash and start a new batch.
So, quick service AND fresh food (and private clean bathroom on the ground floor if you have a handicap: need to ask the staff for the key), so long competitor, back to Burger King!", 'I order ma food at 4:50 nd  waited in line  for 20min while they r chatting wid their frds‚Ä¶ At last when I got ma good it was really poor.. I think they should hire someone adult to look after becoz these kids just chat around nd don‚Äôt care abt customers', 'They closed the restaurant before the time to go online and the restaurant had orders on tape', 'Fast service and pleasant environment', "The positive thing was the speed of which I received my order.

Also the lighting was not great and we could hardly see the food when we were in the back.
The food wasn't bad, but the rest wasn't very good"]

['The friendliest people with the best couscous in town! We loved it - merci beaucoup', 'The owner was super friendly. Simple and easy food but so good.', 'Person smoking in the doorframe entrance. ["Well, it's a McDonald's, what more can one expect? The fast food service that I gave while working at McDonald's 30 years ago? It's the 21st century: people are slow and sloppy. ['A great Vietnamese restaurant! The food was delicious, the atmosphere was cozy. The service was good and the portions are big. Recommended.', 'Very very good food.

['A True Gem in Paris ‚Äì Exceptional Japanese Cuisine

My wife and I had the pleasure of dining at this incredible Japanese restaurant during our visit to Paris, thanks to my aunt, who used to live nearby and frequented it with her family. After dining here, it‚Äôs easy to see why it‚Äôs been a beloved local spot for years.

The food was absolutely phenomenal ‚Äì every bite bursting with flavor and authenticity. The menu offers a great variety of choices, ensuring there‚Äôs something to delight everyone. The prices have remarkably stayed the same for the last six years, a testament to the owner‚Äôs respect and dedication to the local community.

The staff was exceptionally friendly, courteous, and patient, which made the experience even more enjoyable since French isn‚Äôt our first language. The cozy, inviting, and quiet atmosphere added to the charm, making it the perfect place to relax and savor a delicious meal.

It‚Äôs clear the owners prioritize quality, both in their food and their connection to the community. This restaurant is an absolute must-visit ‚Äì worth every moment and bite!', 'The service is great; the food is absolutely delicious, cannot go wrong with anything you order. Best chicken in Paris.', 'Genuine Japanese menu and food, the owner is so smiling and welcoming, make us want to come back soon!', 'Amazing food, great service, smiling staff, worth every penny, use the Fork discount offer while you can.', 'Delicious, good service, good value. Wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to return.']

Nom: Boulangerie- P√¢tisserie AU BEC SUCRE by Frederick Comyn
Reviews:
['The best best boulangerie in paris. Must try the quiche!!! It tastes like my mom‚Äôs food, the place is very clean and has a nice outdoor area. I‚Äôve tried many many patisserie places but this is the best! Delicious food and pastries and cakes ‚ù§Ô∏è

Merci beaucoupü•∞ü•∞', 'Great bakery, came here every morning during my week stay in Paris for fresh baked goods for breakfast. Their Flan a la Vanille is just out of this world, and croissants are tender and crunchy. I take it every time and there was not a single miss.
Staff is always friendly and in a good mood, most of workers speak English. It‚Äôs a vibe!
If they only could improve their coffee game, than this would be an absolute legendary place.

Merci beaucoup!!
Looking forward to visiting your place next time!', 'Great place to have a quick breakfast. The staff was kind to us. Took the time to hear what we wanted to order. Even though our French is a bit rusty. Very affordable and the meal in the picture is only four euros.']

['Very good restaurant, friendly staff, food was excellent and came fast !! Really pleased', 'Super Service. Totally nice. Best place for a dinner.', 'Correct', 'A favorite!

I recommend üëçüëçüëç(Very nice decoration). The dishes are always very good and plentiful. I can't count the times I've gone to eat there.']

["Very good food. I ordered the chicken pita sandwich with lettuce, tomato, garlic sauce and the best pickles I've ever had in France.  The gentleman working there was also quite pleasant. ['Great place and great pizza ‚ù§Ô∏è The owner is so cute and positive üôåüèº Friendly atmosphere and location üíØ

['We were looking for a place to duck in from the rain and found ourselves in the Iris Cafe. This small bar/cafe has a neighborhood feel with a host of regulars. ["I was at the store last week. There is a manager or supervisor shouting at the cashiers and the old man who works in the departments (the old man at his father's age) is very rude. ['Great local cafe / bar with really friendly and great service. And their sandwiches (baguettes) are delicious.', "Great local bar to feel some Parisian vibes. ['Very nice place.  The food service and price was very good.  A good experience.', 'Delicious couscous, reasonably priced, good sized portions, friendly owner. ['Super', 'Very good store which offers a wide range of products. In addition, the staff is welcoming and attentive. I highly recommend it.', 'Unkind
Price labels: many missing
And when we tell them that it‚Äôs not normal, they tell you that it‚Äôs not their fault, it‚Äôs the manager‚Äôs fault‚Ä¶

thank you for improving', 'I placed a Deliveroo order and I received 4 products out of 10. They don't answer the phone and I can't get a refund. And there was a product that they replaced for a cheaper "equivalent". Absolutely avoid.', 'If I could have put 0 I would have done so.

['Nice restaurant, good atmosphere, seems quite fancy. Staff were very attentive and friendly. Our meals were delicious, we even tried escargot. Food was so nice we have booked again for the next day', "This Brasserie which combines an elegant Bar and a French restaurant on the Porte Dor√®e square is absolutely recommended for those living in the area or tourists staying in this part of Paris.

The restaurant is luminous, elegant and welcoming, the choice of dishes is wide and the plates of the day are always varied and cover a wide range of preferences. The staff with us was extraordinary kindness; they always patiently satisfied our requests for changes to the dish, as real restaurateurs should always do.

The ratio quality/price is very good, with an expense of around ‚Ç¨20, you can receive an excellent plate of meat with side dishes that will not leave you hungry.

The desserts are also very attractive and tasty.

Highly recommended, drop by and tell me if I'm not right!", 'Stunning art deco interior. Great food. Would eat here again.', 'Sammy was sooo nice and helpful. Food and desserts amazing. Nice spot to enjoy and relax.', "Awesome cafe, warm and cozy.

['Great spot for some really good ice cream. A friend took us here who has known this spot since he was a kid. Owner and staff are great, they make you feel like home. ["Affordable, good pizzas, made quickly and a very friendly boss! ['Excellent', 'The salespeople are never at their post in the morning and afternoon. Even when calling, no one comes?? They gave me back ‚Ç¨29.01 instead of ‚Ç¨39.01
Now if I go see them, as it is money, there is no proof.
I am a loyal customer of Franprix rue des meuniers Paris 75012.
I am extremely disappointed with what they did to me.
Maybe they think we are rich and that we don't get up in the morning to earn just enough to eat.
That‚Äôs France, we‚Äôll rip you off if you‚Äôre not careful.
Until now, I have never had to check their change for change.
Now, I know to my cost that I have to recount what they give me back.
There was the Franprix on rue de Wattignies which did this type of thing, so I no longer went to them and they had fewer and fewer customers and they closed.
Perhaps the employees of rue de wattignies now work at rue des meuniers.

If for them ‚Ç¨10 is nothing, for some people ‚Ç¨10 is important for eating.", 'Monitor VERY closely the expiry dates of the products purchased: last month 25cl cartons of milk expired 10 weeks ago, today Pasquier croissants expired 48 hours ago. No checks carried out in store.', 'Catastrophic service, they take advantage of being close to a retirement home to inflate their price.

Update 02/02/24: In addition, we find products expired for more than 7 days on the shelves...']

['All the food we ordered was so delicious üòã coupled with an amazing service from the restaurant. Highly recommend the oysters, crab salad and black ink squid with mash.', "Amazing food choices and menu. Great price for fine dining. Yanis our waiter for the evening was very polite, welcoming and funny. He took our coats upon arrival and pulled our seats for us. He went through the menu and made brilliant suggestions to meet our needs. The drinks tasted lovely. And the food was cooked to perfection. There was not one bad things to say. We loved the decor and the atmosphere was very parisian. The restaurant was at the right temperature not too cold nor not too hot. Yanis made lovely conversation with us and checked in on us throughout the evening. Perfect customer service. The food presentation speaks for itself, we ordered three of the same and all three came out exactly the same and looked and tasted perfect. From starter to dessert all tasted incredible. Yanis even placed a candle in my sister's dessert as it was her birthday which we mentioned when ordering, this was very accommodating. Thank you for a wonderful memory!", 'Lovely presentation but the food itself was ordinary. Not sure it suited the caliber or prices of the restaurant. Staff was nice but overwhelmed and mistakes happened. The servers themselves were not at the expertise level you would expect in a place like this. Not a bad experience but would not return.', "We had a most pleasant experience and incredibly delicious dinner at Le Swann! This was our very first meal in France, ever, and we felt very welcomed and comfortable throughout our dinner. Our waiter, Roman, spoke English and he was so fantastic and accommodating to us, and the other waiters were lovely as well. I'll also add that the menu has English translations, which was very helpful.
Regarding the food, delicious just feels like an understatement. Everything tasted so fresh, it was cooked to perfection, and absolutely bursting with flavor! This is certainly a more upscale restaurant but prices were fair and worth every penny (or euro). For reference, we had risotto d'escargot, gambas √° la plancha, smoked salmon, filet de b≈ìuf fa√ßon Rossini, and cr√®me br√ªl√©e. Additionally, Roman recommended a wine to suite my taste and it was perfect.
Upon extending our compliments to the chef, Roman revealed to us that he is the chef! We were nothing short of impressed. We have not a single complaint. Many thanks to Roman and the team, we absolutely recommend Le Swann and we will surely be back!", 'Had a nice steamed Codfish dinner with a smoked salmon starter plate @ Le Swann restaurant. It is an upscale nice place in Porte Dorre...a NON TOURISTY neighborhood here in Paris.
Kirk Regalia
Lauderdale by the Sea,  Florida U.S.A.']

Reviews:
['We had a very good time but we were the only people there üòòüëç people love to eat at home', "I ordered takeout from this restaurant expecting a good meal, but was very disappointed.

When I arrived, the welcome was cold and unfriendly. The lady behind the counter didn't seem friendly at all which made the experience even less enjoyable. She told me ‚Äúplease choose quickly because I have other things to do‚Äù even though it was her I was waiting for.

The service was slow and I had to wait a long time to receive my order. In addition, the dishes did not live up to my expectations.

In summary, I do not recommend this restaurant if you are looking for a pleasant experience, even with takeout.", 'For several years, this caterer has become the essential reference for my family. We have never been disappointed, and the place has become like a second home to us! I highly recommend this establishment, where you can go with your eyes closed. The employees are not only super professional, but also incredibly cheerful, which adds to the warm and welcoming ambiance of the place.', 'Three drops of sauce charged at 30 cents, food with a more than passable taste, notably the fried noodles with a taste and a prominent smell of hydroalcoholic gel, to which the manager retorted that it was impossible and that I had tasted badly because I I was pregnant. Oddly enough, my boyfriend also had to be pregnant to share the famous taste of the gel. After a few minutes of heated discussion the lady asked me if I had ever eaten pasta before‚Ä¶ no refund therefore, expensive food even though we ate almost nothing and deplorable quality. We come out feeling disgusted and hungry. Go your way. (Carafe of water not enough for one person anyway.)', 'I went to this restaurant for takeaway spring rolls. The person at the counter reheated them wrapped in the plastic bag, which is very bad in terms of transferring micro particles to the food. They were actually barely warm, I had to reheat them again. With the spring rolls, no mint, no salad, and the sauce costs extra. I will absolutely not go back!']

["That's everything I love about this type of restaurant: starters and dishes that feel totally homemade with a desire to do well. ['Top notch Sorbets/ice creams.', "It was roughly 10 years ago. Adresse: parc zoologique de paris, 306 Av. Daumesnil, 75012 Paris, France
Reviews:
['I found the food of high pricing considering the taste and quality of ingredients. The beef burger platter was not tasty . The chicken strips pieces were not fulfilling i had to request to add an extra piece . The ch√®vre salad was tiny . The veggie soup with croutons was a healthy option.
Its sort of cafeteria in a zoo for kids and families they should consider lowering prices to make it affordable‚Ä¶', "It's not fine dining, but the fish and chips were amazing, and the burger and omlette were good too!

Prices aren't cheap, but they aren't as unfair as a lot of reviews make it seem. The food was hot and tasty. Can't complain.", "On the expensive side for what's offered, this restaurant charges around ‚Ç¨12 for a main and drink, on a pay first, then collect basis. There is no table service, and you are expected to clean up after yourself, putting your organics in bin #1, plastics in bin #2 and so forth, and the forks with the forks and the knives with the knives etc.

Cheese pasta was tasteless and mostly free of cheese, while the croque-monsieurs were mushy and cold. Fries were good, though it's hard to mess up deep frozen ones. On the plus side, ketchup, mustard and mayonnaise aplenty and at no charge.

Staff were friendly enough. It gets busy at the food collection point so be prepared to wait a short while.", 'Impossible to find a place to sit outside, because visitors of the zoo come with their own food and take the places, for example, mother and 2 kids take 2 tables!  Either need to add more tables or reserve tables only for guests of the restaurant.', 'Good to have such a nice restaurant inside the zoo ..
It was a little bit expensive
But considering the location,  it was predicted..']

['Great kiosk where I love stopping right at the end of the Coul√©e Verte. Very nice owner, choice of quality products, low prices, go for it!', '3 euros 50 for a cardboard crepe. Ugh', 'Here, everything is good, everything is organic.

Christian welcomes you with a big smile and a fresh humanity, which takes us back to a time not so long ago. A time when humans exchanged, shared, laughed and enjoyed getting together, just to have a good time.

A bubble of good living where you would swear that time stands still, on the edge of the woods.

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è', 'A very nice place! Very well received and excellent Italian ice cream!', 'Nice little snack with tasty chicken sandwiches. The bread is fresh and tasty']

Adresse: Rte de la Pyramide, 75012 Paris, France
Reviews: ['My favorite place to have lunch in Parc Floral. A good place for lunch or just coffee and desserts/ice creams (available to take away too). Perfect for kids. Just a few steps from the slides and playground area.', 'Ideal place to go with your family! My two year old was in heaven at this place, an I felt very comfortable as well enjoying a glass of wine! They also offer healthy snacks you can take with you, which was very helpful for our car ride to our hotel.  I look forward to the next time I get to come here!', 'What an amazingly relaxed place to stop for some lunch. Good selection of freshly prepared food amazing salad. Hard working staff.', 'Hidden gem! Very cute vibe. Tasty chicken with lemon & olives for 14‚Ç¨. Kids menu 12‚Ç¨.', 'Avoid the chicken - super dry!\nCheeseburger was not fully cooked, needed to reheat patty.']

Adresse: Rte de la Pyramide, 75012 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Amazing time spent in the restaurant, great food, great service, visited twice so far, I would come back again soon, saw a weddings being held there, seemed quite pleasant too, definitely worth a detour.', 'A charming restaurant not to be missed, in an idyllic location! The food was delicious and the service very friendly. We are vegetarians and it's not always easy to find a good vegetarian option. I had the lentil "croustillant" with seasonal vegetables and it was delicious! I highly recommend it. It was a beautiful day when we ate there, and we got to sit on the terrace which was amazing. Best part: while we were eating our ice cream on the terrace, we got to meet the park's peacocks! Come for the food, stay for the peacocks :)', 'Amazing place, we ate in the patio that was just magical!
The food was fresh, bio from agriculteurs, you can tell that everything has been thought about.
We had all the tartines that all better than the others, salmon tartar was üî•üî•
Highly recommend!! Try the ice cream!', 'Amazing, we love the food, the staff and everything!!! Very healthy and tasty.', 'It‚Äôs amazing and beautifull restaurant with the best service. Loved the burger ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è']
['Consumption a little expensive on the heart of wheat side...\nBut otherwise pleasant', 'Large public restaurant', '', '']

Adresse: Porte Jaune, Av. de Nogent, 75012 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Nice place by the lake. I went here on a Saturday night and I had pizza and some wine. The atmosphere was very relaxed and easy going, great music and scene to dans. The only thing I didn‚Äôt enjoy were the lines for drinks and specially for pizza. We waited standing like 30 minutes. I felt that they were very inefficient to send us to wait in line to pick up the pizza when they could have given us a device that vibrated and let us know when to pick our food up.', 'A fantastic space with a great atmosphere, lots of sitting and wonderful and peaceful view upon the pack. Great amd affortable food.
We went there on a Sunday for a catch up with friends, there was a ginguette that gathered many people from all generations under one roof.
Rosa Bonheur is always delivering on creating space and moments for a good time with friends and love ones.
This is also ideal for parents with kids as there are massive indoor and outdoor spaces for little ones to play.', 'Very friendly place, very family friendly.
Wonderful view on the lake and the food and beverages were good', 'Good food. Funky vibes. Great crowd, wonderful surroundings', 'One of the best places in Paris. The vibe is like a festival on an island in a magical forest.']

['I tried the galette sarasin complete it was okay and the fries where just right, I love the park as well', 'Great place for a crepe and something to drink by the cute lake', 'Cute place for a chill time üíô', 'A nice place to have a coffee, a crepe, an ice cream...the choice is vast in a relaxing atmosphere with a very friendly team.
Come, you will not be disappointed.', 'I tried the waffles, the hot dog and the fries, well frankly only the fries are ok.
The waffle is horrible, I thought I was eating cardboard, too little Nutella.
The hot dog = dry bread + industrial sausage.

This refreshment bar is a pigeon catcher.

The staff pull their faces on top of that.']

['Top', 'Difficult to get there but what a joy this quiet place, very good and simple restaurant, great service with a very pleasant welcome. Thank you Olivia for your kindness', 'A superb experience at the Restaurant du Golf de Longchamp!\nThe setting is magnificent, surrounded by greenery, perfect for a moment of relaxation. The cuisine is delicious, with tasty and well presented dishes.', 'Extremely unhappy with my customer experience. I spent a whole morning golfing with my friends and then we wanted to go to lunch. Having no reservation, the waitress invites us to dispose in a shocking manner: ‚Äúgo bye‚Äù she said to us.', 'Very good and quality food but not very plentiful, too bad. Additionally, the waitresses were somewhat bitter. We still had a pleasant time, in a friendly setting.']

['A shame this brasserie apart from the prohibitive prices, a hamburger menu at 48‚Ç¨, the bread perfectly cooked and as an accompaniment cold matchstick apples straight from a bag. Reviews: ['Aging but magical. HAS\nShould be renovated.', 'Difficult reopening after 1 1/2 years of confinement. We feel certain gaps in the service: endless waiting, cold dishes.\nThe view is magnificent but the greenhouse effect is felt too much near the stands. The heat is unbearable.', 'For lovers of horse racing and greenery ‚ò∫, very easy parking behind the racecourse', 'Very nice location, but the dishes are not great so a little expensive...', 'It is a privileged place to eat well, watch the horses on the track and play trifecta']

['Auteuil Brasserie is the perfect spot for a chic dining experience! üá´üá∑‚ú® With its cozy yet stylish ambiance, it‚Äôs great for date nights or catching up with friends. üïØÔ∏èüç∑ The menu is packed with French-inspired dishes, from light bites to hearty mains, all bursting with flavor. ü•ñüßÄ Pair it with their amazing drinks, and you‚Äôre in for a treat. Definitely a place to keep on your list! üåüüçΩÔ∏è', 'Came here for dinner and I was blown away by this place‚Äôs service right away from the beginning. The food came out in 10 minutes or maybe even less after we ordered. I had polpette de beouf (meatbal) with a side of pasta. It was absolutely delicious!!! Fantastic explosions of taste in my mouth took me straight to heaven!!! Ambience is great , a bit noisy - with music and people enjoying themselves, so if you want a quiet evening not for you. However, I love places with liveliness, so it was pedestrian for me. A great find in Paris for sure!', 'Nice place with a cozy terrace.
Food was good (but not great)
- Steak tartare ‚úÖ
- Tartuffa was ok but there no truffle
- Escalope Milanaise üëéthe meat was too chewy
Overall good experience', 'Italian place with nice food, a varied menu and reasonable prices. Atmosphere is also original and I understand it is recommended to book the rooftop!
Most staff are friendly and accommodating, some a bit colder and less customer focused but Oscar dealt with me and he was top!', 'Food is average, not bad, not exceptional. Atmosphere in the terrasse is great although a bit cold on winter time.

The worst part is the service, not friendly especially at the entrance. To finish, i receive an email the next day asking why I didn‚Äôt come and what was the reason of my absence (?!).

You can find better than that in Paris to be honest.']

['Intimate setting.   My friend, a local, brought me there.  I enjoyed the evening - service is efficient and I appreciate they the staff does not come in to interrupt our discussions just to ask ‚Äúhow‚Äôs everything‚Äù.  Same menu for lunch and dinner.  Food is good but nothing spectacular.  I‚Äôm not a fan of the fried sushi.', 'My friend said that the Le Tigre Qui Pleure was one of the best beef dishes he had so far for his Europe trip. That summed it up on how good the food is from this restaurant.

Since this restaurant is located in an affluent neighborhood, many well to do people dine here. There is a section inside the restaurant reserved just for the VIPs.

This restaurant knows how to serve the VIPs. They provide impeccable service and the food always come out succinctly. Our waitress was very attentive and called my friend by name.

People come here for their gourmet food. All the food we ordered were delicious and fantastic. My friend loved the beef dish and he said that the meats were so flavorful and tender.

My miso glazed salmon was so good too. The fish meat was so tender that it melted in my mouth. With the miso glaze, the salmon tasted amazing.

I have to mention that the egg roll appetizer was one of the best in town. I felt it was better than the ones from the Vietnamese restaurant we had the previous night.

We were so thankful that my friend took us there for lunch. This has been the best meal we have had since we arrived in Paris.', 'We were fortunate to find this lovely restaurant not to far from the H√¥tel Molitor. We arrived just after 2pm, when many restaurants are closed. It was relatively empty and we were treated well and promptly by the staff.

We shared the smoked salmon starter, which was amazing and huge! We were glad we shared. My tiger steak was prepared correctly at medium rare and melted in flavorful bites. Her fish and asparagus was like wise light and flaky and well seasoned.

Our petit millefeuille was wonderful but a bit small to share. The salmon at the start more than compensated. If you don‚Äôt get a huge appetizer, get your own desserts.

We will look to revisit here on our next trip.', "Went in late at night for dinner. The atmosphere is great, and so is the service. Unfortunately the food was very unsatisfactory. Normally, I would rate the food a 2, but at this price point, I have to rate it a 1. We ordered tortiglioni and octopus, and the only thing that we actually liked were the side of mashed potatoes, which also needed salt. If you're aiming for a nice, classy atmosphere and don't care much about the food but moreso, then you may like it. Otherwise, I unfortunately would not recommend.", 'An incomprehensible menu of Asian French  dishes (cabaillaud ton yam for example) caused me to order the poorly executed Milanese Murat.  Dry and unevenly fried.  Maybe I just ordered wrong‚Ä¶.my brother in law did enjoy his tartare and my spinach was perfect']

["I ordered original burger pizza i didn'tcheck it but when i reach home it was pepperoni pizzaI don't think they gave me the wrong one because this ones crust is cheesy crust thats my order but different flavor.I didn't go back to return since its late in the evening.Its not good .I hope they check the order b4 they cook pizza, the one in charge today üëéüëéüëéüëé", 'Good selection of pizzas with gourmet, specialties and make your own. Options for classic, thin, pan or mozzarella filled border crust. Service is fast and wait is minimal. Do note that this is is strictly take away our delivery, there are no sitting spaces', 'High quality pizza, called and was ready for pickup 20 minutes later. Higly recomended', 'Really good vegan options', 'Very impolite. They send ads but then discourage ordering. New management needed.']

['Bof! Their croissants / viennoiseries are too buttery and not even fluffy, just dense. The pastries are ok and my fav thing there is their cereal baguette ü•ñ.', 'The cakes were delicious (Paris-Brest and "Suc√©ss"), they serve coffee which a lot of boulangeries don\'t, and there is outdoor and - a very small amount - indoor seating.', 'Wonderful cakes! Good taste. Pay by card.', 'Delicious croissants, macarons and brioche. 10/10 ‚ù§Ô∏è', "Such a very nice bakery, good breads and pastries. My personal favorite there is their pistachio-apricot tart and for the breads I would higly recommend their baguette monge and viennois üòå did I mention that they have the kindest staff????!!!! Can't wait to come again!"]

['We were going to the Le Louchebem but they were booked out. The owner of that place recommended us to go here which is right across the street. He owns this restaurant as well. We got the fish and then for dessert got the chocolate. Both were amazing. The fish was done right with had the perfect seasoning. Highly recommend to try this place.', "Magic place, service is super correct and kind which is highly appreciated. Food is superb with varied types of typical french delicacies, all of them masterfully executed. Ambience on the outside is wonderful and intimate, with a beautiful and very quiet corner while the inside is able to handle large groups. Wine selection is great with a wide variety of wines available by the glass. I can't wait for my next time in Paris to return. Keep up the good work üí™üèª", "Late dinner on a Friday night, we were the last table to order food as the kitchen closed not long after. Foie Gras and baby cheese ravioli starters were good, the mushroom risotto with shrimps, while it had good flavor, was clumpy and you couldn't taste the mushroom even though you saw it. The shrimps were good, and I do believe it's possible the risotto suffered from us being the final table. The fish of the day, now that was delicious and the accompanying sauce, singularly special. Dessert was also good. They were gracious enough to allow us to stay a while after closing since I had started a meetimg with a 6 hour time difference and didn't want to chance movement for fear of losing connection. Thank you, will be back.", "The unpretentious cosyness of the place and the kindness of the staff, together with fairly enjoyable food made it the right choice for two evenings in a row. Loved by locals, you can't go wrong.", 'I randomly took the lunch menu, and loved every bite. The toasted goat cheese with salad as a starter was especially sublime, but also everything else was great. Highly recommend.']

['Such a lovely restaurant with great staff and food at an amazing value. Our server, Lahcen, was so nice with our young daughter. Chocolate mousse is to die for. Highly recommend this place for traditional French food at an amazing price.', 'Very good food, tasty, nice pasztet, perfect chocolate muss, waiter Lahcen Alan very good service!', 'Philipe was our host. He was super friendly and very welcoming. He helped us with the menu by translating many of the unfamiliar words. We had oysters, fish soup, ravioli, steak, and chocolate mousse. Everything was delicious. Excellent food and service.', 'Amazing food amazing staff Phillip was so fun and kind to us! Best place in Paris we have been yet!', 'What a wonderful experience!  The atmosphere was very good ( downgraded to 4 stars as we seated by the front door), the food as superb with melt in your mouth raviolis, the best seabass I have ever eaten in Paris and a apple tart that was both delicious and presented well. Our waiter was Lahcen Meric who was fantastic!!  You can not go wrong by eating at thus restaurant!!']

['Very very very good! Very tasty Parisian food! My husband and I each ordered an entr√©e and shared a dessert. I got Oeufs en cocottes, and he got a charcuterie platter. The dessert was an Ile flottante which is essentially whipped meringue floating in sauce topped w almonds (delish!).We were so full! Merci!!', 'A very nice, vibrant place to sit outside, relax and have a good meal. The staff is friendly, especially one of the waitresses. The price is average for this area. Visit with a group of friends.', 'Delicious, authentic, traditional brasserie. Founded in the 20s. Art deco interior. Old posters. Burger, tatin d‚Äôagneau, b≈ìuf tigre qui pleure are all great. Brioche fa√ßon pain perdue is the best dessert - if you love caramel, as you should. Good choice of wines. Cute neighborhood to walk around while digesting.', 'The perfect late night eatery for a quiet dinner on a quiet street. The food is good and the staff are lovely! The bistro itself was adorable. The pain pardu was absolutely life-affirming!', 'If you have 35‚Ç¨ for an aithentic French restaurant, this is it. As an exchange student in Paris, this is one of the best for if price. The interior is beutiful and vintange, the food is good, LOVE the desserts.']

['A Corner of Italy in the Heart of Paris

I had the pleasure of dining at this extraordinary Italian restaurant in Paris, and the experience was simply perfect. The atmosphere is warm and elegant, with decor that reflects Italian style, creating an intimate and refined setting.

The menu is a true homage to Italian tradition, featuring dishes made with the freshest and highest-quality ingredients. The staff is impeccable: friendly, professional, and always ready to recommend the perfect dish or the ideal wine pairing. The wine list offers an excellent selection of Italian labels that perfectly complement the meal.

I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for an authentic Italian experience in Paris, whether for a romantic dinner or a convivial evening with friends or family. I can‚Äôt wait to return!

Rating:‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê', 'UPDATE
21/2024 :  I returned last night, and while the service is still as welcoming as ever, the cuisine has unfortunately lost its spark. The dishes are less refined and have lost their distinctive flair, with prices remaining on the high side.

10/2020 : Maybe one of the best Sicilian restaurant in town. You go there fir the food for nothing else. Great service. Must do if you‚Äôre around.', 'Great Italian restaurant that serves authentic Sicilian food. The seafood tasted really fresh like  the ocean and the pasta was really delicious. The tiramisu with pistachio was amazing. The ambience was great with the decor and the service staff were very friendly without being overbearing. But be prepared to bring your wallet for it can get pricey. I just felt for the price paid, the amount of seafood in the pasta could be more.', 'If you are looking for an authentic Sicilian dining experience in Paris, look no further that Non solo Cucina. The menu is a celebration of sicily‚Äôs culinary traditions. The wine list is carefulli curated with a solid selection of wines. The staff are attentive and knowledgeable, offering great suggestions to enhance your dining experience ( especially Giuseppe). Highly recommended for anyone waiting to experience authentic italian flavors!', "A wonderful little gem, tucked away in a quiet corner of the 16th. Lucked out with it being on the ground floor of my rental for the summer, and looking forward to many meals here. Try any of the pastas (perfect al dente), a supremely chilled spritz and any of the starters. Often the Chef Guisseppe will bring your meal to your table, or walk the restaurant to make sure all is well, his accessibility was quite refreshing, with his staff following his lead. Bring your entire family, it's great for a cozy family meal or a simple lunch in-between walks."]

['I enjoyed a nice dinner here and was impressed by the tastiness of the food! The service was prompt, the restaurant was clean, and the menu had so many options! I recommend getting a combo with rolls, gyoza, and the shrimp crevettes. The soup was also very warming and almost every meal comes with soup, rice, and salad. Overall very good and I would recommend coming here if you‚Äôre looking for Japanese food in Paris!', 'Delicious and value for money for the food. Exceptional quality and home lime environment. You can feel comfortable and quality of food is wonderful. Highly recommend', 'Excellent Japanese restaurant with medium prices.
It looks quite new, having the furniture and interior design is minimalistic and simple. Everything was super clean!
The host speaks French and some English, so you can easily get around and order.
The salmon was fresh and all the other dishes were really good. I recommend the menu with brochettes and you should definitely try also the edamame (very similar to the original Japanese ones).
Gyoza and the Mizo soup were also good.
Please check the photos below with all the things we tried.
I recommend this restaurant!', 'I‚Äôve been here for several times. They are always good!', 'The soup of udon is sour, and tastes weird, like spoiled. They insist that they put wrong ingredients, no apologies from them.']

['The food is delicious and there is a wide variety of desserts. The food and the staff are typical and you will for sure spend a nice moment there.', 'Wonderful pizza! Craving for some pasta and bruschette!', 'Excellent local Italian bistro with tasty food.']

Adresse: 38 Rue du Dr Blanche, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Wow! We just moved to the area and we finally tried Le 38 Pizza. It was so good! Fresh ingredients, gourmet recipes - we had the truffle Buffalo mozzarella pizza and a Nutella dessert pizza - and a very cozy, nice atmosphere. We especially enjoyed talking with the woman working there, and look forward to returning after their holiday break for more. Highly recommended!', 'Little cozy place, pizzas were nice and with fresh ingredients. Staff was a bit nervous, and a bit unpolite. We waited 30mins for our pizzas.', 'Fantastic pizzeria! Lovely food and friendly staff. Highly recommend. Good vegetarian options.', 'We ordered the food and it was delivered in exactly 2 mins, no kidding. The people really really friendly. And honestly the best pizza I personally ever had. Located in the best arrondissement of Paris. A really affordable and cosy restaurant for you and your loved one.', 'Pizza are good. My 3 star goes because it states it is open for delivery and takeout from 17:30 and that is totally false. They only open at 19:00 for delivery and takeout and table service.']

["Les Deux Stations ‚Äì a traditional Parisian bistro in the 15th arrondissement! Discover classic French cuisine familiale ‚Äì simple, generous, and all at very affordable prices. This cozy spot serves up a delightful range of Parisian dishes, with a variety of starters, hearty French favorites like steak frites, fresh salads, and tasty French desserts. Their burger is a must-try ‚Äì it's absolutely delicious! It's the ideal spot for a satisfying meal in a warm, inviting atmosphere.", 'A local joint with damn good food. The service was amazing and very friendly, we went back because of it.', 'Excellent quality food and keep great standard for years. Recommend ‚ÄùBoudin Noir‚Äù, yummy', 'Excellent service, excellent dishes and desserts. Price is good considering the neighborhood where is located. Been here several times and enjoyed all of them.', 'Amazing place, food is excellent.']

['Food is great, the owner is very friendly too! ["A pleasure to work with a team that is as professional as it is friendly, before, during and after the event. We have been using Curty's for several years for our events bringing together more than 500 people, and everything is perfect every time. The service ordered from the Arab World Institute was truly exceptional, from the savory to the sweet, including the kindness and availability of the staff. Recommended!', 'Excellent caterer! I have organized several professional events with them and have never been disappointed. The teams are very efficient and the cocktail pieces are always of very high quality, very original and delicious. Fresh products, excellent flavors, in short, top of the range!', "Avoid! I attended a reception at the Arab World Institute and found the waiter extremely dismissive when I asked him what was in the petits fours. In addition, the petit fours in question lacked taste and freshness. The least we can do is not attack people when they ask for information about what they are served to eat!! there was also little choice in terms of drinks. I've seen better."]

['Always great chocolates', 'Decent chocolates but nothing more. Strangely, Bruges jeffs do not have the same taste in France as in other countries. We tested those from Belgium and Maoc, much better (they are made in Belgium in both cases). Those from France are less good', 'Very pleasant seller! I was well received, it was a pleasure. I was very well received and very well advised. The saleswoman made me a very high-quality ballotin, taking my tastes into account! ['This place has been so wonderful for us during our two weeks in the 16 of Paris. Max, Ra, and their team are friendly, helpful, and fun! The cheese well, the cheese we are in France!! üá´üá∑ so ‚Ä¶ il faut laisser une petite place pour le fromage!! üòúüòã', 'Horrible waiters who openly disrespect customers and curse at them when called out for their racist behavior. I can‚Äôt write the truth here because they try to report it as a fake review to get it banned.  they‚Äôll never see my money or waste my time again.', 'We ordered frog legs which came with fries and little salad. Recommend this dish if you want to try something unusual. The frog tastes good, it is something in between fish/chicken.
The service is fast and waitresses are friendly.
Prices are very good!', 'Okay! The food here is excellent, the frites superlative and if your lucky you will get service that combines humor with disdain and a little chaos which is a perfect melange of old and new school French.  (If you are not lucky you‚Äôll just get excellent service). In nice weather enjoy a lemon aide in the pop up cafe.  This is one of the places people from the OECD dine so you may be sitting next to a persona importante.  Defiantly a place to go.  Americans: yes do leave a handsome tip. You can afford it and it leaves a good impression of you and a wake of happiness.']

["We we're totally happy with everything!!! The food and drinks are great and espacially Yaelle did a great service!!", 'Lovely food and service by Yaelle. A really enjoyable morning. ['Excellent fish and seafood restaurant, fresh and original fish recipe. Don t forget the dessert!', 'My favorite authentic seafood place in Paris. The Quincy is excellent and the service friendly and efficient!']

It is sad because the place is well located. Good for a drink outside but nothing more unfortunately.', 'Nice experience on the terrasse of Petit Bistrot d‚ÄôAuteuil
My Caesar salad was good and could have been more tasty
Friendly staff', 'Very delightful place in Auteuil! They have wide selection of dessert (service non stop), I thought I would never like it, but I must admit their cr√®me br√ªl√©e is really really nice!!
Not only for classic diner, entre amis or family can really chill out there in the afternoon.', 'On our first night of a recent trip to Paris, my wife and I had dinner at Petit Bistro d‚ÄôAuteuil, based on a referral from our hotel.  Good call.

First and foremost, this is a bistro.  We‚Äôre not talking white linen tablecloths.  This is pub food territory.  That said, we had a very good experience there.  My wife had the cheeseburger, I had the chicken ‚Äúburger‚Äù (basically, anything on a bun in France is categorized as a burger).  Both were well-seasoned and the cheeseburger was cooked to order.  Excellent frites and salad as accompaniments.

Service was very good and prices were most reasonable.  If you‚Äôre not in the mood for classic French haute cuisine, you can‚Äôt go wrong here.']

['If you haven‚Äôt tried these yet‚Ä¶ don‚Äôt walk run! These are amazing! Ate them on the trolley on the way into downtown from the park!', "It it is a little pricey, but it's the only place you can get a coffee for miles...
Very nice place to stop in the middle of a walk or the end of a run. They have ice-cream üòé, fries, coffee, hot chocolate, cool drinks, wine and more.

It's even open on Sundays üòâ.", 'Hi! This cafe is so cute
Little treat in the middle of forest! It is open every day ! And has regulars! A Parisian secret üòä
The servers were very nice, had a nice chat, thank you !!', 'Older man working is extremely rude. Tried to not give me my change and when I asked him for it he told me I needed to pay attention to what I was doing, as if it was my fault he was trying to keep my change?  Would not recommend going here, but I understand there aren‚Äôt many options nearby. Truly a shame there isn‚Äôt better service.', 'Lovely well stocked cafe with great staff and in a spectacular location :)']

['Great value breakfast at this super cute french diner. The omlette and cake were both lovely. It was like stepping back in time with a dumb waiter even appearing from the floor to take a delivery. Friendly staff too', 'Michelin starred restaurant ( which we discovered once inside) The food was absolutely delicious, perfect quantities, simple and efficient combinations‚Ä¶ it just hits the spot! We went there on a Sunday night and it was nice and quiet. Such a lovely surprise that we will go back to for sure !', 'Atmosphere:\xa0Cozy and family-style with soft lighting, a semi-open kitchen, pet-friendly.

Food:\xa0High-quality ingredients, modern cuisine with French influences.

Opening Hours:\xa0Surprisingly, open all day, serving meals during breakfast, lunch, and dinner, with beverages available in between

Rservations are recommended.', 'Great food, wonderful food, unpretentious vibe. The service was good too. My friend and I ended up finishing an amazing bottle of Bordeaux wine (in retrospect, I wish I took a photo of it or took note of the name) with our dinner. The ambiance of the restaurant was really cozy and welcoming.

It does get really busy so I‚Äôd recommend making a reservation. Would definitely go back there.', 'Everything is fresh and excellent. Friendly service. Plan to make a reservation ahead of time, very busy at lunch time.']

Adresse: 10 Av. de la Prte Molitor, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Cocktail Rooftop 18 euros. Low quality.
No service, order from qr code.
Table was dirty and not clean.
Waiting time long.
I came here few years ago and it was better.
Spot for tourist. To avoid', 'This was my third time at Molitor over the course of a year, and it did not disappoint. The staff is very nice and friendly, the decor urban and chic (our spot wasn‚Äôt the greatest for fair nightingale in the pictures pictures, hence the red lights on the shots below), and what‚Äôs in the plate is simply incredible.
We loved the fun take Chef Simolka has on some classics: his croque-monsieur is really to die for, while he elevates comfort-food like Mac n‚Äô cheese to gourmet levels adding  truffle! The main dishes are cooked to perfection, whether you‚Äôre looking at the scallops or the meat, always with an interesting, original twist.
We say third time is the charm, let‚Äôs see what the fourth time will bring as I will definitely be back!', 'Very good service, delicious cuisine and cool atmosphere! that‚Äôs the place to be when you just want to chill and enjoy a good brasserie cuisine with a modern twist', 'We hosted an event here. It is a great venue, classy atmosphere and the guests loved it. The food was excellent.', 'We had the chance to spend our easter family brunch. Food was great. The Buffet was very generous with a delicious variety . Staff was very nice. They even had some animation planned for the kids! We give it a well deserved 5 star and a special high five for the chefs ‚Äúpat√© en cro√ªte‚Äù bravo üëçüëç']

Adresse: 81 Rue Jean de la Fontaine, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews:
['The restaurant is very cosy and nice. The service is fast and the waiters are friendly. The food is rustic & nice and the portions are big
Overall good experience!', 'The restaurant is amazing for its customer target group. If you want to have
+ simple and delicious Italian food made with good products
+ to have a family meal or informal quick meeting with friends
+ with a helpful and friendly service
This is your choice in 16th.

Restaurant achieves to display an atmosphere of the typical Italian tavern. I cant say that they exaggerate the atmosphere, it is not ‚Äútoo much‚Äù and not fake as in many other Italian restaurants.

Note that the food is quite simple, which can be both a plus and a minus depending on the person.

Waiters are amazing, always ready to help.

Prices are very good for XVI, I had a full stomach with a glass of vine for less than 35 euros.

The only minus was a toilet - you need to climb to it to the second floor and, as far as I remember, the sink was not functioning properly and overall it felt too old.', 'Always good place to have dinner in a very warm atmosphere . Staff always very nice and friendly .', "This place is always packed and with reason, it is probably one of the best pizza places in Lisbon  have discovered a number of great wines here too that are not too expensive. There is often a queue, but if you find this... wait and take a drink in the street, it isn't often a long wait, and is certainly worth it.", 'My French is still a work in progress and the waitresses were super patient about that. Food is great and for dessert, instead of the menu, they bring a big serving plate with one sample of each dessert and they walk you through a description of each so you can view them and choice based on the real thing. Very nice touch!']

['Best moroccan couscous of my life, loved it. If you cone to Paris and want to try real couscous, this place has got it!
We had the merguez and the lamb couscous delivered by uber eats, it came right on spot. The amount of food you receive is amazing and the taste is a delight. The name of the restaurant fits the food.', 'Very good couscous. Generous
The Moroccon wine was a bit heavy.
We were a bit early. No other customers.
Service was good', 'Top couscous quality, fair prices and a very kind staff in a very cozy and stylish place. Highly recommended!!! üëçüëçüëç', "Perhaps the best couscous I've ever had. The food here is simple yet delicious, and is priced very fairly for the size of the portions.", 'Very hipster, local, and no tourists. You feel very in sync with parisian culture. Sadly closes at 2 however! Drinks are a bit pricey but delicious!']

["I came here for the Olympic. It's a lovely shop with an awesome crew with lot of great products and diversity", "This store is very much convenient for me if I need something that can't wait to be bought.

Prices maybe too much compared to other stores but if you really need the item badly then I guess there's nothing we can do about it but to buy it anyway.

Staff are very friendly and helpful.

Visit the store and see it for yourself. üëåüòÄ", 'Clerks were doing their paperwork. Clients stood waiting. 4 auto checkout machines but only one takes cash. Poor service. Next to no white wines. Ugh.', "It doesn't sell alcohol Sunday afternoon.... I mean how does one prepare brunch", 'This place is a joke. Dirty, ugly and none of the check-out machines work.']

['May 2019 review: They have updated their menu recently to 33 euros and the main dishes. There‚Äôs no more lamb ‚Äú√©paule d‚Äôagneau‚Äù and other dishes I read in the past reviews too. However, it‚Äôs still really a good place to be. The cheese plate is really something to shout out for. It‚Äôs a great place to invite your friends or family when they travel to Paris - it has a history, some stories to tell, good services, good wine (included in the menu, oh my god), delicious Brie de meaux) and therefore I ensure there‚Äôs no where like this in Francd.', 'Excellent food and drinks with a very kindness service. You have a great view of the bay.', 'It‚Äôs a historical restaurant, Fontaine, Boileau and Racine all came here.\nThree kirs, three starters, three mains, three cheese courses, three desserts, three coffees, and a bottle of wine‚Ä¶ all for 120‚Ç¨!!! Massive bargain. The food was incredibly delicious, good quality French food. Totally recommend coming here.', 'Great food and atmosphere,historical!', 'Fantastic value! For 35 euros you have a quality diner with an aperitif drink and half a bootle of wine, appetizer, main course , cheese and desert! Have been coming for years with my 92 years old mom and other siblings ;Come hungry; booking advised!']

['Very friendly staff, clean and always well stocked shop. The butcher section is very convenient with a large collection of fresh meats. My favourite Franpix in Paris', 'Very nice local grocery store. Well laid out. Good prices. Only negative is that the shopping carts are dirty.', 'Great prices and friendly staff! Tip for tourists: baguettes are 99 cents!', 'nice dealing with them\ngood quality groceries', 'It was nice experience.']

['Liked sushi shop. Took sushi and salad. Price is good for Paris, quality is great, very tasty. Read about poor service at sushi shop, but for my visit everything was great.', 'Ordered online and received in the space of 10minutes!! Very quick service', 'New concept... a very very expensive for a taste that is not there', 'Paid online, put a German number with the +49 instead of the +33 for France in the order, put our code to enter the house as well and what happens.. the delivery driver was too ‚Äûafraid‚Äú too call and just went away (Didn‚Äôt even rang the doorbell). We called after 1 1/2 hours to ask about the status and they didn‚Äôt apologised or anything. Didn‚Äôt even texted me or anything..  Worst costumer service ever! Do not order here‚Ä¶', 'Five stars just because it‚Äôs a good price for a good meal, you Will suffice your appetite. Additionally, I had salmon nigiri and rolls and the flavour was great.\n\nThe attention was great, despite we couldn‚Äôt communicate well in French.']

['It was great starting with starters and dessert was another level!', 'Ooh my god, this food is better than in Libanon. Everything is delicious. See photos.', 'The best Lebanese food in town. Incredible choices. Make sure to call for a table. Very friendly staff and very tasty food. Super recommended üëå Bravo!', 'The food tasted good and the restaurant owner was a great guy', 'It‚Äôs not always easy to find lebanese food that tastes exactly like home, but Solemar‚Äôs food was amazing! For tabouleh and ftayer lovers, you‚Äôll be impressed.']

['Came here because they were open on new year day. We had meat of the day, which was beef. The serving was generous for the price and staff very friendly.', "Just an allround great place to drink and dine. The food is delicious, the staff is helpful and the fact that they're open late is fantastic.", 'Adorable restaurant near our apartment. Love the food, atmosphere (cozy French bistro!) and service. Ask for Saber‚Ä¶ he took time explaining the menu and wines. Order the roasted chicken with mashed potatoes with salad. Great for our cold rainy weather. Love, love, love!!', 'We found this restaurant when searching for a spot on our way home from an appointment yesterday, and were very pleased with it. I wanted beef tartare - my wife thinks it‚Äôs gross but I love it and try it everywhere that has it the first time I go - and had a chicken Caesar salad. Plus some deviled eggs to start. The tartare was as good as I‚Äôve had and her salad ingredients were fresh, generous, and tasty (I helped her finish). Of course it‚Äôs a Paris restaurant so the seating is very tight, although we got relatively spacious ones ourselves (she‚Äôs very pregnant and we got there before the lunch rush so we had our pick; the place filled up completely before we were halfway finished, it‚Äôs very popular and is a lot of people‚Äôs local, apparently). And the wait staff was perfect, we appreciated them. We will be back!', 'The people are nice; food is good and affordable. They also speak English in addition to French.']

Cheak this camera after jujment.', 'Positive: extended opening hours.\nNegative: typical unpleasant Parisian employees.', 'The Uber driver stole my champagne.He said he delivered my bottle but her never did', 'Very bad lazy staff i have oder uber watting 1 hour 43 minit delivery so bad']

['A very nice restaurant, great for a weekday/weekend gathering. The restaurant is very clean and has indoor outdoor seating options. The food is very good and the portions are adequate. The menu has a large variety of Chinese and Thai specialties. The prices are very fair. The service is quick and the staff  are very welcoming and nice.
Overall great experience!', 'We usually go there in family because it‚Äôs a good Chinese restaurant in the neighborhood.
But they don‚Äôt handle busy service very well.

We were very disappointed to be served in more than an hour yesterday evening, without any form of apology from staff...', 'Excellent food and service. Very friendly.', 'Really appreciated that they welcome us really late even if the kitchen was about to close. Tha√Ø food was good and not expensive.', 'Honestly the menu lacked an understanding of food.  It‚Äôs kind of like concepts of a cook with some imagination but no follow through on actually eating their own dishes enough times to know if it‚Äôs really good and honestly‚Ä¶it‚Äôs not.']

Adresse: 28 Rue du Dr Blanche, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews:
['In my opinion plus expensive Franprix in the neighbourhood, but has all that you need. Rarely I go and dont find something in shelfs.
As for the staff, big praises to young tall
man and little girl with curly hair both who are extremly polite and nice.
On other hand there is a lady with glasses, who is some kind of a responsable in the store, and she is very unprofessional, sometimes rude, always grumpy and communication is 0, so sometimes when I see her I turn around and go to Monoprix 2 streets down from this store.', 'This is our neighborhood market and they do a good job on basic items. The prices are a bit high and the fruits and veggies aren‚Äôt reliably fresh - on any given day you may or may not get what you want - but overall it‚Äôs a good shop for a few basic items. Bonus points to the staff, who have all been friendly and helpful on my visits.', 'Good in a pinch but things are more expensive here and you may or may not (more likely not) get the promotion prices.  Best to only get absolute necessities here when in a pinch- unless budget is not your problem. Then go hog wild!', 'Some of the staff are super friendly, but one older female cashier is just rude and unprofessional. They had about a dozen of tortillas labeled 30 percent off (close to expiry date), so I decided to get one (I‚Äôd never tried one). The cashier ripped off the discount sticker, looked at me as if I had put the sticker there myself, and then said that the discount was not applicable. I mentioned that there were a dozen other discounted tortillas in the fridge, and then she kept going on and on and on about kacher products and that they never get discounted and she made it sound as if I was a crook trying trying to scam the supermarket. I then said that it was probably illegal to sell
discounted products and then not actually discount them at checkout, and she again started about kacher food for 2 minutes while behind us ten people were waiting. I also wanted to buy 3 tomatoes, which I got from a 3.95 euro/kg box, which she then decided were 4.95 euro/kg. When I pointed this out to her, and showed her the actual box with a huge 3.95 euro sticker, she accused me of moving tomatoes from one box to another and basically called me a thief. At that point I just left. I‚Äôve been a client of this particular, overpriced Franprix (as it‚Äôs close to my home and, as I said, some of the cashiers are really nice) for ten years now. I would have been fine if she had said something like, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm sorry, there‚Äôs been a mistake, we‚Äôll make sure it won‚Äôt happen again‚Äù but this was completely unacceptable.', 'Nice and clean. They open 7 days a week.  A bit expensive.']

Adresse: 29 Rue du Dr Blanche, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ['What a fantastic find !! We spent a looooong lunch there on a getaway to Paris and it was worth it..the waiters are amazing and authentic, the banter is there and the service as well. The food is delicious‚Ä¶ we ate till the food coma and I will come back for it !! See the pictures for more details‚Ä¶ I had a cold so I took the ginger chicken, the rice was so flavorful!', 'I had the best calf liver for dinner. And delicious oysters   When I was in Paris 2 weeks ago.  I highly recommend this restaurant.  Everybody including the staff are happy    A great atmosphere', 'As good as a true countryside French meal. If you really do love food and are not just a foodie for the sake of it make the trek here. The confit is fantastic. Don‚Äôt be shy and crunch on the ends of the leg for the a culinary experience you won‚Äôt forget. The caramel ice cream is an explosion of flavor and texture that caps the splendor of what  good food is all about.', 'Very friendly, genuine service, delicious French classic cuisine, and an atmosphere of conviviality. Would highly recommend!', 'Super restaurant of 16em. Service and food are greta']

['Owners as friendly as the sushi is delicious! Highly recommend, best in the area!', 'Client for many many years of this quiet restaurant, the service is excellent, very kind people, and delicious ¬´\xa0chirachi poulet saut√© aux oignons\xa0¬ª !', 'A very nice Japanese restaurant - smiling and friendly staff, food is good and you will not leave hungry.', 'Excellent quality with a large choice of dishes.\nHighly recommended', 'Classical japanese restaurant ! Not better than any other one.']

Adresse: 11 Bis Rue Pierre Gu√©rin, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ['There food was awesome so delicious.. Friendly family very approachable. Shushi üç£üç£', 'Great food and very nice people, loved itü•∞', 'Love their staff, best service ever', 'Very good food and prices, especially the chicken ball teppanyakis!', 'Fresh Sashimi and free slad, soup and rice. Very cozy and clean.']

["The staff at this restaurant provide an amazing customer service which really made our first night in Paris special. They have a few vegetarian options that are delicious. Staff were attentive and offered help to understand the menu. I ordered a wine which was forgotten but I didn't mind as it was very busy, but the waiter was so apologetic and even brought us a free dessert on the house. Amazing food, atmosphere and people. A must visit!", 'Had a lovely dinner with family here. Not cheap, but also not too expensive. Staff is friendly, not all speak English but they try. All the plates were good and tasteful. Recommend to go here.', 'Delicious food, cozy ambiance and very friendly staff. At this french cuisine bistro, you get to choose from a selection of daily specials of starters, mains and desserts. We had the goat cheese salad, the steak and the tiramisu. All were perfect! Recommended if you are in the area', 'They do need a machine for the orders especially there are lots of customers.

I understand people make mistakes but the receptionist didn‚Äôt show me the receipt clearly and explain what I ordered without patience.

By the way, if you don‚Äôt want to wait for so long and get a warm plate instead of hot food better to skip this.', "Very tasty and delicious, I must admit. Very nice restaurant, calm ambience and very friendly waiters. It might be OK to book, but there is a place if you're on your own. The prices are appropriate for Paris, almost a bit high for me, given that I like to eat out a lot. I recommend it for an intimate dinner for two and to enjoy every piece of food. You can walk from the Eiffel Tower and get to know the streets of Paris, which are magical at any moment."]

['Always abundant. Always delicious. There‚Äôs no reason to go to fake Japanese restaurants if you are in the neighborhood. Well, if salmon is the only raw fish you can take, then it doesn‚Äôt really matter.', "Dined here on business last evening and here's a review of the two set meals I ordered, chicken katsu and chirashi sushi, both served with miso soup and two sides of the day, duck steak slices with pickled cucumber and slow cooked pumpkin. The sides were really good and authentic. Prices were pretty reasonable by Paris standards.

The chicken katsu was really good. Near perfectly cooked. Can't fault it in any way. Order this if raw seafood isn't for you.

The chirashi sushi was good though some of the cuts were out of shape. The rice was the deal. Cooked really well. Overall, this dish is modified to maybe suit the local preference. Such as slices raw onions.

Desserts included were ice cream and fruit salads.

Now, for the service. Come here early, about 7pm and you get full attention of the waiters. This place gets really busy after 7:30pm. I was here on a Tuesday and it was full house. Don't expect the type of service you'll get at a Michelin star restaurant. Dine here if you love good Japanese cuisine. Will I dine here again, you bet ;)", 'Always very good. The restaurant is still almong my best sushis experience. Congratulations to the chef.', 'Best sushi foods in Paris. You should try the Kirin frozen beer especially in summer time!', "Best quality sushi and sashimi I've had for a long time. Defo recommend."]

["Had the most amazing croquet Monsieur ! Enjoyed a sugar crepe and delicious cappuccino for dessert. Loved the staff, atmosphere but the food was the best I've had on my visit to Paris so far!", 'Nice little bistro on a busy corner. Food was ok. We had omelettes and a croque madame.', 'Very warm welcome! The duck breast for lunch was absolutely delicious. We were staying at the hotel next door and decided to try this place‚Äîso glad we did!', 'Very nice, typical french restaurant. Good food, nice staff. Great!', 'Regular customer to this little brasserie. Lovely spot away from crowds but always with a good atmosphere. Fast and friendly service. What more could you ask for in Paris.']

['Very good Indian restaurant in autelie. Neighbour hood of Paris France
Good vegetarian options as well as place to try Indian cuisine
Very good staff and customer service
Finally an Indian restaurant in the neighbourhood are the words of customers and people of this  neighbourhood in Paris', 'Very tasty and friendly service with affordable price. I‚Äôll definitely come again.', 'Fantastic food and service! The owners are very gracious and accommodating. First time eating here with my family and everyone enjoyed their meals. Thank you!', 'I‚Äôve been staying in the 16th for over a year now.  Li Feng can now be considered my canteen, a place where I feel right at home. The two owners are always a pleasure and know how to make me feel welcome. The food is DELICIOUS. A must if you‚Äôre in the neighborhood and you appreciate authentic homemade Chinese cuisine.', 'Great night four people.. staff very accommodating and great value.. next time I am in Paris i will be eating at this restaurant']

['Great takeaway burgers. No way to eat inside or sit. Order through tablet and takeaway!', 'The food is great and the service too. However there is no seating. There are benches nearby however.', 'An offer was available on Deliveroo so we decided to try it since I was craving burgers.

It‚Äôs not the first time I eat here so I know that their burgers is really tasty.

The bread is soft and pleasant to eat with the cheddar and steak.

Very tasteful and flavorful.', "My apologies for my last review. I was an idiot. Must have been a long day for me. Anyway, I've removed the post bc that wasn't fair to you. I'll be back. Thanks for replying.", 'Ordered veggie burger.
I usually have bad experiences with vegetarian burgers in Paris but this turned out to be absolutely delicious - Didn‚Äôt expect it be so good! 10/10 recommended.']

['Waiter argued that the moldy (not the good kind of moldy) cheese on our plate was "perfectly normal" after making a rude joke to my girlfriend. Wish I could give less than 1. Nice atmosphere though', '5 of us stopped after being drenched by a storm and they seated us for a late dinner despite being busy. It took a short while to get menus as they were properly managing the flow of orders through to the kitchen yet service was still prompt and pleasant and the food (pizza, pasta, salads, traditional French) was all tasty and at a reasonable price.', 'Friendly service, nice ambient, reasonable prices. Would recommend', 'Friendly staff. Moderate place with moderate food. The furniture needs renovation. Filthy toilets. I was amazed to see the pets of customers seated on the couches, almost tasting the food!', 'A typical French tabac with all you need.\nWe were there on a Saturday morning and the place was very empty and quiet']
['Good place to have some good food and not so expensive üëå', 'Great food x', 'Correct', 'Top', 'Top']

["We went to a restaurant for the New Year's menu. The food was decent, but not worth the price. What I especially have to criticize is the quality of the service. Our order was taken three times by different waiters, and only one of them spoke English. When the waiters brought wine to the couple at the next table, they tasted it and then it turned out the waiter had mixed up the tables. He then took the glasses and wanted to serve them to us. While waiting for the food, we weren‚Äôt given water, and the waiters kept bringing the wrong orders. In the end, even the bill didn‚Äôt match what we had actually ordered.

The atmosphere could have been wonderful if not for the music being as loud as in a nightclub.

In summary, I do not recommend this restaurant.", "We visited after touring the Roland Garros tennis development.   We didn't know exactly what to order but asked one of the waiters what was good after telling him what we were in the mood for.  Long story short, everything was amazing.  Soup, pizza, the seafood pasta and ravioli.  Best we have had to date!  I've never been to Italy but grew up near Little Italy in the Bronx and I hate to say this trumps them all!", 'Cosy, clean, nice and warm service, great menu and good food. Good wine suggestions', 'Very Nice place And the food is realy good

Nice place 5starts', 'Nice pizza and other dishes made with quality Italian products. A bit too pricey!']

['We had a wonderful evening at the Auberge des Crus. The dishes are tasty and there are very good wines! The atmosphere is warm thanks to the fireplace and the service. I recommend!! üòç', 'An inn with an exceptional welcome, with the tastiest dishes and wines, all enhanced with flavors and generous portions.
An atmosphere of very good taste, a quality of service worthy of the name. A beautiful menu with fresh products.
A very good atmosphere, with a superb setting and an exceptional team!', 'We ate very well, special mention for the mash! Many thanks to our server Matteo for his special attention.', 'The dishes are delicious.
The service is quality.
I recommend 100%', 'Exceptional wine list at reasonable prices, superb atmosphere. I will go back!']

['merci! the hottest dogs in town ', 'What a great place to eat best hot dogs of Paris !
I highly recommend !', 'Super service', 'This is the third time we have ordered from them and we have never been disappointed. There are a variety of choices and most importantly there is a vegetarian option for every choice.  I can say that I only eat hot dogs at their place because it is very rare to find vegetarian hot dogs elsewhere.
I like their little notes and the choice of packaging for deliveries.
Good luck :)', "The best hot dogs in all of Paris!
Everything is homemade, a real treat.
I've been several times and always a pleasure! Thank you Lou for the welcome üå≠‚ô•Ô∏è"]

['Nestled in the heart of Paris, this place offers a delightful food experience. The location is perfect, surrounded by charming streets and iconic Parisian scenery. The food is exceptional, with a variety of tasty dishes that capture the essence of French street cuisine. The staff are incredibly friendly and attentive, making the whole dining experience even more enjoyable. Highly recommended for anyone looking to enjoy delicious food in a lovely setting!', 'I had the Flank steak and it was excellent, the red wine was perfect match. Difficult to decide among the dessert options since all sounded great, I went for the tarte tatin and wasn‚Äôt disappointed at all. The service was great and friendly. Thank you!!', '4 stars for the sea bass and Irish coffee.  The fish is fresh and perfectly cooked.  Irish coffee small in volume but generous in whisky\nThe sausage and mashed potatoes is 3 stars.
