Sausage slightly overcooked hence on fry side, mashed potatoes cheese is very get that it solidifies a little\nApple upside down tart is good', "Nice classic bistrot lunch for a good price, with an accurate wine recommendation! The staff is very friendly, fast, efficient and do not push you either to order more than you want or the leave after finishing you lunch. If I stop by this area again, I'll eat again there!", 'Classic french cuisine including their brilliant onion soup. The service is just as good, friendly and catering well to those of us with very poor french. A great experience and well worth visiting.']

Adresse: 28 Rue du Dr Blanche, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ['A very nice butcher shop, quality products and smiling and welcoming staff. I will come back very soon!\nSpecial mention for the truffle sausage ü•∞', 'An extraordinary meat that delighted our festive meal. Incredible quality!']

Adresse: 28 Rue du Dr Blanche, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Just get in and let yourself be transported!\nThis little gem offers ever changing creative little dishes, ultra fresh products in a relaxed atmosphere with open kitchen.', 'Rough around the edges.  Trendy atmosphere‚Ä¶.. small menu of all shared plates. Waiter very knowledgeable about wines and suggested pairings, but the absence of prices felt contrived.   Interesting food but VERY small portions - poor value.', 'A little gem in Paris with excellent service and a culinary food experience. Great value for money. Will definitely return on the next opportunity."', 'Perfect spot for enjoying fresh & creative tapas with variety of wines.', 'It is wonderful. Excellent.']

Adresse: 2 Rue du Capitaine Olchanski, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ['I wanted to change from French, Italian, or Asian cuisine, and I came across this Russian cuisine address, and what a pleasant surprise. I enjoyed dishes whose names we know but not always their flavors. Moreover, the welcome is very warm, the "cheffe" doesn\'t hesitate to share her passion, and the setting is nicely decorated. I will definitely return with friends, family and pleasure.', 'Heavenly delicious and the owner is so nice and caring lady‚ò∫Ô∏è', "It's hard to describe just how good this place is. We've done the highest rated Russian restaurants all over the world, some of which were phenomenal and this edged out any of them. I enjoyed how tasty and yet creative and sometimes cerebral each course was. There is always a play on color, texture and sometimes temperature executed with perfect accuracy. It's russian cuisine at its finest yes but with a touch of an artistic approach, reimagined and led to excellence. All is made of the freshest ingredients of the highest quality, you cannot fool me on that. This was absolutely exceptional experience. Everything was carefully curated in the service. Food was delicious. Every time I dine in the owner makes me feel like I am the only customer there.", 'Service and food are absolutely incredible! Could not recommend this place enough for a quiet, intimate evening with delicious food and the sweetest servers. The chef went above and beyond for a group of myself and my three classmates who are all expats living in paris. She truly made us feel at home ..', 'Great place, food and service. Very much liked by our expat guests! Definitely to return!']

['Not any traditional Thai restaurant that I‚Äôve been to. We ordered the beef green curry and found the meat was medium rare and they served it with rice on the side so we were a  bit surprised as to the combination, and when we asked the server , he said it has a french twist. Really authentic. I loved their mango sticky rice, and they have great selections of cocktails. Verygood plating. Great and helpful staff.
Recommended also to book in advance. We tried going in without reservations but no place for us , they offered the terrace but it was raining so we just booked for other day.', 'I came with my grandma at lunch hour. It was packed, so I recommend making a reservation! We got there at 1:30PM on a Friday, and came back at 2PM for a table.

The staff was very helpful and kind, they were also quite knowledgeable about all the dishes. Everything was tasty, and the portions are big! We took some of our good home. We had a pad Thai (chicken & shrimps), the chicken with basilic, fried egg and rice, mango sticky rice (my favourite dish, highly commend!) and jasmine tea.

We had a great time! Again, it does get busy around lunch time and can be a bit loud at times, but by 2pm it empties pretty quickly (kitchen closes at 2:30, restaurant at 3). Highly recommend :)', 'Overall very good experience.. Food was tasty. Wonderful papaya salad, lovely shrimp curry, average Pad Thai. Generous portions. Nice ambience, simple but stylish decor. I appeal to the owners to carry a better wine selection. Much more suited to the Thai cuisine. Where is Alsacian Pinot Gris or Riesling, where is a Gewurztraminer??? . All fabulous matches to the dishes on the menu!', 'Food was excellent, from starters to mains and sides. Dishes are also very nicely presented.', 'I was very loyal and good client of Crying tiger but very disapointed by how they treat nice and loyal customer . They only take reservayiosn through bank imprint . Shame and very un commercial. Rude and silly']

['Just returned from a 3 night stay with my daughter....

1) location is great only a 5 min walk to the Seine River and 10 min walk to the Eiffel Tower.
2) Reception staff were very welcoming and went out of their way to support us. Big thank you to Bismal, who always had a smile.
3) yes....our room was small but comfortable, very modern decor, clean and sufficient for us as we were out all day sight seeing.
4) breakfast was basic... Fruit, yoghurt, pastries, cereals, breads and cheese/meat plates. That being said...all fresh, and plenty available.

For the central location, and reasonable price, I would definitely recommend this hotel...if you have high expectations or are planning on spending more time in your rooms you may want to reconsider.', "1. blood stains on sheets
2. room was small, not enough space to open luggages
3. room smelt strongly of piss
4. staff cleaned our room despite 'do not disturb' sign, resulting in small items being lost as we had left bags open on the bed

other things to note: you can clearly hear all the neighbours, shampoo provided was 2 in 1 with hand soap, location is only close to eiffel tower but nothing else

we have had our fair share of budget hotels and don't mind staying in run down accommodation, however points 3 and 4 were the cherry on top and caused us to check out early and stay somewhere else.

staff did not seemed phased when we checked out early and did not care to ask why - no dedication to improving.", 'THIS HOTEL IS A SCAM!! They put fake pictures on their website. Do not go here. No matter how many good reviews it looks like it has, it‚Äôs not worth it. The room was barely big enough to fit my suitcase. Water was brown and nasty when we opened the tap water which meant we needed to brush our teeth with bottled water. The shower had brown water and bugs coming out of it. THERE IS ALSO NO AC, which means you have to open the window at night which will let more bugs into the room. No privacy in the room at all because your windows are directly facing another apartment. Bathroom is only big enough for one person in a single standing position. Sink is too high to do makeup. Front desk service is terrible', 'Unfortunately the hotel looks like a scam. We booked a triple room through booking and the pictures DO NOT MATCH! The reception, rooms, breakfast area, the building: nothing matches what they show online. Our rooms were dirty and we barely had a light. It looked like a last minute arrangement, the bathroom was also in the dark and the shower barely fit one person inside. The corridor was tight and dark, looked like some kind of deposit. The receptionist admitted that they had complains about the mismatching of pictures. We booked 4 nights there but had to walk around in the city at 8 pm in an unknown country because we couldn‚Äôt stay there so we needed An alternative. Although they did offered us ‚Äúa better room‚Äù, I don‚Äôt understand why they didn‚Äôt put us there in the first place? Also the whole building was different than what we expected (because of pictures previously seen) so we didn‚Äôt feel safe or comfortable to stay there. We left in a hurry so unfortunately I have no pictures but trust me: I don‚Äôt recommend it!!!!', 'COMPLETE DISASTER! Not worthy of any stars!! Especially as we never got to see the hotel!! NEVER trust Campanile Hotels EVER! We booked our hotel room on 3rd Jan 2024 - for 4 nights from today: Thur 23rd to Mon 27th May 2024 => almost 5 months ago - and everything was confirmed. Then with less than 24 hours notice we got an email from NIKOS TSOLAKIS to advise that "The hotel campanile of Tour Eiffel is shut, closed for renovation"?! Plus this email was sent from a different email address from all the previous email communications - so we thought it was a scam! Having landed at Gare du Nord, we thought to call the hotel to confirm if it was a scam or not. Noone answered our call to the hotel, so we called the Campanile Bookings number - to be advised that the hotel was indeed closed => so we had no hotel for tonight, or the next 3 nights either! In addition, the Campanile Booking person said he could not help us reserve an alternative hotel!! So we gave up and luckily managed to get a room @ the Ibis Paris Tour Eiffel Cambronne instead ... but 50% more expensive!! a VERY UNHAPPY Campanile customer! We are only 3 people out of a total of 50 people on choir tour effected by this disaster!']

Adresse: 19 Chau. de la Muette, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews:
['‚Ç¨58 per head they have lots of choice but I think it also depends upon how much you are starving because a buffet is a buffet you can only eat so much isnt it?? other wise the interior is amazing and drinks are around ‚Ç¨20 each

there are free drinks but I am talking about real drinks', 'Amazing restaurant with beautiful ambiance, great food and impeccable service. We had such a great start to the 2025 year here and we‚Äôre so grateful! Also huge thanks to Adrien for great service, advice & good vibes üëåüèª', 'Our experience at Andia was fabulous. The food was delicious, especially the ceviche and croquetas. The drinks were amazing and well priced. The ambiance is spectacular. The server, Camille, was fantastic! One of our favorite restaurants in Paris, definitely recommend.', 'Visiting Paris we had a great time with friends, amazing food and incredible attention. Elodie guided us with  recommendations and was really proactive throughout the whole evening. Highly recommend this place!', "I went during a business meeting.
Sofia helped us to find the right table for our amazing experience.

The food is delicious. Great options. It has a wonderful atmosphere's with great service.

I will definitely return during my next trip to Paris. Highly recommend.

Gus
CEO"]

['Place has seen better days. It\'s a relatively expensive "museum" when you consider what it has to offer. Ticket includes a small glass of wine which on the day of our visit was not particularly good. Overall we expected much more in a country and city with an amazing wine heritage. Overall a huge disappointment.', 'Nice location and truly educational. Plus you can browse the exhibition with a glass of wine in hand! Audio guides included.', 'We went for lunch here last Friday. What a fantastic experience! The service, is immediately wonderful. We had the lovely Corentine wait on our table. So friendly. The starters of foie gras and the crab/avocado were delicious. The lamb and onglet de boeuf... excellent. The truffle dauphinois, sublime. We finished with cheese and the pistachio, raspberry, cream dessert. Delicious.\nWe will be going back very soon. Highly recommend', 'The restaurant in this Wine Museum is a hidden gem. I had the full course lunch with cheese and wine, food was fantastic paired with good wine.  Emmanuel was friendly and introduced us the various wine regions in France and their grapes. It‚Äôs such an amazing experience to dine in a 14th century wine cellar, a must if you come to Paris.', "What an amazing experience! Unlike the more touristy wine tasting classes, Emmanuel let us choose the wines we wanted to taste from their extensive wine cellar, and even purchase them. He was so friendly, knowledgeable and patient, and his English was fantastic. Especially when you consider the myriad technical terms and wine making techniques he needed to use to answer our endless questions! Reservations were easy- you just have to email (they don't have it available online). Marie Elise took extra time to helped us package up our wine securely, so it could travel home in our suitcases. She was so kind, and a delight to talk with, and was able to make further wine recommendations based on our tasting. And you get to tour the museum with an audio guide. It was quirky, we learned a lot, and it winds through the ancient wine caves. Thank you so much, we had an amazing experience!"]

["Disappointing Teppanyaki Experience at Benkay

I recently dined at Benkay for their teppanyaki, and unfortunately, it was underwhelming. For the price you pay, I expected much more in terms of flavor and quality. The ingredients didn‚Äôt stand out, and there was nothing special about the dishes ‚Äî they lacked creativity and depth. The chef was charming and made for a pleasant ambiance, but that couldn't make up for the below-par food.

If you‚Äôre looking for a teppanyaki experience that‚Äôs truly worth the price, I would suggest looking elsewhere. It‚Äôs hard to justify the cost when the food is this mediocre.
plus when we tried to find the entrance the hotel workers didn‚Äôt know what we were talking about and had to ask about 5 times until someone knew where to guide us.", "It's always a fantastic experience, great food, incredible attention, Japanese care to every detail. I love dining Teppanyaki style.
Only the smoke aspiration did not look fully efficient to me, but it's a detail.
Well done, will come again soon I hope!", 'Everything was perfect! The live show cooking was amazing! Thanks a lot for this experience and we will come back next time we are in Paris! Staff and chef were very professional and kind! We loved it! Thanks again', 'Fantastic experience with beautiful views. We felt welcome from the moment we stepped into the restaurant. The waiters were very attentive, friendly, courteous and professional and ensured that each detail, big or small, was taken care of so that we could have an enjoyable experience. Our table was facing the Seine river and we enjoyed beautiful views and sunset. The chef prepared and cooked the meal in front of us, providing explanations and responding to our questions. Each dish in the menu was uniquely prepared, very flavorful and delicious. Highly recommended.', 'Everything was absolutely prestigious was give hot towels when first arrived and server with high respect and manners the food was unbelievable good Ofcourse a bit more in the expensive side but extremely good and worth it and the chef serving us extremely friendly and nice and the overall experience was amazing with the fire']

['We came here before lunchtime just for escargot, foie gras, oysters and wine. Everything was very good, escargots and foie gras were big. We ended with a tiramisu which was nice too.

Nice place with efficient staff, the senior lady who served us from the staff was very swift.

Highly recommended to give it a try.', 'Small mom and pop restaurant vibe. But oh man the food was awesome! Service was quick and I really appreciated that especially traveling with a young child. The bone marrow and cassoulet were my favorite dishes! The prices were reasonable and If I‚Äôm in Paris again, this is a sure stop.', 'Found as nearby and was surprised how great food and service is. Marrow bone was fantastic and beef tartar with cheese out of this planet. Onion soup of of the best in town. Will come back', "The food was amazing!! And especially onion soup is the best one thst I ever had... Chips and baguette is really crispy and soft at the same time and chicken is sooo soft and I love the sauce\U0001f979 But if you come to this restaurant you should try onion soup, it's absolutely amazing", 'Nice French food. The chicken is well done. Cr√®me bulee nice...']

['Truly good food for an authentic Cambodian restaurant and cuisine. The meat is very tender', 'Delicious food, great atmosphere, highly recommend this gem!', "The food was original and good.\nThe waitress was very friendly, spoke well English and gave useful explanations.\nCan't wait to come again with my friends.", 'Very nice friendly restaurant.   They were also great for our children', "I am a huge fan of cambodian food.  This place is good if I don't feel like making the trek to Republique.  Host sauce though could use some heat."]

['We had a very tasty meal, the food quality is very good at reasonable prices, and the wine collection is quite large as well.', "Order the entrecote steak with a 10euro red wine! You won't regret it. And the male staff  is super friendly and fun", "The waiters here are classy. Aude took care of us and she was wonderful. The food was tasty. It's a short walk from the Eiffel Tower. The sauce on the beef tartare was excellent, just enough flavors so it doesnt take away from the full taste of the beef. I really wish the wagyu steak had better texture but it was still good. Definitely recommend starting out with the bone marrow. Hope to be back again.", "Above all, the staff was so kind. We visited only after looking at Google reviews, and we were a little worried because we were not good at French. However, the staff explained it in English so kindly, and there was no problem with communication at all. And when we ordered meat for 4 people, they explained that we could order it properly so that we wouldn't overpay, and we were very satisfied. We plan to visit often during our stay in Paris. üëç", 'Come for the steak, stay for the bone marrow. Lovely little restaurant, very good wine list and very friendly staff. Perfectly located if you want to see La Tour sparkle. I don‚Äôt smoke but if that‚Äôs your thing, they have a cigar room. You can‚Äôt as it go wrong here, unless you are vegetarian.']

Adresse: Escale de, L'√Æle aux Cygnes, Pont de Bir-Hakeim, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Really enjoyable trip down the Seine and good food. Salmon dish particularly tasty. Meal well organised, very friendly service. Couldn‚Äôt go up past the Eiffel Tower to view the usual sights because of the high water level so went down river instead where we‚Äôd not normally see the amazing riverboats and families waving to us as we passed. Well worth doing this trip.', 'For the price you are paying, it is a really good experience with amazing views. The food was good, but the rice was very dry, which made the whole dish very dry. Also, you have to share 37.5ml wine for two? I expected a whole bottle to share. The staff was friendly. Please note that they will charge you ¬£20 for a pic or ¬£40 for three, which is crazy. üôÉ', "Overall ok but I didn't like the seating arrangement. I understand the purpose but it can be built with some more space. It was uncomfortable to get in and get out each time you want to.
It was moreover like a quick dinner experience where all three meal courses were served at rapid speed and then the trip ends.
I have had better experiences at a cheaper price in Dubai and Istanbul where it's more relaxed and fun.", 'The Paris en Sc√®ne dinner cruise was wonderful. I had a great view of illuminated Paris along the Seine. The server allocated to our section was excellent, providing wine and cocktail pairings, which enhanced my birthday celebration. This dinner cruise is ideal for enjoying the sights, a romantic meal or family celebrations. Would go again! Thank you.', "I was hesitant due to bad reviews but my family and myself had an amazing time!

I really like dinner, we all enjoyed it and it was served on time, as expected and warm, not to say also tasty.

The views of Paris at night are just marvelous so you gotta manage the sightseeing from the upper deck and the eating inside, believe it's a bit challenging üåü

The staff was very attentive and they do speak multiple languages, so that's a plus!"]

['Good experience, food is great. Amazing mix between French and Japanese cuisine‚Ä¶

I would have given a 4/5 starts but
the chef‚Äôs attitude toward his assistant was unacceptable, we witnessed several times slaps and kicks - that is not normal and should be reported, we felt really sorry for that assistant.', "Luckily, we don't need to wait on the Tuesday lunch. Excellent food, tasty dishes with attractive presentation. Great Japanese food fusion with French style.", 'A very lovely mix of Japanese and French culinary traditions. I particularly enjoyed the way fresh vegetables are served. They are very fresh (almost crunchy), and delicious. Food is presented like a piece of artwork.', 'Great presentation, great portion, and great taste. The thin sliced beef is cooked to prefect medium rare. I have never seem beef with this thin cut can be cook ed to this mouth melting perfection.  Amazed.', 'üç∑After confinement, me, 3 times phoned , 1 directly went to their front door, to make reservations, and 2/4 were successfully made. Very popular and hard to make reservations. This is no wonder, because their cost performance is great. As Japanese, my stomach is tiny, so it is quite tough to eat all the course. 1 st plate and dessert are both attractive, and it‚Äôs quite difficult to choose one of them. Yes! Their desserts are very very tasty.

I‚Äôm a big fan of appetizers, so I thought I‚Äôd rather choose their appetizer and dessert, because they are so deliciouly cooked.

In my opinion, Japanese teppan yaki is more rough and wild but at this place the chef adds all the delicate French trimmings to teppanyaki.

The chef is Japanese, but more French visitors than Japanese come to this restaurant.

In Paris, fish are not bad, but the way French prepare fish is not as good as Japanese. This is the reason why ,in Paris ,cooked fish doesn‚Äôt smell good or its texture isn‚Äôt good. Many Paris restaurants‚Äô fish menu disappointed me. But please trust this chef. You can have Japanese real( not fake) sushi level fish.

If you‚Äôre Japanese like me, try raw fish menu here.( Oh, sorry, but heated menu eaten by the other groups looked also good. ÊÇ©„Åæ„Åó„ÅÑ)„ÄÇ

Lunchtime wine costs generous, which makes me fonder of this restaurant.

Êó•Êú¨Ë™û„ÅåÈÄö„Åò„Çã„ÅÆ„ÅßÂÆâÂøÉ„Åó„Å¶Ê•Ω„Åó„ÇÅ„Åæ„Åôüç∑

üçΩUnder confinment, this restaurant has been doing take out dishes. One menu is a hamburger.

This hamburger is extremely addictive. This is a sophisticated restaurant, so maybe normally hamburgers are not in their field. And I avoided posting comments here.

But, as it were, thanks to the confinment I luckily  encountered this hamburger!  This hamburger period will finish on June 4!

This is truly the worst news of this month for me. I decided to post this comment, because poeple should not miss this occasion.

This hamburger will be a phantom burger in the future and I‚Äôm sure you‚Äôll be proud of having eaten this hamburger in the future.

I certainly will miss this burger.üò¢
(Sophisticated finely grilled beef one, looking like hundreds of shirimp stuffed shirimp one....tremendously yammy).

Appendix -I found out that after confinement they renew takeout menu and will continue to tekeouts!

Sadly, the humbergers became phantom menus, but I‚Äôm very much excited to have their renewaled dishes!

The desserts are extremely tasty and wonderful!
The other day, I tasted pineapple and mango dessert and japanese miso mousse, which is extraordinary.

You‚Äôll be amazed at how Chef create these desserts.

Additionally, ex President applauses this restaurant so much.

„ÅäÈ≠ö„ÅÆÂá¶ÁêÜ„ÅÆÂ∑ß„Åï„Åå„Åï„Åô„ÅåÊó•Êú¨‰∫∫„Ç∑„Çß„Éï„ÄÇ']

['I had a fantastic dining experience at DAROCO 16. The pizza was delicious, and the staff were incredibly friendly. The restaurant is beautifully designed with both indoor and outdoor seating, making it a perfect spot for any occasion. I highly recommend giving it a try!', 'The food was amazing, the pizzas are truly fresh and you can definitely taste it. The ambiance is also very nice but a little noisy when the restaurant is full. Still had a really great time :)', 'Fun casual atmosphere- best item was the pesto rigatoni. Wanted to try the ravioli but they were out :(. The pizza was good and so was the pea salad. Gin basil cocktail was the best. The service was very kind (a last min table on the spot) and helpful throughout dinner.', 'Very cozy atmosphere, servers were nice and food was delivered very quickly.\nPizzas are delicious, even though everything in the menu seemed tasty and special. Deserts: please don‚Äôt leave without trying the pear puff pastry (order it at the beginning of your meal) and the AFFOGAMISU - best tiramisu ever made: it has a crunchy texture and comes with vanilla ice cream inside. Incredible. hopefully I‚Äôll be back!', 'Took my wife for her birthday. Stunning place with plants and skylights. Food was top notch as was the service.']

["So we came upon this restaurant at 9 pm and it was full, but instead of turning us away, restaurant manager, Chulho was super friendly and very accommodating putting us on the reservation list for 930.  We came back at 925 where he offered us to come and sit inside, offered a drink a and some house roasted peanuts as we waited for our table.
The food was worth the wait!
We had the soup, papaya salad, yellow curry and the mango and sticky rice.
The service and atmosphere was on point.
I would 100% recommend this restaurant, as well, look forward to coming again next when I'm in Paris!", "Best Thai food I've ever had. Party of 5. Every dish was amazing. Highly recommend the green curry, the pork, papaya salad and the coconut chicken. Also the service is excellent. Do not skip the homemade coconut ice cream dessert!", 'For decades, I would eat in or take out whenever I went to Paris several times a year. When I visited for the first time in a while, the restaurant had been reborn. I took out the green curry and it was delicious. The staff allowed me to sit and serve drink while I waited for takeout. Last night, I had to wait outside in the rain at a nearby Korean restaurant, so I was very grateful.', '"Downgraded and deception of customers" After a few months away, everything has changed. The owner must have had a change of heart or faced losses, becoming blinded by short-term gains. It‚Äôs a betrayal of the regulars, and they‚Äôre now just a tradesman with no regard for the food or the customers.

Prices have gone up, and the popular menu (entr√©e + main course + (dessert)), loved by loyal customers for over 10 years, is gone. They‚Äôve switched to cheaper ingredients, reduced portions, and raised prices. They should never have compromised on the quality of the food.

The menu now looks like something from a Michelin restaurant, and the cost of that change has been passed onto the customers. It‚Äôs all for show, but the quality of the food has dropped. Walking out, I felt like I had been robbed by a place I once trusted. I hope they continue scamming new customers, but if you‚Äôre thinking of coming back here based on old memories, I suggest looking elsewhere.', 'The prawn pad thai was served in a big portions, suited for sharing, came with 2 king prawns. The jasmine tea was served in a small teapot, tasted good. The service was rendered efficiently. The staff were attentive, asked us a couple of times whether we needed something else for them to serve or whether we liked the food.']

['Delicious food, but not your Italian classic restaurant.
I loved it, especially the various ‚Äúemulsions‚Äù', "Best service in Paris!
Ma√Ætre d' was very humble about her English but spoke well and hard enough to introduce the dishes to us even though we don't speak French
Food was great as well, we had veal + lemon sauce, uni (sea urchin) tomato pasta and potato ravioli + truffle.
Tr√®s bien+++", 'One of the best Italian restaurants I have been to (and only counting places in Paris, this is already quite a win üôÇ). High quality, delicious meals, great cocktails ( Aperol Spritz here is the perfection). Best hummus I ever tried (dried tomatoes hummus‚ù§Ô∏è). Pastas - to die for ! Menu changes often, everything is fresh and seasonal. Many regular clients - and after 3rd time, I am one of them!', 'Best Italian restaurant we did in Paris ! Congrats to the chef', 'Love their food and dessert, great pasta and tiramisu!']

Nom: HSP La Table - Hu√Ætres et Saumons de Passy
Reviews:
['We had oysters, cod fish, zalm and grilled octopus for dinner. All of them were very fresh. The taste was delicious and authentic. The service was very good. Victor and Timoth√©e were really friendly and with good sense of humor. One of them helped to select a nice wine for us to go with the meal. Btw, the home made ice cream and tiramisu was also niceüòã. We will definitely come again when we go to Paris.', 'We found this gem as we were walking through the streets and decided to stop by for a bite‚Ä¶ WOW what a delicious treat it was!
Asked for a cocktail and the server made me something with sour Amaretto and eggs white which it was exactly what I needed and I didn‚Äôt know it!  Wife has wine which she was loving it as well.
We ordered oysters and the pumpkin with mushrooms soup and was out of this world.  We ended our small dinner with panna cotta with passion fruit and mango, excellent choice to ended!
The attention was great and our server was kind and funny, loved their restaurant and there is a no doubt to be back whenever we are able to!', 'Best oysters & seafood in Paris, in the coolest setting! Good wine too!', 'Book a table outside and enjoy fresh oysters ü¶™with a tiny local church wall behind you! Attentive staff with a sense of humor. Fabulous evening!', 'Food is very fresh here. Unique twists in each dish make everything a surprise. Desserts were delicious. We really enjoyed the moment there.']

['The food is fresh and flavorful. The pastels filled with Tuna are made like the typical ivorian pastels. The fish was well-seasoned. The strawberry mojito was sinfully delicious. My food was hot and came within 20 minutes. The server was nice and professional. The restaurant is spacious and beautiffully decorated. I will certainly return.', 'Very good food with an excellent ambiance and service. üëåüèΩüòã', "I arrived just when they opened for the day, so it was quiet, soft Afrobeat instrumentals playing in the background and I was able to clearly appreciate the decor. I was attended to but not overly with the food arriving timely. I ate one of the house specials, Tiep Bou Dienn...delicious with a glass of rose wine. I wish the fish was more but maybe I'm just an over-eating American. :)\n\nI would return and recommend to others for sure.", 'The food was good. A bit pricey but good.', 'Great location and nice food. It can be sometimes a bit long to wait for it but in the end it is really worth going. They also serve decent portions of food. Overall good experience']

['Rude French waiters, but the food was pretty good. The desert was fresh and the entree above average.', 'I can‚Äôt believe someone can say at least one bad word about this place. l love it, all my friends love it. I went there maybe 100 times, food is always amazing! AMAZING! And we do know food with my husband.. we travel a lot and had many events / dinners made by worldwide known chefs. And this place - is really good.', 'Went to this place by chance as it was just next to my Airbnb. So no expectation thinking to find just a little neighbourhood restaurant. But what a delightful surprise. Nothing pretentious but everything executed with great care and taste. Flavours were well balanced and every course was a hit, I even ended ordering extra starters just to taste. Great service as well and great atmosphere', 'We arrived late (after 10:00 p.m.) and fortunately we were still able to grab a seat for a bite to eat. We had the calamari as an appetizer. This one was really delicious. As a main course I had the steak tatar. I will definitely recommend this one! The portions are good!', "Off the beaten path so it wasn't overpriced and full of tourists. My judgment always starts with if the locals eat there, it must be good. We'll Le Tournesol had plenty of locals and from there we couldn't have asked for a better dinner experience. The wait staff was very attentive, the food and wine were exceptional,  and the atmosphere was very casual.\nIf you're looking for a great dinner, away from the hustle and bustle, we highly recommend Le Tournesol."]

Adresse: 24 Rue du Dr Finlay, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews: ['First of all the service was so friendly! They all seemed to be happy to be there and happy to wait on you! The food was delicious. We had appetizers, entree and dessert and all were fabulous! Highly recommend!', 'We were looking somewhere good to eat away from all the fuss of the Eiffel Tower and we found this place. My wife loved the food and I too. Amazing service! Thank you for making our trip memorable.', "If you're visiting from the US and don't speak the language, the staff here speak English. Reasonable wait time for the food and we're seated quickly as we arrived near opening time. My brother and father had the Gus burger, which comes with fries, and it was a good size as well as delicious. The caffe gourmand was also delightful, and it came with pastries. Myself, I got the ribs (Travers de Cochon des Montagnes), and I was absolutely blown away by the flavor. I don't like mushrooms, but the shiitake mushrooms were delicious as well as the rest of the dish. Not only that, it was really filling. It's also within walking distance to the Eiffel Tower. Would definitely recommend it. First time enjoying French cuisine and was thoroughly impressed.", 'After a long day of walking at the palace of Versailles, we were hungry and ready to eat. L‚ÄôAbreuvoir hit the spot! We started off our dining experience with a variety of cheeses and cured meats. Each one in different combinations was incredible and the mixed salad in the middle was also delicious. I also did order probably my favorite espresso I had had in Paris here. As far as our meals went, my wife had the chicken cutlet burger sandwich which was absolutely HUGE. Ton of flavor and the fries were also super crispy. My dish I wish I could remember the name, was a fish dish that was delicious. It had a ton of veggies and gnocchi on the bottom that was cooked to perfection. The fish was soft and had a ton of flavor. I was incredibly impressed overall with this place and would happily go again on my next visit.', 'Popped in here on a whim while in Paris, delicious food we got the chicken karaage for start I got the pulled pork burger (amazing) and I got myself a cheeky mojito too, the staff were so friendly and welcoming despite us not speaking French. Would definitely return again.']

['Very good traditional Japanese restaurant with Japanese Chef. The dishes are excellents and the "Fusion like dessert was perfect.
Little down star for me for the Rice which I would have prefered a Japanese Rice with less chalky kernels.', 'Just fantastic and delicious. The food was authentic and I left full after, which I‚Äôm pleased about. The chefs are real artists. I would recommend the wine pairing as it really complements the dishes. The service was great. The restrooms were super clean too.', 'Very nice service, beautiful presentation of each dish, the food itself is tasty but cannot say outstanding. Their meat is amazing by the way, better than the fish I feel.
On the menu I found it says it doesn‚Äôt allow kids to dine here at night in order to create a quite ambiance, I admire their courage! And I wish more restaurant can implement rules like this! üòÜ', 'The food is extremely authentic, delicate, full of  flavor. The service has been done with care and gentle.
We enjoy the moment having diner with friends', 'The meal was very good, with varied tastes, textures and a few surprises. I love Japanese food & this was high quality. However, our waiter was not good. He questioned our requests, pressured us to order, and when we were ready to order, he was nowhere to be found. Maybe he was having a bad night, but it did ruin the atmosphere']

['Really great experience. We really enjoyed super fresh sushi with tempura salmon and sashimi.', "A very good sushi place in Passy, 16th arrondissement in Paris, with a running conveyor of fresh sushi, rolls and other Japanese dishes are ready to be picked straight to the table.\nWe were there with two kids - 12yo and 9yo - and they had lots of fun there as the conveyor experience is very cool, and the food itself is worth the effort and money.\nWhen you're done, you have an amazing view of the Eiffel tower from the street's corner, which makes the whole experience even more perfect!", "I came here with my friend while visiting Paris for the first time (we are both from The Netherlands) and we both really liked the restaurant. We found it last minute (1 hour before) on Google Maps and we could get a seat here right away. We loved the experience of the treadmill with all the food on it, it looked great and it tastes amazing too. The service was amazing, as foreigners we both can't speak French at all, but the staff helped us in English and were very friendly, respectful and professional. Would recommend this restaurant to travelers and foreigners as well. You can make it as expensive as you would like since they charge you per plate you decide to take. We both would like to come back here again!", "20 euro 3 super small rolls (see the picture). They are smaller than a remote control and they cost more than 5 euro each, it's a shame.", 'I‚Äôve been going to this sushi train for a couple of years now and the renovations they‚Äôve recently done are great. There‚Äôs also a much better and more creative selection of plates. The service we had this evening was also fantastic, very attentive and polite. One small area for improvement: each of the dishes need to have a cover! This is basic hygiene. I‚Äôve never been to a sushi train where the dishes are rolling around totally uncovered, it‚Äôs really not ok. But other than that, it was a great night.']

['We had a great dining experience at this restaurant. We ordered steak and fries and a tagine. Unfortunately, the steak was overcooked (medium-well), which was a bit disappointing as we expected it to be more tender. However, the tagine was outstanding ‚Äì the meat was tender and full of flavor, and the root vegetables and couscous were cooked to perfection.

For dessert, we had a generous cheese platter, which was a real treat ‚Äì each cheese was more delicious than the last! We also tried the cr√®me br√ªl√©e, which was good and made for a lovely finish to the meal. The red wine we had, along with the IPA I drank, were excellent and paired perfectly with the meal.

The atmosphere was pleasant, and the service was friendly. The location in the 16th arrondissement is a real plus ‚Äì easily accessible, yet quiet and charming. We would definitely be happy to return!', 'Amazing food, original recipes , I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a great eating experience..üî•üî•üî•üî•üî•', "We ordered one espresso, one hazelnut coffee and a creme brul√©.
They gave us a caf√© cr√®me instead of the hazelnut coffee (that we accepted anyway to avoid discussions).

The cr√®me brul√© was tasteless, the coffee and the caf√® cr√®me were so awful that we didn't drink them.", 'Having a rainy weekend in Paris with our dog proved to be a challenge, but thankfully we came across this cafe with a great covered/closed in patio. Service was kind and excellent! Great formulas for brunch and the OJ was perfect. We will be back!', '(Dine in 5/5/2024)Robbery. Food is fine. But the service is not. We made a reservation with the folk which offering 30% discount on food. When payment, the waiter kept refusing to make discount on bill. Kept saying I need a card for discount and acted like having a language barrier. After payment, his English level suddenly returned to normal. Can I call it a discrimination? If you are not willing to give a discount, simply just shut down the folk option and stop cheating the customer.

Update on 10/5/2024:
Case addressed by the cafe‚Äôs manager. Verbal apologies with refund offered. So we are done here. Thank you for the prompt action from the manager. Wish you all the best.']

Adresse: 100 Av. du Pr√©sident Kennedy, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ['One of the finest fitness Club in Paris , everybody is so kind and helpful.  A warm welcome awaits you.  The Gym,  the swimming pool,  the food,  other fitness classes,  the spa,  the sauna , hammam , massage wellness is really superb . A must place to discover and experience all the benefits . Outstanding.  I really enjoyed a lot.', 'Best gym club in Paris', 'Great gym and more', 'Top', 'Good morning\n\nWhen will it reopen? It‚Äôs been three and a half years. It‚Äôs not serious.']

['Hidden gem in Paris! I was craving Japanese food and discovered this amazing yakiniku grill restaurant. The service was fast and friendly, and the food was absolutely delicious! The meat was tender and full of flavor‚Äîauthentically Japanese. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back next time with friends!', 'The special sauced pork belly, special beef tongue, and snowflake beef are all delicious.

I forgot my hat, and when I went to pick it up, the staff had already collected it for me and packed it in a plastic bag.  very good service! Really appreciate \U0001faf6.  The only complaint is that the space is very small, and some customers who are big size will definitely find the seats too crowded.', 'Super delicious!!! 100% recommended!!! Beef tongue is super tender and delicious, everything made us satisfied. Also the very friendly service and atmosphere here immediately brought me back to Japan. I recommend the ‚ÄúÂÆöÈ£ü‚Äù', 'Food: The food here is amazing. I think that the cuts that we were given were very good. The beef tongue in particular is a highlight for me. The only one that missed the mark was the chicken.

Service: Very very good. I think that the waitress that helped us with our table was extremely helpful throughout.

Atmosphere: Extremely lively. The authenticity of the place could not be doubted as all we heard throughout the restaurant was Japanese and it felt like their go to place for yakiniku.

While this place does lean on the pricier side, it is a must go for all who want to try authentic yakiniku in Paris.', 'The only original ‚Äúyakiniku‚Äû place here in Paris. Great service here too, dumbs up üëçüèªüëçüèª special thanks to their Hokkaido + Osaka staff. Tender and well marinated meat! Menu offers a wide variety of options. We also tried their fresh pressed beer üçªwe would definitely recommend this place to everyone ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è']

["This is one of those restaurants that we travel all the way from Australia to find. Staying in the 15th for the first time for several weeks gave us the chance to try new and off-the-beaten-track places. We found Le Volant Basque early in our stay and then went back several times. The food is exceptional... I rate their beef bourgignon as the best I've had in Paris. The whole experience combines genuine, honest and delicious food with a welcoming generous atmosphere. Paul and Dominic are avgenerous and friendly team and were welcomed with great humour on each visit. Don't miss this gem!!", 'Lovely experience of foods and atmosphere.
They have wonderful foie gras. Confit de canard is the must if you love duck. It‚Äô cooked with perfect crispy skin and tender meat.

We enjoyed friendly and causal conversations with people there. Absolutely we will go back again and again.', 'The food is amazing. This is the best restaurant I have ever been to in France.
The service is excellent. The staff is patient despite the language barrier. They are very helpful and professional in serving French cuisine. ‚ù§Ô∏è', "Le Volant Basque is one of those off the beaten path restaurants that you MUST try!  It's a family run restaurant and the food was incredible!!  My husband and I both ordered the Beef Bourguignon for our main entrees and it was absolutely delicious!   The staff are extremely accommodating and attentive.  We were seated outside which we were more than happy with since we didn't have a reservation, and by the time we left, the entire restaurant was jammed packed with people.  I recommend going early like we did, or make a reservation because it fills up fast!!   Totally worth it and definitely recommend!!", "After searching throughout the 7th and 15th for a restaurant that would accommodate our birthday party for 16 persons, I remembered this somewhat hidden Basque restaurant that we often walked by but never tried. It was a great decision.  From the moment we met the manager Paolo to our departure that evening at midnight we were in good hands.  Warm, engaging and full of character, a refreshing breath of fresh air in this era of credit card deposits and snobbery.   And the food is delicious.  If you are in this area and want a French meal as it used to be served with real heart and care, don't hesitate to visit.  Thank you to everyone at Le Volant Basque for such a memorable evening."]

['We stayed in Paris for 4 nights to celebrate my birthday and my partner and mines engagement and visited Les Ondes 3/4 nights.

The food was excellent and the service was even better! Yann absolutely made our nights and even brought us a small cake with a candle and 2 shots of rum to celebrate.

The other waiters were just as friendly but unfortunately, I was not able to catch their names!

We will definitely be visiting here again on our next trip to Paris!', 'I ate dinner at this location with my family of three. Our server was very kind and helpful. The main course was delicious 5 stars and the desert was equally as good. Bathrooms were very clean. Indoor, covered outdoor, and full outdoor area offered to eat. They allow smoking in the covered outdoor area.', 'Located just a few bus stations away from the Eiffel Tower, this restaurant offers a pleasant ambiance and friendly staff. While the truffle pasta was okay and nothing suprising, the burger, on first, looks like plain appearance, but stole the show with its delicious meat, the best I tried recently.', 'A superb brasserie near Radio France. We came for brunch. Everything was good ‚Äì the service, the decor, with a partial view of the Eiffel Tower. But the real gem is the kitchen, offering quick service.', 'Cool place to wine and dine. Good food and impeccable service.']

['Loved the butter chicken, tarka daal and buttered naan from Le Agra. Delicious food that the entire family enjoyed. Authentic Pakistani food. Thumbs up!', 'Ok.  I‚Äôm truly surprised to see that much negative critique here.   But I see it‚Äôs also relatively old reviews.

Butter chicken was one of the best I have ever had.  And I have visited a lot of Indian/Pakistani restaurants. Please don‚Äôt change that recipe.
We also had aubergines.   Really nice.
I only give 4 stars because portions aren‚Äôt very big.  Garlic nan was only 3 stars out of 5.  Food came quickly.   Staff was friendly.  All together a good experience.', 'Worst food.....there was no paneer in Palak paneer.......no garlic in garlic naan.....no taste...', 'Restaurant looks good, but looks can be deceiving. Quality of traditional Indian dishes was very ordinary at best. Service was ok, but meals took quite some time, and we were the only 2 people in the place. My meal (Tandoori Chicken) came from a frozen packet, not done in a Tandoor Oven. My brothers meal, Rogan Josh, was similar. Very disappointing.', 'Food was amazing, taste, quality, quantity, and to add to it hot oven fresh  tandoori roti. Best and Halal food superb']

['This was the best food we\'d had in Paris in our short stay. The onion soup was out of this world. The Iberian Pig with polenta and vegetables was to die for. But the most incredible thing I\'ve had in years was "Wild Prawns Carpaccio with caper jam and lemon candied cream" (their own translation). This was sublime.\nStaff were nice and friendly and helpful. We had a lovely time.This was the definition of a true french bistrot.', 'This restaurant and the team who‚Äôs running it are incredible!!! A real french escape with amazing food and very special natural wines‚Ä¶ All that in a village style ambiance. The Meyer Global Group loves to disconnect and forget a week of work in this relaxing Bistro.', "This restaurant was exceptional in every way! The food was amazing and the best meal I've had on Paris, which is really saying something. I shared the chicken terrine as an appetizer and had the seabass with ratatouille and the salmon with endive for our entrees--the food was simply divine! I also enjoyed their martini rosso as an aperitif and a coffee after my dinner--every sip was fantastic. The staff was amazing, kind, warm and inviting. I was blessed because I met the chef and was able to thank him personally for making my favorite meal in Paris. Simply amazing and highly, highly recommended.", 'Great meal! Perfect service and wonderfully welcoming. The grilled octopus was worth the visit. The steak was done perfectly. The staff were welcoming and checked in often.', 'Very impressive entr√©es. But we have to wait about 40~50 minutes to meet our main plates, and 2 dishes are not that good among 3 dishes.']

Adresse: 21 Rue Bois le Vent, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ["It's a simple place but has good food.\nService is great and i love the food\nMy go-to place for a quick lunch", 'Wow!  Authentic Japanese food located in lovely part of Paris.  üç±', "We thought the food was going to be prepared hot and fresh.  It actually was all pre-prepared and in plastic bowls and boxes in a refrigerator.  Once you pick one, the staff will microwave it for you. It did taste okay, but wasn't what we expected from the website.", 'Today around 13:15Ôºåwith my friend who doesn‚Äôt speak well French we chose Hana bento( La Muette) 21 rue bois le vent for Quick lunch. Bento quantity is not enough ( in comparaison with other japanese owned restaurant). When we payed, I asked if I could pay 2 ticket restaurant on the overall amount. My bento 13.9euros and friend‚Äôs ordered 12.9euros, total 26.8euros, Yes so I paid 20euros with ticket restaurant but while my friend‚Äôs charged 12.9euros so we paid 32.9euros! I argued and got back 1 ticket restaurant and repay 3.9 euros instead. What we wanted to point out is: check carefully what you pay if you eat at this place or buy something. Especially if you don‚Äôt speak well French.And I will not bring anybody here again, we have to take something else in another place because it is really not enough.', 'You can feel the japanese authenticity of the food and products from their epicerie. Very pleasant staff as well!']

Adresse: 116 Av. du Pr√©sident Kennedy, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Food is absolutely amazing. It is next to auditorium of Radio France. In starter I had ​
Mezze guacamole, eggplant caviar, Greek yogurt, Lebanese tabbouleh, hummus and fried pita bread. And in main course
Vegetable curry with coconut milk, Thai rice. Both dishes were out of world! Pita ciips with starter goes very well with all accompanied. The vegetables in main dish were cut very big to give Grande feel to the dish. Gulped it with good red wine. And finished with an expresso!', 'Amazing restaurant with nice name, inside the Maison de la Radio. View of the Eiffel Tower from certain tables. Elegant interior. Good food. Price a little high for the portions. Would recommend.', 'Special and good atmosphere.Fancy but tasty food. I order one tartar mixed with Thai Asia favor.Never try that but impressive.', "I thought this restaurant is on the roof! All photos from the gallery have roof view. Although the restaurant is located on the ground floor! Atmosphere and food was okay but the owner need to add correct photos to avoid wrong costumer's experience.", 'Was here last week with friends. The service was friendly and very efficient, with a smile. My fish was cooked to perfection. The wine was carefully chosen to accompany our meal üëçüèºüëçüèº
The view of the Effiel tower was spectacular ü§©ü§©ü§©']

['Excellent meal and first class service. Steak was cooked to perfection and very good burger. Good size portions and value for money. Would definitely recommend.', "My family and I were looking for a place to have dinner and we didn't want to go to a touristy restaurant, but a really French place where we could taste French onion soup. We also had great burgers and a fantastic Cr√©me Brul√©e. The owner is a very experienced chef who really knows what he is doing and is a master of his trade. When we are in Paris again, we will definitely be back. In the meantime, we will learn French better so we can enjoy other specialties. They're really good with meat here. Thank you also to the very nice lady for the lovely service.", 'La P‚Äôtite Table is our local hangout. It‚Äôs a small restaurant serving top-quality food. Although the focus is on meat it also offers delicious fish and vegan options. All products are fresh from the market, picked daily by the owner.
Service is excellent: Christophe and Sabrina make you feel immediately at home.
One of the best addresses in the southern 16th district of Paris.
Highly recommended.', 'Outstanding classic French fares for an awesome price‚Ä¶ definitely patronized by locals.', "Great French Avergnat food, great service. Don't hesitate !"]

['I feel very happy with the service of the restaurant, the food was yummy. just love it.', "I just love O'Tacos. Trying different O'Tacos across all over France. Their food is delicious but the Tiramisu is not recommended.
Merci.", "I visited this place recently and it is one of the worst O tacos I've visited till now. I have visited many but haven't seen one with such a slow service and bland tacos.", 'A place that is simply disgusting, the food is of a very poor standard. The attitude of the seller to customers is simply appalling.
A Lenny seller charged us for a miserable tortilla with only cheese for ‚Ç¨ 6.9 and when we came to ask for a change he claimed it was our problem if we did not like. We also ordered a bottle of water and were charged for a bottle of Coke.
Ranks them as the worst place in Paris.', 'original french tacos very tasty üëåüëåüëå']

['This is a hidden gem. My husband came across this accidentally when he went out to buy some groceries. The owner is such a kind and warm lady. She didn‚Äôt speak much English but with we were able to communicate using Google translate. The shop is quaint and the food was delicious. We ordered soup, lentils, ratatouille and quinoa. The soup was particularly good. They also have sugarless banana bread. Must try place.', 'Very hospitable and friendly service. Food was delicious and the server was very approachable. She tried patiently communicating with a lot of care despite a language barrier. Definitely recommend coming here!', 'The food is not only nutritious, but also delicious. The space is cozy and welcoming . Everything is made from scratch .', 'Best bio-organic in Paris', "Homemade cooking, organic food, fast service and above all healthy dishes with real vegetarian options!

It's rare that a place concentrates so many qualities. And then it's small, it's warm, you feel good there.

Thank you, I will come back!"]

["A great meal with nice personal service. The service is expectedly slow; fine dining in Paris is not rushed. It is a small/medium sized dining room. The dishes are delicately prepared. Mixing and plating many different ingredients in a dish can be tricky. They pulled that off well. For our meal, there's use of different exotic citrus fruits to enhance the palate. The crispy sugar coated mint leaves complement the dishes well. It was a very nice fine dining experience.", 'My family and I loved our experience at Comice! The food was fantastic and they took my dietary restriction (vegetarian) into account. We loved every course but especially loved the chocolate cake dessert!! I also want to commend Etheliya for her quick and helpful email correspondence while I made a few changes to our reservations. She was great and I loved meeting her in person! Delicious food and great service.', 'We went to Comice for my birthday. What a magical experience! We did the tasting menu and enjoyed every dish. The service was also very pleasant, it felt like everyone worked so smoothly together and they handled every dish with care. I would recommend coming here for a special occasion because it is pricey. But totally worth it!', 'Delicious meals, especially loved the juicy, flavourful bacon-wrapped venison that was served with smokey/fruity vin jaune sauce, and the tangy pear-cassis sorbet that was served with sweet citrusy champagne mousse. Service was excellent.', 'An amazing meal, in an amazing place. Very pleased for my first experience in a Michelin restaurant. The courses are great and you can tell they pay attention to every detail. Everything was excellent and even though I have photos, they don‚Äôt do the food justice. Thank you for my making my meal so special.']

Adresse: Port de Javel Haut, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews:
['This restaurant has amazing views of the Seine. The food was delicious and my waiter Norman was very professional and nice.  He was helpful with the menu and gave suggestions.  I Will come back and ask for him! Highly recommend!', 'Great ambiance and a wonderful location. Staff was very nice and welcoming. Food was good as well. All in all, a good place to enjoy views of Statue of Liberty, Eiffel Tower while sitting next to the Saine!', 'Although a bit pricey, the service and experience is worth it. By the river and with a day with good weather, sitting at the terrace is a great idea. The food was also up to par, definitely good and fresh, but I definitely enjoyed the sorbets a lot, they were amazing but the tuile it‚Äôs served in seemed like it had been out for a while', 'Great service . Lovely atmosphere! Great view . The mashrooms with the eggs was delicious and so was the plate of cheese.
The ‚Äúharicots‚Äù where sublime !!!!
Nevertheless the fish was dry and the crispy duck was not crispy at all ‚Ä¶a bit disappointing (that was on Wednesday 16th .
On Thursday I was invited to the same place and we ate a delicious ‚Äúceviche‚Äù or Tiradito .
The fish was also excellent!! The music was a bit too loud to talk but fun for the ones who wanted to be at the bar', 'Great food, amazing atmosphere especially for christmas with the deco. Removed 1 star because it‚Äôs a little bit too expensive in my humble opinion. But not bad prices considering the quality.']

['I recently had the pleasure of visiting chipotle in paris and was thrilled to find that the food was just as delicious as I remember from their location in USA . The flavors were as vibrant and well-balanced as ever, and it‚Äôs clear that the team has maintained the same level of quality and care in their dishes.

Each bite was a reminder of why I fell in love with their food in the first place. The consistency between the one I ate in USA  and this location is remarkable‚Äîwhether it‚Äôs the perfectly cooked proteins, the carefully crafted sides, or the delightful presentation, every dish felt just like a visit to the original spot.

What I truly appreciate is that they‚Äôve maintained the same warm, welcoming atmosphere, which makes the meal even more enjoyable. It‚Äôs rare to find a place that keeps its standards high through expansion, but Chipotle has managed to do just that. If you loved the US branch, you‚Äôll be pleased to know that the quality and deliciousness are still very much intact. Highly recommend it to anyone craving a truly satisfying meal!', 'Was pleasantly surprised with how much it tasted like Chipotle in the states! The chips were good too! They don‚Äôt have queso, so mentally prepare for that if you‚Äôre someone that needs itüòÖ', "I recently had the pleasure of dining at this fantastic grill restaurant. It truly exceeded my expectations. From the moment I walked in, the inviting aroma of grilled meats enveloped me, setting the stage for a delicious meal. The ambiance was warm and welcoming, with rustic decor that complemented the theme perfectly.

I decided to try their signature steak, and it was cooked to perfection‚Äîjuicy and flavorful with a beautiful char on the outside. The sides were equally impressive; the grilled vegetables were fresh and seasoned just right, and the garlic mashed potatoes were creamy and rich. The service was attentive without being intrusive, making the experience all the more enjoyable.

For dessert, I couldn't resist  an iceream , which was the perfect ending to the meal. Overall, this grill restaurant is a must-visit for anyone who appreciates quality food and a great atmosphere. I can't wait to go back and try more of their menu!", 'Pretty nice! The food was very nice and delicious. We tried the bowls there and everything was very good and very tasty. This joint is very well located near a mall and in a nice neighbourhood of Paris.

Service was very fast and very efficient, and ordering was very easy.

I would definitely comeback again in the future to try out the tacos or burritos!', "üåØ Chipotle got the best recipe! We were served with a thick and heavy burrito, with fresh ingredients. Reasonable for the price.

üå∂Ô∏è You have the choice between different type of meats or vegan options. I have tried the beef and chicken, both very tasty and the amount was well balanced in my burrito.

ü•ë You gotta try the guacamole! Its excellent, its no stretch to say that it is the best guac I ever tasted so far. Their tortillas are addictive too, you won't be disappointed.

üé∂ Atmosphere-wise, the place is calm and the staff is welcoming. No loud music or dirty surfaces, plus you got a nice bay-view window to enjoy your meal."]

['First time going in this Cinema and it was quite a good experience. Paid ‚Ç¨17 for a movie (booked in advance), they have also machines inside where you can buy tickets. There are lots of snacks to choose from, and easy to get popcorn. Inside the cinema offers good seats.', 'I recently watched a movie at this Path√© Cinema and I had an excellent experience. The theater offers comfortable, reclining seats that made the two-hour movie fly by.

The theater was spotless, ensuring a smooth entry and exit.

However, I found the prices to be quite expensive. Both the ticket prices and snacks were higher than expected, which might deter some people from visiting frequently.

Overall, Path√© Cinema is a top-notch venue for movie lovers, but be prepared for the higher costs.', 'Wow! Now that‚Äôs cinema! They have multiple rooms with different purposes, but the general places are really spacious and well organized, the staff is really nice but the show stealer are their 4DX and Dolby experience rooms! Incredible!', "Really good movie theater, has 4DX(basically when water splashes the current character on screen/character's POV, water splashes on you (water can be turned off)", 'Great to watch movie in 4DX with 270 degree of screen view. Incredible experience.
Sound quality was average but the 4DX effects were mind blowing. Overall great experience.

The toilets were the worst part. Too stinky and dirty.']

Nom: Le Caf√© Le Cordon Bleu, Paris
Reviews:
['Had a great experience at their cafe! Super friendly students serving delicious baked goods they made. Highly recommend trying their croissant and Madeleine.', 'Interesting place to taste the product was made by famous School cilinary in Globe
And the price value for money
They have also souvenir shop Brand.', 'I visited twice. once in October and one in April.
I had the pistachio cake and it was really delicious, while my friend enjoys pain au suisse.
the sandwiches are available after 10:00 am. you can get a pan keychain... my favourite in the world', 'You can get good food for a great price. Also cool to see the students cooking. They have certain time periods where you can get a cheaper set. Before 10 you can get a coffee and croissant set which I got. There is also a lunch set but you should make sure not to miss the time cutoff maybe check in advance idk.', 'Never ever recommended
Very very normal croissant, regular coffee']

Adresse: Centre Commercial, 7 Rue Linois 1er √©tage, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Visited this place with friends and had a great time. The staff is respectful and the food was very delicious.', 'Multiple vegan options with rice/noodles. The restaurant is located in a commercial center, but offer a nice view to the river', 'Excellent service and authentic Chinese food. We had the nasi goreng vege and non-vege versions, which are both very frequent. We also had the fried brinjal which is also very authentic. The oolong tea is also very fragrant. The restaurant serves sushi too. I recommend this restaurant if you have craving for Chinese food.', "My family and I highly enjoyed this restaurant for dinner. There was something for everyone, all the food was delicious, fresh, and servings were generous. Flavours were authentic, and when we asked for dishes spicy, they were fantastically spicy! Chairs were comfy, restaurant was very clean and modern, and staff were attentive. We can't speak French, but we were delegated an English-speaking waiter which was very helpful. We would definitely visit again to try more off the menu!", 'We ate the Japanese breaded chicken and the chicken was burnt, bland, and overcooked; moreover, even after recooking, it was bitter and still very bland. Not only was that the problem, when we ask for it to be recooked it took an extraordinary amount long time for it to be brought out again. We will not be going to this restaurant again.']

Adresse: 16 Rue Bois le Vent, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Best 10 euro lunch in town!  Everything is fresh and tasty!', 'Lovely people and very good potatoes.\nAlways nicely welcomed.\nThank you family !', 'Good dishes at fair prices, ideal for lunch', "traiteur chinois, a neighborhood I've always wanted to visit. There is some space to sit and eat, and there are some good-value lunch menus, so it's worth going there occasionally.", 'Always happy to go to this place. Good food, warm welcome, fast service.']

["We visited this hotel at the end of December with our family of four. The hotel is clearly designed with children in mind, so if you're traveling without kids, there are likely better options available in Paris.

The location is excellent and easily accessible by car. The hotel offers parking for ‚Ç¨25 per day, but when we arrived, the parking lot was full, and we had to park at a nearby shopping mall, which cost ‚Ç¨38 per day. At the time of our visit, it wasn‚Äôt possible to charge an electric vehicle either at the hotel parking or the shopping mall, although charging stations were being installed at the mall.

Our room faced in the direction of the Eiffel Tower, but unfortunately, the view was obstructed by another building.
The room as the hotel itself was well maintained and clean. The restaurant could have a refreshing because it looks a bit worn out.

There is an RER station about a 10-minute walk away and a metro station roughly 15 minutes on foot.

The breakfast buffet offers good value for its price. We didn‚Äôt use the fitness or wellness facilities, but overall, we have no major complaints about this hotel.

The reason I‚Äôm giving 4 stars instead of 5 is due to the limited parking availability during our stay.", "A great location and a practical quality hotel for our family of 5 to explore Paris.  The room was clean with a good use of space with a good quality shower room and toilet.  Plenty of storage space.
Breakfast was good value if you didn't want to hunt out a Patisserie.  Staff were very helpful and polite.
Didn't get to use the retro game machines as we were too busy exploring Paris, but they looked like good fun.  A good hotel for accommodating families of 5 or more.  Metro stops within short walking distances away to allow you to explore the city.", 'The location is great, a few blocks from a train and subway station, and the Eiffel Tower is 10 minutes walking. If you travel with kids they have all they need inside the property, arcades and a playroom. Our kids loved the Pac-Man theme.', 'Price/quality a good hotel to book, certainly with kids. I recommend this hotel to families with kids. Kind staff and clean rooms. Nice visuals in the lobby and in the corridors. You might wish some more space in the room on rainy days. Breakfast was all right, tables were not always very handy (round ones) and we missed some fruit. Entrance is not accessible on the ground floor, but there is an escalator. Metro some steps away and some good restaurants in the neighbourhood. Perfect stay to start discover Paris.', "Perfect central location, walkable distance to Eiffel tower. Clean room, beautiful design of the lobby, super friendly staff, secured and covered parking. The breakfasts don't worth the money I paid."]

['Salad Juice  coffee  cashier Barista  little English speaking  so make sure your order  repeatly to make your wish . Not to busy but drink order take a more time you expecting', 'Nice cafe just across from Gallery Lafayette. A bit on the expensive side and waiting time a bit long. 1 bathroom. Coffee was decent, but 2 x coffee and 1 cookie for ‚Ç¨14 is on the expensive side', 'I dont wanna be rude but this was the worst experience in a cafe i could ever humalely imagine. The staff didnt understand what we were ordering because he didnt know their own menu, so we had to explain what it says behind him. That was unfortunately the least of our problems there, since the coffee tastes like a rubber/silicone-atomic acid. Couldnt even finish half of it. Then in addition it smelles like dog poop in there. Dont come here', 'A must stop every time in Paris.
For the juices super hulk and young blood is a must.
Their sandwiches is outstanding, fresh and healthy. The only place where you can have the right ‚Äúflat white‚Äù. Concerning the service, you select the food you want from the fridge, head to counter to select the drink and pay; your drinks will be served to your table.
Never miss it.', 'Great orange juice, as well as other good drinks. I would recommend this to a close friend as it‚Äôs quite comforting.']

['The quality and choice of smoked salmon presented will make you discover, appreciate and love the REAL taste of quality salmon.
Same analysis for a large choice of caviars and Taramas.
Add to that a warm welcome and you can only leave with a big smile and the desire to quickly taste your purchases.
*Recommended house', 'An unmissable place for caviar lovers, a tarama truffle to die for... Charia always with a smile so as not to spoil anything', "Very warm welcome, not being a caviar expert I was able to get great advice, namely that each caviar producing region has grains and a totally different taste and is not only a function of one's wallet but of taste what you are looking for! I warmly recommend", "They sell expired salmon scraps, the salmon smelled extremely bad. It's shameful for a delicatessen...", 'Selection of very beautiful products around high-end caviar and salmon.. Excellent!']

Adresse: 24 Ter Singer, Rdc gauche, 75016 Paris, France

Reviews:
['Food was delicious and for a very good price. Service was 10/10, the waiter was so nice. Just a very nice place overall - would recommenedüôå', "The food was OK at best. I really like shrimp tempura so I order it but the oil it was fried in was so old the shrimp was almost black and tasted like burned oil.
We asked for one more container of soy sauce and they said we have to pay, even though we placed two orders.
We agreed to pay for that extra soy sauce container but they said they don't accept card payment for that.
Bad first experience and it was definitely our last time there.", 'Really crunchy and savoury katsu chicken. Good value menus tooü•¢', 'We found Oka Sushi on our last day in Paris, and we‚Äôre so glad we did. We had the best dinner, great ambiance, an amazing waiter, and fresh and delicious sushi! Prices are fair and portions are great. You won‚Äôt regret coming to this place!', 'The sushi was very tasty and fresh,  it‚Äôs an affordable restaurant we got a soup as starter it was also delicous.
They are very friendly ! I reccomend this place if you are in paris and you love sushi!']

['I recently had an extremely unpleasant experience at the Starbucks in Beaugrenelle. I purchased a chocolate cake, only to find a piece of gum embedded in it while eating. ü§Æü§ÆThis was not only unhygienic but absolutely revolting.

When I returned to the store to calmly express my concern, I discreetly spoke with Sara, the barista, to avoid alarming other customers. However, I was shocked and deeply disappointed by the response I received. Instead of apologizing or addressing the issue, Sara accused me of placing the gum in the cake myself. This behavior was unprofessional, dismissive, and added insult to injury.

Starbucks needs to take better care of the quality of their products and ensure their staff are trained to handle customer complaints respectfully and responsibly. This experience has left me disgusted and hesitant to trust the brand again.
ü§¢DO NOT BUY HERE !! ü§¢', 'Thursday around 4pm. They are busy each other to talking', "It's located in Monoprix (2nd floor) and not large. Also outdoor seat and no Wi-Fi.
(2019.Mars) I can't pay as starbucks app. Cash and card are available.", "The staff didn't speak properly English which should be required because there are a lot hotels in that area. They got my order completely mixed up and I ended up with to totally different drinks from what I ordered. They got the wrong size and the wrong kind of iced tea I wanted. It still tasted FINE but definitely not the best starbucks location.", 'It's not a "real" Starbucks : no fidelity program (no star earn, can't pay with phone app, etc.). You should better go to the big one at 300m (Charles Michael's metro station).']

['Wonderful cappuccino, amazing food, and friendly even if your French sucks. Highly recommend if you‚Äôre looking for a good Croque Monsieur', 'We had a lovely evening at this restaurant, however the onion soup had too much bread and the waiter wasn‚Äôt really attentive.', 'Great atmosphere. Food is your delicious basics. Staff lovely', 'Best place to get a drink or dine with a great staff and AMAZING food ü§©', 'We were welcomed with hostility immediately who treated us with NO respect and courtesy. The owner was disgusting and racist who insulted us. Considering the high prices we paid, vomit on the side of the road would have tasted 100x better than the rubbish they plated for us and called ‚Äòfood‚Äô. Rather than focusing on bringing customers into your ‚Äòrestaurant‚Äô I recommend focusing on making your food edible. DO NOT recommend and AVOID AT ALL COSTS']

['We were passing by and decided to give a chance to this AMAZING restaurant.

The owner, such a pleasant and welcoming person, treated us like we were one of his own family.

The atmosphere, service and personal were only a treat compering to the amazing food! This should be deserved a chef restaurant where everyone should know in that corner of butiful Paris.

I would recommend youll give this one a try!', 'Excellent food the owner was an excellent host. It was my first time there and he made me feel at home.', "Lovely food, lovely atmosphere, great welcoming host. Staying near Disney so was happy to have some real food after a few days of sandwiches!! Had a delicious pizza and chips and very happy that I know some Hebrew as the owner was more comfortable with that than speaking English! Originally was going to take out the pizza but realised that the box was going to be tricky to carry on the metro, so the owner just set me up with it served on a plate. Didn't even charge me for the chips! Ate it very quickly then back on the Metro to Disneyland!!", 'Wonderful and delicious food. Gracious host. Eager to please. Happy to accommodate all requests! Lovely atmosphere in the restaurant. Highly recommendedüëå', 'Great great food! Great service as well!']

['Cheap, fast, delicious. Surprisingly good dim sum! I‚Äôd come here weekly if I lived in the neighborhood. Very nice counter service too', 'Very good experience. Real authentic Chinese food. Excelente taste. I would like to have chopsticks instead of silverware, but other than that was great!', 'Very friendly staff and enjoyable food. My children equally enjoyed the experience.', 'I love the concept of choosing your food. It reminds me of home. Different food choices, if you love Chinese food, you would definitely enjoy here.', "I don't understand the low reviews. Popped in today during lunch and I ordered a variety of vermicelli noodles, shrimps, chicken in lemon, beef. All dishes were excellent especially taking into account the price. I would def go back."]

["Ordered takeaway from Daikichi so we could enjoy our last night in Paris down in the gardens under the Eiffel Tower. Really nice last meal for Paris with my only regret being I didn't order more! All the sushi was very fresh. Would highly recommend and while we didn't dine in, the restaurant looked nice also. Good value for sushi also!", 'Lovely place for lunch during work. If you love salmon, you should order this plate, which comes on a bed of ice! Perfect for a salmon overdose!', 'Our favorite sushi-restaurant! We have also take-out and it‚Äôs always fresh and delicious.', 'The sashimi was relatively ok, but the ginger was not properly marinated this time. The whole sashimi used to be perfect once. What happened?', 'We love this restaurant! Service is good, food is good quality at a very reasonable price.']

["The service could use some improvement, as it felt a bit below expectations. Unfortunately, the Kubide had an off taste, and the customer service experience wasn't the best. I hope these issues can be addressed for a better experience in the future.", "The place was welcoming but a bit difficult to communicate as they didn't speak much English but we managed as a lovely lady tried her best. The place was decent, but nothing special to grab ones attention or to leave an impression. Empty when we came in but filled it's small seating capacity quite quickly.

Was my first visit on Teheran food thus had not known what to expect. The food filled with meat which was tender and delicious along with rice w/ safron which was a delight to have along with the dishes. Rice is not common to have in France and our expectations for well made rice dishes were low.

Overall good experience with good for, atmosphere was not the best and could improve. If you are craving rice and some well cooked delicious meat, don't look any further.", 'I can call myself Koobideh specialist as I tried it the best Iranian restaurants.
