I give 4 to the Kabab Koobideh of Teheran restaurant. I tried it 2 years ago and it was better for me. The staff are really nice. And side dishes are really tasty. Totally recommend this place', "Very special and tasty meat, also riz with safran and grenade sauce. Definitely should try the dough, it's refreshing yogurt with dry mint drink. A bit expensive i guess, but it's worth to go from time to time.", 'Amazing Iranian food with friendly staff, rhetorical Kebabs are recommended.']

Adresse: 17 Rue Bois le Vent, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Really good red and green curry. Spice on point. Taste on point. Would definitely recommend. Can be a bit crowded during lunch on office days.', 'Service is fast, and the food is great! Definitely worth visiting to try and discover their dishes. Portions are especially very generous. Highly recommend!', "The lady cashier is super nice and friendly. When she took our order she smiled. Every time we had an eye contact she smiled. She spoke English and was friendly.
They have some nice chairs and tables outside but indoors dining is not a good idea because it's a very small restaurant.
The food is good I think but too oily. I also don't think the ratio of protein to noodle or rice is good because the quantity of meat is just not enough.

EDIT: went there on 15/9 at 9pm. Ordered a pad thai with chicken. There's no chicken and no fried onion in it. It's all watery like soup. Just paid for some wet noodles!
Very disappointing...", 'The food was really good for the price. The service was ok, nothing crazy.', 'went here for lunch with friends and no one was disappointed! it was very yummy and you order yourself on a kiosk. the food came pretty quick as well.the only downside is that it is small on the inside']

['I have the best time eating here . I was craving Korean foods and this is one of the best meals I had in Paris . Portion sizes are  huge and very affordable indeed.', 'Visited the place for the second time this year, first time was so good that I had to come again, and I wasn't disappointed, we had the "menu midi" we chose the shrimp and the Bibimbap as main dishes, big portions, very reasonable price, great service, definitely going back again.
And oh the ice cream is so yummy, I wish I took a photo of it.', 'The meal at hanjan was so good. The prices were reasonable, and the food was delicious, making it a great place to come with friends.', 'Really nice place, highly recommended!
The food is delicious and very affordable.
The service is top-notch - you can order ahead of time through the app and get served straight away. And the waiters are very attentive and considerate.
Worth the stop!', 'AMAZING! I would give 6 stars ‚≠êÔ∏è if possible! Delicious and quality food, super nice and police staff, good atmosphere, nice location. The food is gorgeous and the quantities are abundant. One of my best meals ever! I loved it!']

['The dishes change every day, but I loved what I ordered. I was practicing my French and I appreciate that the owner tried with me even if the waiter didn‚Äôt üôÇ Food was amazing, I just wish I asked for mashed potatoes instead of getting fries twice just because ALL their food was SO good!', 'It is a restaurant loved by the locals. Staff there were kind and help us move in\nwhen we don‚Äôt like sitting outside- people smoking. The food is delicious and worth every penny.', 'Ate breakfast here several times. Really good service and prices', 'Not many diners in this evening, friendly service, a little bit of a struggle for kid-friendly options, and barely a vegetable in sight - including in the French onion soup - which was mostly soggy bread and no onions to be seen. The steaks we had were nicely cooked and generous, and not overpriced. Good chocolate mouse and Cr√®me brulee. 70s/80s/90s ballads on the stereo :-)', 'LOVED the magrets des canard (duck breast) there - perfectly cooked! Cute cafe with heaters on their patio and opens early for lunch!']

['Services was fast. Food was really good. As a mexican I have just a little bit of trouble to communicate but the gentleman was really cool.', 'Incredible pizza, one of my favorites in Paris. All ingredients are fresh and you can taste that in every dish. This is a two Italian men operation and the food couldn‚Äôt be more authentic.', 'Small but very lovely Italian restaurant- owner is full of fun, Italian pop music in the background,  and great pizza!! Will be back for sure', "Great service, AMAZING food! We had the truffle pasta and the calabrese pizza. If we're ever back in Paris we're definitely coming back to this little gem of a restaurant !!", 'Amazing place with very nice food. The owners are polite and funny! Visit it.']

Adresse: Avenue Gustave Eiffel 2√®me, Tour Eiffel, Av. Anatole France, 75007 Paris, France
Reviews:
['We went there for a late lunch around 2PM. Everything about this restaurant was great. They had a staff  on street to guide us through an exclusive and hassle-free entrance to Eiffel tower. Then using a private lift to go to the restaurant.
The service was five-star. Each dish was a piece of art, the wines were reasonably good, and the view was fantastic.
It was absolutely worth it and definitely go back there.', 'My wife and I enjoyed a fabulous meal with superb wines. The sweetbreads were particularly outstanding. Worthy of two stars without a question.The team catered to my allergies brilliantly and we both had an unforgettable experience.

Unfortunately they do not allow you to purchase wine in advance for opening, but they did use larger decanters to help. However I would be remiss if I did not point out that for Paris and a restaurant of this calibre, the wine list is very well priced.

Definitely not a tourist trap. A true 2 Michelin Star experience. The setting is incredible but the food is better!', "Dining at Jules Verne was an unforgettable experience! The breathtaking views of Paris from the Eiffel Tower paired perfectly with the exquisite cuisine. Every dish was beautifully presented and full of flavor, showcasing true culinary artistry. The staff was warm, attentive, and ensured every detail of our meal was flawless. This is more than just a restaurant‚Äîit's a once-in-a-lifetime dining adventure. Highly recommended for a special occasion or anyone looking to create lasting memories in Paris!", 'The place and atmosphere the restaurant are wonderful. The staff are all kind, polite and very friendly.  The restaurant is very clean and organised.
The food wasn‚Äôt for my taste. A bit salt and cream. Some combination of flavour were divergent.  Each person has different tasty ü§∑
I notice, all food was made with care, fresh ingredients and a lot of hard work to delivery piece of art inside the plate.
The entrance is well signed and easy to get inside.
I do recommend the place for the experience to eat inside the Eiffel Tower with amazing view and excellent service and variety of dish.
The view, oh! It is be best you can get in Paris.', 'An amazing experience. Exquisite dishes with very unique flavors. Excellent service and accommodations. The restaurant offers a private elevator to go to the top of the Eiffel Tower. It‚Äôs really the perfect choice for a special occasion. The dining room offers a panoramic view overlooking Paris. If it is something you want to experience, make sure to reserve in advance.']

['The hotel is simple, but is very good. The room is comfortable and clean, with a bed and a TV. The bathroom is also good. The hotel localization is excelent near to the metro service and around 25 minutes walking until Eiffel Tower.', 'We stayed 3 nights in H√¥tel L√©onard de Vinci 2 in late March. It is situated in a good location close to the Commerce Metro Station on Line 8. We got a room in the 2nd floor. An elevator was not available, hence we have to use the staircase to access the room. The room had adequate heating.
The bathroom had hot water, amenities (soap, shampoo ) and towels. The room service was good and it was performed daily. Towels were also changed daily.', "We stayed 3 nights in H√¥tel L√©onard de Vinci 2 in early April. It is situated in a good location close to the Commerce Metro Station on Line 8. We got a room in the 3rd floor. An elevator was not available, hence we have to use the staircase to access the room. The room had barely enough space to manage for a couple and it was clean. The room had adequate heating and we were able to adjust the level of heating.

We didn't have any kettles to heat up water, but the owner was kind enough to provide hot water from the restaurant at the basement. The bathroom had hot water, amenities (soap, shampoo ) and towels. The room service was good and it was performed daily. Towels were also changed daily. Although the previous images show very dark rooms, this property has been painted very recently.", 'Great location, very nice and acomodating owner. Special thanks to those two girls incharge of room cleaning in the morning. Always smiling and never miss to greet, room was done on daily basis without asking.
Only downside is the speed at which hot water comes in the shower. Bit of patience test but it does serve the need.', "I don't reccomend this place especially if you have kids. No microwave,  not even a cooler to put milk for baby. Handle of the side tables are falling apart. And the way up to the room are so narrow, lights are so deem.. again IF YOU HAVE KIDS.. DON'T STAY TO THIS PLACE. I hope they will improve this hotel in the future."]

['Absolutely love this restaurant! Every time I‚Äôm in Paris, I make sure to book a table here. The food is just fantastic, everything is so fresh and full of flavor. You can tell they put real heart into every dish.

On my latest visit, they even went above and beyond by making my favorite starter, which had been taken off the menu. The owner is incredibly warm and attentive, always making sure guests feel welcome. Highly recommend it to anyone looking for a heartfelt dining experience in Paris.', "We visited Paris with our kids and wanted to experience a traditional French cuisine experience. This restaurant was perfect for our family. Beautiful quaint restaurant and amazing food, what else could we want! We had the Duck a l'Orange and the salmon. Both dishes were exquisitely done. Escargot was also tasty as well at the desserts we tried. I wish we lived closer so we could visit more frequently. Definitely worth trying if you're in the area.", 'Quaint French restaurant near the Eiffel Tower with white linen table clothes and excellent French food. They have a menu with 2 or 3 courses for lunch and dinner. Seating capacity for 24-30 people. Reservations are recommended.  Plates were beautifully presented, and the flavors were excellent in every course. Not a bad bite all night, for everyone at the table.', 'Absolutely good food. Best restaurant in Paris that I‚Äôve been to. Wait time is a bit long but it‚Äôs worth it.', "This is it!  A super friendly, family atmosphere.  The signature Foie Gras is home made.  I wished to try every menu here.  I would definitely come here again.

The Feux d'artifice, fillet, was so tender, though well cooked outside.

The only thing, the volume of desert Cr√®me Br√ªl√©e)‚Ä¶. Very big;-), but can we blame?  No!  Hahaha.

I‚Äôm really grateful to my friend who took me here!"]

["My wife and I picked this place as a way to try a true expression of French cuisine based on the large number of reviews. Unfortunately we didn't find it as enjoyable. The service was friendly and effective. The atmosphere was lively with a retro feeling. Like you are stepping into a vintage restaurant. We ordered traditional French cuisine dishes such as Terrine, duck... but... the dishes were completely lifeless and forgettable, almost sad. My wife, who is a foody and a great cook, blamed it on execution, but I cannot confirm or deny since I am not a cook. The fact is that we left very disappointed. Fortunately we had the opportunity to taste delicious food in several other places and this experience became a minor low point in our first visit to Paris. Sadly, a experience to forget.", 'What a great first meal in Paris!  The food was great!  Lots of fresh seasonal daily specials - we will be back!  Charming staff made us feel welcome', 'Good experience to taste real French cuisine. It was fully booked but the wait staff were very efficient and kept the order coming fast. All dishes were delicious. We enjoyed our dinner', 'I have always visited this restaurant whenever I visit Paris since 2009. This was my fifth visit. I was also satisfied with the food and service!

I always order beef steak and 45cl of wine. I ordered white wine this time because the temperature was quite hot, and I wanted to feel fresh and light flavors.

It was a nice choice, and the cafe (espresso) was perfect.

I will be visiting here again.', 'The service was outstanding, and the food was incredible. It would be beneficial to have more variety on the menu items. The desserts earned a perfect 10/10; we sampled all of them offered. I highly recommend this place.']

['Mixed feelings. Warm welcome and very good service. Poor decor and no selection but bar stools. Tables need changing (see pics) / entrees and soup great, the clams were delicious and the snails perfect. The salad was average (for 30euros) you could get that in a local supermarket. Chicken was well roasted and the steak (small portion) was cooked at taste. The cheese was a very thin slice (to launch at) same was the desert. For such a price point (40-50 euros per person) I would have expected more. Almost a tourist trap if it was not for half of the dishes. Would not recommend.', 'What an amazing place, a local vibe with upscale food. If you sit near the back you can watch the kitchen action. Dinner was spectacular with the Soup (chestnut and duck) being our favorite. The staff did a great job with wine paring. I know there are a lot of great restaurants in Paris but this one should be at the top of your list.
We found this restaurant from the recommendation of a friend and made a last minute reservation through google.', 'Wonderful restaurant. The decor is lacking but the food and service are fantastic.  We are tourists and after visiting the Eiffel tower we decided to chose a random restaurant on this street with many restaurants and we are SO glad we chose to eat at Les Cocottes.

It‚Äôs good to know that this restaurant must be related to the Michelin restaurant (Violon) just next door‚Ä¶.food is wonderful but you don‚Äôt have to pay the high prices.  Go eat here and have a great time.

Food: The Coquille St-Jacques (scallops) looked amazing - unfortunately we didn‚Äôt order them but the table next to us did.  I had the set dinner (Monday) was a veal stew with butternut squash soup. Four courses total including cheese.  All four courses were delicious.  We also had the lobster bisque, steak, escargots and steak tartare all were cooked perfectly and well seasoned.  Chocolate mousse and Pear crumble for dessert.  Thank you! We would come back everyday to eat here if we could during our trip.', 'I had my last dinner at Les Cocottes on the way to the Eiffel Tower. I typically dine early, around 7 PM, and it wasn‚Äôt too crowded at that time.

I would recommend making a reservation in advance. The staff are friendly and helpful as well in recommending and explaining the menu.', 'This is the best bistrol food that I have tried in Paris. Razer clam seasoned really well and sweet. Not too salty over all. Many restaurants prep food way salty here. Exellent service as well. Reasonable price and good portion to share. Good wine selections. Highly recommended for everyone who plan to  be at Elfel Tower. Must Try!']

["You must make a reservation beforehand, as it is an excellent place with a great atmosphere‚Äîclassical French brasserie. The asparagus entree and onion soup were amazing. We shared a very good steak. I asked if it could be baked in the oven because I didn't want fried potatoes with the meat, and they were very understanding. The escargots were great. And If you are lucky, they can put garlic green sauce for escargots on your oven-baked potato. It's not easy to maintain traditional quality in a place that tends to be so touristy, and it's not easy to find places like this. The atmosphere is charming. The restrooms are very nice. The people are very polite. Highly recommended!", "This restaurant is a classic French bistro, but what sets it apart is its straightforward, uncomplicated menu. When you walk in, you're immediately struck by the stunning open space above you, a reminder that this place was once a department store before it was transformed into a restaurant. As I glanced around at other tables before ordering, I noticed most people had chosen escargots and the traditional French onion soup, which clearly suggests they are the most popular dishes.
The service was slow at first, though it became more attentive as the meal went on. The food was enjoyable, though not exceptional‚Äîgood but nothing that really stood out. Overall, I'd say the main reason to visit this restaurant is for the charming atmosphere and the very reasonable prices.", 'Amazing atmosphere, kind service and great food. Would recommend for a nice and cozy date.

One moment they turned of the light for a birthday song and cake, whole restaurant that is 3 floors joined in with applause. That was really nice.', 'This restaurant is absolutely gorgeous‚Äîyou can really feel the history here (it‚Äôs been around since 1921!). The Art Deco interior and the open-air courtyard give it such a unique and charming Parisian vibe.

Our waiter was super helpful, and the wines‚Äîboth the white and red‚Äîwere amazing and paired perfectly with our meal. I went all in and tried the onion soup (so good, definitely 5 stars!), the eggs starter, snails, and duck confit. Everything was delicious and felt thoughtfully prepared. A really special place to dine!', 'My family and I had a very pleasant time! The meal was delicious, everything was clean, and the service was great!
We were attended to as soon as we arrived, and the waiter was very friendly and patient, even speaking in another language when we had difficulty understanding the menu!
I recommend it and will definitely return.']

Adresse: 66 Av. de la Motte-Picquet, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews:
['We were surprise to find this Starbucks to sell White Chocolate Macadamia and Chocolate Hazelnut Cookies.

Both the White Chocolate Macadamia and Chocolate Hazelnut Cookies were fresh, soft and delicious. It paired well with the Blonde Americano Coffee which was smooth and not acidic. It was a good morning coffee :)', 'Fancy untasteless coffee. It depends on how lucky you are, sometimes they can be ok, sometimes they are like water with a little flavor.', "This Starbucks is what I have been missing in the United States. It's such a cozy cute little place. Drinks amazing üëèüèΩ  staff amazing üëèüèΩ", 'The coffee itself is good as other Starbucks, but there are not enough table and seats for the customers.
Because many of the tables are already occupied by long-time takers who are ‚Äòworking¬¥ with laptops.', 'A life saver if you need a place to work for a while while in Paris! Food and beverages are exactly what you would expect from a Starbucks. Great place to work given ample seating and multiple electrical outlets plus wifi. Very crowded on a friday afternoon, would wish it was larger or had more similar locations around city. Wish it was cleaned fore often as parts of floor were a bit dirty, but again a heaven for work in a crowded city.']

['Nice restaurant which served up the usual array of French classics!

The beef steak was kinda a let down, it didn‚Äôt match the price point. Would recommend the beef stew over the steak if you you want to have beef

The other dishes were great, and we enjoyed them
thoroughly. Do try the foie gras, they were thick and bursting with flavour

French onion soup came in a generous portion, which was enough for sharing', 'The restaurant is conveniently located very close to the Eiffel Tower and offers great food and drinks. We dined in on a weekday night and had their fish-and-chips and sea-bass-with-ratatouille alongside a sancerre and a gewurstraminer (wines). The service was friendly and informative, and the ambiance was cozy.', 'This restaurant is so delicious and the people are exceptionally kind. One of our favorite restaurants in Paris! Thank you for the amazing dinner!', 'After checking out the Eiffel Tower, we were looking to have lunch on our way back to the hotel and found this lovely restaurant. We decided to dine. The food was excellent, and it was my first time trying Escargot, which was alright. The service was fantastic, and our waiter was so funny and friendly. The place was nice, although we felt the table-to-table was so close. Overall, we had a great lunch at this restaurant.', 'This restaurant, just a few steps from the Eiffel Tower, is a true delight. The dishes are amazing, and the service is excellent, even during busy times. Highly recommended for a great dining experience!']

['Had dinner 2 nights in a row here. Food are simple and nice. Portion are really generous and make sure you are really hungry if going for 3 course meal. Service is excellent and warm. Space is like a typical Parisian corner restaurant can be a bit cramp but cozy.', 'We managed to get a table without reservation on a Tue night. The place is busy. The snails were done nicely. The onion soup is classical. The duck confit is nice but the salt level could be toned down. The staff is funny and attentive. The wine recommendation is spot on.', 'Yesterday, we came here with friends to try the onion soup and escargot. It was delicious, and we couldn‚Äôt resist ordering dessert as well. The service was excellent‚Äîthe waiter was incredibly kind and friendly. We felt so bad that we didn‚Äôt have any cash on us to leave a tip.', 'We were walking back to our hotel a few days ago and came across Le Suffren restaurant. We looked at the menu outside and it was all in French. So we walked in asked if we can see a menu in English. Cohan the waiter came over and got us the menu in English and was very helpful and polite to us. We already ate that day and we were not ready at that time. Because of Dohan‚Äôs politeness and helpfulness we ate here today 28-11-2024 at 7:30 pm. The food and service is outstanding. The entire staff is very polite and provides outstanding service. If you do not speak French, I highly recommend this place and recommend you ask for Dohan has your waiter! He speaks English very well and is joy to work with. It is definitely a French restaurant where the locals go to for lunch and dinner.', 'A memorable experience from start to finish. We were dining as a big group, and from the moment we stepped into the restaurant, we were immediately greeted by one the staff at the restaurant who made everyone feel welcomed, even the young ones in our party.

Service was professional and felt sincere, and they really did their best to make sure their guests felt comfortable and looked after.

The food was delicious. Everyone in our group loved the food. Beautifully seasoned and expertly executed dishes.

It was a beautiful way to end our Paris vacation and made a positive lasting impression. Will definitely be dining here again in the future.']

Adresse: 2 Pl. de l'√âcole Militaire, 75007 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Amazing food and service! The onion soup, the tartare and the steak were all delicious. Plus they were kind enough to make my mom‚Äôs birthday special with very little notice. Would come back when back in Paris!', 'Honestly the best restaurant I ate at in Paris when I was there for 5 days. It was affordable the atmosphere was nice, staff were so accommodating, interior is lovely. Would highly recommend. Free crisps, good choice on the menus and the staff offered is more sauce when they saw we had used all the pot they give you', 'We arrived around 12:30 am and were delighted to find the kitchen still open. I had the best risotto I‚Äôve ever tasted‚Äîcreamy yet not too heavy. The steak was perfectly cooked to a medium-rare, and we finished our meal with a delightful cr√®me br√ªl√©e and cheesecake. I‚Äôll definitely return on my next visit to Paris.', 'We visited late at night, but the server seemed quite busy and distracted. The food was fairly average for the price. It‚Äôs not a bad choice if you‚Äôre just looking for something to fill you up.', 'A nice restaurant with attentive staff. Well presented food. And nice selection of drinks .

Had breakfast which was nice the omelette i had was slightly undercooked but the dinner we had was a nice steak and the chicken with mash was gorgeous

Beautiful decor throughout']

Adresse: 12 Rue de l'Amiral Roussin, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews:
["Fabulous experience and overall the best restaurant experience I've ever had (despite this not being my first time at a Michelin star restaurant). The highlight was the first entree (the yellowtail), and the vanilla marinated radish that was part of this (pictured) was particularly divine. Really excellent and would recommend to others. Thank you to the staff and chefs.", 'Amazing experience! I highly recommend to order the wine with your menu, great choice.', '#8th in my public list on Googlemaps.
An improbable balance between delicate flavors. A small miracle, like a summer snow (Neige d‚Äô√©t√©)

There‚Äôs a lot of competition when you‚Äôre a Japanese Chef in Paris. It‚Äôs by far the most represented nationality in the √âtoil√©s Kitchens (French aside, and I‚Äôm not even sure). This chef (worked in George V) is in the leading one star group.
Two interesting things here. First, and you shouldn‚Äôt be surprised, it‚Äôs the quality of execution. Superbe. Second, it‚Äôs the balance and the width (in taste) of its dishes. He does not hesitate to use a large spectrum in a dish and manages to balance it. Like feeling a snowflake in summer. A striking contrast delicately balanced.

The service is of a good √©toil√© with its formalism.
The crowd was family, friends and couples. I did not see business but I would have a business lunch here. I guess the location is not the best for that crowd.
A top tiers one star

Update 2022:
Went back. The crowd was roughly the same.
The service was still excellent which is consistent with the previous visit.
Some element of the menu were still there but most were new or changed. You can check my pictures/videos to see the 21 and the 22 (although the pics may not be attached to the review but just uploaded). I ve also noticed some Spanish flavors, which is also consistent with the last visit.

A very solid one star.', 'Four stars for the pleasant staff and consistent execution in various techniques.

Not all of the dishes "hit" and in some instances the flavors were indistinct. There wasn't a natural theme or flow in flavors from one dish to another that you might expect in a 2+ hour tasting menu.

Service wasn't perfect - empty wine glasses sat on our table for most of the meal after we had finished our first glass.

The Japanese influence seemed minimal, aside from a couple perfunctory references (such as use of binchotan on a couple items).', 'We had a pleasant experience at Neige d‚Äô√©t√© today. The food was nice overall and the staff service was exceptional. The only complaint I would have was the mussel aperitif (it wasn‚Äôt too fresh or it had a really strong taste). But that‚Äôs just my opinion with my particular taste. Maybe it‚Äôs perfectly fine for other guests. We are excited to try their sister restaurant Pilgrim another time and will definitely return to Neige d‚Äô√©t√© as we live around the corner. Thanks to the head chef, the many sous chefs, and the entire staff at Neige d‚Äô√©t√© for today‚Äôs experience.']

['Love this place! They have great lunch options and great pastries! This is a great and convenient location on Rue de Commerce and I highly recommend stopping by for a nice time! They have good options at  all times during the day, and their fruits are great when they are in season! This is a fantastic boulangerie!', 'Spacious bakery shop located just across the street from the exit of the subway station. They are selling breads, patisseries, and sandwiches which was good.
As I know, Eric Kayser is very popular bakery franchise in France, like Paul.', 'Bizarre attitude from a staff member here - annoyed he had to move from behind the cash register to the counter to get our items (so, literally do what he is there to do?).

And then, weird judgemental comments about how much we were ordering (three items for two people, we were going to have some for later), so it‚Äôs also a bad thing to patronize a business too much? Isn‚Äôt that literally the point of a business?

Ah well, there are many more places in Paris that are better quality and are more than happy to welcome your business, we‚Äôll be anywhere but here next time.', "My gosh, this joint is the »ô»õ. Im speechless at the moment. Fresh cakes, amazing croissant, the best coffee I've had so far. Highly recommended. Only negative is one of the ladies serving needs to smile a little more. 2 days in a row i got a bad vibes from her", 'This place is underrated, don‚Äôt understand this low rating. All things what we took was amazing! Stuff was super kind! Thanks for great experience.']

Adresse: 56 Rue de la F√©d√©ration, 75015 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Short version: Le CasseNoix an unforgettable dining experience near the Eiffel Tower, offering extraordinary food, wonderful service, and true value in a city where that‚Äôs hard to find!

Long Version:
Paris isn‚Äôt the easiest place to dine, contrary to what many might think. Yes, it‚Äôs filled with restaurants‚Äîmany of which claim to be exceptional‚Äîbut too often you end up paying an eye-watering amount for food that‚Äôs, at best, average. But that was definitely not the case here.

I dined here yesterday with my family, and from start to finish, it was an incredible experience. For a price similar to what we paid at another restaurant recently (where the food was just mediocre), we were treated to a culinary journey that was beyond our expectations. The menu was refreshingly clear and concise, but the flavors and presentation of each dish were anything but simple‚Äîthey were extraordinary.

None of us knew exactly what to expect, so we each ordered something different, and not a single dish disappointed. Every bite was a delightful surprise, and you could tell just how much care and creativity went into each plate. Plus, being so close to the Eiffel Tower only added to the charm of the evening.

Not only was the food outstanding, but the service was truly wonderful‚Äîattentive, warm, and welcoming. It‚Äôs rare to find a place that excels in both food and hospitality, especially in such a tourist-heavy area. A true gem in Paris‚Äîa place that lives up to its promises!!! Highly recommended!', 'My last supper this trip  in Paris is here. The appetizer, main course and the dessert are amazing. I love the homey atmosphere inside. It‚Äôs like having a warm lovely dinner at a friend‚Äôs house. I will definitely come back again.', 'These are the type of small, creative,, well priced places in Paris that are hard to find unless someone recommends it to you. The service was professional, friendly and quick. The food was delicious, well plated and very reasonably priced( 42 euro for app, plat and dessert). The potions were generous. Eggs mayo, Pork belly and floating island meringue (pictured). Soo good AND it is apparently a Michelin star restaurant!', 'Quite possibly one of the best meals i‚Äôve had in my life. Every item on the menu is thoughtfully chosen, the execution was perfect, and the staff was incredibly attentive and accommodating. I felt like i was having a meal at my family‚Äôs house except that no one in my family can prepare food this good. HIGHLY recommend', 'We ate here our first night of our honeymoon and it was incredibly delicious! It was a warm and cozy atmosphere, the staff were also friendly & helpful with the menu. We absolutely loved everything we had! I still dream about the steak and potatoes I had there that night‚Ä¶ so flavorful and melt in your mouth! Thanks for a memorable meal for us! We will be back someday!']

['A wonderful dining experience just around the corner from our hotel.
Beautiful view of the Eiffel Tower.', 'Small dedicated Resturant serving some lovely dishes. Fun Staff. But beware wine prices a little heavy, but then you are dining and looking at the Eiffel Tower .', 'Value for money? This is your spot.

Good food, honestly, like your grandma cooked it.

Honest service, great flavors, good wine list and a fun cozy atmosphere.

Really enjoyed the simplicity of the food, but how cheap it feels compared to some other places around.

Such a nice little homey spot away from home.

The team is really nice.', 'First dinner here was in 2015 and had a great experience. Came back in 2023 this time we were a group of eight. Make sure you make reservations in advance. The location is excellent with a view of the Eiffel Tower. Service is excellent. The food is presented well and tasty. Highly recommend!', 'We are dinner here on 9/24/24. Food was fabulous, staff was awesome, overall great experience!']

['We did the 45 min river cruise on Siene River . The boat was beautiful. They had a nice cozy bar. We sat upstairs. The views were stunning. Our guide was nice and funny. He explained everything quite nicely. They served amazing wine on the boat.', 'We did a 1 hour Seine cruise around dusk. The boat was very nice. In particular, the narration was excellent and really enhanced our experience. The boat had an open air top deck which provided wonderful views and unobstructed picture taking. The lower level was also nice for warmth (it was a bit cold on this day). This is one of the best values in Paris, and we are glad we did this at the beginning of our stay in Paris.', "10/16/2024

Overall you get what you pay for and our your was only 20‚Ç¨, so I don't think you can expect much. My wife had a difficult time hearing our tour guide as it was difficult to find the combination of shade and still get to feel the waterway breeze. We still had a nice time and didn't break the bank.", 'I live in Canada & was visiting France (Nice/Paris). I was recommended Vedettes de Paris by my friend at Alliance Communications RH. We booked the 10:45 tour & it was perfect weather for the tour.

They mentioned that since we were slightly ahead of schedule we go a little further in the tour, boy was that an awesome offer! I‚Äôm so happy we got to see the Statue of Liberty up close! I can‚Äôt thank you enough for that!

The tour guide had great knowledge & she takes 5-10 minutes half way to see if you have any questions.

Merci beaucoup! Si je visite Paris encore, c‚Äôest certain que je viens vous rendre visite!

Salutations de Montr√©al, Qc. üá®üá¶', 'A wonderful boat tour in French and English. Family friendly with space to store folding strollers. There is a restroom and small "cafe" onboard, with snacks and drinks.']

['Very cozy and cute restaurant! The service was very friendly! The food was good. Out of all the dishes our group got the favorite was a Gorgonzola penne (8/10). We didn‚Äôt have reservations and they were able to seat a party of 5 on a Friday night around Christmas so we got very lucky!', 'Our family visited after a long, tiring day at the Palace of Versailles. Though the restaurant was closed, the owner kindly welcomed us in and cooked an amazing dinner just for us on her day off! The food was delicious and served incredibly fast, despite her being the only staff member in the restaurant. Coming from Australia, this kindness made our trip unforgettable. Thank you for such a special experience!', 'We had pizza (10/10) and spaghetti bolognese (7/10). The atmosphere/interior was well organized, with nice and calm music. Its like a fancy restaurant but in a smaller version. üòÖ the staffs were nice and served us well.', 'We arrived late into Paris by train and happened upon this restaurant by chance because they were open until 12am.\n\nWe shared a pizza and a salad. Both dishes were delicious! Would recommend!', 'First-rate brasserie/pizza restaurant, located on a quiet stretch of Avenue de Lowendal not far from Cambronne Metro station. Friendly atmosphere. Good food. Solid neighborhood reputation, which it seems to deserve.']

["We had a delicious meal at Le Bosquet! We started with French Onion soup, which was great. Then we had a steak and the duck breast, both of which were very good. We also had an order of escargot because when in France...\nThe staff and the overall dining experience was great! We'll definitely go back the next time we're in Paris!", "We popped in for a quick dinner early on in our week vacation, and it was the best decision we could've made! The owners are new, and very eager to make everyone's experience exceptional. The waitstaff works well together. The food was excellent. The atmosphere was welcoming and comfortable. We went about 4 times this trip, and had such a great time we left the owners a gift today before we left Paris to go back to Seattle and I hope they enjoyed it a fraction as much as we loved all the food, wine, and coffee. I'd have more photos but I kept eating the meal too fast! But I recommend the steak, chicken, green bean salad, escargot, breakfast, Cafe creme, Chablis, and the peach sorbet.\nIf you went here before and didn't love it, please try again. The new owners will not let you down!", 'Such a great place. Absolutely amazing service! We had the onion soup and razor clams for starters and the pork mingon as a shared entree. The onion soup was divine! The razor clams were silky smooth and buttery. The pork tasted like it was cooked with grandmotherly love. The atmosphere was light but sophisticated.', 'Not a bad experience but not our favorite spot either. We were sat promptly and the waiter staff were friendly and attentive. There‚Äôs a host of Parisian dishes mixed with other options. We ordered the duck, burger and oysters. Nothing terrible to say about any of it - nothing remarkable to note either. Overall it was a good experience and the portion sizes were quite large.', 'Decent food though not super impressive. Toilets were clean, service was efficient so a plus point. Normal prices for Paris, maybe even on the cheaper side.']

['They don‚Äôt follow their opening time at all, we went there half an hour before the closing time, and the cashier tell the door guy to block us outside. I don‚Äôt know who he thought he was, but I think carrefour should fire him.', 'Always fully stocked, great service!', 'Disappointing encounter at Carrefour. The male employee in his mid 20s with glasses at the till was very unprofessional, aggressively throwing my shopping items. It was unnecessary and left a negative impression.', 'We stoped here to get bottled water and other basic supplies. Small but it had all we needed, definitely a place where locals get their supplies, they were friendly enough.', 'Thank u Nassim! Nice to meet you']

['Hidden gem! Very tasty food, probably one of the best Korean restaurants in Paris I‚Äôve tasted, much better in my opinion than those in Rue Sainte Anne and no queues. Very authentic. Service is very friendly and efficient. The place is super clean (rare to find in Paris) !
Recommended for both, lunch and dinner. For lunch they have a ‚Äúformule de midi‚Äù and at night you absolutely need to take the Koreann bbq!
Extra likes if you like spicy food!', 'We had a 5 day Paris holiday, and ate here for two nights. The first night we had a chicken hotpot which was amazing on an especially cold day, and was very delicious. We also got desert. I loved it so much that we came back here again, but was recommended another dish, which was a kimchi dish and beef bulgogi. The food again was amazing. I spoke Korean to the waiter and they were extremely friendly and kind to us. The music and ambience of the place is great and gives off a comfortable vibe, as the restaurant is often quiet when we go. The prices are also good for what you get. If we come back to Paris again we will definitely be coming here again! Í∞êÏÇ¨Ìï©ÎãàÎã§ Ïò§ÎèÑÎ¶¨!', 'Visited on a bank holiday so there was no lunch set menu. Ordered the yukgaejang and galbitang and it came with sides and rice. Sides were a bit too salty.

Galbitang was very clean tasting and yukgaejang was good. Overall an enjoyable meal.', "Cozy atmosphere located in the small alley.
The food portion is really a little, even for small eaters. Don't know why they serve in such a quantity for high prices.
Won't go again.", 'Great and delicious authentic Korean food and have a good Ambiance, the staff is very kind and accommodating too. Highly recommended and Will definitely come back here']

['This is a very quintessential French brassiere. We loved sitting outside and eating, while watching the people. The service was fantastic and I was able to communicate my allergies with our server. She helped explain some of the items and we all made great choices! I HIGHLY recommend the Carbonara or pizza-yes, I know you are in Paris, but the food was exceptionally good. The Caesar salad was delicious too. If you want a nice, Parisian experience for dinner, check it out! We don‚Äôt even get to dessert we were so full. We will be back when we return to Paris!', 'The place is nice if there wasn‚Äôt cigarette smoke coming into the indoor seating. Food and service was good. The som really loved their steak, had the escargot, french onion soup, pizza, duck confit and pasta. It‚Äôs open until late which is a plus.', 'Lovely cafe on the streets of Paris at the corner of a buzzing intersection. Waitress was friendly and checked on the table often. Pasta Carbonara was delicious.', 'Food was delicious, place was clean and our waitress was excellent. I had the 4 cheese pasta and it was so creamy. My husband had the duck and it was very moist we also had escargot and the layer in a bed of pesto oil. Delicious', 'Very friendly service, rather quick when compared to other local cafes. The oysters were shiny fresh and the foie gras is a perfect starter. Kids menu always welcomed']

['Thank you, Maria and Luigi!

We just had an amazing dinner here at Il Sorrentino. The food was delicious and offered the perfect view of the Eiffel Tower. What made it even more special was the help and assistance from their team, especially Maria and Luigi! Grazie mille! Paris can be intimidating for foreigners at times, but they made it so easy for us and truly showed us the best hospitality. This dinner made my mom‚Äôs birthday unforgettable, and I am forever grateful to them.

Please join them for dinner because you will not regret it!', 'Mg parents loved their food but i didn‚Äôt very much.The fresh pasta in the Parmesan-sauce tasted like alcohol a bit too much.But overall the experience was very nice', 'Very very very (help me to say "very") good place to eat Italian food! As an Italian I can really suggest it (also my son is still mentioning the past he ate there a few days ago...!).
It can look expensive, but the quality of the products is high and the location is really nice.
Be prepared: you will spend around 20‚Ç¨ for a first course, but you will enjoy it for sure.
The personnel are very kind and they have helped us with the kids too, preparing something they really enjoyed.', 'My husband and I went to Il Sorrentino twice in three days! The food is phenomenal, the flavours are intricate and heart warming, the staff is friendly and so attentive! Thank you to the owner, Carla, for her amazing and inviting service. She even gave us some Grappa to end the night! And we loved our server, Emmanuel, his service is impeccable and his energy is infectious!! We will be back!!', 'Great service super friendly staff, had the 6 course, it was a lot of food come hungry or come ready to eat a lot of cheese! Worth every penny tho. The 6 course came with the cheese wheel too!! So that was amazing! Great experience, good food, great people!']

['The foods were great and the waiters were very polite. The Michelin star recognization was not showing until you will not aware if you not look around at cashier counter. The funny part was, I ordered 2 sets 5/6 courses(I can‚Äôt recall) and feel just full after dining, however, I was told that I might order the menu supposed by sharing; the food portion just fine for single Asian perhaps. Feel sad now as I notice the restaurant is temporary closed, hopefully the restaurant is close for renovation! The restaurant is worth to plan a trip to Paris just for having a great dining.', 'We came here for Lunch menu, starter is the pulled beef with veggie stock, It is tasty but I am not amazed by it. Main is the steam cod. The cod is very soft but It seems a bit under seasoning. The sauce is nice on the fish so I think it is still good. Cheese bread as the welcome dish is a bit boring that I agree with. Service is good, staffs are warm n friendly.', "For a 1 Michelin star restaurant, their 3 course 28 euro menu is an absolute steal! It won't blow your mind, but it's a fantastic value for the calibre of meal you get. We had our meal outside, but I must admit that service was mediocre and the place seemed to be swarmed by Chinese tourists - there was also a large Chinese tour group that had booked off the majority of the restaurant.

Overall, the meal you'll get is great for the price, but based on the overall food and service, it's a good restaurant. Would have liked to see other items available on their prix fixe menu so I can say how other dishes were. But I thoroughly enjoyed the tomato appetizer and the squid ink with lardons and cuttlefish greatly!", 'A French restaurant. The food is well prepared and presented. The taste is above average, but not surprisingly meets what I expected. The service is good. Staff are polite and can speak both French and English.

A couple of small downsides. The air conditioning is not very strong. We really feel hot and just want to finish and leave which doesn‚Äôt make a perfect experience. The space between tables are very close.

I would give 4.5 stars if I have choice. But 4 stars is on the lower side. So I give 5 stars.', 'Great restaurant.  The food is good compared to other one Michelin star restaurants.  The food both taste good, and look good.  The dining room is very elegant and modern.  The service is good also.  The lunch menu is very inexpensive.']

['Delicious galettes/ crepes filled both savory as well as sweet, many combinations of ingredients for a large spectrum of tastes. This is already the second visit. Opened during lunch hours, evenings also on Fridays and Saturdays.', 'Love this place, have been eating here for years.', 'I\'ve been staying down the street for a month, and finally figured out this mysterious authentic cr√™perie is only open for lunch Noon to ?  It\'s a travel back in time to the two hour lunchtime with Crepes and a glass of wine!  Between us we had 6 different varieties and all were superb.  The best was the dessert crepe with cinnamon ice cream and apples!  In fact, I\'d recommend skipping the "sans gluten" crepes and go straight to dessert!', 'A great team serving up the best of Peregordine produce in crepes and salads. Their gormand dessert crepe is a must. We came back 6 times with friends. Everyone loved it.', 'Authentic crepes. They were delicious and the service was great even though we did not speak French somehow, we were able to communicate with our server :)']

['I went there on a Friday night with my fianc√©. We really loved the hummus, chicken, baba ganoush! My fianc√© was not able to finish his plate because the portions are so generous, but we still managed to fit a delicious dessert in.', 'Excellent service, we sat in the restaurant side with air conditioning. The staff helped us choose gluten free items. The room was full of happy customers when we were there so it was a little loud with conversation but not so much you can‚Äôt enjoy yourself.

Washrooms aren‚Äôt the best, toilet paper dispenser is broken and no seat on the toilet. You can also see into their staff room which was very messy.

Otherwise I great place for a quick lunch.', 'Great ambience. Mega friendly owner and staffs. I celebrated my birthday here. Must try sahlab!!', 'Night staff was so rude, they all dont like their own job, owner was so rude to others and give full attention to french peoples, labanese restaurant but they didnt like the Arab peoples, Racism at its peak, sweets & food was like it was made 4 days ago, some food was good,they charged 10% service fee and they didn‚Äôt give the attention to their customers, even they refused to hot the food in micro oven.
I will never visit this place again in my whole life, they all were not happy with their customers even if you give them 50 Euro Tip.
Attached a photo of pita bread which was good in look in picture but when i taste it ü§≠', 'Nice Lebanese restaurant, nice meal, friendly staff, we were greeted nicely, we got Grilled chicken and mix plate.']

['1 Michelin star living up to the fame! 5 stars in that regard. This is my second time dining here.

French cuisine with excellent execution. The duck liver was perfectly cooked. Wife wish it was a bit more cooked but I appreciate the exacting perfect balance.

What REALLY stood out though was the wine service. The Saint Joseph recommendation was good, but when the server decanted it, he got quite a bit of sediments into the decanter. I was nice so I figured well shit happens. As I was finishing my first glass there really was quite a bit of sediments in my glass so I was kinda drinking around it. I put down my glass and was going to ask for a clean glass when the waiter brought over a clean one without me asking! Furthermore he brought out another decanter and a filter to filter the wine already in one decanter! Good attention to detail and excellent at paying attention to the diner!

That is luxury. That is class. Unobtrusive but obviously anticipating your needs and wants. This is an actively thinking wait staff thinking about the customer.', 'It was a very solid one star restaurant. Due to time restrictions I couldn‚Äôt try the longest menu but the one I had was delightful. I liked every single dish.
The service was flawless and they try their best to accommodate your needs.
I was able to get a reservation just a couple of hours before lunch time and on a Sunday so I was glad to have experienced such a great meal under those conditions.', "This restaurant has no reason to be rated as 1 star anymore.
When I visited here two years ago, it felt like a 1 star that couldn't be rated as 2 stars.

But it was really the worst experience today.

Even if the food had no impact, the service was really a mess.

Even though I was eating, he was shaking the tablecloth right next me and replacing it.

He would turn away and leave before I could even ask how it was made, and while I was eating, he would not only clean the table but also take away the glasses and plates without saying anything as if he was at a family restaurant.

Because of that, I couldn't even eat the food I had left and it was taken away.

The service at this restaurant was the worst to the point that he was too far away to talk.

Usually, when you leave food behind, they ask what the problem is, but here, they just took the plates away without any asks.

They don't care the customer at all and just bring dishes and take away.
This is not the right service at the Michelin restaurant.

In the end, he just almost threw the dessert on the dish without any explanation about dessert.

Good wine, average food and worst service.

Who would want to eat in such a busy and messy place?

This restaurant is a very typical tourist restaurant for those who want to take a picture at the place rated 1 Michelin star, not for foodie or the person who wants to enjoy foods and wine.

As a food critic and a chef, I who recommended this restaurant, I really regret it.", 'My husband and I celebrated our 9 year anniversary here and was not disappointed. The staff was super attentive and if we had any questions they would ask the chef if they didnt know it. Great value too of how much food you got.', 'Business lunch done in this Michelin starred restaurant today :
great team that welcomed us very friendly and who served very good food ! Nice venue with a sophisticated French cuisine tasting really great.
I recommend.']

["I like sushi, and I've tasted them in many different places, the sushi shop is expensive but not the right place to find best ones.
The reasons why I give 3 stars, is that their sushi taste ok.", 'WARNING - DO NOT EAT HERE. The restaurant now delivers food under "Poka√Ø" brand and you will get food poisoning. See logo on the paper bag, and address on Deliveroo. Thanks for a week on the toilet away from work.', 'Just wanna try Japanese Food ambience, especially Sushi in Paris. Good shop nearby Ibis Tour de Eiffel, with affordable price.', 'The sushi isn‚Äôt good, service is slow. it is enough for a quick snack. Nothing fancy or high end. It is all ready made and tastes like it‚Äôs been sitting in a freezer for hours. I have stopped coming here.

Would not recommend.', 'Do NOT go here!  Tuna was absolutely disgusting and the color was very strange.  Sashimi slices were a rip off!  Gave me the end pieces and counted it as part of the 15 piece. One was so thin it was translucent.  The tuna sushi was very strange pink color.  I do not trust this place and neither should you.']

['I have came here over the years of us visiting Paris. I absolutely love this place. I always get the cashew chicken with sticky rice. Where we live in America it is impossible to find sticky rice and if I do it  is a dessert with mango. The owner is so pleasant and sweet to talk to.', "This is not authentic Thai food. I'm Thai myself, and I went with some family members from France who are familiar with authentic Thai cuisine. Unfortunately, we all agreed that the food here wasn't authentic at all.

We ordered a variety of dishes, including papaya salad. However, we were surprised to find that almost half of it was carrots, which isn't typical in traditional Thai cooking. The taste was strange, and the portion size seemed too small for the price.

Additionally, many of the other dishes were very oily, salty, and we could taste MSG in them, which was disappointing. We had to drink a lot of water afterward to quench our thirst. One dish, the Thai basil minced pork, was particularly different from what we expected. It had ginger and other ingredients that shouldn't have been there.

Overall, the food didn't match the authentic Thai flavors we were hoping for, despite having Thai names on the menu. We felt that everything was overpriced for the quality we received. Personally, I didn't mind the small portion because I found it difficult to finish some dishes due to their greasiness, and I even had to take a digestion pill afterward.

Sadly, based on this experience, I don't think we'll be returning to this restaurant.", 'The food was ok and had very limited options for vegetarian. I had tried pad Thai with egg only and stir fried vegetables. Though I had strictly asked them not put meat items in the food but I could find some pieces of chicken in pad Thai.', 'Cosy Thai restaurant with decent food at fair prices. We were very welcome even though we arrived a bit before opening time. The hostess was energetic and helpful, providing good service in catering to my vegan diet. We noticed that several of the other customers were regulars to the place, that is usually a good sign :)', 'Very Tasty and delicious food. Reasonable price and portions for Paris. Lady waitress was very warm and welcoming even when I had my huge luggage with me. She could speak English and French. I had the lunchtime set menu.']

['Good space hamburger, proper salad - fresh. Value for food is excellent. Service is 6x faster than in an usual Paris restaurant. Personnel is also nice for English speaking paying customers, which is rare in Paris. Recommend to pop up in the Space hamburger and pint of beer. They have a draft French beer.', 'We love Le Cosmo Cafe. My wife and I have been coming to Paris since 2009. This time, because we are staying in the neighborhood, we came across this wonderful cafe and it‚Äôs become our go to spot for great food, service, and ambiance. We highly recommend it for lunch and dinner. We‚Äôve been several times.', 'I wasn‚Äôt hungry so me and my friend took a dish to share which was never a problem before. They told us that we couldn‚Äôt even though there was almost no one in the restaurant and no one waiting to eat, so we weren‚Äôt occupying a table that could‚Äôve gotten more food.', 'it is our first restaurant in paris, server was so kind it made us love paris. The food was not too bad, thank you for everything!', 'The food was tasty and the English menus were super helpful. If you don‚Äôt speak French, but want a French meal, I would recommend coming here. Thank you for an excellent dining experience!']

["I've had the pleasure of being a loyal customer of Restaurant Lac Tana in Paris for several years, and I can confidently say that it's one of the best dining experiences in town. The quality and taste of the dishes are consistently exceptional, and every visit is a culinary delight.

What truly sets Restaurant Lac Tana apart from other establishments is the outstanding service provided by the owner and staff. Their attention to detail and genuine care for their customers make dining here a truly memorable experience. The staff is always friendly, knowledgeable, and willing to go above and beyond to ensure that every guest has an exceptional experience.

I've had the pleasure of working with the owner to accommodate a last-minute event location cancellation, and they graciously allowed me to use the venue for a couple of hours, ensuring that my event went off without a hitch. This level of hospitality and flexibility is a true testament to their commitment to customer satisfaction*. The staff's dedication to excellence is evident in every aspect of the restaurant, from the food to the service.

In addition to their outstanding food and service, Restaurant Lac Tana's owner is passionate about providing an exceptional dining experience for every guest. The menu is expertly crafted, with dishes that showcase the chef's creativity and skill. Each bite is a masterpiece, and every visit is a true culinary delight.", 'I love eating at Lac Tana whenever I am in Paris. The food is delicious and the owners are so kind that they ask you if you want more (if you can finish your meal). The atmosphere is great, it feels like you are in Ethiopia üá™üáπ I highly recommend trying this restaurant if you like authentic exotic food.', 'A Hidden spot in Paris indeed. We ordered the vegetarian and the chicken plate. The food is tasty. Whilst the staff is very polite, the service can be a little prompt. This place is a great cultural experience overall', 'The people there are great! I felt very welcomed in a family like atmosphere :)

The experience of eating with your hands makes you feel a bit uncomfortable in the first 3min, but when you let go it creates a bond between you and the meal itself.

The menu is filled with typical Ethiopian dishes, which are full of spices! (no it doesn‚Äôt mean that they are spicy, just very flavorful!)
Each dish consists of two Injeras (Ethiopian/ Somalian traditional sourdough ‚Äúcrepe‚Äù out of teff flour). The toppings are placed on top of one of them, while the other one can or should be torn into pieces and used to grab the toppings with.

Since I had 3/4th of my second ‚Äúcrepe‚Äù left, I asked if I can take it with me and they added additional filling to it! That was great!

They also have options for vegans :)!', "Have always wanted to try this place as it's well reviewed and just around the corner to our place. Had the Ethiopian assortment platter which my husband (who can't do spices) had a hard time eating. I also can't take too spicy but I was able to finish everything. Quite oily but I guess that's the way it's like with all the sauces. They give a generous portion of injera bread to sop everything up. My husband ordered the beef cubes pictured on the top right (gored gored?) but the meat was very dry and tough. We told the lady and she responded that it's a really good cut of meat though...wanted to try the Ethiopian beer/coffee but at 6‚Ç¨, a bit expensive."]

["One of the best Italian restaurants in Paris without doubt. We went to this restaurant in 2015 when it was around 3pm and all my family were starving and we remember that it was such a great experience. We kinda forgot which was the restaurant's name but we knew that it was next to the UNESCO. This year I came to Paris for 4 months and one of my objectives was to find this restaurant again and I've found it. They seem to have changed their menu but still I tried with my mom one month ago the dishes that are now being offered. We tried the escalope a la milanesa and it was delicious. Also we tried the calamari fritti and it was also so good. The price is perfect taking into account the quality of the products. I'm happy that I found this place again and now I have it saved on my Google Maps. Definitely coming back when I come to Paris.", 'Authentic friendly Italian in the 15th.\nStarted with a hearty minestrone and followed up with a delicious plate of tagliatelle with rabbit. The tiramisu was divine. The smell of truffles permeated the room. I will return.', 'Expensive, the fish was old with a bad taste and the past was so saltt and I cannot eat it. At least I was expecting a warm italian welcome but I had no luck', 'Very good italian restaurant, super friendly staff with price matching.', 'Stumbled across this little gem and had a brilliant meal with outstanding wine!']

['Cozy bar with seats both inside and outside (with heaters). Food is good, service is friendly and quick.', 'The brunch was amazing and the waiters were very patient with us. Just make sure you reserve in advance if you want a place inside! We did not and we ate outside but still a great experience.', "What a find! We had really delicious lunch with fab, freshly prepared food. Service was friendly and helpful and prompt. My picture doesn't do it justice, but it was flavoursome. I would definitely recommend dining here.", 'The food was really good and we all felt full after the different plates. Really worth the money! Definitely recommend this place!', 'Amazing food and the staff is just the best! Had a lovely time. 5 stars especially for the host‚ù§Ô∏è']

['The space is clean with plenty of seating, but the food came out cold and the service was slow. As the server was handing me my order, she spilled the drink. She took back our food and forgot about it. 20 minutes later she handed it to us cold.', 'I went here, placed my order in English using the order screen, and sat down. I was delivered my food very quickly by an employee. I was impressed with the quality of food and the presentation. For example, the cup was a plastic, reusable cup, not a paper cup to be quickly thrown away afterwards like I was used to. The restaurant was very clean and there were many places to sit.', 'We visited it twice last year during our trip to Paris. I must say I love this McDonalds branch. Nice two-storey location. It is cozy that I want to eat my food slow to enjoy the ambience especially at night.
For me, its interior design is better than what we have in North America.', 'A cross of monoprix Not crowded   second floor  nice clean and good  decor', 'Overall not a good experience. The machines to order were not functioning correctly so everyone had to pay at the counter which led to a large backup.
Once receiving food there were missing items which I had to follow up with multiple times.
The seating area was the WORST. Crowded with people just sitting around, not eating anything and just taking up space. There were no napkins available anywhere so when something was spilled it was a disaster and there was no one working the upstairs seating area keeping it maintained.
Food was as expected (aka what you would expect from McDonalds).']

['As a resident for almost 10 years here in the 15th, I am truly kicking myself for not having discovered this hidden gem of a restaurant earlier!
From the incredible service, to the dishes, cooked with so much love, my friends and I had a wonderful overall experience.
We ordered foie gras (it melts in your mouth!), an absolutely succulent and crunchy t√™te de veau and it‚Äôs incredible ravigote sauce, the most perfectly cooked and tender steak, juicy and tasty Scallop Risotto and the lotte, which was simply exploding with flavor! For dessert we took the apple tart and the figs with ice-cream!
In one word - WOW!
Mr Martin is alone in the kitchen and having the pleasure to speak to him, we were amazed by his passion and more so, that just one man can create all these dishes to perfection.
Thank you for a wonderful discovery Mr Martin and team! We will see you again!', 'Exceptionally good food, service and place overall. Our party of seven people all had different dishes and all were great. The seasoning, the sauces, the garnishing.', 'I had a great time here. The foie gras was amazing! It literally melts in your mouth. Great experience you should try.', 'Wonderful neighbourhood restaurant, lunch menu offers exceptional value for substantial and also fine food.

The service is very attentive and sympathetic. You will leave grinning for sure. All locals who know‚Ä¶ (apart from me haha)', 'It is so refreshing to see the care and the quality proposed by this better than typical Parisian restaurant. Discrete and super efficient service, dishes are sophisticated and generous. Wines chosen with taste.']

Adresse: Port de la Bourdonnais, 75007 Paris, France
Reviews:
['We enjoyed the day lunch tour. It was a great way to relax from the busyness of visiting museums and walking around the city for many days. We sat as we made our way down the Seine seeing many of the iconic sights, enjoying a decent multi-course meal, and enjoying a glass of wine. Would do the trip again, but would not bother with the meal. Save your money and go to a nice restaurant after. If you want to spend extra do the night tour, worth the money to see the Eiffel tower lite up from the boat.', 'The evening dinner cruise was one of the highlights of our trip to Paris
The Quality of the food the ambience and experience was first class
We weren‚Äôt sure what to expect as we don‚Äôt normally indulge in this type of experience but we were not disappointed.
Staff were attentive and friendly
Scallops were cooked perfectly. Main was also perfect and dessert was refreshing and so tasty.
Did I mention the Wine and Cheese ?‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ fantastic!', 'This attraction is great!

We recommended it 100% üëç

Sail trough the Seine River in their boats is amazing. They have great tour guides that will be talking about the history of the city and the most important monuments and places that you will see.

The tour is also a great opportunity to take beautiful pictures, sit and relax while learning about Paris, our entire family loved this ride üòç

We will definitely come back soon! üôè', 'We had an amazing time on the river cruise. We waited only about 15 minutes for a boat once we arrived at the terminal, and we booked our tickets in advance. The boat was almost full but there was plenty of space and we had no issue getting pictures or viewing the sights. Guide was helpful as well. Boat had basic restroom facilities and vending machines as we were able to grab snacks and drinks on board. Overall was fantastic and would highly recommend!', 'Pretty easy to find and get to. I appreciate the time slot flexibility. The roof outdoor seating was closed for weather but you can still see very well from inside, or the main lever railing.']

['I wish to come back here once and try other dishes!
The service and the place are really nice and we had a great time here. Also, I love the calm music,  it really fits the atmosphere.
Great thanks to the lovely waitress, you are doing great ;)', 'Best dinner ever in Paris. My favourite was this: mozzarella burrata, arugula, lomo, pear and hazelnuts. But the main dish and the cake were also fantastic. Merci', 'Wanted to have a great steak, and I‚Äôve got it.

Close to Eiffle Tower, the reataurant caught my eyes. Looked the review and reserved it. Looks like many locals come in for dining as well.

All the food was great and the price was reasonable.

Definitely recommend this place!', 'Our first dinner in Paris was here.ü•∞
I‚Äôve been searching tirelessly the week before coming to Paris for cafes and I believe I found a gem in Le Cafe de Marsüíô

The servers speak english and they‚Äôre really polite and friendly. I appreciate them as this sets the tone for other restaurants and cafes that we‚Äôve visited. Their specialty is the ‚ÄúDrunken Dragon‚Äù which is a grilled flank steak with pur√©e and picked shitake. My daughter loved the burger with fries. It‚Äôs also kid-friendly, they‚Äôre very nice not just to us but to my kids as well. They have a kids menu but we opted for the normal menu so we can share. Super love it here! Price is really good!ü•∞', "Although, we dont have a reservation, they greeted us with a big smile and seated us at a table. They cooked our meat as we wished. It was delicious. The atmosphere was also very romantic. The wines were matured and delicious. They asked about our satisfaction many times. We left very satisfied. As I promised, I couldn't help myself comment well.
P. S: toilet is needed revision or at least repairment. Except it, it was a perfect experience!"]

['I ordered a pizza and it comes undercooked, they sent me another pizza üçï and it canes almost the same, undercooked. Absolutely disgusting ü§Æ without saying that the onion rings were also uncooked.', 'I walked in skeptical after reading some reviews but my opinion was completely toppled after ordering the pizza.
I ordered a pepperoni medium pizza, the pan (thick) version, and it was actually really good, it was fluffy inside had crispy crust, well seasoned‚Ä¶ very enjoyable meal‚Ä¶
Very friendly staff, even with foreigners: we had a really nice chat while waiting my pizza to be cooked‚Ä¶
It was a fast serving (within 10 min) and at a reasonable price.
Just 5 minutes away from champs du mars, you can enjoy a dinner facing Eiffel Tower during sunset!!!', 'Amazing pizza, we ordered a kasbah pizza and 30 minutes after eating it were still enjoying it.', 'Always check your order immediately because they don‚Äôt value your taste or the recipe but what they have available at the kitchen.', "Very arrogant owner,ordered a pizza the persons came after me in my plein view get there n go when i asked he is arrogant n say take ur money n go?is this a multi chain functions?sorry pizza hut i am a fan of u if any action's apart from u count u loss one longtime customer."]

['The food is very nice. My favorites are the Spring Rolls and Beef with onions (Beef is tender) I would like to try Shrimps and Thai food next time', 'Super bobuns !!!', "We order delivery each time we visit Paris and we are never disappointed. Special mention for the black mushroom chicken and broccoli shrimp. To be tested. It's worth the detour", 'We have been ordering from this restaurant for years and the quality is always there! Special mention for the ravioli and shrimp fritters that we love!!', "TO RUN!!! I rarely leave reviews but I would give 0/5 if I could. Since this restaurant was well rated on Deliveroo, I ordered 2 bo buns and spring rolls which were exceptionally bad. I have never seen spring rolls with only a small shrimp inside, without meat, without vegetables!! Message to the boss: Close your restaurant! It's really a shame"]

['Generous portions, lots of veggies! The gentleman was helpful and shared the recipe secrets. Baklava to finish was perfect amount.', 'Cosy little lebanese place... Nice atmosphere... Great food and fantastic owner!!!', 'One of the best customer service I have experienced in Paris and the food was delicious AND at an affordable price. Thank you!', 'Very good food! and the people there are very nice ^_^', 'It was perfect-the food and the service. Very quiet and cozy!']

['Beef chuck confit with herbs, pork chop, lamb should be tried and their dessert very nice. We went there during lunch time and very busy. The restaurant no too big but pack with their customer. Eventough they are busy with customer, service is good. Just realize they are Michelin star', 'It was a great place to be in, however english was a bit lacking like most places in Paris.
We got 3 course menu and choose really good options and had really nice 3 course dinner with matching wine from their great wine list. But out of all, duck was definitely the special meal of the night, cooked medium to perfection.

Staff wasn‚Äôt as nice and professional as they meant to be in a Michelin restaurant tho, and that was the only reason for giving 4 star', 'Pottoka is a Michelin guide restaurant near the Eiffel Tower that we chose for its convenient location. While the food at Pottoka is absolutely delicious, families with young children may want to consider other options as the restaurant is not particularly kid-friendly. Additionally, the menu can be a bit confusing, and the "taste menu" cannot be ordered individually; it must be ordered for the entire group to share. The staff can also be a bit impatient at times due to the small and busy nature of the restaurant. However, for adults looking for a high-quality dining experience, Pottoka is definitely worth checking out. The unique dishes are sure to impress, with amazing flavors that are sure to satisfy. Overall, if you're looking for a memorable dining experience near the Eiffel Tower, Pottoka is definitely worth considering. Just be prepared for a potentially confusing menu and a busy atmosphere.', 'We booked through the Fork which was a simple and easy process.

The food what can I say, was outstanding! We really enjoyed how well the fish was cooked and eating the combination on the plate brought so much balance in flavour.
Huge portions (for us at least) that made for a satisfying meal and we were dizzy with the richness of the food after, quite literally.

The only reason I couldn‚Äôt give it a full 5 stars is this was the only place I didn‚Äôt feel as welcome compared to other restaurants in Paris.
It may as well be our fault as we wanted to enjoy the prefix menu and couldn‚Äôt understand what meat the main dish was.

We don‚Äôt eat beef so we just wanted to make sure it wasn‚Äôt beef. So we asked twice, and the head waiter didn‚Äôt seem to happy. Plus we didn‚Äôt get wine.

So if you are keen to just enjoy value, you must go in prepared to feel slightly inadequate haha. Overall great, and a must do to experience a Michelin Star restaurant on a budget.

Its a casual dining area, so no worries about dressing (just don‚Äôt go with shorts and flipflops)', "A must-visit when in the Paris area. Upon entering, I knew that it was going to be a great experience. It was simplistic and beautiful inside. The menu was full of options that I wanted to eat. The white fish main course was delicious and I would've eaten it every day on this trip."]

['We wanted to try some Persian food while in Paris for meetings. We found the restaurant interior design very charming and welcoming, therefore decided to go for it.
The owner was very welcoming and we found a nice table to sit.
The menu is very well explained and we could find variety of choices to choose.
We ordered some drinks and koobide as well as jujjeh dishes with rice.
The dish was well designed and arrived also in short time.
We found both dishes well cooked and well prepared.
While the taste of koobideh was a bit different from others we tried but overall we had a great experience and great atmosphere too.', "Cheminee Restaurant is a hidden gem that dazzles the senses. From the moment you walk in, you're greeted with warmth and elegance. The ambiance is enchanting, setting the stage for a memorable dining experience. The food is a culinary masterpiece, with each dish bursting with flavor and beautifully presented. Don't miss the opportunity to try their signature dish ‚Äì the Koobideh, which is truly the best. The service is top-notch, making you feel like royalty with impeccable attention to detail. Each visit feels like a journey into gastronomic bliss. Cheminee is an absolute delight and a must-visit for anyone craving a memorable dining experience.", 'Subject: Complaint about poor service

Dear [restaurant name or ‚ÄúMr/Mrs‚Äù],

I recently visited your restaurant on 4-1-2025 to enjoy a meal, but unfortunately my experience was disappointing due to the poor service I received.

First of all, it took a very long time before we were noticed by the staff. After we finally placed our order, we had to wait over an hour before the food was served, without any explanation or apology. In addition, part of our order was missing, and when we reported this, there was no adequate response.

Also, the attitude of the staff was not customer-friendly. We did not feel welcome, and there was little attention paid to our table, despite the restaurant not seeming to be busy.

I am normally a satisfied customer, but this experience fell far short of my expectations. I hope you take this feedback seriously and take steps to improve the service, so that other guests do not have to experience the same disappointment.

I look forward to hearing from you.

Kind regards,
M.R', 'Very nice experience at this restaurant. Cozy atmosphere and music. I had chicken and lamb skewers and it was good, with freshly pressed lemonade.', "Good food in traditional decoration, but awkward service!

The kitchen staff (maybe the owner) was nice and helpful. But the waiter was very unprofessional.  He used his hands to move cutlery from our dishes to serve us mains,, put his hands inside the jar when carrying it for us, throw items on table in an aggressive manner, and didn't ask if we finished our food and just took our dishes!  Lack of basis professionalism.

It might be ok in France, but in any other countries those will be a big NO, and you will miss your customers.

Wishing you all the best and hope you will have a better service next time we visit Paris."]

['We have been travelling in Europe for the past 2 weeks. This is our first time eating Thai food after being away from our country. We ordered (1) Pad thai (2) Thai fried rice (3) Chicken tender. It tastes like home! I really like the pad thai, and fried rice. It is so delicious! Chicken tender is very soft, and tasty too. For anyone who live around here, and miss Thai food, this is a great place to come. I will definitely come back anytime soon.', 'Nems ok, pad thai is dry and chicken is VERY dry. Food came to us quite warm, for sure not cold.', 'Amazing food. Favorite Thai of Paris. I love their nems and pad Thai !', 'Pad Thai was more like pasta than rice noodles. Not great', 'The food and experience is always great !üëç']

["You can enjoy spaghetti, pizza, and a variety of other dishes, but the food is just passable‚Äînot as delicious as anticipated. The coffee is also average.
