You can go with friends or family, good for 2-3 people but even groups of 11-12.\nThe food is really really delicious, amazing flavours!', "Started out well with starters but they seemed to have forgotten about us for the entrees. Other people who sat down after us got their food about 30mins before us. I could have forgiven the poor service if the food was great, but sadly it wasn't. We were so disappointed by this sad thing of chicken tagine. Dry and weird. Never had chicken tagine quite like it as if it was boiled rapidly. The eggplant starter and bread was great but couscous was again dry and tasteless.  However because the staff recognized their error they comped us the entire meal including a bottle of wine. I really appreciate that and they get a 3 star vs 1 star."]

['Fantastic experience eating here, from the host to the flavours everything was amazing!

Vegan options very well catered for and staff have no problem explaining what is in each dish.

Would have eaten here every evening if we had the chance!', 'He overcharged us. We ordered the vegetarian dish that was ‚Ç¨17.50, but he charged us for the meat one, which was ‚Ç¨2 more per plate. Also, we ordered half a bottle of wine that was ‚Ç¨12, and he gave us the full bottle and charged us for the glass. We ended up drinking half a bottle and paid ‚Ç¨27, more than the price of the entire bottle. The food was nice, but not worth it. We ended up having a bad time. Also he made some inappropriate "jokes".', 'Good food, authentic atmosphere. The owner is very happy to share his culture with guests.', "Absolutely top notch Ethiopian restaurant. Named after N√©gus, the Ethiopian king of kings, you can be assured a wonderfully warm welcome and some of the best and most authentic Ethiopian food I've ever had. A relaxed, hugely enjoyable restaurant, the owner and proprioter even plays some music if you're lucky - this is far from snobbish - come hungry and you will not be disappointed - highly recommended.", 'Cozy restaurant with amazing food. Ideal for first dates! The host is extremely friendly, and he literally feeds you with his hands, and you too must eat with your right hand. They have vegetarian options as well. Highly recommended.']

['We celebrated our engagement party here and it was a great experience. First they organized a meal plan plus some drinks for the guests for a comfortable price. The music was very good, varied, international and perfect to celebrate a special occasion. Friendly staff and willing to create a great atmosphere for the celebration. Highly recommended for organizing a party for friends and family.', 'A friend and I had an improvised dinner last night and the place was such a pleasant surprise! the service was great and the dinner, delicious. Will come back for sure :)', 'This place is discriminating with other races , we spend hell lot of money literally 100+ euros for 4 people but bouncers were really raciest and most of people were drunk but they only threw out non-whites and this is inacceptable.
They had no reason to give us for this!

Edit 1 (after reply for owner)
Agreed we were bit tipsy (like every other person in that room), but we did not touch a single person nor troubled anyone - In fact other people dropped our drinks and misbehaved  - can you show a video or  evidence if we troubled  anyone or toppled tables as you have mentioned in your fabricated response ?? I am sure you dont. We were just happy within our own group. But the atrocity and discrimination your showed was not acceptable the guys who kicked us out did not say anything even after asking multiple times (In french). i am sure you have some policies and internal agendas. But look deeply! Its only for whites! Enjoy and cheers with your future customer base.

FYI if if we were so drunk, I could not even post this review at same time of the visit l.', 'ABSOLUTELY NO GO TO THIS PLACE. I HAD A TERRIBLE EXPERIENCE ON 27 th Nov. The bouncer was quite rude and irrational. We were literally removed out of the club for NO REASON. I would like to convey to management that this act was quite disrespectful and irrational. Highly disappointing. Do check on the behavior of bouncers and grow up to treat people with different race and orientation respectfully.', "Quite a strange restaurant. I don't recommend it. Our food was ready literally in 10 minutes. Microwave. Friendly staff though"]

['Very friendly staff and customers that come regularly. Food was amazing and thoughtful plating. Worth every penny I am paying. Make sure to leave some stomach for the dessert the portion is super generous üòÇ', 'Excellent dinner, It is now officially on my Paris must go restaurant.', 'Un restaurant agr√©able, if I say it in French. Madame who served us is very friendly and welcoming. She speaks French, English, and Japanese. There were nice flowers arranged by Madam. As the chef is Japanese, he cooks fish in a sophisticated manner. Many local people seem to come here. I loved white asparagus mousse and bonito carpaccio. Cheese mousse dessert was wonderful. Moreover, their glass wines were well selected and at the same time very reasonable. I will visit here again.', 'Great restaurant and very talented chef! The carpaccio appetizer and millefeuille dessert are to die for. It was soooo good I would go back again and again.', 'Loved the place! The food was amazing and the service was excellent! The server/owner speaks french, english japanese and maybe more!']

['Dependable seafood place for delicious seafood and English speaking staff.\n\nThey have an instant reservation system, good for last minute reservations.', 'An exceptional dining experience that felt quintessentially Parisian. The food was superb and presented fantastic quality for the price. From our starting course to the dessert, we savored every bite. Thank you to Pierre for the excellent service!', 'Delicious food, great service, reasonable prices.', 'Such beautiful seafood! Must do in Paris if you‚Äôre in this neighborhood üíãüç∑', 'Good quality seafood and knowledgeable waiters']

['The first restaurant in Paris I ever ate in.  Stopped in for lunch after getting in from the airport.  The coffee and food were good.  Not sure what to make of the servers, though?', "It's a good place to drink:) Workers were kind and tapas was good! We drank nice and reasonable priced cocktail because we went there during happy hour (it costs 7euros each)", 'Nice drinks and snacks. Good service, clean toilet, nice decoration. And superbe location right in front of a cinema. You can have a bite there before the show or after.', 'Food was extremely good, price is average, and the people are nice! And it looks fabulous!', 'I really like this place ! People are very kind, smiley and welcoming. Food and drink are delicious and the prices too !\nI recommend you the chicken burger and the mozzarella stick ! And for drink their homemade tea or the Chardonnay !']

['We stayed nearby and just popped in late, waited at the bar for a table on a busy Friday night about ten pm. The service was friendly and efficient and they served us classic French dishes. I had filet of bass in sauce vierge with pistachio and my companion had a wild boar daube, I had creme br√ªl√©e and he had rice pudding. Really good and they spoke to us in English.', 'Beautiful traditional bistrot. The wine is great and the food amazing. Be aware that portions tend to be huge. We had two main courses and two desserts and we were super full and satisfied at the end.', 'Staff was sooo nice, felt like home !\nIt was my first time eating aligot, I really enjoyed it with the sausage ‚Äúau couteau‚Äù. Had this delicious cr√®me caramel as a dessert of the day ! Saumur Red wine was perfect with all these dishes !', "Wonderful experience\nWant to experience France Aubrac quality food..... don't miss this place.", 'Very cozy place. Great food! Menu available in English. Had the sausage with aligot and entrecote. Cr√®me brulee for dessert. Would definitely recommend.']

Adresse: 317 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Antoine, 75011 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Amazing place! Amazing staff and owner! The food was out of this world! Lebanese authentic cuisine with generous portions‚ù§Ô∏è
Will come back for sure! Highly recommended!', 'Great food, very nice service. Thank you for everything. My family and I had very nice time here.', 'Not the best Lebanese restaurant I‚Äôve been to, but quite good for a buffet set. For around ‚Ç¨21 you‚Äôll get a buffet of mezz√©, and Lebanese dishes. The atmosphere reminds you of Lebanese restaurants with oriental music. The owner seemed so nice.', "I would give a 4.5 for food. Ordered a mezze for 2 people. The hot and cold dishes were great. The houmous and  the aubergine paste were good too. The salads could've been better. One of them was a bit bitter from some leaf they put in it. The falafel was okay. They also had a gravy of chickpeas and aubergine which was okay. Again, could've been better. Around 50eur for 2 people. That's what I generally pay at Lebanese restaurants so it was expected. The vibe of the restaurant is good. The service was good too.
Would go again though, to try something new.", 'The food was awsome and the staff were really kind
The ambiance üí•üôå
You guyz nailed it
Highly recommended']

['The amount of rice in every sushi is very high. So the flavor disappears very quickly. Disappointed.', 'The food was ok the people weren‚Äôt super nice either. Be careful there is no takeaway if you don‚Äôt finish you have to pay 2 euros for each portion of sushi. When we took our last round they did it in purpose to add more and bigger sushi so we struggle to finish and they weren‚Äôt that good either. They were rushed not even closed and taste quite bad. The worst sushi I‚Äôve ever had and the chef was shouting at us for not finishing even though he made them bigger and added sushi we didn‚Äôt order. Not a good adress should run away', 'Tbh I don‚Äôt really see where the negative comments are coming from
The food is really tasty and good of quality. Having tested other Asian buffets , I find that this one is not putting too much rice in maki and sushi as a lot of others do and the staff was very nice and welcoming.

Note that if you have a sweet tooth, the choice of the desserts is not huge
And be aware that you have 5 rounds to order :)', 'Great price-quality ratio! The system is a bit too much at first, but I imagine if you are a regular costumer there you get used to it quite easily. The meat and mushroom sticks are awesome.', "Terrible, awful, tremendously bad experience. 3 hours waiting for 3 small rounds of plates. In all of the rounds, items were missing.

When I asked about the missing items, was notified that they wouldn't come because the kitchen was closed.

The manager was very rude saying that I was wasting his time when I complained. I paid entire value of buffet but did each much less than what would be considered fair.

If you have the chance to eat a simple burger with fries and soda in the store at the side of this place, do it. Will be 3 times cheaper and you will at least have a decent meal."]

['Feel like everyone is happy & content in the restaurant. My lunch was happy spicy. I discovered cadamon tea. I love it.\n\nThank you', 'The food was good but had an extremely bad experience with the owner and the service was so bad. Very rude and he made extremely racist comments. The food was good however but the behaviour of the owner made the overall experience horrible for us and our kids.', 'The naan bread was delicious! The staff was kind and welcoming, in a cosy and pleasant atmosphere. The prices very reasonable for a quality meal.', 'The service was amazing. Very friendly and helpful. The food was so tasty, best Indian food I‚Äôve had in all of Paris. I highly recommend eating here.', 'Behaviour of the owner is very concerning. He‚Äôs simply rude and treats customers harshly. Highly disappointing']

['Cozy place , good vibe , nice hot chocolate Bien noir', 'A really nice find in the 11th   Delicious with some fusion accents and really warm atmosphere in a quaint and historic looking space.', 'great food, music and service. fleetwood mac played throughout the whole visit!', "We wandered into Le Pure Caf√© after looking for records nearby, our first day in Paris. We were charmed by the decor, the velvet bench seats, the sympathetic servers who let me try out my French but still responded in English, kindly. They served up lovely cocktails, and we enjoyed a nice cheese plate as well. We expected that caf√©s like this would be common, and we decided we'd not return, just to make sure we experienced as much as we could, but as our trip went on we realized how special this place really is. We returned for lunch, and again for dinner, each time being met with fantastic service, and incredible food. We enjoyed what was likely the best steak frites in all of Paris with a delicious Jack Daniels sauce, and perfectly golden fries. The desserts were decadent, the drinks were superb, and our dinner was romantic, and truly unforgettable. We plan to return to Paris for an anniversary in the future and hope Le Pure Caf√© is waiting for us.", 'Had a relaxed lunch with a friend. We sat outdoors on a lovely summer day perfectly shielded from the intense summer sun. Food was overall good. The Salmon tartare was refreshing. The steak was good aswell. The portion felt a bit small however. The service was very attentive.\n\nA nice place overall and something I would go back to if I am in the area again.']

['A good Argentinean experience
The menu choice and variety is not super creative but loyal to tradition and the quality was good
The service was not great , specially in the very end where we were asked to leave a tip (we are not in US? ) . Unfortunately this made the overall dinner with a so-so memory.', "An amazing steakhouse in Paris. Ambiance and service at the top, and the food. Oh my god, the food. It was so good! Was a long time I didn't have such a meal!
Excellent!
Of course, it's a bit pricey, but not for the quality. Definitely worth it, and already looking forward to try again ü•≥", 'Lovely place, great steaks and the pudding was amazing.   My children who are sometime fussy about their steak said it was the best ever', '"Good" is enough. Not that much different from other steak restaurant. The differences are music, 3 type of Sources & grilled vegitables that make me guess it would be the argentina style food. Also, staffs are kind ,but cost is expensive.', 'My best steakhouse in Paris.
Great options for kids too, with a large choice of enchiladas.
I heard it is the success story of an Argentinian architect who turned a genuine butcher shop into a restaurant,‚Ä¶
Anyway I found the taste of great Argentinian meat and conviviality. Many good details as excellent knifes, white cloth towels. Good service.
A good 17‚Ç¨  menu at lunch time.']

['I live in the neighborhood and this is one of my go-to places. Service is fast & friendly. Cocktails, salads and burgers are great. I tried the new Croissant Burger with salmon it was delicious and healthy.', "Chez Prosper? More like Chez Disaster! üòí

Service was a joke. Couldn't even choose our table, and it stayed empty the whole time! üçΩÔ∏è . Got scolded for not finishing salad... Seriously? And don't get me started on the tartare. üò§ Soaked in onions and drowning in sauce. ü§¢

Only upside? Pretty decor and clean restrooms.

Note to staff: customers want a good time, not a lecture.

ü§∑‍‚ôÇÔ∏è Guess who won't be coming back anytime soon? üôã‍‚ôÇÔ∏è", "Had the duck leg with greens and sliced potatoes. The meat was a bit dry , hardly fall off the bone. Probably wouldn't go back.

p.s. The moscow mule was not a traditional one I dont think ,but it was delicious", 'Nice and very friendly staff. The atmosphere is cozy. The food quality is OK.

Our tartar was nice but the wine glass we initially got was a bit unpleasantly smelly. The stuff was quick to recognize it to replace the glass.

The number of wine choices is subpar for a nice French restaurant.', 'Very average food. A little bland. Do not recommend. I tried this restaurant few years back, it was much better!
Friendly staff though.']

['Maybe I was super hungry or maybe it was just looking so good. I was on my way to get Chinese dumplings and re-routed by this dish I saw two men eating. I ordered the same, and it is sooo good. mgret de canard ü¶Ü + a vert and we are good in life.', "Lucky find when we wanted dessert and lucky again for lunch.
My husband and I both ordered chicken schnitzel, one with a generous portion of saut√©ed vegetables, the other with frites. My husband also ordered German potato salad and a Maisel's white beer. All delicious and paired well.
Desserts - spot on Apple strudel and chocolate fondant with its melting chocolate center. Ronnenfeldt teas.
Crowded and lively at lunch and the servers keep it all organized with grace. A simple room that fully serves its purpose.

One concern. No soap in the bathroom/toilet area on 2 separate visits.", 'Cozy place, tight fit with kids but it works. Love the idea of basically everything being from Germany.

Food was OK but not exceptional or very good, just hits the spot for when you absolutely need to have food from home right now.

For the price I wouldn‚Äôt go again really, nice experience but nothing to write home about.', "Run, run away. You won't regret it.
The food is a bad joke, you'd be better off throwing your money into the Seine.", 'Great German bar with a good selection of draft beers and wurst. Although there might not be a lot of germanophones, it gathers people that definitely enjoy its culture and food. I you want a nice meal with a match on the screen with a beer in one hand, you have yourself the perfect place to spend the evening!']

['What a lovely surprise!! Highly recommended for someone wanting to have a full night of entertainment. The drag queens are so talented and you are going to laugh and sing all night. The food is delicious and the service is done by the drag queens which is such a fun touch! Would love to come back next time I‚Äôm in Paris. Take the most expensive pack that guarantees first row, plenty of food and drinks for the whole night!', 'Great show, great food and amazing atmosphere! Highly recommended if you wanna see real drag-queen show (unlike terrible madame arthur)! Lots of French and international superstars, fantastic costumes of more than 2 hours show! "Desabilles Moi" is a masterpiece!)))', 'We just had show tickets üéü and WHAT A SHOW!\nSuch a fun evening. A mix of French and pop delivered by a wonderful troupe of characters. Superb', 'Excellent show, very funny and cast were all friendly and kind. Get tickets to this cabaret, it‚Äôs a fun way to spend a night in Paris !', 'Fantastic cabaret with good production !!! Many amazing funny talented artiste ! Only 25 euros entrance ! You can have little meal and drinks including beer or champagne or wine or simply coca or water !!! Very friendly staff that are also artists on stage ! A unique gay friendly place open to all adults people ! Have fun']

Adresse: 216 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Antoine, 75012 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Warm staff. Thickest slices of salmon I‚Äôve had in a chirashi bowl. 11‚Ç¨ served with salad and miso soup. 1/2 wine pitcher for 4‚Ç¨‚Ä¶ lady working is super friendly and cute. 100% recommend ‚ù§Ô∏è', 'This was a very good sushi place. The menus are well priced, the portions are generous and delicious.', 'Exploring around Paris and came across this cute little sushi place. Enjoyed the dishes üòã', 'Really nice people, fast delivery !', 'lovely food']

['Tuesdays they have menu degustation for 5 euro with unlimited rice !!!! Not only the food is delicious also you are in a super sympa ambiance. Need i say they have free karoeke downstairs ?\nA must in the quartier.', 'Great pub with nice variety and quality of beers and snacks. The bartenders are awesome! Must visit in the area to feel some cool local vibe.', 'Best belgium beers selection in the area. Very nice Welsh and French fries. And now they accept card payment!!!! Yeah!!!!', 'From a Filipino living in France : Good, unpretentious Filipino food hidden away in a Paris side street - worth the trip.', 'Good Filipino food for a fair price in Paris .. lot of choices of food and beers.']

Adresse: 108 Rue de la Roquette, 75011 Paris, France
Reviews:
['AVOID IF YOU ARE A TOURIST! Read why...

The good: the absinthe was alright, the drip service, setting the sugar alight, all fun and delightful.

The meh: had a croque monseiur which was basically cheese and toasted bread, no b√©chamel sauce to be found. So an inverted grilled cheese really.

THE BAD: "we don't take credit cards" after I watched two French speakers, looked like regulars, use it without issue. So I had to use the emergency ‚Ç¨40 I had on me. The bill was ‚Ç¨29 and I got ‚Ç¨10 back as the waitress "didn't have enough change".

There's always that one shitty place that takes advantage of you when you visit somewhere awesome like Paris. And La F√©e Verte was that one place.

Avoid.', 'Amazing food, great prices for Paris, great service, will definitely come again with friends!!', 'Amazing experience for a curious American!
Also met one of my best French pen pals, for the first time! He took me to this district and I hope I get to visit again soon!', 'Had dinner here. Planche fromages was good. Gave 4* because Salad paysanne was supposed to have mozarella and tomates marin√©es (but it was good anyway). The restaurant was quite busy with a birthday (?) party, so the waiting times were a bit longer: after waiting 20 minutes for ordered Creme brul√©e we decided to leave without it. Maybe next time.', 'we really enjoyed the place and the various flavours of absinthe. Its really fun to see the drops of water  reach the spoon and melt the sugar.  Order some food to guarantee that you will handle the drink : )']

['Waly-Fay Paris is an absolute gem! The restaurant offers an incredible selection of dishes from all over Africa, and every dish I tried was outstanding. The flavors were authentic and perfectly executed.

The service was out of this world‚Äîthe staff were warm, welcoming, and made the entire experience even more enjoyable. If you‚Äôre looking to explore African cuisine in Paris, Waly-Fay is a must-visit. Highly recommended!', 'Truly obsessed with this place, every time I visit Paris it‚Äôs a MUST GO. The food is incredible and I just cannot get enough.
The Nigerian shrimp with the rice was my fave!
The okra, codfish fritters and the red sauce. Infact everything I ate, I loved and we ate a lot.
Very cute place for friends and romantic enough for a date!', 'This place is so good, definitely worth the hype!! My main suggestion is to be ready to speak French lol bc we were strugglingü§£ We had so many great dishes. The Yassa chicken, ndole beef stew and Suya were phenomenal! For dessert we got the soursop sorbet and the sweet potato mousse! The hibiscus and ginger juice is so delicious as well!!!', 'Lovely place with a great atmosphere and staff that were very attentive and welcoming. I was very excited to try the restaurant as a friend recommended it and it didn‚Äôt disappoint. I really enjoyed the Yassa Chicken, it was tangy and sweet. I recommend trying the Soursop sorbet, a risk was taken but it definitely paid off. It was sweet and creamy and still refreshing - I wasn‚Äôt a fan of the raisins on top but that can easily be removed. Overall a great dining experience', 'Came here through a recommendation and left with mixed feelings. The food is definitely AMAZING, flavours are vibrant and delicious. We had the vegetarian stew, the jumbo prawns (delectable) and for starters the okra and plantains. All of that was exactly as good as I had heard. But the service was fairly poor. Didn‚Äôt really seemed bothered, I understand it was busy but it really felt like they were out of their wits with work, maybe they need a couple more servers?
I would go back for the food but not for the service.']

['Great great food, we took 5 dishes every bite was amazing. Great service, the place is super cute and the wines are great. Overall great experience good value for money. The food is fresh, great ingredients, good balance one of the good and surprising places I had in Paris. Local and very recommend place!', 'We landed here by accident while on vacation because the place we were aiming for didn't have room for us. Le 6 didn't either but they a reservation no-showed so they found us a table.

We ordered the "chef's choice" menu and got a delicious assortment of veal, beef, fish, and ice cream on a reasonable budget given what it was. Each course was really incredible -- presented beautifully, explained well to us in a mix of French and English, with some advice on wine pairing to go with it.

The tables were small and packed close together and the service friendly without being servile.

It will be a great memory for us!', 'I decided to treat myself while in Paris. I had a really high end 3 course meal for about 50‚Ç¨. It was totally worth it! The servers are super nice and speak English. They have a great selection of wine and the server will definitely recommend something good if you‚Äôre indecisive. I would recommend making a reservation unless you‚Äôre a party of one and don‚Äôt mind eating at the bar. I would definitely go back there.', 'Would have given a 5 Star BUT (1) we weren‚Äôt offered the bread basket although the table next to us (left and right sides) were offered these, and (2) We were not offered complimentary sweets at the start of our meal either while likewise other tables received these.  We were amongst the first few tables so we don‚Äôt think it is a matter of the restaurant being too busy.  Having said that the food is excellent and the price is fair.  Keep up the good work guys.', 'Le 6 Paul Bert is a restaurant on the Michelin guide, and rightfully so. At one end it has an eager individual ready to cut through a diverse assortment of hams. While on the other end, one gets familiar with the masterminds behind the concoctions that will be devoured. The chefs are standing in an open kitchen with utter transparency and nothing to hide. I had poultry for my main dish after feasting on its humble beginnings as an ingredient in my salad. The dishes were presented in an appetizing manner and the food was filled with flavor. I enjoyed sitting at the red table in this cozy Parisian restaurant placed on the corner of a street.']

["Don't go to this restaurant if you want to have authentic Japanese ramen and udon. We ordered one miso ramen and udon, but it seemed they cooked the two dishes (soup) at the same time and put different noodles because the soup tasted the same. They also added cilantro (coriander) in ramen and udon. I have never seen such an awful Japanese thing.  Probably we should have ordered different ones..", 'The reception at the restaurant was very nice and polite. The ramen and gyoza were delicious. Not only Asahi Beer but also Kirin is served here.', 'I ordered an oyakodon but what they served was something different. I hope they will learn what is oyakodon.', 'Outstanding sashimi and they made it into a meal with rice, miso soup, cute side salad and a little sweet. Nice people too. Highly recommended', "Amazing chicken. The fried chicken is perfect.. Crispy on the outside but still moist on the inside. Not too dry and sooo tasty! It's a must have!!"]

['Awesome food and great service by the lady. Food was quick and tasty the only thing was not as spicy as we wanted. We ordered fish, Penang chicken, prawn basil, pandan chicken. According to the owner this is the first Thai restaurant in Paris', 'Delicious and authentic Thai food, served in a tranquil atmosphere by friendly staff. I highly recommend a visit to this lovely family restaurant if you enjoy an excellent quality meal at a fair price. We look forward to returning to sample some more of the menu. I highly recommend the  Chicken Thai green curry.', 'Amazing food and service! The owner is very nice and has a warm personality. The cuisine is as good as what I ate in Thailand. Strongly recommend!', 'Very uncomfortable atmosphere with the woman who hawkeyes the restaurant. It is impossible to enjoy a quiet meal with her hovering over your table.  She just stands there and doesn‚Äôt leave even when you ask her repeatedly to do so.

Forget it if you want any sauces on the side.  She seems to have a major issue with this request. She shook her head, seemed exasperated and literally laughed at us (repeatedly) when we requested soy sauce, hot mustard and sweet and sour sauce.  She brought us about a tooth full of soy sauce.

The prices are inexpensive and the serving sizes are small. My husband and I left hungry. We usually always have leftovers when we leave a Thai restaurant. Not the case at this establishment.

I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this restaurant.', 'The green curry was much less spicy than I expected so it was a bit disappointing. The rice is ok. I also ordered a beef salad. Although there was not much ‚Äòsalad‚Äô, the beef was really good. Overall, the flavour is there.']

['Great and affordable Chinese restaurant with good quality food and friendly service. Would highly recommend. Recommend ordering a starter, as main course portion sizes are slightly smaller than expected.', "Has always been a fan of this particular restaurant  due to its friendly staffs and its awesome setting. With its recent renovation, they placed its kitchen in the middle of the dining area which is really cool. Definitely should check out their evening menu: 19,90‚Ç¨ for a full course meal in a modern/classic atmosphere. Way to go Lys d'or.", 'Excelente! Good food, really different compare  the others.', 'Absolutely excellent restaurant. We have traveled quite a bit as a family and eaten out a lot and we loved this place. We had a short one week stay in Paris and liked this restaurant so much we visited twice during our trip. Friendly welcoming professional staff and superb food. If you like oriental food then you have to try here.  Very reasonable prices for really tasty food. I will definitely make a visit again if I have the opportunity to visit Paris again.

PS we are from Ireland.', "The food here is edible but not special and definitely not authentic. The decor is very dated and the service quite cold.

We had the Braised Aubergine and the Sliced Beef in Chili Oil. Both tasted OK but not really authentic. Les Trois Royaumes downtown does the same aubergine dish but with a much more complex & authentic taste.

The decor looks very tired. At a guess, probably not redecorated since the 90s. Nice to see so many plants around - it felt like eating in a forest which is a good thing. However, the chair cushions are very worn. Overall, they should seriously consider redecorating.

The service was pretty cold. At some point, they gave us Prawn Crackers but then took them away without asking after we'd eaten only one.

Unfortunately, we won't be visiting again."]

['After spending 5 days in Paris I can confirm this is the best place I had food at, we even went twice!! Lovely bar, lovely atmosphere and definitely the loveliest people. Stefan thank you so much for your kindness.', 'Cool bistrot, the owner was nice with us. Its well located near the subway and near a super nice street where you don‚Äôt feel in Paris anymore. The beer were good and from Paris region (Yvelines) and the food as well, cheap and good. Recommended.', 'Incredible food. Fait maison gnocchi. Good beer selection. Peugeot pepper grinders. High quality salt. Great decor. Great prices considering the quality. Clean bathrooms.', 'Great little local bar, very cute and intimate. Lovely in summer with big open doors and windows feeling like your outside while seated inside. Very simple and affordable food menu. Lovely staff and selection of wine and craft beer. Their gnocchi and bavette steak are amazing! Also - amazing playlist.', 'The food is homemade and well cooked, prices are correct.']

Adresse: 172 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Antoine, 75012 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Absolutely lovely restaurant with the friendliest staff that makes you feel at home!
The lasagna is amazing and the tiramisu is a must have!', 'delicious italian cuisine, great food , excellent service, friendly people here', 'After a full day it was such a pleasure to find Il Modigliani. I had the fish of the day dish, Bar or Bass, perfectly cooked with light seasoning and lemon juice. The accompanying pasta was slightly spicy, which I thoroughly enjoyed.  (For others perhaps too spicy).
I would have loved to try the tiramisu, but I was simply too full for dessert. So hopefully I can return for a coffee and dessert. Family run restaurant.', 'This is my 2nd time here ,a beautiful atmosphere, Authentic Italian restaurant in Paris 12eme run by a family, Dishes were delicious specially Lasagna and i tried spaghetti shrimp with carbonara sauce.
They have nice varieties of Italian pizzas too , the waitress was very kind with us with patiently even her mom was very kind ,reasonable prices and very hygienic, i highly recommend this place if you are in to Italian cuisine!', 'Good pizzas, simple but missing flavor. Staff is nice and friendly. A few outdoor seatings are available.']

['We returned to Le Charolais after a previous visit 16 years ago during Rugby World Cup 2007.
The staff were very welcoming and full of smiles which always makes for a pleasant meal. With our limited French the English speaking staff made it all very easy. The Steak was tender and tasty and the freshly shucked oysters offered up the salty taste of the ocean. We will return, maybe not after 16 years this time.', 'The lady (owner) is very friendly. We arrived after 11am when we stumbled upon the place. She conversed with us while we were seated to drink coffee until lunch time (served at noon). Food was good and price was reasonable. The lady owner even offered us fresh oysters free of charge. Will definitely go back there to eat.', "I like this place a lot. Quite small place but with many tables located outside. Very helpful waitress, speaking very good English :-)

Tartar made of vegetables (only) was great. Very refreshing and super tasty. With addition of local bread it haven in my mouths!

Beef cooked in red wine with pasta and little onions/ mushrooms was also very good. I almost do not eat meet at all but this dish was very tasty.

It's worth to mention that there is also a great selection of vines. Both white and red.

Totally recommend this place if you want to eat in a nice (quiet!) place, with great atmosphere where you can enjoy the food and conversation.

Thanks!", 'Enjoyed a great salad with chevre, nice glass of red wine and an excellent slice of apricot pie for lunch today. Waiter Jan was super friendly and spoke English well. Recommend!

ETA, returned two more times during our stay in Paris! Bavette with fries was delicious, as well! Met many nice people at Le Charolais!', 'Huge charolais steak for very reasonable price. The steak is very greatly cooked. Love the red wine vinegar onion with oyster.  There is an English menu and waitress that can speak English. Will probably come back again in the next trip to Paris.']

["Visited Chalet d'Avron with the family for a birthday celebration üéâ. The ambiance was pleasant, but our table, situated near the kitchen, felt a bit chilly ‚ùÑÔ∏è. The lone waiter struggled to provide prompt service and a warm welcome. Despite the limited menu, the food was excellent, and the kitchen staff went above and beyond by surprising our little one with candies, making the visit enjoyable.
The absence of music allowed us to hear conversations from other tables üé∂. The solo server, recognizing the service challenges, genuinely tried his best with a warm smile, turning the experience around. Overall, a mix of positives and challenges.", 'great place for Raclette with endless boiled potatoes and pickles . we had also a platter with some cold cuts . The cheese was great , we had great time and the stuff was super friendly and helpful. will visit again .', 'Horrible receptions, foods are below average. It is hard to believe that but I‚Äôve got verbally and physically threatened by the owner (as they thought I didn‚Äôt order much food). The worst dining experience I have ever had. If you‚Äôve had a good time here, then congrats for your luck, but it was a nightmare to me.', 'The time to eat is a bit short if you wish to have a real diner/conversation combo but the cheese is good and the raclettes and service are excellent.
Consider the great price-quality ratio for a nice meal between friends.', 'Good food and very cheap and tasty
Must try every food lovers']

['Lovely Indian food in Paris! Very reasonable prices, quite nice inside, giving ‚Äúmom and pop shop‚Äù if you know that reference from the US ü•∞\nThis would be a nice place for an affordable dinner date. Will definitely eat here again!', 'delicious and open 7 days a week, authentique Indian dishes and good service.', 'This is one of the best Indian restaurants ever, the food is fantastic and the service is also top-class. Would highly recommend !', "Second time visiting the restaurant to collect my order. Borkot was incredible kind and offered conversation. The food was amazing, I'll be back yet again! :)"]

['Food is delicious, staff is very kind and helpful. We ate pizza and really liked the test. However, the service is very slow. We waited over 30 minutes only for 2 pizzas. You should be patient and not starving when you visit here.', 'I won‚Äôt rate any food and beverage establishments where waiters/waitresses throw things at me beyond 3 stars. The reason it doesn‚Äôt go lower than this is thanks to the first waiter who welcomed me and checked on me if things went well, and always wearing a smile. The waiter who served me was like a gangster. His manner was not refined. And also the bread was already half eaten.', 'I was looking for some dinner after a really long day, and decided to try cafe Capone. My French failed me, as did my English! The bar man and waiter were amazing, friendly and patient. I left with energy restored, a full belly and a big smile.

It was also nice to sit and enjoy the local vibe, having spent the day dodging my fellow tourists. What a wonderful place to finish my up travels.', "The taste of food is good but a little expensive! It's in a nice location. Good place to hang out with friends or for a date!
A remark for girls....... Flirty Waiters!!! ü§£", 'Amazing staff and real Italian cocktails !']

['My best experience of Jewish Tunisian food in Paris. Everything was the very tasty and the service was excellent. Can‚Äôt wait to be back to this lovely restaurant.', 'She is working around the clock to please the clients. Excellent food, excellent service.\n#1 Kosher to go in Paris without a question.', 'So view is amazing. But the service and food was poor.  The waiter brought glasses but didn‚Äôt bring water. I finally ordered wine and it came with 5 bugs in it and lipstick on the glass. I told the manager and he gave it to the waiter. It was returned in same glass with cold water dripping of sides.  Lipstick still on glass! Ahhh then manager argues he did not see the lipstick and is holding it to light. Clearly the lipstick was there, and he agreed.  I repeated new glass.  It was a big production to get a clean glass of wine. Also saw that the woman next to us had her soup served with her seafood platter. She asked nicely to have it after her platter and manager was a an arrogant and annoyed.  I‚Äôd skep this place.  Pompous, pretentious, poor food, poor service, dirty', 'Super bon restaurant', 'This place was recommended as a nice place for couscous. Food was below average . I would not revisit this place .']

['Great food in a casuel setting. Everything is very fresh and tasty. Quite a wide menu. Bone marrow is exceptional there! Definitely a must try. Only downside is the beef kefta, extremely dry. Nice selection of wines. Very friendly staff.', "Fantastic meal, had the ravioli, risotto, pulled pork and chicken skewers. All were fantastic, but the risotto was like no risotto I had ever eaten, truly amazing! Also an extensive collection of wine and the atmosphere and decoration were brilliant! If you get the chance to go don't miss out!", 'Loved the vibe. The plates to share were really nice they had a wine collections which they walk you through.', 'We liked eating at this restaurant. The dishes were really nice and quickly prepared. The only unfortunate thing was the fact that the waiter was alone and it was too crowded for him.', "My visit to Le Chat Ivre restaurant was an absolutely delightful experience! From the moment I stepped in, I was enchanted by the cozy and inviting ambiance of the place. The restaurant had a charming and intimate setting, perfect for a relaxing meal.

The service at Le Chat Ivre was top-notch. The staff was friendly, attentive, and very knowledgeable about the menu. They were eager to provide recommendations and cater to any special requests we had.

The cuisine at Le Chat Ivre was a true culinary delight. The dishes were exquisitely prepared with a perfect balance of flavors and high-quality ingredients. Each bite was a burst of delightful taste, and I was thoroughly impressed by the creativity and skill of the chefs.

The restaurant's wine selection was equally impressive, offering a wide range of choices to complement the meal perfectly. The sommelier was helpful in suggesting wine pairings that perfectly enhanced the flavors of our dishes.

The attention to detail at Le Chat Ivre was commendable. From the beautifully presented dishes to the carefully curated decor, it was evident that every aspect of the dining experience was thoughtfully considered.

Moreover, the restaurant had a warm and welcoming ambiance, making it an ideal spot for a special occasion or an intimate dinner with loved ones.

In terms of value for money, I found Le Chat Ivre to be a worthwhile investment. The quality of the dining experience, from the service to the cuisine, more than justified the prices.

In conclusion, my visit to Le Chat Ivre restaurant was a truly memorable and enjoyable experience. The inviting ambiance, impeccable service, delectable cuisine, and attention to detail make it a standout dining destination. I highly recommend Le Chat Ivre to anyone seeking an exceptional dining experience in a charming and cozy setting."]

['We tried almost all the food in the menu. They‚Äôre all pretty good. And the wines? Very good. We had an amazing time here and the staff is friendly and helpful in explaining the menu and wines. We will be back!', 'The service here was great and the waiter recommended some really good wine based on our preferences. The food here is excellent as well. Definitely coming back here again.', 'Best go to place to hang out with my friends. Food is fresh and great with that little touch of originality. Good for a date night or a night out with friends.']

Adresse: 205 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Antoine, 75011 Paris, France
Reviews: ['I had the vegetarian thali (platter) for lunch. It was like home cooked food, flavorful and at a good price. The owner was very collegial. A great place for Indian food near Gare de Lyon!', 'Delicious lamb vindaloo! So tender and flavorful. Highly recommend.', 'Very good food and service!', 'When I first arrived in Paris one of the first things I concerned myself with was finding a decent Indian restaurant. After many disappointments I passed by Cardamom Cafe and decided to try one more time thanks to their menu offer which was very reasonably priced. The food was excellent, everything really delicious, the staff very friendly and the bill was nowhere near as frightening as it can be in other Indian restaurants. Since then I‚Äôve been back plenty of times and plan on going back many times more. Top notch.', 'The place was almost empty. There were 2 guests and we had a reservation at 2 o‚Äôclock.  We arrived at 2:10. The man was unbelievably rude. He said the restaurant closes at 2:30 and he could not seat us.  We got lost walking to the restaurant which made us 10 min late. On this particular street in Paris the even numbers are 206 a block away on the opposite side.  It took us a extra 6 min to correct this.  So this particular person was extremely inhospitable and I would tell anyone to NEVER book a reservation here.  There is a reason the restaurant was empty.  The food did not look appetising.  All of the restaurants around were busy.  If you show up 20 minutes late for a reservation anywhere in my experience until now you would be seated.  We even offered to takeout instead of dine at the restaurant.  He refused.  This restaurant is awful.  The way they treat people is inhuman.  I will tell everyone to avoid this place!  Ten minutes late is ridiculous!  Never eat here!!!']

['Tasty dinner', 'Very good welcome.', "It's not crazy, why not make a pretty decoration? Take inspiration from Colette coffee.", 'Disgusting unpleasant boss', 'Thank you for your welcome and for the kindness of the customers']

['KARAOKE', 'Ok', 'The best brasserie in Paris, I really enjoyed it. The mojitos are excellent and the manager is exceptional. ['Mango dragon is very good', 'Great kosher (so hallal) restaurant, its japanese with a tunisian jewish twist: you can get chiken mayo rolls with a salmon bagel on the side or a burger, or regular japanese sushis and stuff. ['We had dinner there. We ordered the breaded fish and boef carrotes, and both were excellent. All the food is fresh (a different guest told me they have no freezer :o).

['I had an amazing stay at Le Petit Cosy Hotel in Paris! This is our second time visiting the city, and we will definitely return to this hotel in the future. ['The food was delicious and the dishes were original. We ordered 3 starters to share, orange juice and lemonade, and spent 25 euros. The savory and sweet types of crepes were both wildly tasty but the sweet is worth all of the hype. Melted white chocolate and fresh strawberries is in the l'originale - so good. My wife had the praline with banana and also so good. The owner who served us was so sweet and personable, we loved her."]

["It's an Algerian / Morrocoan food restaurant. They served us cous cous, along with veges in shorba and the kebabs and BBQ meat with salads.
They had fresh things available and we chose the kebabs and meat pieces of our liking. What was unique here was the variety of lamb organs (kidneys, heart etc) though we didn't order them.
Cooking standard was good. Cous cous was served in huge quantity and none of us could finish it. Kebabs and grilled meat were excellent.
The ambiance and decor is reasonable, nothing spectacular but it was clean. Rates are very reasonable and it will cost you ‚Ç¨ 7 to 11 per person.  Street parking is available.", 'Great food! A bit chaotic but service is great. Lots of locals. You should really try it!', 'Very tasty meals absolutely lovely,  I highly recommend this place.', 'Excellent services
Very Good Algerian Foods', 'Top top']

['Lovely food. I loved all of it, but starter I had the egg with cheese‚Ä¶ gosh, that was absolutely fabulous. Couldn‚Äôt finish the pork cheeks, also beautiful', 'The plating of the salmon was really nice and my friend was obsessed with the bread haha. Tasty steak and friendly server. Cozy atmosphere too.', "I went for dinner as I was staying nearby. I was pleased to see that they had two vegetarian options and decided on the roasted sweet potato which was supposed to come with a sauce and vegetables. It was half a sweet potato with a white sauce and a few chopped vegetables on top, not much topping at all and a small salad. I was disappointed, it looked really good on the menu but not so on the plate. I think when non vegetarian restaurants foray into vegetarian dishes, they don't always know how to make them.", 'Very disappointing, the quality of the food seems to have fallen. My appetizer, a beef samosa, was bland and burnt and served with an equally tasteless handful of unseasoned greens. The main course, supposedly pasta in a pesto sauce with sun dried tomatoes had no sauce whatsoever and was simply tossed with roquette, slices of an Italian version of chorizo (quite tasty) and parmesan shavings. The wine was good though.', 'Empty plates, full bellies and lovely staff, say less! 5 stars']

['First time I eat Cambodia food. Very good experience ! I love Fish Hamok here and steamed shrimp and chicken Vietnamese raviolis.', 'Delicious food and a nice atmosphere offered by this small family-owned business. We had spring rolls with shrimps, salad, fish amok and veggie soup. The other day we also took fish amok and bo bum with shrimps. Everything was freshly prepared and amazing.
The staff is super friendly and nice to talk to (also in English!).
I highly recommend it!', 'Excellent food.
Very friendly service.
Good prices.', 'We had fish hamok, lemongrass sausage and tapioca dessert. They were full of flavours yet refreshing; tasted of home yet well presented. Well done!', 'Absolutely loved this cute little restaurant! The owner really has a passion for the food she makes and it shows. It‚Äôs delicious and well worth the trip!']

['Cool', 'Good', "I bought something from this store today and when I asked for the invoice the lady with the glasses said I couldn't print. She didn't even ask for the bill. So rude. There was another Asian man working here he scammed my husband because my husband doesn't speak French he added stuff to his bill that he didn't buy and when my husband came home with the bill he said I brought a few things but it cost that much he told me to check and when I checked it was a scam from this Asian mom and I'm immediately went to the store with my husband and showed him the receipt and the things he had brought. He was aware of what he was doing. That's why he refunded us immediately. He scammed my husband and it's shameful. It had happened months before but I hadn't written anything bad. I thought about giving up. But today when this lady didn't give me a bill, she didn't even ask for the bill. We must be conscious when we pay.  I bought something from this store today and when I asked for the receipt the lady with the window said I couldn't print. She didn't even ask for the bill. So rude. There was another Asian man working here he scammed my husband because my husband doesn't speak French he added stuff to his bill that he didn't buy and when my husband came home with the bill he said I brought a few things but it cost that much he told me to check and when I checked it was this Asian mom who scammed me and I went immediately to the store with my husband and showed him the receipt and the stuff he had brought. He was aware of what he was doing. That's why he refunded us immediately. He scammed my husband and it's shameful. It had happened months before but I hadn't written anything bad. I thought about giving up. But today when this lady didn't give me a bill, she didn't even ask for the bill. We must be conscious when we pay.", "I've lived in the neighborhood for years, I was away for a few months, and after my return I noticed that the young Italian girl with long hair and glasses no longer works here, it's too bad she was really too kind, friendly and professional.
Compared to the store, top nothing to say, impeccable cleanliness and well-stocked shelves.", 'Very friendly team and very clean store.
I am a regular customer of this store and have always enjoyed shopping there.
There is everything, and for all budgets!
There are promotions very regularly
Good luck to you']

['One of my favorite chicken shops I frequently order a delivery from. The food arrives fast, correct, hot and delicious, and is not expensive.', 'Just came is paris to visit and I was craving to have indian biriyani and found this restaurant where I tried BIRIYANI POULET TIKKA which gave me the real taste of the INDIAN BIRIYANI. Loved it. Highly recommended.', 'Amazing place ! Very good indian kitchen but also a delicious indian fast food ! Good, local and fresh products. The chef is really kind. You can choose your tvchannel, you can talk with other clients, we feel at home Whitehorse making funny people.', "Excellent, not expensive for the quality, friendly and smiling staff (the sales clerk offered us lassis), the home fries really make the difference with the other restaurants.
The chicken is excellent, it's of a rare quality, the sauces, even the Nawal brand, are really super good. The time I spent in this place was excellent, the welcome was really cordial, attentive and elegant. Similarly, the Indian dishes were really good, their flavor was of high quality, you could feel that the products were meticulously chosen, they were Indian products, the sensation of eating local was total. The restaurant is clean and modern. The screens are highly sophisticated. The decor is young, dynamic and bright; nothing to do with those dodgy Greeks. Here, we know that what we're eating is carefully chosen, and the products are selected according to the customer's affinities.
The programs (about Charles Maurras, or the culture of Bangladesh) that were shown on TV (and chosen by the owner) were very interesting. This allowed the customer to learn something while eating.  The fries are homemade: crispy, melt-in-the-mouth, calorific, mouth-watering. And the American sauce, made by the chef himself, is dense and subtle.

A very good table. I highly recommend it!

I highly recommend!", 'Great butter chicken, samosas are dank. And the service‚Ä¶ impeccable! 5*']

['Take away in my opinion (the place itself is pretty small inside), but the pizza is of wonderful quality for a very affordable price. Strongly recommend ! The owner is a great guy. Strongly recommend!', 'bad taste bad service . not clean . worst pizza  even not good kitchen', 'Top üññüòÅü§ò', "Well what can I say... Excellent pizza for a first experience. Very good chicken pizza and Regina prestige pizza, very very good with good products. Good pizza dough (on request thin or thick) I highly recommend, don't hesitate. Price 17‚Ç¨ for 2 average 4 people during the week to take away very correct (and very friendly manager)", 'Very bad sandwich\nI put everything at the tip more than that he made me pay\nMeat will say it is 3 days old']

Nom: Caf√© De L' Europe : The Feel
Reviews:
['Ok', 'After reading the reviews of this restaurant-bar, I wanted to try one of their beers as well as their "homemade" couscous, I don't know if it was having been running around all day or having eaten at their place but I I wanted to go to the bathroom all evening: food poisoning or...?
In short, very mixed opinion of this place. Not sure I'll come back anytime soon...', 'Change of ownership
At the time I gave it 5 stars
I went back there, surprised by the change of ownership, but still wanted to have lunch there.
Already the reception leaves something to be desired, we have the impression of annoying them, unfriendly...
We order a beer, we point out to them that the taste is strange and that it has nothing to do with what we ordered.
Instead of checking if the beer served was the one requested, we were told that we knew nothing about it, and the strange taste came from the fact that it was a new draft...
At the end of the meal, they have the nerve to ask why we have barely started our beer....
There you go, now it‚Äôs up to you to make up your mind.
Only one regret, the former owner and his sense of welcome and his helpfulness.', 'Hello everyone, in the presence of the boss, the atmosphere is a little cold when we have coffee. On the other hand, the waitress is more welcoming.', 'Very good couscous
Extra super nice boss
I highly recommend this place
Couscous Thursday and Friday
Superb lamb shank']

Adresse: 1 Sent. de la Pointe, 75020 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Good food, lovely people', 'beta', 'Nice place!', 'Very good restaurant with fresh produce. A great experience.', 'Very good lunchtime catering offer. The dishes are fresh and well prepared. They have great taste. Very nice to eat there for lunch during the break.\nWe are very well received there, it is very pleasant. A very nice Latin American cuisine.']

Adresse: 50 Cours de Vincennes, 30 Rue Marsoulan, 75012 Paris, France
Reviews: ['I recommend the menu M1. The rice has the same taste as in Japan.', 'Really good sushi, probably the best in 12eme arrondissement. Fish seems fresh, very good prices for this type of quality! Staff is very efficient.', 'decent quality, moderate price, quite fast in delivery. also nice to eat inside.', 'Really nice and friendly. Affordable, fast and good quality. I really recommend!', 'Very nice place, people and food, thanks']

['üò≠the worst experience I had so far at a McDonald‚Äôs .
Had to wait 20 minutes for a mango smoothie because no one knew how to make it so had to wait for the manager to come make it and when he gave it to me it was cold and tasted like rotten fruits blended
Then asked for a milkshake and then I got this
Honestly so disappointed
It‚Äôs just that the manager was nice about it that‚Äôs why the 3 stars', 'I ordered a mcchicken and got a fillet o fish but it was so bussin I didn‚Äôt care', "This is not a good restaurant others McDonald's it‚Äôs not good, very long time waiting and warker not quickly delivery order is very bad for customers üëé", "Worst McDonald's EVER! We waited 30 min. for our food at 23:30 in the evening. We were the only ones there! And when we finally got our food, we got cold fries. How can you brand yourselves as a fastfood restaurant? My worst experience ever at a McDonald's.", "I thought that all McD's are at same level of service. This was the first time we had cold fries. You have to bring the food to you desk yourself. Even nuggets were so bad. Avoid this place, if you can."]

["Entered without any expectation, left with a big smile and will definetly come back. The restaurant is open since 2014, we went with a friend a mine that I haven't spoke to for a while for a catch-up and started with a simple well dosed cocktail. By seeing the plates being served around we thought it would be good to have a bite. The bread was good, the fries were perfectly golden and crisp. The final sweet note with the strawberries and raspberries tiramisu (sorry for the purists) was light, fresh and creamy. The staff/owners were so welcoming and fun. The place is clean, and they do make you feel welcomed. Thanks for the moment, see you soon, maybe for the the 2024 Olympics or sooner :).", 'What a lovely surprise! We found it randomly because it is close to our hotel and it‚Äôs been outstanding. I wasn‚Äôt expecting this kind of food quality and service. We were served by a lovely young waitress and the overall price was fair! Highly recommended!', "We went in by chance and left with a big smile. It's an excellent place. They have the best food, the service is so good. I liked it very much. I hope to come back, greetings from Bogot√°.", 'On our recent holiday in Paris for a week we only discovered this lovely place on our last couple of days of our stay and what a find!!.
Le Netter was only just around the corner from where we where staying.
It is such a welcoming relaxed place to spend a few hours. We ate there on 2 evenings and the food was beautiful. We had a few drinks each evening and the price was very reasonable(especially for paris). Happy hour prices are great. Staff were friendly especially as we had little French and had to order in English. They were so patient.
If your in the area pay them a visit its so worth it.
Greetings from Ireland.', 'Cozy restaurant, pleasant environment, nice staff. I recommend this restaurant.']

Adresse: 1 Av. de la Prte de Montreuil, 75020 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Unpretentious cafe with delicous French food. The food was so good I came here TWICE in two days.\n\nThe best French onion soup I‚Äôve ever had! And at a great price.', "Came here for lunch and dinner today. Partly chose to come back because of convenience but also because they have great food and an authentic French menu at fair prices. My wife and I shared 5 dishes total and each one was absolutely delicious. The staff were friendly, welcoming and patient. I highly recommend Cafe de l'industrie if you are in the area but it is also easy to reach by transit if you are not.", 'Ohhh this place made our Paris trip very enjoyable. We tried this place out as its so close to our accommodation and just infront of the metro entrance so really convenient. The owners/staffs were so so friendly, helpful and accommodating. We come early at 10:30am when they opened for breakky only. However, when we asked for lunch, the guy here didnt not hesitate to allow us order lunch early. He brought the lunch menu board out and explained the dishes to us. We went for his recommendation of calf liver and lamb and ohhh both of them were really good and tasty. Price is good too for the portion. We paid 34 euro for both dishes. Service is top- notched. Highly recommend this place if you are in the area.', 'walked in at 10:30pm and we were still welcomed with a big smile. i have to say that i had the best french food here in this most random restaurant i found, even better than those overpriced instagram/tiktok restaurants. the price is reasonable and the portion was huge, i would definitely recommend this place.', 'Randomly walked into this restaurant late night and had the best meal in Paris. The owner was super nice and the lamb we ordered was amazing. Definitely worth the price.']

['Good supermarket... everything available for all kinds of household requirement Juices, Meats, fruits & vegetables etc... Also, has a good variety of wines and liquor...', 'You can do your groceries here there are alot of products.', 'Good service and assortment. Service is fast', 'Crowed, but has necessary items.', 'A bit expensive but nice shop.']

["We stumbled upon this restaurant by chance and were drawn in by the lively crowd. Since my friend hadn't tried Moroccan food before, we decided to give it a try. I ordered the vegetarian tajine, and it turned out to be absolutely delicious. The staff were incredibly nice, and knowing I was vegetarian, the owner graciously offered me additional dishes to try. They even served us Chinese mint tea. It was a wonderful dining experience, and I'm grateful for the warm hospitality.", 'It‚Äôs a really cute small place, the food was absolutely delicious. Also of good value and nicely sized portions. It‚Äôs a 4,5 for me, as it seems understaffed. There are so many visitors but to make an order can take up to 20 mins and it‚Äôs not always good when you‚Äôre in a hurry.', 'We loved it!\nWe were welcomed with kindness and beautiful smiles, food was GREAT and prices are PERFECT! The owner is very nice which makes the experience even better! For wine lovers, you can bring your own bottle for free :)\nI recommend 200%!', 'Amazing Morroco cuisine, the dishes are suburb, the stuff very polite and quick, totally satisfied', 'First time eating Moroccan food. We had such a good evening here. The waiters were so positive and food was really delicious and reasonable.']

['The food was fresh. Staff was very friendly. Clean place.', "It's an amazing place, the food is so fresh and clean, people are kind. Best sushi I've ever eaten.", 'Quick and friendly service, fresh and tasty sushi, delicious warm sake!', 'Quick, clean, and easy to order. Nigiri were generous in size and freshly made. Packaged and ready to eat.  Very good quality for all elements of the meals.', 'Amazing experience, nice staff and great food! Overall a good evening']

['I cannot emphasis how scammed I felt. 9.50‚Ç¨ for the boneless chicken. üòë and the wings. Wings was but one get one free so that‚Äôs why I got extra but damn. 9.50 for 5 tiny pieces of chicken. Even the sauces were mediocre at the best.
Never ordering again from the place.', 'Great and clean establishment, mighty quick service and excellent option for the self check out.

Food is appealing to the eye and flavorful to the taste.

We ordered 2 extra hot burgers, regular fries, cheese fries, and 10 traditional wings. To begin with, the food was served quickly, and nice and warm. The burgers were the perfect ratio from bun to chicken and it has a zing. The wings were nice and crunchy. We has the mango habanero and spicy hot aili. Both were excellent, spicy and full of flavor. The mango habanero has a sweet and spicy kick to it. Overall just delicious. 10/10 would recommend and definitely would come back.', 'Got their wings delivered home. So happy we ordered from this restaurant. Fast delivery, good price. The wings were crispy and flavorful. Special mention to parmesan flavor!', 'An average restaurant, the expectation were sooo high bcz of instagram videos promoting this place. Disapointed experience below average. The fried chicken feels preheated.', 'The place is a bit small but their wings are amazing! Be careful though, the habanero sauce is pretty hot! I specially liked the lemon pepper dip. As for the vegetarians, they have vegan wings (cauliflowers)']

['This restaurant is amazing, not only was the food so good but the staff were so amazing. they truly cared about your experience and service you are receiving. The food was absolutely on point and they will more than definitely try their best to make the food suitable as you would like it. I couldn‚Äôt recommend a place more!', 'I was surprised to see so many excellent reviews. My own experience was not that great. I went there for lunch with a group for a birthday. The atmosphere was cold, we just sang happy birthday between us with no reaction from the one lady serving. The restaurant only had 3 other occupied tables for lunch-that should have been a sign. I had the chicken curry: 3 small bite size chicken in a tasteless watery sauce. I did not expect that, I was hoping for flavor, spices and a bit of Indian heat. As a group, we shared our experience and we decided that was not a place we would return. Very disappointing and I am wondering where all the good reviews came from?', 'We had absolutely amazing experience at Villa Darjeeling.  We ended up eating here every night we were in Paris. Great food and hospitality.  Both hosts were very welcoming and we felt like home.  I would give it more stars if I could.  Absolutely one of the most memorable experience from our trip!', 'Superb Indian food\nThe staff was so welcoming and all the reviews which we saw explains the taste of the restaurant.', 'Overall, this place is quite good. They also have a kids menu making the place "kid friendly". The place has lots of lighting and you really know what you are eating. The restroom is clean but the service can take a while. The atmosphere is pretty Indian for this kind of place. Outdoor dining is also available there.']

['Unfortunately the cashier as is common in France however, didnt speak much english but he was still nice and we all still got our correct food. Dont expect to much from the food itself but its pretty good for the price and they offer a wide variety', 'Even though the cashier could not even understand the most basic English phrases, with the help of a fellow French customer, we got everything we ordered. Despite that, the food was quite good and the place wasn‚Äôt too crowded either. Nice place for a quick snack, but maybe you should look up how to say your order in French beforehand, just in case', 'We were just hungry at late night, and we THOUGHT we found the food of our dreams. We ordered by to a different location. We were crazy to miss our dream food (Menu Tank! And menu Killer).
Fourtunately we managed to call the restaurant and we got our food.
The food came, it was badly prepared they use no steak just some cold rubber replacement. They say there is 4 cheese but all you get is this guwwy chesse ughh all cheddar.. where is our 4 cheese?

Both orders were left for the rats of Paris to feed of it, but even rats did not get close to that rubber food.

Conclusion: big, stincky, bad, disgusting, guwy, no taste, dry sandwich. Worst ever. Dream food is a nightmare. Eat your bedsheets instead.', "Really nice place,discovered on last evening here. The steak was really tasty and juicy. Really good value and really friendly staff.
To top it off, it's halal! üòäüòäüòäüòä", 'Good atmosphere and much tasty']

Adresse: 30 Pl. de la Nation, 75012 Paris, France
Reviews: ["I visited on a rainy night and I was shivering from the cold; I didn't expect much, just wanting something to warm my stomach, but the Joue de b≈ìuf mijot√©e that I ordered was really so warm and hearty and delicious that I felt like I've come back to life. The beef in the stew was very tender & soft with a great wine sauce, and the mashed potato that came with it was also very rich.\n\nAlthough I don't know a single word of french and it was already a bit late, the waiters were all very friendly and nice to me and I didn't need to wait much whenever I asked for their service. All in all it was a wonderful dinner and easily the best one I've had during my stay in Paris.", 'The restaurant was next to my hostel. I went here because it always looks full, which means people love it. I went for lunch and took their lunch deal, which included fresh oysters as an appetizer and then a beef patty with fries. It was my first time trying fresh oysters, and I know it was not my cup of tea. Apart from the food, the place was comfortable and nice. The staff was really friendly!', 'Had breakfast and then lunch here. Service is great and the staff were nice. Escargot was perfect, the steak with ratatouille delicious. The bone marrow entree is a very big portion and it was cooked perfectly', "I've been to Le Dalou 4 times now over the last 10 months after discovering this place when I stayed at the hostel next door. I love coming here, the food I've had so far has all been great. I'm a big fan of oysters and mussels and they are amazing there. My boyfriend tried their smoked salmon and rump steak last week which was also very good. The waiters and waitresses are very friendly and when I visited back in October 2022 they didn't speak English that well (luckily my French is alright) but last week all of the serving staff knew English. They were super friendly and the food is tasty and warm.", 'Great Location! Perfectly warm terrace for the winter. Delicious food. Special mention for the Sea Food : Amazing! No issue on the service. I would recommend this place for a cozy dinner.']

Adresse: 92 Rue de la R√©union, 75020 Paris, France
Reviews:
["I've been to many buffets in France, but this one was the most disappointing. The selection felt limited, especially for meat options. The only meat dish was meatballs, which were delicious but just not enough. The space is very small‚Äîstretching my arms between the two aisles could practically block the whole buffet. Dessert options were also quite limited. While the food is tasty and well-prepared, I expected more variety, especially for meat lovers.", 'I invited a friend to A Table. He was so delighted with the restaurant that he insisted we return with his wife. On a hot sunny day, we found a cool shaded table at the back with an open window onto a leafy green courtyard.
The buffet is divided into three parts : Left side is the entrees, wonderful diversity and all savory. Further down are the desserts - custards of unusual and pleasing tastes, fresh fruit and fruit pastes. On the Right side on the main dishes, 4 vegetarian, 4 with chicken or veal or beef in tasty sauces accompanied by two types of rice - saffron and fines herbes.
We ate everything and lots of it. Yet at the end we felt satisfied and light to continue on with our day.
The food is homemade and fresh. If you are looking for tasty variety, something different, A Table takes you there. I highly recommend the food and the service.', "She was the sweetest host üòç was so friendly. Gave us very good recommendations in Paris. The food didn't have a big variety but really delicious. I'd recommend trying the zafran beer. Merci a votre hospitalite madam. ÿ®Ÿá ÿ¥ÿØÿ™ ÿ™Ÿàÿµ€åŸá ŸÖ€åÿ¥Ÿáÿå ÿ®ÿ≥€åÿßÿ± ⁄Øÿ±ŸÖ ⁄Ø ŸÖŸáŸÖÿßŸÜ ŸÜŸàÿßÿ≤", 'Incredible Iranian buffet. The lady wrote all the explanations about these Iranian culinary specialities so that we could know what we were eating. Everything was delicious. And the staff were great', 'we went for their dinner buffet.

pros:
- variety of Persian (Iranian) stews, rice and sweets (but no kebab)
- cheap prices
- clean and decent persian decoration
- nice staff

cons:
- beans in their ghorme sabzi was hard and not fully cooked.
- Almost no meat in their foods
- their doogh (yogurt drink) was too salty.']

['Excellent restaurant/deli/bakery/mini-grocery with great food and incredibly friendly and helpful people. Family owned by someone from Crete, this spot has both great food - the souvlaki was fantastic - and spreads - excellent tzatziki and their tabouleh was the best I‚Äôd ever had - and great pastries, especially their kadaifi! Highly recommend this spot for food and œÜŒπŒªœåœÑŒπŒºŒø!', 'Good little shop with Greek/Cretan products and very welcoming staff.', 'As its name indicates, this shop is rather focused on Cretan products, particularly wines, for the rest you will find all fresh products stuffed eggplants, moussaka, tyropita, tzatziki etc.   everything is very good, a real piece of Greece in the neighborhood', 'Expensive and bad traders.
Formula at 8‚Ç¨50, I add a supplement of 1‚Ç¨ to arrive at 9‚Ç¨50 and I am bluntly told minimum card at 10‚Ç¨.
Very small sandwich, with ‚Äúbeef‚Äù on the menu but in reality ‚Äúminced meatballs‚Äù.
Very good tarama but excessively expensive. The products are qualitative but the welcome and the price do not make you want to return. Damage.', 'Top üëç awesome service human alive. As we love it so much and it‚Äôs very good
Thank you']

Adresse: 116 bis, Cr de Vincennes, 75012 Paris, France
Reviews:
['I recently visited French Tacos for the first time, and overall, it was a delightful experience! The tacos were quite cheesy‚Äîdefinitely more than I expected‚Äîbut I‚Äôm not complaining! I think as I get used to the flavor, it will only get better.

What really stood out to me was the service. The person at the cashier was not only taking orders but also kept the area clean and ensured everything was running smoothly. It‚Äôs great to see staff who are attentive and dedicated to providing a good experience.

I‚Äôm looking forward to returning and trying more from the menu!', 'The most of the food was burned or uncooked.
Frites Cheddar & Lardon, we‚Äôre ok, the cheddar was just flat on top and burned in some places, i expected it to be more saucy (like fromagere one).
Frites Fromag√®re & Lardons we‚Äôre better, but i could feel uncooked fries.
The onion rings were good, wish we could buy them on their own - without the whole set.
the O‚ÄôTACO (or more like a burrito) wasn‚Äôt really good looking, didn‚Äôt taste it but i was told it doesn‚Äôt really have a taste (besides just cheese).
Overall the idea is good, you need to change the cook (or teach him how).
*photos were taken half way through eating but you get the point*', 'gave me the wrong order and my drink was missing, fries were bland af and the chicken tasted like something out of resident evil 7', 'I visited o tacos every thing is very good.cashier Noman is very gentle.', 'Great Food Fast service,the cashier was very gentile']

['This place is a hidden gem. Best meal we had in Paris. All fresh made. Portions are huge. Delicious and very tasteful. Owner went out of his way to explain menu. Will be back for sure. A place you must visit and no place in area comparable with quality.', 'Great and super friendly service!
Great and delicious food!
5 stars for everything!
We will come back if we are in Paris again ‚ò∫Ô∏èüíØüíØ', 'great Italian restaurant with both classic pasta dishes and some unique dishes as well.
The place is Kosher!', 'Came here with a friend at 2230h on a Monday and it was busy. The kitchen was closed but the very friendly owner (Michael) arranged for a taster plate of all the pizzas left in the window. Very tasty, we didn‚Äôt finish either of our plates. Will come back here', 'The pizza and pasta specials were delicious, the owner and staff are fantastic, and I highly recommend visiting. Locals and tourists alike visiting and enjoying']

['Surprisingly delicious food. You don‚Äôt expect from the outside this quality of a food but it impress. The lady who attended us was super cool and very nice to us. wide variety of asian food and you pay what it weighed for. I might say i could repeat all the time i come to Paris. other thing surprised me is the jasmin tea. normally in asian restaurants you get served a teabag. But here no. its a real jasmin tea with jasmin flowers and green tea inside a pot.. bah, just try it and you will see‚Ä¶', 'We found ourselves in nation metro Station when returning from Disneyland. It was by far the best eat out in Paris. Chicken with caramel is excellent.', 'Nice food and good service\U0001faf0', 'Excellent!', 'Lots of varieties']

Nom: Del Totorino la pizza au feu de bois
Reviews:
['Pizza place near our stay in Paris. Food taste excellent!! My family and I love it.', 'Merci! Pizzas delicious! Siblu its s√∫per nice, fast service, very smiley and politeüòçü§ó. Recomended 100%.', 'The pizza was so good. thank you to yasin! For making me a custom pizza ‚ò∫Ô∏è', 'My wife and I regularly eat out at various restaurants and shops.

We found this place through tiktok and thought it looked interesting

When we arrived the place was full, but we were warmly welcomed with a smile and promptly given a seat.

The food was truly a 10/10 and in my opinion it was the best pizza we‚Äôve ever had (and we‚Äôve been to quite a few countries)

Thanks again for the friendly welcome and delicious food. We‚Äôll definitely come back whenever we‚Äôre in Paris again üëçüèº', 'Fabulous little pizzeria.  The staff are very friendly,  the service excellent  and the pizzas amazing!  Authentic thin base with plenty of toppings.  Highly reccomended!']

['5 stars in all categories! Love La Sosta! Whether you are on vacation, a local or just passing through Paris you MUST stop here. I would actually buy a I ', 'Foods are really delicious specially Cheese Nan Kebab .. just love it .. service is good as well .. keep it up planet Food', "One of the best places I've ever eaten at. I went with a bunch of friends and not only was the menu incredibly diverse, the customer service was incredible.\nI would highly recommend", 'Last week me & my friends were there fantastic restaurant friendly stuff & atmosphere, Foods are very delicious Specially pizza and mango lacchi was so delicious we loved it really enjoyed our time so i highly recommend this restaurant.', 'Excellent place, friendly staff. Go there and enjoy nice food.']

Nom: Les Gar√ßons Bouchers restaurant cacher Beth Din
Reviews:
['One of the very best steaks I have ever had. The prices were reasonable, portions are generous and the service is EXCELLENT! There are plenty of Kosher steak restaurants in Paris but this one is the one you want to go to‚Ä¶', "We were on a 2 day layover between New York & Israel.

We decided to hit up this bistro after walking about 20km around Paris all day and we ordered ribeye (cote) steak for 2 people and some pur√©e.
