They are very generous with the portions and the steak is seasoned perfectly. Very quiet and chill before 9pm. Highly recommended if you're looking for a kosher bistro in Paris with very reasonable prices.", 'Great food and better service. Food came out quickly and delicious. Beautifully spiced and seasoned. Pets are allowed so there might be a dog barking here and there. Smoking is allowed inside as well.', 'What a generous portion for the entocote. Delicious meal, and kind and accommodating staff for fumbling through my English. Very glad I went. More noticeably Jewish staff than I‚Äôve seen so far in Paris.

To some negative reviews, I say it is just food lol. Mistakes are made. The table next to me, one of the steaks were undercooked, and they apologetically took it back. Mine was rarer than I normally would have ordered in the states, but I should have looked up translations ahead of time üòÖ Delicious kosher food that didn‚Äôt break the bank.

2024 Update: this is funny, but after six years I was back in Paris and forgot I came here. Was just as happy as before! This time my wife and I tried the charcuterie board which was unfortunately just cold cuts. They were fine, but a very disappointing arrangement since I would have rather spent my money and appetite on something else, like the beef assado! This slow cooked slab of meat was so good, but was rather unrealistic for our waiter to recommend such a large portion of meat for just the two of us. First world problems.', 'Wonderful spot to enjoy good meaty dishes. Whether you choose Ducks or beef, it will be delightful. Meat is absolutely delicious, and they can provide advice on how to cook your meat.
To this, you can add √† very nice staff, always willing to make you enjoy the moment.
This is all required to have a good time.
Thank you very much ! We will be back !']

['I have never felt more welcomed, anywhere. The owner is kind, caring, and so fun. The clients are some of the best people I have met. It was comforting being welcomed in, able to be myself in a foreign place and speaking a different language.  Amazing entertainment,  prices, and service. Do not hesitate to go in, introduce yourself,  and have a blast! XOXOXO ‚ù§Ô∏è', 'Welcome back Karim !', 'Pizz31', 'An old-fashioned place almost in its original form! I find it authentic, far from the madness of all the Parisian bars which are modernizing a little too much. The terrace is small but very very nice on this busy shopping street. I really like my coffee break here, especially since the man at the bar is very nice and very welcoming.', 'Great place, awesome bosses.\nSuper good atmosphere!! I recommend']

["Great pizza, made in front of our eyes and it tasted fresh. I'd go back for sure to try another from the menu.", 'Amazing pizza, amazing owner. Everything is made by hand and organic (and delicious)', 'Excellent.', 'Go, go, go !', 'We tested this address as part of the Salive - Charonne route and what a great discovery. Noureddine was super welcoming (a good start to the journey). His pizzas are very good with quality products, thin and crispy dough. We loved it. A good address to remember.']

['Definitely a 5 stars. Location is not central but worth going to try excellent food, excellent ambience, and excellent service. Not too elegant, but prefer this style more laid back.', 'Excellent service. They were very nice and friendly; the restaurant was busy and despite not having a reservation they took care of everything, found a good table for us and even gave us a beer on the house!
Nice open space. The neighbourhood is cool. Prices are affordable and dishes are very good. Options for vegetarians available.
We‚Äôll come back.', 'Eaten here twice excellent on both times
Fresh and tasty food  . Quick and helpful service', 'Authentique !
Back to Tha√Ølande for 1 dinner !
For more to come because it was too good !', 'The vegetarian green curry is so flavourful! It comes with a very generous amount of vegetables and delicious sauce.
Level 2 spiciness is good for those who like heat at a moderate level']

Adresse: 22 Av. de la Prte de Vincennes, 75012 Paris, France
Reviews: ['I had the chance to visit this pretty fancy bakery/kitchen.  They have really amazing food and baked goods.  The eclair and tarts were amazing and very beautiful to look at.  I would definitely return to this location next time.  The staff were very friendly and attentive of your needs.', 'the worst macaron i have ever eaten even ordinary supermarket macarons are better than this. I bought two boxxes and one of them was gift. i ate it after i gave my gift to my friend, i am very ashamed. The shop looks very fancy but keep away.I have to give one star because there is no zero star', 'After my eurotrip that included 2 weeks in Italy, Berthillion is at the top of my list for gelato. There are several locations on the island of St. Louis, so it is impossible to miss. I tried the strawberry and mango flavors, and both were mindblowing. I felt like I was tasting the fruit itself. The gelato was rich, dense, not too sweet, but very very flavorful. For how good this is, the price is comparable to all other places I have seen. If you are lucky, you may find a pianist or another street performer on the bridge, where you can enjoy your dessert in a free outdoor concert. This was truly picturesque and one of the best memories I had in Europe.', "Staff was super helpful and the macaroons were the best I've ever tried. The cakes are pricey but worth it.", 'Always real pleasure, good products and well presented. Sometime not easy to park if you come by car.']

Adresse: Bois de Vincennes, 2 Av. Anna Politkovska√Øa Or√©e du, 75012 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Brunch Review.

First impression at the door was horrible, security guy seemingly forgot that it‚Äôs not a nightclub. Once in you need to pay in advance, then if you want something extra (second glass of juice etc) you need to pay again on the spot. That seems redundant.

Staff is nice and welcoming, food was great and lots of different foods were available. Strong point: entertainment for children is available and included and they‚Äôre supervised.

The building is aging and many things are neglected it seems (toilet seat broken, doors to electrical safety equipment left open, spiderwebs everywhere and some chairs visibly not in good condition - also some ‚Äûblack mystery dust‚Äú on the napkins). Parking is difficult on the weekends due to the closure of the park, toilets are not stroller - wheelchair accessible.

For the price it must be better I think, the food can only make up for so much and then some.', 'Great avenue for parties (the Kpop one by KEvents was fire there). üî•', 'Beautiful park area. The building is a little need of some upkeep. I went to attend a new years eve event. The meal was just OK, and the service quite slow, even by relaxed Paris standards. I noted that a large group seated almost 30 minutes after me were served their full course first. They may have been thinly staffed that night, but it seemed off.', 'Barman tried to charge me ‚Ç¨40 for two bottles of water, dirty scammer

Obviously expected me to be drunk, and not notice. They probably make thousands a night scamming People this way!', 'Very lame Club! We were here at Silvester Party. First of all the bouncers were so unprofessional and unfriendly that i would gove them a minus -10.
They pushed my friend as if he were a garbage bag while checking him. Even though we had biught tickets in advance for about 50‚Ç¨/person - they wanted to froce us to buy bottles so they can let us in. After i complained and showed them their website, another bouncer came and told them that i am right and the were wrong.
Anyways we got inside and damn what we see? No age class, from teenager to old people of +60 are there.
The party was so lame! So please , if you want to have fun, go somewhere else. And hit the like if you had same bad feeling here.']

['We had an incredible evening here. The food was very inventive. Every time we thought we knew something about the next course, we turned out to be wrong - in delightful way. Slam dunks: desserts, wine, poultry, service, stomach. On point: seafood and sushi dishes. Would have liked to see a beef dish.', 'Very elegant dining venue in a historical park in the west of Paris (Bois de Boulogne). Ample rooms richly decorated within an opulent building. The food is top-notch, very creative and beautifully presented albeit portions are on the small side. Correct service that perhaps should be more personable and attentive for a 3 Michelin star restaurant.', 'An extraordinary example of balanced French cuisine! The service was courteous and natural, adding to the overall experience. I opted for the *De Pre* tasting menu, which was paired with a recommended champagne that complemented every course beautifully. While the wine selection was extensive, I felt that the digital format of the drink menu clashed with the restaurant's elegant style. My only regret was not having the opportunity to personally convey my impressions to the chef‚Äîa common practice in other two- or three-Michelin-starred restaurants ‚Äîand I also missed receiving a copy of the menu as a keepsake.
The tasting journey began with a signature dish: lobster cappuccino. The umami-rich flavor made for a standout start, and upon my compliment, I was even treated to an additional serving. Next came a delicately crafted tapioca risotto, cooked in jellyfish sauce, which offered a gentle and refined taste. The bread and butter exceeded expectations with their exceptional quality, tempting me throughout the meal.
The seafood courses continued to impress. The saut√©ed scallops with rosemary butter were flavorful, though not entirely authentic, while the marinated scallop carpaccio with hazelnut vinegar jus and smoked mustard was a thrilling highlight. The bouillabaisse, presented as a creamy velout√© with added "rouille" paste and bottarga, was both intense and seductive. Another standout was the hot crab jelly, served in a dashi broth with fennel cream and caviar‚Äîsilky, delicate, and bursting with flavor.
The lobster course was pure luxury. A Brittany lobster tail was encased in a thin pastry resembling ravioli, topped with foie gras-enriched jelly and gold leaf. Surrounding it was a velvety velout√© sauce enriched with foie gras. While extravagant and harmonious, the edible gold felt unnecessary. The cod "brandade," served on a base of mashed potatoes with a touch of burnt garlic and seaweed, was elegantly intense and one of the meal's highlights.
Other notable dishes included cherry wood-smoked salmon prepared at a low temperature with wasabi cream and toasted sesame‚Äîsubtle and refined‚Äîand champagne sorbet topped with caviar, which felt delightfully indulgent. The pigeon dish featured poached pigeon breasts with honey and dates, complemented by a sauce made from pigeon bones, delivering an intense yet elegant sweetness.
The cheese course was innovative, with a Comt√© cheese souffl√© in a truffle-infused sauce that was both unique and impactful. For dessert, the caramelized apple in the form of a kadaif-inspired tart, paired with apple pur√©e and vanilla sorbet, was both beautiful and inventive. Finally, the "Pollen" dessert‚Äîa honey sorbet paired with a pollen sponge cake, lemon marmalade, and yogurt mousse‚Äîwas a well-balanced and satisfying conclusion to the meal.
Overall, this dining experience showcased exceptional craftsmanship, creativity, and precision, with a few minor areas for improvement. A memorable journey through the best of French gastronomy!', 'this is the epitome of what a 3-star restaurant should be. everything was perfection - service, food, wine. I‚Äôve been to many 3 star restaurants where something‚Äôs lacking and left feeling disappointed. we ordered the short lunch menu because we didn‚Äôt have much time, but we wish we could‚Äôve experienced the entire menu! hope to return. merci!!', 'Amazing classic French food. Service and vibes are a bit stuffy and dry which I personally didn‚Äôt love. Recommend for anyone looking for a traditional and classic white tablecloth fine dining experience with stellar French food!']

Adresse: Rte de la Vge aux Berceaux, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews:
['An old establishment purely riding on the coattails of a (formerly) impressive beautiful building in need of a bit more maintenance / upkeep. The service was‚Ä¶interesting - impersonal and a bit flippant.

We were led to a table next to the kitchen, in the corner apart from the rest of the dining room, and when asked if we could change our seats a bit closer to everyone else the answer was ‚Äúbut it is impossible‚Äù - no reason given. We assumed it was because reservations were full for the night, but as our meal went on it became clear the hall was half empty. We were sat like outcasts for no reason.

The 5 course meal was uninspired, mediocre food without any ingredient or cooking technique that justified the 200 euro/pp price tag. The menu was poorly explained, my parents‚Äô wine was poured without being offered a tasting, and the bread was very salty. We were surprised to see a cheese course take up 1 course out of the 5. The cheese course was truly just 1 slab of cheese and a little mushroom side.

I wouldn‚Äôt waste any money or time or effort going out of the way to this restaurant! Best to try another establishment - we had pleasant experiences at Boutary (not Michelin rated) and L‚ÄôOiseau Blanc that blew us away.', 'First time I visited this restaurant In September 2003 with friends and we really enjoyed the lovely palace style setup and the outstanding environment in the inside seating and also the professional service also we enjoyed the food.
We are back to this place with my wife in August 2022 and while we enjoyed the outdoor seating and the environment and the setup we found that unfortunately the food wasn‚Äôt the same as before and it doesn‚Äôt even have the same concept at all The restaurant apparently lost his good food and went down in taste, presentation and service and that was terrible when we found that our wine bottle was still half while the server stopped serving us in way we thought it was finished!too bad this dropping from 5 to 3 stars (3 stars only for the location) and for the high price we paid it do not match the food quality and therefore we will not comeback again', 'I decided to take a walk in Bois de Boulogne this morning, and by noon, I arrived at this restaurant. I thought I‚Äôd enjoy a nice lunch given its high ranking. Well‚Ä¶ I should have read some of the top reviews first.

The crew here is the worst I‚Äôve experienced in Paris so far. Arrogant doesn‚Äôt even begin to describe their empty pride and constant contempt. Some of the waiters simply refused to speak to me in English, even though they knew I didn‚Äôt speak French. We had such lovely conversations! ü§£

The glass was dirty. ü§∑üèª‍‚ôÇÔ∏è

The food was tasteless. There are excellent restaurants in Paris (obviously), but this is not one of them. Every dish‚Äîthe cold pea soup, the salmon, even the croissant‚Äîlacked any great taste. It was all mediocre food, cooked with the the poorest creativity.

Unless you have to, don‚Äôt waste your money and time here. It‚Äôs not worth it.', 'Disappointing restaurant.
The quality and the service dropped drastically since we went there a few years ago. We had to ask them a few times to bring water but by the end of it we were just pouring it by ourselves. The prices were way too high for the dishes especially for the macaroni which was nothing incredible.
We took the menu so I would say overall the food is good but not worth the price.', "Unfortunately i have to give a 3 star review like many others here - for Michelin star, and for spending ‚Ç¨800, we expected more from the food, although i did have a decent service, a good time and a good meal. I had to ask for water twice, and we were just pouring it ourselves by the end - we had no trouble being refilled in wine though, which was great - we ordered only a glass at first but then expanded to multiple bottles and they didn't nitpick us about glass/bottle pricing. We had the macaroni - highly recommended(i daresay pushed) by the waitstaff: good but not noteworthy. I had the veal chop- I didn't like it,  and there were only four gnocchi. The chop was at least quite big and filling- my husband and brother had the beef and although they liked it, they werent wowed, and they were still hungry. The dessert we got was fantastic! My favorite plate by far (i cant remember what it was). The crepes suzanne was being prepared at the table next to us and it looked extravagant, i was quite jealous. My biggest disappointment was the french bread - hard as a rock - and obviously i came to paris to have good bread. At least i had good wine, and a gorgeous view."]

Adresse: 42 Rte de S√®vres √Ä Neuilly, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ['The staff was rude and unwelcoming. They kicked one of my friends out of the clubs for no reason and constantly asked stupid questions even when I was in toilet. But the music was nice tho. Overall I think they could‚Äôve handled the situation better and treated the customers nicely.', 'After wedding photos shut we have had nice glasses of wine there!\n\nIt was great', 'Respect our culture üò°üò°üá∏üá¶üá∏üá¶üá∏üá¶', 'Disgustingü§¢ü§Æ', 'Much too expensive for nothing, lousy customer, unpleasant service goes your way']

Adresse: Bois de Boulogne, All. de Longchamp, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ['The place is super cosy\nI love the water üíß fall. I forgot to snap my food but it fine will go there next time', 'A wonderful countryside atmosphere in the bois de Boulogne. Great simple dishes adorned by the high trees.', 'Nice restaurant with amazing food. Will come back in spring or summer to enjoy the terrace', 'In one word- Wonderful! Wonderful atmosphere, wonderful food and wonderful service. Set near the forest, it does feel like dining in a beautiful graden.\nThe menu has something for every taste bud... wonderful, rich in flavor yet refined desserts.', "Wow!!!  What a fantastic place to have lunch!  Food was excellent!  I especially loved the shrimp avocado appetizer and rose wine.  Beautiful outdoor garden seating with the smell of lavender from the trees.  Very reasonable prices.  Wonderful service.  And it takes you away from the bustle of the Parisian city.  Definitely come here if you are looking for an authentic Parisian escape.  Everyone around me spoke French, so it's not overrun with tourist like myself :)"]

Adresse: Embarcad√®re du Chalet des √éles Porte de la Muette Ceinture du lac inf√©rieur du, Bois de Boulogne, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Went here for a staff dinner with my coworkers. The setting is beautiful, the tables are out in a garden and everything is gorgeous, tastefully decorated and calming to the soul. Disappointed in the service as it was very very long between each course and they actually forgot about our desserts (apparently they were sent to another table) the food was alright, nothing exceptional, seasonal produce well cooked but not well seasoned and no interesting spices or sauces.. a shame the food and service wasn‚Äôt to the same standard as the setting.', 'Honestly for the price point, I was quite disappointed by the service. I understand the appeal is the atmosphere, which is undoubtedly magical, but our waitress forgot our order twice and then brought our aperitif with our appetizers which we specifically asked for the two to be served separately. Personally, I don‚Äôt like to sip a fruity cocktail with a ceviche and I probably would‚Äôve ordered white wine with the appetizer had the cocktails not arrived at the same time as the first course. The waitress also completely forgot our table at the end so we did not want to wait around for dessert, although we might have ordered something had she not been so distracted. The lack of attention to detail in the service really brought down the quality of the overall experience, although the food was very good and the atmosphere lovely. For 18‚Ç¨ for an aperitif, I expect more from the service.', "Wait was long despite only a few tables being served. They're under staffed when we visited, but they're pretty nice. Food taste wasn't so special, though pleasing in the eye and cost may be worth the maintenance of the restaurant in a romantic isle setting. I particularly love the cozy raft ride. Relaxing and romantic.", 'take good hard look at my mf boat (ft. T-Pain)

toilet paper: mountainsssss, could mummify many mums, even yo‚Äô momma
sink size: could wash a 15kg dog in there (solid)
stickiness: soggy, stickiness had no shot
does the mirror selfie?: most def
1 or 2 time: both baby
elvis score: why not
rail rating: slip n slide, but doable

thoughts: if you are a nature lover and have the anatomy to tinkle standing upright this is THE place to be üåæ', 'Delicious meals with good ideas in combining flavours. The ambiance is amazing near the lake. You reach the island by water shuttle for 2 euros.']

Adresse: 4 Chem. de Ceinture du Lac Inf√©rieur, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ["Good quality chicken salad, cheap compared to other places. I enjoyed the service, but no waitress, you have to pick up yourself. Also didn't try to speak English, so not sure if they understand.", 'We actually really liked this spot but that was mostly because of the dogs. We only had coffee and hot chocolate. Prices fair and it was relaxed and reasonably quiet when we visited- it was late November.\n\nBig sign says "dogs must be on a lead" and none of them were. But they were all so well-trained. Lady at the counter was a bit confused but very sweet and charming. We\'d definitely stop by during a walk again, even just for the dogs!', 'Hilarious.  Never before have I thought of the police as household removal men. But yesterday in a a sequence √† la "Charlot" (Charlie Chaplin\'s Little Tramp), we watched the efforts of the bicycle-mounted Police Municipale in assisting the franchisee of the Chalet to reorganise his fridges, chillers and coffee machine. We were taking a bike ride through the glorious Bois de Boulogne and stopped, we thought, for coffee. We never got the coffee, but it was quite an entertainment. Glory be to the Police for their stout-hearted civic sensibility (way beyond anything the pathetic troopers of my home city would ever have contemplated). And the sight of a pony-sized Wolfhound nosing ever so politely up to a pint-sized French bulldog was only exceeded by the bulldog\'s necessary and also polite walk on 2 legs to return the favour. Quelle aventure !', 'I waited 10 minutes for my hot dog while people behind me leaving with theirs. I finally asked with a smile if my hot dog was coming. And the owner told me that it needed time to heat up unless I wanted to eat the raw hot dog. Well I didn‚Äôt know that I got a special hot dog prepared from scratch. Very rude response to customer!', 'Just an amazing establishment with great food, great conversation and the owner never forgets your name!  One of my all time favorite spots in Paris for a beer and amazing fries in the idyllic setting of Le Bois.  A must.  And, the dog watching is fantastic for the kids!']

Adresse: Chem. de Ceinture du Lac Inf√©rieur, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Had a very nice time here. We had two tomatoes pasta, salad and drinks. It all was very tasty and the service was very friendly.', 'Wonderful outpost to enjoy the outdoors! I had a ham panini with tomato and mozzarella cheese. It was delicious! A perfect panini! That, with an ice-cold Orangina, made for a wonderful lunch, al fresco. This is a great spot to take a break while visiting Bois de Boulogne.', 'Perfect spot by Lac Superior burger it‚Äôs ample tables available to seat oneself in nature. The people who manage the chalet are kind and courteous and the food choices are good! Much above our expectations. Simple but tasty', 'Very sweet kiosk. Beverages are less expensive than usually in paris and the panini was also very good. Perfect for a snack if you are in the parc. The personal was very nice to us and he even gave us icecubes as it was very hot outside. I do really recommend this place if you search for a quick snack in nature. We will come back.', 'Best cappuccino I ever tasted for my time in Paris, excellent service, nice calm surroundings around the lake. Open when the weather is nice. Their hotdogs with mustard and cheese are really delicious, if you want by request they can add black pepper on top of it for those who like spicy. I love this place. Hightly recommend.']

['Excellent', 'Best place to eat around! whether for a sandwich, homemade cakes or takeaway meals, everything is good at Yesko!!', 'The best sandwich/lunch meal in the neighborhood! Try it once and you will be won over!\nThank you for the warm welcome and good luck.', '', '']

['The sushi‚Äôs great, the restaurants average. I recommend delivering it to ur house.', 'Overall good, but overpriced.', "the worst sushi ever......
we order take away
and they not send the part of
the order,
and still charge.
the food it's not frash.
avrting wes could even hot dish.
we didn't eat anything !!!!!", 'Litterally the worst sushi I‚Äôve ever had. Quality does NOT match with the price AT ALL. Ordered a ¬´\xa0gourmet mix\xa0¬ª and it was just the stalest, most tasteless sushi ever. I‚Äôm pretty sure they were a few days old. Presentation was so messy, as if they just had just thrown them into the box.
Avoid this place at all costs.', 'For a quick and practical meal this place is ok. I use it when in a rush. Quality is not excellent but it‚Äôs decent . Service could be quite slow at rushing hours so be aware of that. Selection is limited']

['A perfect restaurant with first class food and service . The classic French onion soup starter is perfect. Great location in the centre of Paris . Outside seating available and lovely classic decor . Wine list is extensive and top hygiene rating . Not to be missed', 'Amazing experience. The service was fast, food incredible and excellent vibe. Not sure why it‚Äôs only rated 3.5 stars. This has been our best dinner in Paris by far!', 'I could hardly wait to write this review so I pulled over in my car right after the incident to write it. I eat there frequently and have encountered the rude indifferent attitude of this particular Indian looking waiter before. Today however he crossed the line when he verbally attacked and cursed at me in front of a full restaurant because I changed my mind about a dish I ordered. He slammed the plates down and screamed ‚Äústop wasting my *** time, stop playing **** games with me, I have a job to do!‚Äù   This sounds like a mental case at best and an incident of verbal abuse at worst. Place will clearly never see me again. Oh and also he simply ignored my request for the meat to be well done, when the dish came the beans were clearly thrown over the meat with zero consideration. Not sure why he hasn‚Äôt been fired or sued yet, I guess his day will come.', "It's a very local parisian place. However the food is way too deep french cuisine.
We didn't enjoy the food too much and it has high prices.", 'Came in on a late night and had the best meal in Paris!
Their seafood is amazing, I had langoustines for the first time ever here. The French onion soup was mind-blowingly good! Escargot was also delicious.
The staff was very friendly and welcoming.']

['Wonderful food, wonderful host. So lucky to find this place. We took sea foid pasta, and pasta with konjac&parmezan. Also the fish was excelent . Main course average price is 20 euro', 'Authentic Italian cuisine with an intimate, quaint atmosphere. The house pasta and tiramisu were both outstanding.', "I went with my family to this restaurant. The service was impeccable, personal and with an attention to detail. The food was amazing and affordable. I highly recommend this restaurant. The tagliatelle flamb√©es are simply extraordinary. The restaurant uses a wheel of parmesan cheese and mixed the freshly cooked pasta in it with alcohol. It's impressive and super worth it.", "I don't usually take the time to write a review, positive or negative; however, my experience was such that I decided to share it.
I wanted to have some risotto since I arrived in Paris and I had been to other Italian restaurants but they didn't have it. I was in the area with the family and I found this establishment in Google, after looking at some reviews, mostly positive, we decided to try it. We were within walking distance.
Upon arriving, we stood at the door and a manager/owner greeted us behind a counter at the entrance. We said, a table for 3 (in French). He looked at us hesitant and commanded the waitress to make room for us near the counter. At first, I didn't think too much of it, sometimes people see children and they act in a similar fashion,; you don't see families with small children dining out in Paris. At least, I haven't seen too many.
Once seated, the waitress came over to get our drinks, we oder (in our broken French) mostly water and soda. Right off the bat I could sense something was wrong, we had a communication issue, the waitress had some trouble getting our order despite our efforts. I don't blame her (we are in her country and she doesn't need to speak  our language), also, she looked terrified of the man in charge, when I ordered the risotto all hell broke loose. The manager came over and said the plate was going to take too long to make, over 25 minutes. I said, that's fine, I don't think he was happy with my response. I also wanted to try some meat, he again, very rude, mumbled a few words and left it to the waitress who seemed to be in a rush. I was rushed to make a decision which I will later regret.
Fifteen minutes later, the food arrives, we were served bread and some nice complementary starter along with the main plates. I found it odd, it didn't take half as long as I was made to believe, I would soon find out.
No too long after, a few guests of what will become a big party, started arriving. They will occupy most of the seats close to us, perhaps all of the sudden we got in the middle of this and they thought they will be overwhelmed. No excuses, there is no reason to treat your guests poorly or rude. We felt unwelcome, rushed, very dissatisfied. The food wasn't bad, in fact I enjoyed the main course, not as good as I would have if the personal experience would have been different.
At the end, we asked for the check and left, no desert no nothing, we weren't even asked.  Take my experience for what it is, it doesn't necessarily mean it will happen to you. As for me, I will definitely take my business elsewhere more! friendly.
People say French are hostile towards Americans and I refuse to believe that, we have had wonderful experiences in other places always making the best of it when it comes to the language and such. All I can say is that people like this truly embodies the steriotype and that is the saddest thing.
Good luck.", 'Super friendly service, charming atmosphere, and novel delicious food. You absolutely must try their signature pasta dish "tagliatelles flamb√©es dans la meule" - they light some cognac on fire in a carved up cheese wheel, and then toss in your pasta. The flavours really go well together. My dinner total came to only 40 Euros including wine and dessert, so it's not cheap but not outrageous either! Great for a romantic meal.']

['We decided to try this restaurant after hearing people praise their mloukhiye. Unfortunately, it didn‚Äôt live up to the hype‚Äîit wasn‚Äôt good, and it certainly wasn‚Äôt fresh.

The service was another major disappointment. First, the prices are outrageously high (1 portion for 32‚Ç¨) . We opted for two portions of mloukhiye for four people because we heard the portions were generous and we weren‚Äôt that hungry. When we mentioned this to the waiter, he gave us a judgmental look. He then brought only two plates, so we asked for two more, which clearly annoyed him, and he shot us another unfriendly glance.

As Lebanese diners, we usually expect much better service when visiting a Lebanese restaurant, but this experience fell far below our expectations. The four of us felt genuinely uncomfortable and unwelcome throughout our meal. We left as soon as we finished eating. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this place.', 'Food tastes horrible. They delivered the hummus, and all other food that requires bread‚Ä¶ without bread. When I called the store they said they only speak Arabic. So when I started talking to them in Arabic and asked them why didn‚Äôt they call or state they didn‚Äôt have bread they gave a bs excuse and hung up on me. I called back and he said it was an accident, that‚Äôs fine I‚Äôll forgive that. When I went to get a refund on the delivery app, deliverOo, it stated it wouldn‚Äôt be compensated back so don‚Äôt use them ever again.', 'The food had a great flavor, more than we expected after reading the reviews, this place definitely should have more than 4.5 stars, the food is all homemade and you can notice when you eat, we had shawarma, kebbe and esfiha, all delicious! Thank you! We will go back for sure!', 'El service ken ktir fechel wel server ken aam yettala3 fina ghalat kell el waet. Jina lal mloukhiyye w really tasteless bala el khal. Mneje aa mahallet lebneniyye be france expecting at least the service to be good bas wala ta3me wala service. Very disappointed. (Btw the website on google doesn‚Äôt show the real prices fa ntebho)', 'This is the closest I have gotten to real Lebanese food in Paris.
We ordered tabboule, meat hummus, rakakat, chicken liver, garlic potatoes, soujouk, karabij and knefe.
The soujouk are a must and the sweets are too.
It‚Äôs a little pricey but makes sense for its location.
Overall if you don‚Äôt care what you pay to eat authentic Lebanese, this is a good one!']

['great spot for a quick and tasty Japanese meal!\nTheir menu features a variety of sushi rolls, salads, tartares, and hot dishes. The food is fresh and flavorful, and the service is friendly and efficient! If you‚Äôre looking for a casual and satisfying Japanese dining experience, Matsuri Paris is a great option :)', 'I tried their ice cream with mango it was good. I just wish it was little bit bigger. And the employee there was nice.', 'I adore Matsuri! I had the best experience! The quality of the sushi, sashimi, sauce, etc.. üç£ the food overall is excellent. The food is so fresh and made in front of you by the Chef! The concept is amazing! I loved the presentation of the food on an automatic roll carpet. There is also a small outside to enjoy the view even inside it is a great spot from the front gate. It was the best atmosphere and ambiance. I highly recommend it. I will come back for sure.', 'Nice sushi place, kids friendly with arcade games. Highly recommended, although a bit pricey.', 'A great experience, clean and the food is delicious and a real fun way to eat dinner! The staff was friendly and with a smile on their face. Will totally come again and definitely recommend.']

['Loved the food! Wide variety , cant go wrong with a bistro. The waiters are nice but a bit all over the place overall a super nice bistro that you should try :)', 'After 8 years this is still my favorite place to dine or just have drinks with friends.  The service is what you can typically get in any Paris restaurant you just have to know the French dining customs.  We enjoy a lengthy, unbothered experience and are never in a hurry when we go here.  The food never disappoints, everything here has always been really delicious and presented well.', 'First and Foremost, The SERVICE:  Excellent, wish there were 6 Stars to give;  the FRIES;  Absolutely Amazing, we ordered twice,   The ATMOSPHERE:  Really friendly but Cozy,  A place we would return to in our every trip to Paris,', 'Excellent food. Good ingredients prepared well. As some others have mentioned, a bit pricey, but good service and no smoking (at least when we were there) on the attached patio made it worth it.', 'Decided to stop in and eat to take in the French lifestyle. Great start to my trip. Staff was entertaining and engaging. Food was terrific and the wine selection was excellent.']

['Nice bar with a great vibe. Good selection of food and drinks. Plenty of seating but it does get crowded so plan accordingly.', 'Excelent service from the waiter Enrique. He was very nice!! The food amazing for a good price and the beers unique. I recommend the dark elysses. Very good place.', 'Had drinks with colleagues. It was quite warm (especially while drinking). Drinks were good and staff was helpful even with large group.', 'Stumbled across this little places whilst walking round past Trocadero.  Sat outside in the sun and enjoyed their lunch menu. 14.90 euros for lunch and a half pint of craft beer, very nice. I had the salmon and avocado club sandwich with sweet potato fries and a blanche bier. Both very nice.  My husband had the pulled pork tacos and he loved them. The kids menu is very good value for money 9 euros for main, dessert and a milkshake. My daughter had chicken goujons n chips, Churros and a milkshake. Very happy with it.  Would recommend if that is the kind of food n drinks you want.', 'Went here for tea one night and given a table. When we ordered, we were told the kitchen was now closed, so we went elsewhere to eat. On the next try, we ordered the food when that arrived, and two of the meals were not hot but edible. We had almost finished our meal before the drinks arrived, and this was after asking 3 times. The staff were busy and some were helpful but it appeared that once they had got your order were not proactive in ensuring it was fulfilled.']

Adresse: 80 Av. de la Grande Arm√©e, 75017 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Came to this place by accident because the original place we we‚Äôre going to go to had no seating available so while we were walking around the area, we decided to come here to test out the seafood and we‚Äôre delightful surprised by how amazing it was! We both ordered the sea bream, and it was by far the best fish we had both ever had! The mashed potatoes were really great as well as the bread, and the ambience of the restaurant was really tasteful, warm, and relaxing, especially for dinner time! Such great prices for seafood! Will definitely recommend to others!', 'Was well greeted by very friendly staff and were very kind. Was delighted to see that they have an English menu too.

Been in France for a week and finally had a chance to try a French Onion Soup. Was quite disappointed as it didn‚Äôt have enough flavour which I felt could have been much better.

I had the pan fried seabass in a beurre blanc sauce. The fish was well cooked, but it had a mild fishy taste which could have been better. The saving grace which was really really good were their mashed potatoes.

With a nice atmosphere, it is a decent place that I would recommend to try. Perhaps I might have been a bit unlucky with my choices.', 'A very pleasant dining experience with the courteous and humorous staff and tasty food. And they have English menus too. Highly recommended!', 'If you‚Äôre after a classic Parisian brasserie experience, Le Congr√®s Maillot is spot on. The menu is packed with traditional French dishes, and everything I tried was delicious. The service was top-notch ‚Äì super friendly and attentive. The vibe is lively and elegant, making it a great spot for a special meal. Highly recommend for authentic French dining with great service!', 'Excellent fresh oysters. Onion soup and fish soup were outstanding and the desserts very satisfying. The chocolate sauce for the profiteroles was so rich and creamy. Didn‚Äôt expect the prunes in Armagnac to be so flavorful. Loved it.  Would come back again to try more main dishes next trip to Paris.']

['I ordered coffee , chocolate croissants, and Jasmine Macaron,  the Macaron was the best. Average service , the lounge manager needs to be more friendly .overall it was good', 'We arrived at the place looking for a table and were treated very badly. There was a table available and the lady informed us that we could not sit down, that if we wanted to have coffee we would have to wait 1 hour. I asked if she would give us one if any other table became free, she said no matter what. We could only sit down after 1 hour. In addition to being rude, she treated us very badly, as if we were asking her for a favor. Another person came (I believe it was the manager) and I gave him the information and complained about her treatment, he said that she was alone doing everything, so that was the reason she was so rude to us. I told him that she should look for another job and that I would leave a comment here, he told me to feel at ease because most of the time she is adorable and everyone loves her. So here it is, because there is no point in making delicious food and the service is rubbish. We will never go back.', "A beautiful place that we found by accident. With French perfection at its best we were lured in by the sheer beauty of the shop windows. It warms the heart to see so much effort and taste put into a product. We were very glad to pass by and buy some of their incredibly tasteful macarons, which were the perfect complementary for our brunch on the side of the Seine opposing the Tour de Eiffel. We haven't had the opportunity to give their other impeccable culinaries a taste, but on our next Paris trip we will definitely come again and have a try! A must go for every Paris lover!", 'Their p√¢tisserie is flavourful & delicious and the atmosphere is elegantly decorated. But the server was rude, he literally threw the addition to our table while we were still sitting and enjoying our conversation.', 'Found this decedent shop on a casual stroll. What an amazing selection of traditional French treats, sweets and breakfast items. We couldn‚Äôt pass out the temptation to try some goodies. Simply wow!']

Adresse: 96 Rue de la Faisanderie, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ["We have waited 2 hours for our pizza! We were told 40 minutes and now they don't pick up the phone? Avoid", 'Very good pizza in a pleasant and well attended atmosphere even though there were many people because it was when an Olympic athletics session ended leaving Saint Denis and it was very full.', 'excellent artisanal pizzeria. the pizzas are really delicious. the welcome is friendly.\nI like Sunday lunch delivery. that‚Äôs how we discovered.\nwell done keep it up']

['Disappointed Experience at McDonald‚Äôs‚Äù\nI recently visited McDonald‚Äôs and had a truly disappointing experience. We had to wait an unreasonably long time for our food, which completely defeats the purpose of ‚Äúfast food.‚Äù To make matters worse, the toilets were absolutely disgusting‚Äîdirty floors, uncleaned surfaces, and a terrible smell that made it hard to even step inside. It‚Äôs shocking that a global brand would allow such poor hygiene and service. Definitely not what I expect when visiting McDonald‚Äôs.', 'The 2nd best McDonald‚Äôs I have ever been too! Timing was quick, and the food was great and hot, the restaurant was clean enough for people. But it‚Äôs a bit crowded, 5 stars!', 'Often overcrowded, slow service, long waiting lines during and around lunchtime. There were times when McDonalds advertised itself with its fast service ("service in 2 minutes"). Well, those times have gone long, long ago.', "It was tragedy. The service was totally out of time, I waited more than half an hour for a regular menu, which they still gave me incomplete.  Even when I pointed it out, nothing changed.  Right, I don't speak French, but the staff could at least some fundamental words... It is not a mistake of the employees but the management :-(", "Completely not tourist friendly. There's no signal if your order is in the making or not. Fries were cold and the hamburger came glued to the paper. Terrible."]

['NEVER ORDER FROM THIS RESTAURANT!!!\nWe ordered two pizzas one evening, which were supposed to arrive "within 45 minutes". After 2 hours of waiting we called back the restaurant who apologized flatly and assured us that they were arriving. Not only did they never arrive, but the restaurant seemed to have subsequently blocked our number since our calls were systematically ignored. ‚ÄúTradition Pizza‚Äù therefore ruined our evening, I could not recommend a restaurant more. I have never before been confronted with such contempt from the customer.', 'NEVER ORDER FROM THIS RESTAURANT!!!\nWe ordered two pizzas one evening, which were supposed to arrive "within 45 minutes". After 2 hours of waiting we called back the restaurant who apologized flatly and assured us that they were arriving. Not only did they never arrive, but the restaurant seemed to have subsequently blocked our number since our calls were systematically ignored. ‚ÄúTradition Pizza‚Äù therefore ruined our evening, I could not recommend a restaurant more. I have never before been confronted with such contempt from the customer.', '', '', '']

['My lunch of duck breast with pur√©e of vegetables was delicious! I chose the chocolate mousse for dessert which was also very tasty. A great deal, two courses for ‚Ç¨13.50. Friendly, courteous service. Highly recommend it.', 'Not sure why this Caf√© has 4.5 stars. The food was really disappointing - flavorless, cold plats not worth the price. Sorry I wasted my time and money. Go anywhere else.', 'Top', "Bad welcome, the waitress doesn't respond when we thank her, and in a very bad mood, she didn't want to serve us, I would never set foot there again.\nFlee if you are looking for friendliness and human warmth because here you will be judged by your appearance from the moment you enter.", "Super friendly and super smiling. I didn't have any change on me and it was cold, the lady served me tea and told me I could go get the money later. What kindness and trust. Well done!"]

Adresse: Galerie St Didier, 12 Rue des Belles Feuilles Lot 02/0312, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ["It's small but clean and has a good array of foods and drinks that make the chain's reputation as a good place for a quick bite: fresh bread, lunch options (sandwiches or salads), desserts, pastries and both hot and cold beverages (pro tip: avoid the hot chocolate. It‚Äôs processed and has an unpleasant aftertaste). It has a tiny but cozy seating area. I love going there for a quick breakfast early in the morning or for a hot beverage at tea time. It's quiet enough for me to catch up on emails and most of the staff is kind - [update] not all, which is why I‚Äôm removing two stars and shall no longer go there. (Making a sign that says ‚Äúshut up‚Äù to a paying customer that you have decided to dislike only happens in Paris‚Ä¶ Nowhere else would that be acceptable.)", 'Very dirty seating area', 'Nice fresh bread lots of choices of sandwiches and cakes also hot drink .', 'Nice place for breakfast. A variety of bread and hot drinks.', 'This location is closed!']

Adresse: 129 Rue de la Pompe, 75016 Paris, France
32 Rue des Belles Feuilles, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Low quality food, flies in the food cabinet, rude staff -- this place has it all.', 'BEWARE! MICROWAVED FOOD AND NOT FRESH!!!
Do not recommend AT ALL.
A total disregard for customer service or care. Blatantly microwaving food in front of PAYING customers signifies an unworthiness to own a "restaurant". Disgraceful.
The taste was gone due to the use of the microwave and the rice was rice. Overcooked chicken as well. No interesting desserts choice and taking the deal you have to pick a desert so we picked the banana/apple beignet which tasted off. VERY DISAPPOINTED.
If you are willing to waste money go there.
Thank you', 'very good  niceÔºÅ', 'Horrible.', 'Very nice!']

Adresse: 31 Rue des Belles Feuilles, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ["One of my favorite Japanese restaurants, this small place on the busy commercial side of the Rue des Belles Feuilles serves delicious, fresh food at pocket-friendly prices. The demure yet cheery decor is punctuated with photos of the owner and his family posing alongside former president Nicolas Sarkozy and regular customer G√©rard Depardieu.\nI don't eat raw fish, so I opt for the brochettes. However, my companion claims it's one of the freshest sushis he's had.\nThe owner and his staff are also very friendly and, best of all, they deliver!", 'Good sushi and dumplings, however the brochettes stole the show. I loved how the location wasn‚Äôt extremely busy hence it was a nice place to wind down after a long day', 'Excellent quality, always fresh, and the combo meals are a great value. Staff is very nice as well!', 'Got food poisoning from the not fresh tuna which they insisted was fine. Egg nigiri took forever, was the last to arrive and we ordered two and got one and tried to cancel the other and they refused to let us but never delivered. Food was mediocre overall.', 'I was expecting a bit more in terms of food quality and quantity, given its high rating. It was a slight disappoitment.']

Adresse: 174 Rue de la Pompe, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Had an awful food poisoning after sushi that I bought there', 'Good selection for such a small space. Love home delivery service.', 'Cool', 'Disrespecting customers by asking to see their bags when they shop at this store. Visit another store that respects its customers.', 'Spent today to buy a simple juice but the automatic cash register broke down and it swallowed the money without showing that I had paid. The employee asked me to pay believing I was in bad faith until he discovered the jam. I finally paid him the difference plus a little extra. But his attitude towards customers disappointed me a little']

Adresse: 189 Rue de la Pompe, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ["This restaurant exceeded me and my friends' expectations! The owner of the restaurant and staff were extremely friendly. Even though their hours to dine inside are restricted, they still let us sit down and enjoy their delicious pasta (after a certain time they only do delivery). I ate the eggplant pasta and I would highly recommend it! They offered us seasonal vegetables with cheese on the house and a delicious dessert too. If you're craving authentic Italian food and exceptional service you should definitely check this place out. Only good things to say about our experience!!!", 'Excellent quality food, excellent prices, very generous.', 'Absolutely divine. A neighborhood gem. Food is scrumptious and service unbeatable. What a great place.', 'Amazing food but they are using plastic cutlery...', 'Good food\nLow cost']

['Loved the pizza and the fried seafood‚Ä¶ servers are so kind and attentive. Venue is clean, well-lit and overall, charming and relaxing. This will definitely be one of my go-to Italian restos in Paris.', 'Best pizza experience in Paris so far. The food is delicious! And the ambiance takes you to a trip to Italy. Pesto, burrata, mozzarella, courgette, you name it. They have it and it will be fresh. The pizza dough is home made and absolutely delicious. Don‚Äôt settle for the other pizzerias with a big hype and huge queue. Go for this one!', "Went for a lovely birthday meal and wasn't disappointed. We had the gnocchi for 2 and it was delicious and so filling. Lovely bread to soak up the sauce too. Could have chosen from many different menu items. Pizza being made as we went in looked delicious too. Menu was in French but Google translate helped us and the staff were very friendly and attentive.  Lovely Italian food down the street off the main way. Definitely worth it.", 'Food was mediocre. Especially unpleasant: 1. Instead of the printed menu we had to listen to the oral presentation of the dishes still on after 10 p.m., when we arrived; luckily my partner has a great memory:) 2. When ready to pay we were told that their card machine did not work and one of us had to look for an ATM at 11 p.m.', 'The location athmosphere service and quality highly justify the price . A very nice dough made with slow proofing , great stretch and flavour . When I go for a pizza its usually a woodfired one , it turns out they have a MARANA . Go there soon . Ciaoo']

['Great and healthy place!
Big bowls with great ingredients, super healthy and cheap. The waiter and the restaurant‚Äôs owner were very kind with us.

Will come back!!', 'Great value for money,  lovely fresh ingredients and bagels very well filled.  The toilet needs to be kept cleaner, otherwise perfect.  Excellent service.', 'Ordered the foie gras bagel. Delicious. Very fresh. Friendly staff.', "One of the most affordable restaurants in the area. Plus, it's healthy and delicious", 'Lovely food , felt very welcomed and the food was simple but very tasty and affordable. Yummy cookies and bagel']

['Conveniently located. Compact store with a good variety. The store layout is interesting making shopping somewhat fun. For first timers, you might need to cruise the store once or twice before you find what you need. Wine offering is ok.', 'Like a cave full of goodies, but special mention to the roast chicken dinner if you fancy a hot, incredibly cheap but delicious full meal to take away. Fresh fruit and veg and flowers outside so immaculately displayed.', 'Terrible shopping experience. It is difficult to even find entry into the shop. The entry from Avenue Raymond Poincar√© is simply locked without a single advise. Self-servise cash registers are available only. Nobody helps - the staff is only watching to confused customers and having fun in mutual conversation. Some pastry was not fresh. Advertised opening hours are not correct. We wanted to shop in Franprix on Thu at 10PM-11PM and it was closed.', "I had an unacceptable experience when I attempted to collect my parcel. Despite arriving only 10 minutes past closing time to collect parcels due to unavoidable transport delays on a rainy day, and needing the parcel for my travel the next day, the staff's behavior was inexcusable. A staff member at the cash desk was initially willing to hand over my parcel, but was abruptly interrupted by another employee who emerged without warning. She adamantly refused to release my parcel, citing the elapsed collection time. Her insistence, despite my explanation of the circumstances, was not only rude and unhelpful but also an unnecessary obstruction to what should have been a straightforward process.", "It is very bad It's very bad treatment by the employee who is there. She accused me of fraud and judged me of my appearance without making sure of the paper bill I gave her. When she found out that she was wrong, she did not apologise. It was disrespectful."]

["Really nice restaurant. The food was pretty good. Steak was tasty and the fish was delicious. Nice indoor space and some outside tables. I don't think they have air conditioning.", 'Very pleasant staff, good food and wine and a lovely terrace on a pleasant street near the Place de Mexico with nearby Eiffel Tower views.', 'Bonjour\nThe last I had dinner here, it was in 2019 with my husband and today its 5 year back again in the same table and restaurant‚Ä¶. the standard, intimacy and ur special design menu is still the same.. I forgot the name of the waiter but he said he‚Äôs from üá∏üá≥ ( senegal) he was professional and assist in take us through the menu.. Thank you for making my stay to be special üíØ', 'Amazing place!!! Octopus and meat were perfect, stuff are very nice)\nYou must to visit!', 'Cozy restaurant with very polite and friendly staff. In my opinion this place have a cross over between French and Asian food. The Beef filet with pepper sauce was awesome, very yummy. I also tried the Beef "crying tiger" style, fried noodle with vegetables and that was also really good.']

['I ordered Dragon Mango and a Latte. They gave me First 2 latte , then after 5 minutes they finally gave me the right order. Then I wanted to go to the toilet and they only had one toilet for men and females. They had no light and the toilets were really dirty.', 'I‚Äôm really disappointed with my recent experience at this Starbucks. The staff was rude and dismissive, making the entire visit unpleasant. On top of that, the food was below standard‚Äîstale and tasted like it had been sitting out for too long. For the prices they charge, both the service and food quality should be much better. Not coming back anytime soon.', 'Good indoor seating (and a small seating area outside). Few power sockets. Coffee and donut tasted good.', 'I came here to buy some tumblers (@EUR16.95), cup (EUR16.95), and muffin (EUR3.35), the staff were hospitable and put some extra works in packing my tumblers and cup. Muffin is nice, as you may see the choco chips are chunky. Love it. Merci de votre aide!', 'Worst starbucks in the world! DO NOT GO HERE. My sister ans I had breakfast here. She was able to use the toilet and on my way out, I was really needing to pee and the rude staff stopped me saying the toilet is closed when my sister was able to pee 10 minutes before me. I hope that woman gets the healing she needs.']

Adresse: 116 Rue de la Tour, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Cashiers are grumpy and do not want to have any interactions with customers the other staff stocking and helping around the shop are friendly though', "Foul smell, dodgy expiry dates, no reduction applied at counter even if it's mentioned, very expensive. Go only for emergencies.\nNB: Fresh orange juice machine is nice though for the price.", "For the last few months there's been an unpleasant smell of drains / diapers in the back of this shop. I now only go here if I absolutely have to. I recommend Carrefour which is just round the corner, cheaper, friendlier and doesn't smell.", 'Across the entire network of stores, be sure to take the receipt. Check the prices.', 'VERY MEAN WORKERS']

Adresse: Place de la Porte Maillot, 140 Av. de Malakoff, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews:
["A Truly Exceptional Experience!

We had the most wonderful evening at Brasserie Les Muses! The owner is incredibly kind, attentive, and full of charm. His warm hospitality made the entire experience even more special.

We enjoyed a fillet steak that was cooked to absolute perfection! For dessert, we indulged in the best tiramisu we've ever had, along with a delicious cr√®me caramel that was simply divine.

The atmosphere of the brasserie is beautiful, adding to the overall enchanting experience. It was the perfect evening, and we can't wait to return! A huge thank you for an unforgettable meal! üòç", 'Owner/bartender/chef was excellent. Food was simple, tasty and truly authentic. And to top it off prices were incredibly fair for the quality and quantity of food. Would highly recommend stopping by for an excellent home cooked French meal!!!', 'a lovely and cosy place with a friendly owner and very delicious food at reasonable prices. we were looking for an early dinner and this place did not disappoint with its generous portions and wonderful service. would definitely recommend to anyone visiting Paris! merci beaucoup!', 'Cute spot with a reasonable price list! Food was absolutely delicious! And service is amazing! Will be my new go to place \U0001faf6üèΩ and yes get that tiramisu!!! WOWWW', 'The chef is very kind and friendly. Also, the food he makes is so perfect. It feels gourmet and also comforting at the same time, which makes it such a wonderful experience. I would definitely recommend this place and the chef himself to everyone visiting Paris!']

['Great shop with lovely staff. This is my go-to as I live a few minutes away. Never a bad experience in this shop. I thoroughly recommend. A+', 'Nice district supermarket with a huge range of products from local to international at very fair prices. Shop clean, efficient, open daily 2 steps from Hyatt Regency hotel porte Maillot', 'Lots of products and very good self service with staff supporting/helping.', 'They close 20 minutes early because work ethic doesn‚Äôt exist here. When they are open their choices are as mid as you expect', 'great store. perfect for quick shopping. very nice seller. healthy food.']

['One tiny little chocolate shop at Victor Hugo with pretty decorations and nice staff.

The chocolates are nice and the ice cream is yummy too. Price is fair.', 'Good quality, reasonably priced and good service.', 'you have to try !', "Naomi served me an ice cream at Jeff's in Bruges and it was fantastic! His smile and warm welcome made the experience even better. The ice cream was delicious.
Thank you, Naomi, for this great service!", 'I was welcomed by Sarah, a truly beautiful person with a lot of humor and professionalism, I am rarely struck by the kindness and beauty of a person to this extent, a real gem to keep!']

Adresse: 58 Rue de la Pompe, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews: ['The person that served me who seemed to be owner was super polite and keen the cook the sandwich quickly as I was in hurry. The place is small but welcoming.', 'Place was small but staff was very polite and despite being very busy, he was very attentive while making sandwich and took special care to make sure our sandwiches were made exactly how we wanted. Good food and good customer service overall.', 'The woman who works there is really impolite and angry ! She just talked in a really disrespectful way and tone!', 'Casual "healthier" fast food experience. I have eaten at Subway quite a lot and enjoyed all my experiences so far. Hope it stays that way.', 'The server was very nice and patient. She spoke and understood a little English which is important for foreigners like myself.']

Adresse: 56 Rue de la Pompe, 75016 Paris, France
Reviews:
["We chose Chez Carlo for a little evening for two. The reviews and comments are very heterogeneous regarding this restaurant and we were very pleasantly surprised (well, not that surprised, we love Italian restaurants :)). Contrary to what one may read, promiscuity is not a negative point, it is a trattoria, if you want to have 5m distance between each table you should not choose this type of restaurant. The team is very friendly, attentive and works hard to please customers. For a Friday evening we didn't wait any longer than elsewhere for our pizzas, in fact congratulations to the team because despite the crowds the service was smooth!
And what‚Äôs more, the rooms are magnificent! Old-fashioned decoration, a briquette pizza oven and magnificent painted frescoes!

And as for the dishes we tasted a delicious burrata to share, little seasoning with balsamic vinaigrette and fresh basil absolutely perfect:) It's one of the oldest pizzerias in Lyon so we tasted the pizzas, a Carlo and a Diavola both of which were fantastic. The dough is thin in the center, light puffy and crispy on the edges (which we didn't even leave!). The garnish is generous, excellent fresh produce:)

The tiramisu is excellent, like everything else, very good balance of flavors (I personally would have added a little more amaretto but it wouldn't be to everyone's tasteü§£), perfect cream and generous portion :)

I highly recommend this establishment!!", 'A sure value, both on site and to take away.
Everything is good, the real taste of Italy.', "My review rejected? Please look at Street View. This business doesn't exist. In a shop next door we were told that this place had been closed for a long time. We went there specifically to find nothing.", 'We stumbled upon this delicatessen by chance, the surprise was incredible, delicious food, first choice, the chef was very friendly and kind, definitely worth trying', "It's a scandal!! Never order anything there.
Everything is cold, not cooked or half cooked. Absolutely no knowledge of the catering profession apparently.
Ashamed !"]

['Perfect Paris bistro atmosphere.
Tiny little restaurant, menu on the wall, really good food quality.
I had a baba au rhum for desert, it was really good and with free rhum refill üòÅ', 'One of the best Boudin Noirs Ive ever had, it is fried till it has a lovely crust that yields to reveal lovely chunks of meat. The mash was a velvety accompaniment to this delicate dish. At 21eur its probably the most expensive slice of boudin noir or black pudding too but boy was it good.

Cafe gourmand was just sad. Cup of small fruits, bread pudding, stale madeleine, not great. Get a single dessert if you must, the panna cotta looked great.', 'Small bistro perfect for romantic dinner üòÅ Friendly staff, delicious dishes and good coffee! What else you need? ps: Black pudding is fantastic plus dessert on the pics... sorry I forgot the nameüç∞üòÅ', 'There are moments in life where expectations are surpassed and this was truly one of them. If you‚Äôre looking for French food served with without pretense and a focus on deliciousness this is the place. A true French affair. Joie de vivre.', 'A truly lovely experience. Rarely do I give 5 stars but this deserved it.
The food was to die for. I had creamy snails (pictured) to start - something many tourists (which I am here) may turn away from but - rich and creamy, very tasty. A delicious lamb and mash for dinner. The sauce was so good I wanted to lick the plate, but knowing better I mopped it all up with the table bread. Cr√©me Brul√©e for desert, lovely.
The service was wonderful. They even went the extra mile and served me early (before kitchens opened at 7) which I very much appreciated, especially given the weather. Incredibly friendly and great English - always good for a traveller. Recommended a great rum to drink as well.
Warming and cosy atmosphere brought it all together.
Recommended for any local or foreigner alike.']

["The hamburgers were so nice, which comes along with a side dish of fries. They also serve free water, which is very nice! It's also pretty close to the Eiffel tower, and the sight of eating out is very stunning. The prices here are pretty good - not overpriced for what you get.\nThe service was very friendly and we received our food pretty fast as well. I'd definitely recommend to eat here.", 'Excellent food and even better service. We were craving a Jewish deli and weren‚Äôt disappointed. They actually specialized in hamburgers but the pastrami was really good. They have a few locations but this one was nice because the whole restaurant was open which kept the temperature comfortable.', 'Best Pastrami in town! Fantastic Smash Burger! Great quality! Outstanding value for the money. Very friendly staff.', 'Very fast and friendly service with great food. As a tourist in Paris I was made to feel welcome by the lovely team here. The Rueben was fantastic with great chips and the kind staff even charged my phone for me üôèüèºüôèüèº', "The tastiest hamburger we've ever eaten, excellent beef tartar, excellent service and quality.  For sure we will be back"]

['Closes 1.5 hours before they‚Äôre supposed to because Paris. Their selection is low to mid at best but it works in a pinch when they‚Äôre decided to do their jobs', 'Cheaper than Carrefour. Same great quality.', 'The cashier was rude to me.', 'Only the que at checkout point is a little pain.', 'Great supermarket with variety of products']

["I had an Amazing Amazing stay at Warwick Paris. The staff is welcoming and very courteous. Especially Mr. Christopher at the front is simply superb. After a long time I experienced such an hospitality at a hotel in Paris.

Overall Amazing experience. Reasonably priced. And very helpful staff. I would say it's 100/10 only because of staff", 'Absolutely MARVELLOUS.
Staff went well over my expectations.  From start to finish my stay only got better.
Thank you all for making our stay a memorable one and we do hope to return as soon as we can.
HIGHLY RECOMMEND...', "Enjoyable stay (business trip). Rooms are nice and spacious, but water pressure in shower wasn't great.", "I stayed in this hotel in May 2024. Initially, the staff's attitude towards us was unwelcoming and uncooperative. We made a reservation through Booking.com for a room that accommodates up to three people. Upon arrival, we were informed that the extra bed would be prepared within 20 minutes. However, even after waiting, it was discovered that there was no additional bed, and the room was not suitable for an extra bed as advertised and they told us that they gave us the wrong room.

According to the accommodation policy, the extra bed should be provided free of charge. However, we were informed that it would be complimentary only for the first day, and afterward, we would be forced to pay. This information was given to us by their manager.

The room was dirty, and I had to clean it myself. Additionally, some furniture was already broken, which we immediately reported to prevent any charges being deducted from our account.

There is no drinking water available in the room, and the glass cups provided were not clean. We requested water, but it has been two hours and we still haven't received it.

After several attempts, the room was changed to accommodate the third person, but it required significant effort and exhausting discussions.

The reception does not respond to any phone calls, and the hotel system is still malfunctioning as we haven't received the security deposit invoice.

Overall, we did not feel comfortable at all because also there is a nightclub next to the hotel and the noise is very loud as fights happen in front of the hotel because of the nightclub customers!", 'Location, location, location all combined into a modern, easy to access hotel right off the Champs Elysees.   Close to Arc du Triomphe.  Large hotel rooms, great staff, quick service in one of the fastest paced places in the world.  They even have valet service for people like me foolish enough to drive into Paris.  If you need to stay in the heart of the tourist action this is the place.  I chose it simply because for various reasons we had to drive there.  Would stay again.  Wonderful employees.']

['We had a 5 night stay over Christmas and have only wonderful things to say! Terrific location, warm staff, beautiful boutique hotel, wonderful room. In particular, Hugo and Laurent were wonderfully warm and helpful. An absolute gem of a hotel in one of the finest areas of Paris! You will not regret staying at the Hotel Vernet.', 'A++++ Experience
We took a trip to Paris for my 30th birthday (myself, my spouse, and our two toddlers), and Hotel Vernet exceeded our expectations in every regard. The kindness of the staff, the responsiveness of the concierge services, the hospitality and the rooms‚Ä¶we absolutely loved our stay here. A+ location as well!

It was also our first trip with kids to Paris, and the staff went above and beyond to put the most delightful, thoughtful touches in our adjoining rooms. They thought of everything, and the welcome notes + gifts (even for my little ones) were absolutely priceless.

Highly recommend that you book here for your Parisian stay! Thank you, Hotel Vernet! We will be back :)', 'We had a great stay at Hotel vernet. Location is the best, staff are genuinely friendly and helpful and make you feel home. Room was beautifully designed, decorated and absolutely clean. They went beyond to make us feel comfortable, Parisian hospitality at its best.', 'What a wonderful place to stay! My partner and I absolutely loved staying at this traditional yet stylish Parisian hotel. The service is truly superior. The food and the amenities were amazing.
A month prior to arriving, the concierge worked to book chauffeur service from Gare du Nord to the hotel for my partner and I. They were patient with all of my questions, as I had many about the service. Upon checking in, where we got an upgrade thanks to American Express, reception was very happy to give my partner and I a tour of the hotel room. Also, dinner in Le V was an experience worth taking. Complements to Chef Baldassare for making a delicious dinner! Lastly, my partner had lost his hotel room key somewhere in the city, and the staff were glad to deactivate the old cards and give us new ones. ‚ÄúIt only costs a ‚ÄòThank you‚Äô‚Äù, said Nicholas from reception (it was free).
Nicholas Steinberg (who saw to us upon arrival) and Kevin Sultan from reception were so kind. Also, Kayes Hossain and Julien Aubert were great concierges to work with. Lastly, our room service team were extremely accommodating and attentive and wonderful to be around. I‚Äôll add that the staff were happy to speak English at first, but were nevertheless accommodating to me practicing my French when speaking to them.
I wish I could‚Äôve stayed in this hotel longer. I cannot wait to stay here again the next time I‚Äôm in Paris. Merci et √° bient√¥t, H√¥tel Vernet!', 'We stayed recently for 5 nights and had a wonderful experience. The rooms are very spacious, hotel is in a great location and service is impeccable. We will come back!']

['4.5/5 - my only complaint is that the rooms are rather small and bathroom as well, but other than that this was a fabulous hotel and staff! Will definitely be happy to visit again. The location is also extremely convenient !', "The view from the room window was over looking an eyesore of a courtyard, we requested a change of room which eventually happened. We were moved a couple of floors up, and that made a little difference. We kept our curtains shut throughout.

Housekeeping was disrespectful. Even though we wanted to sleep and had the do not disturb sign hanging on the door, they knocked more than 3 times trying to clean the room after our first night. On the second night, they entered our room whilst we were out and the do not disturb sign was up.

The location and the reception staff were the best part of this hotel as it was located about 5 minutes walk to actions in Champs Elysees.

Will I stay here again, I doubt it, but I'll recommend it to anyone wanting to stay in that area.", 'For the kind of service provided, this clearly does not qualify for a 5 Star hotel.

The waitress at the breakfast table always takes forever to get simple salt and pepper and ketchup. These things should be either on the table or the buffet.

The buffet is quite small and there are not many options. When the bread got over, the waitress said the chef will get some more "later" and refused to get more bread immediately.

Food gets cold by the time any kind of services are received at the breakfast.

Hand wash was broken in the bedroom and even when I requested them to fix it, they refused to do so.

They asked us to place a special tag on our pillow if we like the kinen to be changed. Next day they decided to hide the tag completely so that we are unable to put it up and they can avoid replacing our linen.

Even the towels need to be put into the shower area if we need them washed.

Laundry slip was not replaced.

The carpet in the room felt quite sticky so had to wear slippers all the time.

So many issues. How can they call themselves 5 star I don't know. And refusal to work on any of the feedback is just ridiculous.', 'We loved the location of this hotel. We had a view of the Arche de Triomphe but we weren‚Äôt in the chaos of tourism. There were plenty of places to eat and shop around us and it was easy to get everywhere. The staff at this hotel went above and beyond, we had just been engaged and they sent flowers to our room and provided complimentary champagne. Our universal plug died and they were quick to give us one to use during our stay. Everything we needed was so prompt. The amenities were great we loved the rainfall shower and the towel heating rack. There was a Nespresso maker in our room that we fully took advantage of and was great for when we left for our flights at 7am. This is a 5 star hotel with the boutique feel of living in an apartment in the middle of Paris.', 'Amazing hotel at Le Champs-Elysees right next to Arc De Triumph . The staff is friendly . The reception experience was great . The rooms were cosy with Japanese toilets . They do evening service . The upgraded us ans their service is quick . The best part was I liked the nougats at the reception the day we were checking out the staff give an envelope full of them for our trip back . Very touching and I would highly recommend to stay and will do so again  . The hotel is close to the high streets , restaurants and all the tourist attractions of Paris . The view from the balcony I could be arc de trompe . The street is full of buzz but when you close the doors there is silence .']

['Perfect stay.  This is my third stay at the Le Royal Monceau and the services have always been excellent.  I really like their staff and they have a great team.  A lot of the staff members remembered me when I was back to the hotel.  This add a personal touch to my stay.  The hotel is in a very excellent location and the room was beautiful.  I would like thank the team at the Le Royal Monceau for a great stay.', 'Our stay at this property got off to a rocky start and fell short of the 5-star experience we were expecting. We arrived around 1 PM, but the staff was not particularly welcoming. Despite being assured that our room would be ready by 3 PM, we didn‚Äôt gain access until 4:30 PM. What was more disappointing was the lack of communication about the delay.

When we finally entered our room, it was clear it had not been thoroughly cleaned. There were visible remnants from previous occupants, such as red lint on surfaces and noticeable finger smudges across the mirrored bathroom walls‚Äîa key feature of the room. Additionally, our room was located at the end of a hallway, next to ongoing construction and the service elevators, making it exceptionally noisy and nearly impossible to sleep.

An unpleasant moment occurred during check-in when a staff member showed us to our room. My partner, who was still recovering from norovirus, leaned against the double-sided elevator door, unaware it would open from that side. The staff member failed to warn us and even smirked when the door opened, causing her to stumble and trip. This lack of empathy was disheartening.

The saving grace of our experience was Lionel, a standout member of the weekday staff. He took every issue seriously and went above and beyond to resolve them. Within a few hours, he found us a superior room away from the construction noise and ensured we were well taken care of. His professionalism and genuine care made a significant difference.

We also noticed a stark contrast between the weekday and weekend staff. While the weekend team was professional, attentive, and eager to assist, the weekday staff appeared indifferent and unmotivated to address our concerns. This inconsistency in service detracted from the overall experience.

For a 5-star hotel, more consistent attention to detail and guest care should be expected.', 'Given the wrong room. Fake photos advertising the room they gave me. Issues at the restaurant. Issues with housekeeping. Room service good. Location is ok but not optimal. Pool and fitness facility ok but forgettable. Issues with luggage /baggage getting to my room. Concierge issues. Would not return - much better options for the price.', 'Ive been to the spa a few times but my last visit will be the last. The personnel wasn‚Äôt particularly welcoming but what was the most shocking of all, they called me an hour after my massage to inform me that ¬´\xa0I had not paid\xa0¬ª, when in fact I‚Äôd payed online when booking my treatment. They asked me to look through my bank statements and send them a screenshot. No apology whatsoever despite despicable service.
