All in all, a great place to pay a visit.', 'Good restaurant, went twice in one month. Food is very good, typical Korean with good marinades.
I can‚Äôt go higher in the rating (food is 4 stars imo) for two reasons:
- I find the staff sometimes unfriendly (very stressed about tables, what were going to order, what SHOULD be done according to their opinions etc.) and pretty cold
- portions of side dishes are often too small. Literally 5 mushrooms slices in a bowl as a side dish is a joke
It‚Äôs globally a good restaurant but I think there are better options in Paris for the money']

['Extraordinary modern French cuisine. We loved the tapas selections and that way of eating. It‚Äôs so fun to try different flavors and textures at one meal. Clams were delicious, my favorite. Everything was super fresh and highly accessible. Even my teenage daughter enjoyed sampling the different plates. Our wait staff were on point, friendly, very knowledgeable and helpful.', 'This place is ok.. it feels more like a wine bar for light bites before a proper dinner. Although they do have a full dinner menu!

While there‚Äôs a lot to choose from, there are no vegan options, contrary to what the website says. One of our party was out of luck but they did get a green salad (pictured).. the fries/chips are cooked in beef tallow so while delicious, also not vegan friendly

The stand out was the ice cream. The server was explaining how they make it.. and from what I understood, it‚Äôs an elaborate process! That involves whipping the cream for HOURS. Never tasted anything like it before! The texture was a combo of something like gelato and ice cream and yogurt', 'Super cool and French bistro. I think I had the best fish soup in the world that night. I went alone but the staff was very accommodating at the bar table and did not leave me feeling self conscious. It has such a great French vibe', 'The food menu was fantastic, with highlights including the marrow consomm√©, veal sweetbread, fried tapioca, and nougat glac√©. The wine list was also delectable. Unfortunately, the service was subpar and carried an air of arrogance. While the food was excellent‚Äîkudos to the chefs‚Äîthe service team seemed to lack passion and acted as if we were a bother when making requests.', 'Finding this place was a happy accident. Simple short menu prob best for lunch. We sat at the bar. Very french, nice atmosphere, friendly vibe. I thought food great. Soup had real flavour, chicken tasty with interesting bitter charred endive. Confit fennel v nice. Steak generous and good. A good experience and break from brasserie food in the usual cafe places.']

Adresse: 14 Rue de la Fontaine au Roi, 75011 Paris, France
Reviews:
['What a great concept in Paris ! You can have a 3-courses meal and then go straight to stand up show in the same building. You have to book your package online and you‚Äôre in your way, everything is well rounded and organized.

Foodwise, everything was good and the service was fast. They don‚Äôt skimp on the quality of the food and that an excellent thing for a stand-up venue like this one.

I do recommend Le Paname Art Caf√©, great concept !', 'Me and my friend just walking around near the canal Saint Martin and we saw this cafe with high rates.
But unfortunately the hot beverages is quite dissatisfying and disappointing. Their hot matcha latte and hot chocolate was tasteless and not rich it‚Äôs bland and it‚Äôs not worth the price.
The ambience also just plain and flat.', 'We visited this place for a coffee - we also ordered bread platter which had assortment of pastries bread butter Nutella jam and crepes. They were simply and tasty but are quite a standard items you will be able to buy from a shop and hence the 3 stars. Coffees were ok but not the best. There‚Äôs only one toilet for the whole cafe and it is not the best toilet from facilities wise.', 'That‚Äôs a pretty good place, especially to be in an humorous and environment', 'We were only here for dinner. The service was great. The staff very friendly and attentive. But the food was average delicious.
6/10']

['Walked in very randomly with friends as I saw the lighting was super nice and also found they‚Äôve a cave just right opposite of the resto.

From my experience, people who like drinking must also like food. So I proposed to have a dinner here to my friends.

Results turned out very well. Super good seasoning, great ingredients, creative and delicious fusion ideas.', 'There is nothing I appreciate more than a restaurant that accommodates you, although they are busy and you have not reserved.

This place is small but a lot of natural light, normal prices for paris and a delicious. The lamb was so soft, you dont need a knife', 'we came here three times during our stay in the area. the food is absolutely exquisite. everything is cooked to perfection. service is great. i came and got the exact same meal every night, the veal. i tried veal at two other expensive restaurants, and they were not as good as the one here. the pain perdu is also the best desert..EVER. we will miss this place and will be back next time we‚Äôre in Paris.', 'Lovely place, we visited France for a long weekend for my partners birthday and we asked the hotel we stayed at if they had any recommendations, both of us worried at the start as my partner is vegetarian but they where so accommodating and friendly and the food was the best we had all holiday by far! Would definitely say it‚Äôs worth a visit!!!', 'The cr√®me br√ªl√©e is absolutely delicious, especially with a set of three flavors: original, hazelnut, and pistachio.
The staff are also friendly.
Next time I return to Paris, I will  visit this restaurant again']

['Le Chateaubriand exceeded all my expectations. The chefs crafted a vegetarian tasting menu on the spot, paired with impeccable wines, showcasing true French culinary talent. Each plate was beautifully presented, with the chefs personally introducing their creations‚Äîa detail that made the evening feel intimate and extraordinary.

The servers were equally amazing, providing thoughtful and engaging wine pairings that elevated the entire meal. The atmosphere was both welcoming and refined, creating the perfect backdrop for this unforgettable dining experience.

Le Chateaubriand is everything I hoped for when coming to Paris: exceptional cuisine, unparalleled service, and a genuine connection to French gastronomy. I feel incredibly fortunate to have had this experience.', 'I visited for lunch so my experience was somehow limited, but from the end: the dessert was unbelievable tasty.
Trip through a different tastes of ambush starters to the main course - good lesson of tastes and creativity. Must visit place on map of Paris', 'Most of the cooking is really pleasant and shows culinary mastery, the desserts however are terrible, twice in 1 year I have experienced the same with different desserts. The waiting staff could not care less, they explained that a raw yolk was poached in sugar, this statement is wrong in so many ways. We celebrated my friends 40st birthday, they sang happy birthday with a candle and a prune split in two with some random spices on top. Hilarious to questioning whether this was intentionally to annoy us. So sad to see they could not manage consistency and a professional approach.', 'This place was phenomenal and our favorite meal from our recent trip to France! We did the tasting menu with wine pairing and it was well worth it. The dishes were inventive and the staff was lovely. Highly recommend!', 'First time in Paris and this was my favorite out of all the places I‚Äôve eaten! Everything was delicious! The yolk dessert was so interesting and it shocked me with the texture, so good!

Depending on preference in taste and texture, it might not be for everyone but worth a try!']

["I had lunch at this restaurant and ordered a burger, but it was the most horrible burger I have ever tasted. I don't even have words to describe it. It looked like it had been made yesterday and reheated for me. The burger bun was terrible, and the photo can show you how it looked. The cheese tasted like plastic. Overall, it was a huge disappointment to have lunch here. I would recommend spending your money elsewhere and enjoying your meal.", 'Generous food portions at good price. Steak tartare was good but not amazing. Mozzarella sticks were pretty good. Cheap drinks in happy and great service.', 'Love this place. Returned for my birthday dinner! Good food, really friendly staff.', 'Very young crowd. Servers take forever to come serve you. Was a great place. Now it s just below average. Will not be coming back', 'Best bruschetta I‚Äôve ever had. Came back the next day for. Ordered mozzarella sticks w herb sauce. Once again the best sticks ever (never frozen and large).  Ordered more starters. They use fresh ingredients. Ham croquettes and the chicken fingers were perfectly cooked.\nI don‚Äôt smoke, but many locals here smoke heavily. Outside seating is full of smokers. Opt inside and street side a few tables down from the ashtray zone. My new favorite place to nosh in Paris. Line 3 Parmentier stop. Located immediately at  street level exit.\nBon Ap√©tit!']

['An extremely good vegan restaurant. You can taste all the Asian foods that you could taste because they were with meet! Really tasty food, nice people and a really authentic Asian atmosphere!', 'Very delicious and creative vegan food. We enjoyed a combo of starters as well as a different choice of mains on our 2 visits at Tien Hiang. Note: being early pays off - especially on weekends, the place fills up quickly. Definitely would recommend coming here!', 'Excellent - all the way !
Impressive taste of veggie chicken !
Highly recommended', 'Good food, can only recommend! We ordered bit too much and nearly exploded', 'This place is insane, my omnivore partner and I (veg) loved it. The place is cozy, the waiters are nice and the food is great.
We tried the fried chicken and prawns and we were so impressed by their taste. Nem rolls were also good. We then ordered a Pad Thai Chicken and Xeo Ban (Vietnamese Crepe). I‚Äôve never tried vegan pork and it was so rich in flavour! The mochis and coco milk dessert were the perfect final touch to end our amazing dinner.
I‚Äôd recommend this place: great food and fair prices.']

["decent food and cute interior, but couldn't live up to the hype. none of the dishes we had stood out in comparison to the hundreds of other places in the neighborhood and neither did the ambience. overall a nice place, but I wouldn't consider coming again.", 'One of my favorite restaurants and best meals ever!!! Service was delightful and quick - food was delicious and the atmosphere was perfect. Just what you‚Äôd want from a meal in Paris! Nicest staff here too - couldn‚Äôt recommend more!!', 'Lots of tourists here because of Emily in Paris. I had a Caesar salad that was good but the chicken was a bit too crispy and not enough and the croutons very hard. I didn‚Äôt take a picture of that because I forgot! üòÇ But the fruit compote cheesecake was lovely.\nMy waiter was helpful and a bit short with me at times but maybe because he was tired.\nWould probably go back to try other foods.', 'MK made our experience great! He is such a professional. This is a small detail but he made sure we always had water, knew when we wanted more wine, and let us enjoy our cheese then order our meal. The restaurant also accommodated us when we had 3. Added a table and all. The green bean salad was a real highlight for me!   Definitely recommend the Brouilly wine if you are a beaujolais region fan.  This is a regular spot for me and always a delight!', 'My friend wanted so badly to eat here, so we went without a reservation. We found a table of 6 despite the fact that it was really busy. The staff is nice and the food was delicious. I took a meat with chimichurri sauce. We asked for medium but it was very well cooked, still delicious. The potatoes were tasty as well. Overall all enjoyed their plates.']

['Super atmosphere. Katsu curry was exceptional. Very authentic. Thanks for your hospitality.', 'Kyobashi was a great find. 100% authentic Japanese food. With generous side dishes and very reasonable prices. I‚Äôve been looking for legit authentic non-frozen tempura everywhere in France and found it here! Highly recommend Kyobashi. Service was also au top!', 'We had a "boat" for two persons with sushi's, maki's and sashimi's. They were tasty although not outstanding. The good thing was everything which was coming with it: small appetizers, then a mizo soup, then a good salad made with green salad, tomato's and cucumbers, and small fruit salad as dessert.

The gyozas were also good.

The service was very efficient. The place is rather cramped, it seems it better to reserve.', 'Very good California rolls and yakitori. Friendly and warm service. Recommend!', "Excellent. The food is fresh and delicious, good service, some pampering and prices are honest. I'll return."]

["food was INCREDIBLE for awesome prizes, i really recommend the vegetarian burrito (it had some godly guacamole, cheese, cactus, very well prepared mushrooms and peppers, and of course rice and black beans) and especially the champiqueso taco!! the servers were very friendly, too. the plastic glasses we got seem to not have been clean, but we didn't mind too much. highly recommend this place", 'I ordered delivery from this place. Food is really very good! For long time I‚Äôm looking for real Mexican food and I decided to try all kind of dishes.
Burro Pollo Adobado really surprised me!
Tacos were very good
Quesadilla is tasty.
Thank you for evening with pleasure!', 'I tried on taco and nachos con queso (with cheese). I liked nachos more which was very filling and had enough toppings and cheese. Service was good and watching people passing from the street is fun.', 'Incredible Mexican food! This place was exceptional, from the food to the waitstaff, everything was fantastic! The guacamole was fresh and full of flavor! The margaritas were all delicious - you can even purchase them by the pitcher or take them to go! The food came out quickly and the staff were very attentive. Highly recommend!', 'After spending a majority of the day at the Versailles palace, my wife and I were ready for dinner.  After browsing a plethora of options (there is not a shortage of dining options in Paris), we agreed to Mexican food. Ironically, the restaurant that we chose, El Guacamole, was a five minute walk from our hotel. Although the inside and outside seating of the restaurant was quite busy, an employee was able to quickly seat us at an indoor community bench that had just become available.

We placed orders for the following: Frozen Margarita (wife), Frozen Passion Fruit Margarita (myself), Nachos Con Queso, Choriqueso Quesadilla (wife), and Deshebrada de Res Burrito (myself). The delicious drinks arrived five minutes later and the food arrived in less than 15 minutes. The Nachos Con Queso was a delicious starter that we shared and set the expectations  for what I thought would be a good overall meal.
Unfortunately, this was not the case.

Respectfully, the food lacked flavor. My burrito probably would have been good if served with sauce, same with my wife‚Äôs quesadilla. We both used the remaining sauce from the Nachos Con Queso to add the desired flavor. Knowing that we had to doctor up our own food, I cannot give a positive review in good faith.

We reside in California where the bar is set pretty high for good, authentic Mexican food. Therefore, maybe I should have lowered my expectations for Mexican food in Paris. This review is solely my opinion of our experience, I suggest trying the restaurant for yourself to form your own opinion.']

Adresse: 1 Pl. de la R√©publique, 75003 Paris, France
Reviews: ["Indiana Cafe in Paris brings a taste of America to the heart of the city. With its vibrant atmosphere and diverse menu featuring burgers, ribs, and Tex-Mex favorites, it's a fun spot for casual dining. Generous portions and friendly service make it ideal for a laid-back meal with friends or family.", 'Waitress said at 18:30 they will switch the channel to the only live broadcast of football (Premier League). When I came two hours later after planning my day around the waitress promise, the shift manager says other customers wish to watch a re-run of Barca vs Real. I explained to her it‚Äôs not live and she said ‚Äúmaybe later‚Äù with a fake smile , completely ignoring the promise her colleague made to broadcast this game. They even went so far as to laugh at my face . She had no logical reason to be mean to me, just didn‚Äôt feel like changing the channel. I doubt anyone wanted to watch the Classico re-run (from weeks ago!!)\nDisgusting service. The entire staff were very disrespectful.', 'The food and atmosphere is great and the servers are also good and quick if you‚Äôre a fan of salads then try fresh lobster salad', "Service was terrible. We had to ask the waitress three times to get the beer we ordered. I never did get my entree. Seems the waitress was taking a mental day off as she couldn't concentrate on her job.", 'Came here after making reservation at other place. They accommodated us, turned channel for us to watch tennis. Service was great, Enzo took great care of us. ‚ù§Ô∏è']

['A 100-years old restaurant, which offers simple French staples, like chicken, duck and veal kidneys. Tremendous wine list. Large portions. Very high prices. Almost impossible to make a reservation for dinner, a little easier for lunch. 3.5 stars', 'Top recommendation in Paris! We put our names down and went to a bar, Erev, nearby for an hour. It was lovely and easy! Will definitely go back for that Chicken and Fries!', "It's one of the best foie gras dishes I've ever had. The famous chicken, however, is somewhat overrated. The escargot is generously sized. On the downside, the waiter was a mix of rudeness and friendliness. The prices are quite steep, likely due to the restaurant's long-standing reputation. While I appreciated the beautiful cuisine, I believe customers should be treated with more courtesy.", 'Before it becomes ami Louis Vuitton one of the last place in Paris where food is good and large and not pretentious. I fear every day when Bernard will ruin it with a creative chef and change a single thing in this monument.', "Chez l'ami Louis is legendary.  We have eaten here several times over the years and they never disapoint. The crowd is always an eclectic mix of chic, local, business.  All of whom know they are about to experience something special.  Fingers crossed LVMH will preserve l'ami for generations to come."]

['Some god damn good food!!!!\nIn France everything is so bland! I loved how this was the most flavourful\nThe spring roll was Vietnamese. The lady was alright. The pad Thai was nice and spicy. It is a nice place with some good food. The Tom yum soup is coconut based not clear based.', 'We get takeout here, and the takeout place is attached to the restaurant, and it has a very good and dependable selection of Asian foods. Great value for money with a lunch menu at about 11 Euros.', "Came here with friend for dinner. Service was fast, so fast a bit of the charm gets lost. Staff are friendly though and while the food was tasty, there wasn't enough of meat in my and others bobun. Probably wouldn't return.", 'Very good tha√Ø/Asian food. Went there after a concert and it was just what we needed - also one of the few restaurants opened late in the night. Had the tiger tears which were good. We were a bit disappointed though with the service ; some waitress were not nice at all.', 'Fantastic Vietnamese-Thai fusion food. Very attentive and prompt service although food took awhile to come. Definitely recommend this place!']

['Delicious food and great atmosphere. We had a lot of fun. The pork (cochon) was delicious, as were all the dishes we ordered.', 'Easy atmosphere, well cooked bistro style food. Flavours were tasty, nice range in the menu. Quick with service & very accommodating wait staff.', 'The staffs are extremely rude and unprofessional. I have been living in Paris for 2 years now and I have not experienced anything as bad. Basic respect is important and the staffs pointed at us with a bottle opener as if he was our boss. Unacceptable!

We were sitting on the terrace, we waited 30 mins and no one came to take our order. My friend had to go inside and order our drinks and we asked twice for water but until the end they didn‚Äôt bring to us. We were not annoyed with that as we understand the staffs might be too busy on a Saturday night.

After around one hour at the bar, one of my friend joined and he was just finishing his kebab. A young male waiter came to take our empty glasses and said to my friend that he can‚Äôt eat there as it is a restaurant. We apologised and said politely that he is left with one last bite so he will finish fast. That waiter immediately said he is going to get his manager and the manager came out in 1 min (not even that fast when we needed their service).

The manager came and started speaking very aggressively and kept using a bottle opener to point at my friends while he speaks. We tried to explain the situation but he was extremely rude and the way he pointed at his customers with the bottle opener was completely ridiculous. We were starting to feel offended but we didn‚Äôt argue with him. Then he went back in and started staring at us with a fierce look through the window. After awhile he came out and threaten us to leave. Honestly if we did something very wrong or we were rude first we can understand his attitude but we made a small mistake with the kebab and we apologised but he wanted to show his authority and started calling us ‚Äòtu‚Äô rather than ‚Äòvous‚Äô.

I started getting very offended and argued with him and he asked his colleague to bring us plastic cups and the bill so we can leave immediately. I found that extremely mind blowing as we did not trigger the argument first and why are we being chased out when we paid our bill and we tried to be nice first until he started being rude? Also it‚Äôs not like we all brought outside food, my friend was finishing his kebab wrap that he ate half way, that‚Äôs all. These staffs could have told us  nicely that it‚Äôs not allowed and please finish the food at the side of the restaurant  but coming on to us so aggressively and pointing at our faces while speaking was completely unacceptable.

After he gave us the plastic cups, he asked two of his other colleagues to come and ask us why are we not leaving yet. I was furious and I told my friends, we did not do anything wrong and we were polite so we do not need to back off. If no one voices up about unfair treatments like this, these staffs will never understand how to have basic respect.

The guy who said that he is the owner of the restaurant was a bit more polite but if he is really the boss, he should have found out who was wrong and if his staff was being rude first, he shouldn‚Äôt have tried to cover for them. These kind of staffs are just going to ruin the reputation of this restaurant.', 'Good food, but nothing really stands out. We ordered mac & cheese and some dumplings, so it was pretty simple. Both were quite OK. Good service and the decor is varied. Has a terrace outside and plenty of space inside so you can‚Äôt go wrong.', 'Absolutely loved the guts out of this little gem. Amazing food. Amazing staff. Love love loved it']

['For a quick bite  Le Fil Rouge was great. Really friendly service, cold beer and good food at reasonable prices. Dining alone. I was warmly welcomed. My steak tartare was great, as were the hand cut chips. A great first introduction to Paris.', 'AWESOME!!! All the food are Tasty! great ambiance, good varieties and the most important thing that hit the jackpot is their SERVICE! From the start till end we were greeted by friendly faces of service crews.', 'BEST BURGER EVER! Everything is homemade so even more yummy! Had a meal at Hard Rock the night before and this is by far better! Such lovely service and great prices too. Definitely recommend', 'A cool place! It would have been fun if they have played rock n roll music.. the burger was ok, the meat was not that good.', 'Very poor food. Cold, burnt badly presented. People arrived after us and got served before us. Very poor hygiene. Waitress touches money, second hand clothes she sells on the street and then serves you food. Waiter is rude. Going too fast. The place is not heated so we were super cold with windows oppened. I do not recommend :(']

["Very good (even if generic) Spanish restaurant. There's a lively bar and a separate, calm dining area. Overall nice, relaxed atmosphere and the staff are friendly and helpful. The menu is simple but has some solid options, including amazing croquettes and ceviche. The sangria is a tad too sweet but still good enough, and for a rather reasonable price.", 'Delicious tapas, nice service. will come again and try the classic paella.', 'Absolutely fantastic Tapas. We were in a bit of a hurry, and the staff were super attentive and brought our food out quickly. The Sangria is also amazing.', 'Very friendly atmosphere and staff, the food was really good, but a bit pricy for tapas.', 'The decor is great and the staff are very friendly. There were people standing which created a bit of chaos around the tables. Sangria is very tasty and authentic same as the cheese and hams we ordered. However the pain perdu was too sweet.']

["Overall: Good atmosphere even though you can feel the owners (assuming they are) stressed when people come in. Food was ok

Good: good flavoured rum (rhum arrang√©). Food looks really on the plate and is kind of good too.

Bad: be ready to be pushed out after 8pm if you don't plan to eat in. It can be understood but not really appreciated when you are still drinking with friends. Stressed from the people working in it when people start getting in", 'This is a fun-looking restaurant with excellent food and drinks. It was a rainy night when we stopped in so it was a little busy, but the staff did a great job keeping everyone happy. We split the brick de legumes and the veggie burger and it was more than enough for two people. The decorations inside are super fun, and make sure to check out the handwashing station outside the toilets:)', 'Amazing food, local wine and the nicest and sweetest owners i have ever met', 'Fun neighborhood spot with great food and friendly service.', 'cool place and a very good ambience.
Patick, Virginie and Mickey are the best']

["Really worth my 5 star. Don't get the 3.9 review. Brunch worth 21 euros. The pasta at 15 euros scrumptous with parmesan shaker too! Beer at a fantastic temperature for a hot day. The server very competent.", 'Delicious!!! I had the Burrata & Oslo salad and my friend had the pasta and both were great! Quick and friendly service with lots of outdoor seating to enjoy the nice spring weather.', 'Service incredibly bad even for Paris standards. Have to ask twice for a knive for the butter the waiter brings me a spoon. The tartine is just one small piece of bread. Only went her because La favorite on the other side of the church was closed but I definitely regret it.', 'I usually go there for drinks and first time trying lunch there !\nGreat moment, tasty food, great service and quiet fast as well !\n(Fish n chips 17‚Ç¨)', 'Delicious food, good portions. Offers daily menu options including entrees and/or desserts.']

['After researching the top 10 spots for couscous in Paris, I decided to give this restaurant a try. Unfortunately, the experience started on a less-than-positive note, as the reception and seating lacked warmth and courtesy.
We placed our order right away, choosing a Moroccan salad, a pastilla au poulet, and a vegetarian couscous with a side of merguez. The Moroccan salad was quite underwhelming‚Äîessentially a mix of greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, and green peppers, but without any distinctive flavor or seasoning to make it stand out.
The real highlight of the meal was the pastilla. The moment I cut into it, the fresh and perfectly crispy crust impressed me, and the taste was nothing short of excellent. However, the couscous was a bit of a letdown. While the vegetables included (carrots, zucchini, and potatoes) were well-cooked, I had expected a more diverse selection‚Äîperhaps cauliflower, green beans, or even sweet potatoes. Additionally, the couscous itself lacked the sweet touch of dried raisins, which would have added a layer of depth to the dish.
Overall, the meal left me feeling as though I had opted for a budget-friendly version of what could have been a much richer couscous experience.', "Chez Omar in the Marais district of Paris offers an exceptional dining experience. Their chicken couscous with chicken skewers is a standout dish, featuring farm-raised, organic chicken cooked to perfection. The couscous itself is delicious, and the vegetables are expertly prepared, showcasing the chef's skill and attention to detail. Everything comes straight from the grill and pot, ensuring freshness and flavor.

Beyond the food, the staff at Chez Omar truly excel. Despite any language barriers, they provide excellent service, taking great care of guests and ensuring a memorable dining experience. With top-notch cuisine and exceptional hospitality, Chez Omar is a must-visit destination for food lovers in Paris.", 'The bustling restaurant was filled with a lively crowd. A friendly attentive service to begin with, and very comfortable food to follow.

The couscous dishes are the star of the menu. The grains are prepared in a light and fluffy consistency, accompanied with a vegetable stew begging to be spooned over the couscous.

The menu has different pairings of stews, braises, and grilled or veggies. Chez Omar, the food is just nice, they managed to find a delicate balance.', 'Went for a diner there. Food is good but rather pricey for what you eat. Size portion is not much. Better eat as an early bird because the place is cramped and become jam-packed quickly. You have to squeeze into your chair and no privacy between the tables. Staff is accommodating but would not get back there because of the price. Better deals in the street', 'Very nice and characteristic place. I discovered it thanks to a French friend.
The best couscous in Paris.
The ratatouille is also very good.
I was with family and all was satisfied included child‚Äôs.']

['Please take some time and come to this restaurant while in Paris. The food, atmosphere, and staff were amazing and very friendly. We got the escargot, sea bass with ratatouille, and the chicken burger. Everything thing was delicious!!', 'I love this place! I stumbled into it and was immediately impressed, the service was amazing, the two girls there were so lovely and helped me with my French. The Caesar salad was amazing (the best I‚Äôve ever had) and drinks were great too. Fun atmosphere out on the terrace!', 'We rarely leave a restaurant in the middle of the meal because of the food.\nThe onion soup was sour and the salmon tasteless.\nWould not recommend at all.', 'Great place, amazing food, and incredible service. Highly recommend. This place should have much better reviews and is easily 5 stars. Loved it!', 'Good food & nice atmosphere, but our waiter was incredibly rude.  Even good food can‚Äôt overcome bad service.  We definitely won‚Äôt go back.  There are too many other good restaurants in the area.']

Adresse: 19 Rue de la Fontaine au Roi, 75011 Paris, France
Reviews:
['10/10. The food was amazing, even the most simple dish like green beans were unreal. The staff was very friendly and they have a good atmosphere, good music, beautiful bistro. They were even kind enough to give me a tiny portion of two other dishes to try. Repeating this one for sure!', 'Loved the food but the waitress was unbelievably bad as she wasn‚Äôt patient or helpful in fact she even hit my friend‚Äôs head with the dishes when she came to clean the table accidentally which we understand totally. But there was ‚ÄúNO‚Äù sorry or she cared about it. She looked totally tired and sleepy perhaps she wasn‚Äôt paying attention to the customers nor she wasn‚Äôt attentive at all. And most of the menu on that day were out of stock even though we were there at 12:30 pm. But to be honest, the food was delicious.', 'One of the best meals I‚Äôve had in Europe. The dishes are excellent. So flavoursome and perfectly balanced. The service is wonderful and the staff are so helpful. The wine selection is amazing too. An excellent dining experience!', 'Excellent quality-price relation. Food menu is awesome. Small portions but great to finish with a pleasant feeling. Wines are extraordinary. Highly recommend', "My husband and I were really excited to try Vantre while visiting Paris. We booked a reservation via email a few weeks before and they mentioned that they would be following up with us on the day of the reservation to confirm. We didn't get any confirmation texts or calls. We showed up to the restaurant at our reservation time and we were told that our table was given to someone else because we never confirmed. I showed he waitress I didn't get a single phone call or text message. She asked me to check my email and the restaurant emailed us at 7 PM for our 8:30 PM reservation - we were out for cocktails before dinner and I wasn't checking my phone at this point. The hostess/waitress got upset at us...

She eventually was able to make room for us at the bar, but once we got seated, she disappeared. It took about 20 minutes for any staff member to come by and take our drink/food orders. By the time someone did come by, we were told that they were sold out of 2 of 4 of the mains...

When our food did come, it was very tasty. But again, we had to continuously flag down the servers for more wine/water. We were treated as a burden to the staff rather then paying guests.

Had the service been better, I would recommend Vantre, but because of our experience and there being so many other great spots in Paris which exceptional service, I'd recommend looking elsewhere."]

Adresse: 27 Rue du Buisson Saint-Louis, 75010 Paris, France
Reviews:
['I had a very good night. The food was very good. You can really taste the traditional flavors. The service was excellent. The waiters always very attentive and the atmosphere was absolutely amazing. We got the chance to see more than four songs and we have a great time', 'Great ambiance and atmosphere for dinner: people start to dance around 10pm, singing on mostly French songs.
Food is okay, but we waited very long for our orders whereas they‚Äôre usually super quick.
My advice: if you want to sing more than one song, book a table early.', "Fantastic ambiance - no frills karaoke bar - if you go with the right mindset you'll have a great time.

The vegetarian menu was better than expected !", 'Its like a Chinatown restaurant from NYC back in the 50s in terms of quality. Its pretty much a parody on chinese food. Beer and coffee was ok.', 'The place was poorly organized. Our table only got to sing one song the entire night. Too many people were singing at once, which made it really chaotic. The food was below average.']

['I absolutely love this restaurant. It has an incredible authentic taste. I highly recommend it.

There is only one thing, which removes 1 star. I have ordered the past 2 weeks several times, and about 3 times the bags were kind of broken at the bottom, due to the oil having spilled out of the food containers. Please seal them well, remove excess oil.

Overall, love the food!!', 'Love this place! The Soupe Phnom Phen is PHENOMENAL ;) So simple yet the flavour had so many layers. Slightly sweet and savoury with a hint of pickled vegetables to give it that umami depth. I wanted to hang out at the restaurant for a few hours so I can get hungry and eat another bowl..', 'The lemongrass sausages were amazing and the flavor took me back to Phnom Penh. The other dishes were okay and I‚Äôd recommend the caramelized pork over the chicken. Very happy to drink an Angkor beer as well!', 'I have visited this restaurant once in 2018 and again when I returned to Paris. It is still as I remembered: wonderful and friendly staff and great tasting food! I loved the curry‚Äôs but found that the glazed pork recipe was overpowered by the pineapple- I feel that it has a lot of potential if the amount of pineapple was reduced. Would definitely come back again!', 'Cosy restaurant with nice staff
I ordered bobun with shrimps
Vermicelli could have been cooked a little bit more but fresh and nice tastes !
Refreshing homemade juice with hibiscus and basilic üëå']

['Amazing food! The French cuisine with an Asian twist is such an amazing experience. The beef tartare and the cheeses and hams‚Ä¶every dish a flavour bomb. The scallops and the chocolate mousse were also a highlight!', 'French only hand written menu but we were able to decipher between Google translate and online pictures and asking the waitress. They are very nice and was very helpful in explaining and making recommendations to us in English.   Very local casual vibe with great wine and great food.', 'The reviews can be very misleading. Cosy/intimate vibes with a menu that changes daily. Our server made good recommendations and the wine was so good we regretted not getting the bottle. Food comes out quick. Really a wonderful end of your day in Paris to unwind and relax. The place was packed with locals and tourists so you know it‚Äôs good. Have to publicly thank Alison Roman for the recommendation.', 'Best experience ever! Try to book over the phone before showing up. Then, just enjoy amazing natural wines with divine fresh and homemade food! The croquettes are delicious!!! Service is impeccable!!!', 'What an amazing find . The staff are the best . I wanted to try the iberico ham and the bartender spent 15mins explaining to me the different flavor profiles of the cuts he was giving me .  He also paired the wines with it .  Was a great way to wrap my Paris trip . Recommend coming early and sitting by the bar , this place gets busy quick and hopefully you have Igor serving you .']

['This was the best restaurant we‚Äôve eaten to in Paris. Everything we had was delicious and every server we met were very friendly. The atmosphere and music was also great which is why we have visited several times for the past 2 weeks. If it‚Äôs your first visit, order the onion soup, and cote de cochon. You will not regret it! And make sure to come early for dinner or during the weekdays, because the weekends will be packed.', 'We arrived as a party of 10.  It is a great, lively ambiance with a staff truly welcoming and accommodating.  We were predominately English speaking which was not an issue.  The food was absolutely excellent as was the service.  A great selection of wines to choose from and a varied menu.  One of my favorite meals in Paris.', 'I can not stress enough how wonderful this place is. The service was impeccable, the food was exceptional. I was in tears when I received the desert! üßÅ Merci!  I will definitely be coming back.  Leave your ego at the door and just take in all ambience of what Paris has to over.', 'So good we went 3 nights in a row.

Beautiful classy venue, perfect atmosphere, great food and wine, well priced, fantastic service. As a family travelling with an 8yo we wanted somewhere nice, easy, classic, and fun. They didn‚Äôt disappoint over the 3 visits. All dishes were top quality, and generous.

Highly recommended.', "The food was delicious and the service great. As an American, the only thing I didn't like was the steak, for me it lacked flavor, came too raw (and I ordered medium rare) and was a tad too cold, after trying steak a few more times in other restaurants, that is just how they like it, which is cool, but perhaps if you are used to a more American, Argentine or Brazilian style steak it wont be too your fancy.  The pork was banging and the dessert was incredible, some sort of bread smothered in sweet sauce.  I'd go back just for that."]

Adresse: 35 Rue de la Fontaine au Roi, 75011 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Extremely nice and engaged staff! I asked them, whether they could "veganize" one of the vegetarian options and the bartender and the cook went out of their way to try to accustom the vegetarian option for me! Very nice place to eat - they don\'t have too many dishes, but that, in my opinion is usually a garant for very good food. I was not at all disappointed!', 'Super nice place in Paris, very cool vibe and nice food.', 'Awesome atmosphere and decor. Friendly staff and delicious food, risotto was mind blowing! Quite affordable too. Definitely recommend to everyone!', 'The food was really good, we had chicken, aubergine and hamburger', "Everything was perfect! The food was delicious, they have really nice biological wines and the barman can easily recommend the perfect wine for your taste. The bartenders are very very friendly and helpful (as some of our group don't speak French he translated the entire menu to English for us). Also nice atmosphere, nice music."]

['Amazing experience. In our case - No menu. Set of 8 courses from chief. We are vegetarian - it was not a problem. Fusion of french and panasian cousins. You eat, you enjoy, you discuss each course with a stuff.
Amazing food, people, atmosphere.', 'This restaurant offers an intriguing culinary experience. We chose the six-course dinner menu and sat at the counter, which allowed us to watch the food being prepared‚Äîa nice touch that added to the experience. Some dishes, like the gazpacho with watermelon and croutons, and the sea bass with broccolini sauce and Parmesan chips, were elaborate and well-balanced. Others were simpler but still enjoyable. The service was adequate. Overall, it provides good value for a dining experience that is more refined than an average restaurant.', 'Our experience at Pierre Sang Oberkampf started off well, with friendly smiles and welcoming faces as we arrived. The cozy environment and delicious bread and butter made for a promising beginning. However, the rest of the evening quickly went downhill.

The concept of guessing the ingredients with the waiter revealing them afterward was a fun touch, but it couldn‚Äôt make up for the overall experience.

As an Asian couple, we found the food to be uninspired and lazy. While some dishes had elements of Thai and Korean (just slap some gochujang and call it a day), the starters were okay but ultimately forgettable. The fish dish was good, but a coconut-soup-like dish tasted more like a curry and wasn‚Äôt to our liking. The main course was chicken breast ‚Äî probably the most tender chicken breast we had yet, however as mentioned before, the sauce and gochujang for this dish felt underwhelming and uninspiring. After mains, we were given a large chunk of cheese that we could not finish.  Dessert was the star of the show: tasty pastry matched with a lemon-like sorbet. I‚Äôll be honest: the food may excite some people, but it didn‚Äôt work for us, and that‚Äôs okay. Unfortunately, the service really let the evening down.

We were given the wrong bill twice ‚Äî first with 4 drinks instead of 2 ‚Äî and waited 15 minutes while the waiter served everyone else (felt like we were forgotten). We were the last couple still seated for the 7pm session, and when we reminded him about the bill, it was wrong AGAIN, with only 1 drink listed (which we were nice enough to remind the waiter again).The entire process of settling the bill took about 20 minutes. When I asked what went wrong, the waiter blamed his colleague, saying he was ‚Äúonly a servant.‚Äù I was disappointed with that response, and I reminded him that they should take accountability as a team, not shift the blame onto one another.

While the food gets an okay pass overall, the real issue was the frustrating service. The repeated billing mistakes and lack of accountability from the staff turned what could have been a decent evening into a disappointing experience. Unfortunately, we won‚Äôt be returning.', 'This was such a fun unique experience. My Fiance and I went there following our engagement and had such a great time throughout the dinner service. It was a 6 course menu (we also opted into the wine pairing that gave us six glasses) and the portions were perfect. The fun twist of the dinner was guessing each dishes composition! The waiter was very fun and knowledgeable with each dish as well as the accompanying wine. I would recommend this to anyone who is visiting Paris for the first time.', 'The lunch is such an amazing deal. This is one of the best meals I‚Äôve ever had. The experience of guessing what you ate after each course was so fun.']

["A cosy little venue with a warm atmosphere. The service from start to finish was prompt, friendly, and felt sincere.
They have an extensive wine menu, which is very impressive. I'm not a wine drinker, but i can appreciate the options they had for those with a broader range.
Lastly, the food was very good quality and prepared perfectly. The steak was amazing and the cheesecake that followed rounded the meal off nicely.
Highly recommend if you fancy a welcoming, less hectic environment to enjoy a nice meal.", 'After visiting for a second time I had to leave a review. This place is excellent. Well priced and great value for money. An extensive wine selection. The red we had the Esprit du Lieu was delicious. We were offered some to try which added to the great service which is faultless. The ambience is good both upstairs and downstairs with both areas having a great atmosphere. Every time I visit Paris I will try to come back here.', 'Very good meat, perfectly cooked.

Great fries. Chocolate fondant was a bit disappointing.

Overpriced wines but they have to make their money somehow so no complaints.', "L'Aller Retour Marais is a speciality steakhouse that specialises in offering very high end cuts of meats with exceptional quality and attentive service for the more selective customers compared to other steakhouses around town.

The menu is limited but options will satisfy most meat lovers looking for a more exceptional steakhouse experience.

The ambience of the place is more of a bistor than your traditional steakhouse feel, and the place itself is cosy with tables spread over two levels and we were fortunate enough to be seated on the upper level after we had made a reservation a few days prior to our visit. Our server was friendly, professional and was more than helpful in suggesting some of their recommendations on the menu.

We were a group of six people and all of us ordered the burrata which was sincerely divine and to die for, I would just visit this restuarant for the burrata, and the second starter that would make me visit this place exclusively is the beef tartare with an egg in the middle and after a few weeks from visiting I can still taste this plate in mouth and am still craving it everyday! Our server also recommended we try their signature bone marrow, which we didn't try as we had already decided on our starter way before we came to the resturant, but would definitely recommend it taking the quality of the meat on offer.

For our steaks all of us had the beef fillet and one order of rib eye with varying levels of preparations and I can definitely recommend the Medium rare (√† point) for a perfectly cooked steak with juiecy and tender flavour and texture. The steak tasted like a fresh cut of raw meat and for meat lovers this is always a delightful first impression that rewards only the most serious carnivorous out there.

I would definitely pick L'Aller Retour over many of the other more commercial steakhouses dotting the city of lights and am sure I will enjoy it like the first time!", 'If you like meat, this is the place for you.
This restaurant was really good in terms of hospitality and food. The beef tartare and the actual steak with different sides were really tasty. Wine list was really good as well. The staff was also so friendly and helpful.
I recommend this place if you like to have a lovely and typical parisien night.']

["I've honestly never had a bad time at Le Carillon.  Bar staff are extremely efficient in fulfilling orders and the patrons in the area are laid back and relaxed.", 'loud music rude staff wont turn it lower\nbad drink bad experience', 'Great little "hole in the wall".The mix drinks are superb, which is not something I would have expected. The crowd was very small on the Sunday evening I was there which was perfect for me. Walking distance from the apartment I rented. I\'ll go there again tonight for a couple of caipirinhas and/or Mojitos.\nRecommend!', 'They don\'t serve hot chocolate at 18h30....claims they don\'t do "hot orders " lol. I guess it\'s not expensive enough. And waiter isn\'t friendly at all....', 'A place to run away from.']

['This place is seriously disappointing. The vibe is terrible, and the owner‚Äôs behavior is shocking. He seems more interested in annoying customers than running a decent business‚Äîthrowing things across the bar at people? Completely unacceptable. One day, that‚Äôs going to backfire.

They let beggars hang around and don‚Äôt do anything about it. On top of that, the bathrooms are sketchy, and there‚Äôs clearly some shady stuff going on in there. As for the beer, it‚Äôs a disaster. Ruining a Guinness isn‚Äôt easy, but somehow, they‚Äôve managed it.

The kitchen is a whole other issue. It‚Äôs filthy‚Äîold food and grease everywhere. Honestly, I wouldn‚Äôt trust anything coming out of there. Do yourself a favor and don‚Äôt risk your health by eating here.

Bottom line: skip this place. There are way better spots to spend your time and money.', "As a Texan I found this a great pub to hang out and enjoy visiting with the locals. Very friendly people who literally love Americans and especially Texas. I was even invited into a game of darts with some locals.

They have live music but it's a little space so the musician sits atop some beer kegs in the corner while performing. How cool is that?

It's located right off the canal so it will get crowded inside sometimes but thins out rather quickly. Pretty cool spot to hang out and enjoy a beer or two. Would love to return soon.", 'I used to love this place and frequented it for YEARS until I encountered the owner. He is a drunk who harnesses patrons and then threatens to kick them out when they stand up for themselves. Truly embarrassing, and even his employees are ashamed and apologize for his behavior. I empathize for the staff who must work under him because they are always so kind and attentive to customers. It is ridiculously unfair that the staff is put in such a position.', 'Went to watch the ireland game and left at half time. The bar has a very weird atmosphere due to the owner.  Seen reviews he is a bit of a drunk, which he seemed to be but worse was his strange behaviour and interaction with alot of the females who entered the bar while we were there, with some of them even leaving before ordering.', 'I always come here for good times! The fries are delicious and the cocktails are cheap! There‚Äôs TVs to watch sports and darts to play. The toilet smells that‚Äôs the only complain :)']

['The shop is a beautiful sight to look at and the savory as well as the sweet food exceeded all our expectations. The proprietor we met at the Rue Saint-Maur shop was extremely kind and gifted us with extra bread to try. It was a memorable and positive introduction to Algerian patisserie. We returned the next day to get more of the sesame coils which had a unique citron-y fragrance. Truly amazing. Highly recommended.', "My biggest issue with this place besides the price is the employees' passive agressive attitude! They don't know how to smile and should be taught how to especially when 6 pieces of pastries equal 25‚Ç¨. Very disappointed by their welcome everytime! I'm done with this place.

Prix astronomiques.
Accueil extr√™mement froid, sinon passive agressive !!!
Ambiance lugubre ! Vendeurs avec t√™tes d'enterrement !
Bref, faut √©viter d'y aller!", "I had a berb√®re, it looked good but unfortunately the taste didn't match the looks. way too little filling, way too much dough", 'This place is a total scam! The say the food is homemade but it came straight from a package and was distastefull and even smelly. We did not dare to eat it. Also rip-off prices. This place should be shut down!', 'Great experience with original and authentic gastronomy ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è']

['Cosy, clean and comfortable restaurant. Good lighting. Fantastic food. Menu changes daily. Good wine list. From the low end to some very good producers. Friendly staff. English speaking.', 'Truly authentic French cuisine run by a family who utilize fresh seasonal ingredients with lots of attention to detail. Highly recommended!!', 'Fabulous restaurant with a light and welcoming interior with matching welcoming staff! Run by a husband and wife team, the service for non-French speaking tourists like us was AMAZING! The food was delicious and incredibly presented. They have a daily menu which changes to what is in season. We were blown away by the wine list but the host helped us to perfectly match wines to our meal. Tasty but modern French food, it was a highlight of our trip!', "Lovely traditional French restaurant recommended by a French friend who lived in Paris. Loved the  seasonal foods that they had (porcini mushrooms, scallops).  Proprietor was very kind to explain various mushrooms to me.  I wasn't so thrilled by the veal stew (meat was a bit dry to me),  We would still go back and recommend to people.", "Excellent dinner with simple dishes and ingredients very well executed and beautifully plated. Variety of meat dishes available. Don't miss out on the dessert selection either. Extensive wine selection for connoisseurs."]

['I have been coming here after Sunday Mass for many years. The crew varies but is always smiley, friendly, and reliable. Prices are reasonable even though they are right by the canal and could charge more. Always order the special, though everything on the regular menu is dependable.', 'Visited around 3pm on a Thursday, was not busy except for a few tables full in the outside seating area.

Staff were not very attentive, a bit of an uncomfortable vibe as there was one man, I think he was a member of staff but i‚Äôm not too sure, who was sitting at a table and was watching my friend I during our entire meal.

Food was good value for money and restaurant is in a good location.

After paying for our meal we sat outside for a while and the man who was watching us inside came to watch us outside so we found this strange and this made us leave earlier than we wanted to.

Food is good but atmosphere is not great during their quiet periods when staff are lounging around‚Ä¶ .', 'The duck confit was perfectly cooked, with tender, flavorful meat and crispy skin that made every bite a delight. For dessert, the cr√®me br√ªl√©e was a true highlight ‚Äì silky smooth custard topped with a perfectly caramelized sugar crust. Both dishes were exceptionally good, making for a memorable meal. Highly recommend this place!
P.s. very nice and attentive staff.', 'Borderline 4, but service is REALLY bad. It seems that they are understaffed and untrained in customer service. Food was pretty good though! Risotto was delicious. Innovative foods, like the curry chicken burger. Homemade apple dessert was excellent!', "On a Friday night we decided to eat at l'atmosphere. We waited for around 40 minute for our order to be taken.
The people in the restaurant were very loud , at a table for 2 we had to speak up to hear one echader. The prices are ok. We order a burger with fries, the fries some of them were very crounchy, and aconfid du canard that was very good.
For the check we also whaites another 10 minutes
It was not so crowded."]

['I had a very pleasant dinner here. Good for English speaking people like ourselves and the female waitress had excellent service.

The food was also great and I especially loved the cream based ravioli and walnut egg pasta!

Will recommend 10/10, especially for the pasta which has really high standards', 'Good italian restaurant at Canal St. Martin. We had pizza and gnocchi with a bottle of ros√©. Both were excellent. Too bad we did not have any space left to try the desserts - the Tiramisu on the next table looked promising :)', 'Lovely and fast service, well-located on the canal, good portions and very enjoyable food! The coffee was pretty good, they use Illy beans.  We had a variety of classic Italian pizzas and a couple of desserts.  The pizza dough was pretty thin, yet a little doughy. Maybe the shape was a bit too homogeneous. I like it better when the outer crust is very thin or has a big bubbly irregular relief (when it comes to pizza, my favourites are Roman and Neapolitan style). Still very good and a pleasure to eat!  Here‚Äôs our choice from the menu:  Buffalo (Mozzarella au lait de bufflonne): Sauce tomato, mozzarella di bufala, basilic Tomato sauce, buffalo mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves  Vegetariana (fromage et legumes): Sauce tomate, mozzarella, aubergines et courgettes grilles, champignons frais, origano Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, grilled eggplant and zucchini, fresh mushrooms, oregano  Gagliarda (piquant, salami et Nduja): Sauce tomate, mozza, salami piquant, Nduja (creme de piment et chair a saucisse), roquette Tomato sauce, spicy salami, Nduja (spicy pepper and sausage cream), arugula salad  Panna Cotta: Au coulis de fruits rouges With red berry sauce  Sorbetto Limoncello: Sorbet citron frais press√© et limoncello (liqueur au citron) Freshly squeezed lemon sorbet and limoncello (lemon liqueur)', 'What an excellent caf√© along the canal! Great wine choices, beer and cocktails were very good! The truffle pizza was very good, too! Also, our waitress Elana was very nice and helpful, as was Michele. Its very much worth the trip,!!', 'Such a lovely restaurant, great location right by the canal, the food is yum and fairly priced. The staff were so friendly and patient with our poor French (they also speak amazing English and have English menus!!) The pizza is delicious, highly recommend the Canalleto pizza or the Calzone :)']

['Pizzas are good but do not order any deserts, it‚Äôs a total rip off!!! 9‚Ç¨ for 5 spoons of chocolate mousse‚Ä¶', 'The dishes were delicious, especially the Napoli pizza. And they have amazing special salad. The service is very fast and wonderful. It is worth a visit.', 'We had lunch here. The place is pleasant enough and I had a decent pizza. My wife had veal milanese which was however inedible. The manager didn‚Äôt seem surprised and said it must have been a dodgy piece of meat. I had the distinct impression that this was not a one-off event. Best avoided. There are plenty of alternatives nearby.', 'Fine dining experience, equally fine atmosphere. The second floor looked cosy, more intimate, overlooking the busy side walk. Bread was freshly baked; steak, 19 euros, well cooked, medium-rare, though the waitress did not lnow what cut it wasü§≠; ceasar sallad, 16 erous. Staff cordial, service fair, nothing to complain about. We would come back. Thank you!', 'Top quality food. Main plate was very well served and tasty; dessert was one of the best chocolate mousse I‚Äôve ever tasted. Prices are very fair considering how good everything was. One of the best options in the region, for sure!']

['Very pleasant restaurant. The staff was extremely nice with us (we arrived 30 min before the reservation). Food was good and light. Prices are not exaggerated.', "The place looks beautiful, but the service is not the best, the food is mediocre. Wouldn't recommend for a nice dinner, only for a snack or a drink", 'Had reserved the Danish suite with some friends. After spending lots of money on overpriced drinks, some of our things were stolen when we and the staff were the only ones having access to the room.', 'Perfectly pleasant place with friendly staff. The food and cocktails should have been substantially cheaper, however, considering the quality of both.', 'Perfect']

['We did the Sunday jazz brunch here and my bf and I had such a great time! The musicians were fantastic (rob armus) and food was buffet style and very good. There were tons of options including ones for vegetarians like myself. The vibe was great and everyone seemed to be having a great time! Staff were also super nice. Highly recommend :)', 'Best brunch I have had in Paris so far. I loved the concept of a jazz brunch and was not deceived one second. The brunch is a buffet full of healthy salty and sweet home cooked food with fresh and quality ingredients. They have a great variety of delicious food and drinks. The price quality is so worth it. What can I say about the jazz concert, it was swinging in my ears the whole day. Amazing experience and place overall. Perfect for a family brunch to remember!', 'It was truly an unforgettable experience. We had a Sunday jazz brunch here and the atmosphere was extremely cozy and nice. We fully enjoyed our 2-hour brunch at La Bellevilloise. Plus the pricing for the brunch is very great. Not expensive at all considering there‚Äôs great food accompanied by a live jazz band playing. üòçü§©will definitely visit again!', 'Save this place at all costs. Good vibes, affordable cuisine and excellent music. A true gem for an easygoing evening with friends.', 'We had a great evening last night. The venue is awesome and very cosy as the same time. The concept of dining with live music is very pleasant too. The food is good (except the bread). Really good ambience and nice staff. A Central spot for friendly meetings, music and alternative culture in the 20th! Thanks.']

['This place was perfect. Super cozy atmosphere and very kind and friendly staff, even with my lack of French language. The food was DELICIOUS‚Äî I got quiche of the day, and it came with a generous helping of fries and a salad which were all very good. And the bartender/barista guy was very cute :)', "Nice restaurant in a nice place, but that's about it. Maybe great for locals, not recommended for tourists. When I asked about the menu, I was arrogantly told they no longer serve food. Then the two tables next to us ordered food. So I guess different rules apply to tourists. A 'pleasant' experience and rude, uneducated and most racist service I‚Äôve ever seen. Thank you and never again.", 'Nice view, friendly staff and cool spot in the sun on top of Paris. Beers are quite ok and the blond is cheap and refreshing. Some finger food option as of 9:30pm. See you soon', 'Friendly crowd. 20th Arrondissement established place to meet and drink and have a great time.  Right across the street from #LaVieuxBelleville Caberet  fantastic view of Paris and the Eiffel Tower during the day and magical view at night', 'Extremely well situated at the top of Belleville Parc, this neighborhood bar/restaurant has a nice outdoor area with the view over Paris. They serve decent comfort food and standard drinks. The staff is pretty friendly there!']

['Charming venue, I really liked this place. Location is excellent and connections by public transport work well even late at night after the concert. Staff was very friendly and things ran very smoothly the entire evening.', 'Cool place for a concert but the facilities could be upgraded. No wardrobe!', 'A really nice venue; as spacey as it should; had the chance to attend quite a few concerts there from various groups (indie, post punk type of music, and so forth), and appreciated the ambiance.', "Went there for my first concert yesterday to see Waterparks. It was crazy! The venue is quite small and the public is very close to the band, which makes the concert an intimate experience. The AC seems to work well so you don't suffocate once you are inside. Will definitely come back again soon! \\m/", "This concert hall is one of the best if you're a fan of alternative music (maybe some other genres, but I only go there for the rock bands)"]

['A charming local French bistro in Belleville. Very classic, cosy and non-pretentious. The waiter will hand you a hand written menu/blackboard, only in French, to order from. A perfect spot if you want a Parisian dinner experience like a local, away from tourists and hype.', 'Don‚Äôt tell anyone about this place. The bistro of dreams. Great food, no pretence. No wine list but if you guide the super friendly staff, you will be happy. Owners present at the end of the bar keeping an eye. Even if you don‚Äôt know who or what chef Care√±a represents, you will love the food. Definitely will be back! ‚ù§Ô∏è', "It has its reputation for a reason. Incredible French cuisine prepared flawlessly. The recommended wine was one of the best we have ever had.\nFor those who say the service is rude, it goes a long way to be polite and learn how to say 'I'm sorry, I don't speak French' in French, if you are a foreigner.", 'This place is worth the trek abit outside of the touristy zones - very delicious and homey bistro-food. The owner does seem a bit grumpy, but that doesn‚Äôt matter much when the food is this good at very reasonable prices. Especially the sweetbread, beef cheeks, and the vanilla/apple/ginger-dessert were very good! Make sure to call ahead to reserve - you can‚Äôt reserve until two days prior', 'We are tourists and were a little intimidated reading previous reviews about the service but it was more than adequate! The dishes are using quality ingredients, each well thought out and executed. We are 2 people and has 5 entrees, a main and a dessert (would have eaten more if we had the stomach space to spare). The owner gave great recommendations on wines and digestif to pair with our food. The bistro is cosy and a great place to spend a whole evening indulging. *menu is written in French and can be google translated- although I am sure the owner would have provided any help we needed']

Adresse: 14 Rue Crespin du Gast, 75011 Paris, France
Reviews:
['It‚Äôs a nice place. Beautiful view.
The only thing is that no reservation and you arrive to look for where to seat. Maybe stay standing. Depending on what time you arrive', 'If you arrive early, you might be able to find some available seating, but the place gets crowded quickly. The rooftop has a very cool atmosphere, offering a view of the Sacr√©-C≈ìur, albeit from a distance. The cocktails were tasty, although they tended to be on the smaller side with a lot of ice, and they were a bit expensive. I decided to try the Lebanon Hangover, which had a peculiar combination of melon and thyme, but it has an interesting taste.', 'I had such a good time there. Of course im gonna speak about the view thats insane during sunset.
Cocktails very well done.
I recommend !', "Absolutely love this place! It's like the Bermuda Triangle of friendships‚Äîwalk in a stranger, walk out with a good friend, and boom‚Äîthey introduced me to my now-date! Bonus: the magic here is so strong it can even stretch your shipping deadlines! I swear, my truck ended up at Amazon on its own. Definitely coming back, if only to see what other miracles happen!", 'The rooftop patio is breathtaking and was a great way to spend our first night in Paris.  The bartender up top put on a good show and made some excellent drinks.  The dinner was simple, elegant, and delicious.  The red wine we had was excellent as well.  Worth it for the view alone, the sunset view from the top is hard to beat.']

['I passed order the woman in caisse told me it will come 5 mn but i have waited for 20mn', 'the worst service they have no client service they dont even read your allergies really really warst service wont advice to take buy from here', 'Disgusting service people', 'Great inexpensive place to stop at for a quick bite.', 'The young lady was kind']

['Very good bar with pleasant staff and beautiful view at eiffel tower. Happy hours from 16 to 23.', 'nice welcoming cafe and restaurant. they typically host concerts on friday and or saturday evenings.', 'Beautiful place, perfect food and excellent service ü§©', "A very nice spot where you'll be able to eat too much for a very fair price ! Even the salad will stuff you as they are very generous.Take a look at the desert, they are gorgeous. As for the main course you'll have plenty to choose.\nIt was delightful in every way :)\nThanks again", "Sit outside and enjoy the scenes of a Parisian neighborhood. On market day, even better with an open market to watch across the street. The food is decent but it can get busy, so don't take it personally if they take a little time to get to you. Your in Paris, after all!"]

["This place is legit. A must go if you're in Paris. It's a perfect experience with friends if you have a small group or a great date dinner.

Just pick the original or most popular cheese fondue, it's spot on you won't go wrong. I had a group of 3 so we also got the red wine fondue with beef too which was excellent, I recommend that as well. Oh yes, and get a bottle of wine to go with your meal. Their wines are excellent and not badly priced.

I also recommend you request to sit upstairs. It's hells butthole downstairs in terms of heat and upstairs is more bearable because they have a fan. The fan is usually off but ask that they turn it on. My guy friend in the group was dying, the fan definitely helps. They probably might not want to have it on but persist and they will.

When I'm back in Paris this place is now on my restaurant must eat at before I leave list.", 'If you want to taste a home made couscous and listent to great music , you have to try this place', 'gras bon!!!', "Nice and musical place on rue Moret, opposite the International. Interesting musical programming, with live bands and DJ sets with vinyl!!!!!! Cutting-edge, quality programming. The only downside: not enough room for dancing, it closes at 2 o'clock; and far too many young people under 30, especially on Saturday evenings. Too bad, because we don't really feel at home dancing next to these young people just out of high school!", 'One of the best bars in Paris. Friendly, inexpensive, good food, and above all great music, whether DJs or groups. Funk / soul / reggea / hip hop / jazz programming basically.

The only slightly annoying point is the airlock to get in and out, and the lack of space as soon as there starts to be a lot of people.']

['Food was great and amazing service, the ladies who was the waiter speak english very fluent and even explain the menu board one by one which rarely seen in local french restaurant (very impress, owner should give her a raise!) . Food come very fast, serve hot and cook right. Will come again in couple days', 'After a long day of frustration with metro and bus strike, it was really good feeling to have a hassle free dinner. The waiter was friendly and welcoming. the food service was fast and most important it was delicious. It was like a home cooked meal with generous portions. It was the kind of place you instantly feel comfortable and could stay til closing time. Worth the visit!', 'We were a group of 22 and looked after by Eugene. Service was excellent. Food was lovely and reasonably priced and at the end of the evening we had a shot at the bar with the staff. Thanks for a great evening.', 'I\'ve been coming to this neighborhood bistro for 15 years now. It recently changed owners, and while most of the new "equipe" are friendly and efficient, the menu is different and some items are disappointing. Gone are the classic "profiteroles," which are hard to find in a lot of restaurants today. Recently they had a "plat du jour" that was called "poulet au curry"/chicken curry, a dish I usually like. I ordered it; unfortunately, it was chicken in a bland white cream sauce, no curry was distinguishable at all. The server did not ask what I thought of it. When I paid, I said it was not much of a "curry" chicken, and his response was indifferent: "il n\'y a pas de soucis"/"No worries" or "no problem". Strange. To be fair, I ordered a burger a couple of weeks before and thought it was "correct". Same for a poulet fermier before. Generally, I find the staff courteous, too, so perhaps this person was having a bad day and, to maintain sanity, couldn\'t be bothered by another complaint. But I\'ve worked in restaurants when I was younger. That\'s no way to keep customers and build a reputation. The Zephyr is a beautiful art deco vintage bistrot. I hope they find a way to recover their culinary quality and respect customers\' reports of disappointing experiences, instead of dismissing them as "no problem."', 'Our favorite! Came back three nights in a row. Friendly, cozy and excellent food. Great place for families with kids. We will be back:)']

['Staff were super friendly, extremely low wait times for food, most importantly, food was SUPER delicious. Ordered beef tataki, beef tartare, and beef with mash. Their fruity IPA beer was also tasty. I don‚Äôt understand how the is place is not 5 stars because it‚Äôs so amazing. I love everything here, no complaints.', 'Amazing local traditional French restaurant\n\nGreat steaks tar tar and wine', 'The only reason it doesn‚Äôt get 5 stars is the menu is a little odd and limited. I got a poached egg in truffle foam with bacon. It was a full bowl of truffle foam with a cold poached egg in it topped with bacon. A little strange. Delicious but overwhelming. The egg was perfectly poached but it really should have been warmed up. All that said, the staff was lovely and patient with my English. Certainly worth a stop for a snack and a 50cl of wine.', 'Lovely local Bistro that I visited on the day I arrived in Paris! a very cozy place with small space but the staff were friendly and the food was good. (also liked the red checkered table mats)the best menu was truffle soup, I didn‚Äôt expected such a strong truffle taste for this price!', 'Lovely place to stop for an aperol and cheeseboard! Lovely staff and cheese! Perfect for a Parisian evening!']

['Very cosy and interesting place; friendly staff, pleasant atmosphere; great monthly schedule!', 'A small cosy place. The waiting staff is nice and serve with a big smile. Cheap pint during happy hours. I was told the live music is only on Saturdays. Definitely recommended.', 'Nice caf√©/brasserie. They often have bands playing, or cinema projections or other entertainment. The ambiance is easy and relaxed.', 'Lived in Paris 1994-1998 then visited very regularly 1998-2000, Lou Pascalou was one of the places I went to the most.. It has evolved a bit since (which is good!), but remains a very special place in M√©nilmontant, still run by the same (very friendly) person. If you want to "feel" what that area is about, go there.', 'Such a warm pub to drink and have fun. Usually there are interesting concerts.']

["Perfection, pretty much. A very simple set menu with a concentration on amazing flavors and seemingly simple, but expert, preparation. Great bonhomie foodie atmosphere. Get there at 6:30pm (it opens at 7pm) and you'll be at the front of the line (and there is a line).

The menu changes, so what I had is probably not what you'll have, but here it is anyway:", "I tried it by Delivroo and even Macdonald it taste better (look better too) than their Boa Burgers.  I don't use to review a bad scoring... Feel like the restaurant is leading by business and not by love to making food.  Don't go there.", 'The worst Chirasi that I ever ate in my life!
The salmon had oignon taste, rise too much cooked and the avocado was black.
NEVER AGAIN!!', 'I was happy with the food and the portions !', "Although the staff is friendly, their menu is super misleading. As you see it says 'lunch menu' but in reality you have to pay extra for drinks and dessert. So not a menu.
In addition, the mochis are put in bulk in a large plastic box.
The burroto is not bad but lacks a little flavor."]

['I rarely write reviews, but the food was 10/10.

I wasn‚Äôt sure what to order, so he made sure that I was given something that I would like.

From New York, so I have had great food before and this is definitely up there.
Went here everyday! Strongly suggest!', 'Amazing food. I went back twice. I‚Äôve sure to visit again next time I‚Äôm in town.', 'Fresh and delicious for a great price! If you‚Äôre staying at The People - Belleville hostel next door, you must try this place. Great selection of Tunisian style street food and sweet pastries. Very helpful and friendly staff.', 'Good service and fast! Stays open a bit late, I got brick and sweets. Check it out if you‚Äôre looking for food in the area!', 'First time eating Tunisian food. It was deliciuos and the employees were very kind. Sure I would come back, congratulatios! Best regards from Argentina!']

['Always reliable and solid Dominis pizza. Great delivery by Anir :)', 'Absolutely useless delivery service if you live in Azor.

Guaranteed delay of at least 30 minutes after the predicted delivery time.

If you like cold pizza and you live in Azor this is the place for you.

If you live in Azor and you want a nice warm Pizza I suggest purchasing from any other location.', 'The restaurant was good and served good chicken pizza. but the guys dont know english it takes more time to convey our requirements to them. Overall good with quality and expense', 'Service fast and polite. Food delicious. Not kept waiting long. A bit expensive for my liking however!', "4 stars for fast food? This Domino's is as perfect as it can get. Great job guys!"]

['The mountain salad was good, the duck was better and the lasagna was excellent. A friendly staff and pleasant environment at good prices, what more could you ask for?', 'Really classic bistro fare, can‚Äôt go wrong. Good value. Pleasant spot with multiple dining areas and very friendly staff although at times slow. Took two menus and the fish and chips and pave de boeuf were good with the fries nice and crispy.', 'We were seated with such speed and comfort that one might think they‚Äôd been expecting us. The staff, though not linguists, compensated splendidly with their warmth and attentiveness‚Äîa charm that made even my rusty French sound like poetry. The food? Exquisite, of course. While vegetarians may find the options limited, that‚Äôs hardly a concern for those of us with broader appetites. And the desserts? Worth every indulgent moment.', 'Fantastic experience. Had an assortment of meats and cheeses from the Aveyron district which seems to be their specialty. The staff were so warm and welcoming. Definitely will be back for more!', 'Right by our airbnb, we came for a late lunch after landing from Athens. Greeted by a friendly man who spoke some English. He showed us the daily menu and bless his heart tried to explain it in English. We tried to use as much Frnech as we knew and settled upon two daily specials with plum tarts for dessert. We left soooooo happy. The steak skewers where cooked perfectly. The sauce was incredible. And the frites were super cripsy and the jug of wine was super affordable....I only wanted more. Great first meal in Paris! We also came here for breakfast and got a cappucino and croissant for ‚Ç¨5.']

['Alhamdulillah!!!
Awesome and reasonable price!!!
Just for 5 euros you can have a delicious pizza with more cheese & ingredients!

Staffs are very friendly, gentle with smiley faces above all very rapid service!
