Jajakumullahu Khairan!', 'Pizza good and cheap', "It's very good and delicious. Because price is only 6‚Ç¨", 'Best and the most reasonable pizzas around ‚Ç¨5!! They have branches in Jaures and Robespiere!', 'Good price with good value']
['Excellent and inexpensive, I recommend.\nFresh and quality products', '']

['Very tasty ramen au boeuf, good service and prices.', 'Unfortunately it‚Äôs far away from any authentic Japanese food. The bento box was very avarage and kaarage was not even close to original kaarage. Unfortunately as the owners are very kind the food was disappointing.', 'Really authentic Japanese food, the service was also first class while the prices were really great. 10/10 would visit again.', 'I haven‚Äôt even left the restaurant yet and leaving this review. This is my first real Japanese experience and this place did not disappoint. The food is just so delicious, the ambiance is so calm and beautiful, the staff is so friendly. Highly recommend this.', 'I had the Ramon with dumplings and although a bit of a novice when it comes to japanese cuisine I thought the dish was tasty and, filling. The dumplings were delish ! All in all a good experience.']

['Friendly, helpful service. Dinner was great. As expected,it was a little noisy on a crowded Friday night.', 'The couscous is sooo tasty! Especially the one with sausage. Great food and lovely staff!', 'I really love this restaurant.  Staffs do not speak English but they have Englisb menu and we can still communicate.  Food were nice. I love the French toast! Cheeseeeeeeeeee', "Amazing food. They served food at 1am and the food was so juicy and delicious. It's also very crowded at nights, nice vibe.", 'Nothing to complain. Price/quality good, service good. Little weirdness, english menu dont compare french menu 1:1. But anyhow, good place for lunch. Cant say anything for dinner']

['I was just passing by this place and the waiter decided to throw water at me. No apologies ofc!', 'Caveat Emptor
I travel although here, as I live not 55 yards away and for once wanted to be tourist, enjoying the sunshine in front of Saint Joseph, a pint of Ambre, a Basque beer, I enjoyed in the last visit.
It was suggested I tried "Le Blond" and after an exchange with the server, and while others left the bar, through lack of service, with my quip about Basques Blonds, I was subjected to ùê¥ùëë ‚Ñéùëúùëöùëñùëõùëíùëö discours from the cashier and the server.
For information: argumentum ad hominem, is a term that refers to several types of arguments, most of which are fallacious and it was suggested I take "my moustache" elsewhere. Good advice, maybe not for others wishing to come to Paris. C'est la vie.

There are other bars in St. Maur and if you wish to be insulted, this bar is the place for you, however somehow, I think not.', 'Average coffee.', "Good for a few cheap pints of n'importe-quoi beer. Haven't tried the Basque food yet.", 'Nice to be there']

Adresse: 21 Rue de la Villette, 75019 Paris, France
Reviews:
["Had one of the most incredible meals of my entire time in Paris. A buddy of mine in the states who owns a very successful bakery told me I absolutely had to stop by here and I was blown away by it.

We did the six course meal and I sort of wish we went for the full chef's menu. From the welcome food to the dessert, everything had a great aesthetic, great taste. Everything was familiar with an interesting take on it.

And the service was immaculate. Everyone knew exactly when we needed something. We never had to wait.

We went to a Michelin star restaurant the following night and I had a better time and better food at Le Cheval d'Or. When I return to Paris, this will be on the return to list.", 'One of the most incredible restaurants I have been to all year! You must go if you‚Äôre in Paris- the food is well seasoned, well balanced and super creative. We went for the bronze menu- the pork main was insane, the starters were delicious, plus there were so many lovely surprises throughout the meal. The service is friendly, super attentive, and they made great wine recommendations. I can‚Äôt wait to go back when I‚Äôm next in Paris!', "Exquisite experience. We did the tasting menu and it was excellent - the only dish that lacked excitement for us was the fish course. Everything else was inventive, delicious, and impressive.
Limited variety for wines by the glass, but it didn't negatively impact our experience.
If you skip the tasting menu, don't skip the mapo tofu tortellini, croque madame, crispy duck, or egg cups.", 'Amazing experience at Le Cheval d‚ÄôOr !
The food is well-balanced and creative with a fusion of French-Chinese. The waiters were also really attentive and took time to answer all of our questions. If we manage to get another reservation, we will definitely go back !', 'We went with the 9-course tasting menu and enjoyed everything. The scallops, mapo tofu pasta, and duck were particularly impressive and showed off how well the team combines French and Chinese cuisine. The sommelier kindly helped us choose a bottle of wine that paired beautifully with all the courses. Would strongly recommend this for a unique dining experience in Paris.']

['Amazing little restaurant with home cooked meals and everything is biological and sustainable. The chef is a great guy and explains the concept to every customer. We had burrito, soup, chicken tikka masala and hot dogs and were amazed by the taste of every dish! Also the prices are more than fair, big recommendation!', 'Interesting concept of open kitchen, friendly people and vegetarian options that are nice.
I would like it to be a bit more strong in flavors, but it‚Äôs a great place and prices are decent.', 'What a pleasure to see Jimmy, his bright and amazing smile, and his so cool demeanor. But let's not forget the basics: Jimmy wants you to eat tasty, healthy organic AND authentic food. It was a tuesday, but I hadn't been in so long that I had to take a large chicken byriani (yum-my) , a taboul√© with carrots, a carrot cake, and Jimmy concocted an amazing smoothie. Oh and there's always a total veggie option. I can't wait to get back on a wednesday for the thai chicken (with thai soup of course, so good, and made every day). Eating healthy but beeing full, that is the experience with "L'esprit Tcha√Ø".', 'Lovely little restaurant. Friendly owner. Super fresh and tasty food', 'Best chicken Tikka masala of Paris

We can feel all the different flavours. That‚Äôs truly my favorite in town']

['Well located in the 20th district, this authentic Italian restaurant offers high quality pastas, pizzas, antipasti and other local dishes. The ingredients are fresh and it tastes pretty good overall! Service is friendly and the venue is spacious & welcoming.', "The foods were super good, the waiters were attentive and service was great. The place is simple but elegant. C'√©tait un bon din√™r pour nous. Worth a mile of walk.\nI personally recommend the place, make sure to make a reservation as the place is busy üòÉ", 'Real Italian food and real good :)', 'The carbonara tartufo pasta was not very great, tasted very plain and no flavor of truffle mushroom üòû disappointed with the outcome', 'Lovely small place with authentic food. Tiny menu and average prices. The wine was paired well.']

["Reading the comments I see that I am not the only one to have had a bad experience in this store.
I have also been a customer since I lived in the neighborhood (5 years) and one of the employees decided that I had stolen and made me wait at the checkout while he checked the cameras, which caused was a very humiliating and unjustified situation for me (with all the customers looking at me), the cashier ended up coming back after seeing that I obviously hadn't stolen anything, I'm not asking for an apology but he gave me a hand gesture to tell me to leave!!
Is it normal to treat customers like this? It's just humiliating and discriminatory.
In short, fortunately there are enough businesses in the area to avoid this place in which I would never set foot again.", "Disappointed with my last experience and yet, I shop there regularly because I have lived nearby since 2009.
There was a line at the checkout, I wanted to make a comparison so take a few minutes to think. I am stopped several times as I leave the store...
I don't like being followed around the aisles by an employee and then tonight having someone open my bag is too much! I work and pay for my purchases.
I will try to find the products that interested me so much elsewhere even if it is no longer in the neighborhood.
Please respect your customers and not make some pay for the misdeeds of others.", "I don't understand that during festive periods there is no frozen/pastry log that cannot be eaten!!!!!!!", 'Excellent Carrefour city!

I find everything I need there and absolutely all the staff are very nice! (Special mention to the store manager who I particularly like ü§ù!)', 'I am very happy to buy in this store, the staff is very friendly and smiling and even more welcoming to the store manager. I really advise you to go buy there.']

['Creosolino es um excelente chef.\nRepresentative of Brasilian places in Paris, they have live music often on weekends, only for dancing the space is small, and many of the Parisian people from 20e arrondissement go to join, so you have a mix of the people there.\nI have a normal plate of feijoada and caiprinha.', 'As a brazilian the food was amazing! Good prices and nice environment.', 'Feijoada was good. Caipirinha was the best outside of Brazil. The most important thing is the vibes of the bar with good music and nice people. Love this cozy place', 'Very legit Brazilian food! Recommend highly the feijoada (Sundays only) and the caipirinha! Sa√∫de!', 'I liked it but my partner, who is Brazilian, was not impressed with her feijoada. I ordered the picanha but it was not as tender and flavorful as the cut should be but i still enjoyed my meal. Service was not up to par - the food came quickly but we were not checked up on after we received it and it took forever to get the check. We never returned.']

['Has a lot of variety and high quality products. Helpful and generous staff too.', 'Just a supermarket', 'I took a too good to go basket here, lots of products as visible in the photo. I recommend üëç\n\nVery friendly staff too!', "You overdo it with expired products, chips expired for 5 months. We come despite the excessive prices you charge because there isn't much in the neighborhood but if in addition to ruining us you make us sick we won't be happy!", "Be careful of prices at checkouts which differ from prices in stores, and this for many products! You have to be careful because there are no ‚Äúprice information‚Äù terminals to check for yourself. And the saleswoman needs to be less horrible with customers, she's been working in this place for months, and it's still hell to deal with her... I asked her for some information today (reluctantly knowing her) and she whispered at me without answering me. This store helps out in the neighborhood but don't overdo it with customers who have other options a nearby street..."]

["Good food with decent portions and price, had a good chicken burger but wings were a bit too salty. I aspire to be as happy as the man who works here, he was so friendly and couldn't do enough to help. Good atmosphere, great vibe.", 'The burger is nice, but it surprised me that this price without chips, so bad, ,,,,,,,26‚Ç¨only 2 burgers. I‚Äôm not full at all.........', 'Food was great and the service even better. Very kind and welcoming. We enjoyed the meal and the milkshake was a perfect ending. Thank you', "An old timey place, perfectly nostalgic for older generations. Sells some very tasty fries, and the burgers also don't underperform. A great place to visit when you happen to be near and rearing for some nice food.", 'Excellentüòã']

['Small and decent Franprix supermarket with a variety of products, albeit a little expensive.', 'Very helpful supermarket', 'Expensive when compared to other options in the neighborhood.', "Good grocery!  I'm always at the machine making fresh oj!", 'Standard supermarket chain. Handy for milk, cereal and coffee.']

["I think I've found my new favorite place in Paris!  Beautiful salon de the area with textured walls, great lighting, and gorgeous flowers.\n\nAmazing hot chocolate:  thick and creamy, rich but not sickeningly so, with a wonderful chocolate flavor that's not too sweet.  Great quality chocolates with good flavors, and they come in pretty and sturdy silver packaging for those of us who travel, which is definitely a plus.  Delicious caramels (try the mango one, and the different nut flavors!), and the best chocolate eclair I've ever had anywhere; it was beautiful and glossy, had a great texture, and the perfect balance of pate de choux and chocolate custard, with a nice sticky chocolate glaze.  It's probably one of the best things I've ever eaten in Paris.", 'Good service, average food, fair price', 'Top', 'Cool', 'Without a doubt the best bar/restaurant in Paris, from quality to friendliness, everything is great in this house, all very well decorated with a very pleasant texture and ambiance, 5 star staff, I highly recommend this hope and adventure fantastic!']

['Love it, the food was fresh and delicious!
We got the vegan mezze for 2, and it was very satisfied.', 'You should definitely try the cigkofte (which is a turkish vegan dish made with bulgur, tomate paste and spices)! It tastes so good and is a nice reasonably priced vegan meal. Plus the owner and the service is great, you feel at home.

For the desert, I suggest the cafe gourmand with pistachio or the cafe gourmand normal which contains a turkish coffee and small parts of desserts.', 'Got takeaway b√∂rek here because I was craving some (I‚Äôm half Turkish) and it was amazing! The owner was so lovely, he gave me some of their handmade √ßiƒü k√∂fte to try and I tell you it is the best I have had! I will definitely be getting some more of the k√∂fte another time. They have good meal deals too. Highly recommend ‚ô•Ô∏è', 'Everything that I tried from the lentils soup, to the b√∂rek and cig kofte tasted fresh, delicious and was authentically Turkish. The prices are very affordable and I would definitely return to this restaurant!', 'If you would like to try true and delicious Turkish food; this is the place!! Great service, the owner is very kind and atmosphere makes you want to come back. It is my 10th time here, and surely I will come back!']

["Gave this rating as we ordered food and waited ages
Had to go and get it myself and the food was stone cold they just left it on the counter
Ment to be table service
More like couldn't be bothered bringing it", "The service weren't serving at table and was chit-chatting when they had to serve it. My frnd's order came at table but mine didn't even tho there was the number plate, they were either racist or lazy, at the end I had to get it myself", "I thought try a mcdonalds seeing as am in paris was curious to see how different it could be . Had the option of a double fillet o fish burger on the menu . Was cooked well and didn't look like it was slapped together by a bored disgruntled worker. It tasted like normal. Enjoyed the meal . The restaurant was a clean but it was 12.30am and not very busy. After my meal I went to the toilet . I couldn't use it due to number 1 the awful smell like it not been cleaned all day nearly made me sick and number 2 Urine on floor absolutely disgusting. Now I feeling worried about the hygiene of the kitchen and staff", 'I was lucky to have Mr. Nawfal help. He was very helpful. Such a gentleman.

Thanks', 'Very nice service  , excellent environment']

['The whole vibe gives a taste of tunisia . The food is great', 'Vegetarian pizza was good and we paid only 9‚Ç¨', 'Benna lablebi 10euro', 'Amazing mlaoui sandwiches with eggs, meat/tuna and many delicious sauces/vegetables. Very efficient and fun team, clean', "I don't recommend.
Very bad service,
Disgusting smell ü§¢
I will never visit it again"]

['Great outdoor venue to enjoy a drink in a chill and kid friendly environment! There is a large sandbox, ping pong tables and a huge chess game for kids to play around üëåthey also serve some snacks, sandwiches and pizzas.', "I could have give 5 stars except that the toilets weren't very comfortable, they are temporary plastic booths, no water to flush so....and no water to wash the hand, there is liquid soap but still didn't bring you good feeling.\nOther than that, everything is good. It is outdoor space with many tables set up in different styles. There is a play area for kids,  a big chess table, some vintage shops, a bar and a food court, also the stage for live music. The vibe is very nice and fresh, especially in the summer. Fries was good, drink's price is average - 3.5‚Ç¨ for a small beer, for most of soft drink. Staffs were friendly. In general, I liked it.", 'Undoubtedly the single best club night I‚Äôve gone on in the last half decade. Wow. The atmosphere here js 100% pure and genuine love!! Went on a Saturday night to a disco event. When I‚Äôm in Paris again I‚Äôll be back!!!!', 'Cute little place, very chilled and lively. Toilets are a bit weird, never seen such a system, but interesting!', 'Really cool space with a backyard feel. At the end of the space was a stage for a band and dancing. Drinks and food were reasonably priced and bathroom area functioned well for the amount of people. The night I went there was a latin band covering a variety of latin hits (it was latin night themed). Crowd was awesome, friendly and polite - smiles all around. One of the best evenings out I ever had in Paris.']

['Nice little restaurant.. very friendly staff .. nice atmosphere.. food was delicious.. the olive dish was a bit salty for me.. the waiter not very helpful but he was ok.', 'Everything was so delicious ! It really taste like home. I will definitely come back on my next visit to France.
Our server was nice and friendly.
Keep up the good work guys', "Very good, authentic Moroccan dishes. Service was efficient and pleasant! Definitely recommend the chicken tagine with olives and also the cous cous d'agneau.", 'The best Algerian üá©üáøfood you can get in Paris and the best service.
It‚Äôs my second time here after 2 years and it hasn‚Äôt disappointed me', 'A Very nice Algerian restaurant, good food, service and very nice and clean.
I wish we have the same thing in Orl√©ans, France were I live.']

Adresse: Metro 2 Station, 127 Bd de M√©nilmontant, 75011 Paris, France
Reviews: ["Amazing, better cuisine than in Algeria ü•∞ generous quantities and price VERY affordable. Love this small, clean  place . People amazing speak arabic, berbere , french and english !  I don't understand people undee rating this amazing place üòãüòã i am used to eat here since years !", 'Drove from England for this restaurant and it did not let me down at all. Felt like home, the service was perfect and the food was out of this world', 'Excellent food‚Äî they cook the meat right there so it comes out fresh & delicious. The couscous is soft and soup is amazingüî• Great service. We even went twice while visiting Paris!', 'I am from South Africa and this place was so good and reasonably priced,  i visited twice in 2 days.  Good friendly service, good tasty food,  fair price.....can i request u introduce an english  menu  . My rating is 4.5/5', 'Very nice and clean restaurant! Reasonable prices but there is no english menu!']

['Authentic homemade Thai and South East Asian food with a western touch on certain dishes. It is pretty tasty overall, with fresh ingredients and we had a very  good experience üëå', 'Delicious Pad Tai and all the dishes we tried were delicious. Great service as well!!', 'Authentic South East Asian food. Really liked the green curry, which is just the same like cooked in Cambodia. Ask for extra chili if you like more spicy food. Service is very welcoming and friendly.', 'Best Thai place in Paris. Great service, delicious food.', 'We both had a really enjoyable lunch here, and can recommend highly. I had green curry with chicken and cococonut milk, P had red curry with whole fillet of salmon. Both were delicious, the ambiance was relaxed, and the staff were friendly and attentive, and made this such an enjoyable experience. Merci!']

["On a quiet narrow side street of Belleville rests this cozy hole in the wall that hosts travelling chef/sommelier duos. I had the pleasure of visiting chef Celine and sommelier Gaby who also was our server for the night. The mackerel, fried polenta and ganache were excellent and the natural wines suggested by Gaby (an Alpino pet nat and a Melon de Bourgogne) were absolutely beautiful. Can't recommend visiting this pair enough.", 'Superb!! It‚Äôs a pop up restaurant. Every week different chefs. We got to eat from two chefs from Nantes. Every dish was delicate,intelligent and delicious. The service was full of Grace.', 'LUCKY YOU  ! ... If you found this adress by chance. The success of this little house is as simple as that : a rebel boss making her own cooking and challenging your tastes with strange natural wines. Gourmets, both meat lovers and vegan welcome. Just let you guided and enjoy !\n\nAverage rate : 25-30 ‚Ç¨ VAT included, booking is recommended.', 'I love this place. Always different chefs, young creatives doing interesting things with food. Well worth a visit.', 'Fixed 3-course menu, quite average food, but with reasonable price']

['I highly recommend this place. Very friendly staff and the best pizza I have ever had!', 'Well located on the Bld de M√©nilmontant, this traditional pizza place offers some of the best pizzas in the district. The pizza dough is really fresh, soft and slightly toasted & crispy on the outside. And the meat, vegetables and cheese are all very tasty too! üëå The staff is pretty nice and they have a high chair which makes the venue baby friendly! üë∂', 'Delicious pizzas üçï
Italian chef , Super nice staff
Fresh products
I tried the melanzana verde : first  time I try a pizza in which pesto is the base sauce : 14‚Ç¨ not at all expensive for what it is', "Multiple pizza selection menu - excellent pizza! Definitely an 8/10 on my extremely critical rigid scale!!  The crust was to die for, the toppings fresh and delicious and the service exceptional!
I don't speak French and the server and manager went out of their way to assist me and answer questions. A warm and inviting establishment with the pizza oven near the front door, outdoor patio and smoking section!!
Definitely needs to be on your must do culinary stops while in Paris (11th district)!!!!", 'Their pizzas are delicious. I personally like "alla norma" very cheese and yummy eggplant. You can choose among a wide variety of pizze, calzone, etc.
Service is nice. It‚Äôs often full but it turns quickly. Prices have gone up a bit lately but it‚Äôs still worth it. Ask for a wine suggestion, they have very good italian ones.']

['Closes at 9:40 p.m. instead of 10:00 p.m. most days.

The star is required for this review', 'The staff is friendly, friendly, making a lot of effort because they are young and not easy to navigate for a passing clientele. Afterwards, some departments still leave something to be desired in terms of cleanliness and the cold chain is questionable in terms of maintaining the product. An improvement is there, the placement and interest of quick-consumer products still needs to be revised.', "Hello, I am satisfied with the local service offered by this store. However, I live in the same building as this business and since the arrival of the new management, the store's trash can is now stored outside even though a trash room is provided for this purpose. The container is under my window which is not great in terms of hygiene and odors especially with the current heat, but in addition this bin is regularly visited day and night by someone from the building which causes digging noises and odors.   Could you please put this trash can in its premises and contact the person who is digging through it to give them directly what you throw away and which is still edible?
Thank you for considering my request.", 'The cashier this evening on the phone with his earpieces at the checkout, in his visibly animated discussion, without a glance at the customer or even a hello, just a "Seven euros fifty". Really very kind and respectful.', 'It's not normal to leave a young man who is starting out alone at a busy time üò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠ because he didn't know how to get the ticket and I had to wait 30 minutes, time to finish all the customers present for that he.  called "the bossüò™" (as he replied). In addition, the bar code was wrong and the fruit was charged double. üò≠üò≠']

Nom: A casa di nonna. Restaurant Italien Paris Belleville. Cuisine italienne d‚Äôamour.
Reviews:
['Charming place with original Italian cusine! The service is impeccable and you feel like at home. I would really recommend it! If you want to have a break from crepes and croissants, I would highly recommend to come to say hi to Rosaria and Tiffany! üëè', 'Authentique italien cuisine from Napoli. Very friendly staff and tasty dishes. A bit on the expensive side, but totally worth it.', 'Came yesterday night without a reservation and it was 100% worth visiting! Amazing food, perfect service and an excellent selection of Italian wines!', 'Amazing place with really good and authentic food!
Excellent and sincere service from the whole staff incl. the chef.
Very cozy and authentic atmosphere!
We will definitely be back...', 'Absolutely amazing!!! And the maitre d‚Äô was beyond friendly and helpful to silly tourists like me. The food was beyond belief!']

['The pizzas were delicious and the owner was really friendly

More than recommended!', 'Best pizza in Paris!
Parker is very friendly and good vibes!', 'Very beautiful place for 3/4 peoples.its not big place but best pizza with real tast in the area. the chef was really nice. I recommend this place.', 'Awesome food and service. Super recommended.', "Perfect pizza take away! Not to greesy! Just perfect. we'll flavoured ingredients. Good crust. Been there with my kids (8 and 11) and they loved it!"]

['Went here for drinks with friends! The bartender didn‚Äôt speak English but he was very nice as I struggled though with my French. The let us stay and enjoy or drinks even as they were closing. It truly made our nights, and the drinks were great at a reasonable price :)', 'I Went there with a friend to have a late lunch and the experience was delightful. Very cosy and the staff are welcoming. The food was delicious and cooked to a pleasant standard. Would recomend this place to anyonz who is passing through the area.and wanting to live the Parisien experience.', 'We went there as a group for a karaoke night and it was great! The room downstairs can be booked for private events. We brought our computer and plugged it into the projector. We tethered our internet connection from our phone to find songs online. You can order "planche de charcuterie" and happy hour for cocktails until 10:00pm. Overall, we had a very nice time :)', 'This place is amazing cheap bear food is surpurb and atmosphere is great\nHighly recommended', 'Great place! Fun staff, good food and great place to meet friends or date night. Love live music night.']

['The food was exceptional‚Äîflavorful mezze, perfectly seasoned crunchy falafel, and mouthwatering hummus. But what truly stood out was the impeccable service. Zale, one of your staff members, made us feel like VIPs. His friendly demeanor and attention to detail were commendable.
And let‚Äôs not forget the creative cocktails. I suggested Bayrouth icetea and Lebanon mule ‚Ä¶Thank you for creating such a memorable experience. L‚ÄôArtisan Lebanese is now at the top of my recommendation list', 'This is such a fantastic place in  Belleville Paris 19eme to get your traditional libanais food,,best food ever I recommend it to try served by friendly folks with members we tried different plates', 'NEVER AGAIN
So I went in this place to eat dinner on sunday with my boyfriend, there were two men - the one that I think it‚Äôs the cook was very nice, but the other one was CLEARLY very pissed because he wanted to go home soon and he was very rude and impolite. So: we go in at 20:30 and how you ALL can read (both on internet and on their door) sunday it closes at 22:00
we came in and the guy didn‚Äôt even say hi to us so WE say ‚Äúwhat do we do we can sit?!‚Äù , he already is visibly annoyed that we didn‚Äôt take away but we wanted to eat there, after 3 minutes he comes and wants to take the order and when we say ‚Äújust one more minute‚Äù he replies ‚Äúin 30 minutes we closed so you have to hurry up‚Äù (that followed my reply of ‚Äúno you don‚Äôt it‚Äôs written even on the door 22:00‚Äù ‚Äúno it is not‚Äù ‚Äúyes it is‚Äù ecc)
Was it for me I would have gone in another restaurant and send him to a very nice place, but my boyfriend was very happy to eat Libanese so I took a deep breath and stayed.
during the dinner he comes multiples time to ask if we finished and at 21:25 he brings the bill without us asking for it.
at this point my boyfriend asked very calmly ‚Äúis it like this that you treat all of your  clients? you didn‚Äôt even ask if we wanted a dessert or other things‚Äù he started to say ‚Äúno I have to close in 2 minutes‚Äù (again - we point out that it is written 22:00) and ‚Äúyes yes sir as you like, it‚Äôs as you say‚Äù VISIBLY annoyed.

I just want to say that the other guy was so nice and when the other one went in another room he came to me and gave a little bag with two little desserts , i think to apologize for his colleague, and I really appreciated that.', 'It gave me one more reason to love Paris and gave me an unforgettable experience.  Lebanese food was a first for me. And I realized Lebanese food is truly amazing. It was so delicious such an amazing!!! Make me sad because after I don‚Äôt know I could find this same restaurant in Korea. It was refreshing, not greasy, hearty, and so delicious that word will never describe how much it is good. And the restaurant workers and owner are so nice, sweet, gentle and full of youthful energy. The price is reasonable and I think I will be looking for Lebanese food anywhere where I am in the future.', 'Amazing food. Very warm and welcoming people ‚ú®']

['This is the greatest McDonalds in the planet because of how kind the workers are. One of them saw I was taking a cup of tea on my way out but in an eat in cup (too hot) and asked an associate to make me a brand new tea, proactively and unprompted so I could enjoy it without burning my hands. They also courteously bussed my tray without my asking. Truly amazing and a highlight of this trip.', 'The employees here are nice and they look overworked and tired. I saw a guy flip off one of the employees and he didn‚Äôt deserve being treated like that. If I spoke the language I would have said something and stand up for him', "Poor service, not that they were not polite but they just didn't seem to care-not listening to my order properly, not calling out numbers loudly or effectively. We Ordered 3 cheeseburgers and a Swiss Burger and waited 25 mins. The food was rock hard also. Not worth it and worse than any regular McDonald's back home in Canada", "Nice MacDonald's, fast internet, polite staff.", 'Had a coupon with an offer given to me by them. When I went to get my offer they said it did not work. The ‚Äúmanager‚Äù didn‚Äôt even bother to see what is wrong. Poor customer service. Never going back again to Mac in France I‚Äôm disappointed. ['If you love Italian food, you absolutely need to check this place out! I had the most incredible pappardelle with truffle oil, and my wife thoroughly enjoyed a perfect pasta carbonara. To finish, I indulged in a heavenly tiramisu paired with a smooth amaretto‚Äîpure

['We had walked to another restaurant that was recommended to us. When we arrived after a long day of sightseeing, it was closed. Our 12 year old was getting fussy at not eating all day so we stopped here by pure chance walking back to our hotel.

['Such a great little market... Has everything you need.', 'Clean and not a bad size for Paris', 'Ok', 'Top', 'Terrible!
I bought a mini watermelon for 6 euros and when I got home, I realized that it was completely rotten. I go back to return it, but obviously the store is closed (the announced times do not correspond to reality...).

RUN AWAY!']

['We arrived late at night in need of a late meal. Meal was good. Oysters were great. So was the Gnocchi. Nice cheese platter. Great wine recommendations. The staff really took care of us with great service. Kindly offered to translate the menu and explain everything in English and really went out of their way for us.  Very good value for money.', 'An absolutely fantastic place! The dishes are flavorful and delicious, and the atmosphere is both warm and elegant. A must-visit spot!', 'Great food and service not as bad as alot of these reviews. Our waiter was great and joked with us. Food came out promptly and the seafood dishes tasted fresh and vibrant. I thought the menu was exciting and the wine was lovely. Hidden gem', 'I went with friends to have a brunch at this cafe and we were extremely shocked by how bad the service was. We all live in Paris so it is not a surprise when servers are a bit slow but this took it to another level. We ordered multiple things that never came or when it came it was wrong and when we informed the server of this he genuinely could not have cared less. I ordered a veggie lasagna which was good but as you cant even order a coffee at this establishment because it will never come (after ordering it like four times in a row) i will definitely not be back!', 'AVOID. There are places that are charming in their informality, and there are places that mask an underlying hostility to guests with a veneer of ‚Äúinformality.‚Äù This place is the latter.

We walked in at 4:15 pm on a Monday. The restaurant was 10% full. We spoke to the staff in French. We sat down, ordered wine and water, and waited. Nothing happened.

After a long time, we asked about our wine and requested a menu. We waited. The menu came out and we were told that they were out of the wine we ordered. We ordered another bottle, and our food.

We sat and waited. Nothing. Other tables were being served. Finally, after 40 minutes without anything - no wine, no food, not even a glass of water - we walked to the bar to ask about the delay. The bartender, who seemed to be the manager, was all full of attitude and replied that ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre very busy.‚Äù He lied and claimed we had only been there a short time.

He was spectacularly rude, and it was clear that he enjoyed toying with us for his pleasure and agenda. We were made to feel unwelcome here. And all they needed to do was tell us that instead of messing with us and wasting our time. Literally my worst experience in a lifetime of visiting and enjoying Paris.']

["The cheapest soft-drinks (~1 - 1.5‚Ç¨) and food (~9‚Ç¨) I found in my 4 days in Paris.
They were very accommodating and patient with non-French speakers.
It was pure chance me and the Boy's found this place and it excited me infinitely more to go back a second night, than going to the wrought-iron tower in the middle of Paris.
This is the real Paris.", "The atmosphere reminded us a bit of an American Diner. Since they didn't have an english Menu, we had a bit difficulties to order.

But: the meal itself was good and the size of the meal was extremely big! So for the small amount of money you get lots (!) of tasty food and it went quite fast.

It's not a fancy restaurant but as a diner very good.", 'As someone who only speaks english and was staying nearby they were nice everytime we came and made ordering so easy even if the menu is only in French

Super cheap and good food especially late at night', 'I was staying close to this venue and I went almost every day to eat there. Amazing food, good price and large servings. Pizza is amazing here btw', 'Really good food and soo juicey and rich of taste i recommend üëå']

['trash- i ordered food online they stole my money!no tracking was given,i called no one helped!dont eat here!thieves', 'Totally zero, everything is expensive for location,but service is zero', 'Very good service', 'Top', 'Pizzaüòç']

['My favorite french restaurant in Paris üñ§

We had diner in the terrace and we were accommodated by an extraordinary waitress by the name of Sandra who was ‚Äú√† nos petits soins‚Äù during our time there. Fantastic professional with a happy mood. I am glad she exists !

We recommend the restaurant', 'The food was very good and I can‚Äôt wait to go back for other items that were on the menu as we focused on the specials of the day. The owner is trying to save on waiting staff because they are simply unable to keep up with the customers so the service is very slow even though the wait staff are extremely friendly. It is a beautiful setting both indoors and outdoors, you really can‚Äôt go wrong but be prepared to wait!']

['The best onion soup and the most friendly waiters!', 'I came from England last month. I eat twice here in this bistro. This is a very nice place for spend times. ['We have discovered this restaurant and tried Ethiopian cuisine for the first time and have had a fantastic time.
The owner was very friendly, the food was exceptional. We also enjoyed the very cosy ambiance and the Ethiopian vibes.
We would definitely come again and recommend this place!', 'Another enjoyable meal at Abyssinia to close out 2024. Our neighborhood Ethiopian restaurant, we‚Äôve been coming here since it opened nearly 15 years ago. Family owned and operated, the food, atmosphere, and hospitality always combine to offer an enjoyable and memorable experience. Our usual order is their vegetarian ‚Äúsampler‚Äù plus another main. This evening, that main was gored gored, rare beef cubes in a moderately spicy sauce. Appearances can be deceiving ... that metal plate is about 14‚Äù across. As usual, we finished with an Ethiopian coffee.

Not far from central Paris, easy to reach on M√©tro line 3 or Tram 3b ... steps from the Porte de Bagnolet stop on either line.', 'The beef both non spicy and spicy are tasty, with nice melting onions. The lamb is soft, melting and tasty. The lentils and vegetable have a nice variety. All this in a lively decorated setting. Very welcoming. Kids love it all.', "Very dissatisfied. Small portions which I questioned from the onset but after tasting not at all what I'm used too. They ain't got nothing on LA!", 'The place is beautiful. The decoration and the writings all over the walls give such a welcoming atmosphere. The food is delicious. You have a vegetarian option. The service is impecable. The owner is super friendly. We were with kids and he was very patient with them.
I highly recommend the place if you look for a good Ethiopian restaurant.']

["Just go there. You can read the rest of this review, but you're just wasting time that could have been spent eating a delicious meal.

I was recently in Paris for business and my co-worker found Pierre Sang on yelp. We arrived as advised at 6:10 and were first in line when they opened at 6:30 on Saturday night. The line gets long enough so that everyone basically sits down at the same time, and then your 6 course meal (aka journey through paradise) begins. Every night is a new menu so it's not worth discussing specific plates. The chefs decide on the menu every day at 11, source the ingredients locally and then prepare it all live in front of you. The kitchen is no more than 80 square feet, but somehow they cram 6-7 people in there to make a delicious meal. They only ask you if you have any allergies and, if not, you're off to the races. The staff asks you to try and figure out the ingredients and in each course, there were at least 1-2 that I had never even heard of. The sommelier does a great job pairing champagne and wine glasses throughout the meal, so I wouldn't recommend getting a bottle.", "Looks like just another non-Japanese-run quick sushi place you find everywhere in Paris anymore; the surprise is the quality of their fish... and their reasonable prices. This is one of my two favorites sushi places around Gambetta. I order from them regularly and have never been disappointed. The staff is attentive and friendly. Deliveries arrive quickly. NB I reserve the fifth star because their miso soup and cabbage salad that come with a menu are nothing remarkable and there's nothing unusual on their menu.", 'The sushi is sometimes served too cold. Normal prices for Paris. Another typical japanese restaurant, nothing special. Occasionally they offer you a glass of juice while you wait for your take away order. Open until 23h.', 'This place hits the spot in the emporter department. The people are friendly and their food is on point.', "It's been a long time since I've been there, and the fish is still fresh (the sashimi is surprising!), the sushi is still excellent, and the skewers, whatever they are, are still just as good.

The staff also always makes a little effort when it comes to the presentation of the sashimi, which is appreciated.

There are now also frozen mochi for fans!"]

['It‚Äôs good and the chef is very nice, everything we like üëå', 'Warm welcome, fast and clean service (you can see them preparing everything). I liked their pizzas. ['A classic sushi place, reasonnable prices (for Paris) and quality on level with most of the other sushi places.', 'very Good', "I've been going there for several years and have never been disappointed!\nExcellent quality/price ratio", 'Very welcoming and warm staff in addition to being competent. ["This place is just great. The staff is very kind and helpful, the food is AWESOME and the atmosphere is lovely. I had my first escargot here. They have a great children's meal. I also ordered a pina colada but it was not good. So I returned it and asked for a house wine instead. ['Very nice place to have a coffee, a beer or a meal, good price. The service is very nice, specially the owner, best service in Paris. Recommended.', 'The tabac was difficult to find and the little girl who gave me the cigarettes was 15/16 years old which is illegal in France.', 'This is dodgy establishment.  DO NOT FREQUENT THIS RESTAURANT.  I was pick-pocketed on the metro and within 20 minutes there were a  charges of US$816.27 on my credit from this restaurant.

The person who pick-pocketed me was a tall, fit black man, 30ish, with a scruffy beard and a sling on his left arm (apparently used to conceal his theft).  He caused a slight commotion, bumping into me as if I was in his way to get off the metro, speaking rapidly and appearing to ask what stop it was. This was a stall tactic, and then as soon as the doors were ready to close he jumped out.  Not certain, but he may have had an accomplice in the metro who appeared to be empathetic - but could have alerted him that we were on to him. Also given the charges at different establishments (Le Marigny and Ronga) in such a short time, it is likely there was a third person involved as well.

See screenshot below for 2 of 3 charges.  Police report filed.', 'Very convenient cause it‚Äôs open everyday üëçüèº', 'Great place for coffee']

['One of the best hidden gems in Paris! The food is fresh and delicious, the staff is so kind and attentive, and the general vibes are amazing. ['Super good pastries, clearly the best of the street. Croissants are just ok and pain au chocolat are decent tho. On the expensive side and not much organic, but super good. Try the Rocher au chocolat, their version of the all time french classic "Eclair au chocolat". Never tried their brunch on saturdays and sundays but they are super sought after. Not fan of the decor of the place tho, nothing chic or comfortable. Looks like a garage.', "The atmosphere was perfect, with chilled music and a lovely rustic aesthetic. The brunch menu didn't feel like a British or American brunch with a lot of savory lunch food so we opted for breakfast instead. We  got a croissant, baguette, orange juice and coffee this filled us up just as much as a brunch normally would! The food was good but would of been a lot nicer with the baguette and croissant warmed for us. Overall a lovely place for breakfast! Worth a visit!", 'Savor the delectable pastries at this spot, highly praised for their freshness and rich flavors. Despite the delightful experience, exercise caution during payment, as I noticed a possible error post-departure, leaving a slightly bitter aftertaste when I realized I was charged around 35 Euros for an order that should have been around 20 Euros.', "Really nice and spacious bakery where you can find all the classic french pastries! Everything is freshly made and you can enjoy a nice hot chocolate or cup of coffee & tea with your friends or while working remotely. It's also kid friendly and the staff is very nice!", 'Bakery with absolute respect for the ingredients of sustainable farming and low carbon footprint sourcing. AOP butter, organic flour or ancient wheat, in-season and untreated fruits and vegetables. Weekend brunch service is by reservation only.']

["So far the best Indian I've had in Paris! Finally a place that isn't afraid of adding spices, like most of the places I've tried. The mixed grill starter was wonderful and the lamb as well, chicken not so much. Very friendly service.", 'soooo good! definitely recommend this place. we got the butter chicken and tikka masala. the servers and the manager were so friendly and had outstanding service! the cocktail was delicious, after dinner we got the dessert liquor and that was a perfect finishing touch', "If you're searching for an authentic Indian dining experience in Paris, look no further than this gem of a restaurant. After visiting several Indian restaurants in the city, I can confidently say that this one stands out as one of the best. The flavors are incredibly close to the authentic taste of India, making every dish a delightful journey for your taste buds.

Though it may not be located in the heart of the city, don‚Äôt let its location fool you‚Äîthis place is absolutely worth the visit. The warm and welcoming atmosphere, coupled with the delicious food, makes it a top-tier experience.

The owner, Asoke, is incredibly humble and genuinely cares about his customers. Every time I order from here, he goes above and beyond to make me feel at home. On multiple occasions, he‚Äôs surprised me with additional dishes at no extra cost, and I‚Äôve even received discounts as a token of appreciation for being a loyal customer.

In short, if you want an authentic taste of India with exceptional hospitality, this is the place to be. Highly recommended! 5 stars not enough!!", 'Food was good, but service slow‚Äîlikely due to understaffing. Staff were friendly and welcoming. Prices okay, but not exactly pocket-friendly. Improvement needed in taste and service speed.', 'Super Indian restaurant üòã in Paris . Originally Indian food. Extra ordinary service l really recommend this restaurant üëå']

Adresse: 33 Rue de la Chine, 75020 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Wonderful food and better service!! Superb quality and there are no bad words about it! Love to go there to enjoy lunch and their amazing offers', 'Good and reasonably priced beer, very good pizza, really nice staff, in a surprisingly serene part of neighbourhood (a bit off the beaten track of noisy crowded bars around Menilmontant). All in all, I recommend this place wholeheartedly :)', 'Nice bar in a quiet place lots of local people good beers and excellent homemade pizza\nService is nice and cordial!!', 'Lovely pizza nice beer chilled lunchtime atmosphere', 'Good pizzas and drinks. Nice service.']

['Nothing to add or take away. Its a 3 star store with convenient hours. Mediocre quality of products priced higher...', 'Clean and well maintained. No complaints.', "Very beautiful Franprix brought up to date, it's about time...Bravo", "The store has been refurbished and you can find a lot of things there and you can do your shopping without feeling like you're being spied on. Friendly staff who listen to the customer.", 'After a few weeks of work, the Franprix is \u200b\u200bbrand new! Gorgeous ! And the people who work there are very nice as before! It closes at 10 p.m.']

['The food was really good and the waiters are very friendly. I had steak with mushroom souse and IPA beer. They even let me taste beer before ordering.', 'We enjoyed our choice of meal for the last night in Paris.  For starters, we had snails with parsley, and charcuterie board, steak with mushroom sauce for our entree and Apple tart and crem√© brule√© with espresso double', 'Great bistro ! True Parisian atmosphere with amazing food and service . The duck dishes were exceptional  , cannot recommend enough!', 'Came in for lunch on the last day of 2018 right before I had to catch the coach to London at Gallieni. The staff were so kind and wonderful despite my inability to communicate with them in French, and even gave me an extra piece of foie gras and wished me a Happy New Year. (I‚Äôve been hunting for pan fried foie gras in Paris and I finally found it! It‚Äôs my favourite dish of all time, so this is extra special!) So wonderful and excellent service, will definitely return the next time I‚Äôm in Paris! Thank you guys for putting a huge smile on my face on my last meal in Paris! üòò', 'The waiters were really accommodating and understanding about our lack of French. The food was delicious and such a good price for Paris.\n\nWould absolutely recommend, especially the veal cutlet and the massive creme brulee (shown)!']

['Loved this store. The people are friendly and I found everything I need here. I am returning to America, but hope to be back soon.', 'Always open when you need it to be! Especially on Sunday afternoon evenings, earliest to open in the area every day', 'Good hours and good salad bar. Bit on the expensive side but a great late night option', 'Good store with local brand goods at reasonable prices', "Nice place, quite expensive but it's open everyday"]

['Great place, beautiful garden setting, delicious food and drinks.', 'Amazing atmosphere, good food, lovely staff', 'Super nice hidden garden, the restaurant is a great place for a quiet dinner.\nThe food is pretty good, so are the cocktails. The service is efficient, and the food and drinks are fairly priced', "Pizzas are good and not too expensive, although not completely filling, you should expect to need a starter or desert. The backyard is calm and nicely decorated, it's awesome during a sunny day.", 'Best fast food and unique dish available spice  very very delices  and with family break fast  expensive decoration Au fond du jardin osm view']

['Very disgusting place.i saw the guy who make pizza during preparation he used always his ph and not clean hands no gloves , the vegetable is on the floor.. uncleanliness.pizza have hair and rubbish . üò°the pizza preparing in another resto ( rue de la chine very very dirty place ) the mans are using phone and smoking .', "The guy that served us was super chill and welcoming. Went with the vegan option. Easily the best frikin' pizza around Paris. The portions are super filling which is quite tempting, of course. That, however, created a situation that I usually try to avoid. Since I did not manage to shake off the fruits of my large dinner last night with the morning coffee and cigarette, I am now in a state of panic, since I am too ashamed to unload the unneccessary load in a restaurant.\nWould defo recommend that place though.\n5 out of 5!", 'Good but only focaccia pizza and not a great place to sit down. More of a takeaway spot.', 'Atelier Fratteli has the yummiest focaccia I have ever tried. Lots of options to choose from, my favorite was the tartufo and the melanzana (aubergine). The menu also includes pastas and pizzas. Don‚Äôt miss out on the tiramisu that is so delicious.', 'Excellent salad and focaccia. Waiter was friendly and recommended great food to a couple of non-French speaking tourists.']

['So good, probably thought we were insane with how much food we consumed lol.', "Doesn't look catchy from the outside, but it is indeed an excellent small good value restaurant. Extremely fresh and tasty food, home made. No fuss, but charming service. We were six and we shall come back. Our kids enjoyed it.", 'Really nice, food was niceand well presented and the staff were great', 'Prices are good, food is tasty ü§ù‚ù§Ô∏è', "I still don't know much about Japanese foods"]

['Really good option for lunch in a reasonable price :)', 'Really good food. I‚Äôm not a fan of sushi, but my friends loved it. I got a few of the kebabs and they were very delicious.

Prices here are good considering my meal included a salad, soup, and rice.

We received some chex mix style (but way better) snack before the meal and a peanut and caramel desert after. Both of these were very tasty.

I forgot to snag a photo, but we might end up going back while we‚Äôre still in Paris.', 'Really nice, and great value for money at this chinese-japanese restaurant. I recommend the 3 course or 4 course menus for the best value overall.
Also the service is usually fast, and the owners are nice people!', 'Very good service and the best proposition for such a low price in Paris (you can order menu from 8,50 ‚Ç¨)', 'Great sushis with a friendly staff. :)']

['A fantastic meal and great service. We had delicious Algerian couscous and meat and enjoyed an evening watching the Olympics with their projector screen. Great Belgian beers and deserts too. Would recommend!', 'great food, nice service and good prices ‚ò∫Ô∏è merci beaucoup!', 'Try it! You will be satisfied!', "Very nice staff and food. The service was a lot better than what I'm used to.\nOverall a very nice place.", 'They fooled me, saying 3.9 for a beer but they charged 9.3 in the card.']

['Come back after more than 2 years. The place is nice, with good food and good prices. Servicies are good and fast. Indiana burger was good. At 17:30 the place was not full of people and we found a table easy.', 'This place was better than expected. Delicious food, nice staff and good drinks. I would definitely come back. Prices are not really high, with 20-30‚Ç¨ you can have good meal with beverages.', 'Neghiborhood American style restaurant and bar. American music good comfort food. The waitress was very helpful. Good service and good food
Great cocktails and have sports
Football On TV
Outside seating good coffee
Recommended', 'Excellent service, welcoming atmosphere, great food and a wonderful choice for a night with friends. We look forward to returning before our departure!', 'my husband and I were really happy with the service provided by Raphael. the food was great, we had lunch there, wine and beer. I‚Äôd definitely recommend. good prices and good amount of food.']

Adresse: Place Gambetta, 7 Face Mairie du, 75020 Paris, France
Reviews: ['"Had a great experience at this McDonald\'s! The staff was friendly, my order was prepared quickly, and the food was fresh and delicious. A reliable spot for a quick and satisfying meal!"', "I love the service and fast service. I met the person called Wilson who's service and client approach is excellent and really appreciate hid work and hospitality in McDonald.keep the same maintenance svp", 'Very good work on time service and manager is a very smart and kind smiley person ‚Ä¶ merci McDonalds', "They were out of a lot of stuff when I went and the wait was long. Ended up having my sundae with a fork and that took a while. Probably understaffed. Can't beat the AC and free WiFi on a hot day traveling!", 'Jordan is a great guy and the maxi best of is one the best of its kind in Paris. It‚Äôs my favourite!']

['Bar top üëç', 'Cool', 'Positive things:
- Friendly owner and staff
- Possibility of following TV and football on match days
- Well located in a dynamic area in the middle of food stores, pharmacies...

Negative thing:
- A bit dated place. I think the bar deserves a little touch of modernity and decoration', "I went to this bar for two of my best friends' birthdays.

They tell me:
- ‚Äúwe‚Äôre going to celebrate our birthday at Le M√©nil!\xa0¬ª
I retort - ‚ÄúLe M√©nil-Vicomte, this pretty French commune located in the Orne department in the Normandy region, populated by 25 inhabitants?\xa0¬ª
‚ÄúWell no big losers the bar located 299 rue des Pur√©n√©es in the 20th‚Äù she answers me.
- ‚Äúah‚Äù
-‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.\xa0¬ª

So it was with great anticipation that I headed towards this bar and what was my surprise!

Bar pillars sitting in front with their coffee cigarette combo to welcome me (photo supporting), an infinite happy hour, it's not a joke until 2 a.m. he was still active like he doesn't want to cooldawn the brother as well as a LDC final with no delay on TV.

I still have a few negative points to note! And yes it is unfortunately not perfect unlike the Spas-12 akimbo from MW2.
-The music arrived in a snow plow so we waited 2 hours before being able to listen to FM darling
-A tavern owner on Xanax
-No Pokestop

I remain satisfied with the evening, park further down to find a space because there is none in front.", 'Pleasant breakfast for good value for money with the boss who is wonderfully kind, I recommend!']

["The bar is under new management and the new owners are amazing! We hosted a screening in the bar and they were unbelievably kind and accommodating. It was a great evening. The bar has a lovely atmosphere and they have installed a screen so it's perfect for film screenings. I cant recommend it enough both as a bar and a place to host an event :)", 'Good atmosphere, friendly and helpful staff, and very reasonable prices', 'Super bar !', 'Super bar !', 'Super nice location and cool staff']

['üëçüèºüëçüèº', 'Smiling and professional welcome, very good Qorma chicken and tasty veggie dish before the show, it was perfect!', 'I really enjoyed it, you really feel that it‚Äôs homemade and that it‚Äôs made with love. Several times I come to eat here and I am never disappointed, their carrot cake is delicious and the dishes are incredible!', 'the best restaurant in Paris...the food is really delicious and almost everything is good...I love it', 'A succulent meal, fresh produce, the main course, the dessert, the drink, and even the tea at the end, everything was perfect!

The welcome from the chefs is also rare and precious, gentleness and kindness are also on the menu!

We will come back with pleasure']

Nom: RESTAURANT INDIEN PARIS - AU COEUR DE L'HIMALAYA - SUR PLACE - LIVRAISON - EMPORTE
Reviews: ['We loved the food there.. the taste was delicious..will love to come back again..', 'Ordered food here. Below average taste and definitely overpriced.', 'I ordered 15 naan fromages. Most of them badly burned. 64‚Ç¨ gone to trash. Party ruined and friends upset. Highly recommend you guys to order somewhere else.', 'The salesman was condescending toward me and my partner when we came in looking for new glasses (frankly, it\'s too bad because the prices seemed pretty reasonable at this shop). My partner was trying on a pair she liked when he came over and had her try on a couple of pairs that he picked out. He asked what I thought about them and when I admitted that I didn\'t like them because they were both too pink for my taste, he made a weird "joke" making fun of *my* glasses, calling them "masculine" and implying that I don\'t have good taste I guess. I ignored it but he repeated it 2 or 3 more times and then said it was just a joke, when I didn\'t laugh along with him. I was a bit shocked and didn\'t know what to say at the time. I just found it unprofessional and unpleasant, to the point where I\'m still turning it over in my head a couple hours after the fact. Buying glasses is a kind of strangely intimate thing and people want to be listened to and validated, not shamed for their tastes and opinions. It turned me off to the whole thing and so I didn\'t bother trying anything on.', 'The food is great, the overall menu is a bit pricy, but I definitely believe that the quality is there to counterbalance the extra money. I feel bad for them seeing their rating, they deserve better.']

Adresse: 30 Rue Villiers de l'Isle Adam, 75020 Paris, France
Reviews: ['This restaurant in Paris, right below the Hotel Saint Germain where we stayed, is a must visit. The food, service, atmosphere, location, is perfect. One of my Fav was the fresh green peas salad as an entree. As a guest of the hotel mentioned, we were given priority reservations which made it very convenient for our breakfast and dinner planning. We had a fabulous time.', 'An absolutely charming gem hidden in the 20th district, well worth your time and effort to get there (reservations are a must). Service is very friendly and professional, meals are of the highest quality, healthy and original, and the wine list is stunning. We shall definitely return!', 'Burrata with tomatoes and steak were especially good. Great wines. Love the place! Recommend', 'My favorite local restaurant. There‚Äôs always at least one veg option (sometimes even 2!), the ambiance is great, friendly service. Recommended!', 'Beautiful romantic setting. The loveliest staff and excellent French food.']

Nom: Chacha & Companie - Restaurant de Fruits de Mer
Reviews:
['We saw this beautiful display of fresh seafood while walking by, and I am so glad we have entered here to have our last meal in Paris! Food was incredible and super fresh! Octopus is a must try, incredibly tender, and seafood platter was out of this world, nicely complimented with different sauces and great bread and olive oil!', "Imagine being in the big city for the first time, being intimidated by the chaotic exuberance of city of light, this place is rightfully the antidote to put your anxiety at ease. The homey atmosphere, the friendly nature of the owners, and the lovely taste of the sea all caress you into this state of comfort and warmth even in the coldest of days. The oysters and the chardonnay are truly to die for, and if you order the Oceane menu, you're in for an authentic surprise! Give it a shot!", 'Fresh seafood', 'Very mediocre', 'Thanks to The Fork and the restaurant for the great discount.
The products are fresh, we ordered a Deauville platter and 50 cl of white wine.
Some seafood was missing, so the very friendly waitress replaced it with what was available.
I recommend thank you']

["Maybe the worst shop in Paris, the peremption date are not watched, and the promotion not really interessant (for us of course). At the front of the shops it's a lot of gypsy who insist for have a money or something.", 'Small, nice, has the essential things.', 'Correct', 'What a pleasure to enter this Franprix and have a security guard who sticks to your backside and only follows you. What is the point of giving the customer the impression of being spied on? You‚Äôre just a Franprix, not Herm√®s, don‚Äôt worry.', 'Cashiers removed by machines but opened Not for fear of theft\nEndless waiting at checkouts and always the feeling that you are considered a thief']

['Excellent !', 'Rude staff', 'Correct', 'Not surprised to see that the reviews are VERY negative about this store.

In short: a spirit of customer service well below the minimum that can be expected
- lack of empathy regarding the unavailability of the machine
- mockery of the client in the face of a justified request for a written declaration
- repeated lies about real downtime

Detail:
Casual attitude to announce that you will have to come back the next day to collect a package that arrived the same day.
Laugh from the cashier when, after asking to see the manager and having heard again that withdrawal would not be possible, I ask to receive a written document confirming this unavailability.
(Note: the manager indicated to this employee the inappropriate nature of this laughter.)

Insisting on finding a solution and being able to collect my package the same day, I was then told that the machine simply no longer had any battery!
I was then asked to come back 2 hours later (around 9:30 p.m.!). After insisting again, I was told that a 15-minute wait would ultimately be enough.', "There are 12 of us waiting in line, so I go to see a young woman in the aisle sitting on the floor tidying up. I ask her if she can't open the second checkout. She replies: well, my colleague just has to call me, What professionalism wow!!
Seeing the queue getting even longer, her colleague calls her and well she won't come, she continues sitting on the ground Putting away her boxes of tea.
Management should perhaps learn to manage their staff, especially since there is Carrefour City 50 m away where this kind of problem will never happen."]

['Clean place, warm and fast food', "They unfortunately prioritise the big orders; which means I had to wait 25 minutes for my hamburger & 4 chicken nuggets.
I didn't feel like a customer. The lady who handed me the food seemed uninterested. I got my food shoved in my hands. All I heard was mumbling.
The building is okay, but definitely not cosy or anything.
My experience could differ from yours, however.", "It was similar to any Irish McDonalds Fast food outlet but it didn't serve any vegetarian options so my daughter just had chips. Cheap and cheerful and the food was hot and premises tidy.", 'long long wait', "I definitely do not recommend that place. I didn't get my change and the order I have received was incomplete. Not to mention the fact that I had to wait 15 minutes (it wasn't a busy night) to get my food which was cold. People who work here are really unfriendly and seem not to bother about the customer."]

['Very Nice bistro with good food, waitress was very helpful and friendly as well üòä', 'Very nice spot. Caf√© and croissant for 2 Euros. The terrasse is great', 'Lovely sidewalk cafe. Excellent selection of beers and cheese & cold cuts.', 'Not bad, it could be better...', 'Nice typical cafe, nice spot']

['Lovely little cafe.

Stopped here in June 2023 and had a nice experience, was a brunch stop and had a lovely coffee and a club sandwich (in the photos).

Service was nice and friendly and prices are as I would expect. Nice view of the fountain and people watching.', 'Food was good, value for money a bit low. Slow but friendly service.', 'Friendly service, quality food.', 'Delicious french food and friendly service in a bar setup.', 'Beautiful meal, great steak, fantastic prawn Thai curry, lots of big prawns, gorgeous sauce. Very reasonable prices. Two meals, half litre of house white ‚Ç¨48. I would highly recommend this restaurant.']

Adresse: 14 Av. du P√®re Lachaise, 75020 Paris, France
Reviews:
['I wish I could give this place six stars. It‚Äôs one of my favourite spots in Paris. The owner is kind and likes to chat. They have excellent live music, and the menu is fantastic.

Something that sets this place apart: I saw live music here one night, and the way they treated the artists says a lot about the place. The owners were kind and supportive. They passed the hat and encouraged people to give what they could to support the musicians. Then, after the performance, they stayed and chatted with the artists for a few hours and fed them an amazing three-course meal along with some excellent wine.

This isn‚Äôt the kind of thing you see very often. Well worth a visit if you have the chance. Highly recommended!', 'Amazing food, nice ambiance - thats the place to eat and drink like a french !', 'Lovely Betty welcomed us with redwine ü•∞', 'Very delicious Argentinian stake', 'Home food nice place for real food']

['Bertrand was brilliant and would highly recommend! He supported us at an event and was great with guests and to work with! His crepes were amazing too!!', 'Bertrand was a great crepes chef who not only educated our international students but entertained them with his amazing crepes making skills. Bertrand is one of very few crepes chefs in Paris who is fluent in English and able to entertain while making his delicious crepes.', 'The BEST cr√™pe class in Paris!
Bertrand and Stephane are the BEST! They taught us how to make the most delicious cr√™pe in Paris. They are very patient with us and helped us to have fun in making cr√™pes. You can also check out their Instagram (@crepecookingclassparis) and his YouTube Chanel: Cr√™pes Magiques
SO MUCH FUN!!!', "We hired Bertrand to make crepes for our office this week - it has been one of the best things we've ever done! He was prompt, organized, the crepes were so homemade and delicious. Will absolutely hire again. Thank you Bertrand!", 'We were able to hire Betrtrand for the backstage catering of Bruce Springsteen Tour 2023 in Paris.
Everybody was thrilled with his great creations and  he worked with a lot of enthusiasm. It was a great success! We are happy to recommend Bertrand and his Crepes Magiques!
By the way, he speaks very good German! Thank you very much!']

Adresse: 11 Rue Dupont de l'Eure, 75020 Paris, France
Reviews: ['A lovely down-to-earth restaurant with amazing food. I absolutely loved each dish, from starters to the dessert, and discovered new delicious see food - solen. Great ambience, perfect flavors, good service. I was only missing some more vegetarian options.', "The food is ok. As a vegan I struggled to had the right option to find. And finally there was still some cream on the Daal, that tasted more like milk cream than vegan one. Paris is really a hard place for vegans. They need to learn to respect animals life's. I was there with the company for a lunch, can't blame the organizing person. And the others looked happy eating their dead beef and pork.", 'Food was delicious and well priced. There were a few vegetarian items too that were nicely done. A bit shabby but friendly atmosphere.', 'What a wonderful menu, ambiance and location. Proprietors Stefan, Curtis and waiting staff offered a first class service with delicious food and a friendly, professional and delightful charm. Welcoming to all & clearly becoming a ‚Äòmust visit‚Äô hotspot of Olonzac. For locals and tourists alike. So good that we returned on another night. Delicious Moroccan carrots, croquettes and chicken. Caters for vegetarians as well as meat & fish lovers. A must visit. Dr Emma Ramsden', 'Looks great but taste bad. And the service is worst. Your paying for the name the brand. Don\'t waste your money and time. We ordered two main plates of "fresh" beef skewers. One of them was ordered well done and the second normal. Both were more gum then meat. We couldn\'t eat them. So we took the rest for the dog. We paid full for the amount with no discount nor any free desert even though we told the service that we were not satisfied at all. They did offer us a new meal but its the same meat so the end result would have been the same. Anyways would never go there again. This is my professional opinion as a traveler Google employee.']

Adresse: 2 Pl. du Maquis du Vercors, 75020 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Fun, inviting and unpretentious rooftop terrace with a relaxed vibe, great happy hour prices until 9 pm, good pizzas and chill music. The only drawback is the perfectly awful ‚Äúmean girl‚Äù bartendress who clearly takes a perverse pleasure in being as egregious and nasty as possible to every customer.', 'Lovely and spacious terrace, with great pizza and wine and that too in affordable prices! Although I didnt particularly enjoy the live music that much.', 'Very bad food', 'Just one of the best parisian roof top', 'Nice view']

['We enjoyed dinner here on a Saturday night without a reservation. The staff was so friendly and the food was absolutely amazing. Highly recommend visiting and enjoying a nice meal with family and friends. Great selection of wine and appetizers.\nThank you for the great food and service ‚Äî and we appreciate that the staff spoke English üòä', 'Went for quick lunch between meeting. Staff was helpful and understanding. Food was good.', 'Authentic Italians serving authentic flavors. Pizza was remarkably good. And the rest of the food was very agreeable for our party.  Admittedly we‚Äôre Americans but we do recognize good Italian food when we have it.\nWorth trying. Especially if you want a good selection of very familiar foods.', "While in France I had a taste for Italian food. We stumbled upon this restaurant and thought it was a great find. However, we ran into some issues. The service was not very timely and drinks took a long time even though they weren't busy. We ordered brussetta and it was chopped tomatoes on wheat toast without Olive oil or flavor. I decided that I didn't want the appetizer and change my order to just a basic Margarita pizza. The server was not happy that I changed my order and it took a very long time for the pizza to come out. If I were there longer, I would love to try this place again but at this time I wouldn't recommend it for a dinner option.", 'Food was kind of flavorless. Wouldn‚Äôt get the carbonara again, rather bland. The bruschetta was indeed of olive oil. The bread was served with no butter or dipping oil. People around me had pizza and that looked good. Service was very friendly.']

['Great place. Conveniently next to Hyatt. Came for dinner order lamb with rosemary, butchers cut beef, French onion soup and tomato with Burrata starters.\nFrench onion soup I‚Äôve tried for the first time and realized I don‚Äôt like it. It was prepared well and I had no issues with it just not to my taste buds. The lamb meat was cooked well, but the sauce I didn‚Äôt like. The Burrata and tomatoes were fantastic.', 'This restaurant deserves much more than its actual rating. We had a fantastic dinner in this brasserie yesterday. Everything was perfect starting with the fresh and fine oyster selection and finishing with their delicious homemade tarte tatin. The baguette and butter were fresh and tasty, the lamb and its rosemary sauce were outstanding, and the sides, such as the salad, the garlic potatoes, and the homemade mayonnaise with mustard, were delicious. You could say there is a chef here who knows how to cook the classical French cuisine. The service was brasserie style, professional, and friendly. This is the place to go if you are looking for an authentic experience at a fair price. We received an excellent recommendation and would give it further. Thank you for having us.', 'Conveniently located next to the Hyatt. I heard they had bone marrow and it had been a while for me so I had to try it. With two large bones, it was some of the best I‚Äôve ever had. So buttery and smooth. I paired it with a Bordeaux for a perfect early evening. The service was great and I had a nice view of the bustling city. I‚Äôd definitely return to try more dishes.', "We were a group of 6 and we liked every dish we ordered.  Both food & service was awesome, and it's just next to Hyatt.\nWe ordered, Scallops, clams, lamb and out of the desserts, Rum baba was great. Wone we were served was great aswell", 'thank you for 2 memorable nights. Great atmosphere , we really enjoyed the decoration of the space . Really fresh and tasty seafood. There are especially two amazing waiters or metre one with total black suite']

["Awesome shop, cheaper prices than many others in central Paris and the shop keepers are very friendly.\n\nEspecially Milou, who give you the best customer service in exchange for some scritches. (but he doesn't bother customers unless they call for him, so the shop is still suitable for non-cat fans)", 'As a first time visitor to Paris (who does not speak French), I braced myself for ‚Äúthe rude French‚Äù. I have been very pleasantly surprised by the warm response I have received everywhere, including this Carefour location. The staff (2 men) went out of their way to help me, and did so very pleasantly even though my French is limited to few words. Thank you for making this American feel welcome!', 'Open till late with good grocery options at reasonable prices.', "I like because it's open all week", 'Super !!']

["This place is a 10/10. It's a fancy fine dine yet feels very homely. Ony and Samuel were incredibly warm and took the time to explain the dishes to us. We tried the Ravioli della casa, and it was the best Ravioli we‚Äôve ever had. We highly recommend visiting if you‚Äôre in Paris. Special shout out to Samuel, for being extremely helpful and sweet.", 'Really top notch service and ambiance. Love their unique spin on appetizers/starters!  Excellent dishes and (French?) interpretation on Italian food!  A must if you are in the area!  We were staying at our third of 3 hotels in Paris - La Villa des Ternes.  Found it via Google maps.  Looks modern/intimate compared to other Italian joins in the area. Again Excellent service.', 'The Norcia pasta was great, and the eggplant starter was also delicious.

Really nice staff and good vibe (will be even better when the tram is completed).

The bread was awesome too, like a baguette out of pizza dough or something? So good.

Thanks for having us.', 'Italian style recognisable from far distance through the place‚Äôs design, the presence of small olive trees outside and olive bottles spread around to decor the place giving it a cosy atmosphere. As an Italian, I can assure that the food is genuine and the quality exceeded our expectations. The staff is really friendly and patient with demanding clients and we felt like if back in Italy whilst spending time in France so having a really memorable experience!', 'We were the first ones in at 7, and Ony and Samuel took great care of us! Great food, great service, and even a happy birthday song. Constant service, and smiles. We‚Äôll be back.']

Adresse: 1 Pl. du G√©n√©ral K≈ìnig, 75017 Paris, France
Reviews:
["Unacceptable... Working right next door, I have been going to this restaurant for a long time, and I have seen the quantities decrease drastically over the months (which is in line with previous reviews, it does not seem to be trivial). To these remarks to the staff, I am told that these are the directives... Ah, profit, profit, profit

Today, we have reached the heights... the base only has a few pastes, and the quantities of ingredients are derisory.

In the photo the salad of the day (Yes, with 4 ingredients! ham, avocado, corn, mozzarella), now half filled with its container, with a small dessert (mango), ‚Ç¨14...

Thank you, but given the quantities and the price, it's making fun of the world. If you're looking for a place to have lunch, go ahead...", 'I am a regular customer at your restaurant in Porte Maillot. For several days I have had the immense joy of finding the fridge filled with salads, drinks and desserts unusable. In addition, since there is no air conditioning, it is unbearable to eat in your restaurant. The waiting time is excruciatingly long even though the service is usually quite fast. So I left without having any salads.
For almost a week I have noticed the poor working conditions of your employees. It is unacceptable and inhumane to let people work in such conditions. The heat is getting worse and worse, react!

Sincerely,

Ms ISTROFI', 'A regular since the opening, I am very disappointed.
The welcome is borderline polite, and the proportions have been reduced by half for the same price.
Any complaint is brushed aside with the smug ‚Äúit‚Äôs THE dose!‚Äù But actually, what dose??
