['Th√© senior cashier or Manager (probably) tried to stop me from making purchases 10 min before closing time. I was honored to have 2 minutes for everything, and even still it was 20:22, he forced me to finish . I would appreciate if you will change working hours to 20:20, because it doesn‚Äôt work after this time . Otherwise, other staff was incredibly polite.', 'Just bought some grocery from their store early evening today.
Products are well arranged so as the fruits and vegetables.
So you can find what you need right away. Thank you. Mersi :)', "If it was possible to give 0 stars, I would have done so. Firstly the prices are high, secondly the store is small and thirdly the cashier is very polite.... I wanted to buy a pack of cakes for my snack, just a little clarification, I don't have a credit card. I told her I was paying in cash and she replied: ''NO, I don't have change'' in a manner. Now, respect no longer exists?... It can happen to no longer have change but to be poorly polite, to not say sorry... It's unacceptable, I don't recommend it at all. RUN AWAY!!", 'I went shopping in this store one morning at the end of May. There is a big problem with cleanliness, shelving and a lack of sympathy from the manager who speaks very badly to employees and customers. TO FLEE WHEN THIS MAN IS THERE.
On the other hand, I came back a few days ago and in the afternoon there was nothing wrong.
The store is cleaner and more organized.
The shelves are tidy and put back in order regularly as these photos show.
There is a big gap between morning and afternoon staff.
Good advice if you want to do your shopping in good conditions and meet pleasant and professional staff; GO THERE IN THE AFTERNOON AND RUN AWAY IN THE MORNING.', 'Very well stocked store, product shelves organized in a professional manner, adapted to customer needs. The welcome is very warm. The customer is always very well informed by the store manager, St√©phane, who leads his team in an efficient and correct manner. Thanks to its management, this area is always very well maintained, clean, and it is always pleasant to come back to do your shopping.']

['Mezzencore has become our go-to for delicious, healthy meals! We tried the shawarma meat and kafta, and they were fantastic choices‚Äîboth flavorful and satisfying. The seasoning was spot-on, and the quality of the ingredients truly stood out. We absolutely adore these dishes and look forward to trying more. Highly recommended for anyone looking for tasty yet healthy options!', "This was the first time I tried Lebanese food but it was a very pleasant experience. We had no idea what to order, so we just chose randomly, but in light of their taste and quality, we could've chosen anything. Portions are not huge, but they are savory and flavorful, all the ingredients have great texture, make people crave for more after every bite.", "Rice Pudding!!! OMG, it was just delicious. We tried rose and strawberry pudding and it was just too good. Had a veggy falafel wrap. falafel were good but the hummus was okay, not bad but wasn't extra ordinary. Don't have a whole lot of seating if you're planning to sit and eat. Although, if you're around here, just go in for Riz Au Lait!", 'The best Shawarma , healthy, clean and very very fresh!!!\nfriendly staff friendly service I LOVE THIS PLACE , highly recommended to try out! Also nice sweet‚Äôs and best Greek beer üéâ', "I love Lebanese food and as I told you I'm a really complicated person as far as food is concern ... so each times I want to eat real, authentic Lebanese sandwich, achawarma, I go there. You'll be well received,  the vegetables are fresh tasty and you will also come back . I recommend ü•∞‚ù£‚ù£"]

['Fantastic hotel and ideally located. The room was fantastic - comfortable, clean and superbly decorated. The staff were all very helpful and friendly and the restaurant was very, very good. A real gem of a place that I am sure we will return to.', "One of my favourite hotels in Paris, it's like a home away from home! The decor is beautiful and it's always pristine, the staff are so friendly. Ilam was so helpful and friendly during my stay which I really appreciated when answering questions and extending my stay. I would 100% recommend and look forward to coming back.", 'This was a great hotel. We were there for almost a week and did not want to leave. The location is perfect; the staff were charming and helpful; the restaurant was exquisite; the rooms were extremely comfortable. We will certainly return.', 'I stayed at Hotel Eldorado in early December and it was perhaps one of the best hotel experiences I‚Äôve ever had. I can‚Äôt thank Elham enough for going above and beyond answering all my questions and making sure my stay was comfortable. She was incredibly warm and friendly, and it‚Äôs obvious she takes pride in creating a memorable experience for all guests. The hotel itself was incredibly clean and located in a great neighborhood ‚Äî it‚Äôs easy to get around the city by train or bus from here. The rooms are decorated beautifully. If you love a maximalist aesthetic, then look no further. Overall it was a wonderful experience and I would absolutely stay here again when in Paris!', 'The restaurant is beautiful with very good food as well as a fine selection of wines.
Staff‚Äôs very cordial and attentive and the setting is picturesque.

Their Millefeuille is a must have !']

['The service was great. They even had an injera made with Teff. The food was good but a bit oily. Some of the prices on the menu were updated, though. Overall, I had a great experience.', 'Excellent food. Great address for authentic Ethiopian food. They were out of my preferred dessert unfortunately.', 'Menelik Ethiopia Restaurant in Paris is a must-visit for anyone looking to try something new and exciting. Offering authentic and unique Ethiopian cuisine, it‚Äôs a delightful experience that immerses you in rich flavors and culture. From the warm hospitality to the traditional dishes like injera and tibs, every bite is unforgettable. You won‚Äôt regret visiting this place.', 'One of my best restaurants when I want to take a break and a culinary journey around a new gastronomy. An explosion of flavor and a blend of spices that remains sweet, tasty and slightly spicy. There is something for every taste. The meat is halal for Muslims and there are also vegetarian options. The staff is so welcoming, smiling and warm! I like going to this restaurant because I feel everyone is welcome. We find a clientele with a wide range of cultural differences and we are all there to appreciate this moment of delicacy and this gastronomic parenthesis. I recommend all the chicken dishes and especially the one with the typical Ethiopian cheese. Remember to book for the weekend car the restaurant is doing a kind of ceremony for Ethiopian coffee, you will not be disappointed! In any case, this is the address I remember when I have friends/family visiting me in Paris and wanting to discover something new. The restaurant is located in the northwest of Paris and remains very easily accessible by public transport. Regarding the value for money, it is around 17-18‚Ç¨ per person for food and excluding drinks and it is even worth a little more than this price given the quality of the products and the service!', "As I have never been to Ethiopia, I can't say for the authenticity of the cuisine but it was delicious and definitely a new experience (especially eating with my hands! But don't worry, you have a bottle of disinfectant on every table)\n\nThe service was excellent! Very warm and welcoming :) I also really like that they offered a fizzy beverage on the house while you contemplate your menu. It's not much but little things like that definitely do add to the quality of the service."]

['While in Paris, I was looking for the best dining immersive experience as we are obsessed with anything immersive. When googling up, Le Wagon Bleu came up pretty much all the time on various website. The experience was far from impressive. First you have to go through a very busy and loud bar. We thought we were in the wrong place at first. The restaurant itself looks old and not as pretty as the photos online. The food was good but not mind blowing. The atmosphere was rather quiet as not a lot of people were there. The staff was very friendly.', 'A quick search on restaurants to find some dinner on a late night which was our first day in Paris took us to Le Wagon Bleu. We were lucky to get a table inside the Wagon as this place was pretty packed. There were 3 beautiful girls who hosted and waited on us and they were so kind and fluent in English which helped us a lot. The wine they recommended was amazing. Their food was fabulous! We ordered the Magret de canard and a burger. It was so fresh and tasty we just loved it. The prices were really reasonable! Very good ambiance as well. Will definitely recommend to everyone and we will visit this place again!', 'The place was full when we arrived so we ate in the "bar" space, not the wagon. It was a bit crowded and staff seemed a bit overwhelmed at first, but it got better and quicker. The starters were very good, the 4 of us were quite happy with our choices. The happy hour included a couple of drinks for 5 EUR, which was nice although limited in choice. My disappointment and the reason I give only 3 stars is the burger. I took the "2B", and for 17 EUR, I thought it wasn\'t good enough! You know, just ok, but nothing to remember - same for the fries, quite average and no mayonnaise or something to sublime them a little. I think you can find better burgers for a better price elsewhere. But still, nice place, and maybe the other main dishes are more satisfying!', 'Nice cute little place near the Metropolitan metro station in Paris. Food was amazing and had large portion size.', 'This was a great find to stumble after a quick stop at a barbershop nearby. Located near the Rome metro station, it‚Äôs a quaint place that‚Äôs actually an old train car. Really neat and the food was pretty good too. You can enjoy a meal while watching the trains come and go below you.']

Adresse: 69 Place du Dr F√©lix Lobligeois, 75017 Paris, France
Reviews:
["Pizza was very delicious, the Umami flavours were strong and tasty.
Mocktails were so good and tasted perfect.

The waitresses are so nice and polite...

I'm really happy.", 'I ordered a 4 cheese pizza but was very dry and missing Gorgonzola cheese. It needed more cream to soften it. Pasta was good.', 'Do not waste your time. Pathetic service.
Happy hour advertised but not respected. I chose a drink on the menu but the server REFUSED to serve it to me. I was forced to get something else but not what I wanted. I regret not leaving instantly.', 'Everything was so great about this place. I mean to start off, it has a great atmosphere and the waiter was very friendly. And the food was even more outstanding. It couldn‚Äôt have been better! I truly recommend this restaurant.', 'Such a lovely place, the staff were all so friendly offering us an English menu because we don‚Äôt speak French! Food was amazing such a wide range to choose from we had the pasta bolognaise and carbonara, We didn‚Äôt have to wait long either. Would highly recommend, one of the highlights of our trip here.']

["Absolutely delicious!! First time eating here, and I'm already missing it. Very little seating in the restaurant, looks like they do a lot of take out and delivery.  Service was fast and the food was absolutely amazing.   I had never had Bo-Bun before, but will now be looking for it in the US.", 'The server spoke good English, the portions were quite large and well priced. Tried the beef bo bun and tasted very good.', 'The food was beyond expectations and had a fair price. Taste of the bo bun was great (one of the best ones I‚Äôve ever tasted). Loved the pho‚Äôs texture and the soup‚Äôs taste. Staff was also friendly.\nÁúüÁöÑÂæàÂ•ΩÂêÉ‰∏ÄÂÆöË¶Å‰æÜ', 'Taste very good like the original asian cuisine in Asia.  The table  and seat are vary limited..', 'Very friendly staff and tasty food. Unfortunately the portions are a little small for the price, the egg rolls have a bit too much dough. The noodles are good, the regular Bo is a more tasty than the wok fried option.\nI would not recommend the desserts.']

["One of the restaurants on rue de brochant
The server was wonderful! And opened up the restaurant for us close to nearly midnight which was very kind.
We had the dessert touchocode magali which was just okay.
He cream served with it was quite airy and fulfilling.
The restaurant needs to up it's menu to attract crowds.
They have a decent selection of drinks and are priced well", 'Love it, Love it, Love it.
Pablo was excellent, super nice, friendly and kind.
Made us feel like family.
Delicious food and the place itself is magic, great concept to combine art with a restaurant.
The place is so attractive and inviting.
You will love and enjoy it too', 'Nice place with efficient staff and excellent chef.
I recommend the Petit Boudin, traditional French receipe, revisited to its best.', 'Outstanding food. Chilled atmosphere. Great team. Take the St Jacques, you won‚Äôt regret it!', 'While the restaurant is open through the day, no food is served between midday and the usual for Paris 6 or 6:30 pm. Nothing is said about it on the site. Three stars for the fact that the lady has shown me the way to seemingly the only place in Batignolles where you could actually eat.']

['The sushi (and other food) is always delicious and the owner is always very polite and attentive. The price is more than reasonable for the quality.
The place is a bit small for eating in but the food is worth it. Or you can take out.

A real local gem.', 'Incredible fresh Sushi. Really helpful staff, inexpensive and super tasty. Felt like a lot of care was taken and it was presented so well for a take away.
They even gave us a complementary Miso and desert. We will definitely be going back.
Sorry no photos, too busy walloping the lot.', "Excellent authentique Japanese üáØüáµ

The restaurant provides various and well-known Japanese dishes e.g. sushi, sashimi, and bento

The food was as good as the dessert. Unfortunately there's very limited place to eat in.", 'Delicious sushi place, rice is perfectly cooked (rare in Paris). Fish quality is high and food looks authentic. I recommend :)', 'A wonderful, tiny spot for super fresh, delicious Japanese food. Sushi was excellent, as was the bento. Very friendly owner. Very much recommended.']

['Excellent food, the meat (chef‚Äôs selection) was delicious, the mashed ü•î that come as a side was delicious. Additionally, the staff (particularly Victoria) are awesome, she help us with some questions about getting to know France. \U0001faf6üèΩ 10/10 place.', 'Delicious food and friendly staff. The meat ü•© was to die for! We started with the marrow bones which were very tasty (my girlfriend didn‚Äôt love the texture, but this is an acquired taste). The salad was fresh and the wine just on point. Totally recommended \U0001fae1', 'Been here several times, totally recommend the ‚Äúescargot tempura‚Äù, and their meet is overall good. The artichoke starter lacked a bit of flavor.', 'Good value for money.
Service was a bit disconnected, the waiters rushed us and were stressed since my party wasn‚Äôt there 5 minutes after the hour.
Had the steak for two, which was cooked and sliced beautifully. Had better ones before, but it was good one flavouring wise.
Good wine selection and inexpensive.', 'Delocious bone marrow and beef tartare at reasonable price']

['Excellent place for a traditional Lebanese lunch/dining experience: the food is awesome, the service is fast, professional, and friendly, the atmosphere is right.
Opt for the menu if it‚Äôs your first encounter with Lebanese food or if you are very hungry.', 'One of the most delicious Lebanese cuisines in paris.
Loved the hummus, so creamy and delicious, kofta was so juicy tabouleh was the perfect amount of lemon I mean I could go on but u get my point.', 'Service started off a little less than satisfactory. Would definitely recommend this restaurant for a true Lebanese experience.
Great choices even for vegetarian foodies!

Would suggest to call and reserve before! ‚ò∫Ô∏è', 'My to go place for lebanese food in paris, the staff is extremely nice, the quantity is very good, they are very generous and they would never let a customer leave unhappy plus the food is just amazing']

['Super fab place
Booked this place in last minutes and not disappointed at all. Super cute restaurant with perfect service and delicious food. I have never been in Michelin restaurants before but it was unreal experience. The lady who met us at the entrance was really professional and involved in her business. She provided amazing service and a nice atmosphere, was very attentive to details and looked after us all the time. The food was incredible, the chef Nicolas was really nice and shy, his food ideas and presentation are simply amazing. I‚Äôm still fully shocked about one of the starter and dessert, I‚Äôm really a big fan of the asparagus but I have never tried smth that simply and the same time good in my life. I still can feel the taste in my mouth, this dish was extremely simple but absolutely fabulous. And the dessert with the sphere was very beautiful, it‚Äôs good, impressive show for lovers of beautiful presentation. I was pleasantly surprised and definitely recommend to visit this place. Absolutely needs a second star.', 'A special place. A small quiet restaurant in a lovely area. The food was original and superb. Husband and wife team with great effect. Should be 2 Michelin stars.', 'A secluded corner in the hustle and bustle city life. Penny-worth cuisines and cordial service. I would definitely like to come back to try more Cher‚Äôs master cooking and the genial service.', 'This place is a hidden gem in the 17th. The food and ambiance are top notch. Small and cozy. This one star Michelin restaurant rivals many 2 and 3 star establishments that we have visited. And the price is very reasonable. Tonight we had a delicious 6 course meal plus an amuse bouche for only ‚Ç¨75.00. Every course was a treat. This place is not to be missed. It‚Äôs hands down our favourite Paris resto - and has been for the past 10 years.', 'I visited "La Fourchette du Printemps" in February and June 2015. At the time the place used to be a gourmet restaurant and I found it very good.

There is a counter in the entrance area of the restaurant. On the narrow side of this counter is a tiny door through which members of the team can climb backwards over a ladder or a very steep staircase into a cellar to fetch wines from there. I have watched this delicate operation several times during my visits.

The small restaurant was not so easy to reach for tourists at the time, as it is located a little away from the center and also a little away from a metro station. But I suspect that things have gotten better with today's improved public transportation services.
1|33|19']

['Very very nice place. Great atmosphere and great wine choices. Good for breakfast lunch or dinner. Staff very attentive. Highly recommend', 'Had lovely dinner there last Saturday night, surprisingly not too busy. The staff was friendly and the food was delicious.
My starter was " croustillant d avocat"  kind of avocado spring rolls. OMG, it was scrumptious üòã.  My husband and son had the foie gras, large slice with warm bread. They loved it.
And then we all had the "risotto with gambas" which was very nice too but a bit bland,  (we used the slice of lemon of my youngest who had fish and chips ) and then it was absolutely delicious.
Would definitely recommend the place.', 'We walked by at lunch and saw someone‚Äôs burger looked great and so we went here for dinner. We really enjoyed our cheeseburgers with added bacon. The fries were also tasty with a generous portion size. My teenage daughter thought it was all delicious.
The background music was fun with a mix of modern and 90‚Äôs that had us guessing songs and artists.', "Been here a couple times, and the food is a real treat. On this occasion however, I must commend the wait staff. Enjoying perhaps my last meal out before the lockdown, some 'ladette' walked past and decided my food was her food, and plummeted her uncovid safe hands deep into my pile of golden frites that I had been saving as a nice treat to finish off the delicious plat du jour. Disarray and heartbreak ensued on my part as she snarkily trotted off back to her lair grinning. Like a superhero, the waiter came out and flagged down some of Paris metropolises finest men and women in blue, who quickly settled on the she-demon and put out her wrath and trail of destruction. Caged, the beast will be dealt with by law and order. The superhero waiter so kindly brought out more crunchy potato goodness as reparation and even upgraded our dessert. Hats off to the waiter, hats off to the Paris police and hats off to justice served", 'Very Parisian busy crowded and fun restaurant. Cozy close to everyone. Fast serves. Friendly staff. Tried the goat cheese salad which was great. ü•ó']

['Amazing food just like what you would expect in Thailand. The chicken wings are incredible. Thai green curry is spot on. Pad thai was decent as well.', 'Very nice small place just off the main street. Great food. Outside or inside tables. A less expensive place to eat in Paris and still have a good meal. üòÉ', 'We ordered a delivery from here. The food was pretty basic, chicken over cooked, not very tasty, not great value for money. I‚Äôm surprised by the good reviews.', 'We do take out regularly at Thai at home, but the vibe at the restaurant is also really nice. They have some good vegetarian options too.', 'Great thai food in a friendly atmosphere ! Would recommend ;-)']

['Really amazing food and service! I had the vegetarian plate, baklava, and mint tea---an amazing sampling of different flavors.The falafel was absolutely perfect! The owner is extremely kind and made sure I was having an enjoyable experience. Certainly my favorite meal during my visit to Paris.', 'Good food and nice service. A little pricey though. Good address for authentic Lebanese food', 'Very Delicious Food !! Feels like Home Lebanon. So professional and lovely the Mister who own the Place ( Ali ). It‚Äôs our first time in Paris and thankfully we had a pleasant food. highly recommended üëåüèº‚ù§Ô∏è', 'This is a great place to have all the classic Lebanese favourites.', 'Friendly Staff, The Food is Great! The place is nice .. it‚Äôs important to reserve a table before you show! Just to be on the safe side... and don‚Äôt miss the Tea üëåüèª']

['Super quality by real Japanese chefs. It took them four minutes to create a double meal to go with 40 pieces. Please try it!', "Don't respect Asian cultures.", 'Experts', 'I was curious to try the "gwa bao" (steamed bread) that I found for the first time in this little takeaway sushi shop.\nThe bao burger is really pleasant, the salmon very fresh, the staff friendly and quick, the prices average.\nThe lunch menus are very advantageous.', "We went through just eat to order sushi, first order at sushiba despite a fairly high price for a small quantity I think, so we expected good sushi. Of course we didn't expect there to be any problems, at worst it's not serious, we're very understandable. Sadly, it was a disaster. We had ordered 4 platters, the restaurant was 10 minutes away by bike, the application predicted a 50 minute wait, yes it's long, it surprised us but it didn't matter, we were patient. But unfortunately the order took 1 hour 10 minutes to arrive... The restaurant was quite close and it took them 1 hour to prepare 4 trays... We had checked carefully and the delivery man was not at all at fault. And that's not all! the order received only contained 2 trays... I already find the just eat application very very poor in terms of customer service, and no means of contact or tracking of the delivery person. So we wanted to contact the restaurant, which brought us back to customer service (chain of 4 restaurants only) the intro being long and boring, the customer service replied that they had only received 2 trays to make, and that it was indeed the restaurant that was at fault, and therefore sent us the 2 remaining trays without any compensation... And we said to ourselves, mistakes happen but... the 2 trays took 50 minutes to arrive . It was really boring, we were expecting to have a very peaceful evening but they ruined everything and what's more the sushi is way too expensive for lower quality. In short, first and last time! ciao"]

['Music is good,
Waiters are cool,
Food is not at all what you except regarding the price. Meat has no tastes. Pasta are not fresh neither....
And the waiter has 0 experiences in restaurants. When I asked my pasta to be changed because of them not being fresh.
He put the whole plate in the microwave. Including the meat, the meat was therefore overcooked.

All this, for 10% refund at the end.', "Whoever was doing their work in the Bloc Batignolles gastronomic area, we were thrilled. From the sea bream to the Maguro Tataki, in addition to the perfect accompaniment to the vegetables...a feast for the eyes and the palate, accompanied by very pleasant service.  We'll be back...a recommendation", 'Very cool bar! Chill and alternative to the typic parisian bars ! I recommend it !
The only thing is that the glasses were a bit dirty ! But in overall it was great', 'Food and staff was fine. There is a cigar smell all over the place.
Tip: don‚Äôt bring your kids here please', 'Really nice place. They serve food until later than other restaurants + the waiter was really nice. Recommended üëå']

['Simply the best couscous I've eaten in my whole life. Yiu must taste the Imperial couscous of this restaurant because until you do, you do not know what "couscous" actually means. This is not a joke, the meat flow in your mouth like water, the vegetables are also tasty and the semolina... Eating the semolina is like savoring a cloud.
The decoration is really beautiful, you feel like you've traveled to Marrakech once you've passed through the door.
Of course, you have to put the price. He prepared to pay between 15‚Ç¨ and 20‚Ç¨ euros (18‚Ç¨ for the Imperial couscous üíò). After the main meal, you can help your stomach understand what just happened by taking a mint tea, and 2 sweet arab pastries.
Enjoy.', 'Good classic couscous, superb decoration on walls, kind service.', 'One of the best Moroccan restaurants.
Tagines and couscous are tip top', 'Really good food, great service and reasonably priced. Small restaurant with beautiful environment.', 'Delicious Moroccan food, with an incredible interior. The Moroccan wine we were recommended was great, and make sure you order a plate of pastries and tea for dessert and talk for a while while you eat them.

Will be back and take guests.']

["Don't get pizza from here.  Anywhere else is better. I keep getting pizza that looks like it fell on the floor.", 'Their services is very good.\nJamal', 'Nice staf', 'Everything was perfect thank you', 'Best in taste and in price']

['Delicious food, lovely atmosphere, kind staff. We had a romantic and enjoyable dinner for two in the evening and ordered starter, entree, desert and bottle of wine on the menu that changes each day.', 'Wow what a special delight! We found this restaurant accidentally when we were out walking around. I wanted real French food and this place did NOT disappoint! It offered a full menu of very French dishes. All tasted like grandma‚Äôs recipes, which was a perfect match to the very homey atmosphere. It‚Äôs like a cross between a very old fashioned air B&B and an antique store. Look at the pictures to see the cool treasures sprinkled throughout.

If you want to go to a place for a true French experience without tourists, I recommend finding your way to this delightful restaurant.

I had the best foie gras I have ever had for a starter, followed by a traditional meal of sausage on lentils and vegetables (Saucisse de Toulouse). For dessert, I had a wonderful tarte aux pommes. My friend started with a gorgeous appetizer - layered egg plant, cream cheese, and zucchini, and beets. Gorgeous. (Millefeuilles de beetrave.) Her main course was a vegetable dish with grated vegetables (Gratin de poireaux, √©pinards, et l√©gumes) and lemon tarte (tarte citron) for dessert.

We were so pleased to find this place by pure accident.', 'Lovely decor and warm foods. Good selection of wines üç∑We spent a good time here. I ordered Baeckoffe and it was well cooked. Would recommend!', 'Cozy and intimate setting. Amazing authentic food and they have something for everyone. The service is superb. Cannot recommend this place more!', 'Very charming little restaurant with special dishes and a feel-good atmosphere. Highly recommended.']

Nom: LA PLACE ITALIENNE by DaFaustino Paris 17
Reviews: ["Amazing food, beautiful setting with lovely comfy seats and very welcoming service.. even though we were typical English that couldn't speak much French they were very patient and accommodating.. Best carbonara me and the misses have ever had.. Little bit of Italy in Paris. Highly recommend a visit if you love your Italian food!!", 'Kind service and good food. Generous glass of wine for 5‚Ç¨ and pizzas between 15-20. Only down side a lot of meal delivery drivers stopping and going.', 'The panuozzi is so big !! I‚Äôm surprised. It‚Äôs very crispy but cold. Flavor overall good but a bit bland.', 'Very nice staff and a wonderful pizza. Also their Tiramisu is out of this world!!', 'Great place for pizza and pasta! Cute dining room in a fun part of town.']

['A great place to have lunch and watch the locals come and go in their impeccable outfits. Everyone in our party liked their plats very much; if I were to go back I‚Äôd try one of the enormous burgers. Food arrived lightning fast, and we were left in peace to enjoy the atmosphere until we signaled for the check. Lunch for 3 without wine was a reasonable 75 Euros given the neighborhood.', 'It‚Äôs an okay place to grab a bite to eat . The coffee is actually pretty good in this place , strong and not acidic . But the food in my opinion is pricey for what is presented and delivered . I personally would only come again for the coffee. The IPA beer is actually pretty good as well .', 'Plat du jour- rabbit! Excellent! Go with the plat du jour. very attentive service, very nice inside, quiet. If you want noise sit at the awesome terrace and stare at french life going on. Great experience', 'A real ginger. Great value and oversized portions in the 17th! Friendly and rapid service. Faultless.', 'Nice place, correct food, efficient service, good prices.']

['Very nice and typical restaurant. Fast service, nice/warm staff and most pleasant meal. You can‚Äôt go wrong!', 'Good food, cool place to be with friends', 'A good lunch with colleagues, nice people welcoming you, good home made food and THE Argentinian beer. The  Argentina plate is a must,  well cooked with excellent products.', 'Good tapas !! Fried calamari and grilled vegetable with goat cheese and honey! Speaking of burgers, disappointed due to the fact that not even one burger included chicken, for meat eaters only! Good experience overall!', "Very nice, occasionally very generous,  cocktails. Empanadas to die for. Haven't tried their meat yet but hopefully soon will"]

['A pretty casual coffee place to have a break, great atmosphere, staff are very friendly and helpful, drinks are ok, but the morning croissant ü•ê tasty terrible unfortunately‚Ä¶, other than that, is a nice place to chill out with friends.', 'My favorite bar in Paris. A place where you can work during the day or mingle with the diverse clientele in the evening. The staff are friendly, the atmosphere is always nice, the choices of wine and beer are quality and it‚Äôs open every day! I have been in Paris since 2006 and I can never find the same feeling I get when I am there in any other bar. Try it and you‚Äôll understand :)', 'Funky little student friendly wine and beer bar. Warm and inviting for solo travellers !', "Didn't have any food but prosciutto/cheese platters and fresh made baguettes looked decent.\n\nGood service in a rustic environment. Lots of locals which made for a great atmosphere.", 'Great atmosphere and friendly staff that does not hesitate to orientate in your wine choices and let you try beers from small breweries. Food (planches) was ok but not outstanding']

['We stumbled upon this place in Paris and it happened to be our favorite meal out of our whole trip to France! Truffle risotto was the special that day which was delicious and the truffle ravioli was amazing. If you are in the area you definitely need to make a stop here! The staff was so friendly and even gave us limoncello shots at the end! Can‚Äôt wait for my next trip to Paris so I can eat here again.', 'This charming Italian restaurant, without a doubt the best Italian restaurant in Paris, has become our family‚Äôs go-to destination for celebrations, from birthdays, anniversaries to casual dinners.\nThe ambiance is warm and inviting, perfectly complementing the incredible food that never fails to impress. The dishes are authentically Italian, bursting with flavor, and always served with impeccable speed.\nThe staff are the true heart of this place‚Äîpolite, friendly, and attentive, making every visit memorable. It‚Äôs more than just a restaurant for us, it feels like home. We‚Äôll keep coming back for years to come.', 'SO GOOD!!! The food is really tasty and authentic. You also have a really nice selection of dishes to choose from. The service and atmosphere are great. A little pricey but still affordable.', 'Truly an amazing stop, if your in Paris and in the mood for Italian food, definitely come here. This place‚Äôs pasta is some of the tastiest out there. Any dish with truffles is really good. Also, the 4 cheese pasta I ordered had creamy cheese with pasta cooked to perfection. You definitely should stop by here.', 'Best pizza and carbonara I‚Äôve had in a long time. Reasonably priced, food nice and hot, fantastic quality fresh ingredients, it all tasted unreal. Really pretty atmosphere and decor, staff really friendly and chatty, would definitely go back!']

['Fast food? More like slow food. Orederd a big mac without anything because I was in a rush. There was 2 people in front of me. Took them 20 minutes. The staff seem to slow walk ü§£.. Never seen such a thing in McDonalds', 'We waited 40min for a 2 burgers and chips. They are just slow and they don‚Äôt even care about that.', 'Waited 30 minutes. I asked twice, and turns out they completely forgot about my order.', "Not the fastest service, but it was worth the wait as the burgers came out looking as intended and not simply thrown together.
Ketchup was missing from all our meals, despite being on the order, so we had to request them. Staff pleasant and professional.
The restaurant was clean and well maintained, as we're the toilets, with a calm and quiet atmosphere despite being a busy time. The upstairs has a view over the street, which, despite being fairly uninteresting, does give a decent amount of daylight.", "The worst  McDonald's i've ever been too.
The personal is shouting cause you're a tourist and don't speak French.
If you start speaking english she just looks at the other side and completly ignores you.
Thats her she rather sits down than helping the costumers."]

['Wonderful, friendly service and equally delicious food. Charming ambiance perfect for a casual evening out.', 'Fantastic food. Lady of the house was managing it all by herself; a real place. Great value for money! (Both lamb and vegetable tajine were excellent üëåüèº)', 'Wonderful Moroccan restaurant managed by cheerful Moroccan young lady chef serving suculant Moroccan dishes like Tajin, couscous, bostaila and zesty starters and reasonably priced. Highly recommend üëç', "Very good food in a very nice atmosphere. Friendly staff and reasonably priced. It does take a while to get your dinner but it was more than worth the wait. Will definitely visit again next time I'm in Paris.", 'Great Moroccan restaurant. Had a very good Tajine with figs and apricots. bit off the beaten track, but well worth the trip. All female staff, including the chef.']

['Very interesting training with lots of practical sessions and Sylvain, the trainer, present all the time to check and correct our actions. A good investment that helps me enormously in opening my takeaway pizza business.', 'Excellent training with Sylvain Panaccione. Very good teacher, we feel that he loves his job and teaches it to you in a good mood.
Thanks also to Cliff for all his good advice.', "It's my last day of the week-long pizza pro training. The training is perfect for learning the basics of the profession.
The training was carried out by Sylvain, a friendly and pedagogical trainer also for √âric Riem, the founder of the school, a nice and professional person.
I recommend the training and the school.", 'A great training plan. Sylvain the trainer is a professional who knows how to teach, which is not necessarily easy. We see a lot of things in a good mood, which is always more pleasant for learning. Lots of availability. I recommend!', 'A week of training from which I was able to acquire a lot of theoretical and practical knowledge. Everything lived up to my expectations. My greetings to Sylvain who accompanied us at every stage.']

['Quality pizza,  like just awesome. I came from England for visit France,  service rapid', 'Awesome pizza with a good price! Merci', 'I came in paris for vacations and got to taste their pizzas and it was tasty. I recommend this restaurant!!', 'This is probably the worst pizza I‚Äôve ever had. The cheese was horrible. Tastes fake and the texture is disgusting and crumbles in your mouth with a bad after taste. Don‚Äôt waste your money here.', 'It was my first pizza in Paris\nVery testy']

["My family and I were in your shop one he does Dames and the staff , atmosphere, and the food was excellent. The service lady was exceptional and she took the not only to make sure our order was perfect but she also talked too and treated my six girls, seven if you count my wife, with respect and on their level, which is very rare these days. Most places just talk too the adults and ignore the children. We really appreciated it and my girls said she was the nicest ladythey have met. I just wish I could remember her name. The chocolates were impeccable, especially the Orangenettes. We will definitely be ordering from you in the future. Unfortunately we live in the US and probably won't be able too make it back in the near future. However that won't stop us from getting more of those Orangenettes. Thank you again for all you do and GOD BLESS to all of you and take care. On behalf of the Taylor family; Richard, Cheyenne, and our beautiful girls Evie, Dafne, Dakota, Sophia, Ana, and London, wewant to wish you all the continued best of luck in the years to come!! We love you all!", "Happiness is receiving chocolate bites in India especially in Udaipur \xa0gifted by my Childhood friend Shreyansh Jain \xa0lives in Paris..Amazing, Incredible Finger licking \xa0chocolates are to -die-for...perfect to my palate.. le chocolat blanc one of my fav unchocolate fourr'e. Added to my bucket List place ....LOVE \xa0is D word for #Jeff de Bruges \xa0#de`licieux", 'Nice man working there , very professional and kind . Perfect service , good chocolate , one big thanks to him !', 'Words can not describe, Try it and you will not regret it üòâ', 'Delicious']

["Very welcoming staff, it feels like home. I took one of the dishes of the day (sauted pork with clams) and was absolutely blown away. Very fresh, full of different flavors and a very good portion. A mastered dish, can't wait to try it again", 'We went to eat lunch here and there were many men drinking and eating inside but the drunk staff member told us that they were closed, even though according to Google they were open. Maybe too drunk to cook! Also the place is tiny, smelt very strongly of alcohol, as if it had been thrown all over the floors.', 'Excellent!', 'Very underwhelming meal. ‚Ç¨16 for overcooked, tough steak and a side of mediocre fries. None of it felt very home-cooked or exceptionally authentic. Maybe it‚Äôs a better deal at lunchtime.', 'This restaurant is exactly as it should be: good fare, inexpensive, good service (with a smile!) and with decent opening hours and prices! food had excellent flavour and impressive portion sizes! Exactly what we were hoping for! will be back!']

['Really good croissant and chocolatine.
They also have a few seats to enjoy the bakeries inside. The bread looks good too but I haven‚Äôt tried it.', 'We found out about this place the first day we arrived in Paris and the staff was so lovely and welcoming that we are definitely coming here for breakfast everyday! Really appreciated the fact that they tried their best talking in Spanish and English with us to make the best of our experience! Definitely recommended!', 'Loved the Bakery very much! Delicious Croissant and hot chocolate!
Highly recommend, friendly staff and delicious food :)
Careful if you want to go on a sunday! it was packed and they dont have as many seats ;)', "This boulangerie is by far the best. Highly recommended for good quality and delicious croissants and more. I am so glad I made my way there, although there isn't much to do around. However, I was there on a Saturday morning and had a great croissant and almond pastry. Unfortunately, their coffee machine was broken, but I found a nice coffee shop called Noir nearby. The good quality coffee was a bonus for the morning. Additionally, more surprises came my way when I took a walk in the neighborhood and discovered it was an open market day. All the families were out for their weekly shopping. Overall, I had a great experience with the croissant and more.", 'One of the best baguettes I‚Äôve had in Paris. And really great pastries!! This place and their service is so good I went twice during my trip to Paris.']

['Around ‚Ç¨6 to ‚Ç¨7 for a burger or Fried chicken meal. Both are really good. We ordered 3 meals and the bill was around 20 Euros. Plus they do indian currys.', 'Surprisingly good spicy curry chicken tikka dishes. It has got to be one of the best places to pick up a quick fix in the wee hours of the morning in Paris.', "They sell authentic indian and pakistani dishes. Beef curry and basmati rice. The fried chicken is amazingly good worth trying\n\nIt's been a while since I ate here, and it still doesn't fail to satisfy my chicken craving.", 'The food is really delicious. Quantity is very good and price is very cheap.', 'Very Bad old chiken more oil']

['Delicious wrap, very good price.  Recommend this place. üëå', "Quick but to vomit I eat the Greek with disgust it's unacceptable meat taste of caramelized rotten I won't come back", 'EXCELLENT kebab, the meat is delicious and the portions generous. Family atmosphere, the decoration is quite versatile with red paints, fruity paintings and peach knots.

Finally, I will give the information that interests everyone: ‚Ç¨8.50 for kebab AND drink & ‚Ç¨7.50 without drink.', "A culinary disaster

Honestly, it was a terrible experience from start to finish. The meat was way overcooked, dry, almost burnt, to the point where every bite became an ordeal. The fries? Soft, tasteless, and clearly out of a low-end bag. And let's talk about the vegetables... The tomatoes were bland, watery, almost translucent, and the salad looked like it had spent several days in the fridge, very soft and without any freshness. Even the sauce seemed to have been added in a hurry, without balancing anything. In short, nothing was good. An experience to forget, and above all a place to avoid.", "Hideous, it's fast but not good. The meat tastes terrible, the steak is hideous and the eggs tasteless."]

['This is a fantastic Italian deli/market.  We got pastas, prosciutto, and wine. The owner is extremely friendly and speaks great English.', 'Loved this place!! The place is a little small but It gives me authentic Italy vibes. The pizza there was amazing, served warm, crunchy and full of flavors. The people are super nice and the owner is a very nice man. If you‚Äôre a foreigner looking for some good food and good staff I‚Äôd definitely recommend you this place !', 'Beautiful pasta deli run by an extremely helpful and friendly couple who went out of there way to help us. The food was absolutely delicious and authentic. We are so happy we found this fantastic deli ‚ù§Ô∏è', 'O.k. so im not gordon ramsey but they have meat thats not exactly cooked through next to cooked pasta. They weigh your food and then give you a proper price tag. It is put into plastic containers that look like they would melt and are put into a microwave. They ask you if youd like cheese. Do.not.get.the.cheese. the cheese tastes like someone poured straight up clorox into it. The amount of chemicals i tasted was beyond my imagination. If i could lick a menstrual pads blue dye that would be it. The price is insane. And the bouffet is basically a fridge they will heat up the food in front of you so on the bright side theyre not hiding it. On the negative side if theyre not a little embarassed to hide that idk what they are hiding.', 'Rapid service at lunch time. Choice from a variety of pasta dishes, meat balls, salads, pizza, hams and desserts etc. Best for take way as seating inside is limited. Nice food.']

['Excellent meal! The salads appetizer were amazing. My wife got great gnocchis made of peas and flour. My steak was alright. The fries were excellent and they could add a side of vegetables, which is better than most brasserie-style places, which only offer to serve me green beans.', 'Pretty good place to chill out with friends. Not many food options but atmosphere is nice. Good beer selection. Recommended', 'We went here for dinner and it was not great. We ordered a cheese plate, the cheeseburger, and the steak and fries.
1) The cheese plate was fine. Nothing amazing and French cheese is pretty good even at the low end.
2) The burger was ‚Äòfine‚Äô. Bit on the sweet side with the BBQ sauce and a brioche bun. I ordered it without bacon and it came with the bacon anyway. Annoying.
3) The steak was done medium as asked, but the best you could say about it was that it was chewy. Very chewy. Net calorie negative chewy. More poetically you could steal from the bard and say it still had marks from where the jockey was hitting it.

We also had a bottle of wine which was all good, but we did notice, too late, that we were the only people ordering food. So if you want to get some drinks and people watch, go for it. Good location and the staff seemed nice. If you are hungry for food go elsewhere.', 'Awesome place, friendly staff, great coffee and nice beer. Recommend to everyone.', "Great experience in this bar after several times I stopped by.
The team is friendly and efficient in service.
All what you'd expect for a good time with colleagues or friends for a perfect chill evening."]

['The food is fine, the other menu was good\nbut my main dish was the fish not so special. Started was good, dessert was OK.', 'Seriously good food with super friendly staff! Found through Google reviews and would recommend if you‚Äôre in the area!', 'It is very good french 30 euro for dinner place. Book it on LaFourchette and get significant discount! Without this discount it is a bit pricey.', 'Me and my mom went to this lovely restaurant during our vacation. We choose this rest because there was a sign with the legend: Traditional cuisine. It wasn‚Äôt a lie. Everything was lovely, the decor, the beer, the dishes, the waiter and waitress. Service was really quick even though the place was packed. Risotto with fruit de mer was incredible and the entrec√¥te was superb. The waitress and waiter were excellent even though they didn‚Äôt speak any Spanish and only a little bit of English. Our deep appreciation for both and their patience with my limited French skills.', 'Simple restaurant with good food. Very parisian like.']

['Tasty and affordable! very clean environment, like it!', 'We all loved what we ordered. The portions were large. The service was excellent. We were so thirsty and she kept brining us tap water as fast as we could down it. That‚Äôs especially appreciate since it isn‚Äôt always the normal in Paris. Highly recommend.', 'Amazing thai food for good prices', 'Very disappointing, having read good reviews on Google and Deliveroo. This is NOT authentic Thai cuisine AT ALL. Chicken in both green curry and coconut chicken soup is inedible, don‚Äôt know what they did to it but was very unnatural and almost translucent. Never tasted Pad Thai like that, Chinese way with oyster sauce and??? (nothing against good Chinese food) but this is clearly Thai to us.', 'Very great place at walking distance from Cardinet. A lot of options from the menu and the staff is very friendly. Curry dishes are good and soups as well. It is highly recommend for lunch and any takeaways.']

["I came by this small, unassuming restaurant that under further inspection had charm.

Whilst the wine was very pleasant, the pizza, when it arrived, looked beyond superb. I wasn't let down by the flavour either.

Pizzas come and go, but I won't be forgetting this one for some time.

The word 'artisan' gets used too much nowadays, but it is entirely justified here.", 'The BEST pizza! You can tell that a lot of thought goes into every detail, great ingredients, and warm atmosphere. This one is not to be missed.', 'Delicious pizza and the owner is very nice! I strongly recomend!', 'Total surprise walk in. Owner is fabulous.
Fresh ingredients fresh from the block of cheese. Chef/owner added love to the pizza.', 'Best pizza I‚Äôve ever tasted. Never tasted this kind of pizza in the UK and something we will take back with us on this trip. Very friendly owner and baked pizza to your liking.']

Adresse: 20 Rue Severiano de Heredia, 75017 Paris, France
Reviews: ['The food was great and service efficient and friendly. It was cold, and we opted to eat inside. There was a big party of people enjoying happy hour, so it was very noisy. Only negative. Great location close to Pont Cardinet and still surrounded by nature. We will be back!', 'Service was excellent, and staff was extremely friendly. The steak, however, was a bit tough and lacked flavor. Beer choices were plentiful, and the hefeweizen was delicious.', 'Excellent food. Service was very nice.', 'It was an OK visit, nothing spectacular. Very good location, average service (a bit sloppy maybe), average food, average price for what it wa, and nice atmosphere.', 'Its a good place to start your exploration to French cuisine. The host is very friendly, the vibe of the place is impeccable, and the food price is good for the food and service quality. Their wine tastes good too.']

['Nice place
I come here all the time. Nice staff. Nice beers', 'Good drinks and price
Bartender good craic ( also speaks English)', "If only I could get a dollar for every time I said I love this place. This is the perfect corner bar that anyone needs. The guys at the bar are super funny and nice. Always welcome and kind. Authentic drinks and few board games to play if the conversation is not working.
Don't expect a fancy bar, because it is not but expect a good time. Everytime I go here I see a familiar face so clearly, if not most, lot of customers are regular. And with the number of options you have on this specific streets if you have regular customers - it says volumes about the service provided. Thanks for my great time at your place almost every week guys :)", 'Excellent collection of beers! Tried them all. The staff is super cool and the place is proper Parisian corner cafe bar.', 'Late afternoon and evening ambiance is so pleasant here with people hanging out enjoying the fine summer weather and their beverages!']

['Top site! I loved the canned sardines from the Pinhais brand, really really good! In addition, they are not found in traditional stores. The lemon olive oil from Dima terroir was really great too.\nI highly recommend!\nVery well done site and manager passionate about her products.', 'Excellent online store for local, quality and beneficial products for those concerned about their health and their diet. Thank you EgoodFoodShop', 'Varied products of very good quality and perfect service, I highly recommend üòÄüòÄüòÄ']

["The supermarket isn't there, the location is wrong", 'Friendly place, multi lingual, not too pricey. Wonderful selection.', 'Really good quality. And tons of fresh vegetables and fruits', 'No Franprix at this address.', 'Fairly large selection of items.']

['Quickly become our favourite restaurant to have a drink in the evening. As two English people we were very welcomed, everyone was lovely. Rouel was our favourite server!', 'Superb, a nice relaxing cozy restaurant with excellent food and service one of the best in Batignolles', 'We had a wonderful brunch in the exclusive club 3-5-7, hidden gem in the heart of the new batignole area. The food was delicious ; the quality is ridiculously good for the price compare to other brunch in the area. Service was excellent and the place very nice. Truly one of the best brunch in west-Paris - hope the owner will maintain it after the summer!', 'We had a very nice time, it is an elegant place and the service was very friendly yet very professional. I tried their beef tartare which was tasty, not the best I had but still good. I loved the mousse au chocolat, probably one of the best I‚Äôve ever had.', 'Made us feel very welcome nothing was too much trouble food was very good.']

['Our 16 cheeses board was delicious and filled the 3 of us up perfectly well. Wine prices are very fair too.', 'A true 5 star experience, featuring delicious cheese and amazing wine.

Ps. sit outside for a true Parisian experience; and ask for more bread if needed!!', 'Very high quality cheese board with cheese that tastes as good as any cheese I had in France. Slightly out of the centre so getting a seat will be much easier than at cheese places in the more touristy areas.', 'We found this shop by pure luck and decided to grab a sandwhich.
The staff was not only very friendly but he also gave us a wide selection of cheese to try from and chose accordingly to our preferences. He prepared the sandwhiches right infront of us and picked matching flavours and ingredients very skillfully (he had very good taste).

The cheese and ingredients are high quality, very full of flavour and rich in taste. You can also buy some of the cheeses and bring them home with you.

The pricing is affordable and more than justified.

The food and experience made my heart very happy and I will come again', 'One of my favourite restaurants in Paris. Always a pleasure to spend time here. Anytime I have someone visiting, this place is always on the list!
Their cheeses are all top notch quality from some of the best producers in France, the staff is friendly and welcoming, the decor is subtly fancy, and the wine list has something for everyone. Definitely recommend this to any cheese amateurs and aficionados. Thank you to the Formaticus team. Even the newer staff are knowledgeable and friendly. Big up!!']

['The sweetest place I have been in Paris this time around - In every way. I felt so peaceful it was like I was at home. The crepes are perfect, but it was the atmosphere and of course Hamza that I loved most - such a kind person (so was the other waiter though I didn‚Äôt get his name - thank you both!). I stayed for 2 hours, and had 3 perfect cr√®me cafes, and 2 perfect crepes. The coffees come with small chocolates, I don‚Äôt know if that‚Äôs just a common Parisian thing, but either way, it was so sweet.', "Chez Maxence on Rue Legendre in Paris is a fantastic spot for cr√™pe lovers! The menu offers a delightful variety of sweet and savory options, each expertly prepared and bursting with flavor. The cozy ambiance and friendly staff make for a welcoming dining experience. Whether you're a cr√™pe aficionado or trying them for the first time, this restaurant is definitely worth a visit. Highly recommend for a taste of authentic Parisian cr√™pes!", 'Delicious crepes and extremely kind and helpful staff. We also liked coffee here. Bottle of water is served for free.', 'Outstanding crepes, outstanding service. This is a place foodies would enjoy. We loved the chicken crepe, the Fleurette and the sugar and butter. The Dan Armor sweet cider was excellent if you like sweet ciders. I‚Äôm sure the others are great for other pallets.', 'Food is amazing, and the waiter is really friendly. My favorite restaurant in Paris ‚ù§Ô∏è']

['The ambiance is warm and cosy; the food is great and the dough exquisite!
Ideal selection of wine. The owner/manager and the waiter make you feel at home with their continuous smile and attention.
We were also offered a starter dish !
We‚Äôll be back 100%', 'Excellent pizzeria with cozy family atmosphere. We had a good time.

Sorry but not happy at all with this. Dissappointing experience.', 'We really enjoyed our time here! The waiters were nice and spoke english and the food was great!']

['A very quaint little convenience store.  It has most basic necessities, including food, produce, wine, and toiletries.  The employee at the cashier stand was very nice and friendly.', 'More like a mini-market than a supermarket, and prices are insane and higher than anywhere else in the area and with a very limited choice of products too!!', "No choice in this Franprix
The cashier is unpleasant I pay ‚Ç¨3.79/kg for clementines displayed at 2.49/kg I tell him he tells me that it's like that and that he can't do anything and asks me to open my bag right after
Really anything", 'Small supermarket where we have been going regularly for years, change of manager over the past year, we recently bought a bottle of champagne (Nicolas Feuillate) for around ‚Ç¨28 corked...
The manager (who is not in the store) refused to change it because it was open! (Complicated to find a corked taste without opening it...) We will now go to brands and businesses that are more attentive', 'The one on rue de Saussure has closed!!! Phewff']

['Had one of the best bibimpaps there, despite living in Korea in the past. Amazing food, quantity and quality. I‚Äôd suggest installing new lights, more subtle ones, to make the atmosphere inside better and make this place more welcoming - my heart breaks when I see it empty sometimes, knowing how devoted people working there are. Strongly recommend.', 'What a delightful and delicious find on rue de L√©vis in the 17eme!
I was greeted warmly by their staff.

As I was the only one (due to early dinner) in the restaurant I was invited to sit anywhere.

The ambiance is inviting with great music. I asked for an explanation of the menu and it was given, very politely.

The food was amazing, fresh, delicious and well presented! The Bibimbap was excellent!
I will definitely return!', 'I went for lunch with my friend who came here often.
Really good surprise for food, beautifully presented, delicious, comfortable for my stomach, modern interior, excellent service.

Dessert was excellent I had tiramisu, as good as good patisserie or better.', 'The main highlight is the Bibimbap. The food was delicious and spicy.

Ive noticed at the actual resto, not all are prepared fresh. unless you ordered dolsot bibimbap. The rest will be microwaved prior to serving.']

['We really loved this place! We got the waffle and brioche, both were super yummy! Highly recommend the chocolate chip gelato with the waffle!

Wish they had more outdoor seating, but the inside was comfortable.', 'The best ice cream in the world! The staff is always friendly and helpful! The waffles and crepes are also wonderful! The Italian hot chocolate. Best I‚Äôve had in years.', 'Very good waffle and awesome ice cream!! The staff was very helpful and spoke English. I highly recommend this shop.', 'The place is very quiet, there are places to sit, there is a large assortment of wonderful flavors, the ice cream with macaroons is very tasty, the prices are acceptable.  The service is good.']

['Delicious foods and fast service.  Sizable portion with reasonable prices. It may not be the most authentic Thai food. Hey this is Paris! I think it‚Äôs very acceptable quality and quantity. I definitely recommend this restaurant and if I come to Paris again, it will be one of my restaurant choices.', "Not very authentic Thai food.\nIt's one of these Chinese restaurants, who try to offer food from other countries, as you also find a lot of Japanese restaurants in Paris, run by Chinese. These are all not very authentic and on low to medium quality... try to avoid these", "Don't order food here. This costs 13.50euro and there is no rice?", 'Delicious Thai meals at reasonable prices. ['This restaurant is a hidden gem with a cosy, inviting atmosphere and genuinely friendly staff. The black mullet raw fish plate was a fresh and vibrant starter, and the main courses of scallops and duck were cooked to perfection - rich, tender, and beautifully presented. The ambiance is the perfect balance between relaxed and cozy, with great attention to cleanliness and detail. While slightly on the pricier side, the exceptional food, service, and overall experience make it well worth it. Highly recommended for a special occasion or a delightful treat!', 'Amazing food with creations!
Most of the sauces are well whipped, which gives each bite a very light touch on the tongue

Friendly staff and chill atmosphere
Strong recommendation!', 'Nice modern cuisine. We tried several items, all were really good taste and creative combinations. Crispy veal sweetbread is the signature dish, recommended. Cozy atmosphere and friendly service.', 'Amazing place for food. They know what their business. One of us was vegetarian and we told the waiter. They made ver nice three course veg meal for our friend that surprisingly was equally good or better than the non vegetarian food that we had. The best part was these veg food courses were not in the menu. Located in a busy place, which makes it easily accessible and identifiable. Price wise expensive but the quality of ingredients and the flavours burst in our mouth will make sure no regrets.', 'Amazing experience at Beatriz Gonz√°lez property. They kindly accepted a last minute booking on Saturday. I had the Dos de sanglier - delicious.  I would definitely recommend it.']

['If you close at 8:50 or 8:55, do not put your closing time at 9.

['Delicious roasted chicken breasts! 100% recommend.', 'Excellent meat there!', 'Boss not very honest, sold us a 700 gram piece of beef for TWO people telling us that less would be "difficult" to cook to make beef wellington. ['Nice to have a drink!Friendly and cosy!', 'Very very nice place. Very welcoming people. Super nice ambiance, chill, comfy, simple and unique. ["I always liked that place. Their selection of fresh juice is probably unbeatable, but don't quote me on it (I did say probably). ['From the moment I arrived at Le Pigalle, I was struck by the hotel‚Äôs welcoming, laid-back atmosphere. The lobby is more like a communal space, creating an immediate sense of comfort that sets it apart from typical hotel experiences. The staff were incredibly warm and attentive, always making sure my stay was as enjoyable as possible.

The food at the in-house restaurant was simple yet delicious, and I loved the trendy, hip decor in the rooms. While I‚Äôve seen some reviews mention that the rooms are small, I believe that‚Äôs just the reality of most Paris hotels‚Äîespecially unless you‚Äôre willing to splurge.

What really stood out to me, however, was how the staff went above and beyond when I found myself in a panic after my phone was stolen. Their care and quick assistance during a stressful time were invaluable, and I truly appreciated their support.

I highly recommend Le Pigalle for anyone looking for a charming, well-located, and comfortable stay in Paris!‚Äù', "What an amazing and welcoming staff. They are all very knowledgeable about the area and Paris. The breakfast is perfect (parfait). The room we had was small but it is to be expected in a big city. Each room is different and some of the other rooms on our floor had a better outline.
The location was easy for a traveler. The neighborhood is lively but felt safe.
I can't wait to come back.", 'Sadly really poor experience.
Took over 25 minutes just to check in, because the one and only receptionist had disappeared and no one in the downstairs lobby/restaurant/cafe area could find him.
Nothing (water, cotton rounds, towels, etc) replenished at any point during our stay.
Found used cotton buds and copious amounts of dust under the bed from previous guests.
Linen not changed during housekeeping.
Used towels rehung from the floor rather than given fresh ones
Room service dishes not cleared at any point during the day.', 'Offers an authentic and charming French dining experience. The bistro boasts a cozy, Parisian-inspired ambiance, making it perfect for a romantic evening or a casual meal. The menu features delicious, classic French dishes, prepared with fresh ingredients and full of flavor. With friendly service and a relaxed atmosphere, Le Pigalle is a must-visit for anyone looking to enjoy true French cuisine.', 'I stayed here for 3 nights. I didn‚Äôt have any issues with the hotel but it‚Äôs definitely not a 4 star hotel. It‚Äôs a small, boutique hotel that I would classify as 3 stars. First, there isn‚Äôt even a lobby with a reception area. There‚Äôs a communal dining table with a staff member and a laptop who checks you in. I completely didn‚Äôt even realize they were staff because they blended in with the other patrons who were using the dining table. I had room 31 which is fine for a solo traveler, but definitely not for a couple. It‚Äôs small and inconveniently designed. There‚Äôs no door from the sleeping area to the shower and sink. The toilet is a separate, closed off area, away from the sink which I would find awkward if I was sharing with a partner or a friend.The lobby also hosts a club and many DJ‚Äôs so it tends to get quite loud and packed at night. There are also plenty of clubs on the same street that I could hear at night when I‚Äôm trying to sleep. It wasn‚Äôt really an issue for me because I can sleep through anything, but I can see how that would be a problem for other guests.']

['Food was amazing! The ‚Äúlamb of the day‚Äù was better than I could have expected, and take it at chef‚Äôs temperature. The vibe inside is very comfortable and quaint. Serving staff is very attentive but also a bit distracted and have a hard time focusing but overall it‚Äôs obvious they do care a lot. Would definitely go back on my next trip to Paris!', "We had a reservation but had to wait  outside for a table for around 30+ minutes as they were extremely busy and were given a free kir while we waited.

Service
Exceptional service. Very friendly with full knowledge of their wine list and very informed about their dishes.

Food
The food was lovely with the slight exception on the risotto, which was a bit too creamy for my wife's taste.

All in all, it was a great experience apart from having to wait so long to be seated.", 'We visited this restaurant with a reservation at 9:30 PM but were only seated at 10:30 PM, and our main course did not arrive until 11:30 PM. While the staff were exceptionally kind and gracious, even offering us two small glasses of wine to make up for the delay.

The food itself was fantastic‚Äîwell-prepared and truly delicious‚Äîbut it was evident that the restaurant is struggling to manage its capacity during this busy season. Given that this is a mid-to-high-range establishment with prices to match, such extended waiting times are simply not acceptable.

While the quality of the food and the staff‚Äôs effort are commendable, the overall experience fell short of expectations.', 'Unfortunately this place wasn‚Äôt a good choice for our dining experience in Paris. Very unwelcoming service from the moment we walked in. We had to wait to order and just to get some water over 20 minutes. The food also was very mediocre quality. No one asked me how I‚Äôd like to have my meat cooked and as a result my lamb was completely uncooked. A little ‚Äúcherry on top‚Äù was another 30 minutes wait when I asked to bring our bill to pay.
Never come back neither recommend this place to anyone. There are plenty of way better restaurants in Paris', 'The service, food and atmosphere was amazing. We had beef, cheese plate, and onion soup. It was the best onion soup I have ever eaten. definitely recommended']

['Cool small venue, theatre style in basement and lounge bar on the first floor with great windows all along , as well as a bar in the foyer.', "This is a cosy venue, great for intimate gigs.\nThere's an eccentric bar upstairs that you can visit before a show.", 'Amazing place. Cozy and lovely staff!', 'A modern, good looking setting for a great show. The sound in that room is perrrrfect!', 'We had lots of fun with the live music in french music']

['So fresh and delicious.', 'Food was delicious and service is very good', 'Constantly forgetting items in deliveries. will stop ordering', 'I like it, the staff is friendly and they always remember me when i go, gives me a good "small town" vibe. ['we were here on sunday evening, we were pleased to see that there were free seats! of course, for fans of the film Amelie, which I am :), this place is special! Great atmosphere, on the menu there is a special "Amelie set", which consists of onion soup, beef bourguignon and creme brulee. The dishes were served very quickly, the service was excellent!', 'The staff were amazing, they were super nice from the moment we came in the restaurant. There is live music, great atmosphere and the food was delicious. I recommend trying the mussels and beouf bourgignon.', 'As you can imagine it‚Äôs very touristy, everyone goes there for the
Picture if you have watched Amelie !

Waiters are very nice but I didn‚Äôt really enjoy my meal

However the place is very fun and the service
Is excellent

Didn‚Äôt like they staff asked for a tip Without giving me the change of adding this myself which probably would have been a
Bigger amount as
I was about to leave cash as a tip  but  when they come with the ticket and grab the machine and say how much with the tip it kind of
Broke the magic of the moment and left me thinking that was a bit cheeky ‚Ä¶ however they make you feel very welcome and are very nice people', 'Visited here for a look as it is in the film Amelie. But we ended up staying for food and drinks. So glad we did. Our server was awesome, the atmosphere was great (we were outside streetside), the wine was nicely chilled and the food was so good.y wife and I had Moules-frites', 'I read a bunch of the previous reviews, and still had to come to Caf√© des Deux Moulins to honor the teenage version of myself who adored "Amelie." Maybe the reviewers we're having a bad day or maybe the staff was having a bad day... But I had a wonderful experience. The staff (and I interacted with several staff members) were all lovely. Our server in particular was very kind, charming and also very stylish. She was attentive and did her best to accommodate a couple of Americans. I ordered the onion soup and the small Parisian salad. I thought they were both great. The baguette that came with the soup was good. I think baguettes have to be good if they are made/sold in Paris. Anyway, I was very pleased with what I ordered. My husband ordered the cheeseburger. He said the burger was decent but nothing to write home about and he was very pleased with the fries. We shared Amelie's Cr√®me Br√ªl√©e - and I thought it was fabulous. If it wasn't socially unacceptable, I would have licked the ramekin clean. It was tr√®s bon! I loved the cute aesthetic of the cafe and how they feature Amelie all over the cafe from photos to the menu. I loved it! If you're a fan of the film, it's definitely worth checking out!']

Adresse: 15 Rue des Trois Fr√®res, 75018 Paris, France
Reviews:
["Most amazing crepes I have ever tried! Nice staff, good prices, tasty food! Too little space, everyone is sitting near each other, but that's usual in Paris restaurants :)", 'Amazing no frills place. Crepes were good, a tad bit salty but not an issue, on the affordable side. Served pretty fast as well. Just had to wait around 5-10 minutes, visited slightly after 2pm.', 'The crepes here are delicious! Perfectly light, with just the right amount of sweetness and a variety of tasty fillings to choose from. You can tell they use quality ingredients, and every bite is worth savoring.

The only downside? It‚Äôs a bit on the pricey side. While the crepe is definitely tasty, it might feel a little expensive for what you‚Äôre getting.

That said, if you‚Äôre in the mood to treat yourself, it‚Äôs a great spot to enjoy a well-made crepe!', 'Had the most delicious galettes and cr√™pes at Cr√™perie Broc√©liande! The crepe was the lightest and crispiest, fillings were fresh and flavorful, and the atmosphere was cozy and inviting. The staff was really warm and friendly.

Definitely recommend this spot for a delicious and authentic Parisian experience close to Montmartre!!', 'We ordered two savory crepes and they were both delicious. Friendly staff and they speak English. I really recommend this place and look forward to going back to try their sweet crepes!']

['I was on school trip in Paris in May. I dont even know how to explain the quality of food. I paid 15‚Ç¨ for Fries, Chicken, schweppes and dessert, and I‚Äôm sure that i can tell i wouldnt give a 5‚Ç¨ for that. I‚Äôm giving 1 star because: Man in bar with main meal gave me chicken when i asked what type of meat is it. The wing was raw and poorly seasoned. Fries were bland and cold. Cake that i mentioned was also cold and bland. Feeling of eating the dessert was like it was straight out of freezer. I couldnt eat that. Only schweppes in metal can was tasty and i never had it before. When i went to pay i felt a bad smell in my nose. I‚Äôm sure that boys from the crew dont care about personal hygiene. Also the toilet wasnt clean and there was stinky. As fast as I walked into the toilet I escaped from there. The smell of Urine was terrible. While I was going to france i expected good food and high culture, because thats how i‚Äôve always percieved france (the spell was broken). I really wouldnt recommend that if you wouldnt like to have problems with gastric system. I give 1 star only becuase the schweppes and google criteria.', "The place is okay but there are a lot of people just sitting inside the food court not even eating or buying food.
But if you're doing some kind of meetings with your friends at the same time having lunch, it's perfect because they don't mind no matter how long you'd like to stay there.", 'my first flunch. i had paella and a norwegian salad.
the veggies are √† volont√©
international crowd - italians, spanish, norwegians (probably because of the quarter and proximity to hotels), also many old folk (probably because flunch is somewhat more known amongst the older gen. in europe)
kind of like a more expensive and more international crous (french university dining fare) which serves alcohol and draws an older crowd since it isn‚Äôt for students. and where you pay for the entree and get veggies free.
the customer service agent was kind to me
only thing is the wifi does not capt well. i‚Äôm also not sure how often they change the menu but both times i‚Äôve had flunch, i had paella so i imagine this can get quite repetitive over time', 'Great Flunch! Staff were very helpful and friendly. Restaurant is clean and tidy with a nice calm atmosphere. Legumes a volonte were constantly being maintained and refreshed by the cooking staff. When my friend needed a dump violently the cubicles were out of service and he was forced to leave a huge chocolate log on the floor and when it was picked up by the poor cleaner it was put in the sink and it got stuck in the pipes they also spat In my food when i told them there breath smells I would not recommend to my worst enemy']

['I came here based on a recommendation by Fodor‚Äôs Paris France travel guide as well as Amex Platinum travel offer. We had oysters, fish soup with rouille and crouton, sausage, smoked pork belly sauerkraut, roast chicken. Oysters were fresh, chicken dry, and sausage sauerkraut average. I‚Äôm giving service 1-star because the waiter Luciano said ‚ÄúAmerican high tips‚Äù. When he brought the credit card machine he asked for 20 euros tips with a smile  I don‚Äôt mind giving tips for good service which he did provide. However, I was taken aback by such a direct ask which I thought was in poor taste. I pointed to the bill which clearly states that 15% service charge has been added. His action made a negative impression to me that Wepler was tourist trap. I can honestly say I‚Äôve never had an experience where waiter asked me to give him a specific tips amount. Before I left I shared this incident with a manager because I thought the waiter made the restaurant look bad.', 'What a surprise! Huge place with a nice buzz, not too loud, everyone sort of funnily peeks into the neighbors dishes.. service is pro and nice, the food was delicious. We took 1 course and 2 a la Carte with a platter which was amazingly fresh and so tasty that we could not believe it. At the end we got a little espresso on the house and that was the golden customer touch I needed, I‚Äôm coming back for sure !!', 'Amazing dinner. They prepared my fish - deboning table side. Best part they left the bottle of rum on our table in case we needed more for the rhumbaba.', 'Le Wepler never disappoints. Perfect style as of end of 18th century Belle √âpoque, attentive personnelle, good selection of fresh seafood. The price list is quite the same as in other non haute cuisine places.', 'Maybe better for seafood.\nWith meat they are not so professional\nSnail and onion soup recommended']

['Had a lovely dinner at Chez Ma Cousin today! My friend and I had moule frites (mussels and fries) and a chocolate lava cake. The moule frite was a generous serving, and the broth was delicious.
