Would recommend to those that wish to taste authentic french cuisine. Will come again next time I come back to France.', 'Nice brasserie with consistent quality and great service! Oysters were great, the meat too but was not super tender. Fries and green salad were good.', 'Just stumbled into this French restaurant. Superb food at really good prices. Who knew French cuisine could be so affordable as well ? The lamb was succulent.  Very well cooked. Not gamey and nice and juicy! The escargots were out of this world. Super well seasoned with olive oil and mint. And the ravioli doused with the cheese. Heavenly. The waiters are really busy. Guess the quality of the food speaks for itself. Also had the draft 1664 to go with the meal. Also had their French onion soup which was also excellent and not overtly salty.  Must come here again !  This is my 4th time eating here. Speaks volumes !', 'Fabulous lunch, my oysters were lovely. Langoustine ravioli was delicious and the tuna steak was HUGE. Mum really enjoyed her pate encroute and the fish and chips.\nHIGHLY recommend.', "I love this place! Was here for breakfast in October and dinner in December and both times were great. Friendly service and excellent food. The location, right in front of Gare du Nord, is super convnient. I'll definitley be there again!!"]

['Traditional French restaurant ambience. Fantastic food. We had the lunch set menu for 28 Euro. The appetizer of white asparagus was very chill and tasty. the entry of pork neck was so tender.  We loved this restaurant! The waiter is Luca and he is so pleasant.', 'I made a reservation for my bday brunch.
Atmosphere was very authentic and chill which I was able to enjoy both food and romance , and All the food was delicious and the guy work from there he recommended the wine and the selection was especially impressive. it went well with the menu.
I definitely want to go back.', 'Hands down one of the best restaurants I‚Äôve been to in Paris. Intimate candle light dinner with a romantic vibe. The service was excellent as the server was super friendly and he recommended an amazing 2016 vintage wine to accompany the courses. It‚Äôs said that Madonna and Lady Gaga have visited in past stays in the city.', "A must in the Montmartre / Sacr√©-Coeur area.

The experience is memorable and the atmosphere is quaint and laid back.

We went for the first available reservation slot and the restaurant filled quickly after.

The best dish, in my opinion, was ravioli with smoked goats' cheese and wild garlic.

I highly recommend the wine pairing, although the white wines were in a different league compared to the red. While, I would enjoy the white wine again but I wouldn't miss the red.

Bread was served throughout which I really liked, going away from traditional fine-dine rigour. The crusty bread was a sublime wholemeal sourdough.

This instantly became my no-nonsense favourite fine-dine in Paris. Thoroughly recommended.", 'Highly recommended! Amazing food, they way the different ingredients are matched to each other, including the wine pairing is just sublime! The staf was amazing, super welcoming, knowledgeable and served with a nice sense of humor. Making the experience just amazing. They van easily customize the set menu if needed.']

Adresse: 6 Rue de la Chapelle, 75018 Paris, France
Reviews:
['McDonald‚Äôs

Food stay the same as any McDo. But services are always very slow and the neighbours is not safe.', "I came to eat at Mc Donald in the 18 th arrondissement of Paris by 3 : 30 pm on 19/09/2024. When I entered , there was nobody but me, so I thought I could get my food ordered to my table a bit early.

I paid 10.45‚Ç¨, as I  was hungry because I am a person with disability even though I do not carry my walking stick. I went upstairs to sit and wait for my order.
I realised that it was almost half an hour and my order didn't come.

Therefore I left and went to a chinese restaurant because may be it will never be delivered. I didn‚Äôt want to complain because it's about food. If they don‚Äôt want to give me, so I left.

Sorry but there is no respect of person and customer in this situation", "This place is absolutely disgusting. It took more than 30 minutes to get our food, the upstairs dining area was completely full of trash, dirty, messy, and I won't even talk about the bathrooms... Absolutely disgusting.", 'Worst mcdonalds i have ever been.
Bad food, they mistake my order and i wait over 45 minutes for mcdonalds food!', 'Horrible client not friendly place where all the electricity connections are removed!!!']

["The soft lighting, the elegant decor, and the gentle hum of conversation created a truly inviting atmosphere.

I decided to indulge in a classic French breakfast, starting with a perfectly brewed cup of coffee. The rich, aromatic brew was the perfect way to wake up my senses. Next, I opted for a flaky croissant, buttery and delicious. To accompany my croissant, I ordered a plate of fresh fruit. The combination of sweet, juicy fruit and the buttery croissant was simply divine.

As I sat there, enjoying my breakfast, I couldn't help but feel a sense of peace and contentment. L'Escale provided the ideal setting for a leisurely morning, allowing me to fully immerse myself in the Parisian experience.", 'The best in town. Best cocktails and they‚Äôre so nice. For the before don‚Äôt think twice L‚ÄôEscale is the place to be!', "Very good and cheap cocktails,the barman is very sympa and pizza are better than in diffa. Good place to party after coming back from Cherbourg. If ure looking for a bar for a date, it's the perfect place as the woman won't remember anything", "The barman here was drunk, I've been waiting, without exaggeration any, 1h45 to order a drink I never had. His behaviour seems quite violent also (he never have done anything to a client though). I would have rated 1 star if the drinks were not that cheap (like REALLY cheap seeing how the dosage is)", 'Good cocktails for good price, the ambience is really vibrant. Arrive early because the place get crowded very fast. Definitely worth it!']

Nom: Restaurant Indienne Au Palais de l'Himalaya
Reviews: ['Great food here. Good indian restraunt in Paris. Loved the food. We got the food very fast also', "Au Palais de l'Himalaya earns a solid 4 out of 5 from me. The overall experience was impressive, with commendable ambiance and delicious offerings. However, a minor drawback was noticed in the service, which could be refined for an even more satisfying dining experience. Nevertheless, the restaurant stands out for its noteworthy qualities, making it a favorable choice for those seeking a taste of the Himalayas in Paris.Also great presentation!!!", 'My husband and I had a lovely meal from the set menu on Tuesday evening. As the starter was so large we struggled with the main course. The set menu is 23 euros for 3 courses. The decor was colourful and I loved the poem in the menu', "I really love spicy food, and because it's not for everyone, I appreciate the fact that there are various levels of spiciness to ensure everyone has a great time. The food is delicious, authentic and served in solid portions.\nThe staff are friendly and efficient, and you can choose to sit inside or outside as there's a good number of tables.", 'Excellent food. Clost to train station.\nWe are south Indians, family of 4. We loved the food. We ordered Chicken Tikka masla, Tandori Roti. The food was delicious. We also had some tour friends from Oman and that couple too loved the food.']

['i LOVE this place! cocktails are amazing! the bar staff are lovely and very kind. thanks for an amazing trip  and when we are back in paris we will come back to you! ‚ù§Ô∏èüá´üá∑', 'I had a good meal based in the daily menu: les oeufs mayonnaise with fresh salad and a sausage with mashed potatoes. All food was tasty, the home made mayonnaise sauce was delicious. I recommend you to sit inside, it is vintage and really stylish.', 'Great Caf√©! The waitress was very nice and the food very delicious. They gave us the menu in English so we had no problem with ordering. Cute ambiente and definitely not a place that was made only for tourists. Would recommend!', 'Nice and kind stuff, tasty dishes, pleasure to come üòä', 'Amazing food, cocktails were great and if you‚Äôre a fan of 70s working men clubs the furniture is right up your alley! The service was the best we received in Paris, genuine and not after extracting every penny from tourists']

["The food, the service, and the environment are so so so so lovely. It was such a pleasant experience that I brought my French friends back to this restaurant for our final meal together. Highly recommend coming back here because it's close to Montmartre but doesn't have the overwhelming vibe of tourists.", 'Love this place. Excellent French food, great atmosphere and good service. Will always come back here.', 'Accidentally reached this hidden gem in montmartre, 18 Arr. ordered day‚Äôs special duck confit with orange reduction sauce. It was delicious. Vibe is homely. Everyone speaks just about perfect English. It‚Äôs a happy family run restaurant, at least it seemed so. Recommend everyone to go and enjoy!!!', 'Random strolling took us to this place which looked attractive on the first go itself. The staff was welcoming but the two lasagna we ordered was not upto the expectation at all. So we had to leave disappointed with giving the price not worth the food served.', 'We happened upon this lovely restaurant in June of 2018.  My friends and I LOVED our Quiche lunch.  My husband and I are returning to Paris in November, 2024.   We will MOST certainly enjoy lunch here together!']

['Absolutely a must visit while in Paris. The menu is diverse and delectable, alcohol and atmosphere is always on point, and the service is class and lighthearted as is the case with their sister restaurant Bonvivant.

We enjoyed a variety of meats and drinks at a reasonable price for the outstanding quality of the food. Pics below.', 'Good restaurant in a quiet spot around the corner from Paris Gare du Nord railway station. Good food from an interesting menu; we had gazpacho followed by a dish of raw langoustines with ham and grapes. Very friendly and helpful staff. Lots of outdoor seating some of it covered.', 'Went straight from the Eurostar to here and it didn‚Äôt disappoint! We got there earlier than our reservation and the servers were very accomodating.
French onion soup and veal peppercorn was outstanding.
Music playlist was unreal as well!', 'Remarkably excellent food! This owner chef is a creative genius. My dinner was superb. The staff is warm and welcoming, to locals and travelers both. They speak English so don‚Äôt worry about your French. The wine list has many delicious wines by the glass too. I had pork with a heavenly sauce and fresh warm bread, exquisite. This is a true gem in Paris, prices are good for this high level of quality and I‚Äôll be back. Don‚Äôt miss it!', 'Just right. A wonderful welcome, great food, super service and delightful wine‚Ä¶']

['Thank you for celebrating with us our 7th wedding anniversary. All the staff are super friendly and the foor is super. Will visit you again soon. ‚ù§Ô∏èüé∂üéâ', 'Incredible. I was looking for a great italian restaurant close my hotel. The food is just delicious.', "The Place is nice,the service is good....we ordered tagliatelle with cream and lemon but don't know what happened but it taste more lemon than creamüòû", 'Food is amazing!!!!

Wow the seafood pasta!!! So many mussels and deliciousness!!!

Service is fast.  Clean environment. Nice outdoor patio seating.

Also loved the penne pasta with bacon and mushrooms - so delicious!

I would come back here again! Great option for Italian food - especially the pasta.  Good sized portions for the price.  Not located on a super busy street.', 'Everything was great ! High quality food and nice cocktails.']

Adresse: 18 rue du Poteau, Pl. Charles Bernard, 75018 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Poor food and service. I ordered duck leg. It came out quick, but was salty and even cold inside. The waiter did not apologize when I complained. His attitude was arrogant. Will not recommend to anyone who wants to have a good meal.', 'Great brasserie in a calm but active neighborhood. Friendly staff and good food. The terrace is perfect for relaxing, people watching or meeting up with friends.', 'Quick, efficient service. Good beer, good ros√©. It is a tabac shop, so smoking is commonplace. Definitely worth a visit.', 'We have dined here many times and it is a must with each visit to Paris. The food is great along with the service. It is not a tourist mecca and hence is authentic.', 'Had breakfast here and it was typical French with baguette, marmalade, orange juice and a coffee for 6.5‚Ç¨. Nice and rustic place.']

['North african specialities, delicious food, kind and friendly staff, honest prices, I recommend it 100%!!!', "Went all the way there and found out that they don't open until 6pm which was not stated on their Google maps page. For that I won't give them a high rating.", 'Tasty traditional food set in rustic backgrounds.', 'Great food!', 'Excellant !!!']

['The service was excellent and the food fantastic! Kids loved the thin crust and flavor of the pizza (so much better than doughy and soggy options just a block away). The carbonara was made with fresh pasta and it was fantastic. Convenient location, good vibes and excellent food. Glad we happened upon it.', 'The best pasta carbonara in Paris is right here in La Villa Andrea.
The restaurant is well placed in a cute neighborhood, everything is very clean, service is great, and the owner is incredibly friendly and welcoming. Very positive experience. Highly recommend.', 'My spaghetti bolognese was ok nothing special 6/10.The sauce was a little watery and needed some extra seasoning/flavor.The rest of the group was positive about their food though.The service was good 7,5/10.Atmosphere is also good 7/10', 'We had an excellent experience here for lunch. We arrived when it was full and waited 10minutes for a table. So glad we did, the food was absolutely fantastic and all of the staff were lovely and kind. Can‚Äôt wait to come back next time we are in Paris!', 'Marco is the greatest host in Paris.
The greatest mathematician lasagna making riddle asking chef I‚Äôve ever met in my life‚Ä¶ and very good wine.
All Leeds aren‚Äôt we']

['Came here after someone recommended it and Loyo did not disappoint. We let the owner decide on what to serve us and it was the fried fish and the grilled chicken. The fish was so tasty that my friend even sucked on the bones. The chicken also had a nice creamy sauce that was very flavorful. Try this place, you won‚Äôt be disappointed.', 'The best restaurant ever! I‚Äôve had the pleasure of being introduced to this restaurant by my friend and it‚Äôs been the best thing ever. The owner is so kind, wonderful and personable! Made me feel like I‚Äôve been coming here for the past 10 years. I highly recommend anyone looking for good food to come here. I had the chicken and rice and then came back a second time before leaving Paris to eat here again. The atmosphere and vibes here are just immaculate. The food is so tasty and cooked to perfection.', "Delicious. We hoped for a great example of Martinique cuisine...and found it. The entree platter of assortments was awesome. Those samosas, wow. The prawn spring rolls were basically fine dining. Then the signature dish - the poulet. Definitely get it with the plantain rather than rice. The best, soft, sweet and juicy plantain I've perhaps ever had. The chicken was perfectly braised, the creamy sauce I could eat all day. It's a generous serving so two people could share it. We also had the goat curry which was equally delightful. Slow cooked and perfectly spiced, with black beans flavoured with cloves. Highly recommend for the flavours of Martinique, cooked at a high level.", 'Found this place as we wandered around Montmartre and I‚Äôm glad we decided to stop and eat. This was some of the best food I had in Paris hands down. I didn‚Äôt even take pictures of it because I was too busy savoring every bite.

The staff were super friendly and were patient with me as I struggled to order in French. Food came out pretty quick and left nothing to be desired. I‚Äôll definitely be back next time I‚Äôm in Paris!', 'I‚Äôve been here twice and both times for a birthday treat, so can‚Äôt comment specifically on the price.

For the rest, let‚Äôs start on the positive. The appetizers were excellent, just the right amount of spice. The main, a fish dish, was also very good, with lots of bold flavors. The dessert, chocolate cake with cocoanut ice cream, also very good. And the drinks? So excellent we each ordered two.

The up side with the service was they were very kind, happy to explain everything, and very patient when I made a mistake with my order and so had to change it.

As for the atmosphere, very comfortable, though not too fancy, so if that‚Äôs what you‚Äôre looking for, this place may not work for you.

Now for the not-so-great stuff. With the food, you should be warned that with the fish dishes at least, they bring you the whole fish, head, skin, and bones included. And while I could certainly scrape around the bigger bones and avoid the head, I was picking smaller ones out of my teeth the whole evening.

The dessert was fine, but nothing special as in you could get something similar just about anywhere. No specific spice or other intriguing touch.

Finally, I felt like the service was pretty slow. I had to ask for a menu more than once to get the additional drinks and dessert.

One final high note, though, as we were paying, the ladies offered us complimentary rum shots which were delicious!

If you‚Äôre looking for a solid date-night of tasty African cuisine, this is a great option.']

['Wow. I visited this restaurant as a part of a tour with Black Paris Tours. It was a wonderful way to sum up the amazing contributions of the African Diaspora to Europe and the world. The food was fresh, appealing, and delicious. It was the best food I had during my entire trip to Europe. I hope to visit Paris and this restaurant again.', 'It was good!\nThey serve big portions, I was really full. For 10-15 euro you can buy a plate of vegetables, rice and meat, nicely cooked.\nAlso, the berry+mint drink was tasty.', 'Fish and plantain was delicious! Highly recommend. Super authentic.', 'First time visit by chance! Oh my! This place is magic!  No menu üòã  but dish of the day is served. Kept us full all day! No frills but amazing quality & price at Euros 38 for 2 mains, 1 bottle whine wine & coffee!', "What a wonderful experience in Paris. Don't expect a fancy place, but the food is amazing. There's no real menu but instead you will be asked about your preferences and what is on sale today. Waiting time is a bit on the longer side but everything is made fresh. We totally enjoyed this dinner and will definitely return"]

['The waiter was enthusiastic. Food is good. Location close the train station.
The waiter asked us willing to pay him service fee that I did not say no (almost 10% of the bill).
Pricing of drink is higher than others restaurant. Example, a soft drink charged ‚Ç¨5.6', 'Took an afternoon nap and woke up late thinking we missed dinner. To our surprise, we found this late night gem within walking distance from our hotel and instantly became our most amazing meal and experience of our trip so far. Our waiter, Raphael greeted us as we walked in with a big smile and such a welcoming energy that immediately made us so happy of our decision to dine here. Won‚Äôt make this drawn out, but I‚Äôll just say, the food was amazing. The cocktails and wine was excellent, but the service was exceptional! Thank you Raphael for making our night truly special. ‚ù§Ô∏èüá´üá∑üôèüèæ', 'The menu was ‚Ç¨18.50, which is a very good price-quality, BUT there is a catch‚Ä¶‚Ç¨7.50 for a Cola Zero on tap, that‚Äôs a total SCAM! He also overcharged us! Will not recommend.', 'Visited tonight last night of our honeymoon and it was the perfect ending to a perfect visit to Paris. The sirloin was cooked to perfection, fries were delicious and the dessert was delicious! Staff were incredible, wish I had gotten the servers name to mention him here because he was beyond nice. Can‚Äôt wait to revisit in future.', 'Badly conned to take dish of the day, which was undercooked beef bourguignon and over salted.
I have not been offered a replacement dish or a discount after telling the waiter, who did seem to know when he saw the food left on my plate.
Sadly, I will not recommend it and will not return.
There are plenty of other restaurants around']

['Order: sea bass with potatoes and grilled pork with fries.
Came for the chicken but they didn‚Äôt have any so that was disappointing. Settled for whatever else was on the menu which was decent but I don‚Äôt believe the portion sizes are worth the price. The tiramisu tasted like water so it was clearly frozen. I think I would go back just to try the chicken but nothing else.', 'Amazing food and great prices! Definitely worth the money, we ate here 3 times during our three day stay in Paris and each time paid about ‚Ç¨15 per person. Great Portuguese dishes to choose from, friendly staff and good food. Would definitely recommend.', 'Simple and welcoming restaurant. Food was good and the price was good too. Recommend if you want a break from French cuisine. We got the fish and steak bbq. My steak was cooked a little over medium. The fish had a lot of bone in it so we had to be careful eating it. Portion was big as well. The chorizo appetizer was good as well. Slightly spicy', 'Visiting Churrasqueira Galo in Paris, located at 69 Rue de Dunkerque, was a delightful culinary experience. This restaurant, specializing in Portuguese barbecue, offers a warm and authentic atmosphere. The menu stands out for its perfectly grilled meats, including roasted chicken, ribs, and picanha, all prepared with a special touch of Portuguese spices.

Traditional sides like french fries, rice, and salad complement the main dishes perfectly. Besides the meats, Churrasqueira Galo offers a selection of traditional appetizers and desserts, such as past√©is de nata, providing a true immersion in Portuguese cuisine. The service is friendly and efficient, adding to the memorable dining experience.

A visit to Churrasqueira Galo is a must for barbecue lovers, combining authentic flavors and a welcoming atmosphere in the heart of Paris.', '10/1000!!
The food is amazing!! Tasty, juicy, big portion and well seasoned. Best food i‚Äôve had in Paris!! The staff is super friendly. The place is very basic and the staff does not speak very well English but we used google translate and everything went perfect! The price is very good also. I‚Äôm happy i can leave Paris with my tummy full üòä']

['Our family traveled from Manchester, UK, to watch the Olympics. We are staying nearby. This time we tried the pasta here, and it was incredibly delicious. There‚Äôs an Italian restaurant called ‚ÄúItalian Job‚Äù in Manchester, and their pasta is already very good. We never imagined that we would find a place even better than that. Thank you to the owner for the warm hospitality.', 'not very generous adding toppings...1 pepperoni slice per pizza slice...', 'Very good', 'Very fast and very affordable. Extra kind...', 'Nice Pizza']

['One of the best halal food buffet in Paris area, the food is amazing, the derived is also nice.

The food was hot and fresh and you can tell from the taste.

Fruits could be improved as the watermelon was not really fresh as expected

The deserts options are very good and you have a variety to choose from including ice cream.

Overall the restaurant is good, I would visit it back for sure!', "I absolutely loved the food the ambience and location. It was a fusion of indian and Iranian food but I found most of the foods are like Indian food. Salads weren't that great, starters were ok and main course was good all the curries were good. Desserts were also good and I would recommend this place to anyone. Although it was a bit expensive during evenings, I suggest going evenings only. I will go again and see if the menu is the same all days.", "Very nice restaurant everything was clean there is a very kind and gentle lady working the who doesn't hesitate he dedicate  you time and attention . Food is good most of it was fresh and it is resupplyed very frequently.  We took Iranian and Indian dishes they serve you water everyone your bottle is empty . In overall very pleasant .", 'The lady working there was super friendly and helpful pointed out all the vegan things and told us everything we needed to know. Table was clean and cleared quickly and there was a jacket left behind and they looked after it until the owner came back for it
I liked the variety of Iranian and indian foods the different salad things the pickles, grilled veggie things a lot, the seafood was pleasant and the calamari curry was really good the plantain and aubergine dishes were especially nice, the curries were really well cooked meat tender and balanced, only criticisms were the dhal was a bit too salty and the meats without sauce like the rib and the tandoori chicken wing was quite dry but I account that to going so close to closing

Would go again', 'The service was great, and the staff, especially the woman working there, was polite and helpful. However, the food fell short of our expectations. Before visiting, we had already tempered our expectations regarding the authenticity of the Iranian dishes. While the Joojeh Kabab was good, the Koobideh was visibly unappealing, even without tasting it. That said, we did enjoy the rice and chicken overall. It was a good experience, but not compelling enough for us to return.']

['A nice place to eat Lebanese food.
The food is good.
The service and hospitality are excellent.', 'It was an amazing experience! This restaurant is a great place to have traditional lebanese food with reasonable price compared to other lebanese restaurants around paris. We ordered the Mezze for 4 and we had a variety of dishes including chicken, meat and vegetarian food and everything was delicious! The taboul√© was so fresh and the sambousek so crispy üòç
For the desert I recommend the mouhalabieh which is very light and flavorful :)
The host is very generous and welcoming! The diner was literally perfect!', 'Food was great, sambousek and the lentils were our favorite. The waiter made lemonade for us because we asked for it even though wasn‚Äôt on the menu. No EN menu was the only disadvantage but the waiter explained the menu and some names and words we could understand.', 'From two Americans- the whole vibe was just right! Intimate setting, delicious selection of the freshest meats! We had Lebanese wine- Nakad, red- order the whole bottle it‚Äôs perfect with the lamb skewers. My vegetarian boyfriend enjoyed the lamb, get the lamb, DO NOT MISS OUT ON THE LAMB. Fatouche salad, Falafel,Taboul√©, Spinach fatayer & homemade pita. It was a 2 minute walk from our hotel, so happy we stumbled in here. Gracious host, didn‚Äôt mind our terrible French and spoke English.', 'Came in for takeaway shawarma wraps but it was definitely not to the standard and authenticity we are used to. The meat was not freshly cut off the spit as we would normally get, and you could taste and feel it. The chicken was dry and chewy so I'm not sure how long it had been sitting there at the counter. I think it was microwaved before going into our wrap, so it got further overcooked through this process. In addition, the wrap was quite small and not very filling, so overall very disappointing.

Edit: in response to the owner's scathing response, the purpose of Google reviews is to give your honest opinion of your experience to help guide others in choosing where to spend their money, it has nothing to do with "moving up in rank". I do not earn any money doing Google reviews so I would have no reason to lie. I also love garlic so I have no idea what they are talking about. London and Paris are considered equally expensive and for the same price in central London you can get a good quality filling shawarma wrap, so the excuse of it costing ‚Ç¨7 and therefore I should not expect anything of adequate size or quality is very poor. I'm sorry, I do understand that critical feedback is difficult to accept, but this was my honest opinion and in fair comparison against similar price and experience elsewhere.']

['Me and my son had wonderful time here. I found this cozy place 5 years ago while I was staying near here in my last visit to Paris.
I found varieties of creativities in entrees - they used Shiromiso - a Japanese ingredient with cauliflower source which was amazingly good.
They have English menus and are very supportive for non French speaking people like us. There were also many local people enjoying dinner so you can feel you are part of Paris people. Highly recommended.
I am looking forward to coming back to L‚ÄôAtelier Ramey, thank you.', 'This place was an absolutely amazing find. As soon as we walked in we felt the warmth of our host and from that point I knew I was going to love this meal!

The starter was a fish soup which was incredible and ideal for the cold winter months and absolutely bursting with flavour.

The pork and duck mains were so delicious and I couldn‚Äôt fault them.

For dessert we had a cheese plate and the chocolate dessert. They were so perfectly curated.

If I am ever back in Paris I will definitely make the trip back here for the food and the warmth of both the people in the restaurant and the hosts.

A true testament to Paris!

Thank you!!', 'We stumbled upon it as it was very close to our Airbnb and what a gem of a find! The food was absolutely delicious. Our server Dani was so energetic and charismatic making the service and atmosphere even better! Wherever you are in Paris, make the trip. Thank you from les quebecois! :)', '4.6 stars. We treated ourselves to a delicious meal at L‚ÄôAtelier Ramey after a long day viewing Olympic events. What a great way to cap off a great day. We were treated to a green tea mousse followed by several starters. These included 50-day aged beef tartare, a cold watermelon soup, and a ‚Äúperfect cooked‚Äù egg and Ni√ßoise salad. All were memorably delicious. Our entrees included veal, lightly-grilled tuna, and a vegetable dish. Both of the protein entrees were served over the same vegetables that comprised the vegetable dish. Again, these rustic preparations were fantastic. For desserts we enjoyed an expertly prepared chocolate mousse and traditional tiramisu. On top of it all was the wonderful service we received. Dani made us feel welcome by expertly describing each menu item in perfect English. He was as unique as the eclectic atmosphere that surrounded him. You won‚Äôt regret dining here. We plan to tell our friends and return on our next trip.', 'Last night I had dinner with my boyfriend at this cosy restaurant. The host and waitress are very friendly and helpful, very good at their job! And so are the cooks! We had a wonderful 3-course dinner, everything was prepared amazingly, with a special mention of the best panna cotta and chocolate mousse I‚Äôve ever had.']

["We sat randomly there. Most of the places open their kitchen at 19.00 again. So this place is one of the few where the kitchen is open continuously. The place was nice and the staff friendly. The food was also tasty. We took a steak and lamb. The steak was quite difficult to chew and they didn't ask us how we wanted it baked. Further we were waiting for the main dishes around 45 min and it was not busy. That's the only reasons that I put 3 stars. For sure go there and especially if you want to eat and everything else is closed.", 'Lovely pastry breakfast, very quick and good service.', 'First the worker lured us in. Then he hardly paid attention to us. When he finally came to us, and we didn‚Äôt even finish ordering, he looked at us weirdly and ran off. Turned out he went to the shop next door to buy some croissants. When the food came, we didn‚Äôt even get the right stuff.', 'A really nice and cozy place with polite staff and tasty dishes! Highly recommended üòä', 'Loved this place. The food looked amazing when it came as the presentation was so good. It was not what we were expecting from a bar, but what we had secretly hoped for. It wasn‚Äôt, food-cooked-put-on-plate as you might think from a bar but clearly followed the ideas of the chef, and worked. The staff were also just as you‚Äôd hope: natural, welcoming. It‚Äôs also a great people-watching spot when sitting along the outside by being where roads meet, on the top of a small hill. The terrace is not big, drawing tourists, but one layer, drawing locals. Like this and at this spot, it‚Äôs a great experience.']

['I have been a loyal customer of Subway since over 12 years, and first time I was sincerely disappointed with the service and the staff.

I RATED 1 ‚≠ê FOR THE SERVICE, YOU CAN CONSIDER IT IS NEGATIVE 5!!!

Date: 18-March-2023
Timing: 14H00

Firstly, they seemed seriously offended while we were placing the order and asked to add salad and sauces as per our choice.

Secondly, they charged me for 2 grand while 1 took 1 grand and one petit for myself and my friend, unfortunately I didn't check right away as I tapped my card, only after I paid, I checked and they again seemed offended. When I asked them to review the bill, they asked me to stand in the queue again and come and talk to them, all the while not even a sorry.

Thirdly, when the manager came and told me I can take another cookie and a nachos gratin, I placed the order, but they were so offended, they didn't add anything to the nachos except the sauces.

HORRIBLE SERVICE, Subway, I have visited your stores from India, to Spain, and across France, this is the first one where I am seriously offended, the least I expected was a "sorry".', 'We stopped by when switching trains at Gare du Nord and we were blown away by how nice the staff was. Really nice food and the employees went above and beyond. Not what we were expecting out of a Subway. Props to themü§óüëç‚ù§Ô∏è Good vegetarian options aswell.', 'Ibra was exceptionally good. Friendly, kind, helpful and efficient. A welcome change from the usual contempt we received in general, being tourists from the UK in Paris.', 'Staffs are very friendly and welcoming, not much people so it‚Äôs comfortable to order and take your time to sit down and eat', 'I‚Äôm regular Subway customer, and I like to eat it every where at anytime.
This branch in Paris is extremely bad and dirty! The food is disgusting, and i got food poisoned.
I‚Äôm very disappointed because it ruin my time in Europe, and this will be the last time to go to subway in Europe, and epically in France.
If anyone wanted to enjoy the time in Paris i recommend not to eat subway.']

["I'm giving Boggo 5 stars because I love the food but waiting 45 minutes for a sandwich with only two customers ahead of me is far too long to prepare a simple sandwich. I recommend Boggo to all my friends and neighbours but most people won't come back if they have to wait that long to get a simple sandwich.", "THIS IS NO LONGER A PIZZERIA!!!
It's an amazing sandwich shop. The chicken sandwich is really really good. And the guy working there is very friendly. Highly recommend", 'Updated: Upped from 4 to 5 stars. Has been 5-star pizza most recently. Nice job guys.

Superb service with a smile. Not 5-star pizza but a nice hearty break from the more-common Naples-style pizza. Fresh ingredients. We took the recommendation of another review and tried the vegetarian + potatoes. Crust could use a bit more salt. But again, very friendly, and a quaint relaxed atmosphere. Thanks!', '13,50‚Ç¨ Normal (middle) size "quattro formagio", not the Quality Pizza I expected. Cheese was absolutly not good.  7‚Ç¨ wood be ok', 'Nice little neighborhood place that doesn‚Äôt pretend to be anything it‚Äôs not. Decent service; good, cheap, satisfying pizzas that hit the spot.']

Adresse: 40 Rue de la Goutte d'Or, 75018 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Very nice and friendly', "Two specific points of this institute: 1) its value for money, one of the best in Paris. 2) yes it‚Äôs the ‚Äúlively‚Äù atmosphere but we‚Äôre still in France. I ordered a beef couscous to take away for the first time, but I usually take their famous brik (‚Ç¨3). Everything on the menu is very voluminous, the service very fast and welcoming.
Often very full around 6:30 p.m. to 7:30 p.m. on weekdays.
You really shouldn't generalize because you hear people speaking non-French languages, the atmosphere is friendly and human. It's 100% worth it.", "It‚Äôs a neighborhood must-see!
In the morning, large pancakes with honey (msemems is how it's pronounced), hard-boiled egg and without forgetting the best coffees with milk for 2 generations that you will never find elsewhere at this price!! thank you
Don't change anything, you're the best!
And then let‚Äôs not forget the lunchtimes with their magnificently hearty dishes, it‚Äôs simple! We eat well and at prices that are still as honest as in my youth. The staff is valiant and has not changed. And frankly I‚Äôm amazed that they don‚Äôt have more opinions!", "On vacation on Rue de la Gout d'Or, I visited this place often, congratulations to the lady who prepares the Msemens, they are excellent!
Having tasted the tea nearby, this is where it is the best üëç (no bitterness, well-dosed sugar)
Peaceful atmosphere, the dishes offered are appetizing (not tasted at the time of writing) the locals stop there, it's a sign!
Plus the guys who serve are very friendly!
Thank you for what you do and don‚Äôt change anything, Salamalekoum!", 'Food is good

Very good value for money.']

['Basic but nice and good value', "The owner is tremendous. With limited French on my side he accommodated us in English. Had a nice Chardonnay and charcuterie plater. Also cassoulet and steak frites. Very friendly staff and patrons. I'll be back once more before leaving. Outstanding!", 'Local watering hole that also does brasserie style food. If you are lucky they have delicious choux farci (cabbage stuffed with good stuff) . Traditional and I hope it stays that way!', 'Small bar in a corner with a cool service', "Didier is a character like no other!\nWe had one of the best times of our stay at Didier's place. His anecdotes are hilarious."]

['I got my wine and it had literal bits of goodness knows what in it. I had to send it back. It looked like it had oil in it almost (image attached)\nFood was ok but I have been a bit sick this evening since returning home.\nPlace Itself was very sweet and quant but unfortunately the food and drink was not good at all', "Great little restaurant. The grilled vegetables were perfect. And they have a great simple bolognese. I like simple meals made good. Don't forget the limoncello spritz with espresso.", 'An amazing dinner! The pizzas were loaded with flavor, and the service was outstanding‚Äîwarm, friendly, and attentive. Highly recommended!', 'Great little Italian restaurant. Cosy with delicious food and friendly staff. It‚Äôs definitely worth checking out for a nice dinner or lunch.', 'a small but fine restaurant with good prices. It is a popular Italian restaurant. It is recommended to book a table. in the basement it looks very romantic. the food is delicious and definitely recommendable. Parking in front of the restaurant is very bad as it is on a busy road. The staff is very nice. from me full 5 stars.']
["Hello, I usually have breakfast every weekend, it's always so good, good pastry, especially 1, very warm welcome from the girls."]

['the prices are decent, and the beef tartare was alright. the rest of the food was mediocre at best.
besides that, service is pretty aggressive, smells a bit from the toilet, you cannot pay with credit card, and they rejected a couple who just wanted 2 coffees.
did not really feel like paris, at all, for me.', "I stumbled upon this restaurant near my hostel, and it's a charming little place. I ordered the entrecote, and it was absolutely superb, incredibly delicious! The staff were also incredibly friendly. I highly recommend it!", 'Awesome spot to grab some reasonably priced food. Was great to be there during the World Cup with different folks cheering on different teams while still having fun. Lasagna was great, soup was mediocre but warm.', 'Fantastic service,  excellent plat of chicken salad and frites‚Ä¶.the accompanying baguette was out of this world‚Ä¶ such a stunning find‚Ä¶staff were able to assist with gluten free and several hours later- no problems so excellent all round', 'Be very careful, when the bill arrives they will lie to you and claim they only take cash, only to bring out the card machine when we walked several blocks to an ATM that would not work.

What kind of business does this to paying customers??']

['Very disappointed with this KFC. Ever order as served after more than 10 mins. I checked the timer on the screen. The staff are really bad. They were constantly talking and not serving orders as the line of people waiting for food was growing large. Food was ok but after such a long wait they forgot the fries in my order. Would not recommend this KFC.', '1,KFC dissatisfied me ,, they messed up my order, 2, the side dish is super unacceptable üò§, 3 the corn is somehow  sour,( like  spoilt it really  spoilt my appetite', 'For a fast food restaurant, the food was ok. The only thing that I was disappointed with is that they gave only 1 ketchup bag for 4 chips pack. For every extra small bag, they wanted 10 cents euro. How can a family of 5 people use only 1 bag.', "I just went there because it was fast food. I didn't want to wait for a long time. If you like fried chicken it's a good place to go.", 'I met Miss Randal, I was very impressed with the Customer Service she did.The smile and everything were on point.Love the service üéäüéäüéä']

['Spent 3 months in France and this place served my favorite meal. We asked the server to recommend some dishes and she brought us the mixed appetizer and a goat dish - everything was really good! She served some spicy red sauce (I think with habanero) on the side and I asked for 3 more servings. It was a similar taste as jellof to me. Also, the server was so nice as well. I will def return', 'The food is amazing! The griot fried to perfection. I don‚Äôt know what the red sauce is but bottle it immediately! Please and thank you!', "We were visiting Paris for my dad's birthday, and we thought it was a fun idea to get Haitian food as a tribute to him. I picked this place just based on Google Maps search, and I am so glad I did.We were trying to reconnect to our roots while in Paris, and this place did not disappoint.

The food was great! They have a good selection of staple Haitian dishes. We had a large party so we ordered many different dishes. They were all well made and tasty. I had and loved the goat, but I also wished I ordered the fried whole fish. There are also dishes for those who are new to Haitian food and offer a good entry point.

It is a decent sized place, so for us having a larger party, that was also a good thing. My only complaint was that they were understaffed the night we were there. It was a Tuesday night, so maybe they did not expect the volume. Our server was great, but I felt bad for her because she seemed stretched thin.

Please go to this place and enjoy the food.", 'This was my first time trying Haitian food and 10/10 experience. The Haitian fritters were 10/10, the chicken was amazing, salad served with the items, rice, black bean sauce, plantains ‚Äî EVERYTHING was seasoned so well and tasted great. I can‚Äôt wait to visit again to eat here.', "Living in europe the last 5 years, this place  reminded of home. The food, the service, atmosphere. The food delicious, the meat was tender, rice fluffy, the barbancourt sour was mixed well. I will be back the next time I am in Paris. The griot was amazing, the legume avec beef and diri jon jon. I can go on, but it's a must if you want to try something else beside French and Asian cuisine. Merci et a bientot!"]

["This is where the locals go. This is where you want to go. You cannot beat Chicken Avenue (they used to be Chicken 75) - the food is good, the portions are large and the price is very reasonable. If you are visiting Paris and want to see a slice of real life in the Quartier de la Goutte-d'Or - and better yet, taste it - come here. And get the spicy wings if you like hot wings/Buffalo wings. OUI.", 'The staff were friendly and efficient. Our fast-food was hot and enjoyable. The restaurant was immaculate, special items hot chicken wings & chicken roll....', 'Good food. Excellent service... must visit place', 'Good', 'So good']

['The first place I went for coffee in Paris. It was good, and I like the attitude of the guy running the place.', "A small, popular lotto bar in its own right.\nSo it's not very clean, everything is a little shabby or even dilapidated but it's a small, timeless space of which there aren't many anymore. The TV on one side, Amigo on the other but a large, long room with people from the neighborhood seated at tables. Not sure if we can eat anything.", 'Small and typical. It seems frequented by locals rather than tourists.', "Ones like this one... There aren't many left... the decor dates from the 60s (beginning).", '']

["Inedible fries (dry, soft and toasted). My sandwich in foil was flooded with sauce. You can't get this sandwich out without getting up to your elbows in it.
Bread even thinner and drier than the steak, even though the steak was already pretty good from the ground up.
Too expensive!

Nice team", 'Very good products, kind and friendly staff', 'Disrespectful delivery man,', '', '']

Adresse: 67 Quai de la Seine, 75019 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Charming restaurant with a cozy, welcoming atmosphere, some antique furniture and christmas decorations that created a unique, special vibe.
The waiters were incredibly friendly, making us feel right at home.
The food was fantastic‚Äî we had the crispy pork belly with pan-fried Chinese cabbage and sweet potato, and it was absolutely delicious.
Great value for money.', 'Authentic French vibe and atmosphere for a Tuesday night! This was right across from a hotel we were staying at and the front desk suggested it and they were right! Our food was so tasty and came out so quick! Also we got 2 drinks, 2 meals, and cr√®me br√ªl√©e for ‚Ç¨50!!! Great price for the food and service we received. Plan to go back for coffee in the morning!', 'The food here is amazing, especially the Poitrine de cochon, it‚Äôs like seared pork with thin sliced fried potatoes and delicous sauces.
The Entrecote sauce Blue is good with big portion, it‚Äôs seared steak with french fries and creamy sauce. I order medium well but receive a more like medium rare one. You can ask the chef to re-sear it to your favourite temperature. But overall, a good found to me üëç', 'It was a nice meal which was value for money.

The soup was very delicious and flavourful. Entrec√¥te beef was a bit tough and a bit overcooked for a medium done. Creme br√ªl√©e was a bit disappointing as it was a bit burnt and the custard was too eggy instead of silky texture.

Overall a good experience for this place', 'The staff were exceptionally kind and accommodating despite my limited French. The food itself was excellent.

The restaurant was quite crowded, which is a testament to its popularity. The lively ambiance added to the authentic French bistro vibe.

Overall, Le Bastringue is a gem that I highly recommend.']

['Inexpensive take out. Pizza is good for the price, but fried menu was mediocre and pasta was dry. Service was very nice.', 'Our neighborhood pizza place. Pizza very good. Excellent service.', 'Best falafel place in Paris !', 'The chicken Panini is delicious.', 'Awesome pizza place.']

["We just came for a quick drink, tried a couple of superb wine, by the glass. We also tested some of the dishes on the menu, tapas style, very fresh and delicious. I'll come back for more !", 'Amazing classic Paris Cafe in an up and coming neighborhood. Delicious food, multi course fine dining on a hot Paris night with the doors open and seating outside, it was like being in an Audrey Hepburn movie.', "Food was really good. Few choises for vegetarians. Sizes not very big; if you're hungry, you should choose a three course meal. A bit more on the expensive side.", 'Fantastic place to go for food and wine. Non-French speaker and the owner was more than helpful.', "My boyfriend and I had lunch there and had possibly our best meal we've ever had in Paris. Both meals were absolutely delicious and, even though there was nothing on the set menu for vegetarian, the chef made a dish especially for me. The service was also quick and friendly. We will definitely be back!"]

['The place has absolutely dreadful food, it cost 45 euros for a main course and a dessert. We had the chicken supreme for the main course, the chicken was supremely dry (as you can see in the picture) it tasted awful. The dessert was okay.
Only nice thing about the place was the ambience and the music.', 'The club has good vibes but not for my age. The crowd is age of 35+ and the not my vibe.
Drinks are expensive and the taste is not good , I spent 15‚Ç¨ for a mojito which just mojito I didn‚Äôt taste in it.
You need coins for the vestiaire not car accepted and 12‚Ç¨ entrance.', 'Great inclusive atmosphere. Music brings up together . Food 9/10. Price point Great! THANK YOU Celine for making my birthday great!!!', 'Good show we came to see Duo Pyr√®ne. Food and drinks could be better.', 'Wonderful evening here !
Live music show very exciting !']

['Delicious breakfast, great service, and good prices. We enjoyed it very much and highly recommend this place.', 'Came on a Friday night with my girlfriend and ordered the couscous special. Amazing! Hearty, flavorful, and a little spicy. The chef personally came out and asked if we liked it, and if course we did. I left so full it hurt. Server was attentive and spoke English. Prices were very reasonable. Would highly recommend.', 'Best bar ever, the two brothers partied with our group like crazy.', 'Outstanding food and service. Love the local atmosphere. Highly recommended.', 'Excellent food, fun atmosphere and great prices! We love this place!']

Adresse: 68 Quai de la Seine, 75019 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Lovely restaurant which had an extensive menu. I opted for the creamy mussels and fries - such a large portion which was impressive. The sauce the mussels came in was divine. My partner opted for the mixed grill which was nice and varied.

The ambience in the restaurant was nice and peaceful. Sitting by the window next to the river was so relaxing. The waiters were so lovely and made us feel really at ease. It was a beautiful way to spend our last evening in Paris and highly recommend!', "Great value for money! I couldn't fault our waitress, I had the 20‚Ç¨ mussels menu! Had 3 different flavours. The only negative thing was the waiter! He needs to pull his trousers üëñ up! Not professional in a restaurant.", 'I stumbled on La Cri√©e on my way to a nearby hostel and noticed the "All-You-Can-Eat Mussels" sign. It was past noon and the placed looked nice with its on-the-water placement, so I decided to go for it because those are not something I get to eat often.

I was quickly assigned a table outside overlooking the canal and had the table promptly set-up by Fred, the manager, who also took my order for the first round of mussels, a la Marin√©re (white wine, scallions, butter, parsley).
Good bread with a nice tuna spread was taken to the table with beverage, and a few minutes later a nice helping of tasty mussels was steaming on the table. The accompanying fries were properly fried, crunchy on the outside and soft on the inside.
I dug in and, a couple minutes after I was done, Fred came over to pick up the pot and took the second order: La Cri√©e (bacon, brown butter, garlic, parsley).
Again, it didn't take long before the pot showed: the brown butter could be clearly tasted and gave the mollusks a nutty and smoky taste which made'em delicious.
The third helping took me a bit to choose, because the choice between Roquefort and Chorizo was not an easy one. I went for the former and that was an inspired choice, even tho cheese and fish don't seem to be a great pairing at first. Well, they were, and the cook didn't skim on the Roquefort! The bread I had barely touched until then helped in cleaning up the pot at the end: that goodness on the bottom couldn't be allowed to go to waste!

Before leaving I also had a quick chat with Fred (it's pretty clear I'm a metalhead and we exchanged a few words about a few bands we both enjoy and also took our sons to see), which closed a very pleasant meal 1) for a bargain price 2) in a nice place 3) with kind and prompt service.
I would've gladly made a repeat on the day after but, by that time, I was strolling around the Pompidou Center before heading back to the airport. Will definitely return the next time I'm in town tho!', 'I highly recommend this sea food restaurant overlooking the canal. The fish soup was exquisite. The mussels tasted fresh and not too salty. The various homemade breads were too scrumptious and the demi salted charentes-poitou butter is one of the\xa0best I've tasted so far.

The ambience was so warm. The waiters were all welcoming & friendly.
Ahmadou and Antonio went out of their way to make us comfortable especially as we spoke "okay" French.

ARRIVE EARLY IF YOU DIDN'T MAKE A RESERVATION.

Watch for the water guard on the canal  watching for boats crossing under the bridge.', 'Restaurant by the canel, very nice atmosphere. Staff were busy but friendly. Foods were very good, the seafood soup is a must try. Lobster tails was good. Totally enjoyed the dinner with good friends.']

['Very lively atmosphere and I got excellent service and food, the people are so nice even though I can‚Äôt speak French.', 'Very nice place, full of life!\nAverage age is 30, good local beers and great hamburgers.\nA bit expensive.', 'Fun little local bar, super lively, will be back to the old magpie soon!', 'Quaint restaurant with pleasant waitstaff. Healthy portion sizes.', "Solid place to eat. The burger was under seasoned, and I'm not sure it's worth 14 euros. A small glass of beer for 3 euros is great though. I'd come back here for a few beers, but I'd skip the food, considering all of it was a bit pricey."]

['Nice food. Very crowded. Prices are right', 'Terrible....dont go!!! ['Excellent glacier', 'Very wide choice of good quality ice creams with good ingredients. Do not hesitate to enter the courtyard to access reception', "Excellent sorbets, not very sweet, fruit, lots of fruit.
And the welcome (at the back of the courtyard, don't hesitate to enter) is very friendly.
Also available for sale at the Monoprix next door if it's closed.", 'Very good value for money, quality products.
Additionally, there are ice creams for lactose allergies made from soy. So the sorbets are low in sugar so great for diabetics.', 'I entered out of simple curiosity and was greeted warmly. If you want to taste something exotic, you must communicate this before visiting']

['Great staff and attention to customers. Some items are a bit pricey though.', 'Nice store but sold out of the small Cristaline bottles of water', 'Quite a decent sized Franprix. Very clean. Friendly staff.', 'Neighborhood is not safe my car got broken into right in front of the store', 'Ok']

['I felt like a regular from the second time I visited. Having fresh bread every day is such a great treasure. I knew to ask for the tradition and was transformed by the quality and consistency of what the have to offer. They even advised me not to buy one at the end of the day. The deserts we had were very good. Nothing was rock hard as mentioned by another reviewer. Pain au chocolat was a breakfast staple for us all week. The thinks we bought were about the same or less cost as a grocery store across the street. How do they do it?!?!?  Visit with confidence.', 'Top top', 'Love their cappuccino!!! Baguette was fresh and delicious!! People that work their are so friendly and very welcoming üòãüëåüèª', 'Best bakery in the neighborhood! Quality and good prices\nMuffins are excellents üëåüèΩ', 'Correct .']

["Croustipate large and thin pizza\nI put the dough in the freezer. I wanted to make a pizza - Impeccable - It turned out well and cooked perfectly. one of the best pizza doughs I have eaten. The slightly crunchy edge. Too good. I'll start again next week.", '2 pizza doughs = 2 horrors to roll out. a sticky dough as possible. Avoid so as not to poison your life even with organic products.', 'Worst hairdresser of all time, he ruined my head, this North African', 'Anything but crispy', '']
['Good food and good staff', 'Superb and delicious food low cost prices wings spicy and yummy üòãüòãüòã', 'Taste good, all aspects are pretty good', 'Good food', 'Good one at Stalingrad']

["Don't buy frozen food, it often was unfrozed/frozen again (happened multiple time for me)

Take care when buying anything, they don't remove bad or passed food and put them in the front.", 'Franprix at Stalingrad is a mini grocery store...', 'Rude staff', 'Adorable cashiers but chaotic supply and inventory management for Franprix prices.
