The loyalty card never works there.', 'I think their cold chain is not always respected, which caused me indigestion after eating mozzarella purchased in this store']

['Hidden in a backstreet, close to Metro "Stalingrad we found it by accident: La Colombe  :-)  :-)  :-)  Une merveilleuse restaurant -  small, relaxed and still very comfortable. Mostly the locals are ccoming here.
+ Perfect food
+ and sensational service by Monsieur Mahmoud  !
***** During various stays in Paris, we NEVER have been treated an nicely as by Monsieur Mahmoud, who presented us a sensational Pizza and fantastic
Calamari fritti.
A place, where you can relax, refrain from HighSo-trouble and enjoy food, which is prepared not only with great ingredients, but also with the heart.
We LOVE IT !!!', 'wooo cool', 'A beautiful and quiet place with Sudanese meals', 'The people of Sudan are people of generosity and blessings towards you', 'I like bosses üôè']

["I'm pleased with my experience at Grand Central but surprised by the low rating.

The service was efficient and friendly, with smiling servers üòä.

The industrial vibe within 104 is inviting and comfortable. The Marble Cake was delightful, perfect with a cup of tea or coffee.

Honestly, I'm baffled by the poor rating. It's clean, bright, and overall pleasant. No complaints here!", 'I review with one star because 0 is not possible. We arrived in a busy Sanday at 14:00 with my two young children, so we were prepared to wait. Unfortunately, after 30 minutes, no one acknowledged our presence, even though other people who got there after us got served rather quickly. When we finally managed to get the attention of a waiter, she apologised and got as the menus. But another 15 minutes passed, and no one showed up still. The kids were hungry and thirsty, and no one seemed to care. Shame.', 'Fantastic Luncheon! Good ambiance.', "I've been coming there for a few years every time there's an event at Cent quatre. Beware of the guy at the counter. He's unreasonably rude. Go to Cafe Cache at the other end of cent quatre.", 'The bobo salade is too die for. Great service, cosy atmosphere and great value for your money.']

['Cool ppls', 'Great', 'Top !', 'Magnificent', 'Good Bistrorant. Good value for money and very friendly waitress.\nI recommend the Mango Cheecake and the Tiramisuüòç\nGood time in a very nice atmosphere.']

Adresse: 15 bis Quai de la Seine, 75019 Paris, France
Reviews:
['This how I imagined a small and cozy restaurant in Paris.
Very nice atmosphere, near the river, a variety of delicious food, prepared with love and taste.
The service was super friendly and fast.
We had a steak, perfectly cooked, as well as a salad and chicken with pasta!
Highly recommended.
Added bonus; very friendly prices as well!', 'Good food,nice environment and super friendly staff! Really like it', 'We were looking for somewhere to eat and stumbled across this place as a large group of 8 with kids. The staff were very welcoming and got us sat down in the very nicely decorated area by the front window.
Some of our entourage are fussy eaters yet they happily accommodated all of our needs without any fuss.
We found the drinks choice to be great (especially the champagne) and the food was delicious. The menu choice wasn‚Äôt huge but it covered most of what you would want/expect. If you like couscous you are in for a treat!
Overall, I would highly recommend this place and it was popular with the locals too which is always a good sign.', 'Good people , they helped us last night', 'Fabulous food and french champagne with an amazing view of the Louvre.']

Adresse: 10 Quai de la Seine, 75019 Paris, France
Reviews:
["I didn't choose less than 3 stars because the staff was really nice and the atmosphere was nice!

The coffee was good, but the hot chocolate was way too milky ans the moelleux was not that great, I was really disappointed especially for the price (15‚Ç¨ for one expresso, one hot chocolate and one cake) :(", 'Fairly surprised to see such a low overal rating. The service was ok, got the food fairly quickly. Great brunch, i like how they incorporates pizza oven bakes dishes into it :) great combo of sweet and savory! Also locations is very nice, right in a canal.', 'Probably the best service we ever had! All of the staff was super friendly and helpful! The food was great as well and the location was very cute and directly at the canal, though we chose to eat inside, as we were a bit cold.
We would recommend this place to everyone who wanders around this part of Paris and is looking for a nice little restaurant and bar with amazing service! Thank you so very much!', "Truly Italian-style pizza, great taste and very nice location in the city! The staff was very kind and helpful and we had a lovely time. Prices are a bit high but nothing too far from Paris' standards. Highly recommended!", 'I didn‚Äôt have lunch so I cannot rate the food, but the staff was super friendly and the terrace is awesome! Perfect spot to read and think while enjoying the sun.']

['The owner was incredibly kind to us and did his best to welcome and accomodate everyone. The drinks were solid and I really appreciated everything that was done for us. I would recommend it to anyone visiting the area!', 'most annoying restaurant ever people need to sleep after 12 am and still always a lot of noise till past 2am  VERY ANNOYING', 'The vegan couscous was great ! They could have more budget friendly options though.', "Simple but friendly atmosphere and cuisine, that's a big yes! Samy is very friendly, good value for money.", 'Cool little cafe‚Ä¶']

['the food was delicious with many options to choose from. It was easy to eat vegatarian or vegan. The stuff was very friendly and the ambiance cozy. I can fully recommend the breakfast and lunch. We enjoyed our meals!', 'The chicken was raw and the pasta was raw. A bone and pie crust was found in the rice. Breakfast was really nice. Mattress and pillows was stained.', 'Peoples are very nice at Mamamyokas and they serve generous food they have  different options', 'Great breakfast spread when I stayed at the hostel. Plenty of outdoor dining space too!', "Regularly ordering food from Mam'Ayoka for work-events/workshops. Always amazing service and incredibly delicious. Thank you! :)"]

['A highlight to the restaurant in Paris experience. Stylish modern atmosphere with wholesome traditionally cooked cuisine. The owner Neo was personable and quite accommodating while the waitress was courteous and charming, not to mention, both perfectly speaking English. A worth while dining experience while visiting the region.', 'What a nice place‚Ä¶the bar is cool ‚Ä¶.the music is out of this world ‚Ä¶with a secure security..the staff is extra cool and friendly..I really enjoy myself‚Ä¶.when am sad and lonely I go out with my friends to enjoy music, nice like sexy in the beach üèñÔ∏è Hennessy..Fred fish and meat üçñ', 'Very good', 'Cool', 'Nice place']

Adresse: 54 Rue Philippe de Girard, 75018 Paris, France
55 Quai de la Seine, 75019 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Nice bar on a boat, cheap too!\nSome cold plates, some sandwiches. A couple of beers and wines.\nLive music some days of the week!', 'I had a fantastic time on this cute little boat. ‚Ç¨4for a small delicious red wine and the nice man at the bar offered to let me try three different ones and they were all delicious. it was a great experience. I would love to return!  (3pm on a cold sunny Sunday late February) btw the ‚Äúsmoking‚Äù section was pretty smoke-free and perfect for any non-smoker.', "Small boat, has two sections. Smoking and non smoking. Super small area. Intimately close table arrangement. Has two small clean toilets. Food was tasty. Beer was good. 2 beers at 6.50 each isn't a cheap option for drinks, but the food was tasty and good portions. Chicken burger was around euro 9. So for 2 big beers and a chicken burger it was around euro 20. Nice place to have a drink or two.", "Do you wanna have a kind of underground music experience in a üö¢‚õµ boat? Well you should consider to check it out the program of this great p√©niche. I premiere I a piece for alto üé∑ with electronics. The place sounds great, and the surrounding ambience is great. Really a place to stop by, have some dinner, drink a üçªüç∫ with friend or in couple. Not very handy for couple with kids, but, that's life.", 'Great spot for spring and summer. Not a lot of variety but nice food and veggie options. The staff is kind and cool']

Adresse: 93 Rue Philippe de Girard, 75018 Paris, France
Reviews: ['I had a great time and enjoyed the classic Ethiopian food, excellent service and the warm welcome from the staff at the restaurant.', "We went last night and loved it. It's a small restaurant but the food is delicious and the staff is incredibly. thank you for a wonderful moment :) So happy this is not too far from my place and I can come back easily! Variety of options are available to decide from.", 'This is a fantastic restaurant. The food is very tasty and of excellent quality. The owners are so sweet and friendly! Highly recommend!!', "It's a small place, the food is delicious and the waiter was very kind to us. Highly recommendable!", 'Delicious! We thoroughly enjoyed our curries - the aubergine was particularly good but all were exceptionally tasty. The staff were very friendly and beautifully organised so everything was quick and easy. Recommend!']

["We stopped here for a late dinner and to try some of the local fare. The escargot was delicious, and I can now say I had French Onion soup from it's home country üá´üá∑

The service was super friendly, which really makes it or breaks it for me too.", 'An excellent little restaurant with lovely, attentive staff.  We ordered the special - veal liver - and found it prepared with care.  They also do an excellent burger if you wish.  Note - the bathroom is upstairs via a narrow, windy staircase - those with mobility issues will find the voyage challenging.', "I came here to try beef tartare for the first time. It was very good. The cappuccino is also excellent! The staff are super friendly. They assigned a lady who speaks English to assist me when they realized I don't speak French.", "The perfect spot. Food was delicious, staff were friendly and made the effort, cocktails were very nice and the atmosphere of the restaurant was laid back and very pleasant. I'd recommend dining early for dinner when it's not so busy. Dinner was so enjoyable, we returned for breakfast!", "I had breakfast there: the orange juice wasn't so good, the pain au chocolat either, but the coffee was a good one.
On the other hand, the ambiance is relaxing, and the waiter is very kind."]

['Exactly as it should be. Delicious food served fast fair price.', 'üôèüôåüé∞ Such an amazing place!!!!
L‚ô•Ô∏è\U0001faf6VE it. Such a kind Crew working there.
Our sweet girl ü•∞ felt safe and Happy.
Try the Pizza Norvegienne and the Tiramisu üòãü§§ü§©
Thanks so much, also for the humane prices and clean bathroom!
üëãü§ó from us3, see you soonüá´üá∑', 'Delicious sit-down or take out. Build your own sandwich pita or platter. Lots of choice of meat , veggies and sauces. High recommend- also reasonably priced.', 'Best shawarma ever. Very tasty. Excellent service. Vegetarian can ask for eggs - they are delicious here.', "Nice selection of meats and breads where you can build your own hot sandwich or pizza. The meat is halal which means the kebab is probably turkey and the burgers have a unique consistency but they're still tasty enough that I eat there weekly. Low priced, tables in case you'd like to eat on site and located close to the Canal de L'Ourq if you feel like a picnic and the weather permits."]

["Bog-standard Subway. Smiling staff with their mind on the job serve you as fast as needed, and the food is as you'd expect it.

They have a certain level of disrepair going on, and cleanliness left to be desired so close to opening time. Cramped quarters, seating upstairs that I didn't bother with.", 'The staff was super super professional!
One of the few subways that offer such professionalism especially with the guy making the subs.
Would definitely be eating there again!', 'Super friendly staff and the food was good!', 'Got incredibly stomach sick from this place, I‚Äôm sure cause it was the only thing I ate. Don‚Äôt go!', "Excellent Subway - fast efficient service and they speak English. It's very clean as well."]

Adresse: 9 Rue de la Guadeloupe, 75018 Paris, France
Reviews:
["Very nice place to eat, me and my girlfriend enjoyed eating here during our visit in Paris. Try the atchiek√©, you'll be surprised.", 'After sitting us on a table we waited for almost 2 hours without any menu been given to us, nor coming to take our orders. Waste of time. Do not go there.', 'Warm restaurant for a first tasting of Togolese gastronomy.
No need to book, very pleasant welcome.
Unfortunately the credit card machine does not work :(
No air conditioning in the restaurant too bad.', 'I followed Google maps to go to this restaurant in the 18th, the two dishes I had were impeccable. Except that Akoume was not yet ready when I arrived.', "I was forced to take the √† la carte dishes even though I originally came for the all-you-can-eat buffet. The boss told us that there was no all-you-can-eat buffet on Saturday. I believed it but when I left it was not specified on the poster. It must be said that there were only 2 of us but that's not very honest. Original cuisine, slightly spicy. Not bad but very expensive compared to the all-you-can-eat buffet, where we could have eaten the same thing. All this inconvenience affects the number of stars."]

['If you want to meet locals and have a genuine and honest french food with great value.', "This restaurant doesn't look like much but it's one of the best in the area. Momo is adorable and very welcoming. The dishes are simple and good.", "This restaurant doesn't look like much, but you have to dare to open its door. Unique, local, relaxed atmosphere. The dishes change every day depending on delivery. They are excellent, we are served in 5 minutes and the staff is very friendly. No wonder it has become the canteen of all the local businesses!", 'Well received, good kitchen, attentive waiter for workers who work nearby, basically to redo problems', "Very warm welcome!
Couscous every other Friday. Very good!
Affordable dish of the day!
To do again when I'm in the neighborhood!
Good cuisine and a good address in the 19th"]

["Open on Sundays all day. It is a smaller grocery store so the selection is somewhat limited but it's convenient and they have all the basic necessities and more. I just wish they would start carrying the pink donuts again, they were really good and I miss them.", "Fruit all rotten, wouldn't buy anything here. Walked out to the other supermarket", 'A supermarket with good price and you can find a lot of things.', 'Fast location for quick pick up', 'Nice supermarket.']

Adresse: 61-63 Quai de la Seine, 75019 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Love this place, laid back and very friendly. Huge portions with swift service. Probably our best experiance so far eating out in Paris.

Would 100% recommend. 4.8/5', "Well located by the canal, this restaurant is very baby/kid friendly! üë∂ They have high chairs, toys, books and a dedicated area for kids! However you need to pay 8‚Ç¨ to access this area.. The food in general is simple and good, nothing extraordinary but for a high volume restaurant it's fine!", 'Spacious repurposed building where the furniture is school desks. Good food and service. I thought the king prawns on my tagliatelle were a bit mushy but otherwise liked it all. Reasonable prices. Loved the banoffee', 'I came to Paris to eat but with the rain and some fatigue I tried staying closer to my hotel. This was down the street and it‚Äôs had a few things going for it: an menu that had a few intriguing dishes, a hip looking crowd, and the guy that met me at the door was pretty inviting.

I ended getting a cuttlefish and potato salad with an onion dressing and a vegetarian lasagne. Both dishes really hit it out of the park for me. I‚Äôm normally leaning carnivore, but had been overdoing it on the trip so far, and so I was happily surprised that the veg lasagne was possible the best veg one I‚Äôve ever had.

I was also peaking at the tables by me and the burrata avocado tomato salad also looked great, and the frites looked home made and home style with skins and plenty of dark bits on the edges.', 'Fun and hip little place, very atmospheric, welcoming staff, food was yummy, overall really great experience!']

["The staff are kind and very helpful. That said, the grocery store gets a 3/5 stars because of the prices. I find it's expensive for the neighborhood and compared to more upscale supermarkets like Monoprix.", 'Convenient for last minute supplies but the surroundings are quite threatening (I have been attacked twice), and the shop is messy, some fridges are broken and some vegetables or fruits rotting.', "Not a fan... doesn't look clean. The 2 starts are for the people working there they seemed to be nice.", 'I like this one . Service there is very good .', 'Variety if items by modest prices']
['Really Really worthless to run away from', 'Very good clean fast food and really good chicken sandwich.', 'Great Atmosphere!']

Adresse: 196, Avenue Secr√©tan, 196 Bd de la Villette, 75019 Paris, France
Reviews:
['If I could give 0 stars I would have done it right away. Hygiene non-existent, everything very dirty and as icing on the cake we saw the whole ratatouille family walking around the kitchen.', "They do follow quality standards of the brand. They should have all the products of the Menu. Not only the most expensive ones.

If you want to have a different thing. Don't open a McDonalds. Go and open something else.", 'Poor seating facilities downstairs.

Staff were fine.

They allow homeless to sit and remain within the restaurant which made us feel uncomfortable as well as the smell putting us off our food.

Chips were well overcooked and just warm.

Premiem salad was nice,  burger was,  well,  a pile of glunk.

The area this is situated in was filthy dirty with a very strong smell of urine outside their doors.

Overall a very poor experience.', 'The worst Mac Donald I have ever went. They don‚Äôt have any professionalism. Stuffs don‚Äôt wear caps, they don‚Äôt use gloves, they don‚Äôt smile when talking with guests. The fries were not salted, the chicken in the burger was old and smelly. They didn‚Äôt have any salt and pepper. They didn‚Äôt have any ketchup. Even they didn‚Äôt have any sanitizer.', 'Forks were knocked to the floor and not cleaned in the whole time I was here']

['Great tajine and couscous. Friendly staff', 'A friendly place in the 18th: delicious pizzas and couscous like in the countryside; the mint tea is incredible and Rachid always has a smile. Absolutely worth discovering üòò', 'I often go there with my brothers and friends, the manager is a good, friendly person, the food is so good, lots of choice, good luck.', 'Friendly place where you eat delicious couscous at a reasonable price. I recommend!', 'Very good pizzas made by chef Rachid, always in a good mood! It also makes very good Ti Punches!']

['The meat is amazing, Recommended', 'very goood man give my double fries for free, if you will in dublin call myüòâ', 'Great kebab been going since I was a kid. The staff is super nice too', 'For me the best place to eat kebap. The service is better.', 'Good food with good staff']

['When in europe, coming from Asia, I crave for chinese food. Finally found Kim Yang due to its good review. I really had a great meal that i came back the second time while in Paris. My favourite dish is the fried beef with ginger on hot plate, omellete with shrimp and grilled pork spare ribs. Everything here is good. They even give free kerupuk. The price is very very worth it. The cheapest and most delicious chinese food i found in Paris. Two thumbs up! Will definitely come back when I come to Paris. Sorry we were so hungry and forgot to take picture before we eat so some of the picture was not complete.', 'Loved it, the food was delicious,  and most of all, for Paris, it was Very Very reasonable and affordable.\nü•ü dumplings are a must try, and the dumpling soup also.', 'Tasty, well priced range of Asian food, mostly Chinese. Quick service too. My chicken and lemon sauce, plus veggie chop suey were very good, esp the chunky strips of chicken breast', "I posted a previous review but i am sad to add this not so glowing review. It is all about this shrimp dish, one of the chef's specials. Cocotte crevette  thialandaise. Now apologies for spelling. Unpeeled shrimp in a hot dish, with a sticky sauce. How am i supposed to peel these shrimp without getting the sauce all over my hands, the tablecloth, my shirt. Seriously? I am not a prep cook in your kitchen. Chef 101; when the dish has a thick sticky sauce, you must peel the shrimp. Lazy cook. The shame is, it tasted fantastic. My husband's dish was great. It ruined the experience for me.", 'Some of the best Chinese food we have eaten.  Our children (12 and 10) ordered two of the soups for entree and they were incredibly delicious.  We also ordered Sweet and Sour Pork, Noodles and Beef with Broccoli.  All delicious and fresh.  The staff were helpful and welcoming.']

["Perfect restaurant ! Food quality, good portion, not expensive and the taste is really amazing. I totally recommend! personal really kind, great welcome. All is good for me.

I really love Asian food. That's a great restaurant if you want to eat good food with friends or family.", "AMAZING food. All our dishes were delicious, with a mix of spices that turned every dish into a special experience! You can't miss this place if you like Thai food. And if you think that you don't like Thai food, give this restaurant a try anyway. Bonus: prices are very reasonable.", 'Very nice food, fresh and delicious.
The service is great, very kind and friendly staff. Amazing atmosphere. Plus, the prices are very reasonable. You go to eat and you walk out with full belly and big smile ‚ò∫Ô∏è!
Best restaurant in the area!', 'I‚Äôve never ate such unauthentic Thai Food. It was more like a mix of Chinese cuisine and trash. When I go to a restaurant I expect that the meat is properly cooked . The meat in this restaurant was raw and the consistency was like gummy. The noodles were cold and the vegetables were dreadful. Everything they ‚Äúcooked‚Äù came from the microwave. I‚Äôve never experienced anything like this before . I can‚Äôt recommend this to anyone.', 'Really good restaurant really friendly service had a the thai chicken for 12 euros and the portions were huge!']

Adresse: 20 Pl. de la Chapelle, 75018 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Best meal I had in Paris. Very friendly service. The couscous is very nice. Much better than what you will get from the supermarket. I enjoyed various tastes and was very delicious.', 'Great place for cheap good food and people watching', 'Nice breakfast, fast and low price']

Reviews:
["Momo's restaurant in France is an absolute gem! The food is a masterpiece of flavors, and Momo's personal touch adds an extra layer of magic. A must-visit for an unforgettable dining experience in France.", 'Absolute delight, people are great!
Perfect place to visit to have authentic Indian food in Paris!', 'Niceüòçüòçüòçü•Çüçî', 'Food was very delicious and friendly service', 'Very good meal this lunchtime in this small restaurant which offers a varied cuisine with a few Indian dishes to order, all the products are fresh and at affordable prices (14‚Ç¨ per menu).
Simple, attentive service

['One of the best places where I had the pleasure to taste Chinese food.. I tried the noodles saut√© with vegetables and it was amazing.. I also tried the chou, a green dish less flavored but very balanced and balancing to the other dishes.. The atmosphere is good and warm.. The chairs and tables are cute and lovely.. The service was also great and the owner (I suppose) is very kind an smiling. If you ever come across this place, I advise you to try it!', 'delicious, fast, friendly staff, I recommend', 'such tasty authentic food! great quality and prices for paris! lovely service as well! awesome vegetarian options·µïÃà', 'The best Asian restaurant experience we had during our trip in Paris! I recommend this restaurant to everyone who loves Chinese food!', 'Very nice meal, fast service and not expensive at all üëç']

Adresse: 227 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Martin, 75010 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Chanced upon this cafe while looking for a brunch place and I‚Äôll tell you, we weren‚Äôt disappointed. The server was super polite and charming (turns out he was also the bartender); he didn‚Äôt speak English but we were somehow able to communicate and joke. Anywho, the food was good, ordered the mushroom omlette with a side of frites and that‚Äôs exactly what is what - eggs & mushroom without any additional over the top additions. The Croissant could‚Äôve been from the day earlier; but overall had a fun experience having breakfast and people watching on the Parisian streets.', 'best bar in pAris, owner and staff are sooo nice and everything is fairly priced, amazing energy ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è french fries are so so so delicious', 'Called in for a drink ended up having food enjoyed it so much we ended up having 3 meals over our stay\nStaff member Momo  (hope I‚Äôve spelled his name right) very friendly very helpful and couldn‚Äôt do anymore or work any harder to make sure everyone was looked after\nFood & drinks very reasonable priced which is always a bonus', 'Great little spot near Metro Louis Blanc.  Prices were great, very friendly and fun atmosphere where food is available.  Staff were super friendly.  I will return if in the area.', 'Very rude staff. We asked for eating, they said yes they sandwiches, then another waiter told no food available. And they charged me 5 euro (!!!!!) because i used toilet. And they made very aggressive gestures. I could also drink something if they ask me instead, but we left because of their aggressions.']

['John from Kannur made this visit wonderful. From the minute we approached the restaurant he made sure that our every need and want was seen to promptly. The location was perfect. The food, amazing! If you have the deep urge for spicy, southern Indian food, this is the place. You will not be disappointed. Every bite was straight from Kerala. Thank you for making our visit perfect John!', 'It is always a surprise when you see an Indian restaurant outside of India. It is a bigger delight when you realise that the restaurant serves delicious food combined with a fantastic service. That is the story of this restaurant.\nThe aappam is amazing and cheap and they also offer it with different options. It is an absolute must try in this place. Look no further than this place if you are looking for some refreshing Indian food.', 'Typical Indian style cafe, mostly you will find the South Indian flavours. Quality and the quantity is  enough for the traveller. Very friendly staff, Kudos to them.', "I visited this restaurant with a group of friends. The food was average, not exceptional, but it was still decent. The flavors didn't stand out, and service was just okay. It's an option if you're in the mood for a quick Indian cuisine, but there are better definitely choices available in Paris.", 'Amazing food! Had a veg biryani a non-veg Thali,Paneer 65 and chicken 65.The taste is just like how you find it in India.Comfortable and clean place with outdoor tables.Neatly maintained.This place deserves a five star ‚≠ê rating.Friendly staff and good cook.Should definitely check this place out and if you prefer coming by metro it is quite nearby.take the number seven metro to Louis Blanc and if you have maps it is nearby.definately love giving this place a five star ‚≠ê rating']

["You can spend long time here.  Normally it's  difficult to others at this area.", 'nice place i like it', 'Ok', 'Cool', 'I had a latte in the morning, excellent, also friendly service, however no pastries, I had to buy an average chocolate pai on the side..']

['Top Service and superb food', 'the best kebab in town, large portions of meat. perfect staff. 10 stars out of 5 possible', 'Best kebab in Paris? Good quality food and quantity at correct price. Service was friendly and they took time to make sure everything was OK.', 'I was cheated here. Ordered a sandwich for 6E50, then when it was ready was asked what I wanted to drink. I didn‚Äôt want a drink and said so. Then they started yelling and talking super fast to make me think t was included in the price of the sandwich. I asked 3 times if it was included, and each time I got yes. Handed over credit card and got it back with a receipt for 8 euros - including 1.50 for the drink that I didn‚Äôt want. Nasty.', 'The wrap was OK. Nothing wrong with it, but it just wasn‚Äôt that flavorful. A bit disappointed, since I saw the positive reviews before I went, and it was really busy, but not that great. Maybe I ordered the wrong thing?']

Adresse: 3 Rue de la Chapelle, 75018 Paris, France
Reviews:
["We went on christmas Eve evening and it was open. The crew is really welcoming and the quantities are very pleasing. You won't leave here on an empty stomach üòÇüòÇ
Only flaw, the restrooms are not as clean as expected in a restaurant... Very dirty", 'not good Fried chicken. i ordered and they give me old Fried  chicken.  very bad experience.', 'Great fried chicken for a good price! Plenty of other options.', 'This was an interesting spot. I was hungry for some chicken and happened to be near this place.

After I looked at the menu, I asked for 38.
It was some kind of pita pocket with sauce and chicken. I asked for small.
OMG, it was good!!!

The toilet is upstairs and there are tons of seating upstairs as well.

Prices was good.
Portions were good, maybe even by American standards too!
While the ladies that worked there seemed to be not as enthused, they did a good job of getting food done and serving!

Near Marx Dormoy Metro stop.', 'Really good fried chicken at really low price. The star deduction is because the menu could use  more sides other than French fries - ideally some salads.']

["The food was kinda okay, except the miso soup for me. The plate looks small and it‚Äôs was overstated. But about the service - you need to do something. Extra 1‚Ç¨üòÇ for sauces ( kinda weird if i‚Äôm taking sushi‚Äôs, or your sauce cost you a lot?),
second think - that i ask for a time because i was in rush, they told about 10 mins.
2 sets of rolls.
2 misos
and one wakame took me 25 mins instead of ten, so if you don‚Äôt have time - just go, because for me - i just miss my plans, and also the thing the restaurant was empty kinda strange ( SOUP, WAKAME (They already prepared) so it‚Äôs tooks 25 mins to make a 2 rolls with empty place.

No napkins, you need to ask about chopsticks.
Cmon guys, do a service, not money growing because for me your place looks cindy cringey

The rolls quality- i‚Äôm not sure, because it‚Äôs doesn‚Äôt worth it. I will also add the photo. Check how much rice they got, and about avocado size.

The restaurant saves every penny and does not even provide normal service/product. Everything takes a long time and there is no communication between the waiter and the cook about the time. I don't recommend it", "I've dined here twice in two days during my time in Paris. Initial reviews looked great, however they really do offer fantastic service and quality food. I tried the sushi and gyozas and on both occasions they were freshly made and tasted delicious. Prices are very good! A new favourite when I'm next in Paris.", 'Good restaurant serving nice food.', 'Very good sushi, noodles and skewers! Pricing is cheap compaired to the rest of the restaurants in Paris. A must go if you want to eat sushi when you are in the neighborhood!', 'Great place, delicious and fresh food, kind staff and very nice atmosphere!']

['I am Turkish and have enough experience to objectively evaluate doner/gyro/shawarma quality. Bedri brothers has one of the best examples of doner outside the mainland.\nI live abroad and was visiting Paris. I was pleased and surprised to find a doner shop as the best restaurant in the neighborhood and they surpassed my expectations. It is a quick and clean restaurant serving delicious doner.', 'Waiter and cashier who helped us was nice, we‚Äôeaten the food, it was normal no really taste not really bad, I waited only 10min to get my order that was cool', 'As a Turkish person, I can easily say this place is super delicious with good quality ingredients!', 'I was there by myself I didn‚Äôt speak French at all the staffs were really helpful with ordering and when I was eating few different staffs came over to check if I was okay with the water and sauces. It was really nice. Didn‚Äôt expect this from a kebab shop. Fries and kebab was cooked at the spot, it was freshly made. Very yummy!! And I think they kebab might not be as big as some kebab shop but for me that portion was more than enough especially you want to finish the fries as we. I would highly recommend!', 'I got the mixed grill, which was a bit mixed. The kebab (doner) meat was excellent, the kofte was good, but the two shish meats were quite average lacking in seasoning and flavour (no spices or marinade that I could detect) as well as being cooked on a flat top as opposed to a BBQ or other form of grill. The fries were ok, and the rice and breads were nice.']

["Clean, well frequented and well decorated. There you can find, among other things, Azur pastis (you can't find it anywhere else in the Paris region), Floranis and Ph√©nix anisette. On the other hand, I find that the prices are high for Azur pastis.", 'Good spot for a simple drink rue de Crimee\nTypical atmosphere üëç', 'The bar has a charming atmosphere, old decor and very good coffee taste.', 'Avoid!! Extremely unpleasant boss!', '']

['Service is amazing, Salomi the boss, Kawtar & the crew all turn it on,  Highly recommended.', 'Horrible experience "" over priced!
Shisha horrible.
Excellent for the Tiktok not Quality.', 'Steak is good
Place no interest underground and noisy price very high over $150', 'Good customer service good music good food and good shisha', 'Very nice']

Adresse: 77 Quai de la Seine, 75019 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Absolutely great place! The servers were extremely kind and attentive the food great and the general atmosphere is very friendly!', 'Remarkably good service! The staff is outstandingly friendly and the food was excellent. Allez-y les yeux ferm√©s !', 'Excelent place. Simple and fit but, waitress always on, delicious food and nice price!!!', 'Friendly staff and really good different kinds of sushi at reasonable prices. Popular among locals both to eat there and get delivered. Highly recommended!', 'Very good and honest price! Bought there many times already']

['This is a fantastic spot to enjoy authentic South Asian cuisine. The food is delicious, and the prices are incredibly affordable. In fact, I even asked them to double-check the bill because I thought they might have missed something we ordered‚Äîthe total was that low!

Their mango kulfi is delightful, though we did come across one or two that were less flavorful. However, their milk tea is absolutely amazing.

I highly recommend this place for anyone looking for great food at excellent value!', 'Good and tasty authentic Tamil food! The Kotthu Roti was reaaally good a 10/10, the Dal soup was perfect, Masala Dosa was good too, unfortunately just the Rolls didnt have the tamil filling as it should be.
Super cheap and affordable prices, big portions and a very friendly service. Obviously you go there for the good food not for a fancy dining. Thank you, we recommend! ‚ò∫Ô∏è', 'Very good Sri Lankan food for a very good price. Very friendly staff. Good variety of foods to enjoy.', 'The\xa0food\xa0has\xa0an\xa0authentic\xa0taste,\xa0and\xa0the\xa0service\xa0and\xa0staff\xa0members\xa0are\xa0friendly.
The\xa0owner\xa0is\xa0also\xa0quite\xa0pleasant\xa0and\xa0helpful\xa0to\xa0customers. During\xa0my\xa0trip\xa0to\xa0Paris,\xa0I\xa0ordered\xa0three\xa0times.', 'This is the place to eat if you want to taste original amazing Tamil food! We ate there 3 times during our stay in Paris (idiyappam, kuttu roti and biryani, respectively). We also bought rolls and vaipan to go. The prices are quite low too. Highly recommend!!']

['Dined in as tourists.
The food was delicious, especially the steak dish. I didn not expect the size of the plates, they were really large.
The server was really friendly and had no issues conversing in English, unlike you usually see somewhere else.
However, the bathroom area was disappointing (the cleanliness could be improved), so one star will be lost.', 'Food was only just OK, had Confit de Canard and it was very dry. Forgot some of the sideorders and some were not correct. Points for the friendly service though.', 'Small brasserie with friendly hosts.  We had the ravioli and the croque monsieur.  Both were good but will leave a lasting memory. The price was certainly ok. The patrons civilized and the music not too loud, so we will keep a fond memory of eating there. The mousse au chocolat and the cr√®me br√ªl√©e were very tasty btw :)', 'This restaurant is very good!!üòä
The food is very good!
The chef and the waiters are very friendly and funny.
üòçüòçüòç', 'Very good french cuisine.  Stellar, friendly service']

['We recently revisited this restaurant after two years, hoping to enjoy the same great food as before. Unfortunately, we were deeply disappointed this time. The chicken and tikka biryani were very poor in taste and quality. It‚Äôs a significant drop compared to our previous experience. Unless there‚Äôs an improvement in the menu and cooking, it will be challenging for them to maintain customer satisfaction. We truly hope they can bring back the taste and quality they once had.', 'Sadly have to give this place 1 ‚≠ê only. Did not check any reviews before going here but can only agree that it feels dark and a bit dirty.  That is not a problem but the food and service was also terrible. Just taking orders was long, getting the food was even longer some people at the table waited 1h20 to get a plate. Kids waited 1h for a cheese naan. The food (i had vegetarian) was just spicy and mostly liquid, I have eaten this befor and this was bland, spicy and lacking vegetables. Saturday they had special biryani with fish üê† but very salty and spicy üî• Anyway first and last for me.', 'Nice and authentic restaurant for Indian food. Service can be slow but the food is good. It gets hot and you get out of there with food smell üòÖ', 'Its a worst restaurant i have ever eaten in my france life the service quality is worst and the food quality worst than it and the server does not know to talk in either french or english', "I don't know how people make negative comments.  Seriously this is one  of the best  restaurant I visited in recent time and this is the real Indian food I recommend 100%. And  yes food is little bit spicy but customers can command for no spicy then everything is fine. Service I give 5* as I observed. Obviously food take some time to prepare. Overall this place become my best in my bucket list. Please visit üôè and order as you and preferences.  Thank you"]

['Great restuarant with a variety of food and beers! Great opton to have a meal!', "There were an Italian, a Spanish and a British....it sounds like a joke...but it was true. We were all here for a meeting and we found this pub to watch some football matches and to enjoy easy food.
Everything here was great. From the staff to the beers and the food.
If you'd like to spend a nice time with friends just jump in here and have fun.", 'Great food.  Provide counter service but the will bring your food to the table.  After 10 days in Europe a burger,  nachos, and chicken wings were what was needed.  We will be back most likely as we are in the area for a bit.', 'Great place to stop for a meal which was around the corner from Holiday Inn Express. Had the steak ü•© and for price was enjoyable. I would come back as it is a relaxed atmosphere and sits along the canal for a nice table side view.', 'Guys, seriously you need to do something about your service and the cleanliness of your restaurant. We asked polite several times to bring us CLEAN glasses please. You didn‚Äôt even remove the lipstick from them and they were dirty inside (see the photo).
The tables are greasy and sticky, forks and knifes are dirty too.
It‚Äôs really a pity‚Ä¶']

["It is a perfect hotel for solo travelers, especially if there are going to a concert at Zenith. It's super close to the metro, there are a bunch of small cafes and shops where you can stop by for a quick bite. The neighborhood felt safe, the staff were friendly, the breakfast was good. I'll definitely be choosing this hotel if I'm attending anything in the neighborhood. Loved the design of the room.", 'The hotel has extremely clean and well-designed rooms with all what you need after visiting the city or working all day.

The personnel is very kind, extremely efficient and welcoming. The area is growing but this place is a sacred nest.
Some of the rooms on the highest floor have a view on the beautiful Philarmonie.

Make sure to reserve a table at the restaurant if you are not yet vegetarian...!', "good hotel! staff, breakfast, location! Only they didn't return the money for the reservation, which was withdrawn from the card! I also paid in cash on the spot, as they said they would return the money to the card! but this didn't happen, where should I go? was 6.12.24-7.12.2024 Lykhostup Oksana", 'The rooms are freshly renovated,the service is ok.There is one gentleman working at the reception though that needs to look for a different job.Very rude attitude,totally not qualified to work with customers.The lady working at the reception is a lovely person though.The parking situation is a bit annoying if you have to enter and exit the parking regularly.You have to pick up and bring back the card/key to enter the parking to the reception every time you need to enter the parking.

ATTENTION!!
Most strange about this hotel is that you ‚Äúpay‚Äù double for the room when you book through Booking.com.The money that was hold on my credit card for the reservation (the full price) hasn‚Äôt been refunded yet and it‚Äôs been 2 weeks since we‚Äôve checked out.I paid cash for the room while checking inn.So if you need that money urgently keep that in mind.They do this even though it‚Äôs advertised on Booking.com that you don‚Äôt have to pay nothing upfront.This normally means that there‚Äôs no pre-authorization deposit hold on your credit card.So i see this as false advertising.Never had this at any hotel before,very strange system.In our case it takes a whole month before the money is released by our bank.

There is a metro station right in front of the hotel but it‚Äôs like 30 minutes to the center of the city by metro.For the price the hotel is good but there is definitely room for improvements', "For us, the location was perfect. We stayed in the hotel because we went to a concert in Zenith La Villette.

The room was nice, pretty big even. There were blackout curtains. We had a room next to the street, but we didn't hear anything. Nice!

The only negative thing about the room (for me) was the full carpet. I have bad allergies, and with carpet like that, they flare up.

Breakfast was okay. Nothing special: some bread, croissants. There were both sweet and savory spreads."]

Adresse: 2 Av. de la Cascade, 75019 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Nice very colorful place, too bad the weather is cold. Great terrace in a parc.
Friendly service.
If I was not mistaking I even saw a massage service in the corner :)
Not far from the subway.', 'Located inside of the park and closed to the metro station, nice fun energetic queer bar and children friendly, drag race screening was fun to watch. It‚Äôs in the Paris metropolitan area, so I did pass through some scary part of Paris to get there, but once you are here it‚Äôs all rainbows and glitter.', 'This is a delightful bar in a charming park - and it serves delicious cocktails (can heartily recommend the Summer Ros√©). Lovely atmosphere (family friendly during the day and early evening - suspect it gets a bit more hedonistic the later it gets).', 'Went on a Sunday afternoon, and it truly was something special. Maybe arrive earlier to avoid queuing for more than half an hour. The staff did what they could with the amount of people they had to deal with. Super delicious pizza and patatas bravas. Prices were reasonable.', "It's a must for Parisians and libertine citizens for a good vibe and music in one of Paris most beautiful parks. Sunday tea dance has become a legendary event. One of the only places Parisians are willing to queue."]

['Fantastic couscous and tagine. Great selection of meat or vegetarian dishes. Delicious wine from France and Morocco.

The staff were so kind helping us seat our two year old.

The food is absolutely incredible, so very tasty and plentiful. We asked for more vegetables and toppings with no problem.', "Reminded me of my father's cooking \U0001f979üá©üáøüá≤üá¶", 'Excellent food and very good service. The couscous is delicious!', 'Amazing experience dining at l‚ÄôAtlantide with my friend. The waitress was sweet, the food delicious and the wine to die for ( wine from Maghreb chosen to complement perfectly your dish no matter your choice). Of corse I recommend the address but make sure to make a reservation if you wanna secure your seat!', 'We went there not knowing what to expect but we left highly satisfied. The service team was very nice and quick. We had several variations of Tanjin and Couscous. All of the dishes were extremly delicious.
On the photo you can see a Lamb Tanjin with dried fruits and roasted almonds. Sorry, the picture is slightly out of focus as I was shivering in anticipation...']

['I was not able to take a photo of every food that we had but everything that we got was delicious. The service is great. The staff were really friendly and helpful if you want to know more about the dish. We dined outside and it was perfect. The interior of the restaurant is beautiful.', "The place to be for a Sunday brunch overlooking Buttes Chaumont Parc. Please proceed with a booking beforehand although there are plenty of tables inside and outside.  Don't miss their unbeatable brunch menu combining both sweet and salted delicacies! There is also a wide range of freshly made juices! After your brunch you can wander and enjoy the rest of your day in the park!", 'Cozy atmosphere, very good price/quality ratio (lunch menu)', 'An amazing restaurant, charming and tasteful in a glorious garden setting, with wonderful food and superb service from Jacob. We met Australian friends for lunch and shared tapas plates‚Ä¶ the staff came out with a candle in a little cake and sang happy birthday when we let on my wife was celebrating a birthday. A memorable afternoon, merci üôè', 'If you want to get ripped off LITERALLY this is the place. Situated in the park, lovely villa with a nice terrace is a lure. Once inside, they roll parchment paper across the middle of the table and the menu concept is pre-set appetisers ( just some dips with grilled vegetables ) which they charge ‚Ç¨37 per person. So for 3 of us was ‚Ç¨110 for 9 grilled carrots ü•ï ( like we are rabbits üê∞) 3 dips, 1 slice of watermelon with few grapes on top and 2 slices of grilled eggplant with a spoonful of cooked grains on it ( do the math üòÇ ). In addition to that we got  tartare as the main meal which was meat mixed with arugula salad kind of thing ( it should not be called tartare ) and a ‚Ç¨59 milanese that came as two small pieces of meat-which is a rip off again ( not classic Milanese - some altered version of it ). Drinks are also more on a whatever side. All in all‚Ä¶run away. It‚Äôs like a mermaid‚Ä¶pretty but you get slaughtered‚Ä¶they deserve to close. Service was super nice but those poor servers can‚Äôt do miracles if the owners are greedy. This is a tourist / instagram bs .Stay away from it or rather go to a Michelin for that price and eat properly, like a human being.']

['One of the best Asian buffet restaurants in Paris!', 'I wanted to have a meal in this restaurant, there were plenty of empty tables, but I was told to leave as they "had no vacant seats". No further explanation. Incredible!!!', 'All you can eat buffet, if you want something cooked they do it in front of you.\nWide selection of foods in the buffet and all to perfection.\nThere is also a wide selection of deserts to choose from.', "Perfect place for eat, nice people, and it's cheap!", 'Food was really cold , they seemed to think a microwave was the solution that‚Äôs how people get food poisoning.I will definitely never go there again.']

['Franprix is Franprix, but this one has a nice ambiance to it, jocular staff who rib one another in indulgent mirthful teasing, which makes grocery shopping as fun an experience as I can imagine it being', 'Very good restaurant, good music, great service. It‚Äôs cheap.', 'Good thing it is now renovated and became spacious and more pleasant to shop.', 'Affordable price, fast service and some original products despite few diversity.', 'Very clean, well supplied, very helpful staff.']

['During my brief stay in Paris in June 2023, one of the days I was there alone without knowing the language, a guy from the staff named Kevin treated me wonderfully. He gave me impeccable service and was very friendly. I appreciate it.', 'Is a great place to eat a pizza. Environment was clean and confortable in winter. The personal was kind and someone speak English and Spanish aswell. It was my favorite place to eat something fast and tasty', 'Horrible pizza for 18 euros.', 'Fast food, just a counter with a prompt service, nothing fancy, no tables. A pickup and go spot.', 'A great place to grab a late bite when everything else is closed down.']

['Top service\nBest chocolates', 'Yummy chocolate and waffles', 'Top', 'excellent', "I don't know the quality of their chocolates, but the candied chestnuts are so tasty. What's a shame is that the costs are very expensive, it's not just with you, it's with everyone who sold candied chestnuts"]

['The store is extremely clean and everyone is so nice! I went in for fish to make a ceviche with and they recommended this beautiful bar filet, debonned and deskinned. It was perfect, and mind you we consumed it raw! Will definitely come again.', 'Waste of money', "A fishmonger sparkling with freshness and superb products, a caterer who will delight you with the quality, invention and care taken in his preparations, always sound advice and a hyper professional service: every Saturday, I stock up there and It's always a guaranteed treat! I can't wait to go back next Saturday!", "One of the best. I have never disappointed....\nAlthough this shop is 2 stations away, it's worth the cost of walking....\nVariety of seafood, starters, paella,... are very good.", 'These are clearly the most expensive prices I have seen so far at a fish store. I bought and tasted, nothing special compared to the others. It‚Äôs not fresher or better. Just a lot more expensive.']

['Very pleasant staff, food very good, especially the couscous. So nice came back for a second night.', 'Great food, great wine, great atmosphere.', 'Great little neighbour cafe, with good food and drinks', 'The staff was so friendly and we really needed that after a tough time. They really made our day! Lots of local people having lunch = food is good. Thank you again for making us feel welcome.', 'Great little restaurant/bar  the food is very good and the service is excellent. Good range of drinks very reasonable prices.']

Adresse: 107 Rue Manin, 36 Rue d'Hautpoul, 75019 Paris, France
Reviews: ['A random stop and a great experience. Tasty cuisine and a great maitre d.', 'Nice owners, engage with client√®le in polite yet friendly manner', 'Coollll', 'Nice surprise, this neighborhood bistro where the chef offers family cuisine at a reasonable price with a waiter who is really attentive to satisfying the customer.\nThe herring and onions were tender, the beef bourguignon was tasty and generous and the caramel cream added a sweet final touch.\nThank you for this pleasant meal break.', "Food is okay because fries are generally tasty, not that expensive, but unfortunately the waiter decides what you eat. We were not given time to look at the menu nor were we allowed to say what we would like to eat. The waiter decided that we would have fish and chips and chicken. Also a soup that we didn't actually order. Still nice to hang out and watch people."]

['Great selection of produce and non perishables. Easy for me (an American) to find what I came for and bonus treats! Definitely recommend', 'Something was seriously wrong with the girl who worked the morning of October 2, 2024. She should have left her personal problems at home rather than being rude to customers. There is another Carrefour nearby and two Franprix. I am boycotting your store for this rudeness.', "I did not understand the attitude of the cashier who is usually very friendly the other day I had not taken a bag unfortunately and I was loaded I am a good customer but I did not appreciate her authoritarian remark when I took a paper bag to put my purchases no but these are bags to put vegetables in I felt ashamed we shouldn't exaggerate either I found this remark inappropriate the same another time no bag I wanted take a box I live next door there was none except an empty one in front of the door he refused to give it to me I find these attitudes quite impolite towards a close and fixed clientele especially since the prices are quite high I did not appreciate it at all", 'With the passage of G20 to Carrefour City this gives a good clean look. It remains a practical convenience store... And the staff is friendly and fast.', "honestly this is very practical because it's downstairs from my office but the dry croissants reheated from the day before leave you wanting, the microwave in the room and filled with moldy water just makes you vomit. but avoid your croissants from the day before, it's a total lack of respect. dry croissant dry or stiff chocolate bread made something."]

["Super very generous the service is perfect very good welcome a small couple over 50 years old I advise you to go there and very well located
I recommend the Algerian Chorba soup
13‚Ç¨ for a soup and a pancake is a bit of bread it's a bit off", "Excellent address with several brick specialties, m'hadjeb, stuffed pancakes, plain wheat or barley pancakes.
Excellent value for money.
The people who work there are welcoming and warm.
I recommend.", 'Excellent Mediterranean specialties! Fresh products, unbeatable prices! Go there with your eyes closed! The terrace allows you to enjoy your meals!', 'Very good home-cooked food. Ideal for eating quickly.  The couple is very welcoming. I recommend', 'I tried the stuffed pancake bricks, it‚Äôs really good.
I recommend with my eyes closed
The manager is extremely nice.']

['Worst sashimi in the city, very bad staff they laugh on the clients, I will NEVER go back/recommend.', 'Very nice pieces of food. Soup was also ok.    The portion is enough for one person and even the two people can eat to feel almost filled up with taking the set. The qjuality to price is also satisfying.', "One of the best Japanese restaurants we've been into! Superb service and nice people... The taste was amazing... We took the menu for two persons (Menu Yoshida) and it was an amazing unforgettable experience! :)", 'Very good sushi restaurant and take away. Good service and very friendly staff. I can recommend this restaurant. Greetings from Netherlands.', 'Lovely place with fantastic, authentic food and great service.']

['Plastic recycle ‚ôªÔ∏è machine available in Franprix üëçüèª', 'ok', 'Correct', 'Terrible service', 'One star because I can't give less. I found fruit flies in the "fresh" juice at this Franprix, and when I reported this to the staff, they said they already knew about it and it wasn't the first time that it was happening. This shows that the fruit used is probably bad. Their answer? ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs nothing.‚Äù Truly unacceptable.

This is not the only bad experience. I have also found mouse droppings on products on several occasions. The staff is extremely rude.
(Also, there is one cashier who seems to have a habit of charging me more than necessary, causing me to have to come back several times to get my change.)

Bottom line, avoid juice at all costs, and if you get sick, you'll know where it's coming from.']

['Horrible experience ordering there. Food was cold and tasted as if it was from the day before. Also waited for two hours. Disgusting!', 'A nice little burger place with a neat and tidy interior, staff were attentive and a good selection of options (classic smash burger style). I liked the fact they had a vegetarian smash burger, and some veggie nuggets that the kids enjoyed. Food was served quickly, and was hot and tasty.', "Ambiente is okay, but the food has a very bad quality. Don't buy a vegetarian burger might be filled with rotten food.", 'Don‚Äôt get me wrong - the place was simple and nice, with quite decent food. The servers were very friendly and welcoming, and the food was decent. I would go again. The only reason I gave 4 for the food was because it wasn‚Äôt as good as other burgers I have had, but I still highly recommend for a quick bite.', 'Amazing!!!Came here near closing time with my family and my uncles about 10 people and they still let us eat in even tho it was near the closing which was quite kind. Furthermore   there beef burger was class the best I‚Äôve had and quality fries to.After we were done eating we asked for a bottle of water and we only had 50 cent but the guy taking our order paid for us and he asked what football team we supported and we both supported Man Utd and because of that he gave me a hug and was really ecstatic about it.That just made my whole day and summed  up the amount of hospitality you get here.']

['Nice and cozy place. Very tasty food,great service. The soup is fish one, hot and nice.Deserts are ice creams.', 'I enjoyed the food here. The staff where very pleasant also.', 'Tasty, good selection of sushi and warm dishes. Quick and friendly service. Visited a few times before while in Paris and will come again on a next occasion.', 'Lovely place, gentle attentive service, really nice sushi. Quite a perfect experience.', 'Best value Japonais food around here']

['Good attitude, always open. Recommended.', 'Normal prices', "I've never seen it, I'm shocked üòÆ
This morning I go to this Franprix to buy just a salad and a cucumber
She took ‚Ç¨5/90 cents from me
When you see a renoi du bled you have to hagra him
To avoid strongly recommended never again
Even grocery stores are a thousand times better than big stores ü§¢", "I came today to return a phone charger that was defective (it was the 3rd) because they announced a 2-year warranty but they told me today that ultimately it's 2 weeks to make a return and that I bought it 6 months ago so the warranty is not valid.  They are incompetent people with 2 tensions who don't even know the principle of a guarantee. To flee.", 'It happens a little too often!!!! Charred chicken and potatoes for 3.90 euros.
