Adresse: 34 Quai de la Marne, 75019 Paris, France
Reviews:
['What a great team of people works here to make you feel welcome. From the barman to waiter at the terrace. And than the chef surprises you with more than delicious food. We came here one evening by accident for dinner and returned the next day especially for lunch.

Both times the experience was great and I cannot wait to return in teh summer when the terrace will be even nicer.

Lots to see, because along te canal there is a parade of people jogging, walking their dog or couples enjoying a walk together.', "2nd time here it's a must. Food amazing,staff very friendly and helpful. Atmosphere delightful", 'I had a great smoked salmon bowl. Healthy. Good portions. Reasonable prices (remember tip and tax are included). Very friendly and personable. Great walk along the canal. Stop by and say hi :)', "Very good and kind service, speaks English very well. Explained the menu amazingly. Food was well-priced and phenomenal and fastly served. The ambiance was great, the restaurant looked spotless, and the location is beautiful, close to canal. We will defenitely return here next time we're in Paris.", "After seeing the reviews, I'd thought it would be worth trying this place. As an expat, the food scene can be amazing, if not overwhelming at times. Making the best of your evening is a must and the food should speak to your experience in Paris. Sadly, I gave this place 2 attempts (to be fair) and I can say, save your money. This is a hard pass.

Over cooked chicken where its so dry its the texture of drywall. Seriously, cooking a bird isn't the most difficult thing, to chalk it into wall paste is an achievement.

If you like fries, you're going to be angry. Soggy, half done noodle like squiggly potato strings that only serve to make an attempt at driving a higher dish price. Do yourself a favor,  throw some ramen in a warm glass of water and sprinkle salt on it...wait 5 minutes and you'll have a better taste than what they serve here.

Food - 1/10
Service - 5/10 (4 bonus points for English  mastery,  1 point of attention)
Decor/location - 8/10 (if only the food matched, omg!)"]

Nom: La Marmite d‚ÄôAfrique, restaurant social et solidaire
Reviews: ['Friendly service, cosy canteen feel, yummy food at a great price point!', 'Top', 'Excellent', 'Is  good üëåüëç', 'Excellent !!!']

['Although the restaurant is small, it has very nice ambiance. The available staff is very attentive and helpful. The food was delicious and very Indian in taste. Went with family for a dinner and tried chicken tandoori, chicken tikka Masala, Naan. The bill was higher side but considering the portions it is in accordance. Highly recommended.', 'The portions for the midi menu were plentiful! We had the curry chicken and the tandoori chicken pictured here, and shared a mango lassi. I can honestly say that it‚Äôs one of the best Indian meals we‚Äôve had in a really long time. If you‚Äôre in the area, definitely stop by.', "I got the fixed price Delhi meal for ‚Ç¨17.50 with Tandoori chicken, lamb curry, cheese naan and fresh fruits for dessert. The Tandoori chicken was excellent. I used to live in Delhi and it's hard to find good Tandoori chicken abroad but this came close.", 'Very good restaurent for Indian food - high quality food, very nicely organised interiors. Loved the Ganesha murti and other wall hangings from Bharat/ Nepal. Highly recommend Mountain for desi food', 'Very tasty and fresh food.Place is also clean']

['Was thoroughly impressed with the exceptional quality of their cuisine. The price is reasonable, and the flavors are truly outstanding. A must-try for anyone craving delicious asian dishes in the 19th', 'Kind and passionate crew, good prices, fresh tasty food. Not your everyday asian restaurant. As students ( Low budget) we were literally saved and were in an awe how cheap it is considering its quality and paris.', 'I went there in 2018, it was amazing', 'Disgusting', 'Nice']

['Great place to get food late at night. The people are very friendly and can make any orders based on your needs.', 'I stopped there to get a pizza.\nThe staff did a good service, they spoke english with no problem, the food was good, the price was nice, I  recommend this place.', 'Very nice restaurant I really recommend it', 'Without teste  and back side of the pizza is raw bad quality', 'J‚Äôadore. Friendly staff, good food, LOVELY price. Really good guys üëçüèºüëçüèº']

["Not ethical behavior from employees.

As some people already pointed here, some employees of this place cannot understand basic consumer rights.

For example, I bought a supposedly chocolate donuts package, but the filling was apple. The cashier said that it was their fault that the flavor was different but she refused to give me the correct flavour and just ignored me (literally).

I'll never buy anything from this place again and will try to stay away from Franprix.", "If you don't like to be cheated, never go to this Franprix. It has been years we noticed that the prices displayed are frequently not honoured. The few times we noticed it, we had to flag it to ensure they correct the price. Today, we wanted to buy a soup. The displayed price is 3.99‚Ç¨, but they wanted to charge us 6.79‚Ç¨. the cashier started getting slightly aggressive when we flagged it up. After he went to check, he said the product was not correctly placed hence it is not the right price, insisting on charging us the higher price.  We decided to leave without buying. From now on, I'll boycott this branch.", 'Small store with a limited selection and elevated prices. There were signs on products that indicated they were on sale but the price underneath was exactly the same. This is a neighbourhood store to visit if you are missing a single ingredient or need a quick snack. This isn‚Äôt a place to do your regular grocery shopping.', 'i always make my shopping there', 'Smallish branch of this popular supermarket.']

['No credit cards, only cash payment? I‚Äôm not sure this is possible this day and age! In fact I paid with credit card only last year in the same shop! There are several supermarkets around, yes I will be shopping elsewhere. Disappointing!', 'The employees are super helpful and also kind. At the cashiers, the efficiency is pretty high.', "very rude staff working here.. don't waste time for shopping here.", 'The security guard closed the curtain 10 min before the closing time, and he was extremely aggresive blocking our way.', 'Not a huge supermarket but has everything you need. Very good prices, great location.']

Adresse: Attenant √† la Grande Halle de la Villette, 211 Av. Jean Jaur√®s, 75019 Paris, France
Reviews:
['We came on a calm weekend (school holidays), for a quick dinner, and left during a concert that had started in the meantime. The place is great (high ceilings, cozy decor and outside space), as are the pizzas üçï and the staff. More the half the tables were removed at 21:15 to give space to the concert, which was clearly indicated from the start. Can add some stress if you are still eating (we had to be on the lookout for tables that wouldn‚Äôt be removed for the concert in order to get one and finish our dinner), but it is what it is. Same for the noise. Overall, good experience.', 'This place had a really cool vibe and the food was good but the birds were hounding us our entire meal (although they were pretty cute).

The wood fired margherita pizza was great as were the fish and chips.', "Are you hanging around with friends in a ‚òÄÔ∏èüòé day in spring üå±üåº Paris and you need a not so quick stop to recover forces, aka, take a beer and a üåØüåÆ, with some fries üçü perhaps? Well you're in the right place, choose your sit ü™ë under a üå¥üå≤ and enjoy a moment in this beautiful place. Price/quality is alright.", 'Somehow landed here on a Sunday evening & there was live music with an amazing vibe.
Lots of cool people. A bunch of kids too.
Very happy we decided to stay
I also must add that the pizza was great too ! We devoured it.
No service thou. You have to make a queue & order & then pick it up. But worth it', 'We chose this restaurant for its convenience, as options were limited near the Zenith before a show.

The space boasts a spacious, cozy setting with an industrial vibe. However, the service was notably lacking, possibly due to being understaffed on a busy Saturday evening. Our ability to order food was restricted until 7 PM, although our server accommodated us at 6:50 PM. Despite this, our pizza order, even after several reminders, took over 40 minutes, leading us to cancel it. Both the sweet potato and bruschetta entr√©es were disappointing.

While the ambiance is inviting for drinks, the dining experience was underwhelming. Additionally, seating near the entrance can be uncomfortable in winter, as the cold wind sweeps in each time the door opens.']

['a nice experience that allowed us to eat kosher in Paris the prices were reasonable and the atmosphere very oriental you would have thought you were in Tel Aviv', "Always a great time here. Friendly staff and so many choices of different small plates. The menu is diverse and there's plates of delicious bread, butter, mustard and sea salt all scattered across the bar", 'Cheap and cheerful, no frills but solid food.', 'Seating outside too hot and on the street', 'Very good falafel!!! ‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è']

['We tried Chez Arnaud last sunday and it was just Amazing!!! We tried the beef burger, the chicken burger and the Monroe Pizza.. Everything was just great. The place is very nice in a calm street near Parc de la Villette.. The staff is friendly and the service is very good. I highly recommend!!', 'Truly an amazing experience. The food is amazing, the olive oil at every table is to die for. The desserts were all homemade and delicious. If I was local this place would get a weekly visit. A must go if in the area. Worth the travel to Paris alone!', 'I had dinner here tonight and it exceeded my expectations! It is a small, simple restaurant, but the food is delicious! I ordered a Saumon (toasted bread with smoked salmon) because I wanted something light and it was so good. My husband ordered Le Bacon and it was soooo good as well. I highly recommend this restaurant. The staff is also nice!', 'I didn‚Äôt expect that this restaurant is THAT good!! One of the best Magret de Canard that I‚Äôve even eaten in France! Very nice and friendly staff :) super highly recommended ! And I definitely will come back here !', 'Fabulous! The food was perfect. We had the vegan burger and one of the pizzas. Both were full of flavor but on top of the great food was the excellent service! Harold was top notch, excellent and extremely kind! The owner was also there and he was very nice as well. The place has great music and great decor! Worth the stop in the neighborhood.']

['The food is delicious and fresh, good price and the service was great! Many vegan options too. Our  waiter Lounbna was so lovely, she just make us feel so welcome and she helped us to choose the best options from the menu, I 100% recommend this restaurant, and I will go back for sure!', 'My husband and I enjoyed our lunch at Cedars restaurant Paris. The food was tasty and we did not have to wait for long before the meals were served.  The waiter was very kind and helpfull.', 'The food was spot on. We were going to grab takeout to take on tube to a rugby game. Decided it was so nice to just sit down and take our time to enjoy meal. Food was delicious. Staff were very friendly and polite. Highly recommend', 'Great food, lovely presentation and friendly staff. Good value for money highly recommend it', 'The food was very good that we ordered more and the service exceptional. I did not have wifi and the kind waitress let me hotspot from her phone. Would recommend.']

['Best Asian food I‚Äôve ever had.

Food was fresh and hot that warmed us from winter.

The duck was so flavorful and beyond amazing. The pho was so great and mouthwatering. The dumplings was just wow.

Staff were friendly yet don‚Äôt speak English but managed to order and eat.

Honestly highly recommended it. You have to try this restaurant before leaving Paris.

Food was out of this world', 'Amazing food and experience the best i had till date', 'Best pho I had ever. I‚Äôm from Vancouver.', "Best Pho I've had in ages. Fantastic broth and the cuts of meat were super delicate.", 'Nice huge portions and very fresh flavourful food! I went for the bobun and the summer rolls and I barely finished. Will come back soon!']

['Delicious. The choices are reduced to few dishes. Always a good sign of homemade and quality', 'Great atmosphere | great food | great service | affordable | Highly recommended‚Ä¶', 'On aime on love on kiiiiffe ü§©', '', "I ordered a chicken tiep to take away. The manager seemed annoyed when I asked her for the menu. There were around ten dishes offered on the slate outside, however she only offered me chicken or fish tiep. I then waited for over 40 minutes even though there was no one else there! I even heard a microwave, so I don't understand why it took so long. But hey, if it was still good... The rice was way overcooked, mushy, and tasteless (no spices or seasoning); the chicken was dry and stringy. The vegetables were the only decent part of the dish. In short, 10‚Ç¨ for a dish that is almost edible, and for an interminable wait, I strongly advise against it!"]

['Understaff‚Ä¶ usually have to wait 10-15mn to get your order.', 'Relatively calm and chill. Sadly you can\'t access the second floor. The workers seem to often struggle with "whose food it is" and it can lead to a lot of panic from the workers, and a *long* wait time for the customers. Overall, not a bad experience. They\'re friendly so that\'s great. Would come back if I\'m around.', "Absolutely disgusting. Staff were extremely rude and disrespectful. The bathroom was actually HORRENDOUS. I'd rather die then step foot in there again. It smells horrible and looks like it has not been cleaned in years.", "Kiosks work. It's as good as fast food gets.", "we were a group of 10 friends the first orders were quick then they took a long time I don't know why at least 15 minutes. But that's ok otherwise everything was good."]

["The worst thing I could possibly say about a McDonald's is that chicken tenders were processed. That sadly appears to be the case here, and if it's not, then I don't know how they achieved the results they did. A massive downgrade from British McDonald's on that fact alone. The wedges were nice, but the ranch wrap was a mushy mess", 'utterly disappointing‚Ä¶i went there because i wanted to have a quick lunch before my concert. First of all, the toilet didn‚Äôt work. Secondly, the dessert station was empty (no effort whatsoever). Lastly, the mcchicken was dry and i ordered a fanta, but they gave me a coca cola‚Ä¶ i don‚Äôt recommend this mcdonald at all!!', "A little crowded environment. You need to wait for a little  long and the taste is just ok. The service team is very busy with their team so you won't get attention for what you ask. The teamwork needs to be better and also make sure about the cleanliness.", 'So unbelievably, incredibly slow! People even abandoned their orders. What happened to ‚Äúfast food‚Äù?? Also no hygiene here!', 'AVOID AT ALL COST!
-dirty floors, sticky table, toilet with tissues and pee everywhere
-small staff that even the security is serving food
-THE MOST EXPENSIVE MCDO I'VE BEEN IN FRANCE
-our coke is not frizzy or cold :(
UPDATE: this review has been updated because my previous review was "offensive" when it is the dirtiest McDonald's ever']

['Very nice place , friendly staff and delicious food.', 'Top', 'Good', 'Super', "The dishes are not bad and affordable but on the other hand the quality of service and delivery is Zero points!\nI order from them very early to be delivered on time, there is nothing to do my order arrives 2 hours later!!! and it's not the fault of the poor delivery people who suffer from the management and disorganization of delivery!!! I do not recommend it if you are in a hurry at lunchtime"]

['Very good dishes. Chinese Wen Style. Absolutely fabulous.', 'Very good Chinese restaurant which offers options for all budgets and for all occasions. Normally we find a classic menu of an Asian restaurant, with its sure values \u200b\u200blike fried noodles, Cantonese rice, Peking duck etc., for special occasions like birthdays or weddings, it offers formulas which range from 60‚Ç¨ to 150‚Ç¨ ‚Ç¨ per person depending on budget. The rooms can be privatized, the quality is there and the service is fast. There are just sometimes people smoking inside the restaurant and it bothers everyone. The owner must firmly enforce this rule. Otherwise I highly recommend this place, both for celebrating major events and for just a simple meal. Thanks to the whole team.', 'The dishes are good but the decor is average', 'Very good meal at a good price! A little too much noise.', 'Please be careful of your alcoholic customers who allow themselves to insult and be aggressive towards young women in the street...']

['Good quality, but they raised prices at the beginning of this 2023 year for 0.20‚Ç¨, over 20% for baguette, so I buy less than before. Price went up for all products.', "Great local bakery, one of the best tuna baguette's I've had, good prices as well, compared to the centre of town. Helpful staff, specially for an English speaker.", 'Black forest pastry had some alcohol and it was divine', 'Just a perfect bakery!', 'Baguettes so well']

["It's an above average 'all you can eat'. The staff are very friendly though", 'Service is good and the quality of food is not bad', 'Eat as much as you can. Very good Japanese food.', 'Good food great service\nWould reccomend', 'Great Sushi restaurant with some cracking deals']

Adresse: 90 Quai de la Loire, 75019 Paris, France
Reviews:
['Apparently the closest you can get to legit German food in Paris but it was all a bit dry and seemed a day old. The beer selection was good though and the location along the canal is excellent.', 'One of the few cool German hangouts in Paris.

They have a very good selection of regional German beers, even alcoholfree options! The latter is super rare in Paris unfortunately. . .

There is lots of German food as well. Personally, I like the basic bretzel! ü•®', "Going here was easily one of the best and most positive experiences I've had in Paris. The server/bartender was incredibly kind, accomodating and pleasant to my large group. She was amazing and it was a breath of fresh air in this city. Also, the food was fantastic! Definitely worth a visit. Looking forward to my next meal there.", "I had an extremely disappointing experience at this bar. As a vegetarian, I was excited to see a veggie schnitzel on the menu, only to be told by the waiter that it was no longer available. I opted for a veggie currywurst with a side of potato salad instead. Halfway through my meal, I discovered pieces of ham in my potato salad. When I brought this to the waiter's attention, he confirmed it was indeed ham. I then asked for a replacement side of sauerkraut. However, just as I started eating the sauerkraut, another waiter informed me that while it contained no meat, it had been cooked in meat stock. This lack of consideration for dietary restrictions is unacceptable. I won‚Äôt be returning and cannot recommend this place to other vegetarians.", 'Good atmosphere, friendly staff. The waiters make an effort to speak German, which is funny, but also helpful, if you prefer to order in German :) For us Berliners it is a bit pricey, but relative to Paris quite OK. I had the Falafel-Burger (with fries) - was tasty and quite a generous portion (but not very German...).']

['Had a nice shwarma lafa and chips here. The food is good, the place looks like it could do with a revamp.', 'The shop didn‚Äòt really look like much, but the food was incredible - especially the falafel.\nI would definitely recommend 10/10!', 'Genial', 'Good takes time', 'Best falafel EVER!\nFresh and crispy, just fried, really amazing!']

['A m a z i n g  location & Bistronomy menu!
Must be one of Paris best kept secret...

180‚Ä¢C open-view over canals and Paris‚Äô largest Park... one of the rarest city terrasses.

Food is delicious and well-priced: 15‚Ç¨ tasty 2-courses at lunch:
I had an incredible Mushroom Gaspacho and a perfectly cooked Sea Bass, Lemongrass coconut milk infused red lentils.
Topped up with great coffee and absolutely adorable team... Highly recommended !

Ps: for the sake of transparency, I am friends with one of the cooks, but that really doesn‚Äôt change my tastebuds, pictures and opinion :)', 'It like a hidden jem there are seats inside and outside and umbrellas.The outside seats are next to the canal too.there is a variety of food and drinks.', 'The Chicken Avocado Burger was bombastic, really delicious. Can only recommend this place. Small menu card‚Ä¶ but great. Had a tasty Ros√© to the burger. With kids, they had the croque monsieur‚Ä¶ also remarkable. üëå', 'The personal is nice but terribly stoned. The waiter came 3 times to confirm our order if it was the right one. The food is really cheap quality but looks good for a photoü§£ Im not going back there for sure', 'They have one vegan dish, the salad,+ which was definitely good. I do wish they could have another vegan option as well. Nice location and a very friendly waiter. He can speak English too.']

Adresse: 41 bis Quai de la Loire, 75019 Paris, France
Reviews:
['A lucky find whilst on a business trip.

Tucked away a gem of a bar restaurant.

The atmosphere is buzzing even on a Monday or Tuesday evening.

They brew thier own beer and have a great selection of others.

The bougionjon brisket is fantastic.

On the second visit I was remembered and welcomed very warmly.

Have a great visit if you have the chance', 'Wandered in, 5 adults and 1 toddler, very friendly staff who welcomed us in and found seats, had some excellent food quickly served, and the beers were fantastic too. Glad we made the effort to come here, really enjoyed it.', 'Nice river side bar and restaurant. Good own beers on tap and a tasty food menu.
Large amounts of outdoor seating under cover.
Enjoyed the IPA and fish & chips.', "A great find! The luxury of a good beer outdoors in the shade, by a canal, is one of life's simple pleasures. Add to that some really tasty fish and chips and the winner of kimchi as a side dish, and my afternoon was complete. Will come here again.", "Excellent atmosphere by the canal. This is a microbrewery worth visiting - easy walking distance from the Metro and a great aesthetic to the whole place.

You can normally tell it's a good place if people are visiting just for the food and not the beer - plenty of locals there on a Tuesday lunchtime just enjoying themselves for lunch. Tapioca halloumi to start and a brilliant brisket bourguignon made for a great lunch, washed down with Paname's own easy drinking IPAs. All to the sounds of indie music to complete the vibes.

Would highly recommend you visit - staff were wonderful, and the venue is great."]

['First impression is how friendly and welcoming the staffs are at this supermarket! It\'s small but well stocked, clean and bright with a small selection of fresh produce but plenty of general grocery items. Reasonably priced. They have a "make yourself coffee machine and orange juicers machine" inside the store, which I find convenient and easy to use. The cashier staff who served me was so friendly and a happy smile which concludes a pleasant experience visiting this supermarket! Highly recommended for friendly services and good stock.', 'Aways friendly.', 'Good reliable supermarket chain... Smallish one but very close to metro.', 'Very convenient and reasonable prices although a little cluttered', 'Cool']

['Very good', 'Good service, excellent salad, good pizza. Price ok', 'Great, I invited my best friend there last night, she was the one who introduced me to it by eating the best fresh üç£ there.
Last night, we ate a delicious fresh tuna steak with sesame, with fries and arugula and mesclin salad.
A treat.
Great atmosphere, clean, relaxing setting and warm welcome service.
Thanks to the whole team', "Quite good and generous pizza.

Don't expect an express service, the waiting time is very long before being served.

The apple pie with salted caramel sauce is very succulent. Don't miss it if you're there.

A room with karaoke is present at -1 but I did not have the opportunity to visit it.", "The menu of this restaurant is original and changes a little from what you can find in the community. Too bad the service leaves a little to be desired and the view of the kitchen really doesn't make you want to eat in this restaurant.
The wait is sometimes too long. It is also difficult to park but the valet service is too expensive."]

["Service is good and people there are helpful and courteous. The meals are ok but nothing extraordinary. It's quite expensive too.", 'Food quite food and unfriendly service.', 'Testy food and good service', 'Top', 'Excellent service !']

['Clean and nice. But expensive', 'Good service good food', 'Good', 'Top', 'Contrary to the comments, super patient and available server, completely reasonable preparation time (even fast), we were a group with a lot of requests throughout the meal and everything was done really well!\nTasty dishes, fresh food. Note that in this Nina Sushi, certain dishes are not offered (buger, noodles, fries).']

["Every customer is required to put their bag on a table at the entrance. No locker is provided, neither a guarantee that your stuff will be taken care of. Come and shop here ONLY IF you don't mind being suspected as a thief.", "Overpriced, poor and slow service, they don't adhere to their own opening hours, the quality of the fresh produce is regularly very lacking (rotten fruits and vegetables frequently), and added to that the prices listed in the shop occasionally don't match up to those when you scan items.\n\nThere are other better shops a short walk away, until this place sorts itself out shop in another nearby.", "Supermarch√© found all over Paris. I rush in when out and about because they aren't my most preferred due to their prices. A little bit more expensive than other supermarkets, say, LeaderPrice.", 'This is a supermarket. Bought orange juice. Was ok. Thanks for reading my review.', 'Smallish branch open from 8am to 9pm even on Sundays']

['Prompt and friendly staff who put in the legwork to bridge the language gap. The food is good and shockingly affordable for Paris, and the location is right by the canal, which is a nice little bonus', 'A very beautiful culinary and human experience!
The products are fresh, the chef shares his joy of cooking with us, all in a warm family atmosphere!
I highly recommend!', 'Came with family to drink coffee and having a young child I wanted to change a diaper, the boss clearly told me that I had to leave the premises because he did not provide anything to change a baby in the toilets, moreover he added that the customers were going to see the baby without clothes.
I invite you, Mr. Boss, when you address customers to do so with respect and not contempt.
To flee!', 'Small, friendly bistro, we are quickly considered regulars. The dishes are good and inexpensive, the salads plentiful. Special mention to the tuna brick.', 'Warm team, friendly places
Mourad the chef listens to his customers
Value for money at Topp üòâ
Yes I will come back, I highly recommend üéâüéäüôè']

["Very nice place. Take a couscous dish, it's really enjoyable,  really tasty and good for the whole table. Same with the beers :)", 'A chilled out place, great home made food for a top price and friendly stuff üå∫
I recommend the couscous dishes. The amount is huge and the taste- very nice :)
I will definitely come back again.', 'One of the friendiest place in Paris, thanks to Majid and his formidable team !', 'Go to this restaurant. We decided to stop in last minute on a Sunday night, and what an amazing surprise it was. The couscous was fantastic, the service lovely, and we even had an outstanding strawberry dessert. Highest recommendation.', 'We came with high expectations because of reviews.
The couscous wasn‚Äôt available because it had only just arrived which was a shame so we ordered a vegetarian burger which was a sandwich not a burger. I think it‚Äôs quite ridiculous to charge the same price as a hamburger as you do for egg, lettuce and tomato, it was enjoyable but it was not satisfying.
The communication was difficult, thankfully another customer was able to translate for us because they didn‚Äôt have an English menu, which I understand were in a foreign country but Google translate is free.']

Adresse: 110 Bis Av. de Flandre, 75019 Paris, France
Reviews: ['Small store bit it open till 21h30 AND on Sundays so very convenient in a country where it‚Äôs really difficult to find a store opened late at night (10pm) or during the weekend (including Sundays)', 'Clean and well organised, the prices are high though. Overall no complaints.', "Medium size branch of this popular supermarket...open Sunday's !!", 'Great convenience store!', 'Love it']

['Food was delicious and service was fantastic. Highly recommend for discovering Ivorian food.', "Les chats Perch√©s is a local bar. I live a minute away from it and it quickly became my favorite bar, and not only because it's close. The owners are really cool and the patrons are mainly people living in the neighborhood. Prices are more than fair and if you want to eat, it's surprisingly good for the cheap price. You can pick anything on the menu and you'll be satisfied.\n\nRiP Les chats Perch√©s ! We miss you but had fun times there ;)", "We oringally stopped in for a quick advice on where to get a bottle of wine and the owner Paul told us honestly it would be cheaper to go down the street. we came back a few nights later. This place is off the charts cool. The atmosphere is a+++++ amazing and the food is very good. I promise you wont regret spending some time here, although I HIGHLY RECOMMEND that it's not your last night in paris as we closed the bar down the night before our 10am flight... Paul and alex made our last night truly amazing and we couldnt thank you enough for the amazing experience we had with you. MERCI", 'A really friendly neighborhood bar, with a popping crowd and great bartenders. I had a great time and am really grateful to have had the opportunity to meet this incredible group! I wish I had a bar like that next to home!', 'So yummy and a great price! Service is nice and the food comes quickly. Definitely would recommend!']

['The staff in this place are brilliant, very welcoming, happy and serve with a smile.
